chapter.verse: Uru ni urukurikirane rwa ba sekuruza ba Yesu ari we Kristo, yakomotse kuri Dawidi wo mu ruvyaro rwa Aburahamu:
Aburahamu yavyaye Isaka, Isaka yavyaye Yakobo, Yakobo yavyaye Yuda n’abandi bavukana,
Yuda yavyaye Peresi na Zera kuri Tamari, Peresi yavyaye Hezironi, Hezironi yavyaye Ramu,
Ramu yavyaye Aminadabu, Aminadabu yavyaye Nahashoni, Nahashoni yavyaye Salimoni,
Salimoni yavyaye Bowazi kuri Rahabu, Bowazi yavyaye Obedi kuri Rusi, Obedi yavyaye Isayi,
hanyuma Isayi avyara umwami Dawidi. Dawidi na we yavyaye Salomo, amuvyara kuri Batisheba yahora ari muka Uriya,
Salomo yavyaye Rehobowamu, Rehobowamu yavyaye Abiya, Abiya yavyaye Asa,
Asa yavyaye Yehoshafati, Yehoshafati yavyaye Yehoramu, Yehoramu yavyaye Uziya,
Uziya yavyaye Yotamu, Yotamu yavyaye Ahazi, Ahazi yavyaye Hezekiya,
Hezekiya yavyaye Manase Manase yavyaye Amoni, Amoni yavyaye Yosiya,
hanyuma Yosiya avyara Yekoniya n’abo bavukana igihe bajanwa kuba abanyagano i Babiloni.
Bamaze kuva mu buja i Babiloni, Yekoniya yavyaye Shalutiyeli, Shalutiyeli yavyaye Zerubabeli,
Zerubabeli yavyaye Abiyudi, Abiyudi yavyaye Eliyakimu, Eliyakimu yavyaye Azori,
Azori yavyaye Sadoki, Sadoki yavyaye Akimu, Akimu yavyaye Elihudi,
Elihudi yavyaye Eleyazari, Eleyazari yavyaye Matani, Matani yavyaye Yakobo,
hanyuma Yakobo avyara Yosefu, umugabo wa Mariya, nyina wa Yesu ari we Kristo.

Ni ukuvuga ko habayeho urukurikirane rw’imiryango cumi n’ine kuva kuri Aburahamu gushika kuri Dawidi; n’iyindi cumi n’ine kuva kuri Dawidi gushika igihe bajanwa kuba abanyagano i Babiloni; hongera haba urundi rukurikirane rw’imiryango cumi n’ine kuva bagarutse bavuye mu buja gushika kuri Kristo.
Uku ni ko ukuvuka kwa Yesu ari we Kristo kwagenze: nyina wiwe Mariya yari akowe na Yosefu, ariko imbere y’uko babana, asama inda ivuye ku bushobozi bwa Mpwemu Yera.
Kubera ko Yosefu yari umuntu atunganye, yiyumvira ingene yomuheba mu mpisho, kuko atagomba kumutetereza mu bantu.
Ariko, akivyiyumvira, umumarayika w’Umwami Imana araza avugana na we mu ndoto amubwira ati: “Yosefu mwana wa Dawidi, ntutinye kurongora Mariya, kuko inda afise yavuye kuri Mpwemu Yera.
Azovyara umwana w’umuhungu, nawe uze umwite Yesu, kuko ari we azokiza abantu biwe ivyaha vyabo.”
Ivyo vyose vyabaye kugira ngo ivyo Umwami Imana yari yaravugishije abavugishwa na we bishike, ngo:
“Ehe, inkumi itarigera iryamana n’umugabo izosama inda ivyare umwana w’umuhungu hanyuma bamwite Emanuweli” (bisobanurwa ngo “Imana iri kumwe natwe”).
Yosefu amaze kwikangura, aca akora ivyo umumarayika w’Umwami Imana yamubwiye, atwara Mariya iwe nk’umugore wiwe.
Ariko ntibigeze baryamana nk’umugore n’umugabo kugeza amaze kuvyara uwo mwana w’umuhungu; hanyuma amwita Yesu.
Yesu amaze kuvukira i Betelehemu mu ntara ya Yudaya, ku ngoma y’umwami Herode, abanyabwenge mu vy’inyenyeri bavuye mu buseruko baja i Yerusalemu.
Barabaza bati: “Umwami w’Abayuda yavutse ari hehe? Twabonye inyenyeri yiwe mu buseruko none tuzanywe no kumusenga.”
Umwami Herode yumvise iyo nkuru yaciye abura amahoro, hamwe n’ab’i Yerusalemu bose.
Aca akoranya abakuru b’abaherezi n’abigisha b’ivyagezwe, ababaza ati: “Vyanditswe ko Kristo azovukira hehe?”
Baramwishura bati: “Ni i Betelehemu mu ntara ya Yudaya, kuko ari ko vyanditswe n’uwavugishwa n’Imana ngo:
‘Kandi wewe, Betelehemu mu ntara ya Yuda, nturi mutoya mu bisagara vya Yuda, kuko muri wewe hazokomoka umurongozi azoragira ubwoko bwanje bwa Isirayeli.’ ”
Hanyuma Herode ahamagaza mu mpisho ba banyabwenge agerageza kubabaza neza igihe iyo nyenyeri yabonekeye.
Aca arabarungika i Betelehemu, ababwira ati: “Genda mubaze neza ivyerekeye uwo Mwana. Mumaze kumubona, muce mugaruka mumbwire kugira ngo nanje nje kumushengerera.”
Bamaze kwumva ivyo umwami ababariye, baca babandanya urugendo. Ya nyenyeri babona mu buseruko ica ibaja imbere kugeza ihagaze hejuru y’aho uwo mwana yari ari.
Babonye ya nyenyeri ihagaze bagira umunezero mwinshi.

Binjiye mu nzu, babona uwo mwana ari kumwe na nyina Mariya, barapfukama baramusenga. Hanyuma batekurura udusaho turimwo ivy’agaciro bagendanye babimuhako ishikanwa rigizwe n’inzahabu, n’utundi tuntu tumota neza.
Hanyuma, Imana imaze kubamenyesha mu nzozi ngo ntibasubire kwa Herode, baca bisubirira iwabo bajanye iyindi nzira.

Bamaze kugenda, umumarayika w’Umwami Imana araza avugana na Yosefu mu nzozi amubwira ati: “Fata umwana na nyina ubahungishirize muri Egiputa; uzogumeyo kugeza aho nzokubwirira kugaruka, kuko Herode ariko arondera umwana ngo amwice.”
Yosefu avyuka hakiri mw’ijoro, afata umwana na nyina, abahungishiriza muri Egiputa,
agumayo kugeza Herode apfuye. Uko ni ko Umwami Imana yashikije ivyo yari yaravuze aciye ku wavugishwa na we ngo: “Nahamagaye umwana wanje ngo ave muri Egiputa.”

Herode abonye ko ba banyabwenge mu vy’inyenyeri mu buseruko bamuhenze, arashavura cane, aca arungika abasoda kwica abana bose b’i Betelehemu no mu micungararo yaho, bafise imyaka ibiri n’abatarayikwiza akurikije igihe yabonaniye na ba banyabwenge.
Uko ni ko ivyo uwavugishwa n’Imana Yeremiya yavuze vyashitse ati:
“Induru yumvikaniye i Rama, amarira n’amaborogo menshi: Rasheli aririra abana biwe kandi yanse guhozwa kuko batakiriho.”
Herode amaze gupfa, umumarayika w’Umwami Imana abonekera Yosefu mu ndoto ari muri Egiputa,
amubwira ati: “Haguruka ujane umwana na nyina usubire mu gihugu ca Isirayeli, kuko abahora barondera kwica uwo mwana bamaze gupfa.”
Yosefu arahaguruka, afata umwana na nyina basubira mu gihugu ca Isirayeli.
Ariko amaze kwumva ko Arukelayosi ari we atwara intara y’i Yudaya mu gishingo ca se Herode, aca aratinya kujayo, mu nyuma amaze kuburirwa n’Imana mu ndoto, aja mu ntara y’i Galilaya,
baca baja kuba mu gisagara citwa Nazareti. Uko ni ko ivyo abavugishwa n’Imana bavuze vyashitse ngo: “Azokwitwa Umunyenazareti.”
Haciye igihe haza Yohana Umubatizi, yigishiriza mu bugaragwa bw’i Yudaya,
avuga ati: “Nimwihane kuko Ubwami bw’ijuru buri hafi.”
Uwo Yohana ni we yari yaravuzwe n’uwavugishwa n’Imana Yesaya, igihe yavuga ati: “Hari ijwi ry’uwusemerera mu bugaragwa ati: ‘Nimutegurire Uhoraho aho aca, mugorore inzira agenderamwo.’ ”
Yohana yambara impuzu ikozwe mu bwoya bw’ingamiya akayikenyeza umukanda w’urushato mu rukenyerero. Ivyokurya vyiwe vyari inzige n’ubuki bwo mw’ishamba.
Abantu bava i Yerusalemu, i Yudaya no mu karere k’uruzi Yorodani, bakaja iyo ari.
Bamaze kwatura ivyaha vyabo yaca ababatiza mu ruzi Yorodani.
Ariko abonye ko Abafarisayo n’Abasadukayo benshi baje aho ari ngo ababatize, arababaza ati: “Mwa bana b’inzoka mwe, ni nde yababuriye ngo muhunge uburake bw’Imana bugiye kuza?
Nimukore ibikorwa vyerekana ko mwihanye,
mureke kwibwira mu mitima yanyu muti: ‘Turi uruvyaro rwa Aburahamu’, kuko ndababwira ko no muri aya mabuye mubona, Imana ishobora gukuramwo abana ba Aburahamu.
Mbere incabiti ibanguriwe imizi y’ibiti: igiti cose kitama ivyamwa vyiza kigiye gucibwa gitererwe mu muriro.
Jewe ndababatiza mu mazi kuko mwihanye ivyaha, ariko uwuje inyuma yanje arandusha ubushobozi, mbere ntibimbereye no kumutwaza ibirato. We azobabatiza muri Mpwemu Yera no mu muriro.
Afise urutaro rwo kugosora mu minwe, azokubura ikibanza co gusekuriramwo. Ahejeje kugosora azokwegeraniriza ingano mu kigega umuguruka na wo awuturirire mu muriro utazokwigera uzima.”
Hanyuma Yesu ava i Galilaya aja kuri Yorodani ngo abatizwe na Yohana.
Ariko Yohana agerageza kumwankira, avuga ati: “Ni jewe nkwiye kubatizwa nawe, none uje ngo abe ari jewe nkubatiza!”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Reka tubikore gutyo, kuko bikwiye ko dushitsa ibigororotse.” Yohana aca yemera kumubatiza.
Yesu amaze kubatizwa, aca ava mu mazi. Uwo mwanya nyene, ijuru riruguruka, abona Mpwemu w’Imana amanuka kuri we mw’ishusho y’inuma.
Hanyuma ijwi ryumvikana rivuye mw’ijuru rivuga riti: “Uwu ni Umwana wanje nkunda, akampimbara.”
Hanyuma Yesu aca ajanwa na Mpwemu mu bugaragwa kugira ngo ageragezwe na Satani.
Amaze gusenga yisonzesheje imisi mirongo ine n’amajoro mirongo ine, yumva arashonje.
Umugeragezi aca aramwegera, amubwira ati: “Niwaba uri Umwana w’Imana, bwira aya mabuye ahinduke imikate.”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Handitswe ngo: ‘Umuntu ntabeshwaho n’indya gusa, ariko atungwa n’ijambo ryose rivuye mu kanwa k’Imana.’ ”
Hanyuma wa mubi amujana i Yerusalemu, igisagara cera, amuhagarika ku rusengero ahantu hataramutse,
amubwira ati: “Niwaba uri Umwana w’Imana, niwikororere hasi, kuko handitswe ngo: ‘Azotegeka abamarayika biwe bakuzigame. Bazokurerura mu maboko yabo kugira ngo ntutsitare kw’ibuye.’ ”
Yesu na we aramwishura ati: “Handitswe ngo: ‘Ntukagerageze Uhoraho Imana yawe.’ ”
Hanyuma Satani yongera kumujana ku musozi muremure cane amwereka ubwami bwose bwo mw’isi n’ubwiza bwabwo.
Aramubwira ati: “Ivyo vyose ndabiguha niwapfukama ukansenga.”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Mva i ruhande Satani! Kuko handitswe ngo: ‘Usenge Uhoraho Imana yawe, kandi abe ari yo yonyene ukorera.’ ”
Kuva ako kanya Satani aca aramureka, maze abamarayika baraza baramukorera.
Yesu yumvise ko Yohana yashizwe mw’ibohero, aca aja i Galilaya.
Yabanje kuja i Nazareti, hanyuma avayo aja kuba i Kaperinawumu, igisagara cari hafi y’ikiyaga mu ntara ya Zabuloni na Nafutali,
kugira ngo ivyavuzwe n’uwavugishwa n’Imana Yesaya bishike. Yavuze ati:
“Mu ntara ya Zabuloni n’intara ya Nafutali, mu bice vyegereye ikiyaga, hakurya ya Yorodani, i Galilaya haba Abanyamahanga benshi;
abantu bahora bicaye mu mwijima, babonye umuco mwinshi, kandi ababa mu gihugu c’igitutu c’urupfu, umuco warabarasiye.”
Kuva ico gihe Yesu aca atangura kuvuga Ubutumwa Bwiza no kwigisha, ati: “Nimwihane kuko Ubwami bw’ijuru buri hafi.”
Yesu ariko aragendagenda ku nkengera y’ikiyaga Galilaya, abona abavukana babiri, Simoni batazira Petero na Andereya mwene nyina, bariko baterera urusenga mu mazi kuko bari abarovyi.
Yesu arababwira ati: “Nimunkurikire, nzobagira abarovyi b’abantu.”
Ubwo nyene, baca basiga ngaho insenga zabo, baramukurikira.
Abandanije, abona Yakobo na Yohana bene Zebedayo, bari kumwe na se mu bwato, bariko barasana insenga zabo. Maze Yesu arabahamagara,
baca basiga ubwato na se baramukurikira.
Ico gihe Yesu agendagenda mu ntara yose ya Galilaya yigishiriza mu masinagogi yaho, avuga Ubutumwa Bwiza bw’Ubwami, akiza abantu ingwara zose n’ubumuga bwose.

Nuko inkuru ziwe zikwiragira hose, gushika no muri Siriya. Bamuzanira abarwayi bose: abafise ububabare butandukanye, ababoshwe n’abadayimoni, abarwaye intandara, hamwe n’abatikakaza kubera bababara mu mubiri; bose arabakiza.
Maze amasinzi y’abantu baramukurikira, bavuye i Galilaya, i Dekapolisi, i Yerusalemu, i Yudaya, no hakurya ya Yorodani.
Yesu abonye abantu baje ari benshi, aca aduga umusozi. Amaze kwicara, abigishwa biwe baramwegera,
aca atangura kubigisha. Arababwira ati:
“Harahiriwe abumva ko bakenye mu buryo bw’impwemu, kuko Ubwami bw’ijuru ari ubwabo.
Harahiriwe abarira, kuko ari bo bazohozwa.
Harahiriwe abaciye bugufi, kuko bazoragwa isi.
Harahiriwe abafise inzara n’inyota vyo kugororoka, kuko bazohazwa.
Harahiriwe abagira imbabazi, kuko na bo bazozigirirwa.
Harahiriwe abafise imitima itanduye, kuko bazobona Imana.
Harahiriwe abaharanira amahoro, kuko bazokwitwa abana b’Imana.
Harahiriwe abahamwa bahorwa ukugororoka, kuko Ubwami bw’ijuru ari ubwabo.
Namwe muzoba muhiriwe abantu nibabatuka, bakabahama, bakabavugako ibibi vyinshi babampora.
Muze munezerwe kandi muhimbarwe kuko impera yanyu izoba ari nini mw’ijuru. Uko ni ko bahamye abavugishwa n’Imana babitangiye imbere.
Muri umunyu mu bantu bo mw’isi. Ariko iyo umunyu utakaje uburyohe bwawo, mbega bwowusubiramwo gute? Nta co uba ukimaze atari ugutabwa hanze abantu bakawucako.
Muri umuco mu bantu bo mw’isi. Igisagara kiri hejuru ku gasozi, ntigishobora kunyegezwa.
Ni ko bimeze no kw’itara, nta woridomeka ngo ace aryubikako igiseke. Ahubwo arishira ku giterekwako itara kugira ngo riboneshereze abari mu nzu bose.
Uko ni ko mukwiye kureka umuco wanyu ukakira imbere y’abantu kugira ngo babone ibikorwa vyanyu vyiza, hanyuma bahimbaze So wo mw’ijuru.
Ntimwibaze ko nazanywe no gukuraho ivyagezwe vya Mose n’Ivyanditswe n’abavugishwa n’Imana. Oya sinazanywe no kubikuraho, ahubwo nazanywe no kubishitsa.
Ndababwire ukuri, igihe cose ijuru n’isi bizoba bikiriho, nta n’akadome na gatoya canke agakwabu ko mu vyagezwe vy’Imana kazovako, kugeza ivyo vyagezwe bishikije intumbero yavyo.

Ni co gituma umuntu wese atazokurikiza ayo mabwirizwa naho ryoba ritoya ryo muri yo kandi akigisha abandi kutayakurikiza azoba uwa nyuma mu Bwami bw’ijuru. Ariko uwo wese azoyakurikiza akigisha n’abandi kuyakurikiza azoba mukuru mu Bwami bw’ijuru.
Ndababwire ukuri, ukugororoka kwanyu niyo kutaruta ukw’abigisha b’Ivyanditswe n’ukw’Abafarisayo, ntimuzoruha mwinjira mu Bwami bw’ijuru.
Mwarumvise ko ba sogokuruza bari barigishijwe ngo: ‘Ntukice, kandi ko uwica wese azotsindwa n’urubanza’;

ariko jeho ndababwira ko umuntu wese ashavurira mwenewabo aba akwiye gucirwa urubanza kandi uwubwiye umuvukanyi ngo: Wa mburabwenge we, aba akwiye guhanwa n’abacamanza. Kandi uwubwiye umuntu ngo: Wa musazi we aba akwiye gutererwa mu muriro wa Gehinomu.
Mu gihe rero uriko urashikanira Imana ikimazi ku gicaniro, ukibuka ko hariho ikintu upfa na mugenzawe,
siga ikimazi cawe ngaho imbere y’igicaniro, ubanze ugende wiyuzuze na mugenzawe hanyuma ugaruke utange ico kimazi.
Nihagira umuntu aja kukwagiriza mu bucamanza, wihutire kwiyuzuza na we mukiri mu nzira, kugira ngo ntagushikirize umucamanza hanyuma na we akagutanga ku mukuru w’ibohero, uwo na we akagupfunga.
Ndakubwire ukuri, ntuzovayo utarishe n’igiceri ca nyuma umuheraniye.
Mwarumvise ko vyavuzwe ngo: ‘Ntugasambane.’
Ariko jeho ndababwira nti umuntu wese araba umugore akipfuza gusambana na we aba yamaze gukora ico caha mu mutima.
Ijisho ryawe ry’i buryo niryatuma wipfuza, ukagwa mu caha, urikureyo urite kure yawe, kuko vyokubera vyiza kubura igihimba kimwe c’umubiri wawe hako umubiri wawe wose utabwa muri Gehinomu.
Ukuboko kwawe kw’i buryo nikwatuma ucumura, uguce ugute kure yawe, kuko vyokubera vyiza, kubura igihimba kimwe c’umubiri hako umubiri wawe wose utabwa muri Gehinomu.
Vyaravuzwe mu vyagezwe ngo: ‘Umuntu niyirukana umugore wiwe, azomuha urwandiko rwemeza ko bahukanye.’
Ariko jeho ndababwira yuko umuntu wese yirukana umugore wiwe atamuhoye ubusambanyi, aba amutumye gusambana kandi ko uwurongoye umugore yahukanye, na we aba asambanye.
Kandi, mwarumvise ko ba sogokuruza babwiwe ngo: ‘Ntukivuguruze ku vyo warahiye, ariko ushitse ivyo wemereye Uhoraho.’
Ariko jeho ndababwiye nti, ntimukarahire na rimwe: ntimukarahire ijuru kuko ari yo ntebe y’Imana; kandi
ntimukarahire isi kuko ari yo ntebe y’ibirenge vyayo; ntimukarahire Yerusalemu kuko ari co gisagara c’Imana; Umwami asumba bose.
Kandi ntukarahire umutwe wawe kuko udashobora gutuma n’agashatsi na kamwe kawo kera canke kirabura.
Muvuge ngo ‘ego’ iyo ari ego canke ‘oya’ iyo ari oya, ibindi vyose wongerako biba bivuye kuri wa mubi.
Mwarumvise ko vyavuzwe mu vyagezwe ngo: ‘Ijisho rihorwe irindi, n’iryinyo rihorwe irindi.’
Ariko jeho ndababwiye nti: ntimukihore ababagirira nabi. Umuntu niyagukubita ikofe mu musaya w’i buryo, umuhindukirize n’uw’i bubamfu.
Kandi umuntu niyagomba kukuburanya kugira ngo akunyage ishati yawe, umuhebere n’ikoti na yo.
Umuntu niyagutegeka kugenda ikilometero n’amaguru umutwaje ibintu, ugende ibilometero bibiri.
Umuntu niyagusaba ikintu ukimuhe, kandi uwugomba ko umugurana ntumwirengagize.
Mwarumvise ko vyavuzwe mu vyagezwe ngo: ‘Ukunde mugenzawe ariko wanke umwansi wawe.’
Jeho ndababwiye nti: mukunde abansi banyu kandi musengere ababagirira nabi,
kugira ngo mumere nk’abana ba Data wo mw’ijuru, kuko atuma izuba ryiwe ryakira ababi n’abeza akagwishiriza imvura abagororotse n’abatagororotse.
Nimwakunda ababakunda gusa, n’iki cotuma muhabwa impera n’Imana? Mbega abatozakori bo si uko babigenza?
Nimwaramutsa incuti zanyu gusa, ni igiki muzoba murushije abandi? Mbega abatizera Imana bo ntibabigenza batyo?
Nuko rero, nimube intungane, nk’uko So wo mw’ijuru na we ari intungane!
Mwirinde ntimukore ibikorwa vyo kugororoka murondera gushimwa n’abantu. Kuko nimwabikora gutyo, So wo mw’ijuru ntazobaha impera.
Nihagira ico uha umukene, ntuze uvuze inzamba nk’uko indyarya zibikora mu masinagogi no ku mabarabara barondera gushimwa n’abantu. Ndababwire ukuri; abo baramaze guhabwa impera zabo zose.
Ariko niwagira ico uha umukene, ukuboko kwawe kw’i bubamfu, ntigukwiye kumenya ico ukuboko kw’i buryo gukoze.
Gutyo, gutanga kwawe kugume ari ibanga, kandi So wo mw’ijuru abona ibikorerwa mw’ibanga, azobiguhembera.
Kandi, iyo musenga, ntimumere nka za ndyarya kuko zikunda gusenga zihagaze mu masinagogi no mu mayirabiri, kugira ngo abantu bose bababone. Ndababwire ukuri, abo baramaze guhabwa impera zabo zose.
Ariko, wewe ugomvye gusenga, winjire mu cumba cawe, wugare umuryango, hanyuma usenge. So wo mw’ijuru, we abona ivyo mw’ibanga, azobiguhembera.
Iyo musenga, ntimuvuge amajambo menshi nk’abatizera Imana, biyumvira ko Imana ibumva kubera amajambo menshi bavuze.
Ntimugire nka bo, kuko Data wo mw’ijuru azi neza ivyo mukeneye imbere y’uko munabimusaba.
Mukwiye gusenga muvuga muti: Data wa twese uri mw’ijuru, izina ryawe niryubahwe,
Ubwami bwawe buze, ivyo ugomba bibe mw’isi nk’uko biba mw’ijuru.
Uduhe ivyokurya bidukwiye uno musi,
Uduharire ivyaha vyacu, nk’uko natwe duharira abaducumuyeko.
Ntudutererane ibitugerageza, uhubwo udukize wa mubi. [ Kuko Ubwami, ubushobozi n’ubwiza ari ivyawe ibihe vyose. Amen. ]
Kuko nimwaharira abantu ibibi babakoreye, na So wo mw’ijuru azobaharira namwe.
Ariko nimutaharira abandi ivyaha vyabo, na So wo mw’ijuru ntazobaharira namwe ivyaha vyanyu.

Iyo mwisonzesheje, ntimwerekane ko mubabaye nk’uko za ndyarya zibigira: kuko baca bijirirwa mu maso kugira ngo abababona bose babashimire ukwisonzesha kwabo. Ndababwire ukuri: iyo ni yo mpera yonyene bazoronka.
Ariko wewe, iyo wisonzesheje, woge mu maso hanyuma wisige amavuta mu mutwe,
kugira ngo ntiwereke abantu ko wisonzesheje; ahubwo uvyereke So ari ahihishije; maze So, we abona ibikorerwa mw’ibanga, azobiguhembera.
Ntimukirundanirize ubutunzi mw’isi, aho imiswa, inyenzi n’ingese bishobora kubwonona, kandi n’ibisuma bigashobora kumena bikabwiba.
Ariko, mwirundanirize ubutunzi mw’ijuru, aho imiswa, inyenzi n’ingese bidashika ngo bibwonone canke abasuma badashika ngo bamene babwibe;
kuko aho ubutunzi bwawe buri, ari ho n’umutima wawe uzoba.
Amaso ni yo matara y’umubiri. Iyo amaso yawe abona neza, umubiri wawe wose uba mu muco.
Ariko iyo atabona neza, umubiri wawe wose uca uba mu mwijima. Nimba wibaza ko ufise umuco kandi ari umwijima, umwijima uri muri wewe n’umuzitanya!

Nta muntu n’umwe yoshobora gushimisha abakoresha babiri: agerageje kunezereza umwe yosanga yababaje uwundi; kandi agerageje kuba umwizigirwa kuri umwe yosanga yahemukiye uwundi. Nta muntu ashobora gukoreshwa n’Imana ngo yongere akoreshwe n’amahera.

Ni co gituma ndababwiye nti: ntimukiganyire kubera ivyo mukeneye kugira ngo mubeho; vyaba ivyokurya, ivyo kunywa, canke ivyo kwambara. Mbega ubuzima ntiburuta cane ivyokurya canke umubiri nturuta cane ivyambarwa?
Nimwitegereze inyoni zo mu kirere: ntizibiba, ntizimbura kandi nta co zegeraniriza mu bigega; ariko So wo mw’ijuru arazigaburira! None mwebwe ntimuziruta cane?
Ni nde muri mwebwe yoshobora kwiyongera akanya na gatoya ko kubaho kubera kwiganyira?
Ni kuki mwiganyira kubera ivyo mwambara? Nimwitegereze ingene amashurwe yo ku misozi akura. Ntakora kandi ntajisha impuzu.
Ariko ndababwiye ko na Salomo ubwiwe, mu cubahiro ciwe cose, atigeze ashaza nka rimwe muri yo.
Nimba Imana yambika gutyo ivyatsi vyo ku misozi, biriho uno musi ariko ejo bikazotererwa mu ziko, mbega ntizorushirizaho kubambika, yemwe ab’ukwizera guke!
Ni co gituma mudakwiye kwiganyira; muvuga muti: ‘Mbega tuzorya iki?’ canke ‘Mbega tuzonywa iki?’ canke ‘Mbega tuzokwambara iki?’
Ivyo ni vyo abatizera Imana birukira ubudahumeka; ariko mweho So wo mw’ijuru arazi ko ivyo vyose mubikeneye.
Ahubwo, nimubanze mwitwararike Ubwami bw’Imana no kugororoka kwayo, hanyuma ivyo na vyo izobibaha nk’inyongera.
Nuko rero ntimugahagarike imitima ku vy’ejo, kuko ejo hazoza hafise ingorane bijanye. Umusi wose ufise umwitwarariko wawo.
Ntugacire imanza abandi kugira ngo na we Imana ntizogucire urubanza.
Kuko uko ucira imanza abandi ni ko n’Imana na yo izorugucira, kandi uko mugerera abandi ari ko namwe muzogererwa.
Ni kuki ushinga ijisho akatsi kari mu jisho rya mugenzawe ariko ntiwiteho inkingi y’igiti iri mu jisho ryawe?
Ni kuki ubwira mugenzawe uti: ‘Reka ndagutosore akatsi kari mu jisho,’ kandi wewe ugendana inkingi y’igiti mu ryawe?
Wa ndyarya we, tangura ukure inkingi y’igiti iri mu jisho ryawe, hanyuma ubone gutosora akatsi kari mu jisho rya mugenzawe.
Ntimugahe ivyera vy’Imana imbwa, kandi ivy’agaciro kanini vyanyu, ntimukabiterere ingurube, kuko zohava zibihonyanga, hanyuma zikabahindukirira zikabatabagura.
Musabe muzohabwa; murondere muzoronka; mudodore muzokwugururirwa.
Kuko uwusaba wese arahabwa, uwurondera araronka, n’uwudodora arugururirwa.
Ni nde muri mwebwe umwana wiwe yosaba umukate akamuha ibuye,
canke amusavye ifi akamuha inzoka?
Nimba mwebwe mushobora guha ingabire nziza abana banyu kandi muri babi mu mitima, mbega So wo mw’ijuru ntazorushiriza guha ivyiza ababimusavye!
Nuko rero, ivyo mugomba ko abantu babagirira, abe ari vyo namwe mubagirira, kuko ivyo ari vyo ivyagezwe hamwe n’ivy’abavugishwa n’Imana vyigisha.
Muce mw’irembo ryaga. Kuko irembo ryagutse n’inzira yagutse bijana mu mahonero, kandi abantu benshi ni vyo bacamwo.
Ariko irembo ryaga n’inzira ntoya ni vyo bijana mu bugingo, kandi ababihitamwo ni bake.
Mwirinde abavugishwa b’ibinyoma, baza muri mwebwe bambaye nk’intama inyuma, ariko imbere muri bo bameze nk’ibikoko vy’inkazi.
Muzobamenyera ku vyo bama, ari vyo bikorwa vyabo. Nta wokwamura inzabibu ku bisaka vy’amahwa, canke insukoni ku mitobotobo.
Igiti ciza cama ivyamwa vyiza, kandi igiti kibi cama ivyamwa bibi.
Nta giti ciza cokwama ivyamwa bibi, kandi nta giti kibi cokwama ivyamwa vyiza.
Igiti cose cama ivyamwa bibi kiracibwa kigatererwa mu muriro.
Nuko rero, muzobamenyera ku bikorwa vyabo.
Abampamagara bose ngo: Mwami, Mwami, si bo bazokwinjira mu Bwami bw’ijuru, ariko ni abakora ivyo Data wo mw’ijuru agomba.
Ku musi w’urubanza, benshi bazombwira ngo: Mwami, Mwami, mbega ntitwavugishwa mw’izina ryawe, kandi si mw’izina ryawe twirukana abadayimoni bakava mu bantu, tugakora n’ibitangaza vyinshi?
Ariko, nzobishura nti: ‘Nta ho nigeze ndabamenya. Mva i ruhande mwa nkozi z’ibibi mwe!’
Nuko rero, umuntu wese yumva amajambo yanje akayashira mu ngiro, ameze nk’umwubatsi w’ubwenge yubatse inzu yiwe ku rutare;
imvura yaraguye, inzuzi ziruzura, igihuhusi kirahuhuta, vyisuka kuri nya nzu, yamara ntiyasenyuka kuko urufatiro rwayo rwari rumase ku rutare.
Ariko, umuntu wese yumva aya majambo yanje, hanyuma ntayashire mu ngiro, ameze nk’umwubatsi w’ikijuju, yubatse inzu yiwe ku musenyi;
imvura yaraguye, inzuzi ziruzura, igihuhusi kirahuhuta, vyisuka kuri nya nzu, hanyuma irasenyuka kandi isenyuka ryayo riba irikomeye.”
Yesu amaze kuvuga ivyo, abantu batangazwa n’inyigisho ziwe;
kuko yigishanya ububasha, mu buryo butandukanye n’ubw’abigisha b’ivyagezwe babo.
Nuko Yesu ava kuri uwo musozi, amanukana n’abantu isinzi bamukurikiye.
Maze haza umuntu arwaye imibembe, apfukama imbere yiwe, amubwira ati: “Mwami, ubishatse, woshobora kunkiza ngahumanuka.”
Yesu aca aramvura ukuboko amukorako. Aramubwira ati: “Ndabishatse, kira uhumanuke!” Ubwo nyene aca arakira ya mibembe.

Hanyuma Yesu aca aramubwira ati: “Ntihagire umuntu n’umwe ubibwira. Ariko genda umuherezi agusuzume, hanyuma utange ikimazi Mose yashinze ko uwuhumanutse atanga kugira ngo bose bamenye ko wahumanutse.”
Yesu ashitse i Kaperinawumu, umusoda mukuru mu gisoda c’Abaroma aza aho ari, aramwinginga ngo amufashe.
Aramubwira ati: “Mwami, umukozi wanje aryamye i muhira, ntiyikoma kandi arababaye cane.”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Ndaje kumukiza.”
Ariko, uwo musoda aramwishura ati: “Mwami, ntibimbereye ko wokwinjira mu nzu yanje. Pfa kuvuga ijambo rimwe gusa umukozi wanje arakira.

Kuko nanje, ndafise abantegeka, kandi mfise n’abasoda ntegeka. Iyo mbwiye umwe nti: ‘Genda,’ aca agenda; nabwira uwundi nti: ‘Ngwino,’ agaca aza; kandi iyo mbwiye umukozi wanje nti: ‘Kora iki,’ aca agikora.”
Yesu avyumvise aratangara cane, abwira abariko baramukurikira ati: “Ndababwire ukuri, nta muntu n’umwe muri Isirayeli nari bwabonane ukwizera gukomeye nk’uku.
Ndababwira ko abantu benshi bazoza, bamwe bavuye mu buseruko abandi mu burengero, bahabwe ivyicaro mu mazimano hamwe na Aburahamu, Isaka na Yakobo mu Bwami bw’ijuru;
mu gihe abari bateguriwe ubwo bwami bazoba baterewe hanze, mu mwijima aho bazokwama baboroga kandi bahekenya amenyo kubera umubabaro.”
Hanyuma Yesu aca abwira wa musoda mukuru ati: “Genda bikubere uko nyene uvyizeye.” Ako kanya nyene wa mukozi wiwe aca arakira.
Yesu aca aja i muhira kwa Petero, asanga inabukwe wa Petero ari mu buriri, arwaye kandi ashushe cane.
Amukora ku kiganza, ako kanya nyene bwa bushuhe buca burahera, aca ava hasi aramuzimana.
Ku mugoroba, bazanira Yesu abantu benshi baboshwe n’abadayimoni. Yirukana izo mpwemu mbi mu kuzitegeka, azikura mu bantu kandi akiza abarwaye bose.
Ivyo yabikoze kugira ngo ijambo uwavugishwa n’Imana Yesaya yavuze rishike, aho yavuze ati: “Yikoreye ubumuga bwacu, yishirako ingwara zacu zose.”
Yesu abonye isinzi ry’abantu baje kumushengerera, aca abwira abigishwa biwe ngo bajabuke, baje hakurya y’ikiyaga.
Umwe mu bigisha b’ivyagezwe aca aramwegera amubwira ati: “Mwigisha, nditeguye kugukurikira aho uja hose.”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Imbwebwe zirafise imyobo zibamwo n’inyoni zo mu kirere zirafise ivyari, ariko Umwana w’Umuntu ntagira n’aho akika umusaya.”
Umwe mu bigishwa aramubwira ati: “Mwami, ndeka mbanze ngende mpambe data.”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Nkurikira, reka abapfuye mu buryo bw’impwemu bahambe abapfuye babo.”
Nuko Yesu aja mu bwato, kandi abigishwa biwe bajana na we.
Ubwo nyene haza umuyaga w’igihuhusi mu kiyaga, ku buryo imipfunda yariko irisuka mu bwato; kandi ico gihe Yesu yari asinziriye.
Abigishwa biwe baramukangura bataka bati: “Mwami dukize, turapfuye!”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Yemwe mwa bantu b’ukwizera guke, ni kuki mufise ubwoba?” Aca aravyuka, akankamira uwo muyaga n’imipfunda, haca haba agahwekere.
Maze bose baca baratangara, baravugana bati: “Mbega uwu ni umuntu ki, ko umuyaga n’imipfunda na vyo bimwumvira?”

Yesu ashitse hakurya y’ikiyaga, mu ntara ya Gadarene, abantu babiri baboshwe n’abadayimoni baza guhura na we, bavuye mw’itongo ry’abapfuye. Bari bakomeye cane ku buryo ata muntu n’umwe yashobora guca muri iyo nzira.
Bamubonye, abo badayimoni baca barasemerera bati: “Uturonderako iki ga Mwana w’Imana? Uje kutubabaza kandi igihe cacu kitaragera?”
Hafi y’aho hari umukuku munini w’ingurube zari ziragiwe ku musozi.
Abo badayimoni binginga Yesu bati: “Ugomvye kutwirukana, twemerere tuje muri ziriya ngurube.”
Yesu arababwira ati: “Nimugende!” Baca bava muri abo bantu, bitera muri za ngurube. Ubwo nyene wa mukuku wose w’ingurube uca wiruka umanuka, zisuka mu kiyaga zicwa n’amazi.
Abari baragiye izo ngurube baca bariruka barahunga; baja mu gisagara kuvuga ivyabaye, n’ivyashikiye ba bantu babiri bahora baboshwe n’abadayimoni.
Ubwo nyene abantu bose bo muri ico gisagara baja gutegera Yesu, bamubonye baramwinginga ngo abavire mu ntara.
Maze Yesu atambukira mu bwato, ajabuka hakurya y’ikiyaga aja mu gisagara c’iwabo.
Nuko haza abantu bamuzaniye umuntu akongataye ku nderuzo. Yesu abonye ukwizera kwabo, abwira ico kimuga ati: “Humura, mwana wanje, ivyaha vyawe urabihariwe.”
Bamwe mu bigisha b’ivyagezwe baravugana bati: “Uwo mugabo atutse Imana!”
Yesu amenye ivyo biyumviriye, aca ababwira ati: “Ni igiki kibateye kwiyumvira nabi mu mitima yanyu?
Mbega icoroshe ni uko novuga nti: Ivyaha vyawe urabihariwe, canke ni uko novuga nti: Haguruka ugende?
Ariko nshaka ko mutahura ko Umwana w’Umuntu afise ububasha kw’isi bwo guharira ivyaha.” Nuko abwira uwo muntu amugaye ati: “Haguruka, ikorere ikirago cawe, witahire.”
Uwo muntu aca arahaguruka arataha.
Abantu babibonye, bagira ubwoba, hanyuma bahimbaza Imana yahaye umuntu ububasha bungana gutyo.
Yesu avuye aho, abona umutozakori yitwa Matayo yicaye aho yatoreza ikori, amubwira ati: “Nkurikira.” Matayo aca ava hasi, aramukurikira.
Mu nyuma, Matayo atumira Yesu n’abigishwa biwe i muhira iwe kugira ngo abazimane, atumira kandi n’abatozakori hamwe n’abandi banyavyaha ngo basangire.
Ariko Abafarisayo babibonye, babaza abigishwa biwe bati: “Ni kuki umwigisha wanyu asangira n’abatozakori n’abandi banyavyaha?”
Yesu avyumvise aravuga ati: “Abakomeye si bo bakeneye umuganga, ahubwo abarwaye ni bo bamukeneye.
Nimugende mwige iri jambo ico rivuga: ‘Nshaka ko mugira imbabazi kuruta kumpa ibimazi.’ Kuko sinaje kurondera abiyumvira ko bagororotse, ahubwo naje kurondera abemera ko ari abanyavyaha.”
Abigishwa ba Yohana Umubatizi baraza baramubaza bati: “Ni kuki twe n’Abafarisayo twisonzesha kenshi, ariko abigishwa bawe ntibisonzeshe?”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Mbega abatumire b’umukwe bogandara bakiri kumwe na we? Ariko hazogera aho umukwe abakurwamwo; ico gihe rero bazoheza bisonzeshe.
Nta wofata igitambara gishasha ngo akibaririre ku mpuzu y’umushire, kuko ico gitambara cotuma ya mpuzu y’umushire itabuka rwose.

Ni nk’uko ata wosuka umuvinyu mushasha mu mukuza w’urushato ushaje, kuko uwo muvinyu wotuma uwo mukuza umeneka; hanyuma akabura umuvinyu n’umukuza. Ahubwo umuvinyu mushasha bawushira mu mukuza mushasha, ni ho vyompi bizigamwa.”
Akiriko aravuga ivyo, haza umukuru w’isinagogi apfukama imbere yiwe amubwira ati: “Umwana wanje w’umukobwa ahejeje gupfa, ariko woza ukamurambikako ibiganza, yosubira akaba muzima.”
Yesu aca arahaguruka ajana na we n’abigishwa biwe.
Umugore yari amaranye imyaka cumi n’ibiri ingwara yo mu gitereko yo kuva amaraso, yegera Yesu amuturutse inyuma, akora ku musozo w’impuzu yiwe.
Kuko yari yiyumviriye ati: “Naho nokora ku mpuzu yiwe gusa, nokira.”
Yesu arahindukira, amubonye aramubwira ati: “Humura, mwana wanje, ukwizera kwawe kuragukijije.” Ubwo nyene uwo mugore aca arakira.
Yesu ashitse mu nzu kwa wa mukuru w’isinagogi, abona abantu bavuza imyironge n’isinzi ry’abantu bavuza induru.
Arababwira, ati: “Nimusohoke. Uwu mwana ntiyapfuye, arasinziriye.” Ariko, abo bantu baramushinyagurira.
Bamaze gusohoka, arinjira amufata ukuboko, wa mwana aca aravyuka.
Inkuru y’ico gitangaza ica ikwira hose muri iyo ntara.
Yesu avuye aho, impumyi zibiri ziramukurikira zisemerera, ziti: “Tugirire imbabazi Mwana wa Dawidi!”
Ashitse mu nzu, za mpumyi ziramwegera; hanyuma arazibaza ati: “Murizeye ko nobahumura?” Ziti: “Egome Mwami, turavyizeye.”
Nuko azikora ku maso avuga ati: “Bibabere nk’uko mwizeye.”
Maze amaso yabo aca arahumuka. Yesu arabihanikiriza ati: “Mwiyubare, ntihagire umuntu n’umwe abimenya.”
Ariko bo, basohotse baca bakwiragiza inkuru ziwe muri iyo ntara yose.
Inyuma y’ivyo, baca bamuzanira umuntu aboshwe n’umudayimoni amutera kuba ikiragi.
Yesu aca yirukana iyo dayimoni; imuvuyemwo aca aravuga. Abantu babibonye baratangara, bavuga bati: “Ntihari bwaboneke ibisa n’ibi muri Isirayeli.”
Ariko Abafarisayo bo baravuga bati: “Umukuru w’abadayimoni ni we amushoboza kwirukana abadayimoni.”
Hanyuma Yesu agendagenda mu bisagara vyose no mu mihana yose yigisha mu masinagogi yabo, avuga Ubutumwa Bwiza bw’Ubwami, akiza ubumuga bwose n’ingwara zose.
Abonye abantu, bamutera ikigongwe; kuko bari bagowe, batagira uwubatabara, mbere bameze nk’intama zitagira umwungere.
Aca abwira abigishwa biwe ati: “Ivyimburwa ni vyinshi, ariko abimbuzi ni bake.
Nimwinginge nyene ivyimburwa arungike abimbuzi mu vyimburwa vyiwe.”
Yesu ahamagara abigishwa biwe cumi na babiri abaha ububasha bwo kwirukana impwemu zihumanye no gukiza ubumuga bwose n’ingwara zose.
Aya ni yo mazina y’abigishwa biwe cumi na babiri: uwa mbere ni Simoni, yongera akitwa Petero, hamwe na mwene nyina Andereya, hagakurikira Yakobo mwene Zebedayo, na mwene nyina Yohana;
hanyuma hakaza Filipo na Baruteremi; hagasubira Toma na Matayo umutozakori; Yakobo mwene Alufayo, na Tadeyo;
Simoni Umuzelote, na Yuda Isikariyote umwe yamugurisha.
Abo cumi na babiri Yesu arabarungika, ababwiye ati: “Ntimuje mu Banyamahanga canke ngo mwinjire mu bisagara vy’i Samariya.
Ariko, mugende mu ntama zazimiye za Isirayeli.
Mugende muravuga ubu butumwa muti: ‘Ubwami bw’ijuru buri hafi.’
Mukize abarwaye, muzure abapfuye, muhumanure abarwaye imibembe, mwirukane abadayimoni. Ivyo mubiherewe ubuntu, namwe mubitangire ubundi.
Ntimwitwaze inzahabu canke ifeza mu mifuko yanyu.
Ntimwiremereze amasakoshi y’impuzu canke ibirato vyo gukuranya; mbere ntimwitwaze n’inkoni yo kwishimikiza. Kandi, ntimwanke guhabwa indaro, kuko umukozi wese aberwa n’impembo.
Igisagara cose canke imihana muzokwinjiramwo, muze murondere uwemera kubakira hanyuma muze mugume mu nzu iwe.
Nimwinjira muri iyo nzu, muze muyiramutse muyihezagira.
Niyaba ibikwiye, umuhezagiro wanyu uze ube kuri yo; niyaba itabikwiye, umuhezagiro wanyu uzogumana namwe.
Aho bazokwanka kubakira no kwumviriza amajambo muvuga, muze mukunkumure umukungugu wo mu birenge vyanyu, maze muve muri iyo nzu canke muri ico gisagara.
Ndababwire ukuri: ku musi w’imanza, ibihugu vya Sodomu na Gomora bizogira agahengekerezo kurusha ico gisagara.
Ndabarungitse nk’intama mu bikoko vy’inkazi. None rero, mwiyubare nk’inzoka kandi mwitonde nk’inuma.
Mumenye neza ko bazobashengeza imbere y’ubucamanza kandi ko bazobakubitira mu masinagogi.
Muzohagarara imbere y’abatware n’abami muzira kuba abigishwa banje, kugira ngo munshingire intahe imbere yabo n’imbere y’Abanyamahanga.
Nibabafata, ntimuze muhagarikwe imitima n’ivyo muzovuga n’uburyo muzobivuga. Ako kanya nyene, muzohabwa ivyo mukwiye kuvuga,
kuko mutazovuga ivyo mwigeneye, ariko muzovuga ivyo muhawe na Mpwemu wa So azoba abavugiramwo.
Umuntu azotanga uwo bavukana ngo bamwice, n’umuvyeyi agirire umwana wiwe uko. Abana bazogarariza abavyeyi babo banabicishe.
Muzokwankwa n’abantu bose babampora. Ariko uwuzokwihangana gushitsa kw’iherezo azokira.
Nibabahama mu gisagara kimwe, muze muhungire mu kindi. Ndababwira ukuri ko mutazoheza kugendagenda mu bisagara vyose vya Isirayeli Umwana w’Umuntu ataraza.
Umwigishwa ntaruta umwigisha, n’umukozi ntaruta shebuja.

Umwigishwa akwiye kugera ku rugezo rw’umwigisha wiwe, kandi umukozi akwiye kugera ku rugezo rwa shebuja. Nimba umukuru w’inzu bamwise Beyelizebuli, mbega abo mu nzu yiwe ntibazorushiriza kubita gutyo!
Nuko rero, ntimubatinye, kuko ata cagizwe ibanga kitazomenyekana kandi ata canyegejwe kitazonyegururwa.
Ivyo ndababwirira ahatabona, mubivugire ahabona; ivyo ndabongorera mu matwi, mubivugire hejuru ku mazu.
Ntimugatinye abashobora kwica umubiri ariko badashobora kwica ubugingo. Ahubwo, mutinye Imana, yo ishobora guhonya ubugingo n’umubiri, ikabita muri Gehinomu.
Mbega utunyoni tubiri ntitugurwa hafi ubusa bw’amahera? Ariko nta na kamwe muri two gakorokera hasi So wo mw’ijuru atavyemeye.
Mbere n’imishatsi yo ku mitwe yanyu yaraharuwe yose.
Mweho rero, ntimugire ubwoba; kuko musumvya agaciro utunyoni twinshi.
Umuntu wese azonyemanga imbere y’abantu, nanje nzomwemanga imbere ya Data wo mw’ijuru.
Ariko umuntu wese azonyihakana imbere y’abantu, nanje nzomwihakana imbere ya Data wo mw’ijuru.
Ntimwiyumvire ko naje nzanye amahoro kw’isi! Haba na mba! Sinazanye amahoro, ahubwo nazanye intambara;
kuko naje gutuma ‘umuhungu agwanya se, umukobwa agwanya nyina, umukazana agwanya inabukwe.
Abansi b’umuntu bazoba abo mu rugo iwe.’
Umuntu wese akunda se canke nyina akabandutisha ntankwiriye; uwukunda umuhungu wiwe canke umukobwa wiwe akamundutisha uwo na we nyene ntankwiriye.
Umuntu wese atikorera umusaraba wiwe ngo ankurikire ntankwiriye.
Umuntu wese agerageza kwironkera ubuzima azobubura, ariko uwubutanga ku bwanje azoburokora.
Umuntu wese abakiriye aba anyakiriye, kandi unyakiriye azoba yakiriye uwantumye.

Umuntu wese yakiriye umuvugishwa kuko ari umuvugishwa w’Imana, azohabwa ingero ihwanye n’iy’umuvugishwa. Kandi umuntu azokwakira umugororotsi w’Imana kuko agororotse, azohabwa ingero nk’iy’umugororotsi.
Nihagira umuntu aha umuntu mutoya mu bigishwa banje igikombe c’amazi apfutse kuko ari umwigishwa wanje, ndababwije ukuri ko atazobura kubihererwa impera.”
Yesu ahejeje gusigurira neza abigishwa biwe cumi na babiri igikorwa abatumye, ava ngaho aja kwigisha no kuvuga Ubutumwa Bwiza mu bisagara vy’i Galilaya.
Yohana ari mw’ibohero, yumva ivyerekeye ibikorwa vya Kristo, hanyuma amutumako abigishwa biwe kumubaza bati:
“Mbega woba uri umwe yategerezwa kuza, canke twitege uwundi?”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Subira inyuma, mugende mubwire Yohana ivyo mwumvise n’ivyo mubonye:
impumyi zirahumuka, ibimuga biragenda, abanyamibembe barahumanuka, ibipfamatwi birumva, abapfuye barazuka, kandi aboro barabwirwa ubutumwa bwiza.
Harahiriwe uwudatsitazwa n’ivyanje!”
Abigishwa ba Yohana bamaze kugenda, Yesu atangura kubwira abantu ivyerekeye Yohana, ati: “Mbega mwagiye kuraba iki mu bugaragwa? Irenga rizungagizwa n’umuyaga?
Nimba atari uko, mwagiyeyo kuraba iki? Umuntu yambaye impuzu z’igiciro kinini? Haba na mba! Abambara impuzu z’igiciro kinini bari mu birimba vy’abami.
None mwagiye kuraba iki? Uwuvugishwa n’Imana? Egome cane, ndababwiye ko mwagiye kuraba uwuruta uwuvugishwa n’Imana.
Kuko uwo ni we Ivyanditswe bivugako ngo: ‘Ngira ndungike intumwa yanje imbere yawe igutegurire inzira.’
Ndababwire ukuri, mu bantu bose bavyawe n’abagore, nta wigeze kubaho ahambaye kungana Yohana Umubatizi. Ariko, umuntu muto kuruta abandi mu Bwami bw’ijuru arahambaye kumuruta.
Uhereye igihe Yohana umubatizi yatangura kwigisha kugeza n’ubu, Ubwami bw’ijuru bugenda bugwanigwa kandi abahizi ni bo bwabwinjiramwo.
Kuko ivyo ivyagezwe vya Mose n’ivy’abavugishwa n’Imana bose bavuze gushika mu gihe ca Yohana, vyari vyerekeye kino gihe.
Kandi nimba mushaka kwemera ivyo ndiko ndavuga, ni we Eliya abavugishwa bari baravuze ko azoza.
Uwufise amatwi yo kwumva niyumve.
Mbega abantu ba kino gihe nobagereranya n’iki? Bameze nk’abana bicaye mu mayirabiri hanyuma bagahamagara abandi bana, bati:
‘Twabavugirije umwironge, ariko ntimwatamba; hanyuma tubaririmbira iz’ikigandaro ntimwarira.’
Kuko Yohana yaje atarya kandi atanywa, baca bavuga bati: ‘Arimwo dayimoni.’

Umwana w’Umuntu na we aza arya kandi anywa, baca bavuga bati: ‘Ni umukunzi w’inda kandi ni imborerwa, agendana n’abatozakori n’abandi banyavyaha.’ Ariko icerekana ko ubwenge bugororotse ni ibikorwa vyabwo.”
Maze Yesu aca atangura kuburira ibisagara yakoreyemwo ibitangaza vyinshi kuko abantu baho banse kwihana, avuga ati:

“Uzobona ibara yewe Korazini! Uzobona ibara yewe Betesayida! Kuko iyo ibitangaza vyakorewe iwanyu bikorerwa i Tiro n’i Sidoni, abaho baba barihanye kuva kera, bakambara amagunira, bakisiga n’iminyota.
Ni co gituma ndababwiye ko ku musi w’imanza i Tiro n’i Sidoni hazogira agahengekerezo kurusha mwebwe.

Na we Kaperinawumu, mbega wibaza ko uzoduzwa gushika mw’ijuru? Haba na mba! Ahubwo uzokororerwa i kuzimu mu kibanza c’abapfuye, kuko ibitangaza vyakorewe muri wewe iyo biba vyabereye i Sodomu, haba harazigamwe kugeza n’uwu musi.
Ni co gituma ndababwiye ko ku musi w’imanza igihugu ca Sodomu kizogira agahengekerezo kurusha mwebwe.”
Uwo mwanya Yesu aravuga ati: “Ndagushima Data, Mwami w’ijuru n’isi, kuko ivyo wabihishije abigira abanyabwenge n’abahinga, ukabihishurira abameze nk’abana bato.
Egome Data, kuko uko ari ko washimye kubikora.
Data yaranyizigiye anzeza vyose. Nta n’umwe azi Umwana atari Data, kandi nta n’umwe azi Data atari Umwana, n’uwo Umwana ahisemwo kumuhishurira.
Nimuze kuri jewe mwese abarushe n’abaremerewe n’imitwaro, ndabaruhura.
Mwakire umutwaro wanje hanyuma munyigireko kuko ndi umugwaneza kandi nicishije bugufi mu mutima, namwe muzoronka uburuhukiro bw’imitima yanyu.
Kuko umutwaro wanje urahwahutse kandi ivyo ndabikoreza ntibiremereye.”
Hanyuma y’ivyo Yesu aragenda aca mu mirima y’ingano kandi hari ku musi w’Isabato. Abigishwa biwe bari bashonje, baca batangura guca imitwe y’ingano zeze, barazivungura, bakuramwo intete barazirya.
Abafarisayo babibonye, baca baramubwira bati: “Ehe raba abigishwa bawe bariko bakora ikizira ku musi w’Isabato!”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Mbega ntimurasoma ivyo Dawidi yakoze igihe we n’abo bari kumwe bari bashonje?
Yinjiye mu nzu y’Imana, arya imikate yashikaniwe Imana; yongera ahako n’abari kumwe na we; kandi abaherezi ari bo bonyene bari bemerewe kuyirya.
Canke mbega ntimurasoma mu vyagezwe ingene abaherezi batubahiriza umusi w’Isabato, iyo bariko barakora ibikorwa vyabo vyo mu rusengero kandi ntibagirizwe icaha?
Ariko ndababwire, hano hari uwurengeye urusengero!
Iyo muba mutahura ijambo rivuga ngo: ‘Nshaka ko mugira imbabazi kuruta kumpa ibimazi,’ ntimwari gucira urubanza abatagira icaha.
Kuko Umwana w’Umuntu ari we Mwami w’Isabato.”
Avuye ngaho, yinjira mw’isinagogi yabo,
ahasanga umuntu akongataye ukuboko. Kuko bashaka ico bafatirako kugira ngo bamwagirize, baramubaza bati: “Mbega biremewe gukiza umuntu ku musi w’Isabato?”
Na we arabishura ati: “Muri mwebwe uwoba afise intama imwe hanyuma ikagwa mu kinogo ku musi w’Isabato, ntiyoyikurayo? Nzi neza ko yoyikurayo.
Namwe murazi neza ko umuntu afise agaciro karengeye ak’intama! Ni co gituma vyemewe gukora iciza ku musi w’Isabato.”
Hanyuma aca abwira wa muntu ati: “Gorora ukuboko kwawe.” Akugoroye guca kurakira neza kumera nk’ukundi.
Abafarisayo baca baragenda baja kugira inama barondera ingene bokwica Yesu.
Yesu abimenye aca ava ngaho, maze abantu benshi baramukurikira hanyuma akiza abarwaye bose bari muri bo,
ariko arabihanikiriza ngo ntihagire umuntu n’umwe avuga uwo ari we.
Ivyo vyabaye kugira ngo ivyo uwavugishwa n’Imana Yesaya yavuze bishike, aho yavuze ati:
“Ng’uwu umukozi wanje natoranije, uwo nkunda kandi umutima wanje unezerererwa. Nzomushirako Mpwemu wanje, na we azomenyesha amahanga ivy’ubutungane.
Ntazotongana canke ngo avuze urwamo; nta n’umwe azokwumva ijwi ryiwe mu mabarabara.
Irenga rivunitse ntazorihohosha, kandi n’urumuri rwaka buhoro ntazoruzimya, kandi ivyo azobikora kugeza ubutungane busasagaye.
Amahanga azokwizigira izina ryawe.”
Hanyuma bamuzanira umuntu aboshwe n’umudayimoni amutera kuba impumyi n’ikiragi. Nuko Yesu akiza uwo muntu, aca aravuga kandi arabona.
Maze amasinzi y’abantu bari aho baratangara cane, baca batangura kubazanya bati: “Mbega uwu yoba ari wa Mwana wa Dawidi?”
Ariko Abafarisayo bavyumvise baca bavuga bati: “Uwo nta kindi kimushoboza kwirukana abadayimoni atari Beyelizebuli, umukuru w’abadayimoni.”
Yesu amenye ivyo bariko bariyumvira, aca ababwira ati: “Ubwami bwose bwiciyemwo ibice buba bugiye gusenyuka. Kandi iyo igisagara canke umuryango vyiciyemwo ibice ntibishoboka ko birama.
Nimba Satani yirukanye Satani, akicamwo ibice; none ubwami bwiwe bworama?
None nimba Beyelizebuli ari we anshoboza kwirukana abadayimoni, abigishwa banyu bo babishobozwa na nde? Ni co gituma ari bo bazobatsindisha.
Ariko nimba ari Mpwemu w’Imana anshoboza kwirukana abadayimoni, Ubwami bw’Imana bwashitse muri mwebwe.
Ikindi, umuntu yoshobora ate kwinjira mu nzu y’umunyenkomezi ngo amunyage ivyo atunze atabanje kumuboha? Aho ni ho honyene ashobora kwinjira mu nzu akamunyaga ivyiwe.
Uwutari kumwe nanje wese arangwanya, kandi uwutariko aramfasha kwegeranya wese, aba ariko arasanzaza.
Ni co gituma ndababwira ko icaha ico ari co cose n’ugutuka Imana kwose abantu bashobora kubiharirwa, ariko gutuka Mpwemu Yera ntibazobiharirwa.
Umuntu wese atuka Umwana w’Umuntu, azobiharirwa; ariko uwutuka Mpwemu Yera ntazobiharirwa, haba muri kino gihe canke mu gihe kizoza.
Igiti iyo ari ciza n’ivyamwa vyaco biba vyiza, kandi igiti iyo ari kibi n’ivyamwa vyaco biba bibi; kuko igiti cose kimenyekanira ku vyamwa vyaco.
Mwa bana b’inzoka mwe, mbega mwovuga ivyiza mute kandi muri babi? Erega ivyuzuye mu mutima ni vyo akanwa kavuga.
Umuntu mwiza akura ivyiza mu bubiko bwiza bw’umutima wiwe, umubi na we agakura ibibi mu bubiko bubi bw’umutima wiwe.
Ariko ndababwira ko ku musi w’imanza, umuntu wese azobazwa ijambo ryose ritagira ikimazi yavuze.
Amajambo yawe ni yo azotuma utsinda canke utsindwa n’urubanza.”
Hanyuma bamwe mu Bafarisayo n’abigisha b’ivyagezwe baramubwira bati: “Mwigisha, dushaka ko uduha ikimenyetso cerekana ububasha bwawe.”
Arabishura ati: “Abantu ba kino gihe babi kandi b’abasambanyi ni bo basaba ikimenyetso! Ariko nta kindi kimenyetso bazohabwa kiretse ikimenyetso c’uwavugishwa n’Imana Yona.
Kuko nk’uko Yona yamaze imisi itatu n’amajoro atatu mu nda y’ifi, ni ko n’Umwana w’Umuntu azomara imisi itatu n’amajoro atatu mu nda y’isi.
Ku musi wo guca imanza, abantu b’i Ninewe bazohaguruka bagirize abantu ba kino gihe kandi babatsindishe, kuko bo bihanye bamaze kwumva ubutumwa bwa Yona; ariko raba uwuruta Yona ari hano.

Ku musi wo guca imanza, umwamikazi w’i Sheba azohaguruka yagirize abantu ba kino gihe kandi abatsindishe, kuko yahagurutse akava ku mpera z’isi aje kwumviriza amajambo y’ubwenge ya Salomo; ariko raba uwuruta Salomo ari hano.
Iyo impwemu ihumanye ivuye mu muntu, ica igenda iyerera mu bugaragwa irondera aho yoruhukira. Ihabuze,
ica ivuga iti: ‘Reka nisubirire muri ya nzu nahoramwo.’ Ishitse, iraheza igasanga iyo nzu ata kiyibamwo, isukuye kandi itunganije neza.

Maze ica isubira ikagenda, ikazana izindi mpwemu mbi indwi ziyirusha ububi, zikinjira muri wa muntu, zikibera ngaho. Ivya nyuma vy’uwo muntu biba bibi kurusha ivya mbere. Uko ni ko bizogenda ku bantu ba kino gihe kibi.”
Yesu akiriko aravugana n’abantu isinzi bari aho, nyina na bene nyina baraza bahagarara hanze, bashaka kuvugana na we.
Umuntu umwe araza aramubwira ati: “Nyoko na bene nyoko bahagaze hanze, bashaka kuvugana nawe.”
Yesu na we aramwishura ati: “Mbega mama ni nde kandi bene mama ni ba nde?”
Nuko atunga urutoke abigishwa biwe, aravuga ati: “Aba ni bo mama kandi ni bo bavukanyi banje.
Kuko uwukora ivyo Data wo mw’ijuru ashaka wese ni we mwene mama, kandi ni we mama.”
Uwo musi nyene, Yesu arasohoka ava mu nzu, aja ku nkengera y’ikiyaga, yicaraho.
Ubwo nyene abantu benshi baca baza aho ari, na we aca atambukira mu bwato abwicaramwo; abantu na bo bahagarara ku musenyi.
Maze abigisha vyinshi mu migani, avuga ati: “Umubivyi yagiye kubiba imbuto ziwe.
Ariko arabiba, zimwe zigwa i ruhande y’inzira, hanyuma inyoni ziraza zirazinobagura.
Izindi na zo zigwa ku rutare, ahantu hatari ivu ryinshi; zica zimera ningoga, kuko ivu ryari rike.
Ariko izuba ryatse, za mbuto zariko ziramera zica ziruma kuko imizi yazo itashika kure.
Izindi mbuto zigwa mu mahwa; zimaze kumera, ayo mahwa arakura arazinyoha.
Hakaba rero n’imbuto zaguye mw’ivu ryiza, ziramera, zirakura kandi zirama, zimwe zimbuka incuro ijana, izindi mirongo itandatu, izindi mirongo itatu.
Uwufise amatwi yumva niyumve!”
Abigishwa biwe baramwegera baramubaza bati: “Ni kuki wigisha abantu ukoresheje imigani?”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Ni mwebwe mwahawe kumenya amabanga y’ivy’Ubwami bw’ijuru, ariko bo ntibabihawe.
Uwufise azokwongererezwa asesekarizwe, ariko uwa bike azokwakwa n’ivyo yari afise.
Ni co gituma ndabigishiriza mu migani: Kugira ngo n’aho boraba ntibabone; n’aho bokwumviriza ntibumve canke ngo batahure.
Ivyo bishitsa kuri bo ivyo Yesaya yavugishijwe, aho yavuga ati: ‘Kwumva muzokwama mwumva, ariko ntimuzokwigera mutahura; kuraba muzokwama muraba ariko ntimuzokwigera mubona.

Kuko imitima y’ubu bwoko ikomantaye; amatwi yabo ntashobora kwumva, kandi amaso yabo barayahumiriza. Ahandi ho bobonesheje amaso yabo, bakumvisha amatwi yabo, bagatahurisha imitima yabo; maze bagahindukira, nanje nkabakiza.’
Ariko harahiriwe amaso yanyu kuko abona, n’amatwi yanyu kuko yumva.
Kuko ndababwire ukuri, abavugishwa n’Imana n’abagororotsi benshi baripfuje kubona ivyo muriko murabona ariko ntibabibona, no kwumva ivyo muriko murumva, ntibavyumva.
Nimwumvirize ico umugani w’umubivyi usigura:
Iyo umuntu yumvise ubutumwa bw’Ubwami, hanyuma ntabutahure, wa mubi aca aza akarandura icari cabibwe mu mutima wiwe. Izo ni zo mbuto zabibwe i ruhande y’inzira.
Imbuto zabibwe ku rutare zerekana ukuntu abantu bumva ijambo ry’Imana hanyuma bagaca baryakirana umunezero mu mitima yabo.
Ariko kubera ko iryo jambo ritagira imizi miremire muri bo, bamara umwanya muto bizeye. Iyo baciye mu vyago canke mu guhamwa bazira kwizera iryo Jambo ry’Imana, baca bata ukwizera.
Imbuto zaguye mu mahwa, ni ikigereranyo c’umuntu yumva ijambo ry’Imana, ariko imyitwarariko y’ivy’iyi si hamwe n’uruhendo rw’ubutunzi bikaza bikanyoha iryo jambo yumvise bigatuma ata co ryama.

Ariko imbuto zaguye mw’ivu ryiza ni ikigereranyo c’umuntu yumva ijambo ry’Imana akaritahura; uwo ni we aheza akama; bamwe bakama incuro ijana, abandi incuro mirongo itandatu, abandi incuro mirongo itatu z’ivyabibwe.”
Yesu abacira uwundi mugani ati: “Ubwami bw’ijuru bugereranywa n’umuntu yabivye imbuto nziza y’uburo mu murima wiwe.
Mw’ijoro, abantu bose bamaze gusinzira, umwansi wiwe araza abiba urwamfu muri bwa buro hanyuma arigira.
Uburo bumaze gukura, no kuyangika, urwamfu na rwo rutangura kwibonekeza.
Abakozi ba nyene umurima baraza baramubaza bati: ‘Nyakwubahwa, mbega ntiwari wabivye imbuto nziza; none uru rwamfu rwavuye hehe?’
Arabishura ati: ‘Umwansi ni we yakoze ivyo.’ Baca baramubaza bati: ‘None urashaka ko tuja kururandura?’
Arabishura ati: ‘Oya, kuko mu kurandura urwamfu mwohava murandurana n’uburo.
Reka vyose bikurane kugeza umusi wo kwimbura. Ico gihe nzobwira abimbuzi babanze begeranye urwamfu barutekere mu mikama hanyuma baruturire, maze uburo babwimburire mu kigega canje.’ ”
Abacira uwundi mugani ati: “Ubwami bw’ijuru bugereranywa n’akabuto k’igiterwa citwa mutaride umuntu yateye mu murima wiwe.

Naho ari gatoya kurusha izindi mbuto zose, iyo kameze karakura, kakaruta ibindi biterwa vyose vyo mw’itongo, maze kagahinduka igiti kinini, ku buryo n’inyoni zo mu kirere ziza zikarika mu mashami yaco.”

Yongera abacira uwundi mugani ati: “Ubwami mw’ijuru bugereranywa n’umwambiro umugore akoresha mu gukora imikate. Naho yokoresha umwambiro muke mw’ifu ingana n’ibiro mirongo ibiri na bitanu, uwo mwambiro muke utuma igikandu cose gikakama.”
Ivyo vyose Yesu yabibwira abantu mu migani; nta kintu na kimwe yababwira adakoresheje imigani.
Uko ni ko ivyo uwavugishwa n’Imana yavuze vyashitse, ngo: “Nzokwugurura akanwa kanje mu migani, mvuge ivyagizwe amabanga kuva isi ikiremwa.”
Hanyuma Yesu asiga abantu ngaho, yinjira mu nzu. Abigishwa biwe baza aho ari, bamubwira bati: “Dusigurire umugani w’urwamfu mu murima.”
Arabishura ati: “Uwabivye imbuto nziza ni Umwana w’Umuntu.
Umurima ni iyi isi, imbuto nziza ni abana b’Ubwami. Urwamfu ni abana ba wa mubi.
Umwansi yabivye urwamfu ni Satani. Iyimbura ni umuhero w’isi; abimbuzi ni abamarayika.
Nk’uko begeranya urwamfu kugira ngo baruturire, ni ko bizomera ku muhero w’isi.
Umwana w’Umuntu azotuma abamarayika biwe, bakure abazana ibitsitaza hamwe n’abakora ibibi bose mu Bwami bwiwe;
babate mw’itanure ryaka umuriro; aho hazoba amarira no guhekenya amenyo kubera umubabaro.
Ariko abagororotsi bazokwakaka nk’izuba mu Bwami bwa Se wo mw’ijuru. Uwufise amatwi yo kwumva niyumve.

Ubwami bw’ijuru bugereranywa kandi n’ubutunzi buhishijwe mw’itongo. Umuntu umwe yabuserutseko, aca yongera arabuhisha. Hanyuma kubera umunezero mwinshi, aragenda ashora ivyo yari afise vyose, agura iryo tongo.
Kandi Ubwami bw’ijuru bugereranywa n’umudandaza yagiye kurondera amabuye y’agaciro.
Abonye irirusha agaciro ayandi, aca aragenda ashora ivyo yari afise vyose, ararigura.
Ubwami bw’ijuru bugereranywa n’urusenga rwaterewe mu kiyaga, rufata ifi z’ubwoko bwose.
Rumaze kwuzura, abarovyi barukwegera i musozi, baricara batoranya ifi nziza bazishira mu masandugu, mbi na zo barazita.
Uko ni ko bizogenda ku muhero w’isi. Abamarayika bazosobanura abanyakibi mu bagororotsi,
babaterere mw’itanure ryaka umuriro, ni ho hazoba amarira no guhekenya amenyo kubera umubabaro.”
Yesu abaza abigishwa biwe ati: “Mbega ivyo murabitahura?” Na bo bati: “Egome.”

Na we arababwira ati: “Ni co gituma umwigisha wese w’ivyagezwe, iyo ahindutse umwigishwa mu Bwami bw’ijuru, agereranywa n’umuntu yinjira mu nzu yiwe, agakura mu bubiko bwiwe ivyiza bishasha hamwe n’ivya kera.”
Yesu ahejeje kwigishiriza muri iyo migani, aca ava ngaho.
Ashitse mu gisagara yakuriyemwo, atangura kwigishiriza abantu mw’isinagogi yabo. Abamwumviriza bose baratangara, babazanya bati: “Mbega ubu bwenge n’ubu bushobozi bwo gukora ibitangaza yabikuye he?
Mbega uwu si wa muhungu w’umubaji? Nyina ntiyitwa Mariya; abo bavukana si Yakobo, Yosefu, Simoni na Yuda?
Bashikiwe bose ntitubana? None ivyo vyose yabikuye hehe?”
Maze ivyiwe birabatsitaza, bituma batamwizera. Yesu arababwira ati: “Uwuvugishwa n’Imana arubahwa hose kiretse iwabo no mu muryango wiwe.”
Aho hantu Yesu ahakorera ibitangaza bike kuko abantu baho ata kwizera bari bafise.
Muri ico gihe, Herode Antipa yumva amakuru ya Yesu;
aca abwira abagendanyi biwe ati: “Uwo ni Yohana Umubatizi yazutse mu bapfuye! Ni co gituma afise ubushobozi bwo gukora ibitangaza.”
Kuko Herode Antipa yari yarafashe Yohana, aramuboha, amuta mw’ibohero. Ivyo yabikoze abitumwe na Herodiya uwo yari yararongoye, kandi yari asanzwe ari muka Filipo, uwo bavukana.
Yohana yama abwira Herode ati: “Ntivyemewe ko urongora uwo mugore.”
Herode na we yama agomba kwica Yohana ariko agatinya abantu, kuko kuri bo Yohana yari uwuvugishwa n’Imana.
Ku musi mukuru wo kwibuka ivuka rya Herode, umukobwa wa Herodiya araza atambira abatumire, maze ivyo binezereza Herode cane,
bituma amusezeranira ashizeko n’indahiro ko amuha ico amusaba cose.
Uwo mukobwa amaze kwoshwa na nyina wiwe, abwira Herode ati: “Ndasavye umpere kuri iyi sahani umutwe wa Yohana Umubatizi.”
Maze umwami Herode arababara cane kubera ivyo yavuze, ariko kubera indahiro yari yarahiriye imbere y’abatumire biwe, avuga ko uwo mukobwa bamuha ico asavye.
Nuko arungika umuntu asanga Yohana umubatizi mw’ibohero, amuca umutwe,
awuzana kw’isiniya, awuha wa mukobwa, na we awushira nyina.
Abigishwa ba Yohana baraza batora ikiziga ciwe baja kugihamba, hanyuma baragenda babwira Yesu ivyabaye.
Yesu amaze kuvyumva, aca ava ngaho agenda n’ubwato, aja ahantu hiherereye. Ariko abantu bamenye iyo agiye, bava mu bisagara bagenda n’amaguru baramukurikira.
Yesu amaze kuva mu bwato abona abantu isinzi, bamutera ikigongwe, aca abakiriza abarwaye.
Bugorovye, abigishwa biwe baza aho ari bamubwira bati: “Aha hantu turi ni mu gahinga kandi buriko burira. Rungika aba bantu bagende mu mihana bigurire ivyo barya.”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Ntibikenewe ko bagenda. Ba ari mwebwe mubagaburira.”
Baramwishura bati: “Aha dufise imikate itanu n’ifi zibiri gusa.”
Arababwira ati: “Nimubinzanire.”

Hanyuma abwira abantu ngo bicare ku vyatsi. Maze afata ya mikate itanu na za fi zibiri, arangamiza mw’ijuru, abishimira Imana. Hanyuma amanyagura ya mikate, abihereza abigishwa biwe na bo babiha ba bantu.
Bose bararya kandi barahaga. Hanyuma abigishwa begeranya ibiseke cumi na bibiri vyuzuye utumanyu twasigaye.
Abariye bari abagabo ibihumbi bitanu, udashizemwo abagore n’abana.
Ubwo nyene Yesu abwira abigishwa biwe ngo baje mu bwato babe baragenda bamwitangire imbere mu kujabuka, na we asigare arasezera abantu.
Amaze gusezera abantu, aca aduga ku musozi wenyene aja gusenga, maze burira akiri ngaho wenyene.
Ubwato bumaze kugenda urugendo rutari ruto buva ku nkengera, haza umuyaga ubaturutse imbere, maze buzungazungishwa n’imipfunda iteye ubwoba.
Buri hafi guca, Yesu aza aho bari agendagenda ku mazi.
Abigishwa biwe bamubonye agendagenda ku mazi, bagira ubwoba bwinshi, barataka bavuga bati: “Ni umuzimu.”
Ariko Yesu arababwira ati: “Humura! Ni jewe; ntimugire ubwoba.”
Petero aca aravuga ati: “Mwami, nimba ari wewe, mbwira nze aho uri, ngendagenda ku mazi.”
Yesu aramubwira ati: “Ingo.” Petero aca ava mu bwato, atangura kugendagenda ku mazi aja iyo Yesu ari.
Ariko abonye ko umuyaga ari mwinshi, agira ubwoba bwinshi. Atanguye kudobera mu mazi, arasemerera ati: “Mwami, ntabara!”
Ubwo nyene, Yesu atuma ukuboko aramufata, amubwira ati: “Wa muntu w’ukwizera guke, ni kuki wakekeranije?”
Bamaze gutambukira mu bwato, umuyaga uca urahagarara.
Abari mu bwato bose bamuha icubahiro, bavuga bati: “Ni ukuri uri Umwana w’Imana.”
Bamaze kujabuka, bashika hakurya ahitwa Genezareti.
Abantu baho bamenye ko ari Yesu, baca babimenyesha abantu bo muri ako karere, na bo bamuzanira abarwaye babo.
Maze baramwinginga ngo yemerere abarwaye bapfume bakora no ku musozo w’impuzu yiwe, kandi ababukorako bose baca bakira.
Hanyuma Abafarisayo n’abigisha b’ivyagezwe bava i Yerusalemu baja iyo Yesu ari, baramubaza bati:
“Ni kuki abigishwa bawe batubahiriza imigenzo ya ba sogokuruza? Ntibakaraba imbere yo gufungura!”
Yesu arabishura ati: “None mwebwe ni kuki mutubahiriza ibwirizwa ry’Imana mwitwaje imigenzo yanyu?
Kuko Imana yavuze iti: ‘Wubahe so na nyoko,’ yongerako iti: ‘Umuntu wese azovuma se canke nyina aze yicwe.’
Ariko mweho muvuga ko iyo umuntu avuze kw’ivyo yari gufashisha se canke nyina ari inyegu y’Imana
ataba agikwiye kubibafashisha. Uko ni ko muhindura ijambo ry’Imana ubusa kubera imigenzo yanyu.
Mwa ndyarya mwe, Yesaya yavuze ukuri igihe yabavugishwako ati:
‘Aba bantu banyubahisha iminwa yabo, ariko imitima yabo iri kure yanje.
Ukunsenga kwabo ntikugira ikimazi; inyigisho zabo ni amabwirizwa abantu bishingiye.’ ”
Yesu aca ahamagara isinzi ry’abantu bari ngaho, arababwira ati: “Nimwumvirize kandi mutahure:
Icinjira mu kanwa k’umuntu, si co kimuhumanya. Ariko ikiva mu kanwa kiwe, ni co kimuhumanya.”
Hanyuma abigishwa biwe baza aho ari, baramubaza bati: “Mbega urazi ko Abafarisayo bababaye bumvise ivyo uhejeje kuvuga?”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Igiterwa cose Data wo mw’ijuru atateye kizorandurwa.
Nimubihoze; ni impumyi zirongora izindi! Kandi iyo impumyi irongoye iyindi, zompi zigwa mu kinogo.”
Petero aramubwira ati: “Dusigurire uwo mugani.”
Yesu arababaza ati: “Namwe ntimurashobora gutahura?
Ntimuzi ko ikintu cose cinjira mu kanwa kija mu nda hanyuma kigasohoka?
Ariko igisohoka mu kanwa k’umuntu kiba kivuye mu mutima, kandi ni co kimuhumanya.
Kuko mu mutima ari ho hava ivyiyumviro bibi: ubwicanyi, ubusambanyi, ivy’isoni nke, ubusuma, kubeshera abandi no kuvuga abandi nabi.
Ivyo ni vyo vyanduza umuntu. Ariko kurya udakaravye, ntibishobora kwanduza umuntu.”
Yesu avuye ngaho, aja mu ntara ya Tiro na Sidoni.
Umunyakananikazi wo muri iyo ntara, aza aho ari atakamba ati: “Mwami, Mwana wa Dawidi, ngirira imbabazi! Umukobwa wanje aboshwe n’umudayimoni kandi aramubabaje cane!”
Ariko Yesu ntiyamwishura n’ijambo na rimwe. Abigishwa biwe baraza baramwinginga bati: “Mwirukane kuko aguma avugiriza induru inyuma yacu.”
Nuko Yesu abwira wa mugore ati: “Natumwe ku ntama zazimiye za Isirayeli gusa.”
Wa mugore aca araza apfukama imbere yiwe, aramubwira ati: “Mwami, ntabara!”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Si vyiza gufata umukate w’abana ukawuterera imbwa.”
Na we aramwishura ati: “Ni vyo, Mwami, ariko n’imbwa na zo ziremerewe kurya utuvunguka dukoroka tuva ku meza za ba shebuja.”
Yesu aca aramubwira: “Mupfasoni, ufise ukwizera gukomeye! Ivyo usavye urabihawe.” Maze ako kanya nyene, umukobwa wiwe aca arakira.
Nuko Yesu ava ngaho, agendagenda ku nkengera y’ikiyaga Galilaya. Hanyuma aduga umusozi, yicaraho.
Maze abantu isinzi baza aho ari, bazanye abacumbagira, impumyi, ibimuga, ibiragi n’abandi barwayi benshi. Babashira imbere yiwe, na we arabakiza.
Abantu baratangara cane babonye ibiragi bivuga, abacumbagira bagenda neza, ibimuga bimuguruka, n’impumyi zihumuka. Maze bahimbaza Imana ya Isirayeli.
Yesu ahamagara abigishwa biwe arababwira ati: “Aba bantu banteye ikigongwe. Tumaranye imisi itatu none raba nta vyokurya basigaranye. Ninabarungika bashonje, bahava bagwira isari mu nzira.”
Abigishwa biwe baramubaza bati: “None twokura hehe ivyokurya bikwiye abantu bangana gutya muri kano gahinga?”
Yesu arababaza ati: “Mufise imikate ingahe?” Nabo baramwishura bati: “Dufise imikate indwi hamwe n’udufi dukeya.”
Aca abwira abantu ngo bicare hasi.
Hanyuma afata ya mikate indwi na twa dufi, abishimira Imana, arabimanyagura, hanyuma abiha abigishwa biwe na bo babigaburira ba bantu.
Bose bararya barahaga, hanyuma abigishwa begeranya ibiseke indwi vyuzuye utumanyu twasigaye.
Abafunguye uwo musi bari ibihumbi bine, udashizemwo abagore n’abana.
Yesu amaze gusezera abantu, afata ubwato, aja mu ntara ya Magadani.
Abafarisayo n’Abasadukayo baza aho Yesu ari bazanywe no kumugeza, bamusaba ngo abereke ikimenyetso kivuye mw’ijuru cerekana ububasha bwiwe.
Arabishura ati: “Iyo bugorovye, muravuga muti: ‘Ejo ikirere kizoba ari ciza kuko ijuru ritukurije,’
kandi iyo bukeye, muravuga muti: ‘Uno musi ikirere ntikiza kuba ciza kuko ijuru ryiraburaniwe.’ Murazi kugenzura ikirere mukurikije uko ijuru risa, ariko ntimuzi kugenzura ibimenyetso vy’ibihe.
Abantu ba kino gihe babi kandi b’abasambanyi ni bo basaba ikimenyetso! Ariko nta kindi kimenyetso bazohabwa kiretse ikimenyetso c’uwavugishwa n’Imana Yona.” Maze Yesu aca abasiga ngaho arigira.
Bashitse hakurya y’ikiyaga, abigishwa biwe basanga bibagiye gutwara imikate.
Yesu arababwira ati: “Mube maso, mwirinde umwambiro w’Abafarisayo n’Abasadukayo.”
Maze abigishwa bavugana hagati yabo bati: “Ivyo abivuze kubera tutazanye imikate.”
Yesu amenye ivyo bariko baravugana, arababaza ati: “Mwa bantu b’ukwizera guke, ni kuki muriko muvuga ko mudafise imikate?
Mbega n’ubu ntimuratahura? Ntimwibuka ya mikate itanu yagaburiwe abantu ibihumbi bitanu, na vya biseke mwegeranya.
Canke ya mikate indwi yagaburiwe abantu ibihumbi bine, hamwe na vya biseke mwegeranya?
Ni kuki mudatahura ko ntariko ndababwira ivyerekeye imikate? Nababwiye nti: Mwirinde umwambiro w’Abafarisayo n’Abasadukayo.”
Maze babona gutahura ko atariko ababwira kwirinda umwambiro w’imikate, ariko ko bakwiye kwirinda inyigisho z’Abafarisayo n’Abasadukayo.
Yesu ashitse i Kayisariya mu bwami bwa Filipo, abaza abigishwa biwe ati: “Mbega abantu bavuga ko jewe Umwana w’Umuntu ndi nde?”
Baramwishura bati: “Bamwe bavuga ngo uri Yohana Umubatizi; abandi ngo uri Eliya, abandi na bo ngo uri Yeremiya canke umwe mu bandi bavugishwa.”
Aca arababaza ati: “None mweho, muvuga ko ndi nde?”
Simoni Petero aramwishura ati: “Uri Kristo, Umwana w’Imana nzima.”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Uri umuhirwe, Simoni mwene Yona, kuko ivyo ntubihishuriwe n’umuntu buntu afise inyama n’amaraso gusa, ariko ni Data wo mw’ijuru abiguhishuriye.
Nanje ndakubwiye ko uri Petero (bisigura ‘urutare’), kandi kuri urwo rutare, nzohubaka ishengero ryanje, kandi ko n’amarembo y’i kuzimu atazorinesha.
Nzoguha impfunguruzo z’Ubwami bw’ijuru; ico uzoboha cose kw’isi, kizoba kiboshwe no mw’ijuru, kandi ico uzobohora kw’isi cose, kizoba kibohowe no mw’ijuru.”
Hanyuma aca yihanikiriza abigishwa biwe ngo ntihagire umuntu n’umwe babwira ko ari we Kristo.

Kuva ico gihe, Yesu atangura kubwira abigishwa biwe ko ategerezwa kuja i Yerusalemu, akababazwa mu buryo bwinshi n’abakuru b’idini, n’abaherezi bakuru n’abigisha b’ivyagezwe, kandi ko azokwicwa hanyuma akazuka ku musi ugira gatatu.
Petero aramwihereranya, atangura kumwamira ati: “Mwami, ntibikabe! Ivyo ntibikakubeko!”
Yesu arahindukira abwira Petero ati: “Mva i ruhande, Satani, herera inyuma yanje! Uri igitsitaza kuri jewe; kuko ibikuraje ishinga si ivy’Imana, ariko ni ivy’abantu.”
Hanyuma Yesu aca abwira abigishwa biwe ati: “Umuntu wese agomba kuba umwigishwa wanje, ategerezwa kwiheba, akikorera umusaraba wiwe, akankurikira.
Kuko uwugomba gukiza ubugingo bwiwe azobubura, ariko uwubuheba ku bwanje azoburokora.
Mbega umuntu vyomumarira iki yungutse ivyo mw’isi vyose, ariko agatakaza ubugingo bwiwe? Canke umuntu yotanga iki kugira ngo acungure ubugingo bwiwe?
Kuko Umwana w’Umuntu agiye kugaruka ari mu bwiza bwa Se, ari kumwe n’abamarayika biwe, hanyuma ahe impembo umuntu wese ikwiranye n’ivyo yakoze.
Ndababwire ukuri, bamwe mu bahagaze ngaha ntibazopfa batabonye Umwana w’Umuntu aje ari mu bwami bwiwe.”
Haheze imisi itandatu, Yesu ajana Petero, Yakobo na mwene nyina Yohana, abadugana ku musozi muremure, kugira ngo abe aragumanye na bo bonyene.
Bari ngaho, akayanganira imbere yabo, mu maso hiwe hakaka nk’izuba, impuzu ziwe zica ibibatsi kandi zera derere kurya kw’umuco.
Ubwo nyene baja babona Mose na Eliya bariko bavugana na Yesu.
Petero abwira Yesu ati: “Mwami, bitubereye vyiza kuba hano hantu. Ubikunze, reka ndahashinge amahema atatu: iryawe, irya Mose, n’irya Eliya.”
Akiriko aravuga, haza igicu cera derere kirabatwikira. Hanyuma ijwi ryumvikanira muri ico gicu, rivuga riti: “Uwu ni Umwana wanje nkunda cane kandi ampimbara. Nimumwumvirize!”
Abigishwa bumvise iryo jwi, bagira ubwoba bwinshi, bituma bagwa hasi bubamye.
Maze Yesu arabegera abakorako, ababwira ati: “Nimuve hasi, nta co mutinya.”
Bunamuye amaso, ntibagira uwundi babona atari Yesu.
Bariko baramanuka bava kuri uwo musozi, Yesu arabihanikiriza ati: “Ntihagire umuntu n’umwe mubwira ivyo mwabonye, kugeza Umwana w’Umuntu amaze kuzuka mu bapfuye.”
Hanyuma abigishwa baramubaza bati: “Ni kuki abigisha b’ivyagezwe bavuga ko Eliya ategerezwa kubanza kuza?”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Ni ukuri, Eliya ategerezwa kubanza kuza kugira ngo asubize vyose mu buryo.
Ariko ndababwire, Eliya yaramaze kuza, yamara ntibamumenye, ahubwo bamukoreye ivyo bishakiye. Uko ni ko n’Umwana w’Umuntu bagiye kumugirira nabi.”
Abigishwa baca batahura ko yariko avuga Yohana Umubatizi.
Bashitse musi y’umusozi, basanga abantu isinzi babarindiriye. Umugabo umwe aramwegera, apfukama imbere yiwe.
Aramubwira ati: “Mwami, girira impuhwe umuhungu wanje, kuko arimwo idayimoni itera intandara kandi arababaye cane. Ni kenshi imuta mu muriro canke mu mazi.
Namuzaniye abigishwa bawe ariko vyanse ko bamukiza.”
Yesu yishura avuga ati: “Yemwe bantu b’iki gihe mutizera kandi mwononekaye mu mitima, nzobana namwe gushika ryari? Nzobihanganira kugeza ryari? Nzanira uwo mwana hano.”
Yesu aca akankamira iyo dayimoni, iva muri uwo mwana, aca akira ako kanya nyene.
Hanyuma biherereye, abigishwa ba Yesu baramubaza bati: “Mbega ni kuki twebwe vyatunaniye kwirukana irya dayimoni?”

Yesu arabishura ati: “Ni kubera ukwizera guke kwanyu. Ndababwire ukuri, iyo muba mwari mufise ukwizera kungana n’akabuto k’igiterwa citwa mutaride, mwobwira uriya musozi muti: ‘Imuka uve ngaha,’ kandi woca wimuka. Nta kintu na kimwe kitobashobokera. [
Ugusenga n’ukwisonzesha ni vyo vyonyene bishobora kwirukana idayimoni nk’irya.” ]
Umusi umwe, bakoraniye i Galilaya, Yesu abwira abigishwa biwe ati: “Umwana w’Umuntu agiye gutabwa mu maboko y’abantu.
Bazomwica, ariko ku musi ugira gatatu azozuka abe muzima.” Maze ivyo bibabaza cane abigishwa biwe.
Yesu n’abigishwa biwe bashitse i Kaperinawumu, abatoza ikori ry’urusengero rigizwe na darakuma zibiri baza aho Petero ari, bamubaza bati: “Mbega umwigisha wanyu ntatanga ikori ry’urusengero?”

Petero arabishura ati: “Egome araritanga.” Petero yinjiye mu nzu, Yesu aramwitanga, amubaza ati: “Wiyumvira iki ga Simoni? Ni ba nde baha abami bo muri iyi isi amakori n’amatagisi? Ni abana babo canke ni abandi bantu?”
Petero aramwishura ati: “Ni abandi bantu.” Yesu aramubwira ati: “Urumva rero ko abana batariha ikori.

Ariko, kugira ngo ntituboneke nabi imbere y’aba batoza iri kori, genda ku kiyaga utere igera urobe. Ifi ya mbere uza kuroba, uyasamike; maze urayisangamwo igiceri kinini c’ifeza coriha ikori ryawe n’iryanje, uheze ugitange.”
Muri ico gihe, abigishwa begera Yesu baramubaza bati: “Mbega ni nde mukuru mu Bwami bw’ijuru?”
Yesu aca ahamagara umwana mutoya, amuhagarika hagati yabo.
Hanyuma ababwira ati: “Ndababwire ukuri, mudahindutse ngo mumere nk’abana bato, ntimuzokwigera mwinjira mu Bwami bw’ijuru.
Kandi umuntu wese yicisha bugufi nk’aka kana ni we mukuru mu Bwami bw’ijuru.
Umuntu wese yakira umwana muto mw’izina ryanje ni jewe aba yakiriye.
Nihagira umuntu atuma umwe muri aba bato banyizera acumura, ikimukwiye ni uko yoboherwa urusyo kw’izosi, agakororerwa i bwina mu kiyaga.
Isi iragowe kuko yuzuye ibituma abantu bacumura! Kandi ivyo ntibizokwigera bireka kubaho; ariko aragowe umuntu abizana!

Nimba ukuboko kwawe canke ukuguru kwawe gutuma ukora icaha, guce ugute kure yawe. Kuko vyokubera vyiza kwinjira mu bugingo budashira ufise ukuboko kumwe canke ukuguru kumwe, hako utererwa mu muriro utazozima ufise amaboko yompi n’amaguru yompi.
Kandi nimba ijisho ryawe rituma ukora icaha, rinogore urite kure yawe, kuko vyokubera vyiza kwinjira mu bugingo budashira ufise ijisho rimwe hako utererwa mu muriro wa Gehinomu ufise amaso yompi.
Mwirinde ntimugakengere umuntu n’umwe muri aba bato, kuko ndababwira yuko abamarayika babo bama bahanze amaso Data wo mw’ijuru. [
Kuko Umwana w’Umuntu yazanywe no gukiza abazimiye. ]
Mbega ndababaze umuntu atunze intama ijana hanyuma imwe muri zo ikazimira, yokora iki? Ntiyosiga mirongo icenda n’icenda ku musozi akaja kurondera iyo imwe yazimiye?
Kandi ayitoye, ndababwira ukuri ko yoyinezerererwa cane naho yari asanganywe izindi mirongo icenda n’icenda zitari zazimiye.
Uko ni ko na So wo mw’ijuru atagomba ko hagira n’umwe muri barya bato azimira.
Mwene So niyagucumurako, ugende umwihereranye muri babiri umwereke icaha yagukoreye. Niyakwumviriza akemera kwihana, uzoba wiyujuje na mwene So.

Ariko, niyanka kukwumviriza, urondere abandi bene So, ari umwe canke babiri, kugira ngo ukore nk’uko ivyagezwe biri, aho bivuga ngo: ‘urubanza rwose ruze rucibwe habanje kwumvirizwa ivyabona bibiri canke bitatu.’
Na bo nyene yanse kubumviriza, ubibwire ishengero; kandi yanse kwumvira ishengero, umufate co kimwe n’uwutizera Imana canke umutozakori yiba.
Ndababwire ukuri, ico muzoboha kw’isi cose kizoba kiboshwe no mw’ijuru, kandi ico muzobohora kw’isi cose kizoba kibohowe no mw’ijuru.
Kandi, ndababwira ukuri ko babiri muri mwebwe nibahuriza inama kw’isi gusaba ikintu ico ari co cose, Data wo mw’ijuru azokibakorera.
Kuko aho babiri canke batatu bakoraniye mw’izina ryanje, nanje mba ndi hagati muri bo.”
Hanyuma Petero araza abaza Yesu ati: “Mwami, mbega mugenzanje ancumuyeko, nzomuharira kangahe? Incuro indwi?”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Sindababwiye incuro indwi, ariko incuro mirongo irindwi kugwiza indwi.
Ni co gituma Ubwami bw’ijuru bumeze nk’umwami yagomvye kumenya ubutunzi yabikije abakozi biwe uko bwifashe.
Agitanguye, bamuzanira umuntu amuheraniye italanto ibihumbi cumi.
Kubera atari ashoboye kumwishura, shebuja ategeka ko umugore wiwe, n’abana bagurishwa hamwe n’ivyo bafise vyose kugira ngo umwenda wiwe wishurwe.
Uwo mukozi yikubita imbere ya shebuja aramupfukamira, amubwira ati: ‘Mbabarira unyihanganire, nzokwishura umwenda ndagufitiye wose!’
Shebuja amutera ikigongwe, amuhebera uwo mwenda wiwe, aramurekura aragenda.
Uwo mukozi agisohoka ahura na mugenziwe bakorana amuheraniye idenariyo ijana. Amufata mw’izosi atangura kumunigura ati: ‘Ndiha umwenda umfitiye ningoga!’
Mugenziwe apfukama imbere yiwe, aramwinginga ati: ‘Mbabarira unyihanganire, nzokwishura umwenda ndagufitiye wose!’
Ariko aranka. Ahubwo aramujana bamushira mw’ibohero kugira ngo azoveyo arishe umwenda wiwe wose.
Abakozi bagenziwe babonye ibibaye, barababara baca baja kubwira shebuja ivyabaye vyose.
Shebuja avyumvise ahamagara wa mukozi yahebera umwenda munini amubwira ati: ‘Wa mukozi mubi we! Warantakambiye ndaguhebera umwenda wawe wose,
none ntiwari ukwiye kugirira imbabazi mugenzawe nk’uko nanje nazikugiriye?’
Maze shebuja aca araraka cane, amuta mw’ibohero kugira ngo azoveyo arishe umwenda wiwe wose.
Uko ni ko na Data wo mw’ijuru azobagirira nimutaharira bene So bivuye ku mutima.”
Yesu ahejeje kuvuga ivyo, aca ava i Galilaya, amanuka mu ntara ya Yudaya, hakurya y’uruzi Yorodani.
Abantu benshi baramukurikira, akirizayo abarwaye babo.
Bamwe mu Bafarisayo baza aho ari bashaka kumutega umutego, bamubaza bati: “Mbega biremewe ko umugabo yahukana n’umugore wiwe bivuye ku mvo iyo ari yo yose?”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Ntimurasoma ko mu ntango Umuremyi yabaremye ari umugabo n’umugore,
hanyuma akavuga ati: ‘Ni co gituma umugabo azosiga se na nyina akabana n’umugore wiwe ubutakivana, maze naho ari babiri bakaba umubiri umwe?’
Gutyo ntibaba bakiri babiri, ahubwo baba babaye umwe. None rero ico Imana yamatanije, ntihakagire uwukimatanura.”
Baramubaza bati: “None ni kuki Mose yategetse ko umugabo yandikira umugore urwandiko rwemeza ko bavavanuye, hanyuma akamwirukana?”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Mose yabemereye kwirukana abagore banyu, kuko imitima yanyu ikomantaye. Ariko mu ntango ntivyari bimeze uko.
Kandi ndababwire, umuntu wese yirukana umugore atamuhoye ubusambanyi, hanyuma akarongora uwundi, aba asambanye.”
Abigishwa biwe baramubwira bati: “Aho ho rero nimba ivy’abagabo n’abagore bimeze uko, umuntu yopfuma areka kurongora.”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Si bose bashobora kwemera iyi nyigisho kiretse abo Imana ibishoboje.
Kuko hariho bamwe bavutse ari inkone, hari n’ababaye inkone babigizwe n’abandi, hakaba rero n’abahisemwo kutarongora kubera Ubwami bw’ijuru. Uwushobora kuvyemera avyemere.”
Abavyeyi bamwe bazanye abana babo ngo Yesu abarambikeko ibiganza abasengere. Ariko abigishwa barabakankamira ngo ntibamugore.
Maze Yesu arababwira ati: “Nimureke abana baze aho ndi, ntimubabuze, kuko Ubwami bw’ijuru ari ubw’abameze nka bo.”
Amaze kubarambikako ibiganza abahezagira aca ava ngaho.
Hanyuma haza umusore umwe, aramubaza ati: “Mwigisha, iciza nokora ni ikihe kugira ngo nze ndagwe ubugingo budashira?”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Ni kuki umbaza ivyerekeye iciza? Umwiza ni umwe. Nimba ugomba kwinjira mu bugingo, kurikiza amabwirizwa.”
Na we ati: “Amabwirizwa ayahe?” Yesu aramwishura ati: “ ‘Ntukice, ntugasambane, ntukibe, ntukagirize abandi ibinyoma,
wubahe so na nyoko,’ kandi ‘ukunde mugenzawe nk’uko wikunda.’ ”
Wa musore aramwishura ati: “Ayo yose narayakurikije. None ikindi nkwiye gukora ni igiki?”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Nimba ugomba kuba uwutunganye rwose, genda, ugurishe ivyo utunze vyose, maze amahera ukuyemwo uyahe aboro; ni ho uzoronka ubutunzi mw’ijuru. Hanyuma uce uza unkurikire.”
Uwo musore avyumvise, aca agenda ababaye, kuko yari afise ubutunzi bwinshi cane.
Yesu aca abwira abigishwa biwe ati: “Ndababwire ukuri, biragoye cane ko abatunzi binjira mu Bwami bw’ijuru.
Kandi ndabisubiyemwo: vyokworoha ko ingamiya ica mu gatoboro k’urushinge rubarira kurusha ko umutunzi yinjira mu Bwami bw’Imana!”
Abigishwa bavyumvise baratangara cane, hanyuma baramubaza bati: “None nimba biri uko, ni nde ashobora kurokoka?”
Yesu arabitegereza, hanyuma ababwira ati: “Ku bantu ntibishoboka. Ariko ku Mana vyose birashoboka.”
Petero aramwishura ati: “None ko twebwe twasize vyose tukagukurikira, tuzoronka iki?”

Yesu arababwira ati: “Ndababwire ukuri, mu gihe c’isi nsha, aho Umwana w’Umuntu azokwicarira ku ntebe yiwe y’icubahiro, mwebwe mwankurikiye, muzoba mwicaye ku ntebe cumi na zibiri, mucira imanza imiryango cumi n’ibiri ya Isirayeli.

Kandi nta muntu n’umwe yasize inzu, canke abavukanyi, canke se, canke nyina, canke umugore, canke abana, canke amatongo kubera izina ryanje, atazobishumbushwa incuro ijana kandi akaragwa n’ubugingo budashira.
Ariko benshi mu bari imbere bazoba ab’inyuma, abari inyuma na bo babe ab’imbere.
Ubwami bw’ijuru bugereranywa n’umuntu yari afise umurima w’uruzabibu, hanyuma azinduka kare aja kurondera abakozi bamukorera muri uwo murima.
Maze bumvikana ko aja kubahemba idenariyo imwe kuri uwo musi, hanyuma arabarungika mu ruzabibu rwiwe.
Nk’isaha zitatu zo mu gitondo, arongera aragenda abona abandi bahagaze mu mayirabiri ata co bariko barakora.
Arababwira ati: ‘Namwe nimugende mukore mu murima wanje, ndabaha impembo mukwiranye.’
Maze baja mu murima wiwe. Nyene umurima yongera aragenda nk’isaha zitandatu n’isaha icenda, akora kwa kundi nyene.
Nk’isaha icumi n’imwe z’umugoroba, aragenda abona abandi bahagaze ata co bariko barakora. Ababaza ati: ‘Ni kuki umusi wose uheze muhagaze ngaho ata co muriko murakora?’
Baramwishura bati: ‘Ni kubera twabuze uwuduha ico dukora.’ Na we arababwira ati: ‘Namwe nimugende mukore mu murima wanje.’
Bugorovye, nyene umurima abwira uwujejwe ubutunzi bwiwe ati: ‘Hamagara abakozi ubahembe, uhereye ku baje ubwa nyuma, uhereze ku baje ubwa mbere.’
Abakoze kuva isaha icumi n’imwe z’umugoroba, bahembwa idenariyo imwe.
Maze abahawe igikorwa ubwa mbere baza guhembwa bazi ko baronka menshi kurusha. Ariko na bo nyene bahembwa idenariyo imwe.
Abo bamaze guhembwa baca bidodombera nyene umurima,
bavuga bati: ‘Abakoze isaha imwe ubahemba co kimwe natwe twiriwe turakora ku ruzuba ruri aho!’
Ariko nyene umurima abwira umwe muri bo ati: ‘Mugenzi, nakurenganije? Mbega ntiwari wemeye gukorera idenariyo imwe?
Akira rero ingero yawe utahe. Nahisemwo kugerera urya nahaye akazi ubwa nyuma ingero ingana n’iyawe.
Mbega simfise uburenganzira bwo gukoresha amahera yanje ico ngomba? Canke ubabajwe n’uko nagize umutima mwiza ku bandi?’
Abari inyuma bazoba ab’imbere, kandi abari imbere bazoba ab’inyuma.”
Yesu ariko aduga aja i Yerusalemu, afata ba bigishwa cumi na babiri arabihereranya, ababwira ati:
“Ehe, tuduze i Yerusalemu, kandi Umwana w’Umuntu azotangwa ku bakuru b’abaherezi n’abigisha b’ivyagezwe. Bazomucira urubanza rwo gupfa,
hanyuma bamushikirize Abanyamahanga kugira bo bamushinyagurire, bamushishagure, hanyuma bamubambe ku musaraba. Ariko ku musi ugira gatatu, azozuka!”
Hanyuma nyina wa Yakobo na Yohana bene Zebedayo, aza aho Yesu ari azananye n’abo bahungu biwe babiri, apfukama imbere yiwe amwubashe cane, amusaba.
Yesu aramubaza ati: “Wipfuza iki?” Na we aramwishura ati: “Ndagusavye, mu Bwami bwawe, uze utegeke ko aba bahungu banje bicarana nawe, umwe i buryo bwawe, uwundi i bubamfu bwawe.”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Ntimuzi ico muriko murasaba. Mbega mwoshobora kunywa ku gikombe c’imibabaro ngiye kunywako?” Baramwishura bati: “Egome twobishobora.”
Yesu arababwira ati: “Ni ivy’ukuri ko muzonywa ku gikombe canje. Ariko, ku vyerekeye kwicara i buryo canke i bubamfu bwanje si jewe ndabitanga. Ivyo bibanza ni ivy’abo Data yabiteguriye.”
Bamwe cumi bandi bavyumvise, bashavurira abo bahungu babiri bavukana.
Yesu aca arabahamagara bose, ababwira ati: “Murazi ko abatware b’Abanyamahanga babatwaza umukazo, kandi ko ababaganza babacinyiza.
Ariko muri mwebwe si ko bikwiye kumera. Ahubwo, uwushaka kuba umukuru muri mwebwe, ategerezwa kuba umukozi wanyu,
kandi uwushaka kuba uwa mbere ategerezwa kuba umugurano wanyu;
kuko n’Umwana w’Umuntu ntiyazanywe no gukorerwa, ahubwo yazanwe no gukorera abandi no gutanga ubuzima bwiwe ngo bube incungu ya benshi.”
Yesu n’abigishwa biwe bariko barava mu gisagara c’i Yeriko, abantu isinzi baramukurikira.
Hafi y’inzira, hari impumyi zibiri zari zicayeho. Zumvise ko Yesu azananye iyo nzira, zitangura gusemerera n’ijwi rirenga ziti: “Mwami, Mwana wa Dawidi, tugirire imbabazi!”
Abantu bari aho barabazibiza ngo bahore, ariko bo barushiriza gusemerera bati: “Mwami, Mwana wa Dawidi, tugirire imbabazi!”
Yesu aca arahagarara, arabahamagara, ababaza ati: “Mushaka ko ndabakorera iki?”
Baramwishura bati: “Mwami, twipfuza kubona.”
Yesu abumvira ikigongwe, aca abakora ku maso; ubwo nyene baca barahumuka baramukurikira.
Yesu n’abigishwa biwe begereje i Yerusalemu, bashika ahitwa Betifage ku Musozi wa Elayono. Yesu aca atuma babiri mu bigishwa ngo babitangire imbere,
ababwira ati: “Nimugende muri iriya mihana iri imbere yanyu; nimwahashika, murahasanga indogoba n’inyana yayo ziziritswe. Muce muzizitura muzinzanire.
Nihagira uwugira ico ababaza, mumwishure muti: Umwami arazikeneye, kandi aca azisubiza adatevye.”
Ivyo vyabaye kugira ngo ijambo ry’uwavugishwa n’Imana rishike; ryavuga ngo:
“Mubwire umukobwa w’i Siyoni muti: Raba Umwami wawe arakugendeye, aciye bugufi, agendera ku ndogoba, mbere aje ku nyana yayo.”
Abo bigishwa baragenda, babikora nk’uko Yesu yabibabariye.
Bazana ya ndogoba n’inyana yayo, bazisasako impuzu zabo, hanyuma Yesu yicara kuri ya nyana.
Abantu isinzi basasa impuzu zabo mu nzira, abandi na bo baca amashami y’ibiti, bayasasa mu nzira.
Maze abantu bariko bagendera imbere ya Yesu, bagenda barasemerera bati: “Hozana Mwana wa Dawidi!” “Hahezagirwe uwuje mw’izina ry’Uhoraho!” “Hozana hejuru mw’ijuru!”
Yesu yinjiye i Yerusalemu, mu gisagara cose haba uruhagarara. Abantu bakaja barabazanya bati: “Uwo ni nde?”
Abandi bakishura bati: “Ni Yesu, umuvugishwa w’i Nazareti mu ntara ya Galilaya.”
Maze Yesu yinjira mu rusengero, yirukana abadandaza n’abariko baragura bose. Ahenagura imeza z’abavunja amahera hamwe n’intebe z’abadandaza inuma.
Arababwira ati: “Handitswe ngo: ‘Inzu yanje izoba iyo gusengeramwo,’ ariko mweho mwayihinduye ubwihisho bw’ibisuma!”
Maze impumyi n’abacumbagira baraza baramwegera mu rusengero, arabakiza.
