Ariko, abakuru b’abaherezi n’abigisha b’ivyagezwe bamaze kubona ibitangaza bihebuje akoze n’ingene abana baguma basemerera mu rusengero bavuga bati: “Hozana mwana wa Dawidi!” Maze barashavura cane.
Babaza Yesu bati: “Mbega urumva ivyo aba bana bariko baravuga?” Na we arabishura ati: “Egome. Mbega ntimurasoma Ivyanditswe bivuga ngo: ‘Mu kanwa k’abana bato n’inzoya, wahironkeye amashimwe’?”
Maze aca abasiga ngaho, ava mu gisagara aja kurara i Betaniya.
Kare mu gitondo, Yesu ariko arasubira i Yerusalemu, yumva arashonje.

Nuko abona umusukoni uri hafi y’inzira, arawegera ariko asanga ata kintu na kimwe wamye, kiretse amababi gusa. Hanyuma aca arawubwira ati: “Ntugasubire kwama na rimwe.” Ubwo nyene uwo musukoni uca uruma.
Abigishwa biwe babibonye, baratangara cane. Baca babaza Yesu bati: “Ko uwo musukoni wumye ningoga?”

Yesu arabishura ati: “Ndababwire ukuri, hamwe mwogira ukwizera ntimukekeranye na gatoya, namwe mwoshobora gukora ivyakorewe urya musukoni, mbere mwokora n’ibibirengeye. Mwoshobora no kubwira urya musozi muti: ‘Shinguka witerere mu kiyaga,’ kandi ni ko vyogenda.
Nimwizera, ico muzosaba cose mu gusenga muzogihabwa.”
Yesu aca asubira mu rusengero hanyuma atangura kwigisha, abakuru b’abaherezi n’abakuru b’Abayuda baza aho ari baramubaza bati: “Ni ubuhe bubasha butuma ukora ivyo? Ni nde yabuguhaye?”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Ndababwira aho ububasha butuma nkora ibi buva, nimwishura ikibazo kimwe ngira ndababaze.

Mbega umubatizo wa Yohana wavuye he? Ku Mana yo mw’ijuru canke ku bantu?” Baravugana hagati yabo bati: “Nitwavuga tuti: ‘Wavuye mw’ijuru,’ ahava atubaza ati: ‘None ni kuki mutizeye ivyo Yohana yavuze?’
Kandi nitwavuga tuti: ‘Wavuye ku bantu,’ dukwiye guca twirinda abantu, kuko bose baremera ko Yohana yari uwuvugishwa n’Imana.”
Nuko bishura Yesu bati: “Ntituzi uwabumuhaye.” Na we aca ababwira ati: “Nanje sindababwira aho ububasha butuma nkora ibi buva.
Mbega ibi muvyibazako iki? Habaye umuntu yari afise abahungu babiri, hanyuma abwira umwe ati: ‘Mwana wanje, uno musi genda ukore mu murima w’uruzabibu.’
Aramwishura ati: ‘Oya, singenda,’ mugabo mu nyuma arisubirako, aragenda.
Hanyuma, se aragenda abwira umuhungu wiwe wa kabiri nk’uko yabwiye uwa mbere. Na we aramwishura ati: ‘Egome, muvyeyi, ndagiye,’ ariko ntiyajayo.
Mbega muri abo babiri, ni nde yakoze ivyo se yagomba?” Baramwishura bati: “Uwa mbere.” Yesu arababwira ati: “Ndababwire ukuri, abatozakori biba n’abamaraya barabatanze kwinjira mu Bwami bw’Imana.
Kuko Yohana yaje akabereka inzira yo kugororoka, ariko ntimwamwemeye, yamara abatozakori n’abamaraya baramwemeye. Ivyo mumaze kubibona, ntimwihanye ivyaha vyanyu ngo mumwizere.

Umviriza uwundi mugani. Habaye umuntu yari afise itongo hanyuma aririmamwo imizabibu. Ararizitirira, yimba ahantu ho kuganira imizabibu, yubaka n’umunara wo gucungererako urwo ruzabibu. Hanyuma azeza uwo murima abarimyi, afata urugendo rwa kure.
Hageze igihe co kwimbura, arungika abakozi biwe ngo baje gutora igice c’umwimbu kimwegukira.
Abo barimyi bafata abo bakozi, uwa mbere baramukubita, uwa kabiri baramwica, uwa gatatu bamutera amabuye arapfa.
Hanyuma arungika abandi bakozi barusha aba mbere ubwinshi, na bo abo barimyi babagira nk’uko bagize aba mbere.
Ubwa nyuma, arungika umuhungu wiwe, yibwira ati: Umuhungu wanje we bazomusonera.
Ariko ba barimyi babonye uwo muhungu, baca baravugana bati: ‘Uwu ni we azoba samuragwa. Reka tumwice kugira ngo twegukire ivyo yorazwe.’
Nuko baca baramufata, bamukwegera inyuma y’umurima w’uruzabibu, bamwicirayo.
None mwibaza ko nyene uruzabibu niyaza, azokorera iki abo barimyi?”
Baramwishura bati: “Azobica rubi hanyuma iryo tongo arizeze abandi barimyi bazohora bamuha umwimbu umwegukira uko iyimbura rigeze.”
Yesu aca ababwira ati: “Nta ho murasoma mu Vyanditswe havuga ngo: ‘Ibuye abubatsi bagaye ni ryo ryahindutse irigumya imfuruka; ibi Uhoraho ni we yabikoze, kandi ni igitangaza mu maso yacu?’
Ndababwire, muzokwakwa Ubwami bw’Imana, buhabwe ayandi mahanga azokwama ivyamwa bikwiranye na bwo.
Umuntu wese azogwa kuri iryo buye azovunagurika, kandi uwo rizogwako, rizomusya.”
Abakuru b’abaherezi n’Abafarisayo bumvise iyo migani ya Yesu, bamenya ko ari bo yariko aravuga.
Baca barondera ingene bomufata, ariko batinya abantu kuko kuri bo Yesu yari uwuvugishwa n’Imana.
Yesu yongera kuvugana na bo mu migani, ababwira ati:
“Ubwami bw’ijuru bugereranywa n’umusi mukuru w’ubukwe umwami yateguriye umuhungu wiwe.
Igihe co kuzimana abatumire gishitse, atuma abakozi biwe guhamagara abatumiwe, ariko banka kuza.

Hanyuma arungika abandi bakozi, ababwira ati: ‘Nimugende mubwire abatumiwe ko nateguye amazimano: nabaze impfizi hamwe n’ibindi bitungwa binuze, kandi ibintu vyose biteguye neza. Mubabwire baze ku mazimano y’ubukwe!’
Ariko, habura n’umwe avyitaho, bose bigira mu vyabo, umwe mw’itongo, uwundi mu bucuruzi,
abandi na bo bafata abakozi biwe barabakubagura, hanyuma barabica.
Maze umwami araraka cane, aca arungika ingabo ziwe kwica izo nkozi z’ibibi, bongera batongoza umuriro igisagara cazo.
Hanyuma abwira abakozi biwe ati: ‘Amazimano y’ubukwe yateguwe, ariko abo natumiye nta n’umwe agomba kuza.
None rero nimugende mu mabarabara no mu mayirabiri, mutumire umuntu wese muhasanga.’
Nuko, abo bakozi baragenda begeranya abantu bose bahuye, ababi n’abeza, hanyuma inzu y’ubukwe yuzura abashitsi.
Ariko umwami yinjiye kuraba abatumire, abonamwo umuntu atambaye impuzu y’ubukwe.
Aramubaza ati: ‘Mugenzi, winjiye gute hano kandi utambaye impuzu y’ubukwe?’ Uwo muntu ntiyashobora kuronka ico yishura.
Umwami aca abwira abakozi biwe ati: ‘Nimumubohe amaboko n’amaguru, mumuterere hanze mu mwijima, ahazoba amarira no guhekenya amenyo kubera umubabaro.’
Burya abatumiwe ni benshi, ariko abatoranijwe ni bake.”
Hanyuma Abafarisayo barakorana barondera ingene bomutegera ku majambo avuga.

Barungika bamwe mu bigishwa babo bari kumwe n’abashigikiye Herode Antipa. Baramubwira bati: “Mwigisha, turazi ko utunganye, kandi ko wigisha inzira ihimbara Imana mu kuri kwose. Ntuhengamira ku ruhande na rumwe kuko utarobanura abantu ufatiye ku cubahiro cabo.
None rero tubwire ico wiyumvira: Mbega ivyagezwe vyacu biratwemerera gutanga ikori rya Kayisari, canke ntibibitwemerera?”
Ariko kuko Yesu yari azi intumbero mbi bafise, ababwira ati: “Mwa ndyarya mwe, ni iki gituma muntega imitego?
Nyereka igiceri mukoresha mu kuriha ikori.” Bamuzanira idenariyo, igiceri c’Abaroma,
aca arababaza ati: “Iyi shusho n’ibi vyandiko biriko ni ivya nde?”
Baramwishura bati: “Ni ivya Kayisari.” Aca ababwira ati: “Nuko rero ivya Kayisari nimubihe Kayisari, ivy’Imana na vyo mubihe Imana.”
Bumvise ivyo barajorerwa cane, baca bamusiga ngaho baragenda.
Uwo musi nyene, Abasadukayo, ari bo batemera ivy’izuka ry’abapfuye, baza aho ari, baramubaza bati:
“Mwigisha, Mose yavuze ko umugabo apfuye adasize abana, uwo bavukana ategerezwa gucura umupfakazi wiwe kugira ngo aronkere uruvyaro uwo yapfuye.
Rero, harigeze kuba hagati muri twebwe abavukana indwi. Mukuru muri bo ararongora, ariko apfa atavyaye; maze murumunawe arongora uwo mupfakazi.
Uwa kabiri na we nyene apfa atavyaye, n’uwugira gatatu bigenda gutyo kugeza ku wugira indwi.
Mu nyuma na wa mugore arapfa.
None ku musi w’izuka, uwo mugore azoba uwa nde ko bose babaye abagabo biwe?”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Mwarazimiye kuko mudatahura ico Ivyanditswe vyera bivuga, ntimumenye n’ubushobozi bw’Imana.
Ku musi w’izuka abantu ntibazorongora canke ngo barongorwe, bazoba bameze nk’abamarayika bo mw’ijuru.
Ku bijanye n’izuka ry’abapfuye, mbega Nta ho murasoma mu Vyanditswe ingene Imana yavuze iti:
‘Ndi Imana ya Aburahamu, ya Isaka na Yakobo?’ Erega si Imana y’abapfuye, ni Imana y’abazima.”
Abantu bumvise ivyo baca batangazwa n’inyigisho ziwe.
Abafarisayo bumvise ko Yesu yajoreje Abasadukayo, baca barakorana.
Umwe muri bo w’umwigisha w’ivyagezwe, agerageza kumutega umutego, amubaza ati:
“Mwigisha, ibwirizwa riruta ayandi mu Vyagezwe ni irihe?”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “ ‘Ukundishe Uhoraho Imana yawe umutima wawe wose, n’ubugingo bwawe bwose, n’ubwenge bwawe bwose.’
Iryo ni ryo bwirizwa rya mbere kandi riruta ayandi.
Irya kabiri na ryo risa n’iryo: ‘Ukunde mugenzawe nk’uko wikunda.’
Ivyagezwe vya Mose n’ivyanditswe n’abavugishwa vyose bishingiye kuri ayo mabwirizwa abiri.”
Abafarisayo bakoranye, Yesu arababaza ati:
“Mbega mwibaza iki ku vyerekeye Kristo? Ni umwana wa nde?” Baramwishura bati: “Ni umwana wa Dawidi.”
Arababwira ati: “None bishoboka gute ngo Dawidi, avugishijwe na Mpwemu, amwite Umwami? Kuko yavuze ati:
‘Uhoraho yabwiye Umwami wanje ati: Icara i buryo bwanje kugeza abansi bawe bose ndabashize musi y’ibirenge vyawe.’
None nimba Dawidi amwita Umwami, yoba umwana wiwe gute?”
Nta n’umwe yashoboye gukura ururimi mu kanwa ngo amwishure, kandi kuva uwo musi, nta n’uwongeye kwubahuka kumubaza ikibazo.
Yesu abwira abigishwa biwe hamwe n’abantu bose bari ngaho ati:
“Abigisha b’ivyagezwe hamwe n’Abafarisayo bicaye mu kibanza ca Mose.
Mukwiye rero, kwiyubara mugakora ico cose bababwiye. Ariko ntimukore ivyo bakora, kuko badakora ivyo bigisha.
Bafata imitwaro iremereye y’amategeko y’idini bakayikoreza abantu ariko bobo ntibanayikozako urutoke.
Ivyo bakora vyose, babikora kugira ngo biyerekane. Bambara udusaho turimwo imirongo y’Ivyagezwe mu ruhanga no ku maboko kandi n’imisozo yo ku mpuzu zabo bakayigira miremire gusumvya abandi.
Bakunda ivyicaro vy’icubahiro mu misi mikuru, n’intebe z’imbere mu masinagogi.
Bakunda kuramutswa mu cubahiro mu makoraniro y’abantu, bagakunda ko babita Rabi risobanurwa ngo Mwigisha.
Ariko mwebwe, ntimukemere ko babita Rabi kuko mufise umwigisha umwe, namwe mukaba muvukana.
Ntihakagire umuntu n’umwe kw’isi mwita ‘data’ kuko mufise Data umwe, ari we So wo mw’ijuru.
Ntimuze mwemere n’uko babita abigisha kuko mufise umwigisha umwe ari we Kristo.
Umukuru cane muri mwese, ategerezwa kuba umukozi wanyu.
Uwishira hejuru azocishwa bugufi, ariko uwicisha bugufi azoshirwa hejuru.
Muzobona ibara yemwe bigisha b’ivyagezwe n’Abafarisayo, kuko muri indyarya! Mwugaye umuryango w’Ubwami bw’ijuru, ntimwinjira mwebwe ubwanyu, kandi n’abagomba kwinjira ntimwabakundira. [

Muzobona ibara yemwe bigisha b’ivyagezwe n’Abafarisayo, kuko muri indyarya! Munyaga abapfakazi utwabo, hanyuma mukagira amasengesho maremare kugira ngo mwiyerekane. Ni co gituma muzobona ibara ku musi w’imanza. ]

Muzobona ibara yemwe bigisha b’ivyagezwe n’Abafarisayo, kuko muri indyarya! Mukwiragira hose ku misozi no mu biyaga murondera umuntu umwe ngo mumuhindure umunyedini, mumaze kumuronka mugaca mumuhindura incuro zibiri kuba uwo gutabwa muri Gehinomu, nk’uko muri!
Yemwe ndongozi zihumye, muzobona ibara kuko muvuga muti: ‘Nta co bitwaye kurahira urusengero rw’Imana, ariko kandi mukavuga ko uwurahiye inzahabu ziri mu rusengero aba yibohesheje iyo ndahiro.’
Yemwe mwa mburabwenge zihumye, mbega igihambaye ni ikihe hagati y’inzahabu zo mu rusengero n’urusengero rutuma izo nzahabu ziba izejejwe?
Muravuga muti: ‘Nta co bitwaye kurahira igicaniro, ariko mukavuga ko uwurahiye ku kimazi kiri ku gicaniro aba yibohesheje iyo ndahiro.’
Mwa mpumyi mwe! Mbega igihambaye ni ikihe, hagati y’ikimazi n’igicaniro gituma ikimazi kiba icejejwe?
Uwurahira ku gicaniro aba arahiye ku gicaniro ubwaco no ku biri kuri co vyose.
Kandi umuntu wese arahira ku rusengero, aba arahiye ku rusengero ubwarwo no ku Mana iba muri rwo.
Umuntu wese arahira kw’ijuru, aba arahiye no ku ntebe y’inganji hamwe no ku Mana iyicayeko.

Muzobona ibara yemwe bigisha b’ivyagezwe n’Abafarisayo, kuko muri indyarya! Mutanga ikigiracumi kuri vyose gushika no ku mboga zo mu matongo yanyu, ariko mukirengagiza ibikomeye vyo mu vyagezwe ari vyo ukugororoka, imbabazi, n’ukwizera. Ivyo ni vyiza, ariko mwari mukwiye gutanga ico kigiracumi, n’ivyo bindi mutavyirengagije.
Yemwe ndongozi zihumye! Murayungurura agatuku mu vyo munywa, ariko ingamiya mukayimirira rimwe!
Muzobona ibara yemwe bigisha b’ivyagezwe n’Abafarisayo, kuko muri indyarya! Mwoza neza inyuma h’igikombe n’ah’isahani, ariko imbere huzuyemwo umwanda w’ivy’ubusuma n’ukwipfuza kwanyu.
Yemwe mwa mpumyi z’Abafarisayo! Banza mwoze imbere h’igikombe n’isahani hanyuma n’inyuma hazoheza habe heza.
Muzobona ibara mwa bigisha b’ivyagezwe n’Abafarisayo, kuko muri indyarya! Mumeze nk’imva zera derere; zisa neza inyuma, ariko imbere muri zo huzuyemwo amagufa n’ibindi bintu vyose bihumanye.
Namwe ni uko, inyuma mugaragara mugororotse, ariko imbere mu mitima mwuzuye uburyarya n’ikibi.
Muzobona ibara yemwe bigisha b’ivyagezwe n’Abafarisayo, kuko muri indyarya! Mwubakira imva z’abavugishwa n’Imana ba sogokuru banyu bishe, mugashariza ivyibutso vy’abagororotsi ba sogokuru bishe,
hanyuma mukavuga muti: Iyo tuba twariho mu gihe ca ba sogokuru, ntituba twarifatanije na bo mu gusesa amaraso y’abavugishwa.
Ariko iyo muvuze gutyo muba mwiyagirije mwebwe nyene ko muri uruvyaro rw’abo bishe abavugishwa.
Bandanya rero murangize ibikorwa ba sogokuru banyu batanguye!
Mwa nzoka mwe, ruvyaro rw’imvuvyi! Mwibaza ko muzokira mute urubanza rwa Gehinomu?

Ehe ngira ndabarungikire abavugishwa, abanyabwenge hamwe n’abigisha b’ivyagezwe b’ukuri. Bamwe muzobica, abandi mubabambe, abandi mubatonagurire mu masinagogi yanyu, hanyuma mubatoteze bave mu gisagara baja mu kindi.

Ikizokurikira ni uko ingaruka z’amaraso y’abagororotsi b’ibihe vyose bishwe, uhereye ku mugororotsi Abeli ukageza kuri Zakariya mwene Barakiya uwo mwiciye mu rusengero hagati y’igicaniro n’ihema ry’ibonaniro, zizoba kuri mwebwe.
Ndababwira ukuri ko ingaruka z’ivyo vyose zizoba ku bantu ba kino gihe.

Yewe Yerusalemu, yewe Yerusalemu! Wewe wica abavugishwa n’Imana, ugatera amabuye abagutumweko! Ni kangahe nagerageje kwegeranya abana bawe nk’uko inkoko yegeranya uduswi twayo mu mababa yayo, ariko ukanyankira!
None raba inzu yanyu igiye kuba akahebwe.
Kuko ndababwira ukuri ko mutazosubira kumbona kugeza aho muzovugira muti: ‘Hahezagirwe uwuje mw’izina ry’Uhoraho!’ ”
Yesu ariko arasohoka ava mu rusengero, abigishwa biwe baramwegera, bamwereka ingene urusengero rwubatse.
Na we arabishura ati: “Murabona ibi vyose? Ndababwira ukuri ko ata buye na rimwe rizosigara rigeretse ku rindi, yose azosamburirwa hasi.”
Hanyuma Yesu yicaye ku Musozi Elayono, biherereye, abigishwa biwe baramubaza bati: “Tubwire, ivyo bizoshika ryari, kandi ni ikihe kimenyetso kizokwerekana ukugaruka kwawe n’umuhero w’isi?”
Yesu arababwira ati: “Mwiyubare ntihagire umuntu n’umwe abazimiza
kuko benshi bazoza mw’izina ryanje bavuga ngo: ‘Ni jewe Kristo,’ kandi bazozimiza benshi.
Muzokwumva intambara n’inkuru zivuga ivy’intambara hirya no hino, ariko ntimuze muhagarike imitima. Ivyo bitegerezwa gushika, ariko iherezo rya vyose ntirizoba rirashika.
Ihanga rizotera irindi hanga, ubwami butere ubundi bwami. Ahantu henshi kw’isi hazoba amapfa n’ukunyiganyiga kw’isi.
Ivyo vyose bizoba ari nk’intango y’ibise.
Hanyuma bazobafata babahame, ndetse babice. Muzokwankwa n’amahanga yose babahora izina ryanje.
Ico gihe benshi bazota ukwizera bahemukiranire kandi bankane.
Hazokwaduka abavugishwa b’ibinyoma benshi kandi bazozimiza abantu benshi.
Kuko ikibi kizogwira, urukundo rwa benshi na rwo ruzotimba.
Ariko uwuzokwihangana gushitsa kw’iherezo azorokoka.
Kandi ubu Butumwa Bwiza bw’Ubwami buzovugwa kw’isi yose, kugira ngo bubere ikimenyetso amahanga yose, hanyuma umuhero uzoca uza.
Nimwabona ca ‘kizira gihumanya’ cavugwa n’uwavugishwa n’Imana Daniyeli gihagaritswe ahera (uwusoma yiyubare),
abazoba bari i Yudaya baze bahungire ku misozi.
Uwuzoba ari hejuru ku nzu, ntaze asubire mu nzu kurondera ivyo ahungana.
Uwuzoba ari mu murima ntaze asubire i muhira gutora umutamana.
Ese ukuntu iyo misi izoba ari iy’umubabaro utagira ingene wovugwa ku bagore bibungenze n’abazoba bonsa!
Musenge kugira ngo uguhunga kwanyu ntikuze kube mu gihe c’imbeho nyinshi cane canke ku musi w’Isabato.
Kuko hazobaho umubabaro n’agahinda bitigeze kubaho kuva isi iremwa kugeza ubu kandi bitazosubira kubaho.
Kandi iyo iyo misi itagabanywa, nta muntu n’umwe yorokotse. Ariko kubera abatoranijwe, iyo misi izogabanywa.
Muri ico gihe nihagira umuntu ababwira ati: ‘Ehe Kristo ari hano!’ canke ngo: ‘Ehe ng’uriya!’ ntimuze muvyemere.
Kuko abiyita Kristo n’abavugishwa b’ibinyoma bazoza ari benshi, bakore ibimenyetso n’ibitangaza kugira ngo bishobotse bazimize n’abatoranijwe.
Ehe raba ndabibabwiye imbere y’uko bishika.
Nihagira uwubabwira, ati: ‘Erega, Kristo ari mu bugaragwa,’ ntimuze muje kumuronderayo. Canke bati: ‘Raba ari hano mu vyumba,’ ntimuze muvyemere.
Kuko nk’uko umuravyo urabiriza i buseruko ukaboneka no mu burengero, ni ko bizomera Umwana w’Umuntu niyaza.
Aho umuvyimba uzoba uri, ni ho ibisiga vy’amero bizokoranira.
Ubwo nyene, inyuma y’ivyo vyago vyo muri iyo misi, ‘izuba rizocura umwijima, n’ukwezi ntikuzosubira kubonesha, inyenyeri zizokoragurika ziva kw’ijuru, n’ivy’inkomezi biri mu kirere bizonyiganyizwa.’

Inyuma y’ivyo, ni ho ikimenyetso cerekana kugaruka kw’Umwana w’Umuntu kizogaragara kw’ijuru, kandi hazoba amaborogo mu bantu bo mu moko yose yo kw’isi. Ni ho bazobona Umwana w’Umuntu aje ku bicu afise ububasha bwinshi n’icubahiro.
Azotuma abamarayika biwe bavuze inzamba isamirane cane, hanyuma begeranye abatoranijwe biwe bose bo mw’isi, kuva aho ijuru ritangurira gushika aho riherera.
Nimwigire ku mugani w’igiti c’umusukoni: iyo amashami yaco atanguye kworoha, amababi agatangura gututuza, muca mumenya ko agatasi kari hafi.
Namwe, nimwabona ivyo vyose, muzoce mumenya neza ko ukugaruka kwiwe kuri hafi, ko ageze kw’irembo.
Ndababwire ukuri, abo muri runo rungamwe ntibazopfa bose ivyo vyose bitarashika.
Ijuru n’isi bizokurwaho, ariko amajambo yanje ntazokwigera akurwaho.
Ariko ku bijanye n’umusi canke isaha, baba abamarayika bo mw’ijuru canke Umwana ubwiwe, nta n’umwe abizi uretse Data wenyene.
Nk’uko vyari bimeze mu gihe ca Nowa, ni ko bizomera no mu gihe co kugaruka kw’Umwana w’Umuntu.
Kuko mu misi y’imbere y’uko umwuzure uza, bararya, baranywa, bararongora bagashingiza, gushika umusi Nowa yinjiye mu bwato.
Ntibigeze bamenya ibigira bibe kugeza umwuzure uje ukabatwara bose. Uko ni ko bizomera igihe Umwana w’Umuntu azozira.
Abagabo babiri bazoba bari mu murima, umwe ajanwe uwundi asigare.
Abagore babiri bazoba bariko barasya ku rusyo, umwe ajanwe, uwundi asigare.
Kubera ivyo rero mube maso, kuko mutazi umusi Umwami wanyu azozirako.
Mutahure ibi: Iyaba nyene inzu yomenye isaha igisuma kizira ko, yoteramye ntiyokwemera ko kimena inzu yiwe.
Ni co gituma namwe mukwiye kwama mugavye, kuko Umwana w’Umuntu azoza mu gihe mutamwiteze.
Mbega umukozi w’umwizigirwa kandi w’umunyabwenge ni nde? Ni uwo shebuja ashobora guha ubukuru bwo kuganza abandi bakozi no kubagaburira ku mwanya.
Azoba ahiriwe uwo mukozi shebuja azosanga akora gutyo niyagaruka.
Ndababwire ukuri, azoshika amuzeza ivyo atunze vyose.
Ariko vyogenda gute hamwe yoba ari umukozi mubi, maze akibwira mu mutima wiwe ati: ‘Databuja yatevye kugaruka,’
hanyuma agatangura gukubita abakozi bagenziwe, kurya no kuborerwa hamwe n’izindi mborerwa,
shebuja azoshika umusi uwo mukozi atari yiteze ko ashikirako, no kw’isaha atazi.
Azomuhimbagura hanyuma amusangize ikibanza n’indyarya, ahazoba amarira no guhekenya amenyo kubera umubabaro mwinshi.”
Yesu abandanya avuga ati: “Ico gihe Ubwami bw’ijuru buzoba bugereranywa n’inkumi cumi zateguye amatara yazo ngo zije gusanganira umukwe.
Batanu muri bo bari ab’ubwenge buke abandi batanu bari abanyabwenge.
Abo batanu b’abanyabwengebuke batwaye amatara yabo, ariko ntibajana amavuta.
Bamwe batanu b’abanyabwenge bobo batwaye amatara yabo, hamwe n’ayandi mavuta mu macupa.
Umukwe agitevye kuza, bose bararambirwa, batangura gusinzira.
Ijoro ryitereye, humvikana ijwi risemerera ngo: ‘Ng’uwo umukwe araje nimumusanganire.’
Za nkumi zose ziravyuka zitunganya amatara yazo.
Ba banyabwengebuke babwira abanyabwenge bati: ‘Nimuduhe ku mavuta yanyu kuko amatara yacu agira azime.’
Na bo barabishura bati: ‘Ntibishoboka kuko twohava tudakwirwa twese, ahubwo nimugende ku bayagurisha mwigurire.’
Maze bagiye kugura ayo mavuta, umukwe aca arashika, abari biteguye binjirana na we mu musi mukuru w’ubukwe, hanyuma umuryango urugarwa.
Mu nyuma, za nkumi z’ubwenge buke zigarutse, zihagarara hanze, zirahamagara ziti: ‘Nyakwubahwa, nyakwubahwa twugururire!’
Na we arabishura ati: ‘Ndababwire ukuri, sindabazi!’
Nuko rero mube maso, kuko mutazi umusi n’isaha.
Ubwami bw’ijuru bugereranywa kandi n’umuntu yafashe urugendo rwa kure. Imbere yo kugenda, ahamagara abakozi biwe abasigarana ubutunzi yari afise.
Uwa mbere amuha italanto zitanu, uwa kabiri amuha zibiri, uwa gatatu amuha imwe, umwe wese amuha akurikije uko ashoboye gucuruza. Hanyuma afata urugendo.
Wa mukozi yaronka italanto zitanu z’amahera, aragenda arazicururisha yunguka izindi zitanu.
N’uwahawe zibiri aragenda abigira gutyo nyene, yunguka izindi zibiri.
Ariko umwe yahabwa italanto imwe, aragenda yimba ikinogo mw’ivu, anyegezamwo ya talanto ya shebuja.
Haheze igihe kirekire, shebuja aragaruka, ahamagara ba bakozi kugira ngo bamubwire ingene bakoresheje amahera yiwe.
Umwe yahabwa italanto zitanu azana izindi zitanu, avuga ati: ‘Databuja, wari wansigaranye italanto zitanu, none raba nungutse izindi zitanu.’
Shebuja aramwishura ati: ‘Wakoze neza, mukozi wanje mwiza kandi w’umwizigirwa! Wabaye umwizigirwa kuri bike; nanje nzoguha kuganza vyinshi. Kaze usangire umunezero na shobuja!’
Uwari yasigaranywe italanto zibiri na we araza, avuga ati: ‘Databuja, wari wansigaranye italanto zibiri; none raba, nungutse izindi zibiri.’
Shebuja aramwishura ati: ‘Wakoze neza, mukozi wanje mwiza kandi w’umwizigirwa! Wabaye umwizigirwa kuri bike; nanje nzoguha kuganza vyinshi. Kaze usangire umunezero na shobuja!’
Hanyuma umwe yasigaranwa italanto imwe na we araza, avuga ati: ‘Databuja, nari nzi ko uri umuntu agoye, wimbura aho utateye kandi wegeranya umwimbu aho utasanzaje imbuto.
Rero, naratinye nca ndagenda mpamba italanto yawe mw’ivu, none akira ivyawe.’
Shebuja aramwishura ati: ‘Wa mukozi mubi kandi w’ikinebwe! Ko wari uzi ko nimbura aho ntateye kandi negeranya umwimbu aho ntamije imbuto,
ni kuki utajanye amahera yanje ku bayadandarisha, kugira ngo ngarutse ndonke amahera yanje n’inyugu yayo?’
Ubwo nyene aca atanga itegeko ati: ‘Nimumwake n’iyo talanto yari afise, muyihe uwufise italanto cumi.
Kuko uwufise azokwongererezwa asesekarizwe, ariko uwutagira ico afise azokwakwa n’ivyo yari afise.
Uwo mukozi w’imburakimazi na we nimumute hanze mu mwijima ahazoba amarira no guhekenya amenyo kubera umubabaro.’
Aho Umwana w’Umuntu azozira, ari mu bwiza bwiwe, ari kumwe n’abamarayika biwe, azokwicara ku ntebe yiwe y’inganji.
Amahanga yose azokoranira imbere yiwe, hanyuma arobanure abantu, nk’uko umwungere arobanura intama mu mpene.
Azoshira intama i buryo bwiwe, impene na zo azishire i bubampfu.
Maze Umwami azobwira abari i buryo bwiwe ati: ‘Nimuze mwebwe abo Data yahezagiye, muragwe Ubwami mwateguriwe uhereye isi ikiremwa.
Kuko nari nshonje murangaburira, nari nyotewe mumpa ico kunywa, nari ingenzi mumpa indaro,
nagenda gusa muranyambika, nari ndwaye muza kunsuhuza, nari mw’ibohero muza kundaba.’
Maze abagororotsi bazomwishura bati: ‘Mwami, twakubonye ryari ushonje turakugaburira, canke unyotewe tuguha ico kunywa?
Ni ryari twakubonye uri ingenzi tuguha indaro, canke ugenda gusa turakwambika?
Twakubonye ryari urwaye canke uri mw’ibohero tuza kukuraba?’
Umwami azobishura ati: ‘Ndababwire ukuri, igihe cose mwabikoreye urya muntu muto muri aba bene Data, ni jewe mwabikoreye.’
Hanyuma Umwami azohindukira abwire abari i bubamfu bwiwe ati: ‘Mva mu maso mwa bivume mwe, muje mu muriro utazozima wateguriwe Satani n’abamarayika biwe.
Kuko nari nshonje ariko ntimwampa ivyokurya, nari nyotewe ntimwampa ico kunywa,
nari ingenzi ntimwampa indaro, nagenda gusa ntimwanyambika, nararwaye nja no mw’ibohero ntimwaza kundaba.’
Na bo bazomwishura bati: ‘Mwami, ni ryari twakubonye ushonje, canke unyotewe, canke uri ingenzi, canke ugenda gusa, canke urwaye, canke uri mw’ibohero ntitwagufasha?’
Umwami azobishura ati: ‘Ndababwire ukuri, igihe cose mutabikoreye umwe muri aba bato, ni jewe mutabikoreye.’
Hanyuma bazoca baja mu gihano c’ibihe bidashira, ariko abagororotsi bo bazoja mu bugingo budashira.”
Yesu ahejeje kuvuga ivyo vyose, abwira abigishwa biwe ati:
“Nk’uko musanzwe mubizi, Umusi Mukuru wa Pasika, ugiye kuba mu misi ibiri: Umwana w’Umuntu azofatwa atangwe kugira ngo abambwe.”
Uwo mwanya, abakuru b’abaherezi hamwe n’abakuru b’Abayuda, bakoranira mu rugo rw’umuherezi mukuru Kayafa,
kugira ngo barabe akaryo ko gufata Yesu mu mpisho, bamwice.
Barasezerana bati: “Ariko ntidukwiye kumufata mu misi mikuru kuko abantu bohava bagumuka.”
Ico gihe, Yesu yari i Betaniya, mu nzu kwa Simoni yahoze ari umunyamibembe.
Ariko arafungura haza umugore aramwegera afise icupa ryiza ririmwo amavuta amota cane kandi y’igiciro kinini, maze ayamusuka ku mutwe bicaye mu buriro.
Abigishwa babibonye ntibabishimye baca bavuga bati: “Mbega ubu buhombe ni ubw’iki?
Aya mavuta yari kugurishwa amahera menshi agafasha aboro.”
Yesu amenye ivyo bariko baravuga, aca ababwira ati: “Mbega uwu mugore mumugorera iki? Ankoreye ikintu ciza.
Aboro muzokwamana, ariko jewe ntimuzonyamana.
Ansutseko aya mavuta kugira ngo umubiri wanje awutegurire guhambwa.
Ndababwire ukuri, kw’isi yose aho ubu Butumwa Bwiza buzovugwa, ibi akoze bizovugwa bitume yama yibukwa.”
Hanyuma Yuda Isikariyote, umwe muri ba bigishwa cumi na babiri, aragenda aja kurondera abakuru b’abaherezi,
arababaza ati: “Hamwe nobaha Yesu mwompa angahe?” Baca bamuha ibiceri vy’ifeza mirongo itatu.
Kuva uwo mwanya aca atangura kurondera akaryo keza ko kumubashikiriza.
Ku musi wa mbere w’imisi mikuru y’imikate itarimwo umwambiro, abigishwa baza aho Yesu ari baramubaza bati: “Ni hehe ugomba ko tuguteguririra ivyokurya vya Pasika?”
Arabishura ati: “Nimugende mu gisagara, maze muraja kubona umuntu, mumubwire muti: Umwigisha avuze ko isaha yiwe yegereje, kandi ko agomba gusangirira n’abigishwa biwe ivya Pasika iwawe.”
Ba bigishwa baragenda babikora nk’uko Yesu yabibabwiye, bategura ivyo vya Pasika.
Ku mugoroba, Yesu yicarana ku meza n’abigishwa biwe cumi na babiri.
Bariko barafungura, Yesu aravuga ati: “Ndababwire ukuri, umwe muri mwebwe ahava angurisha.”
Abigishwa biwe baca barababara cane, umwe wese akavuga ati: “Mwami, nibaza ko atari jewe!”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Uwo twahurije amaboko mw’isahani ni we ahava angurisha.
Umwana w’Umuntu agiye gupfa nk’uko Ivyanditswe bivuga. Ariko aragowe uwo muntu amugurishije! Vyari kumubera vyiza iyo atavuka!”
Maze Yuda, yari yateguye kumugurisha na we nyene avuga ati: “None yoba ari jewe ga Mwigisha?” Yesu aramwishura ati: “Na we urabizi.”
Bariko barafungura, Yesu afata umukate, awushimira Imana, arawumanyura, awuha abigishwa biwe, avuga ati: “Nimwakire murye; uwu ni umubiri wanje.”
Yongera afata igikombe, agishimira Imana, arakibaha, ati: “Nimwakire munyweko mwese.
Aya ni amaraso yanje y’isezerano asesekeye benshi ngo baharirwe ivyaha vyabo.
Ndababwire, sinzosubira kunywa kuri uwu muvinyu w’imizabibu guhera ubu gushitsa kuri wa musi aho nzosubira gusangirira namwe mu Bwami bwa Data.”
Bahejeje kuririmba barasohoka, baja ku Musozi Elayono.
Bariko baragenda Yesu arababwira ati: “Iri joro muraja kunta mwese mwigire. Kuko Ivyanditswe biravuga ngo: ‘Nzokubita umwungere, intama zo mu mukuku zisanzare.’
Ariko maze kuzuka, nzobatanga kuja i Galilaya, ndabarindirireyo.”
Petero aramwishura ati: “Naho abandi bose boguta bagahunga, jewe sinzokwigera ndaguta.”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Ndakubwire ukuri, iri joro nyene, isake itarabika, uzoba umaze kunyihakana gatatu kose.”
Ariko Petero arasubira avuga ati: “Sinshobora kukwihakana ngo sindakuzi naho vyonsaba gupfana nawe.” Mbere n’abandi bigishwa bavuga batyo.
Hanyuma Yesu ajana n’abigishwa biwe ahantu hitwa Getsemane, arababwira ati: “Nimube muricaye ngaha nje harya gusenga.”
Ahitana Petero na bene Zebedayo, hanyuma atangura kugira umubabaro mwinshi n’agahinda.
Arababwira ati: “Umutima wanje wuzuye agahinda gashobora kunyica. Nimube muragumye ngaha mubane maso nanje.”
Nuko yigira imbere, yubama hasi arasenga ati: “Data, nimba bishoboka, ndakwinginze unkure imbere iki gikombe c’imibabaro. Ariko, ntibibe nk’uko jewe ngomba, yamara bibe uko wewe ugomba.”
Hanyuma agaruka aho abigishwa biwe bari asanga barasinziriye. Abaza Petero ati: “Ntimushobora kubana maso nanje n’isaha n’imwe?
Nimube maso musenge kugira ngo ntimutsindwe n’amageragezwa. Kuko umutima urabikunze ariko umubiri ufise intege nke.”
Asubirayo ubugira kabiri arasenga ati: “Data, nimba bidakunda ko iki gikombe c’imibabaro kimva imbere ntakinyoyeko, ivyo ushaka nibibe.”
Agarutse, asanga basubiriye gusinzira, kuko amaso yabo yari aremerewe cane n’itiro.
Maze yongera kubasiga ngaho asubira gusenga ubugira gatatu, avuga amajambo nk’amwe ya mbere.
Agarutse aho abigishwa biwe bari, ababwira ati: “Mbega muracasinziriye, muriruhukiye? Ehe, isaha irageze, Umwana w’Umuntu agira atangwe mu maboko y’abanyavyaha.
Nimuvyuke tugende kuko uwangurishije arashitse.”
Yesu akiriko aravuga, Yuda umwe muri ba bigishwa cumi na babiri, arashika. Inyuma yiwe hari isinzi ry’abantu bitwaje inkota n’amahiri, barungitswe n’abakuru b’abaherezi hamwe n’abakuru b’Abayuda.
Yuda, uwari yamugurishije yari yabahaye ikimenyetso, ababwira ati: “Uwo nja gusoma azoba ari we, muce mumufata.”
Maze Yuda aca agenda atumbereye Yesu, avuga ati: “Ndakuramukije Rabi!” Aca aramusoma.
Yesu aramubwira ati: “Mugenzi, kora ikikuzanye!” Ba bantu baca bashorera amaboko kuri Yesu, baramufata.
Umwe mu bari kumwe na Yesu aca asokora inkota, ayikubita umukozi w’umuherezi mukuru, amuca ugutwi.
Yesu aramubwira ati: “Subiza inkota yawe mu rwubati! Kuko abicisha inkota na bo bazokwicishwa inkota.
Wibaza ko ntari gushobora gusaba Data ubwo nyene akandungikira ingabo zirenga legiyono cumi na zibiri z’abamarayika bo kungwanira?
Ariko none Ivyanditswe vyera bivuga ko bitegerezwa kugenda gutya, vyoshitswa gute?”
Hanyuma Yesu abwira ba bantu benshi baje kumufata ati: “Mbega mbaye umugumutsi, aho muza kumfata mwitwaje inkota n’amahiri? Ni kuki mutamfatiye mu rusengero kandi ari ho nama imisi yose nigisha?
Ariko, ibi vyose bibaye kugira ngo Ivyanditswe n’abavugishwa n’Imana bishike.” Ubwo nyene abigishwa biwe bose baramuta barahunga.
Abaje gufata Yesu bamujana mu rugo rw’umuherezi mukuru Kayafa, ahari hakoraniye abigisha b’ivyagezwe hamwe n’abakuru b’Abayuda.
Ariko Petero aguma inyuma yiwe, amukurikira agendera kure, kugeza ashitse mu rugo rw’umuherezi mukuru. Ashitse yicarana n’abarinzi b’urugo arindira kuraba ingene bija kurangira.
Abakuru b’abaherezi n’abagize inama nkuru y’idini ry’Abayuda bagerageza kurondera ibirego vyotuma Yesu acirwa urubanza rwo gupfa.
Ariko, ntibaronka na kimwe, naho ivyabona vy’ibinyoma vyari vyaje ari vyinshi. Ubwa nyuma, haza abantu babiri
bavuga bati: “Uwu mugabo yaravuze ko ashobora gusambura urusengero rw’Imana, akarwubaka mu misi itatu.”
Hanyuma umuherezi mukuru aca arahaguruka, abwira Yesu ati: “None wewe nta co wireguza? Ibi birego bakwagiriza ubivugako iki?”
Ariko Yesu aguma ahoze. Maze umuherezi mukuru aca aramubwira ati: “Mw’izina ry’Imana nzima, tubwize ukuri: Uri Kristo, Umwana w’Imana?”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Uko uvuze ni ko biri. Kandi muri kazoza, muzobona Umwana w’Umuntu yicaye mu kibanza c’icubahiro i buryo bw’Imana y’ububasha, kandi aza ari ku bicu vyo kw’ijuru.”
Maze umuherezi mukuru yitaburirako impuzu ziwe, avuga ati: “Aratutse Imana! None hari ibindi vyabona dukeneye? Ubu na ho ntimwiyumviye ingene atutse Imana?
Mumucira urubanza ruki?” Baramwishura bati: “Akwiye gupfa.”
Hanyuma baca bamucira mu maso, bamukubita ibipfunsi, abandi bakamukubita amakofe,
bavuga bati: “Ko uri Kristo, tubwire uwugukubise?”
Ico gihe, Petero yari yicaye hanze mu rugo. Maze umwigeme yakora ngaho, aramwegera avuga ati: “Na wewe wari kumwe na Yesu w’i Galilaya.”
Ariko Petero, arabihakana imbere yabo ati: “Sinzi n’ivyo muriko muravuga.”
Hanyuma aragenda ahagarara hafi y’irembo, uwundi mwigeme w’umukozi w’aho na we aramubona aca abwira abari ngaho ati: “Uwu mugabo yari kumwe na Yesu w’i Nazareti.”
Arongera arabihakana, ashirako n’indahiro ati: “Sindamuzi!”
Haheze akanya gato, abari bahagaze ngaho begera Petero bamubwira bati: “Ni ukuri na we uri umwe muri bo, kuko n’imvugo yawe, irakuranga ko uri Umunyagalilaya.”
Petero aca atangura kurahira yisiba ati: “Ndabarahiye urya muntu sindamuzi!” Uwo mwanya nyene, isake ica irabika.
Petero aca yibuka ivyo Yesu yari yamubwiye ati: “Isake itarabika, uja kuba umaze kunyihakana gatatu kose, uvuga ko utanzi.” Aca aja hanze araturikisha ararira cane.
Kare mu gitondo, abakuru b’abaherezi hamwe n’abakuru b’Abayuda bagira inama yo kwica Yesu.
Baca baramufata, baramuboha, bamujana kwa Pilato, umutware w’Umuroma.
Yuda yamugurishije abonye ko baciriye Yesu urubanza rwo gupfa, aca aricuza, hanyuma afata vya biceri vy’ifeza mirongo itatu, abishira abakuru b’abaherezi hamwe n’abakuru,
ababwira ati: “Nacumuye kuko nagurishije umuntu atagira icaha.” Baramwishura bati: “Ivyo ntibituraba, ni ingorane yawe!”
Yuda aca aterera ayo mahera mu rusengero, arasohoka aja kwiyahura.
Abakuru b’abaherezi batora ayo mahera, baravugana bati: “Ntivyemewe ko aya mahera tuyavanga n’ubutunzi bw’urusengero kuko yaguze amaraso.”
Bamaze kuja inama, bafata ingingo yo kuyagura itongo ry’umubumvyi kugira ngo bazohore bahahamba abanyamahanga.
Ni co gituma, gushika n’ubu iryo tongo ryitwa itongo ry’amaraso.
Uko ni ko ivyavuzwe n’uwavugishwa n’Imana Yeremiya vyashitse, aho yavuze ngo: “Bafashe vya biceri vy’ifeza mirongo itatu, ikiguzi Abisirayeli babonye ko akwiriye,
bayakoresha mu kugura itongo ry’umubumvyi nk’uko Uhoraho yabintegetse.”
Nuko Yesu arengutswa imbere ya Pilato, umutware w’Umuroma, na we aramubaza ati: “Uri umwami w’Abayuda?” Yesu aramwishura ati: “Uvuze ukuri, ndi we.”
Ariko abakuru b’abaherezi hamwe n’abakuru b’Abayuda bamwagirije, ntiyishura na kimwe.
Pilato aramubwira ati: “Mbega ntiwumva ivyo bakurega?”
Ariko Yesu ntiyagira ijambo na rimwe yishura, bituma uwo mutware atangara cane.
Mu gihe c’imisi mikuru ya Pasika, umutware w’Umuroma yari afise umugenzo wo kurekura imbohe abantu bihitiyemwo.
Ico gihe, hariho imbohe izwi cane yitwa Yesu Baraba.
Nuko Pilato abaza abantu bari bakoraniye aho ati: “Mbega mugomba ko ndabarekurira imbohe iyihe: Baraba canke Yesu yitwa Kristo?”
Pilato yari azi neza ko ari ishari ryatumye bamuzanira Yesu ngo amucire urubanza.
Pilato acicaye aho acira imanza, umugore wiwe amurungikira ubutumwa buvuga ngo: “Ntihagire ikintu na kimwe ugira uwo mugororotsi, kuko naraye mbabajwe cane mu ndoto kubera we.”
Ariko abakuru b’abaherezi n’abakuru b’Abayuda, bemeza abantu ko basaba Baraba kugira ngo Yesu abe ari we abambwa.
Hanyuma Pilato arababaza ati: “Ni nde muri aba babiri mugomba ko ndabarekurira?” Barishura bati: “Baraba.”
Hanyuma Pilato arababaza ati: “Yesu bita Kristo wewe ndamugire nte?” Bose bishurira rimwe bati: “Nabambwe!”
Ariko Pilato arababaza ati: “Kubera iki? Ni ikihe caha yakoze?” Ahubwo barushiriza gusemerera bati: “Nabambwe!”
Pilato abonye ko ata co ariko arashikako, ahubwo ko umuvurungano ukomeza kwiyongera, afata amazi, akarabira imbere y’abantu, avuga ati: “Jewe ndera, amaraso y’uwu muntu, ari kuri mwebwe!”
Abantu bose barishura bati: “Amaraso yiwe azotwagire twebwe n’abana bacu!”
Pilato aca arekura Baraba. Atanga itegeko ko bashishagura Yesu, hanyuma aramutanga kugira ngo bamubambe.
Abasoda ba Pilato batwara Yesu aho umutware w’Umuroma yakorera, hanyuma begeranya abandi basoda bagize umugwi wabo.
Bamwambura impuzu ziwe, bamwambika impuzu yindi itukura,
hanyuma bajisha urugori rw’amahwa, barumwambika ku mutwe. Bamufatisha mu kuboko kw’i buryo inkoni y’irenga. Maze, bamupfukama imbere bamushinyagurira bati: “Turagize bwakeye, mwami w’Abayuda!”
Bamucirako amate, bafata rya renga barimukubita kenshi ku mutwe.
Bahejeje kumushinyagurira, bamwambura ya mpuzu itukura, basubira kumwambika impuzu ziwe, hanyuma bamujana kumubamba.
Bariko barasohoka igisagara, bahura n’umuntu yitwa Simoni w’i Kurene; abo basoda bamutegeka gutwaza Yesu umusaraba.
Nuko bashika ahantu hitwa Gologota (bisigura ngo Ahantu h’Agahanga).
Abasoda bamuha umuvinyu w’inkarisha, ariko amaze kuwumviriza, yanka kuwunywa.
Bamubamba ku musaraba, hanyuma bagabura impuzu ziwe bakoresheje ubupfindo,
maze bicara ngaho kugira ngo bamucunge.
Hejuru y’umutwe wiwe, bashiraho icandiko c’ibirego vyatumye abambwa cavuga ngo: uwu ni yesu umwami w’abayuda.
Abasoda bongera babamba ibisuma bibiri i ruhande ya Yesu, kimwe i buryo, ikindi i bubamfu.
Abahita bakagenda baramutuka bamuzunguriza umutwe,
bakamubwira bati: “Wewe wavuze ko wosambura urusengero ukarwubaka mu misi itatu. Nimba uri Umwana w’Imana niwikize wikure ku musaraba!”
Abakuru b’abaherezi, abigisha b’ivyagezwe hamwe n’abakuru b’Abayuda, na bo nyene bakamucokora, bavuga bati:
“Yakijije abandi ariko we ntashobora kwikiza! Nimba ari Umwami w’Abisirayeli, niyikure ku musaraba natwe duce tumwizera.”
Yizigiye Imana, rero Imana nimba imukunda nimutabare kuko yavuze ati: “Ndi Umwana w’Imana.”
Kandi na vya bisuma vyari bibambanywe na we na vyo biramutuka.
Kuva isaha zitandatu z’umurango kugeza isaha y’icenda, haba umwijima, utwikira igihugu cose.
Isaha y’icenda igira ishike, Yesu arasemerera n’ijwi rirenga ati: “Eli, Eli, lema sabakitani?” (bisobanurwa ngo: “Mana yanje, Mana yanje, ni kuki wampevye?”).
Bamwe mu bari bahagaze aho bumvise ivyo, baca bavuga bati: “Ariko ahamagara Eliya!”
Ubwo nyene, umwe muri bo ariruka afata ipampa, arijobeka mu nkarisha, arishira kw’irenga ngo ayimunyweshe.
Ariko abandi baravuga bati: “Reka turindire turabe ko Eliya aza kumutabara!”
Yesu yongera gusemerera n’ijwi rirenga, hanyuma aracikana.
Uwo mwanya nyene, igitambara co mu rusengero gitandukanya ahera n’ahera cane gitabukamwo kubiri kuva hejuru gushika hasi. Isi iranyiganyiga, ibitandara birasatagurika,
imva ziruguruka kandi imibiri myinshi y’abera irazuka.
Bava mu mva, kandi Yesu amaze kuzuka, binjira i Yerusalemu, igisagara cera, babonekera abantu benshi.
Umusoda mukuru w’Umuroma hamwe n’abasoda yari arongoye mu gucunga Yesu, babonye ukunyiganyiga kw’isi hamwe n’ibibaye vyose, bafatwa n’ubwoba bwinshi, bavuga bati: “Ni ukuri uwu yari Umwana w’Imana!”
Abagore benshi bari bavuye i Galilaya bazananye na Yesu kugira ngo bamushigikire mu gikorwa ciwe, bari ngaho babirabira kure.
Muri bo harimwo Mariya Magadalena, Mariya nyina wa Yakobo na Yosefu, na nyina wa bene Zebedayo.
Buriko burira, haza umutunzi w’i Arimataya yitwa Yosefu, kandi na we nyene yari umwigishwa wa Yesu.
Aja kwa Pilato, amusaba ikiziga ca Yesu. Maze Pilato ategeka ko bakimuha.
Yosefu afata ico kiziga, akizingira mu gitambara cera,
hanyuma agishira mu mva nshasha yari aherutse kwiyimbishiriza mu gitandara. Nuko aca atembagariza ikibuye kinini ku muryango w’iyo mva arayugara.
Mariya Magadalena na Mariya wundi, bari bicaye imbere y’imva.
Umusi ukurikira, hari kw’Isabato, abakuru b’abaherezi hamwe n’Abafarisayo baja kwa Pilato,
bamubwira bati: “Nyakwubahwa, twibutse ivyo wa mubeshi yari yaravuze akiri muzima ngo: ‘Inyuma y’imisi itatu nzozuka.’

Turagusavye rero utange itegeko ryo gucunga imva yiwe kugeza ku musi ugira gatatu. Ivyo bizotuma abigishwa biwe bataza kwiba ikiziga ciwe, hanyuma bakabwira abantu ko yazutse mu bapfuye. Bibaye uko ububeshi bwiwe bwa nyuma bwoba bubi kurusha ubwa mbere.”
Pilato arabishura ati: “Ng’abo abasoda, nimugende mucunge iyo mva yiwe uburyo bwose mwipfuza.”
Baca baragenda bashira ikimenyetso ku kibuye cugaye imva, hanyuma bashiraho abasoda bo kuyicunga.
Umusi w’Isabato urangiye, mu mutwenzi w’umusi wa mbere utangura indwi, Mariya Magadalena na Mariya wundi baja kuraba imva ya Yesu.
Ubwo nyene, haca haba ukunyiganyiga gukomeye kw’isi, kuko umumarayika w’Umwami Imana yamanutse avuye mw’ijuru, agatembagaza ca kibuye cugaye imva ya Yesu akacicarako.
Mu maso hiwe hasa n’umuravyo, kandi impuzu ziwe zarera derere.
Ba barinzi b’imva ya Yesu bagira ubwoba bwinshi ku buryo bamera nk’abapfuye.
Umumarayika abwira abo bagore ati: “Mweho ntimutinye, kuko ndazi ko murondera Yesu yabambwe.
Ntari hano, yazutse, nk’uko yari yarabivuze. Nimuze murabe aho umubiri wiwe wari uryamye.
Nuko rero, nimugende mwihuta mubwire abigishwa biwe ko yazutse kandi ko agiye kubarindirira i Galilaya. Ni ho muzomubonera. Ubwo ni bwo butumwa nari ndabafitiye.”
Abo bagore baca bava ku mva, bagenda bihuta. Bari bafise ubwoba ariko kandi bafise n’akanyamuneza kenshi. Nuko bariruka baja kubwira abigishwa biwe iyo nkuru.
Ubwo nyene, Yesu aca ahura na bo arabaramutsa. Na bo baramwegera bamufata ku birenge baramusenga.
Yesu aca arababwira ati: “Ntimutinye; nimugende mubwire bene Data baje i Galilaya, aho ni ho tuzobonanira.”
Ba bagore bakiri mu nzira bagenda, bamwe mu barinzi b’imva binjira mu gisagara, babwira abakuru b’abaherezi ingene ibintu vyagenze.
Abo bakuru b’abaherezi baca bagirana inama n’abakuru b’Abayuda, baha amahera menshi ba barinzi b’imva,
bababwira bati: “Muze muvuge muti: ‘Abigishwa biwe baraje mw’ijoro dusinziriye, biba ikiziga ciwe.’
Pilato niyavyumva, tuzomwumvisha nta ngorane muzogira.”
Abo barinzi bakira ayo mahera hanyuma bakora nk’uko babwiwe. Inkuru yabo ikwira hose mu Bayuda, kugeza n’uno musi.
Nuko ba bigishwa cumi n’umwe baja i Galilaya, ku musozi Yesu yari yarabarangiye.
Bamubonye, baramusenga, ariko bamwe muri bo barakekeranya.
Maze Yesu arabegera, ababwira ati: “Nahawe ububasha bwose mw’ijuru no mw’isi.
Nuko nimugende, muhindure amahanga yose abigishwa: mubabatize mw’izina rya Data n’iry’Umwana n’irya Mpwemu Yera,
mubigishe gushira mu ngiro ivyo nabategetse vyose. Kandi mumenye ko ndi kumwe namwe imisi yose gushika ku muhero w’isi.”
Iyi ni yo ntango y’Ubutumwa Bwiza bwa Yesu Kristo, Umwana w’Imana.
Bwatanguye nk’uko vyari vyaranditswe n’uwavugishwa n’Imana Yesaya ngo: “Ngira ndungike intumwa yanje imbere yawe, igutegurire inzira”:
“Ni ijwi ry’uwusemerera mu bugaragwa, ati: ‘Nimutegurire Uhoraho aho aca, mugorore inzira agenderamwo.’ ”
Uko ni ko Yohana Umubatizi yaserutse mu bugaragwa yigisha umubatizo wo kwihana ngo abantu baharirwe ivyaha.
Abantu benshi bava mu ntara ya Yudaya no mu gisagara ca Yerusalemu bakaja iyo ari. Bamaze kwatura ivyaha vyabo, yaca ababatiza mu ruzi Yorodani.
Yohana yambara impuzu ikozwe mu bwoya bw’ingamiya, akayikenyeza umukanda w’urushato mu rukenyerero. Ivyokurya vyiwe vyari inzige n’ubuki bwo mw’ishamba.
Yigisha avuga ati: “Uwuje inyuma yanje arandusha ubushobozi ku buryo bitanambereye kwunama ngo mpfundurure utugozi tw’ibirato vyiwe.
Jewe ndababatiza mu mazi, ariko we azobabatiza muri Mpwemu Yera.”
Muri ico gihe, Yesu ava i Nazareti mu ntara ya Galilaya, aja ku ruzi Yorodani, abatizwa na Yohana.
Akiva mu mazi, abona ijuru ryugurutse, Mpwemu Yera amuzako asa n’inuma.
Maze ijwi ryumvikana rivuye mw’ijuru riti: “Uri Umwana wanje nkunda, ukampimbara.”
Muri ako kanya nyene, Mpwemu Yera aca ajana Yesu mu bugaragwa,
ahamara imisi mirongo ine ageragezwa na Satani. Yabana n’ibikoko vyo mw’ishamba, kandi abamarayika baraza bakamukorera.
Yohana amaze gutabwa mw’ibohero, Yesu aca aja i Galilaya avuga Ubutumwa Bwiza bw’Imana,
ati: “Igihe kirashitse, Ubwami bw’Imana buri hafi. Nimwihane mwizere Ubutumwa Bwiza.”
Umusi umwe, Yesu ariko aragendagenda ku nkengera z’ikiyaga c’i Galilaya, abona abarovyi bavukana, Simoni na Andereya, bariko bararobesha insenga.
Arababwira ati: “Nimunkurikire, nzobagira abarovyi b’abantu.”
Ako kanya nyene baca basiga ngaho insenga zabo, baramukurikira.
Yigiye imbere gato, abona Yakobo na Yohana bene Zebedayo bariko barabarira insenga zabo mu bwato.
Ubwo nyene aca arabahamagara, na bo basiga se Zebedayo n’abakozi biwe mu bwato baramukurikira.
Nuko Yesu ajana na bo i Kaperinawumu. Umusi w’Isabato ushitse, yinjira mw’isinagogi arigisha.
Abamwumviriza batangazwa n’inyigisho ziwe, kuko yigishanya ububasha, mu buryo butandukanye n’ubw’abigisha b’ivyagezwe.
Ako kanya nyene, muri iyo sinagogi, umuntu yarimwo impwemu ihumanye, atangura gusemerera ati:
“Yesu w’i Nazareti, uturonderako iki? Uzanywe no kuduhonya? Ndazi uwo uri we. Uri Uwera w’Imana!”
Yesu arayizibiza ati: “Hora! Muvemwo!”
Ya mpwemu mbi ica iramujegeza hanyuma imuvamwo ivuza induru nyinshi.
Abantu bose baratangara, barabazanya bati: “Mbega ibi ni ibiki? Ni inyigisho nshasha kandi zirimwo ububasha! N’impwemu mbi na zo arazitegeka zikamwumvira!”
Ubwo nyene inkuru ziwe zica ziramamara mu ntara yose ya Galilaya.
Bavuye mw’isinagogi, Yesu aca ajana na Yakobo na Yohana i muhira kwa Simoni na Andereya.
Bahashitse, baca babwira Yesu ko inabukwe wa Simoni ari mu buriri, arwaye kandi ashushe cane.
Nuko Yesu yegera aho aryamye, amufata ukuboko, aramuhagurutsa. Bwa bushuhe buca burahera, aca arabazimana.
Ku mugoroba izuba rimaze kurenga, bazanira Yesu abarwaye benshi n’ababoshwe n’abadayimoni.
Abantu bose bo muri ico gisagara bakoranira imbere y’umuryango yari arimwo.
Nuko Yesu akiza abantu benshi bari barwaye ingwara zitandukanye. Yirukana n’impwemu mbi nyinshi, ntiyazemerera kugira ico zivuga kuko zari zamenye uwo ari we.
Mu gitondo ca kare butaraca, Yesu aravyuka, arasohoka aja gusengera mu ahantu hiherereye.
Maze Simoni n’abari kumwe na we baja kumurondera.
Bamubonye baramubwira bati: “Abantu bose bariko barakurondera.”
Na we arabishura ati: “Nimuze tuje mu yindi mihana yo hafi nje kwigishayo, kuko ari co canzanye.”
Nuko agendagenda mu ntara ya Galilaya yose, avuga Ubutumwa Bwiza mu masinagogi, yirukana n’abadayimoni.
Umuntu arwaye imibembe araza apfukama imbere yiwe, aramwinginga ati: “Ubishatse, woshobora kunkiza ngahumanuka.”
Yesu aterwa ikigongwe n’uwo muntu maze aramvura ukuboko amukorako, aramubwira ati: “Ndabishatse, kira uhumanuke!”
Ubwo nyene ya mibembe ica iramuvako arahumanuka.
Yesu aca amurungika amwihanikirije ati:
“Ntihagire umuntu n’umwe ubibwira. Ariko genda umuherezi agusuzume hanyuma utange ikimazi Mose yashinze ko uwuhumanutse atanga, kugira ngo bose bamenye ko wahumanutse.”

Aho guhora, wa muntu aca aragenda atangura kuvuga no gukwiragiza iyo nkuru. Ivyo vyatumye Yesu adasubira kuja mu gisagara ku mugaragaro ahubwo aca aguma hanze kure yaco ahantu hihishije. Ariko na ho nyene abantu barahamusanga bavuye mu mihingo myinshi.
Haciye imisi, Yesu asubira i Kaperinawumu, maze inkuru iramenyekana ko yagarutse i muhira.
Abantu benshi bakoranira aho hantu haruzura ku buryo n’imbere y’umuryango ata kibanza cari kihasigaye.
Nuko haza abantu bane bateruye ku nderuzo umuntu akongataye.
Ariko kubera ubwinshi bw’abantu, ntivyakunda ko bashikira Yesu. Nuko basambura ahantu hato ku nzu hejuru y’aho Yesu yari ari, bururukirizamwo ya nderuzo wa muntu aryamyeko.
Yesu abonye ukwizera kwabo, abwira ca kimuga ati: “Mwana wanje, ivyaha vyawe urabihariwe.”
Bamwe mu bigisha b’ivyagezwe bari ngaho batangura kwibaza mu mitima yabo bati:
“Uwo mugabo yubahutse gute kuvuga gutyo? Ukwo ni ugutuka Imana! Imana yonyene ni yo ishobora guharira ivyaha!”
Ubwo nyene Yesu amenya mu mpwemu yiwe ivyo bariko baribaza mu mitima yabo. Arababaza ati: “Ni kuki muriko mwiyumvira gutyo mu mitima?
Mbega icoroshe ni uko nobwira iki kimuga nti: ‘Ivyaha vyawe urabihariwe,’ canke ni uko novuga nti: ‘Haguruka wikorere inderuzo yawe ugende’?
Ariko nshaka ko mutahura ko Umwana w’Umuntu afise ububasha kw’isi bwo guharira ivyaha.” Nuko abwira ca kimuga ati:
“Haguruka, ikorere ikirago cawe, witahire.”
Wa muntu aca arahaguruka, aterura ikirago ciwe, asohoka bose babibona. Abantu bose baratangara, bahimbaza Imana bavuga bati: “Ntitwari bwabone ibintu nk’ibi!”
Yesu yongera kuja ku nkengera y’ikiyaga c’i Galilaya. Nuko abantu benshi baza aho ari na we atangura kubigisha.
Ariko ararengana, abona Lewi mwene Alufayo yicaye aho yatoreza ikori, amubwira ati: “Nkurikira!” Lewi aca ava hasi, aramukurikira.
Mu nyuma Lewi atumira Yesu n’abigishwa biwe i muhira iwe kugira ngo abazimane, atumira kandi n’abatozakori benshi n’abandi banyavyaha; kuko mu bakurikira Yesu harimwo benshi bameze nk’abo.
Bamwe mu bigisha b’ivyagezwe b’Abafarisayo babonye Yesu asangira n’abatozakori n’abandi banyavyaha, babaza abigishwa biwe bati: “Ni kuki asangira n’abatozakori n’abandi banyavyaha?”

Yesu avyumvise, arabishura ati: “Abakomeye si bo bakeneye umuganga, ahubwo abarwaye ni bo bamukeneye. Sinaje guhamagara abiyumvira ko ari abagororotsi, ahubwo naje guhamagara abemera ko ari abanyavyaha.”

Ikindi gihe, abigishwa ba Yohana n’abigishwa b’Abafarisayo bari bisonzesheje. Maze abantu baza aho Yesu ari baramubaza bati: “Ni kuki abigishwa ba Yohana Umubatizi n’abigishwa b’Abafarisayo bisonzesha, ariko abigishwa bawe ntibisonzeshe?”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Mbega abatumire b’umukwe bokwisonzesha bakiri kumwe na we mu musi mukuru? Ntibishoboka!
Ariko hazogera aho umukwe abakurwamwo; ico gihe bazoheza bisonzeshe.
Nta wofata igitambara gishasha ngo akibaririre ku mpuzu y’umushire, kuko ico gitambara cotuma ya mpuzu y’umushire itabuka rwose.

Ni nk’uko ata wosuka umuvinyu mushasha mu mukuza w’urushato ushaje, kuko uwo muvinyu wotuma uwo mukuza umeneka; hanyuma wa muntu akabura umuvinyu n’umukuza. Ahubwo umuvinyu mushasha bawushira mu mukuza mushasha.”
Umusi umwe, ku musi w’Isabato, Yesu yariko aca mu mirima y’ingano ari kumwe n’abigishwa biwe. Bariko bararengana, abigishwa biwe bagenda baraca imitwe y’ingano zeze.
Abafarisayo baramubaza bati: “Ni kuki abigishwa bawe bakora ibitemewe ku musi w’Isabato?”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Mbega ntimurasoma ivyo Dawidi yakoze igihe we n’abo bari kumwe bari bashonje, ata co kurya bafise?
Yinjiye mu nzu y’Imana, mu gihe c’umuherezi mukuru Abiyatari, arya imikate yashikaniwe Imana; kandi abaherezi ari bo bonyene bari bemerewe kuyirya; yongera ahako n’abari kumwe na we.”
Yesu aca arababwira ati: “Isabato yashizweho ku neza y’umuntu, umuntu ntiyaremewe kuganzwa na yo,
ni co gituma Umwana w’Umuntu ari na we Mwami w’Isabato.”
Ikindi gihe Yesu yinjira mw’isinagogi ahasanga umuntu akongataye ukuboko.
Bamwe mu bari aho bamuhanga amaso ngo barabe ko amukiza, kuko bashaka ico bafatirako kugira ngo bamwagirize ko yakoze ku musi w’Isabato kandi kizira.
Yesu abwira wa muntu akongataye ukuboko ati: “Haguruka uhagarare hano imbere y’ishengero.”
Arababaza ati: “Mbega ni igiki cemewe gukorwa ku musi w’Isabato: Gukora iciza canke gukora ikibi? Gukiza umuntu canke kumwaka ubugingo?” Ntihagira uwumwishura.
Nuko Yesu abitegereza ashavuye, kandi ababajwe cane n’uko imitima yabo ikomantaye. Nuko abwira wa muntu ati: “Gorora ukuboko kwawe.” Akugoroye guca kurakira.
Abafarisayo baca baragenda baja inama n’abayoboke ba Herode, barondera ingene bokwica Yesu.
Yesu n’abigishwa biwe bava aho hantu baja ku kiyaga c’i Galilaya, maze abantu benshi baramukurikira bavuye i Galilaya, i Yudaya,
i Yerusalemu, muri Idumaya, hakurya y’uruzi Yorodani no mu micungararo y’intara za Tiro na Sidoni. Abo bose bamukurikiye kuko bumvise ibitangaza yakoze.
Nuko abwira abigishwa biwe ngo bamutegurire ubwato kugira ngo abantu ntibamusite,
kuko yari yakijije abantu benshi bituma abarwaye bandi barondera kumukorako.
Abantu baboshwe n’impwemu mbi bamukubise ijisho, izo mpwemu mbi zaca zibakubita hasi zigasemerera ziti: “Uri Umwana w’Imana!”
Ariko we yaca azikankamira ngo zihore, ntizisubire kuvuga uwo ari we.
Hanyuma Yesu aduga ku musozi ahamagara abo ashaka, na bo baza aho ari.
Maze atoranyamwo cumi na babiri, abita intumwa, kugira ngo babane na we yongere abatume kuvuga Ubutumwa Bwiza;
abaha n’ububasha bwo kwirukana abadayimoni.
Aya ni yo mazina y’abo cumi na babiri yatoranije: Simoni (uwo yise Petero);
Yakobo na Yohana bene Zebedayo (na bo abita Bowanerige, bisigura ngo abana b’inkuba);
Andereya, Filipo, Baruteremi, Matayo, Toma, Yakobo mwene Alufayo, Tadeyo, Simoni Umuzelote,
na Yuda Isikariyote, ari we yahavuye amugurisha.
Hanyuma Yesu aja i muhira, maze abantu benshi basubira gukoranira aho ari, ku buryo we n’abigishwa biwe bitashoboka ko bafungura.
Abo mu muryango wiwe bavyumvise, baja kumufata, kuko bivuga bati: “Yasaze.”
Abigisha b’ivyagezwe bari baje bava i Yerusalemu bavuga bati: “Akoreshwa n’ububasha bwa Beyelizebuli! Umukuru w’abadayimoni ni we amushoboza kwirukana abadayimoni.”
Yesu arabahamagara ababwira mu migani ati: “Mbega Satani yokwirukana Satani gute?
Iyo ubwami bwiciyemwo ibice, buba bugiye gusenyuka.
Kandi iyo umuryango wiciyemwo ibice, ntushobora kurama.
Iyo Satani yigwanije akicamwo ibice, ntashobora guhagarara, ivyiwe biba biheze.
Nta muntu yokwinjira mu nzu y’umunyenkomezi ngo amunyage ivyo atunze atabanje kumuboha. Aho ni ho honyene ashobora kumunyaga ivyiwe.
Ndababwire ukuri, ivyaha vyose abana b’abantu bakora n’ibitutsi vyose batuka Imana barashobora kubibabarirwa.
Ariko umuntu wese atuka Mpwemu Yera ntazokwigera abibabarirwa, icaha ciwe kizohoraho ibihe bidashira.”
Ivyo yabivuze kuko bariko bavuga ngo arimwo impwemu mbi.
Bene nyina ba Yesu na nyina baraza bahagarara hanze, batuma umuntu kumuhamagara.
Abantu bari bamukikije baramubwira bati: “Nyoko na bene nyoko bari hanze kandi barakurondera.”
Arababaza ati: “Mama ni nde kandi bene mama ni ba nde?”
Nuko yeraguza mu bari bamukikije, avuga ati: “Aba ni bo mama kandi ni bo bene mama.
Uwukora ivyo Imana ishaka wese ni we mwene mama kandi ni we mama.”
Ikindi gihe Yesu asubira kwigishiriza ku nkengera y’ikiyaga c’i Galilaya, maze abantu isinzi bakoranira aho ari, na we aca atambukira mu bwato abwicaramwo, abantu na bo bahagarara i musozi.
Nuko abigisha vyinshi mu migani, ababwira ati:
“Umviriza! Habaye umurimyi yakiriye imbuto aja kubiba.
Ariko arabiba, zimwe zigwa i ruhande y’inzira, hanyuma inyoni ziraza zirazinobagura.
Izindi zigwa ku rutare, ahantu hatagira ivu ryinshi; zica zimera ningoga kuko ivu ryari rike.
Ariko izuba ryatse, za mbuto zariko ziramera zica ziruma kuko imizi yazo itashika kure.
Izindi mbuto zigwa mu mahwa; zimaze kumera, ayo mahwa arakura arazinyoha, ntizashobora kwama.
Ariko hari n’imbuto zaguye mw’ivu ryiza. Izo zarameze, zirakura kandi zirama; zimwe zama mirongo itatu, izindi mirongo itandatu, izindi ijana.”
Hanyuma aca ababwira ati: “Uwufise amatwi yo kwumva niyumve!”
Inyuma y’aho, Yesu ari kumwe na ba bigishwa cumi na babiri n’abandi bari bamukikije, bamubaza ivyerekeye iyo migani.
Arabishura ati: “Mwebwe mwahawe kumenya amabanga y’ivy’Ubwami bw’Imana. Ariko ku batabihawe, nkoresha imigani
kugira ngo, ‘naho boraba, ntibabone, naho bokwumviriza ntibatahure; kugira ngo ntibagaruke ku Mana na yo ngo ibababarire.’ ”
Nuko Yesu arababaza ati: “Mbega ntimutahura uwo mugani? None iyindi mwoyitahura gute?
Umubivyi abiba ijambo ry’Imana.
Abantu bamwe bafise imitima imeze nk’i ruhande y’inzira. Bagiheza kwumva iryo jambo, Satani araza akiba iryo jambo ritewe mu mitima yabo.
Abandi, imitima yabo imeze nk’urutare. Abo ni abumva ijambo ry’Imana bakaryakirana umunezero.
Ariko kubera iryo jambo ritagira imizi muri bo, bamara akanya gato bizeye. Iyo baciye mu vyago canke mu guhamwa bazira kwizera iryo Jambo ry’Imana, baca bata ukwizera.
Abandi bafise imitima imeze nk’umurima urimwo amahwa. Abo barumva ijambo ry’Imana,
ariko imyitwarariko y’ivy’iyi si, n’uruhendo rw’ubutunzi n’ibindi vyipfuzo vy’uburyo bwinshi, biraza bikanyoha iryo jambo bigatuma ata co ryama.
Abandi imitima yabo imeze nk’umurima ufise ivu ryiza. Abo na bo ni abumva ijambo ry’Imana bakaryakira maze bakama ivyamwa, bamwe mirongo itatu, abandi mirongo itandatu, abandi ijana.”
Yesu yongera kubabwira ati: “Mbega hari umuntu yodomeka itara akaryubikako igiseke canke akarishira musi y’igitanda? Mbega ntibarishira aho risanzwe riterekwa?
Nta canyegejwe kitazonyegururwa, kandi nta cagizwe ibanga kitazomenyekana.
Uwufise amatwi yo kwumva niyumve!”
Yongera kubabwira ati: “Mushire imitima cane ku vyo mwumva! Kuko uko mugerera abandi ari ko namwe muzogererwa, mbere kuri mwebwe bizorushiriza.
Uwufise vyinshi azokwongererezwa, uwufise bike azokwakwa n’ivyo yari afise.”
Yesu yongera kubabwira ati: “Uku ni ko Ubwami bw’Imana bugereranywa: Iyo umuntu abivye imbuto mu murima wiwe,
haba mw’ijoro canke ku murango, asinziriye canke ari maso, izo mbuto ziramera, zigakura, ariko we ntamenya uko bigenda.
Isi ubwayo ni yo ituma icabibwe gikura kandi kikama: ubwa mbere haza umutumba waco, hagakurikira umuyange, hanyuma intete.
Umurima weze, wa murimyi arazana umuhoro akimbura, kuko iyimbura riba rigeze.”
Yesu yongera kuvuga ati: “Mbega Ubwami bw’Imana twobugereranya n’iki? Twokoresha uwuhe mugani mu kubusigura?
Ubwami bw’Imana busa n’akabuto k’igiterwa citwa mutaride. Ako kabuto ni gato kurusha izindi zose kw’isi.
Ariko iyo gatewe, karakura kakaba igiterwa kiruta ibindi vyose. Amashami yaco arakura, akaba manini kugeza n’aho inyoni ziza zikarika mu gitutu caco.”
Yesu yigisha abantu akoresheje imigani myinshi isa n’iyo, akurikije ivyo bashobora gutahura.
Nta kintu na kimwe yabigishije adakoresheje imigani. Ariko asigaranye n’abigishwa biwe bonyene, yaca abasigurira vyose.
Ku mugoroba w’uwo musi nyene, Yesu abwira abigishwa biwe ati: “Tujabuke tuje hakurya y’ikiyaga.”
Nuko basiga aho rya sinzi ry’abantu, baja mu bwato Yesu yari yicayemwo, bajana na we. Kandi hari n’ubundi bwato bwajanye n’ubwabo.
Maze haza umuyaga w’igihuhusi ukomeye bituma imipfunda y’amazi yisuka mu bwato, ku buryo bwari bugiye kwuzura amazi.
Yesu we yari yiryamiye inyuma mu bwato yiseguye. Abigishwa baramukangura, bamubwira bati: “Mwigisha, ntubabajwe n’uko tugira dupfe?”
Nuko Yesu aravyuka, akankamira uwo muyaga, abwira ikiyaga ati: “Hora, tekereza!” Wa muyaga uca urahagarara, haca haba agahwekere.
Aca abwira abigishwa biwe ati: “Ni kuki mufise ubwoba? Mbega n’ubu nta kwizera mugira?”
Ba bigishwa batinya cane, barabazanya bati: “Mbega uwu ni umuntu ki, ko umuyaga n’imipfunda na vyo bimwumvira?”
Nuko bashika hakurya y’ikiyaga c’i Galilaya, mu ntara ya Gerasene.
Yesu avuye mu bwato, umuntu arimwo impwemu ihumanye aza guhura na we avuye mu mva.
Uwo muntu yaba mw’itongo ry’abapfuye kandi nta muntu yashobora kumuboha, naho yokoresheje iminyororo.
Kuko kenshi bamubohesha iminyororo ku maboko n’ivyuma ku maguru, ariko iyo minyororo yarayicagagura, n’ivyo vyuma akabivunagura. Nta muntu n’umwe yashobora kumutururuza.
Uko bukeye, uko bwije, yagendagenda mu mva no ku misozi aboroga kandi yikomeretsa n’amabuye akarishe.
Uwo muntu abonye Yesu akiri kure, ariruka apfukama imbere yiwe.
Arasemerera n’ijwi rirenga ati: “Mbega undonderako iki ga Yesu, Mwana w’Imana Musumbavyose? Ndakwinginze mw’izina ry’Imana ntunkubagure!”
Ivyo yabivuze kuko Yesu yari ahejeje kuvuga ati: “Wa mpwemu mbi we, muvemwo!”
Yesu aramubaza ati: “Witwa nde?” Na we arishura ati: “Nitwa Gitero, kuko turi benshi.”
Nuko za mpwemu mbi zinginga Yesu zishimitse ngo ntazirukane muri iyo ntara.
Hafi y’aho, hari umukuku w’ingurube zari ziragiwe ku musozi.
Abo badayimoni binginga Yesu bati: “Twemerere uturungike muri ziriya ngurube, tuzinjiremwo.”
Nuko Yesu arabemerera. Izo mpwemu mbi ziva muri wa muntu zinjira muri za ngurube. Izo ngurube zashika nk’ibihumbi bibiri. Nuko ziva kuri wa musozi ziruka zimanuka mu kiyaga zicwa n’amazi.
Abari baziragiye baca barahunga, baja kubivuga mu gisagara co hafi y’aho no mu misozi ihegereye. Nuko abantu barakorana baza kuraba ivyabaye.
Bashitse aho Yesu ari, babona wa muntu yari yaraboshwe n’abadayimoni menshi yicaye, yambaye kandi afise ubwenge bukwiye, maze bagira ubwoba.
Ababonye uko vyagenze baca babiganira ivyabaye kuri wa muntu yari aboshwe n’abadayimoni no kuri za ngurube.
Maze abo bantu baca binginga Yesu ngo abavire mu ntara.
Yesu ariko arurira mu bwato, wa muntu yari yaraboshwe n’abadayimoni aramwinginga ngo bajane.
Ariko Yesu ntiyamwemerera, ahubwo amubwira ati: “Subira i muhira mu muryango wawe, ubabwire ivyo Umwami Imana yagukoreye vyose, n’ingene yakugiriye imbabazi.”
Wa muntu aca arataha aca i Dekapolisi, atangura kuvuga ivyo Yesu yamukoreye. Abantu bose bavyumvise baratangara cane.
Yesu amaze kujabuka agasubira hakurya y’ikiyaga, abantu isinzi baraza bakoranira hafi y’ikiyaga aho yari ari.
Maze haza umwe mu bakuru b’isinagogi, yitwa Yayiro. Abonye Yesu, apfukama imbere yiwe,
aramwinginga ati: “Umukobwa wanje ari ku mpfiro. Ndakwinginze uze umurambikeko ibiganza akire abe muzima.”
Nuko Yesu ajana na we. Kandi hari abantu isinzi bari bamukurikiye, bamubanda.
Muri bo harimwo n’umugore yari amaze imyaka cumi n’ibiri arwaye ingwara yo mu gitereko yo kuva amaraso.
Yari yarivuje ku baganga benshi kandi atanga ivyo yari afise vyose, ariko aho gukira abandanya aremba.
Yumvise inkuru za Yesu, araza amuturuka inyuma, aca muri rya sinzi ry’abantu, akora ku mpuzu yiwe,
kuko yibwira ati: “Naho nokora ku mpuzu yiwe gusa, nokira.”
Ubwo nyene ya maraso arahagarara, yumva mu mubiri wiwe ko akize ingwara yiwe.
Ako kanya nyene Yesu yumva ko hari ubushobozi bumuvuyemwo. Ahindukirira rya sinzi ry’abantu, arababaza ati: “Ni nde akoze ku mpuzu zanje?”
Abigishwa biwe baramwishura bati: “Abantu bariko bakubanda impande zose, none uriko ubaza ngo: ‘Ni nde ankozeko?’ ”
Ariko Yesu abandanya araba hirya no hino kugira ngo arabe ko yobona uwamukozeko.
Wa mugore, kuko yari azi ivyamubayeko, aza ajugumira kubera ubwoba, apfukama imbere y’ibirenge vya Yesu, amubwira ukuri kwose.
Yesu aramubwira ati: “Mwana wanje, ukwizera kwawe kuragukijije, igire amahoro kandi ukire icago cawe.”
Yesu akiriko aravuga, haza abantu bavuye kwa Yayiro, wa mukuru w’isinagogi, baramubwira bati: “Umukobwa wawe yamaze gucikana. Ni kuki ubandanya ugora umwigisha?”
Yesu yumvise ivyo bavuze, aca abwira Yayiro ati: “Ntutinye, wizere gusa.”
Ntiyemerera umuntu n’umwe kumukurikira kiretse Petero, Yakobo na Yohana mwene nyina wa Yakobo.
Bashitse i muhira kwa wa mukuru w’isinagogi, Yesu ahasanga urwamo rwinshi, abantu barira, abandi na bo bavuza induru n’ijwi rirenga.
Nuko arinjira, ababwira ati: “Ni kuki hari induru n’amarira? Umwana ntiyapfuye, arasinziriye.”
Ba bantu baramushinyagurira. Amaze kubasohora bose, yinjirana na se na nyina b’umwana hamwe na ba bigishwa bari kumwe na we, baja aho umwana ari.
Amufata ukuboko aramubwira ati: “Talita Kumi!” (bisigura ngo: “Gakobwa, ndakubwiye nti vyuka!”)
Ako kanya wa mukobwa arahaguruka atangura kugendagenda (yari afise nk’imyaka cumi n’ibiri). Babonye ibibaye, bose baratangara cane.
Maze Yesu arabihaniza ashimitse ngo ntihagire umuntu n’umwe babwira ivyabaye, yongera ababwira ngo bagaburire uwo mwana.
Nuko Yesu ava aho aja i Nazareti, igisagara yakuriyemwo, ajanye n’abigishwa biwe.

Umusi w’Isabato ushitse, atangura kwigisha mw’isinagogi; benshi bamwumvirije baratangara cane. Barabazanya bati: “Mbega ivyo yigisha yabikuye he? Ubu bwenge n’ubu bushobozi bwo gukora ibitangaza yabikuye he?
Mbega uwu si wa mubaji, nyina si Mariya, abo bavukana si Yakobo, Yosefu, Yuda na Simoni? Bashiki biwe si ababanyi bacu?” Maze ivyo birabatsitaza, bituma batamwizera.
Yesu arababwira ati: “Uwuvugishwa n’Imana arubahwa hose kiretse iwabo no mu muryango wiwe.”
Nta gitangaza yahakoreye kiretse abantu bake yarambitseko ibiganza, arabasengera, barakira.
Maze atangazwa cane n’ukutizera kwabo. Nuko Yesu agendagenda yigisha, ava mu mihana aja mu yindi.
Akoranya abigishwa biwe cumi na babiri, abarungika ari babiri babiri, abaha ububasha bwo kwirukana impwemu zihumanye.
Ababwira abihanikiriza ati: “Ntihagire ikintu na kimwe mujana ku rugendo kiretse inkoni yo kwishimikiza. Ntimujane ivyokurya, amasakoshi, canke amafaranga mu mipfuko yanyu.
Mwambare ibirato kandi ntihagire impuzu yo gukuranya mutwara.
Inzu muzokwinjiramwo bakabakira, muze muyigumemwo kugeza muvuye aho hantu.
Nimwaja ahantu bakanka kubakira canke kubumviriza, muze mukunkumure umukungugu wo ku birenge vyanyu, muhave. Ico kizobabera ikimenyetso co kubagiriza.”
Nuko baragenda bigisha abantu ivyo kwihana;
birukana abadayimoni benshi kandi basiga amavuta abarwaye benshi, barabasengera barakira.
Muri iyo misi, Umwami Herode Antipa yumva inkuru za Yesu kuko yari yamaze kumenyekana cane. Bamwe bavuga bati: “Yohana Umubatizi yazutse, ni co gituma afise ubushobozi bwo gukora ibitangaza.”
Abandi bavuga bati: “Ni Eliya.” Hariho n’abandi babavuga bati: “Ni uwuvugishwa n’Imana, asa n’umwe mu bavugishwa n’Imana ba kera.”
Ariko Herode avyumvise aravuga ati: “Ko Yohana ari jewe namuciye umutwe, yoba yazutse!”
Herode Antipa ubwiwe ni we yari yatanze itegeko ryo gufata Yohana, kumuboha no kumupfunga. Ivyo yabikoze abitumwe na Herodiya, uwo yari yararongoye kandi yari asanzwe ari muka Filipo, uwo bavukana.
Kuko Yohana yama abwira Herode ati: “Ntivyemewe ko urongora umugore w’uwo muvukana.”
Ivyo vyatumye Herodiya amwanka urunuka, yipfuza kumwica. Ariko ntiyabishobora,
kuko Herode yatinya Yohana akamukingira. Yari amuzi nk’umuntu w’umugororotsi kandi w’intungane. Igihe cose yamwumviriza, ivyiwe vyaramubuza amahoro, ariko kandi agakunda kumwumviriza.

Maze igihe kimwe Herodiya aronka akaryo. Ku musi mukuru wo kwibuka ivuka ryiwe, Herode yateguye umusi mukuru atumira abategetsi bakurubakuru bo ku ngoma yiwe, abo mu gisoda hamwe n’abatware bo mu ntara ya Galilaya.
Maze umukobwa wa Herodiya araza aratamba, anezereza cane Herode n’abatumire biwe. Umwami aca abwira uwo mukobwa ati: “Nsaba ico ushaka cose, ndakiguha.”
Ivyo yabimwemereye ashizeko indahiro ati: “Ico unsaba cose ndakiguha, naho coba igice c’ubwami bwanje.”
Wa mukobwa arasohoka abaza nyina ati: “Nsabe iki?” Na we aramwishura ati: “Saba umutwe wa Yohana Umubatizi!”
Ubwo nyene wa mukobwa ariruka asubira aho umwami ari, aramubwira ati: “Nsavye ko umpa ubu nyene umutwe wa Yohana Umubatizi kw’isiniya!”
Maze umwami Herode arababara cane, ariko kubera indahiro yarahiye imbere y’abatumire, ntiyashobora kumwankira ico asavye.
Nuko aca arungika umusoda amutegeka kuzana umutwe wa Yohana. Wa musoda aja mw’ibohero, aca umutwe Yohana,
agaruka awuzanye kw’isiniya, awuha wa mukobwa na we awuha nyina.
Abigishwa ba Yohana bavyumvise baraza batora ikiziga ciwe baja kugihamba.
Intumwa zigarutse zikoranira aho Yesu ari, zimwiganira ivyo zakoze n’ivyo zigishije.
Kubera hari uruja n’uruza rw’abantu benshi ku buryo batashobora no kuronka akaryo ko gufungura, Yesu aca ababwira ati: “Nimuze tuje mu kibanza gitekanye, turuhuke.”
Nuko bafata ubwato baja ahantu hiherereye.
Ariko benshi bababona bakiva aho hantu, barabamenya, baca bava mu bisagara vyinshi bariruka n’amaguru, babatangayo.
Yesu amaze kuva mu bwato abona abantu isinzi, bamutera ikigongwe, kuko bari bameze nk’intama zitagira umwungere. Nuko atangura kubigisha vyinshi.
Buriko burira, abigishwa biwe baza aho ari, bamubwira bati: “Aha hantu turi ni mu gahinga kandi buriko burira.
Rungika aba bantu baje mu misozi no mu mihana yo hafi kugira ngo bigurire ivyo barya.”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Nimubagaburire mwebwe nyene.” Na bo baramubwira bati: “Mbega twokura hehe idenariyo amajana abiri zo kugura ivyokurya bikwiye aba bantu?”
Yesu arababaza ati: “Mufise imikate ingahe? Genda murabe.” Bagarutse bamubwira bati: “Dufise imikate itanu n’ifi zibiri.”
Nuko abatuma kwicarika abantu mu mirwi ahantu hari ubwatsi butotahaye.
Bicara mu mirwi y’abantu ijana ijana na mirongo itanu itanu.
Yesu afata ya mikate itanu na za fi zibiri, arangamiza mw’ijuru, abishimira Imana. Hanyuma amanyagura ya mikate, ayihereza abigishwa ngo bagaburire abantu. Abagaburira na za fi bose.
Nuko bose bararya kandi barahaga.
Hanyuma abigishwa begeranya ibiseke cumi na bibiri y’ivyasigaye kuri ya mikate na za fi.
Abariye bari abagabo ibihumbi bitanu.
Hanyuma y’ivyo, Yesu abwira abigishwa biwe ngo baje mu bwato babe baragenda bamwitangire imbere mu kujabuka i Betesayida; na we asigare arasezera abantu.
Ahejeje kubasezera, aca aduga ku musozi gusenga.
Bumaze kwira, bwa bwato bwari bugeze hagati mu kiyaga, Yesu we yari akiri ku musozi.
Akiri aho, abona ko abigishwa biwe bafise ingorane nyinshi mu gusoza kuko umuyaga waza ubaturutse imbere. Ijoro ryitereye bugiye guca, aza aho bari, agendagenda ku mazi, asa n’uwugira abarengane.
Bamubonye agendera ku mazi, bagira ngo ni umuzimu, baca bakoma induru,
kuko bose bari bagize ubwoba bwinshi. Aca arababwira ati: “Humura! Ni jewe. Ntimugire ubwoba.”
Nuko atambukira mu bwato maze umuyaga uca urahagarara. Na bo baratangara cane,
kuko na ca gitangaza c’imikate batari bwagitahure, bitumwe n’uko imitima yabo yari ikomantajwe n’ukutizera.
Bamaze kujabuka, bashika hakurya ahitwa Genezareti, babohera ubwato i musozi.
Bururutse ubwato, abantu barababona, bamenyamwo Yesu.
Baca bakwiragira muri ako karere kose bazana abantu barwaye ku nderuzo, bakabajana aho bumvise ko Yesu ari hose.

Kandi aho yaja hose, haba mu mihana, mu bisagara canke mu misozi, abantu bazana abarwaye babo bakabashira ahabona, maze bakamwinginga ngo abareke bakore ku musozo w’impuzu yiwe, kandi ababukorako bose baca bakira.
Abafarisayo na bamwe mu bigisha b’ivyagezwe bari bavuye i Yerusalemu baraza bakoranira aho Yesu ari,
maze babona bamwe mu bigishwa biwe bafungura kandi amaboko yabo ahumanye, ni ukuvuga batakaravye nk’uko umugenzo wabitegeka.
(Mu bisanzwe, Abafarisayo n’abandi Bayuda ntibashobora gufungura batabanje gukaraba nk’uko umugenzo wa ba sekuru wabitegeka.
Kandi n’iyo bavuye kw’isoko, ntibashobora gufungura batabanje gukaraba. Barakurikiza n’iyindi migenzo, nko kwoza ibikombe, amasafuriya, amasahani n’imeza.)
Nuko ba Bafarisayo na ba bigisha b’ivyagezwe babaza Yesu bati: “Ni kuki abigishwa bawe batubahiriza imigenzo ya ba sogokuruza, bagafungura n’iminwe ihumanye?”
Arabishura ati: “Yesaya yavuze ukuri igihe yabavugishwako mwa ndyarya mwe! Yanditse avuga ati: ‘Aba bantu banyubahisha iminwa yabo, ariko imitima yabo iri kure yanje.
Ukunsenga kwabo ntikugira ikimazi; inyigisho zabo ni amabwirizwa abantu bishingiye.’
Mureka amabwirizwa y’Imana mugashira imitima ku migenzo y’abantu.”
Yongera arababwira ati: “Mwagize ishaka ryo kutubahiriza amabwirizwa y’Imana kugira ngo mwubahirize imigenzo yanyu!
Kuko Mose yavuze ati: ‘Wubahe so na nyoko,’ yongerako ati: ‘Umuntu wese azovuma se canke nyina, aze yicwe.’
Ariko mweho muvuga ko iyo umuntu afise ico yari gufashisha se canke nyina, ariko akavuga ko ari Korobani (bisigura ko cagizwe inyegu y’Imana),
ivyo bituma mumwemerera kutagira ico afasha se canke nyina.
Uko ni ko muhindura ijambo ry’Imana ubusa mwishimikije imigenzo mwishingiye kandi mugakora n’ibindi vyinshi bisa n’ivyo.”
Hanyuma Yesu yongera guhamagara rya sinzi ry’abantu ngo begere aho ari, maze arababwira ati: “Nimuntege amatwi mwese, kandi mutahure:
Nta kintu na kimwe kija mu muntu kivuye hanze gishobora kumuhumanya; igihumanya umuntu ni ikiva muri we. [
Uwufise amatwi yumva niyumve.” ]
Yesu amaze kuva aho abantu bari akaja mu nzu, abigishwa biwe bamusaba ngo abasigurire uwo mugani.
Arababaza ati: “Mbega namwe ntimutahura? Ntimuzi ko ivyo umuntu arya bidashobora kumuhumanya?
Kuko ntibija mu mutima wiwe, ahubwo bija mu nda yiwe, hanyuma bigasohoka.” (Mu kuvuga ibi, Yesu yariko yerekana ko ata vyokurya bihumanya.)
Arongerako ati: “Ibiva mu muntu ni vyo bimuhumanya.
Kuko imbere mu mutima w’umuntu ni ho hava ivyiyumviro bibi, ingeso mbi z’ivy’isoni nke, ubusuma, ubwicanyi,
ubusambanyi, gukunda ibintu kurenze urugero, ubukozi bw’ikibi, ubugunge, kwipfuza kurenze urugero, kwipfuza ivy’abandi, gutukana, ubwibone, n’ubupfu.
Ibi bibi vyose biva mu muntu maze bikamuhumanya.”
Hanyuma y’ivyo Yesu ava i Galilaya aja mu karere kegereye igisagara ca Tiro. Nuko yinjira mu nzu kandi ntiyashaka ko hagira uwumenya ko ariho ari; ariko ntivyakunda ko yihisha.
Ubwo nyene umugore yari afise umukobwa aboshwe n’impwemu mbi yumva ko Yesu ari ho ari. Aca araza apfukama imbere yiwe.
Uwo mugore yari Umugirikikazi yavukiye i Foyinike muri Siriya. Nuko yinginga Yesu ngo yirukane impwemu mbi yari mu mukobwa wiwe.
Yesu aramubwira ati: “Reka abana babanze barye bahage, kuko si vyiza guterera imbwa ivyokurya vy’abana.”
Na we aramwishura ati: “Mwami, n’imbwa na zo zirarya utwo abana bakororeye musi y’imeza.”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Ko wishuye uko, niwitahire; ya mpwemu mbi yavuye mu mukobwa wawe.”
Nuko arataha asanga umwana wiwe aryamye ku buriri, ya mpwemu mbi yamuvuyemwo.
Hanyuma Yesu ava mu karere kegereye igisagara ca Tiro aca i Sidoni imbere yo gusubira ku kiyaga c’i Galilaya no mu karere ka Dekapolisi.
Ahashitse bamuzanira umuntu atumva kandi adatobora neza, binginga Yesu ngo amurambikeko ibiganza amukize.
Nuko Yesu aramufata, amwigiza kure y’abantu, ashira intoke ziwe mu matwi y’uwo muntu, acira amate ku ntoke ziwe maze amukora ku rurimi.
Ahanga amaso mw’ijuru, ariruhutsa, maze abwira wa muntu ati: “Efata!” (bisigura ngo: “Zibuka”).
Ubwo nyene amatwi ya wa muntu arazibuka, ururimi rwiwe ruragoboroka, aca atangura kuvuga neza.
Yesu ategeka abari aho kutabibwira umuntu n’umwe. Ariko uko yababuza ni ko barushiriza kubikwiragiza.
Abantu baratangara cane, bituma baguma bavuga bati: “Ivyo akora vyose biratangaje. Atuma n’ibipfamatwi vyumva, n’ibiragi bikavuga.”
Muri iyo misi, kubera hari hakiri abantu isinzi kandi ata vyokurya bari bagifise, Yesu ahamagara abigishwa biwe arababwira ati:
“Aba bantu banteye ikigongwe. Tumaranye imisi itatu none raba nta vyokurya basigaranye.
Ninabarungika bashonje, bahava bagwira isari mu nzira, kuko bamwe muri bo bavuye kure.”
Abigishwa baramwishura bati: “None twokura he ivyokurya vyokwira aba bantu muri ubu bugaragwa?”
Yesu arababaza ati: “Mufise imikate ingahe?” Baramwishura bati: “Indwi.”
Maze Yesu abwira ba bantu ngo bicare hasi. Amaze gufata ya mikate akayishimira Imana, arayimanyagura ayiha abigishwa ngo bayihe abantu, na bo babikora uko.
Bari bafise kandi n’udufi duke. Na two adushimira Imana, abwira abigishwa ngo baduhe abantu.
Ba bantu bararya barahaga. Abigishwa begeranya ibiseke indwi vyuzuye utumanyu twasigaye.
Abari aho bashika ibihumbi bine. Bahejeje gufungura, Yesu aca arabarungika barataha.
Ubwo nyene aca aja mu bwato n’abigishwa biwe baja mu karerere ka Dalamanuta.
Abafarisayo bumvise ko Yesu yashitse, baraza batangura kumuhaririza. Mu ntumbero yo kumutega umutego, bamusaba ngo akore ikimenyetso kivuye mw’ijuru cerekana ko yatumwe n’Imana.
Maze Yesu ariruhutsa cane, hanyuma ababwira ati: “Mbega ni kuki abantu ba kino gihe basaba ikimenyetso? Ndababwire ukuri, nta kimenyetso nk’ico nzobaha.”
Nuko aca abasiga ngaho, atambukira mu bwato aja ku rundi ruhande rw’ikiyaga.
Ariko abigishwa bari bibagiye kuzana ivyokurya. Bari bafise umukate umwe gusa mu bwato.
Bariko barajabuka arabagabisha ati: “Mwirinde umwambiro w’Abafarisayo n’uwa Herode.”
Abigishwa baca baravugana bati: “Ibi abivuze kuko tutagira imikate.”
Yesu yari azi ivyo bariko baravugana, ni ko kubabwira ati: “Ni kuki muvugana ku vyo kutagira imikate? N’ubu ntimurabona canke ngo mutahure? Imitima yanyu irakomantaye ku buryo idashobora gutahura?
Ko mufise amaso, ni kuki mutabona? Ko mufise amatwi, ni kuki mutumva? Nta kintu na kimwe mwibuka?
Hamwe namanyagura ya mikate itanu nkagaburira abantu ibihumbi bitanu, mwegeranije ibiseke bingahe vyuzuye utumanyu basigaje?” Baramwishura bati: “Cumi na bibiri.”
Yesu arabandanya ati: “Hamwe namanyagura ya mikate indwi nkagaburira abantu ibihumbi bine, mwegeranije ibiseke bingahe vyuzuye utumanyu basigaje?” Baramwishura bati: “Indwi.”
Maze arababaza ati: “N’ubu ntimuratahura?”
Bashitse i Betesayida, bamuzanira impumyi baramwinginga ngo ayikoreko, ayikize.
Nuko afata ukuboko ya mpumyi ayijana inyuma y’imihana. Ahejeje gucira amate ku maso ya ya mpumyi, ayirambikako ibiganza, arayibaza ati: “Hari ikintu ubona?”
Wa muntu areraguza, maze avuga ati: “Egome, ndabona abantu, ariko bameze nk’ibiti bigendagenda.”
Yesu yongera kurambika ibiganza ku maso ya wa muntu, maze amaso yiwe aca urahumuka. Aca arakira rwose, abona neza.
Yesu aca aramurungika muhira, amubwira ati: “Ntuce mu mihana.”
Hanyuma y’ivyo, Yesu n’abigishwa biwe bava i Galilaya baja mu mihana yegereye i Kayisariya mu ntara yatwarwa na Filipo. Bakigenda arababaza ati: “Mbega abantu bavuga ko ndi nde?”
Baramwishura bati: “Bamwe bavuga ko uri Yohana Umubatizi; abandi ngo uri Eliya; hariho n’abavuga ko uri umwe mu bavugishwa n’Imana.”
Arababaza ati: “None mweho muvuga ko ndi nde?” Petero arishura ati: “Uri Kristo.”
Yesu aca arababuza ngo ntihagire umuntu n’umwe babwira uwo ari we.

Yesu aca atangura kubigisha ababwira ko Umwana w’Umuntu ategerezwa kubabazwa mu buryo bwinshi; akankwa n’abatware, n’abakuru b’abaherezi n’abigisha b’ivyagezwe; kandi ko azokwicwa hanyuma akazuka ku musi ugira gatatu.
Ivyo yabivuga mu majambo atomoye. Hanyuma Petero amujana hirya gato atangura kumwamira ngo ntasubire kuvuga ivyo bintu.
Yesu arahindukira araba abandi bigishwa, akankamira Petero ati: “Satani, herera inyuma yanje. Ivyo wiyumvira si ivy’Imana, ni ivy’abantu.”
Nuko Yesu ahamagara rya sinzi ry’abantu benshi bari hafi ngo begere abigishwa, arababwira ati: “Uwushaka kuba umwigishwa wanje wese, ategerezwa kwiheba, akikorera umusaraba akankurikira.
Kuko uwugomba gukiza ubugingo bwiwe, azobubura. Ariko uwubuheba ku bwanje no ku bw’Ubutumwa Bwiza, azobukiza.
Mbega vyomarira iki umuntu kugira ubutunzi bw’isi yose, ariko agatakaza ubugingo bwiwe?
Mbega ni ikihe kintu c’agaciro umuntu yotanga kugira ngo acungure ubugingo bwiwe?

Umuntu niyagira isoni zo kunyemera no kwemera amajambo yanje muri uru runganwe rw’abasambanyi n’abanyavyaha, n’Umwana w’Umuntu na we azogira isoni zo kumwemera aho azozira mu bwiza bwa Se ari kumwe n’abamarayika bera.”
Maze abandanya ababwira ati: “Ndababwire ukuri, bamwe mu bahagaze hano muri kano kanya ntibazopfa batabonye Ubwami bw’Imana buza mu bushobozi bukomeye.”
Haheze imisi itandatu, Yesu ajana na Petero, na Yakobo na Yohana abadugana ku musozi muremure aho bashobora kuba bonyene. Bari ngaho ishusho ya Yesu ihinduka babona.
Impuzu ziwe zirera cane, zica ibibatsi; nta muntu n’umwe kw’isi yozimesuye ngo zere nk’uko.
Hanyuma ba bigishwa batatu babona Eliya na Mose baganira na Yesu.
Petero abwira Yesu ati: “Mwigisha, bitubereye vyiza kuba hano. Reka tuhashinge amahema atatu: iryawe, irya Mose, n’irya Eliya.”
(Yari yabuze ico avuga; kuko we na bagenziwe bari batekewe n’ubwoba.)
Maze haza igicu kirabatwikira, hanyuma ijwi ryumvikanira muri ca gicu, rivuga riti: “Uwu ni Umwana wanje nkunda cane. Nimumwumvirize!”
Ako kanya nyene, baravye hirya no hino, basanga Mose na Eliya bagiye, basigaranye na Yesu gusa.
Bariko baramanuka bava kuri uwo musozi, Yesu arabihanikiriza ngo ntihagire umuntu n’umwe babwira ivyo babonye kugeza Umwana w’Umuntu azutse mu bapfuye.
Nuko babigumya nk’ibanga, bibaza ico “ukuzuka mu bapfuye” bisigura.
Hanyuma baramubaza bati: “Ni kuki abigisha b’ivyagezwe bavuga ko Eliya ategerezwa kubanza kuza?”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Ni ukuri, Eliya ategerezwa kubanza kuza kugira ngo asubize vyose mu buryo. None ni kuki handitswe ko Umwana w’Umuntu ategerezwa kubabazwa cane akongera agasuzugurwa?
Ariko ndababwire, Eliya yamaze kuza, kandi abantu bamukoreye ivyo bishakiye, nk’uko Ivyanditswe vyera bibivuga.”
Bagarutse aho abandi bigishwa bari, babona abantu isinzi babakikije kandi bamwe mu bigisha b’ivyanditswe ni ho bari bari baharira na bo.
Abantu bose babonye Yesu aserutse baratangara cane, biruka baja kumuramutsa.
Yesu arababaza ati: “Mbega muriko muharira ku biki?”
Umwe muri ba bantu arishura ati: “Mwigisha, nakuzaniye umuhungu wanje, kuko aboshwe n’impwemu mbi ituma atavuga.
Ishobora kumufatira aho ari ho hose, ikamutura hasi, akabira ifuro mu kanwa, agahekenya imisaya, hanyuma umubiri wiwe ukadadarara.”
Yesu yishura avuga ati: “Mwa bantu b’iki gihe, nta kwizera mufise! Mbega nkwiye kugumana namwe igihe kingana gute? Mbega nzobihanganira gushika ryari? Nimunzanire uwo mwana.”
Nuko bamuzanira wa mwana. Ya mpwemu mbi ikibona Yesu, itangura kumujegeza cane, agwa hasi, arikumbagaza, ibira ifuro mu kanwa.
Yesu abaza se wa wa mwana ati: “Ibi vyatanguye kumushikira ryari?” Na we arishura ati: “Kuva akiri umwana muto cane.
Kenshi iyo mpwemu iramuta mu muriro canke mu mazi, ikagerageza kumwica. Nimba woshobora kugira ico ukoze, utugirire impuhwe udufashe.”
Yesu aravuga ati: “Uvuze uti: ‘Nimba noshobora kugira ico nkoze?’ Vyose bishobokera uwizera.”
Ubwo nyene se wa wa mwana arasemerera ati: “Ndizera! Ariko mfasha kuko mfise ukwizera guke!”
Yesu abonye ko abantu benshi baje biruka batumbereye aho bari, ategeka ya mpwemu ihumanye ati: “Wa mpwemu itera uburagi n’ukutumva, va muri uwu mwana kandi ntuze wigere umugarukamwo.”
Ya mpwemu ihumanye ivuza induru, ijegeza cane wa mwana, hanyuma imuvamwo. Uwo mwana aca amera nk’uwupfuye, kandi benshi bavuga bati: “Arapfuye.”
Ariko Yesu amufata ukuboko aramuhagurutsa, maze wa mwana arahagarara.
Mu nyuma y’ivyo, Yesu yinjiye mu nzu, abigishwa biwe baramubaza biherereye bati: “Ni kuki twebwe vyatunaniye kwirukana irya dayimoni?”
