Arabishura ati: “Ugusenga kwonyene ni kwo gushobora kwirukana impwemu nk’irya.”
Nuko bava aho hantu baca i Galilaya. Yesu ntiyashaka ko hagira uwumenya aho bari,
kuko yashaka kugumana n’abigishwa biwe ngo abigishe. Arababwira ati: “Umwana w’Umuntu agiye gutabwa mu maboko y’abantu. Bazomwica ariko ku musi ugira gatatu, azozuka.”
Ariko ntibatahura ico ababwiye, kandi batinya no kugira ico babimubazako.
Nuko bashika i Kaperinawumu. Ashitse mu nzu abaza abigishwa biwe ati: “Mbega mwariko muharira ku ki igihe twari mu nzira tuza?”
Ariko ntibamwishura, kuko mu nzira bariko babazanya umukuru muri bo uwo ari we.
Yesu amaze kwicara ahamagara ba bigishwa cumi na babiri arababwira ati: “Umuntu wese ashaka kuba uwa mbere ategerezwa kuba uw’inyuma ya bose, n’umukozi wa bose.”
Nuko afata umwana mutoya amuhagarika hagati yabo, aramuterura, ababwira ati:
“Umuntu wese yakira umwe muri aba bana bato mw’izina ryanje aba anyakiriye; kandi uwunyakiriye wese ntaba yakiriye jewe gusa, ahubwo aba yakiriye uwantumye.”
Yohana abwira Yesu ati: “Mwigisha, twabonye umuntu yirukana abadayimoni mw’izina ryawe duca turamubuza kuko atari umwe muri twebwe.”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Ntimukamubuze, kuko nta muntu yokora igitangaza mw’izina ryanje hanyuma ngo agaruke amvuge nabi.
Kuko uwutatugwanya aba ari ku ruhande rwacu.
Ndababwire ukuri, umuntu wese abahaye igikombe c’amazi mw’izina ryanje kuko muri aba Kristo, ntazobura kubihererwa impera.
Nihagira umuntu atuma umwe muri aba bato banyizera acumura, ikimukwiye ni uko yoboherwa urusyo kw’izosi, agatererwa mu kiyaga.
Ukuboko kwawe nikwatuma ucumura, uguce. Vyokubera vyiza kwinjira mu bugingo budashira ufise ukuboko kumwe, hako winjira mu muriro utazima wa Gehinomu ufise amaboko yompi, [
aho ‘inyo zaho ntizipfa, n’umuriro waho ntuzima.’ ]
Kandi ukuguru kwawe nikwatuma ukora icaha, uguce. Vyokubera vyiza kwinjira mu bugingo budashira ufise ukuguru kumwe, hako winjira mu muriro utazima wa Gehinomu ufise amaguru yompi, [
aho ‘inyo zaho ntizipfa, n’umuriro waho ntuzima.’ ]
Ijisho ryawe niryatuma ukora icaha, rinogore. Vyokubera vyiza kwinjira mu Bwami bw’Imana ufise ijisho rimwe, hako utererwa muri Gehinomu ufise amaso yompi,
aho ‘inyo zaho ntizipfa, n’umuriro waho ntuzima.’
Umuntu wese azopimwa n’umuriro.
Umunyu ni ngirakamaro. Ariko iyo utakaje uburyohe bwawo, mbega bwosubiramwo gute? Mugire ibiranga umunyu muri mwebwe kandi mubane amahoro.”
Nuko Yesu ava i Kaperinawumu aja mu ntara ya Yudaya, hakurya y’uruzi Yorodani. Na ho nyene abantu isinzi baza aho ari, aca arabigisha nk’uko yari asanzwe abikora.
Bamwe mu Bafarisayo baraza bagerageza kumutega umutego, baramubaza bati: “Mbega biremewe ko umugabo yahukana n’umugore wiwe?”
Arabishura ati: “Mbega ivyagezwe vya Mose bitegeka iki?”
Baramwishura bati: “Mose yaremeye ko umuntu ashobora guha umugore wiwe urwandiko rwemeza ko bahukanye hanyuma akamwirukana.”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Yanditse ico cagezwe kuko imitima yanyu ikomantaye.
Ariko Imana yaremye ‘umugabo n’umugore kuva mu ntango y’irema.’
‘Ni co gituma umugabo azosiga se na nyina akabana n’umugore wiwe,
maze bakaba umubiri umwe’; kuko baba batakiri babiri, ahubwo baba babaye umwe.
None rero ico Imana yamatanije, ntihakagire uwukimatanura.”
Bashitse mu nzu, abigishwa basubira kubaza Yesu ku bijanye n’ukwahukana.
Arabishura ati: “Umuntu wese yirukana umugore wiwe akarongora uwundi, aba asambanye, kandi aba acumuye kuri uwo wa mbere.
Kandi iyo umugore yahukanye n’umugabo wiwe akarongorwa n’uwundi mugabo, aba asambanye.”
Umusi umwe, abavyeyi bazanye abana babo aho Yesu ari kugira ngo abarambikeko ibiganza, abahezagire. Ariko abigishwa barabakankamira.
Yesu abibonye, arababara. Abwira abigishwa biwe ati: “Nimureke abana baze aho ndi, ntimubabuze, kuko Ubwami bw’Imana ari ubw’abameze nk’aba.
Ndababwire ukuri, umuntu wese atakira Ubwami bw’Imana nk’umwana muto ntazokwigera abwinjiramwo.”
Nuko aterura ba bana, abarambikako ibiganza, arabahezagira.
Yesu afashe urugendo rwiwe aja i Yerusalemu, haza umuntu yiruka aja iyo ari, apfukama imbere yiwe, aramubaza ati: “Mwigisha mwiza, nokora iki kugira ngo nze ndagwe ubugingo budashira?”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Unyitira iki mwiza? Nta mwiza ahari, kiretse Imana yonyene.
Urazi ko amabwirizwa avuga ngo: ‘Ntukice, ntugasambane, ntukibe, ntukagirize abandi ibinyoma, ntukanyage abandi ivyabo, wubahe so na nyoko.’ ”
Wa muntu yishura ati: “Ayo yose nayakurikije kuva nkiri muto.”

Yesu aramuraba yumva aramukunze. Aramubwira ati: “Hari ikintu kimwe ugihajije. Genda ugurishe ivyo utunze vyose, maze amahera ukuyemwo uyahe abakene; ni ho uzoronka ubutunzi mw’ijuru, hanyuma uze unkurikire.”
Wa muntu avyumvise aca arijirirwa, agenda ababaye kuko yari afise ubutunzi bwinshi cane.
Yesu arahindukira abwira abigishwa biwe ati: “Biragoye cane ko abatunzi binjira mu Bwami bw’Imana!”
Abigishwa batangazwa n’ayo majambo. Yesu yongera arababwira ati: “Bana nkunda, biragoye cane kwinjira mu Bwami bw’Imana!
Vyokworoha ko ingamiya ica mu gatoboro k’urushinge rubarira kurusha ko umutunzi yinjira mu Bwami bw’Imana.”
Ivyo vyarushirije gutangaza abigishwa, maze baravugana bati: “None ni nde ashobora gukizwa?”
Yesu arabitegereza, hanyuma ababwira ati: “Ku bantu, ntibishoboka. Ariko ku Mana, vyose birashoboka.”
Maze Petero aramubwira ati: “Twebwe twasize vyose turagukurikira!”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Ndababwire ukuri, nta muntu n’umwe yasize inzu, abavukanyi, se canke nyina, abana canke amatongo yiwe kubera Ubutumwa Bwiza,
atazobishumbushwa incuro ijana muri iki gihe: inzu, abavukanyi, abavyeyi, abana n’amatongo, hamwe no guhamwa. Kandi mu gihe kizoza akazoronka ubugingo budashira.
Kandi benshi mu bari imbere bazoba ab’inyuma, abari inyuma na bo babe ab’imbere.”

Bari mu nzira baduga i Yerusalemu, Yesu agendera imbere y’abigishwa biwe kandi bari bahagaritse imitima, ndetse n’abagendana na bo bari bafise ubwoba. Nuko Yesu yihereranya bamwe cumi na babiri, yongera kubabwira ibigiye kumubako.
Arababwira ati: “Ehe tuduze i Yerusalemu, aho Umwana w’Umuntu azotangwa agahabwa abakuru b’abaherezi n’abigisha b’ivyagezwe. Bazomucira urubanza rwo gupfa hanyuma bamushikirize Abanyamahanga,
na bo bazomucokora, bamucireko amate, bamukubite, hanyuma bamwice. Ariko inyuma y’imisi itatu azozuka.”
Yakobo na Yohana, bene Zebedayo, baza aho Yesu ari. Baramubaza bati: “Mwigisha, turakwinginze udukorere ico tugusaba.”
Arababaza ati: “Mushaka ko ndabakorera iki?”
Baramwishura bati: “Niwicara ku ntebe yawe y’ubwami mu bwiza bwawe, uze utwicarike, umwe i buryo bwawe, uwundi i bubamfu bwawe.”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Ntimuzi ico muriko murasaba! Mbega mwoshobora kunywa ku gikombe c’imibabaro ngiye kunywako canke kubatizwa umubatizo w’umubabaro ngiye kubatizwa?”
Baramwishura bati: “Egome twobishobora.” Yesu arababwira ati: “Ni ivy’ukuri muzonywa ku gikombe c’umubabaro ngiye kunywerako kandi muzobatizwa umubatizo w’umubabaro ngiye kubatizwa,
ariko ibijanye no kwicara i buryo canke i bubamfu bwanje si jewe ndabitanga. Ivyo bibanza ni ivy’ababiteguriwe.”
Bamwe cumi bandi bavyumvise bashavurira Yakobo na Yohana.
Yesu aca arabahamagara bose ababwira ati: “Murazi ko abatware b’Abanyamahanga babatwaza umukazo, kandi ko ababaganza babacinyiza.
Uko si ko bikwiye kumera muri mwebwe. Uwushaka kuba umukuru muri mwebwe ategerezwa kuba umukozi wanyu,
kandi uwushaka kuba uwa mbere ategerezwa kuba umugurano wa bose.
Kuko n’Umwana w’Umuntu ntiyazanywe no gukorerwa, ahubwo yazanywe no gukorera abandi no gutanga ubuzima bwiwe ngo bube incungu ya benshi.”
Nuko Yesu n’abigishwa biwe bashika i Yeriko, hanyuma bava muri ico gisagara bari kumwe n’isinzi ry’abantu. I ruhande y’inzira hari impumyi yitwa Barutimayo, mwene Timayo, yari yicaye asegerereza.
Yumvise ko ari Yesu w’i Nazareti ariko ararengana, atangura gusemerera ati: “Yesu, Mwana wa Dawidi, ngirira imbabazi!”
Abantu benshi baramuzibiza bati: “Hora!” Ariko arushiriza gusemerera ati: “Mwana wa Dawidi, ngirira imbabazi!”
Yesu aca arahagarara, avuga ati: “Nimumumpamagarire.” Nuko bahamagara ya mpumyi bati: “Humura! Haguruka, araguhamagaye!”
Ya mpunyi ita impuzu zayo, irabaduka ija aho Yesu ari.
Yesu arayibaza ati: “Ushaka ko ngukorera iki?” Na yo iti: “Mwigisha, ndashaka guhumuka.”
Yesu aravuga ati: “Igire, ukwizera kwawe kuragukijije.” Ubwo nyene aca arahumuka, akurikira Yesu.
Bariko baregereza i Yerusalemu, Yesu n’abigishwa biwe bashika ahitwa Betifage n’i Betaniya ku Musozi wa Elayono. Yesu atuma babiri mu bigishwa biwe,
arababwira ati: “Nimugende muri iriya mihana iri imbere yanyu; nimwahashika, murahasanga inyana y’indogoba iziritse ata muntu n’umwe arayigenderako. Muce muyizitura muyizane hano.
Nihagira uwubabaza ati: ‘Ivyo mukora ni ibiki?’ Mumwishure muti: ‘Umwami arayikeneye’ kandi aca ayibasubiza adatevye.”
Nuko baragenda basanga inyana y’indogoba ihagaze mu nzira, iziritse imbere y’irembo. Bariko barayizitura,
bamwe mu bantu bari bahagaze aho barababaza bati: “Ivyo mukora ni ibiki? Kuki muzitura iyo nyana y’indogoba?”
Na bo babishura nk’uko Yesu yababwiye, maze barabareka barayijana.
Nuko baca bayizanira Yesu, bayisasako impuzu zabo, na we ayicarako.
Maze abantu benshi basasa impuzu zabo mu nzira, abandi na bo basasa amashami y’ibiti baciye ku misozi.
Abari imbere ya Yesu n’abari inyuma yiwe bagenda barasemerera bavuga bati: “Hozana!” “Hahezagirwe uwuje mw’izina ry’Uhoraho!”
“Hahezagirwe ubwami bwa sogokuruza Dawidi buje!” “Hozana hejuru mw’ijuru!”
Nuko Yesu ashitse mu gisagara i Yerusalemu, aja mu rusengero. Amaze kwihweza ivyari aho, aca arasohoka asubirana i Betaniya na bamwe cumi na babiri, kuko bwari bwije.
Ku musi ukurikira, bariko baragenda bava i Betaniya, Yesu yumva arashonje.
Akiri kure abona igiti c’umusukoni gitotahaye, aca aja kuraba ko hari ivyamwa gifise. Agishikiriye ntiyagira icamwa agisangako, atari amababi kuko kitari igihe caco co kwama.
Maze aca abwira ico giti ati: “Ntugasubire kwama na rimwe!” Ivyo yabivuze abigishwa biwe bumva.
Yesu ashitse i Yerusalemu, yinjira mu rusengero atangura kwirukana abadandaza n’abariko baragura. Ahenagura imeza z’abavunja amahera hamwe n’intebe z’abadandaza inuma,
ntiyemerera umuntu n’umwe kwinjiza ibidandazwa mu rusengero.
Nuko aca arabigisha ati: “Mbega Ivyanditswe ntibivuga ngo: ‘Inzu yanje izoba iyo gusengerwamwo n’amahanga yose’? Ariko mweho mwayihinduye ‘ubwihisho bw’ibisuma.’ ”
Abakuru b’abaherezi n’abigisha b’ivyanditswe bavyumvise baca batangura kurondera ingene bomwica. Ariko baramutinya kuko abantu bakunda cane inyigisho ziwe.
Bugorovye, Yesu n’abigishwa biwe barasohoka bava mu gisagara.
Bukeye mu gitondo, bariko baragenda, babona ca giti c’umusukoni Yesu yavuma cumye kuva mu mizi.
Petero aca aravyibuka maze abwira Yesu ati: “Mwigisha, ehe ca giti wavuma cumye!”
Yesu aca ababwira ati: “Mukomere mu kwizera Imana.
Ndababwire ukuri, umuntu yobwira uwu musozi ati: ‘Shinguka, witerere mu kiyaga,’ avyizeye adakekeranya mu mutima wiwe ariko yizeye ko ivyo avuze biba, vyogenda nk’uko yabisavye.
Ni co gituma ndababwira ko ico muzosaba cose mu gusenga, mukwiye kwizera ko mwamaze kukironka, kandi Imana izokibaha.
Ariko imbere y’uko mutangura gusenga, mubanze mubabarire umuntu wese yabacumuyeko, kugira ngo So wo mw’ijuru na we abaharire ivyaha vyanyu. [
Ariko nimutaharira abandi, na So wo mw’ijuru ntazobaharira ivyaha mwakoze. ] ”
Nuko Yesu n’abigishwa biwe basubira i Yerusalemu. Yesu ariko aragendagenda mu rusengero, abakuru b’abaherezi, abigisha b’ivyagezwe, n’abakuru b’Abayuda baza aho ari,
baramubaza bati: “Ni ubuhe bubasha butuma ukora ivyo? Ni nde yabuguhaye?”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Ndababwira aho ububasha butuma nkora ibi buva, nimwishura ikibazo kimwe ngira ndababaze.
Mbega umubatizo wa Yohana wavuye ku Mana yo mw’ijuru canke ku bantu? Nimunyishure.”
Baravugana hagati yabo bati: “Nitwavuga tuti: ‘Wavuye mw’ijuru,’ ahava atubaza ati: ‘None ni kuki mutizeye ivyo Yohana yavuze?’
Kandi ntitwovuga tuti: ‘Wavuye ku bantu.’ ” (Kuko baratinya isinzi ry’abantu bari aho, kuko abantu bose baremera ko Yohana yari uwuvugishwa n’Imana.)
Ni ko kwishura Yesu bati: “Ntituzi uwabumuhaye.” Na we aca ababwira ati: “Nanje sindababwira aho ububasha butuma nkora ibi buva.”

Nuko Yesu atangura kubigisha akoresheje imigani. Arababwira ati: “Umuntu yateye imizabibu mw’itongo ryiwe, ararizitirira, yimba ikinogo co kuganiramwo imizabibu, yubaka n’umunara wo gucungererako urwo ruzabibu. Hanyuma azeza uwo murima abarimyi, afata urugendo rwa kure.
Iyimbura rigeze, atuma umukozi wiwe kuri ba barimyi gutora igice c’umwimbu kimwegukira.
Ba barimyi bafata uwo mukozi, baramukubita, bamurungika iminwe misa.
Yongera arungika uwundi mukozi, na we baramucokora, bongera bamukubita mu mutwe.
Hanyuma arungika uwundi mukozi, uwo we baca baramwica. Yarungitse abakozi benshi, bamwe barabakubita, abandi barabica.
Umuhungu wiwe akunda cane ni we yari asigaranye yashobora gutuma. Nuko amurungika ubwa nyuma yibwira ati: ‘Umuhungu wanje we bazomusonera.’
Ariko ba barimyi bamubonye baravugana bati: ‘Uwu ni we azoba samuragwa. Reka tumwice kugira ngo twegukire ivyo yorazwe.’
Nuko baca baramufata, baramwica, bamukwegera inyuma y’umurima w’uruzabibu.
None mwibaza ko nyene uruzabibu niyaza azobagira gute? Azoza yice abo barimyi, maze urwo ruzabibu aruzeze abandi.
Mbega ntimurasoma aya majambo yo mu Vyanditswe avuga ngo: ‘Ibuye abubatsi bagaye, ni ryo ryahindutse irigumya imfuruka.
Ibi Uhoraho ni we yabikoze, kandi ni igitangaza mu maso yacu.’ ”

Nuko abakuru b’abaherezi, abigisha b’ivyagezwe n’abakuru b’ubwo bwoko barondera ingene bomufata kuko bari batahuye ko ari bo yariko aravuga muri uwo mugani. Ariko barabitinya kubera abantu, baca bamusiga aho baragenda.
Mu nyuma abakuru b’idini barungika bamwe mu Bafarisayo bari kumwe n’abashigikiye Herode Antipa kugira ngo batege umutego Yesu, bamufatire ku majambo avuga.

Baza aho ari baramubaza bati: “Mwigisha, turazi ko uri umuntu w’imvugakuri. Wewe ntutinya igitsure c’abantu, kuko ntuterwa ubwoba n’igihagararo cabo, ahubwo wigisha inzira ihimbara Imana mu kuri kwose. None tubwire: Biremewe gutanga ikori turiha Kayisari canke ntivyemewe?
Dukwiye kuritanga canke ntidukwiye kuritanga?” Ariko kuko Yesu yari azi uburyarya bwabo, arabishura ati: “Ni kuki muriko mugerageza kuntega umutego? Nzanira igiceri c’idenariyo ico ndaba.”
Nuko bamuzanira ca giceri. Arababaza ati: “Mbega iyi shusho n’ibi vyandiko biriko ni ivya nde?” Na bo bati: “Ni ivya Kayisari.”
Na we asubizayo ati: “Ivya Kayisari nimubihe Kayisari, ivy’Imana mubihe Imana.” Maze iyo nyishu irabatangaza cane.
Hanyuma Abasadukayo, basanzwe bavuga ko abapfuye batazozuka, baza aho ari baramubaza bati:
“Mwigisha, Mose yaduhaye ivyagezwe bivuga ko iyo umuntu apfuye, agasiga umugore atagira abana, uwo bavukana ategerezwa kurongora uwo mupfakazi kugira ngo aronkere uruvyaro uwo yapfuye.
Rero, harigeze kuba abavukana indwi. Mukuru muri bo ararongora, ariko apfa atavyaye.
Hanyuma uwa kabiri arongora wa mupfakazi, ariko na we nyene apfa atavyaye. Umuhungu wa gatatu na we nyene bimugendera gutyo.
Bibandanya uko, ku buryo ata muhungu n’umwe yamusigaranye abana. Maze mu nyuma wa mugore na we arapfa.
None ku musi w’izuka ry’abapfuye, uwo mugore azoba uwa nde, ko yabaye umugore w’abo indwi bose?”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Mwarazimiye kuko mudatahura ico Ivyanditswe Vyera bivuga, ntimumenye n’ubushobozi bw’Imana.
Aho abapfuye bazozukira, abantu ntibazorongora canke ngo barongorwe; kuko bazoba bameze nk’abamarayika bo mw’ijuru.
Ku bijanye n’izuka ry’abapfuye, mbega Nta ho murasoma mu gitabu ca Mose, aho yandika ivy’igisaka caka kitarurumba? Handitswe ko Imana yamubwiye iti: ‘Ndi Imana ya Aburahamu, ya Isaka, n’iya Yakobo.’
Si Imana y’abapfuye, ariko ni Imana y’abazima. Ni co gituma nababwiye ko mwazimiye cane!”
Umwe mu bigisha b’ivyagezwe yari ahagaze ngaho yumviriza ingene bavugana; yumvise ko Yesu yishuye neza abasadukayo, aramubaza ati: “Ni irihe bwirizwa riruta ayandi yose?”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Ibwirizwa riruta ayandi yose ni iri: ‘Umviriza yewe Isirayeli! Uhoraho Imana yawe, ni yo Mana imwe rudende.
Ukundishe Uhoraho Imana yawe umutima wawe wose, umushaha wawe wose, ubwenge bwawe bwose n’inkomezi zawe zose.’
Irya kabiri ni iri: ‘Ukunde mugenzawe nk’uko wikunda wewe nyene.’ Nta bwirizwa ryoza riruta ayo.”
Wa mwigisha w’ivyagezwe arishura ati: “Mwigisha, wishuye neza cane! Ivyo uvuze ni ukuri; ko Imana ari imwe kandi ko ata yindi iriho kiretse yo yonyene;

kandi ko dukwiye kuyikundisha imitima yacu yose, ubwenge bwacu bwose; n’inkomezi zacu zose, kandi tugakunda bagenzi bacu nk’uko twikunda. Ivyo birahambaye kurusha gushikanira Imana ayandi mashikanwa yose n’ibimazi vy’ibikoko.”
Yesu abonye ko yishuranye ubwenge, aramubwira ati: “Nturi kure y’Ubwami bw’Imana.” Inyuma y’ivyo nta muntu yasubiye kwubahuka kumubaza ibibazo.
Hanyuma, Yesu ariko arigisha mu rusengero, abaza ati: “Mbe ni kuki abigisha b’ivyanditswe bavuga ko Kristo ari umwana wa Dawidi?
Dawidi ubwiwe, aho yavugishwa na Mpwemu Yera, yavuze ati: ‘Uhoraho yabwiye Umwami wanje ati: Icara i buryo bwanje, kugeza abansi bawe bose, ndabashize musi y’ibirenge vyawe.’
None ko Dawidi ubwiwe amwita Umwami, yoba umwana wiwe gute?” Abantu benshi bari ngaho bamwumviriza buzuye umunezero.
Akiriko arigisha, Yesu avuga ati: “Mwirinde abigisha b’ivyagezwe. Bakunda kugendagenda bambaye amakanzu maremare y’icubahiro, no kuramutswa mu cubahiro mu makoraniro y’abantu.
Bakunda kandi guhabwa ivyicaro vy’icubahiro mu masinagogi no mu misi mikuru.
Barya amazu y’abapfakazi bakabatwara ivyabo, kandi bakabandanya biyerekana nk’abantu beza mu gusenga amasengesho maremare. Ni co gituma bazohanwa kurusha abandi.”
Nuko Yesu yicara hafi y’ico batorezamwo amashikanwa mu rusengero, araba ingene abantu bashiramwo amafaranga y’ishikanwa. Benshi mu batunzi batanga menshi.
Ariko umupfakazi umwe araza ashiramwo ibiceri bibiri vy’agaciro gato cane.
Nuko Yesu ahamagara abigishwa biwe arababwira ati: “Ndababwire ukuri, uwu mupfakazi w’umukene atanze ishikanwa rinini kurusha abandi bose.
Bose batanze ku musesekara w’ubutunzi bwabo; ariko we, mu bukene bwiwe, atanze ivyomubeshejeho vyose.”
Yesu ariko arasohoka ava mu rusengero, umwe mu bigishwa biwe aramubwira ati: “Mwigisha, ehe raba ingene izi nyubakwa n’amabuye azubatse biteye igomwe!”
Yesu arishura ati: “Murabona izi nyubakwa zihambaye? Nta buye na rimwe rizosigara rigeretse ku rindi; yose azosamburirwa hasi.”
Hanyuma Yesu yicaye ku Musozi wa Elayono aharabana n’urusengero, Petero, Yakobo, Yohana na Andereya baramubaza biherereye bati:
“Tubwire, ivyo bizoshika ryari, kandi ni ikihe kimenyetso kizokwerekana ko bigiye gushika?”
Yesu atangura kubabwira ati: “Mwiyubare ntihagire umuntu abazimiza,
kuko benshi bazoza mw’izina ryanje, bavuga bati: ‘Ni jewe Kristo!’ kandi bazozimiza benshi.
Nimwumva intambara n’inkuru zivuga ivy’intambara hirya no hino, ntimuze muhagarike imitima. Ivyo bitegerezwa gushika, ariko iherezo rya vyose ntirizoba rirashika.
Ihanga rizotera irindi hanga, ubwami butere ubundi bwami. Ahantu henshi kw’isi hazoba nyamugigima n’amapfa. Ariko ivyo bizoba ari nk’intango y’ibise.
Mube maso! Bazobafata babajane imbere y’ubucamanza, kandi bazobakubitira mu masinagogi. Muzohagarara imbere y’abatware n’abami muzira kuba abigishwa banje, kugira ngo mushingire intahe imbere yabo.
Kuko Ubutumwa Bwiza butegerezwa kubanza kuvugwa mu mahanga yose.
Nibabafata bakabashengeza, ntimuze muhagarikwe imitima n’ivyo muzovuga. Muze muvuge ico muzohabwa ako kanya, kuko mutazovuga ivyo mwigeneye, ariko muzovuga ivyo muhawe na Mpwemu Yera.
Umuntu azotanga uwo bavukana ngo bamwice, n’umuvyeyi agirire umwana wiwe uko. Abana bazogarariza abavyeyi babo banabicishe.
Abantu bose bazobanka babahora izina ryanje. Ariko uwuzokwihangana gushitsa kw’iherezo azokira.
Nimwabona ca ‘kizira gihumanya’ gihagaze aho kidakwiye guhagarara (uwusoma niyiyubare), abazoba bari i Yudaya baze bahungire ku misozi.
Uwuzoba ari hejuru ku nzu, ntazosubire mu nzu kurondera ivyo ahungana.
Uwuzoba ari mu murima ntaze asubire i muhira gutora umutamana.
Mbega ukuntu iyo minsi izoba ari iy’umubabaro utagira ingene wovugwa ku bagore bibungenze n’abazoba bonsa!
Musenge kugira ngo ntibize bishike mu gihe c’imbeho nyinshi cane,
azoba ari imisi y’umubabaro n’agahinda bitigeze kubaho kuva Imana irema isi kugeza ubu, kandi bitazosubira kubaho.
Iyo Umwami Imana atagabanya iyo misi, nta muntu n’umwe yorokotse. Ariko kubera abatoranijwe, iyo misi yarayigabanije.
Muri ico gihe nihagira umuntu ababwira ati: ‘Ehe Kristo ari hano!’ canke ngo, ‘Ehe ng’uriya!’ ntimuze muvyemere.
Kuko abiyita Kristo n’abavugishwa b’ibinyoma bazoza ari benshi, bakore ibimenyetso n’ibitangaza kugira ngo bishobotse bazimize n’abatoranijwe.
Nuko mube maso, kuko ndabibabwiye imbere y’uko bishika.
Muri iyo misi, inyuma y’ayo makuba, ‘izuba rizocura umwijima, n’ukwezi ntikuzosubira kubonesha,
inyenyeri zizokoragurika ziva kw’ijuru, kandi n’ivy’inkomezi biri mu kirere bizonyiganyizwa.’
Ni ho abantu bazobona Umwana w’Umuntu aserutse mu bicu afise ubushobozi n’ubwiza bihambaye.
Azotuma abamarayika biwe bakoranye abatoranijwe na we babakuye ku mpera zine z’isi, kuva aho itangurira gushika aho amajuru aherera.
Nimwigire ku giti c’umusukoni: iyo amashami yaco atanguye kworoha, amababi agatangura gututuza, muca mumenya ko agatasi kari hafi.
Nimwabona ivyo vyose, muzoce mumenya neza ko ukugaruka kwiwe kuri hafi, ko ageze kw’irembo.
Ndababwire ukuri, abo muri runo runganwe ntibazopfa bose ivyo vyose bitarashika.
Ijuru n’isi bizokurwaho, ariko amajambo yanje ntazokwigera akurwaho.
Ariko ku bijanye n’umusi canke isaha, baba abamarayika bo mw’ijuru, canke Umwana ubwiwe, nta n’umwe abizi uretse Data wenyene.
Nuko rero mwame mugavye, muterame, kuko mutazi aho ico gihe kizoshikira.
Ukuza kw’Umwana w’Umuntu kugereranywa n’urugendo umuntu yateguye. Agira ave i muhira, yabwiye abakozi biwe bose ivyo bategerezwa gusigara barakora, hanyuma abwira umuteramyi kuba maso.
None rero mube maso kuko mutazi igihe nyene inzu azogarukirako; hashobora kuba ku mugoroba, mu gicugu, mw’ijoro rishira ubuca canke kare mu gitondo.
Niyaza giturumbuka, ntaze asange musinziriye.
Ibi ndabibwiye mwebwe, ndabibwira n’abandi bose: ‘Nimube maso!’ ”

Ico gihe hari hasigaye imisi ibiri ngo Umusi Mukuru wa Pasika n’Umusi Mukuru w’Imikate Itarimwo Umwambiro ishike. Kandi abakuru b’abaherezi n’abigisha b’ivyagezwe bariko barondera akaryo ko gufata Yesu mu kinyegero kugira ngo bamwice.
Barumvikana bati: “Ntidukwiye kumufata mu gihe c’imisi mikuru kuko abantu bohava bagumuka.”

Ico gihe Yesu yari i Betaniya mu nzu kwa Simoni, yahoze ari umunyamibembe. Ariko arafungura, haza umugore afise icupa ryiza ririmwo amavuta amota cane kandi y’igiciro kinini ahinguwe mu giti bita narada. Nuko yugurura rya cupa, asuka ya mavuta ku mutwe wa Yesu.
Bamwe mu bari aho bongorerana bababaye bati: “Ni kuki yononye ayo mavuta?
Iyo agurishwa yari kuvamwo idenariyo zirenga amajana atatu, maze ayo mafaranga agafasha aboro.” Banegura cane ivyo uwo mugore akoze.
Yesu arababwira ati: “Mbega uwu mugore mumugorera iki? Ankoreye ikintu ciza.
Aboro muzokwamana, kandi murashobora kubafasha igihe cose mubishakiye. Ariko jewe ntimuzonyamana.
Akoze ivyo ashoboye. Asutse aya mavuta ku mubiri wanje imbere y’igihe, kugira ngo awutegurire guhambwa.
Ndababwire ukuri, kw’isi yose aho ubu Butumwa Bwiza buzovugwa, ibi akoze bizovugwa, bitume yama yibukwa.”
Hanyuma, Yuda Isikariyote, umwe muri ba bigishwa cumi na babiri, aragenda aja kuvugana n’abakuru b’abaherezi ingene yobashikiriza Yesu.
Maze vyo birabanezereza cane baca bamwemerera amahera; na we aca atangura kurondera akaryo keza ko kumubashikiriza.

Ku musi wa mbere w’imisi mikuru y’Imikate itarimwo umwambiro, hari umugenzo wo gutanga ikimazi c’umwagazi w’intama wa Pasika. Nuko abigishwa babaza Yesu bati: “Ni hehe ugomba ko tugutegurira ivyokurya vya Pasika?”
Nuko arungika bibiri mu bigishwa biwe, arababwira ati: “Nimugende mu gisagara, mu nzira muraja guhura n’umuntu yikoreye umubindi w’amazi, muce mumukurikira.
Ashitse aho agiye, mubwire nyene urugo ko Umwigisha ashaka kumenya ahari icumba c’abashitsi aja gusangiriramwo ivya Pasika n’abigishwa biwe.
Nawe araja kubereka icumba kinini co hejuru, kirimwo ibikenewe vyose. Aho abe ariho mudutegurira ivya Pasika.”
Nuko ba bigishwa baragenda, baja mu gisagara basanga ibintu bimeze nk’uko Yesu yabibabwiye, baca bategura ivyokurya vya Pasika.
Hageze ku mugoroba, Yesu aca arashika ari kumwe n’abigishwa biwe cumi na babiri.
Bariko barafungura, Yesu aravuga ati: “Ndababwire ukuri, umwe muri mwebwe turiko turasangira ahava angurisha.”
Abigishwa baca barababara, umwe wese aramubaza ati: “Yoba ari jewe?”
Arabishura ati: “Ni umwe muri mwebwe cumi na babiri, uwo twahurije ukuboko mw’isahani.
Umwana w’Umuntu agiye gupfa nk’uko Ivyanditswe bivuga. Ariko aragowe uwo muntu amugurishije! Vyari kumubera vyiza iyo atavuka!”
Bariko barafungura, Yesu afata umukate, awushimira Imana, arawumanyura, awuha abigishwa biwe, avuga ati: “Nimwakire murye, uwu ni umubiri wanje.”
Yongera afata igikombe, ahejeje kugishimira Imana, agiha abigishwa biwe, maze bose bakinywako.
Arababwira ati: “Aya ni amaraso yanje y’isezerano hagati y’Imana n’abantu bayo, asesetse ku bwa benshi.
Ndababwire ukuri, sinzosubira kunywa ku muvinyu w’imizabibu gushitsa kuri wa musi aho nzosubira kuwunywa ari mushasha mu Bwami bw’Imana.”
Bahejeje kuririmba barasohoka baja ku Musozi wa Elayono.
Yesu arababwira ati: “Mwese muhava muhunga, munte jenyene. Kuko Ivyanditswe bivuga ngo: ‘Nzokubita umwungere, intama zisanzare.’
Ariko maze kuzuka, nzobatanga kuja i Galilaya ndabarindirireyo.”
Petero aramubwira ati: “Naho bose boguta bagahunga, jewe sinzoguta.”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Ndakubwire ukuri, iri joro nyene, imbere yuko isake ibika kabiri, uzoba umaze kunyihakana gatatu kose.”
Ariko Petero abisubiramwo ashimitse ati: “Sinshobora kukwihakana ngo sindakuzi naho vyonsaba gupfana na we.” N’abandi bigishwa bavuga amajambo nk’ayo.
Nuko baja ahantu hitwa Getsemane, maze Yesu abwira abigishwa biwe ati: “Nimube muricaye ngaha nanje nje gusenga.”
Nuko ajana na Petero, na Yakobo na Yohana maze atangura kugira agahinda kenshi cane no guhagarika umutima.
Arababwira ati: “Umutima wanje wuzuye agahinda gashobora kunyica. Nimube muragumye ngaha mubane maso nanje.”
Nuko yigira imbere, yubama hasi arasenga asaba ngo iyo saha imurengane.
Aravuga ati: “Aba, Data, wewe vyose biragushobokera. Ndakwinginze unkure imbere iki gikombe c’imibabaro. Ariko ntibibe nk’uko jewe nshaka, yamara bibe uko wewe ushaka.”
Nuko agaruka aho abigishwa biwe bari asanga barasinziriye. Abaza Petero ati: “Simoni, urasinziriye? Ntiwashoboye kubana maso nanje n’isaha n’imwe?
Nimube maso musenge kugira ngo ntimutsindwe n’amageragezwa. Umutima urabikunze, ariko umubiri ufise intege nke.”
Asubira kwigira imbere, asenga asubiramwo ya majambo nyene.
Agarutse, asanga basubiriye gusinzira, kuko amaso yabo yari aremerewe cane n’itiro, maze babura ico bamubwira.
Agarutse aho bari ubugira gatatu, arababaza ati: “Mbega n’ubu muracasinziriye, muriruhukiye? Ehe, isaha irageze, Umwana w’Umuntu agira atangwe mu maboko y’abanyavyaha.
Nimuvyuke tugende kuko uwangurishije arashitse.”

Yesu akiriko aravuga, Yuda Isikariyote, umwe muri ba bigishwa cumi na babiri arashika. Inyuma yiwe hari isinzi ry’abantu bitwaje inkota n’amahiri, barungitswe n’abakuru b’abaherezi n’abigisha b’ivyagezwe n’abatware.
Yuda, uwari yamugurishije yari yabahaye ikimenyetso, ababwira ati: “Uwo nja gusoma azoba ari we. Muce mumufata mumujane, kandi mumugumye cane!”
Babashikiriye, Yuda agenda atumbereye Yesu, avuga ati: “Rabi!” Aca aramusoma.
Nuko ba bantu bashorera amaboko kuri Yesu baramufata.
Umwe mu bari hafi ya Yesu asokora inkota yiwe ayikubita umukozi w’umuherezi mukuru, amuca ugutwi.
Yesu aravuga ati: “Mbega mbaye umugumutsi, aho muza kumfata mwitwaje amahiri?
Imisi yose namana namwe mu rusengero nigisha, ariko ntimwigeze mumfata. Ariko ibi bibaye kugira ngo Ivyanditswe bishike.”
Nuko bose baramuta barahunga.
Ariko umusore umwe agerageza gukurikira Yesu yambaye umutamana wonyene, na we nyene baza kumufata,
aca abatana wa mutamana ahunga ari gusa.
Nuko bafata Yesu bamujana mu rugo rw’umuherezi mukuru, ahari hakoraniye abakuru b’abaherezi, abatware, n’abigisha b’ivyagezwe.
Petero aguma amukurikira agendera kure inyuma, maze ashika mu rugo rw’umuherezi mukuru, aca yicarana n’abarinzi b’urugo, yota umuriro.
Abakuru b’abaherezi n’abagize inama nkuru y’idini ry’Abayuda, bagerageza kurondera ibirego vyotuma Yesu acirwa urubanza rwo gupfa, ariko ntibaronka na kimwe.
Bamwe mu bamwagiriza bagerageza kumubeshera, ariko ntibahuza ku vyo bamurega.
Nuko bamwe barahaguruka bamwagiriza ibinyoma bati:
“Twamwumvise avuga ati: ‘Nzosambura uru rusengero rwubatswe n’abantu, hanyuma mu misi itatu nubake urundi, rutubatswe n’abantu.’ ”
Ariko n’ivyo birego na vyo ntibabihurizako.
Hanyuma umuherezi mukuru aca arahaguruka imbere ya bose, abaza Yesu ati: “None wewe nta co wireguza? Ibi birego bakwagiriza ubivugako iki?”
Ariko Yesu arihorera ntiyagira ico amwishura. Wa muherezi mukuru arongera aramubaza ati: “Uri Kristo, Umwana w’imwe ihezagiwe?”
Yesu arishura ati: “Ndi we! Kandi muzobona Umwana w’Umuntu yicaye mu kibanza c’icubahiro i buryo bw’Imana y’ububasha, kandi aza ari ku bicu vyo kw’ijuru.”
Wa muherezi mukuru yitaburirako impuzu ziwe, avuga ati: “None hari ibindi vyabona dukeneye?
Ubu naho ntimwiyumviye ingene atutse Imana? Nimugire ico mubivuzeko.” Bose baca bamucira urubanza ko akwiye gupfa!
Bamwe batangura kumucirako; bamupfunga amaso, bamukubita ibipfunsi, bavuga bati: “Vugishwa, utubwire uwugukubise!” Hanyuma ba barinzi baca baramujana, bamukubita amakofe.
Petero akiri hasi mu rugo, umwe mu bakobwa bakorera umuherezi mukuru aza aho ari.
Abonye Petero ariko arota, aramwihweza cane. Maze amubwira ati: “Na wewe wari kumwe na Yesu Umunyanazareti.”
Ariko Petero arabihakana ati: “Sinzi kandi sintahura ivyo uriko uravuga!” Nuko aca ava mu rugo aja kw’irembo.
Wa mukobwa abonye ko Petero ahagaze kw’irembo, aca abwira abari ngaho ati: “Uwu mugabo ni umwe mu bigishwa biwe!”
Petero yongera kubihakana. Haheze akanya, abari bahagaze hafi ya Petero baramubwira bati: “Ni ivy’ukuri uri umwe muri bo, kuko uva i Galilaya.”
Petero atangura kurahira yisiba ati: “Ndabarahiye, uwo mugabo sindamuzi.”

Uwo mwanya nyene isake ica ibika ubugira kabiri. Nuko Petero na we aca aribuka ijambo Yesu yari yamubwiye ati: “Isake itarabika kabiri, uzoba umaze kunyihakana gatatu kose, uvuga ko utanzi.” Maze aca araturikisha ararira.
Kare mu gitondo, abakuru b’abaherezi hamwe n’abatware, n’abigisha b’ivyagezwe, ari bo bari bagize inama nkuru y’idini ry’Abayuda barakorana, bagira inama. Nuko baboha Yesu, bamujana kwa Pilato.
Pilato aramubaza ati: “Woba uri umwami w’Abayuda?” Yesu aramwishura ati: “Uvuze ukuri, ndi we.”
Maze abakuru b’abaherezi bamurega ibirego vyinshi.
Pilato aramubaza ati: “Mbega nta co wishura? Mbega ntiwumva ivyo bakurega?”
Ariko Yesu ntiyagira ico yishura, bituma Pilato atangara.
Igihe cose mu misi mikuru ya Pasika, hari umugenzo wo kurekura imbohe abantu bisabiye.
Hariho umugabo yitwa Baraba yari mw’ibohero kuko we na bagenziwe bagirizwa ubwicanyi mu migumuko.
Nuko abantu baraza basaba Pilato kubarekurira imbohe nk’uko yari asanzwe abikora.
Pilato arababaza ati: “Mushaka ko ndabarekurira Umwami w’Abayuda?”
Yari azi neza ko abakuru b’abaherezi bamuzaniye Yesu kubera ishari.
Abakuru b’abaherezi batangura kugumura abantu ngo basabe Pilato abarekurire Baraba mu kibanza ca Yesu.
Pilato arababaza ati: “None uwo mwita umwami w’Abayuda ndamugire nte?”
Barasemerera bati: “Nabambwe!”
Pilato arababaza ati: “Kubera iki? Ni ikihe caha yakoze?” Ahubwo barushiriza gusemerera bati: “Nabambwe!”
Mu ntumbero yo kunezereza abantu benshi bari aho, Pilato arekura Baraba. Atanga itegeko ko bashishagura Yesu, hanyuma aramutanga kugira ngo bamubambe.
Nuko abasoda bajana Yesu mu rugo rw’imbere (ni ukuvuga aho umutware w’Umuroma yakorera), bahamagara abandi basoda bagize umugwi wabo,
bamwambika ikanzu itukura, bajisha urugori rw’amahwa, barumwambika ku mutwe.
Nuko batangura kumucokora bati: “Turagize bwakeye, Mwami w’Abayuda!”
Bamukubita kenshi irenga ku mutwe, bamucirako amate. Bapfukama imbere yiwe bamushinyagurira ngo baramwubashe.
Bahejeje kumushinyagurira, bamwambura ya kanzu itukura basubira kumwambika impuzu ziwe, hanyuma bamujana kumubamba.
Bakiri mu nzira bagenda, bahura n’umugabo yitwa Simoni yari avuye mu mirima, bamutegeka gutwaza umusaraba Yesu. Simoni yava i Kurene kandi yari se wa Alegizandere na Rufu.
Nuko bashikana Yesu ahantu hitwa Gologota (bisigura ngo Ahantu h’Agahanga).
Bagerageza kumuha umuvinyu w’inkarisha, ariko Yesu yanka kuyinywa.
Nuko baramubamba, bagabura impuzu ziwe bakoresheje ubupfindo kugira ngo barabe iyo umwumwe wese yegukira.
Igihe bamubamba hari nk’isaha zitatu z’igitondo.
Icandiko c’ibirego vyatumye abambwa cavuga ngo: umwami w’abayuda.
Ba basoda bongera babamba ibisuma bibiri i ruhande ya Yesu, kimwe i buryo, ikindi i bubamfu bwiwe. [
Uko ni ko Ivyanditswe vyashitse kuko vyavuga ngo: “Yaharuwe mu gitigiri c’inkozi z’ikibi.”]
Abarengana bagenda baramutuka bamuzunguriza imitwe, bakamubwira bati: “Wewe wavuze ngo wosambura urusengero ukarwubaka mu misi itatu!
Ikize rero, wikure kuri uwo musaraba!”
N’abakuru b’abaherezi n’abigisha b’ivyagezwe na bo bakamucokora, bavuga bati: “Yakijije abandi, ariko we ntashobora kwikiza!
Kristo, Umwami w’Abisirayeli niyikure ku musaraba kugira ngo tubibone hanyuma tumwizere.” Na vya bisuma vyari bibambanywe na we na vyo biramutuka.
Kuva isaha zitandatu z’umurango, igihugu cose gitwikirwa n’umwijima gushika isaha y’icenda.
Isaha y’icenda ishitse, Yesu arasemerera n’ijwi rirenga ati: “Eloyi, Eloyi, lema sabakitani?” (bisobanurwa ngo: “Mana yanje, Mana yanje, ni kuki wampevye?”)
Bamwe mu bari bahagaze aho baravuga bati: “Mwumvise? Ariko ahamagara Eliya!”
Umwe ariruka afata ipampa arijobeka mu nkarisha, arishira kw’irenga, aca arariduza ku munwa wa Yesu kugira ngo amunyweshe, aravuga ati: “Reka turabe ko Eliya aza kumwururutsa amukure ku musaraba.”
Nuko Yesu araboroga, aca aracikana.
Igitambara co mu rusengero gica gitabukamwo kubiri kuva hejuru gushika hasi.
Umusoda mukuru w’Umuroma yari ahagaze imbere ya Yesu, abonye ingene apfuye, aravuga ati: “Ni ivy’ukuri uwu yari Umwana w’Imana!”
Ico gihe hariho abagore bariko barabikurikirana bari kure. Muri bo harimwo Mariya Magadalena, Mariya nyina wa Yakobo mutoya na Yose, hamwe na Salome.
Abo bagore bagendana na Yesu igihe yari i Galilaya bakamushigikira. Kandi benshi mu bagore bari bazananye na we i Yerusalemu bari aho.
Uwo musi wari uwo kwitegurira Isabato, ni ukuvuga buca haba Isabato. Nuko hageze ku mugoroba,
Yosefu w’i Arimataya ararinda, aja kwa Pilato amusaba ikiziga ca Yesu. Uwo Yosefu yari umwubahwa mu bagize inama nkuru y’ubwoko bw’Abayuda kandi yari yiteze ukuza kw’Ubwami bw’Imana.
Pilato aca aratangara yumvise ko Yesu yamaze gucikana. Nuko ahamagara wa musoda mukuru w’Umuroma amubaza ko Yesu yamaze gucikana.
Na we amubwira ko ari vyo. Pilato aca aha uruhusha Yosefu rwo gutora ikiziga ca Yesu.

Maze Yosefu aca agura igitambara cera, akura ikiziga ca Yesu ku musaraba, akizingira muri ico gitambara cera, aca agishira mu mva yimbwe mu gitandara; aca atembagariza ikibuye kinini ku bwinjiriro bwa ya mva arayugara.
Kandi ico gihe Mariya Magadalena na Mariya nyina wa Yose bariko bararaba aho bashize ikiziga ca Yesu.
Isabato iheze, Mariya Magadalena, Mariya nyina wa Yakobo na Salome baja kugura amavuta amota neza kugira ngo baje kuyasiga umubiri wa Yesu.
Kare mu gitondo ku musi wa mbere utangura indwi, izuba riserutse, bafata inzira baja ku mva.
Bariko baragenda barabazanya bati: “Ni nde aja kudukurira ca kibuye ku bwinjiriro bw’imva?”
Ariko bahashitse, bararaba babona ca kibuye camaze kuvaho.
Binjiye mu mva, babona umuntu asa n’umusore yambaye ikanzu yera cane, yicaye ku ruhande rw’i buryo, maze bagira ubwoba.
Na we arabaremesha ati: “Ntimugire ubwoba! Ndazi ko murondera Yesu w’i Nazareti, umwe babamba. Ntari hano kuko yazutse! Nimuze murabe aho bari baryamitse ikiziga ciwe!
Nimugende mubibwire abigishwa biwe, na canecane Petero, ko Yesu agiye kubarindirira i Galilaya. Aho ni ho muzomusanga nk’uko yabibabwiye.”
Nuko ba bagore barasohoka barahunga baja kure ya ya mva bajugumira kandi bazazaniwe, ntibagira n’umwe babibwira kuko bari bafise ubwoba bwinshi. [
Yesu amaze kuzuka, mu gatondo ku musi wa mbere w’indwi, yabanje kwiyereka Mariya Magadalena, uwo yari yarirukanyemwo abadayimoni indwi.
Na we aca aja kubwira abigishwa iyo nkuru. Abigishwa bari bakigandaye, bamuririra.
Naho bari bumvise ko Yesu ari muzima kandi ko yamwiboneye, ntibizeye ivyo ababwiye.
Inyuma y’aho Yesu arongera yiyereka, mu bundi buryo, babiri bo muri bo bariko baja mu gihugu hagati.
Maze baca baragaruka babibwira abandi, ariko na bo nyene ntibizera ivyo bababwiye.
Mu nyuma Yesu yiyereka bamwe cumi n’umwe bariko barasangira. Arabahambarira kubera ukutizera n’ugukomantaza imitima kuko banse kwemera ivyo babwiwe n’abamubonye amaze kuzuka.
Arababwira ati: “Nimugende mw’isi yose, mubwire Ubutumwa Bwiza abaremwe bose.
Uwizera wese akabatizwa azokizwa, ariko uwutizera azocirwa urubanza.
Kandi ibi ni vyo bimenyetso bizoboneka ku bizera: bazokwirukana abadayimoni mw’izina ryanje, bazovuga indimi nshasha,
bazofata inzoka mu biganza vyabo; kandi nibanywa ivyica, nta co bizobagira. Bazorambika ibiganza ku barwaye, kandi bazokira.”
Umwami Yesu ahejeje kubabwira ivyo, aca aduzwa mw’ijuru, yicara mu kibanza c’icubahiro i buryo bw’Imana.
Hanyuma abigishwa baca baja mu mihingo yose bavuga Ubutumwa Bwiza, kandi Umwami Yesu akorana na bo, ashingira intahe Ijambo ryiwe biciye mu bitangaza vyarikurikira.]
Abantu benshi baragerageje kwandika inkuru z’ivyabereye hagati muri twebwe,
nk’uko twazishikirijwe n’abavyiboneye kuva bigitangura, ari na bo bamamaje Ubutumwa Bwiza.
Ni co gituma nanje, maze gutohoza neza uko vyagenze vyose kuva mu ntango, nahisemwo kukwandikira inkuru y’ukuri kandi itomoye, nyakwubahwa Teyofilo,
kugira ngo umenye udakekeranya ko inyigisho wakiriye ari iz’ukuri.
Igihe Herode yari umwami w’i Yudaya, hari umuherezi yitwa Zakariya wo mu mugwi w’abaherezi bitirirwa Abiya. Umugore wiwe yitwa Elizabeti, na we akaba yakomoka mu muryango wa Aroni.
Zakariya na Elizabeti bari abagororotsi imbere y’Imana, kandi bakurikiza ivyagezwe n’amabwirizwa vy’Umwami Imana ata co bahajije.
Ariko nta mwana bari bafise, kuko Elizabeti atavyara, kandi bompi bari bashaje cane.
Umusi umwe, Zakariya yariko arakora igikorwa ciwe c’ubuherezi mu ngoro y’Imana, kuko umugwi wiwe ari wo wari uramukiwe.
Yari yatowe hakoreshejwe ubupfindo nk’uko umugenzo w’ubuherezi wabitegekanya mu guhitamwo uwinjira mu ngoro y’Umwami Imana guturira ibimota neza
Igihe co guturira ibimota neza kigeze, abari ngaho bose bariko basengera hanze.
Maze umumarayika w’Umwami Imana yiyereka Zakariya, ahagaze i buryo bw’igicaniro bacanirako ibimota neza.
Zakariya amubonye afatwa n’ubwoba bwinshi.
Ariko wa mumarayika aramubarira ati: “Zakariya we, ntutinye, kuko Imana yumvise ugusenga kwawe. Umugore wawe Elizabeti agiye kukuvyarira umwana w’umuhungu, na we uze umwite Yohana.
Uwo mwana azogutera kunezerwa no guhimbarwa, kandi ivuka ryiwe rizonezereza benshi,
kuko azoba uwuhambaye imbere y’Umwami Imana. Ntazokoza umuvinyu ku munwa canke ikindi kintu cose kiboreza, kandi azoba yuzuye Mpwemu Yera kuva akiri mu nda ya nyina.
Azogarukana Abisirayeli benshi k’Uhoraho, Imana yabo.

Azogendera imbere y’Umwami Imana afise impwemu n’ububasha nk’ivya Eliya, kugira ngo agarukane imitima y’abavyeyi ku bana babo, abatumvira Imana na bo abagarukane ku bwenge bw’abagororotsi; uko ni ko azotegurira abantu kwakira Umwami Imana.”
Zakariya abaza uwo mumarayika ati: “Ivyo novyemezwa n’iki, ko nshaje kandi umugore wanje akaba ageze mu zabukuru?”
Wa mumarayika aramwishura ati: “Ndi Gaburiyeli, kandi nama mpagaze imbere y’Imana. Ni yo yandungitse kukubwira iyi nkuru nziza.
Kuva ubu, ugiye kuba ikiragi, ntuzosubira kuvuga kugeza uwo mwana avutse, kuko utizeye ivyo nakubwiye. Kandi bizoshika igihe cavyo kigeze.”
Mu gihe ivyo vyariko biraba, abantu bari hanze, bagumye barindiriye Zakariya bibaza igituma yatevye mu rusengero umwanya munini.
Ariko asohotse, ntiyashobora kuvugana na bo. Abantu baca batahura ko hari ivyo yerekewe mu rusengero, kuko yabavugisha akoresheje ibimenyetso vy’amaboko, ntavuge.
Ikiringo c’ibikorwa vyiwe vy’ubuherezi kirangiye, asubira i muhira.
Haheze imisi, umugore wiwe Elizabeti asama inda, aca amara amezi atanu ataja ahabona. Aravuga ati:
“Ehe ivyiza Umwami Imana yankoreye! Muri iki gihe, yangiriye ubuntu ankurako ibiteterwe mu bantu.”
Elizabeti amaze amezi atandatu yibungenze, Imana irungika umumarayika Gaburiyeli mu gisagara c’i Galilaya citwa Nazareti,
ku nkumi yitwa Mariya yari ikowe n’umusore yitwa Yosefu, wo mu muryango wa Dawidi.
Uwo mumarayika yinjira aho Mariya ari, amubwira ati: “Nezerwa! Umwami Imana akugiriye ubuntu, kandi ari kumwe na we.”
Mariya aterwa ubwoba bwinshi n’ayo majambo, yibaza ico iyo ndamukanyo isigura.
Ariko wa mumarayika aramuhumuriza ati: “Ntutinye, Mariya, kuko ugiriwe ubuntu n’Imana.
Raba ugiye gusama inda, maze uvyare umwana w’umuhungu, kandi uze umwite Yesu.
Azoba uwuhambaye, kandi azokwitwa Umwana w’Iyisumbavyose. Umwami Imana azomuha intebe y’inganji ya sekuruza Dawidi,
kandi azoganza inzu ya Yakobo ibihe bidashira; Ubwami bwiwe ntibuzogira iherezo.”
Mariya abaza uwo mumarayika ati: “Ivyo vyoshoboka bite, ko ntarigera ndyamana n’umugabo?”
Na we aramwishura ati: “Mpwemu Yera azokuzako, ububasha bw’Iyisumbavyose bugutwikire. Ni co gituma umwana azovuka azoba uwera, yitwe Umwana w’Imana.
Mbere na Elizabeti incuti yawe agiye kuvyara umwana mu myaka yiwe y’ubusaza. Uwahora yitwa ingumba, uku ni ukwezi kugira gatandatu yibungenze,
kuko ata jambo Imana ivuze ribura ububasha.”
Mariya aramwishura ati: “Jewe ndi umusavyikazi w’Umwami Imana, nibimbere nk’uko ubivuze.” Wa mumarayika aca amusiga aho arigira.
Muri iyo misi, Mariya aritegura, aduga yihuta mu misozi, aja mu gisagara ca Yuda.
Ashitse kwa Zakariya, aramutsa umugore wiwe Elizabeti.
Na we yumvise indamukanyo ya Mariya, umwana yari mu nda yiwe ariginagura. Elizabeti aca yuzuzwa Mpwemu Yera,
avuga n’ijwi rirenga ati: “Urahezagiwe mu bandi bagore bose, n’umwana ari mu nda yawe arahezagiwe.
Mbega nari iki kugira ngo nyina w’Umwami wanje angendere?
Nabaye ncumva indamukanyo yawe, umwana ari mu nda aca ariginagura kubera umunezero.
Urahiriwe kuko wizeye ko ivyo Umwami Imana yavuze bizoshika.”
Mariya aravuga ati: “Ubugingo bwanje burahimbaza Umwami Imana,
kandi impwemu yanje inezererewe Imana yo Mukiza wanje,
kuko yibutse umusavyikazi wayo muto. Uhereye ubu abantu bose bazonyita umuhirwe,
kuko Inyenkomezi yankoreye ibihambaye, izina ryayo ni iryera.
Igirira imbabazi abayubaha, uko uruganwe rukurikirana n’urundi.
Ukuboko kwayo kwakoze ivy’inkomezi; yashwiragije abishira hejuru mu mitima yabo.
Yakuye abatware ku ntebe z’inganji, ishira hejuru abaciye bugufi.
Yahagije ivyiza abashonje, yirukana abatunzi bagenda imbokoboko.
Yatabaye umusavyi wayo Isirayeli, yibuka kugirira imbabazi
Aburahamu n’uruvyaro rwiwe ibihe vyose, nk’uko yari yarabisezeraniye ba sogokuruza.”
Nuko Mariya amarana na Elizabeti amezi nk’atatu, araheza arataha.
Igihe ciwe co kwibaruka kigeze, Elizabeti yibaruka umwana w’umuhungu.
Incuti n’ababanyi bumvise ko Umwami Imana yamugiriye ubuntu, banezeranwa na we.
Umwana amaze imisi umunani, bamujana kumukeba. Bagira bamwite izina rya se Zakariya,
nyina arahakana, avuga ati: “Oya, izina ryiwe ni Yohana.”
Na bo baramubwira bati: “None ko ata n’umwe wo mu muryango wanyu yitwa iryo zina!”
Baca babaza se bakoresheje ibimenyetso ngo ababwire izina ashaka ko bita umwana wiwe.
Zakariya aca asaba ico kwandikako, yandika ati: “Izina ryiwe ni Yohana.” Bose baratangara.
Ubwo nyene akanwa kiwe gaca karuguruka, ururimi ruragoboroka, aca atangura kuvuga ahimbaza Imana.
Abari aho bose bafatwa n’ubwoba, kandi iyo nkuru yamamara mu misozi yose y’i Yudaya.
Abavyumva bose vyabatera kwibaza mu mitima bati: “None uwo mwana azoba umuntu ki?” Kuko ubushobozi bw’Umwami Imana bwari kuri we.
Se Zakariya, yuzuye Mpwemu Yera, atangura kuvugishwa ati:
“Amashimwe ni ay’Umwami, Imana ya Isirayeli, kuko yaje gutabara no gucungura abantu bayo.
Iduhagurukirije Umukiza ahambaye mu nzu ya Dawidi, umusavyi wayo
(nk’uko yabisezeranye kera ikoresheje abavugishwa bayo bera),
izodukiza abansi bacu, iturokore no mu maboko y’abatwanka.
Yagiriye imbabazi ba sogokuruza, yibuka isezerano ryiwe ryera,
ari yo ndahiro yarahiye sogokuruza Aburahamu;
ko azodukiza agahahazo k’abansi bacu, akadushoboza kumukorera ata bwoba,
mu kwera no mu kuyigororokera imisi yose yo kubaho kwacu.
Kandi nawe, mwana wanje, uzokwitwa uwuvugishwa n’Iyisumbavyose, kuko uzokwitangira imbere Umwami Imana, ukamutegurira inzira.
Uzokwigisha abantu biwe inzira y’agakiza kava mu guharirwa ivyaha vyabo.
Ku bw’imbabazi nyinshi z’Imana yacu, umuco w’igitondo ugiye kuturasira uvuye mw’ijuru,
kugira ngo uboneshereze abari mu mwijima n’abari mu gitutu c’urupfu, wongere urongorere intambuko zacu mu nzira y’amahoro.”
Uwo mwana arakura, arakomera mu mpwemu, aba mu bugaragwa gushika igihe yiyerekeye Abisirayeli.
Muri iyo misi, Kayisari Ogusito, umwami w’abami w’Abaroma, asohora itegeko ko haba urusansuma rw’abantu bose baba mu bwami bw’Abaroma.
Urwo rwari urusansuma rwa mbere rubaye kandi ico gihe Kuriniyusi yatwara intara ya Siriya.
Nuko abantu bose baja mu bisagara bavukiyemwo kwisansumisha.
Yosefu na we nyene ava i Nazareti, igisagara c’i Galilaya, aduga i Yudaya mu gisagara ca Dawidi citwa Betelehemu, kuko yakomoka mu muryango wa Dawidi.
Nuko aja kwisansumisha ajanye na Mariya, uwo yari akoye, kandi Mariya yari yibungenze.
Bakiri i Betelehemu, igihe co kwibaruka kiragera,
maze avyara umwana wiwe w’imfura, amuzingira mu mpuzu z’uruyoya, aca amuryamika mu bwato inka ziriramwo, kuko bari babuze ikibanza mu nzu y’ingenzi.
Muri ako karere hari abungere bama barara mu gahinga baraririye imikuku y’ibitungwa vyabo.
Umumarayika w’Umwami Imana arabiyereka, ubwiza bw’Umwami Imana bubakayanganira impande zose, na bo baterwa n’ubwoba bwinshi cane.
Wa mumarayika aca ababwira ati: “Ntimutinye kuko ndabazaniye inkuru nziza y’umunezero mwinshi ku bantu bose.
Uwu musi, umukiza yabavukiye mu gisagara ca Dawidi, ni we Kristo, Umwami.
Iki ni co kizobabera ikimenyetso: muzosanga uruyoya ruzingiriweko impuzu, ruryamitswe mu bwato inka ziriramwo.”
Ubwo nyene haca haboneka ingabo nyinshi cane zo mw’ijuru zifatanya n’uwo mumarayika, zihimbaza Imana ziti:
“Icubahiro kibe ic’Imana mw’ijuru riri hejuru y’ayandi, kw’isi na ho amahoro abe mu bantu bayihimbara.”
Abo bamarayika bamaze gusubira mw’ijuru, ba bungere baca baravugana bati: “Nimuze tugende i Betelehemu kuraba ivyabaye, ivyo Umwami Imana atubwiye.”
Baca bagenda bihuta, basangaho Mariya na Yosefu, n’umwana aryamye mu bwato inka ziriramwo.
Bamubonye baca babwira bose ivyo babwiwe kuri uwo mwana,
kandi abavyumva bose vyarabatangaza cane.
Ariko Mariya we, yaguma azigama ayo majambo yose mu mutima wiwe, akayiyumvirako cane.
Ba bungere na bo basubira inyuma bahimbaza Imana bongera bayitazira kubera ivyo bumvise n’ivyo babonye, kuko basanze bimeze nk’uko bari babibwiwe.
Ku musi ugira umunani, wa mwana amaze gukebwa, bamwita Yesu, nk’uko umumarayika yari yarabwiye Mariya imbere y’uko asama inda yiwe.
Igihe c’imigenzo yo guhumanurwa kigeze, nk’uko Ivyagezwe vya Mose vyabitegekanya, Yosefu na Mariya badugana Yesu i Yerusalemu kumushikanira Umwami Imana.
(Nk’uko vyanditswe mu Vyagezwe vy’Uhoraho, “Umuhungu wese w’imfura yategerezwa kwegurirwa Uhoraho”).
Nuko Yosefu na Mariya baca batanga ikimazi nk’uko ivyo vyagezwe nyene vyabitegekanya: “inyoni zitwa intunguru zibiri canke inuma zikiri nto zibiri.”
I Yerusalemu hari umugabo yitwa Simeyoni, yari umugororotsi kandi yubaha Imana. Yari yiteze kubona ukwirurwa kwa Isirayeli, kandi Mpwemu Yera yari kuri we.
Kandi yari yarahishuriwe na Mpwemu Yera ko atazopfa atabonye Kristo w’Umwami Imana.
Arongowe na Mpwemu Yera, yinjira mu rusengero. Yosefu na Mariya bazanye Yesu mu rusengero kugira ngo bashitse ivyo ivyagezwe vyategekanya kuri we,
Simeyoni aramwakira, amukikira mu maboko yiwe, ashima Imana ati:
“Ubu rero, Mwami Imana, nk’uko wansezeraniye, urasezeye umusavyi wawe amahoro.
Kuko amaso yanje yiboneye agakiza,
ako wateguriye amahanga yose.
Ni umuco uzohishurira Abanyamahanga Imana, ni icubahiro ku bwoko bwawe bwa Isirayeli.”
Abavyeyi b’uwo mwana batangazwa cane n’ayo majambo amuvuzeko.

Nuko Simeyoni arabahezagira, maze abarira Mariya ati: “Uwu mwana ashizweho kugira ngo, muri Isirayeli, abantu benshi bagwe, abandi bavyuke. Azoba ikimenyetso kivuye ku Mana, ariko benshi bazomugwanya.
Ivyo bizotuma ivyiyumviro vyo mu mitima ya benshi bija ahabona. Kandi nawe nyene, inkota izogusogota mu mutima.”
Kandi hariho n’uwavugishwa n’Imana yitwa Hana, mwene Fanuweli, wo mu muryango wa Asheri, yari ashaje cane. Yabanye n’umugabo wiwe imyaka indwi gusa,
akaba yari amaze imyaka mirongo umunani n’ine ari umupfakazi. Yama mu rusengero ijoro n’umurango, akorera Imana, asenga kandi yisonzesha.
Ako kanya nyene, ashika aho bari aca atangura gushima Imana no kubwira abari biteze ugucungurwa kwa Yerusalemu bose inkuru z’uwo mwana.
Yosefu na Mariya bahejeje gukora ibitegekanijwe n’ivyagezwe vy’Uhoraho, baca basubira i Galilaya mu gisagara cabo ca Nazareti.
Uwo mwana arakura, arakomera, agwiza ubwenge, kandi ubuntu bw’Imana bwari kuri we.
Uko umwaka utashe, abavyeyi ba Yesu bama baja i Yerusalemu mu misi mikuru ya Pasika.
Yesu amaze imyaka cumi n’ibiri, ajana na bo muri iyo misi mikuru nk’uko vyari bisanzwe.
Imisi mikuru irangiye, abavyeyi biwe barataha, ariko uwo mwana Yesu asigara i Yerusalemu, yamara abavyeyi biwe ntibabimenya.
Nuko bamara umusi wose bagenda, bibaza ko umwana yoba ari mu bandi bari bafatanije urugendo. Mu nyuma batangura kumuronderera mu ncuti n’abagenzi.
Bamubuze, basubira i Yerusalemu kumurondererayo.
Haheze imisi itatu, bamusanga mu rusengero yicaranye n’abigisha b’ivyagezwe, abumviriza yongera ababaza ibibazo.
Abamwumva bose baratangazwa n’ubwenge bwiwe hamwe n’inyishu ziwe.
Abavyeyi biwe bamubonye baratangara cane. Nyina aramubaza ati: “Mwana wanje, ibi watugiriye ni ibiki? Twe na so tumaze imisi duhagaritse imitima cane tukurondera.”
Yesu aramubaza ati: “Mbega mwandonderera iki? Ntimwari muzi ko ntegerezwa kuba mu nzu kwa Data?”
Ariko ntibatahura ico ababwiye.
Nuko basubirana na we i Nazareti, kandi yama abumvira. Nuko nyina abika ivyo vyose mu mutima wiwe.
Nuko Yesu abandanya akura mu gihagararo, agwiza ubwenge, kandi agira ikiganza ciza ku Mana no ku bantu.

Mu mwaka ugira cumi na gatanu Kayisari Tiberiyo ari ku ngoma i Roma, Pontiyo Pilato yari icariho ciwe i Yudaya, Herode Antipa yari umuganwa atwara intara ya Galilaya, uwo bavukana Filipo yatwara intara za Ituraya na Tirakoniti, Lusaniya na we yatwara intara ya Abilene,
Anasi na Kayafa na bo bari abaherezi bakuru. Ico gihe ni ho ijambo ry’Imana ryaza kuri Yohana mwene Zakariya ari mu bugaragwa.
Nuko Yohana aja mu turere twose two hakurya no hakuno y’uruzi Yorodani, yigisha abantu umubatizo wo kwihana ngo babone guharirwa ivyaha vyabo.
Ivyo vyari vyaranditswe mu gitabu c’amajambo y’uwavugishwa n’Imana Yesaya, aho yavuga ati: “Hari ijwi ry’uwusemerera mu bugaragwa ati: ‘Nimutegurire Uhoraho aho aca, mugorore inzira agenderamwo!
Imyonga yose izokwuzuzwa iringanire, imisozi n’udutumba vyose bizosenwa. Amabarabara atagororotse azogororwa, n’inzira zisivye zizosiburwa, ziringanizwe.
Kandi abantu bose bazobona agakiza k’Imana.’ ”
Nuko abantu benshi baja iyo Yohana ari ngo ababatize. Arababaza ati: “Mwa bana b’inzoka mwe, ni nde yababuriye ngo muhunge uburake bw’Imana bugiye kuza?

Nimukore ibikorwa vyerekana ko mwihanye, mureke kwibwira mu mitima yanyu muti: ‘Turi uruvyaro rwa Aburahamu.’ Kuko ndababwira ko, no muri aya mabuye mubona, Imana ishobora gukuramwo abana ba Aburahamu.
Mbere incabiti ibanguriwe imizi y’ibiti: igiti cose kitama ivyamwa vyiza kigiye gucibwa gitererwe mu muriro.”
Abantu benshi bari ngaho baramubaza bati: “None dukore iki?”
Yohana arabishura ati: “Uwufise imyambaro ibiri y’impuzu, nahe umwambaro umwe uwudafise n’umwe, n’uwufise ivyokurya nagire gutyo nyene.”
Abatozakori na bo baraza ngo ababatize. Baramubaza bati: “Mwigisha, dukore iki?”
Arabishura ati: “Ntimugatoze ibirengeye ivyemewe n’amategeko.”
Abasoda na bo nyene baramubaza bati: “Tweho dukore iki?” Arabishura ati: “Ntihakagire abo munyaga utwabo kandi ntihakagire uwo mudendereza. Mubumbwe n’impembo zanyu.”
Kubera abantu bari biteze cane ukuza kwa Kristo, bagumye bibaza mu mitima ku vyerekeye Yohana ko yoba ari we Kristo.
Nuko Yohana abwira bose ati: “Jewe ndababatiza mu mazi. Ariko hagiye kuza uwundusha ubushobozi; ntibimbereye no gupfundurura utugozi tw’ibirato vyiwe. We azobabatiza muri Mpwemu Yera no mu muriro.
Afise mu minwe urutaro rwo kugosora. Azokubura ikibanza co gusekuriramwo, ahejeje kugosora, azokwegeraniriza ingano mu kigega, umuguruka na wo awuturirire mu muriro utazokwigera uzima.”
Nuko Yohana abandanya abwira abantu Ubutumwa Bwiza burimwo amajambo menshi yo kubatera intege.
Ariko Yohana amaze kwagiriza ku mugaragaro Herode Antipa icaha co kurongora Herodiya, kandi yari asanzwe ari umugore w’uwo bavukana, akavuga n’ibindi bibi vyinshi yakoze,
Herode yaciye yongerako ikindi caha kibi co gushira Yohana mw’ibohero.
Mu gihe abantu bose bariko barabatizwa, Yesu na we yabatijwe hamwe na bo. Ariko arasenga, ijuru riruguruka,
Mpwemu Yera amanuka kuri we mw’ishusho y’inuma. Maze ijwi ryumvikana rivuye mw’ijuru riti: “Uri umwana wanje nkunda kandi urampimbara.”
Igihe Yesu yatangura igikorwa ciwe yari amaze hafi imyaka mirongo itatu. Abantu benshi bibaza ko Yesu ari mwene Yosefu, Yosefu mwene Heli,
Heli mwene Matati, Matati mwene Lewi, Lewi mwene Meliki, Meliki mwene Yanayi, Yanayi mwene Yosefu,
Yosefu mwene Matatiya, Matatiya mwene Amosi, Amosi mwene Nahumu, Nahumu mwene Esili, Esili mwene Nagayi,
Nagayi mwene Mayati, Mayati mwene Matatiya, Matatiya mwene Semeyini, Semeyini mwene Yoseki, Yoseki mwene Yoda,
Yoda mwene Yohanani, Yohanani mwene Resa, Resa mwene Zerubabeli, Zerubabeli mwene Shalutiyeli, Shalutiyeli mwene Neri,
Neri mwene Meliki, Meliki mwene Hadi, Hadi mwene Kosamu, Kosamu mwene Elumadamu, Elumadamu mwene Eri,
Eri mwene Yosuwa, Yosuwa mwene Eliyezeri, Eliyezeri mwene Yorimu, Yorimu mwene Matati, Matati mwene Lewi,
Lewi mwene Simeyoni, Simeyoni mwene Yuda, Yuda mwene Yosefu, Yosefu mwene Yonamu, Yonamu mwene Eliyakimu,
Eliyakimu mwene Meleya, Meleya mwene Mena, Mena mwene Matata, Matata mwene Natani, Natani mwene Dawidi,
Dawidi mwene Isayi, Isayi mwene Obedi, Obedi mwene Bowazi, Bowazi mwene Salumoni, Salumoni mwene Nahashoni,
Nahashoni mwene Aminadabu, Aminadabu mwene Ramu, Ramu mwene Hezironi, Hezironi mwene Peresi, Peresi mwene Yuda,
Yuda mwene Yakobo, Yakobo mwene Isaka, Isaka mwene Aburahamu, Aburahamu mwene Tera, Tera mwene Nahori,
Nahori mwene Serugi, Serugi mwene Reyu, Reyu mwene Pelegi, Pelegi mwene Eberi, Eberi mwene Shela,
Shela mwene Kayinani, Kayinani mwene Arupakisadi, Arupakisadi mwene Shemu, Shemu mwene Nowa, Nowa mwene Lameki,
Lameki mwene Metusela, Metusela mwene Enoki, Enoki mwene Yeredi, Yeredi mwene Mahalaleli, Mahalaleli mwene Kenani,
Kenani mwene Enoshi, Enoshi mwene Seti, Seti mwene Adamu, Adamu akomoka ku Mana.
Hanyuma Yesu, yuzuye Mpwemu Yera, ava ku ruzi Yorodani ajanwa na Mpwemu mu bugaragwa,
ahamara imisi mirongo ine ageragezwa na Satani. Amara iyo misi ata co arya, maze iheze, yumva arashonje.
Satani aramubwira ati: “Niwaba uri Umwana w’Imana, bwira aya mabuye ahinduke imikate.”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Handitswe ngo: ‘Umuntu ntabeshwaho n’indya gusa.’ ”
Hanyuma Satani amujana ahantu harehare, amwereka ubwami bwose bwo mw’isi mu kanya gato.
Aramubwira ati: “Ndaguha kuganza ubwo bwami, nguhe n’ubwiza bwabwo bwose, kuko narabuhawe kandi nshobora kubuha uwo nshatse.
Niwapfukama ukansenga, ivyo vyose biraba ivyawe.”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Handitswe ngo: ‘Usenge Uhoraho Imana yawe, kandi abe ari yo yonyene ukorera!’ ”
Nuko wa mubi amujana i Yerusalemu, amuhagarika ku rusengero ahantu hataramutse, amubwira ati: “Niwaba uri Umwana w’Imana, niwikororere hasi,
kuko handitswe ngo: ‘Azotegeka abamarayika biwe bakuzigame.
Bazokurerura mu maboko yabo, kugira ngo ntutsitare kw’ibuye.’ ”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Handitswe ngo: ‘Ntukagerageze Uhoraho Imana yawe.’ ”
Satani ahejeje kumugerageza mu buryo bwose, aca amusiga aho, ntiyasubira kumugerageza gushika amuronse akandi karyo keza.
Yesu aca asubira i Galilaya yuzuye ubushobozi bwa Mpwemu Yera, maze inkuru yiwe ikwira akarere kose kahegereye.
Yama yigisha mu masinagogi kandi agashimwa n’abantu bose.
Umusi umwe, Yesu aja i Nazareti aho yakuriye. Ku musi w’Isabato, yinjira mw’isinagogi nk’uko yari amenyereye, maze ahaguruka ngo asome Ivyanditswe.
Bamuhereza umuzingo w’igitabu c’uwavugishwa n’Imana Yesaya, arakizingurura, aca ashikira ahanditswe ngo:
“Mpwemu w’Uhoraho ari kuri jewe, kuko yansize amavuta ngo mbwire aboro Ubutumwa Bwiza. Yantumye kurekura imbohe ngo zidegemvye, guhumura amaso y’impumyi, kurekura abacinyijwe ngo bidegemvye,
no kumenyekanisha umwaka wo kugirirwa ubuntu n’Uhoraho.”
Ahejeje gusoma, aca azinga wa muzingo w’igitabu, agisubiza uwujejwe kukibika, aca aricara. Abari mw’isinagogi bose bamuhanga amaso cane,
aca atangura kubabwira ati: “Uwu musi ibi Vyanditswe mwumvise birashitse.”
Bose baramushima, batangazwa n’amajambo arimwo ubuntu bw’Imana yava mu kanwa kiwe, babazanya bati: “Mbega uwu si wa muhungu wa Yosefu?”

Yesu arababwira ati: “Ndazi ko mutazobura kuncira uwu mugani muti: ‘Muvuzi, niwivure!’ Kandi muzombwira muti: ‘Korera muri iki gisagara uvukamwo ibitangaza nk’ivyo twumvise wakoreye i Kaperinawumu!’ ”
Arabandanya ati: “Ndababwire ukuri, nta wuvugishwa n’Imana yemerwa iwabo.
Mu vy’ukuri, mu gihe ca Eliya hari abapfakazi benshi muri Isirayeli, aho ijuru ryugarwa imvura ikamara imyaka itatu n’igice itagwa, amapfa agatera mu gihugu cose.
Ariko Eliya ntiyarungitswe ku mupfakazi n’umwe muri bo, atari ku mupfakazi w’i Zerafati mu ntara ya Sidoni.
Kandi hari abanyamibembe benshi muri Isirayeli mu gihe c’uwavugishwa n’Imana Elisa, ariko nta n’umwe yahumanutse imibembe atari Namani Umusiriya.”
Abari mw’isinagogi bavyumvise, bose baterwa n’ishavu.
Barahaguruka, bamukwegera inyuma y’igisagara, bamujana hejuru ku musozi ico gisagara cari cubatsweko, kugira ngo bamutembagarize mu manga.
Ariko abaca hagati arigira.
Nuko Yesu aca aja i Kaperinawumu mu gisagara c’i Galilaya. Ku musi w’Isabato aja kwigisha mw’isinagogi,
maze abantu batangazwa n’inyigisho ziwe, kuko zarimwo ububasha.
Muri iyo sinagogi hari umuntu yarimwo impwemu ihumanye. Maze akoma induru n’ijwi rirenga ati:
“Yesu w’i Nazareti, udushakako iki? Uzanywe no kuduhonya? Ndazi uwo uri we. Uri Uwera w’Imana!”
Yesu arayizibiza ati: “Hora! Muvemwo!” Wa mudayimoni aca amukubita hasi imbere ya bo, amuvamwo ata co abaye.
Abantu bose baratangara cane, babwirana bati: “Ijambo ry’uwu muntu rirakomeye! Rifise ububasha n’inkomezi, kuko n’impwemu mbi na zo arazitegeka zikamwumvira, zigasohoka!”
Nuko inkuru ziwe zikwira muri ako karere kose.
Yesu aca ava muri iyo sinagogi aja i muhira kwa Simoni. Inabukwe wa Simoni yari arwaye kandi ashushe cane, maze abari aho binginga Yesu ngo amukize.
Yesu aramwegera, ahagarara i ruhande yiwe, akankamira ubwo bushuhe, buca burahera. Ako kanya nyene aca arahaguruka, arabazimana.
Izuba ririko rirarenga, bamuzanira abantu bose bafise ingwara zitandukanye, arambika ibiganza kuri umwumwe wese, arabakiza.
N’impwemu mbi ziva mu bantu benshi, zisemerera ziti: “Uri Umwana w’Imana!” Ariko arazikankamira, ntiyazemerera gusubira kuvuga, kuko zari zamenye ko ari Kristo.
Bukeye mu gitondo, Yesu aja mu kibanza ciherereye. Abantu baja kumurondera, babonye aho ari, baramugobera ngo ntasubire kuvana na bo.
Ariko arababwira ati: “Ntegerezwa kuvuga Ubutumwa Bwiza bw’Ubwami bw’Imana no mu bindi bisagara na vyo, kuko ari co canzanye.”
Nuko abandanya yigisha mu masinagogi y’i Yudaya.
Umusi umwe Yesu yari ku nkengera y’ikiyaga c’i Genezareti, akikujwe n’isinzi ry’abantu bariko bumviriza ijambo ry’Imana.
Maze abona ubwato bubiri abarovyi bari basize ku nkengera y’ico kiyaga, bariko boza insenga zabo.
Nuko yinjira muri bumwe; ubwo na bwo bwari ubwa Simoni, amusaba ngo abwigize mu mazi kure y’isi gato, na we abwicaramwo, atangura kwigisha abantu.
Ahejeje kwigisha, abarira Simoni ati: “Nimuterere insenga zanyu hagati mu kiyaga, murobe.”
Simoni aramwishura ati: “Mwigisha, twakoze ijoro ryose turaruha, ariko ntitwaronka ifi n’imwe. Yamara ko ubivuze, reka nterere insenga.”
Batereye insenga, baroba ifi nyishi cane, gushika aho insenga zitangura gutabuka.
Baca bahamagara bagenzi babo bari mu bundi bwato ngo baze babafashe, maze buzuza ubwato bwabo bwompi gushika aho butangura kwibira.
Simoni Petero abibonye, apfukama imbere ya Yesu, amubwira ati: “Mwami, igira kure yanje kuko ndi umunyavyaha!”
Ivyo Petero yabivuze kubera we n’abo bari kumwe bari batangajwe cane n’ubwinshi bw’ifi bari bahejeje kuroba.
Bagenziwe, ari bo Yakobo na Yohana bene Zebedayo, bakorana na Simoni. Yesu abwira Simoni ati: “Ntutinye, kuko uhereye ubu, ugiye kuba umurovyi w’abantu.”
Baca bakwegera ubwato bwabo ku nkengera y’ikiyaga, basigaho vyose, baramukurikira.

Yesu ari muri kimwe mu bisagara vy’aho hantu, haza umuntu yuzuye imibembe umubiri wose. Abonye Yesu, yikubita imbere yiwe yubitse umutwe hasi, aramwinginga ati: “Mwami, ubishatse woshobora kumpumanura.”
Yesu aca aramvura ukuboko, amukorako. Aramubwira ati: “Ndabishatse, kira uhumanuke!” Ubwo nyene imibembe ica iramuvako.

Yesu aca aramwihaniza ati: “Ntihagire umuntu n’umwe ubibwira. Ariko genda umuherezi agusuzume, hanyuma utange ikimazi Mose yashinze ko uwuhumanutse atanga, kugira ngo bibabere ikimenyetso ko wahumanutse.”
Yamara inkuru za Yesu zirushirizaho kumenyekana, abantu isinzi bakama baza aho ari kumwumviriza no kugira ngo abakize ingwara.
Ariko Yesu yama aja ahantu hiherereye mu bugaragwa gusenga.

Umusi umwe Yesu yariko arigisha, kandi bamwe mu Bafarisayo n’abigisha b’ivyagezwe bari ngaho; bari baje bava mu bisagara bitandukanye vy’i Galilaya, i Yudaya n’i Yerusalemu; kandi ububasha bw’Umwami Imana bwo gukiza ingwara bwari kuri Yesu.
Nuko haza abantu bateruye umuntu akongataye ku kirago, barondera ingene bomwinjiza mu nzu ngo bamuryamike imbere ya Yesu.
Babonye ko badashobora kwinjira kubera ubwinshi bw’abantu, baca burira hejuru ku nzu, basambura aho bacisha ca kirago aryamyeko, bacururukiriza hagati mu bantu, gitumbereye imbere ya Yesu.
Yesu abonye ukwizera kwabo, avuga ati: “Mugenzi, ivyaha vyawe urabihariwe.”
Abafarisayo n’abigisha b’ivyagezwe batangura kwiyumvira bati: “Mbega uwu ni nde ko yigize Imana! Ukwo ni ukuyituka. Imana yonyene ni yo ishobora guharira ivyaha.”
Yesu aca aramenya ivyo bariko bariyumvira, maze arababaza ati: “Ni kuki muriko mwiyumvira gutyo mu mitima yanyu?
Mbega icoroshe ni uko novuga nti: ‘Ivyaha vyawe urabihariwe,’ canke ni uko novuga nti: ‘Haguruka ugende’?
Ariko nshaka ko mumenya ko Umwana w’Umuntu afise ububasha kw’isi bwo guharira ivyaha.” Aca ategeka wa muntu akongataye ati: “Haguruka, ikorere ikirago cawe witahire.”
Ubwo nyene aca arahaguruka bose babibona, yikorera ca kirago, ataha ahimbaza Imana.
Abari ngaho bose baratangara cane kandi bagira n’ubwoba, bahimbaza Imana bavuga bati: “Uwu musi amaso yacu abonye ibitangaza!”
Inyuma y’ivyo, Yesu ariko arava muri ico gisagara, abona umutozakori yitwa Lewi yicaye aho yatoreza ikori, amubwira ati: “Nkurikira!”
Lewi aca ava hasi, aramukurikira.
Mu nyuma Lewi ategurira amazimano Yesu i muhira iwe, atumira n’abatozakori benshi n’abandi bantu, baraza basangira na bo.
Ariko Abafarisayo n’abigisha b’ivyagezwe babaza abigishwa ba Yesu bamwidodombera bati: “Ni kuki mwicarana n’abatozakori n’abandi banyavyaha, mugasangira na bo?”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Abakomeye si bo bakeneye umuganga, ahubwo abarwaye ni bo bamukeneye.
Sinaje kurondera abibaza ko ari abagororotsi, ahubwo naje kurondera abazi neza ko ari abanyavyaha, kugira ngo bihane.”
Baca baramubaza bati: “Ni kuki abigishwa ba Yohana, co kimwe n’ab’Abafarisayo bisonzesha kenshi bongera basenga, ariko abawe bakaguma barya bongera banywa nk’uko bisanzwe?”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Mbega abatumire b’umukwe bokwisonzesha bakiri kumwe na we mu musi mukuru? Ntibishoboka!
Ariko hazogera aho umukwe abakurwamwo; ico gihe rero bazoheza bisonzeshe.”

Aca abacira uwu mugani ati: “Nta wutabura igitambara ku mpuzu nshasha ngo akibaririre ku mpuzu y’umushire. Abikoze uko, aba yononye iyo impuzu nshasha, kandi ico gitambara gishasha ntigishobora gufatana n’impuzu y’umushire.
Ni nk’uko ata wosuka umuvinyu mushasha mu mukuza w’urushato ushaje. Abigize uko, uwo umukuza womeneka, umuvinyu ugaseseka.
Ahubwo umuvinyu mushasha bawushira mu mukuza mushasha.
Kandi nta muntu anywa umuvinyu wa kera ngo aheze yipfuze kunywa mushasha, kuko avuga ngo: ‘Umuvinyu wa kera uryoshe kuruta mushasha.’ ”
Umusi umwe, Yesu yaciye mu mirima y’ingano, kandi hari kw’Isabato. Abigishwa biwe baca batangura guca imitwe y’ingano zeze, barazivungura, bakuramwo intete, barazirya.
Bamwe mu Bafarisayo baramubaza bati: “Ni kuki mukora ikizira ku musi w’Isabato?”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Mbega ntimurasoma ivyo Dawidi yakoze igihe we n’abo bari kumwe bari bashonje?
Yinjiye mu nzu y’Imana, afata imikate yashikaniwe Imana arayirya; yongera ahako n’abari kumwe na we; kandi abaherezi ari bo bonyene bari bemerewe kuyirya.”
Yongera arababwira ati: “Umwana w’Umuntu ni we Mwami w’Isabato.”
Ku wundi musi w’Isabato, Yesu yinjira mw’isinagogi, atangura kwigisha. Aho hari umugabo akongataye ukuboko kw’i buryo.
Abafarisayo n’abigisha b’ivyagezwe baca bamushinga ijisho kugira ngo barabe ko amukiza, maze bace bamwagiriza ko yakijije umuntu kw’Isabato.
Ariko Yesu amenye ivyo biyumvira mu mitima, aca abarira wa mugabo akongataye ukuboko ati: “Haguruka uhagarare hano imbere y’ishengero!” Nuko arahaguruka, ahagarara imbere.
Maze Yesu arababaza ati: “Mbega ni igiki cemewe gukorwa ku musi w’Isabato? Gukora iciza canke gukora ikibi? Gukiza ubuzima bw’umuntu, canke kubwica?”
Nuko Yesu arabitegereza bose, maze abwira wa muntu ati: “Gorora ukuboko kwawe!” Akugoroye, guca kurakira.
Ariko ba Bafarisayo n’abigisha b’ivyagezwe barashavura cane, batangura kuja inama babazanya bati: “Yesu tumugire dute?”
Umusi umwe Yesu aduga ku musozi, akesha ijoro ryose asenga Imana.
Bukeye, akoranya abigishwa biwe bose, atoranyamwo cumi na babiri, abagira intumwa. Na bo ni aba:
Simoni, uwo Yesu yise Petero, mwene nyina Andereya, Yakobo, Yohana, Filipo, Baruteremi,
Matayo, Toma, Yakobo mwene Alufayo, Simoni Umuzelote,
Yuda mwene Yakobo, na Yuda Isikariyote, ari we yahavuye amugurisha.

Hanyuma Yesu ava kuri uwo musozi amanukana na bo, bashika ahantu hateze, bahasanga isinzi ry’abigishwa biwe, hamwe n’abandi bantu benshi bari baje bava i Yudaya, i Yerusalemu, no mu micungararo y’intara za Tiro na Sidoni yegereye ikiyaga,
bazanywe no kumwumviriza no kugira ngo abakize ingwara. Nuko abari baboshwe n’impwemu mbi barakira,
kandi abantu bose bagerageza kumukorako, kuko ububasha bwo gukiza ingwara bwamuvamwo bugakiza abantu bose.
Nuko Yesu yitegereza abigishwa biwe, aravuga ati: “Murahiriwe mwebwe mwumva ko mukenye, kuko Ubwami bw’Imana ari ubwanyu.
Murahiriwe mwebwe mushonje muri kino gihe, kuko muzohazwa. Murahiriwe mwebwe murira muri kino gihe, kuko muzotwenga.
Muzoba muhiriwe abantu nibabanka, bakabakumira, bakabatuka, bakabavuga nabi nk’inkozi z’ibibi, babahora Umwana w’Umuntu.
Ico gihe muze munezerwe kuko impera yanyu izoba ari nini mw’ijuru. Kandi mwibuke ko ba sekuruza babo ari ko bagiriye abavugishwa n’Imana ba kera.
Ariko muragowe mwebwe abatunzi, kuko mumaze kuronka indemesho yanyu.
Muragowe mwebwe muhaze muri kino gihe, kuko muzosonza. Muragowe mwebwe mutwenga muri kino gihe, kuko muzobabara muboroge.
Muragowe mwebwe mushimagizwa na bose, kuko uko ari ko ba sekuruza babo bashimagiza abavugishwa b’ibinyoma.
Ariko ndababwire mwebwe munyumva: Nimukunde abansi banyu, mugirire neza ababanka.
Muhezagire ababavuma, musengere ababagirira nabi.
Nihagira uwugukubita mu musaya umwe, umuhindukirize n’uwundi. Hagize uwugutwara umutamana, umuhebere n’ikanzu na yo.
Umuntu niyagusaba ikintu ukimuhe, uwukunyaze ivyawe ubimuhebere.
Ivyo mugomba ko abantu babagirira, abe ari vyo mubagirira namwe.
Nimwakunda ababakunda gusa, muzoba murushije iki abandi? Mbega abanyavyaha bo ntibakunda ababakunda?
Kandi nimwagirira neza ababagirira neza gusa, muzoba murushije iki abandi? Mbega abanyavyaha bo ntibabigenza batyo?
Nimwagurana abo mwizeye ko bazobasubiza bonyene, muzoba murushije iki abandi? Mbega abanyavyaha bo ntibagurana abo bizeye ko bazobasubiza yose.

Ariko, mukunde abansi banyu, mubagirire neza. Mubagurane mutiteze ko babasubiza, ni ho impera yanyu izoba nini mw’ijuru. Aho muzoba mwerekanye vy’ukuri ko muri abana b’Iyisumbavyose, kuko igirira neza intashima n’abanyakibi.
Mugire impuhwe nk’uko So wo mw’ijuru ari umunyampuhwe.
Ntimugacire imanza abandi, kugira ngo namwe ntimuzonegurwe. Ntimugatsindishe abandi, kugira ngo namwe ntimuzotsindishwe. Mugire imbabazi, ni ho namwe muzozigirirwa.
Mutange, namwe muzohabwa. Ingero nziza, itsindagiye, inyingishe kandi isesekaye ni yo muzogererwa. Mugerera abandi ari ko namwe muzogererwa.”
Yesu abacira kandi uwu mugani ati: “Mbega impumyi yorongora iyindi mpumyi? Zose ntizohava zigwa mu kinogo?
Umwigishwa ntaruta umwigisha, ariko umwigishwa yigishijwe neza amera nk’umwigisha wiwe.
Ni kuki ushinga ijisho akatsi kari mu jisho rya mugenzawe, ariko ntiwiteho inkingi y’igiti iri mu jisho ryawe?

Ni kuki ubwira mugenzawe uti: ‘Mugenzi, tega ndagutosore akatsi kari mu jisho,’ kandi nawe ugendana inkingi y’igiti mu jisho ryawe? Wa ndyarya we, tangura ukure inkingi y’igiti iri mu jisho ryawe, ni ho uzobona neza akatsi kari mu jisho rya mugenzawe, uheze ugakureyo.
Nta giti ciza cama ivyamwa bibi, kandi nta giti kibi cama ivyamwa vyiza.
Igiti cose kimenyekanira ku vyamwa vyaco. Nta wokwamura inzabibu ku bisaka vy’amahwa, nk’uko ata wokwamura insukoni ku mitobotobo.
Umuntu mwiza akura ivyiza mu bubiko bwiza bw’umutima wiwe, umubi na we agakura ibibi mu bubiko bubi bw’umutima wiwe. Kuko ivyuzuye mu mutima ni vyo akanwa kavuga.
Ni kuki mumpamagara ngo: ‘Mwami, Mwami,’ ariko ntimukore ivyo ndababwira?
Umuntu wese aza aho ndi akumva amajambo yanje hanyuma akayashira mu ngiro, ngira ndabereke uko ameze:
ameze nk’umwubatsi yimvye cane akubaka umushinge w’inzu yiwe ku rutare. Iyo hateye umwuzure, inzuzi zigasuriranya, iyo nzu ntishobora kunyiganyiga kuko yubatse neza.
Ariko uwumva amajambo yanje ntayashire mu ngiro, ameze nk’uwubaka inzu kw’isi ahatagira umushinge. Iyo inzuzi zisuriranije kuri ya nzu, irasenyuka kandi isenyuka ryayo riba irikomeye.”
Yesu ahejeje kwigisha abantu muri ayo majambo yose, aca aja i Kaperinawumu.
Aho hari umusoda mukuru w’Umuroma yari afise umukozi yakunda cane. Uwo mukozi yari arwaye, ari hafi yo gupfa.
Yumvise inkuru za Yesu, aca arungika bamwe mu bakuru b’Abayuda, ngo bamwinginge aze akize umukozi wiwe.
Bashitse aho Yesu ari, baramwinginga bashimitse bati: “Uwu muntu birakwiye ko umufasha,
kuko arakunda ihanga ryacu kandi yaratwubakiye n’isinagogi.”
Yesu aca ajana na bo. Ari hafi yo gushika, wa musoda aca arungika abagenzi biwe ngo baje kumubwira bati: “Mwami, ntiwirirwe urigora, kuko ntibimbereye kukwakira mu nzu yanje.
Simbereye no kuza aho uri ngo duhure. Ariko vuga ijambo rimwe gusa, umukozi wanje arakira.

Kuko nanje ndafise abantegeka kandi mfise n’abasoda ntegeka. Iyo mbwiye umwe nti: ‘Genda,’ aca agenda; nabwira uwundi nti: ‘Ngwino,’ agaca aza; kandi iyo mbwiye umukozi wanje nti ‘Kora iki,’ aca agikora.”
Yesu avyumvise aratangara cane, aca arahindukira abarira abo bari kumwe ati: “Ndababwire ukuri, no muri Isirayeli, sinari bwabone uwufise ukwizera gukomeye nk’uku.”
Maze bamwe bari batumwe baragaruka, basanga wa mukozi yakize.
Inyuma y’ivyo Yesu aca amanuka mu gisagara citwa Nayini, ari kumwe n’abigishwa hamwe n’isinzi ry’abantu bamukurikiye.
Ageze hafi y’irembo ry’igisagara, haza abantu bagiye guhamba umuntu. Yari umuhungu w’ikinege kandi nyina yari umupfakazi. Hariho kandi n’isinzi ry’abantu bo muri ico gisagara bari bamuherekeje.
Umwami Yesu abonye uwo muvyeyi, amugirira impuhwe, aca amubwira ati: “Reka kurira!”
Maze Yesu yegera isandugu yarimwo ikiziga, abari bayiteruye baca barahagarara. Hanyuma avuga ati: “Muhungu, ndakubwiye, haguruka!”
Wa muhungu yari yapfuye aravyuka, atangura kuvuga, Yesu aca amusubiza nyina.
Abari aho bose baterwa n’ubwoba, bongera bashima Imana, bati: “Uwuvugishwa n’Imana ahambaye yatwiyeretse, Imana yaje gutabara abantu bayo.”
Nuko inkuru ya Yesu ikwira i Yudaya hose no mu micungararo yaho.
Maze abigishwa ba Yohana Umubatizi baragenda bamubwira ivyo Yesu ariko arakora vyose. Aca ahamagara babiri muri bo,
abatuma kubaza Umwami Yesu bati: “Ni wewe twari twiteze ko uzoza canke twitege uwundi?”
Bashikiriye Yesu bamubwira bati: “Yohana Umubatizi adutumye ngo tukubaze: ‘Woba uri umwe yategerezwa kuza, canke turindire uwundi?’ ”
Ako kanya nyene Yesu aca akiza abantu benshi bari bafise ingwara n’ubumuga butandukanye, ababoshwe n’impwemu mbi, ahumura n’impumyi nyinshi.

Maze abarira ba bigishwa ati: “Genda mubarire Yohana ivyo mwabonye n’ivyo mwumvise: impumyi zirahumuka, ibimuga biragenda, abanyamibembe barahumanuka, ibipfamatwi birumva, abapfuye barazuka, kandi aboro barabwirwa Ubutumwa Bwiza.
Harahiriwe uwudakekeranya ivyanje.”
Ba bigishwa bamaze kugenda, Yesu aca atangura kuvuga ivyerekeye Yohana Umubatizi, ati: “Mbega mwagiye kuraba iki mu bugaragwa? Ni irenga rizungagizwa n’umuyaga?
Canke mwari mugiye kuraba umuntu yambaye impuzu z’igiciro kinini? Haba na mba! Abambara impuzu z’agaciro n’abiyamira mu bikayangana baba mu birimba.
None mwagiye kuraba iki? Uwuvugishwa n’Imana? Egome cane, ndababwiye ko mwagiye kuraba uwuruta uwuvugishwa n’Imana.
Kuko uwo ni we Ivyanditswe bivugako ngo: ‘Ngira ndungike intumwa yanje imbere yawe, igutegurire inzira.’
Ndababwire ukuri, mu bantu bose bavyawe n’abagore, nta wungana na Yohana; ariko umuntu mutoya musi y’abandi mu Bwami bw’Imana arahambaye kumuruta.”
(Maze abantu bose, harimwo n’abatozakori, bumvise ayo majambo ya Yesu, baca baremera ko inzira z’Imana zigororotse, kuko bari babatijwe na Yohana.
Ariko Abafarisayo n’abigisha b’ivyagezwe bo banka umugambi w’Imana kuri bo, kuko bari baranse ko Yohana ababatiza.)
Yesu yongera kubabwira ati: “Mbega ab’uru runganwe nobagereranya n’iki? Bameze gute?
Bameze nk’abana bicaye ku mbuga, bahamagara bagenzi babo bakababarira bati: ‘Twabavugirije umwironge, ariko ntimwatamba; hanyuma tubaririmbira iz’ikigandaro, ntimwarira.’
Kuko Yohana Umubatizi yaje atarya, atanywa n’umuvinyu, muvuga muti: ‘Arimwo dayimoni.’
Umwana w’Umuntu na we aza arya, kandi anywa, muca muvuga muti: ‘Ni umukunzi w’inda kandi ni imborerwa, agendana n’abatozakori n’abandi banyavyaha.’
Ariko icerekana ko ubwenge bugororotse ni ubuzima bw’ababwakiriye.”
Maze umwe mu Bafarisayo atumira Yesu ngo amuzimane. Nuko Yesu aragenda, yinjira mu nzu yiwe, yicara ku meza.
Hanyuma umugore umwe wo muri ico gisagara yari azwi nk’umunyavyaha yumva ko Yesu ariko afungurira mu nzu y’uwo Mufarisayo. Aca aza azanye icupa ririmwo amavuta amota cane y’igiciro kinini,
apfukama i ruhande y’ibirenge vya Yesu arira, ajojotereza amosozi yiwe ku birenge vya Yesu, abihanaguza umushatsi wiwe, arabisomagura yongera abisiga ya mavuta.
Wa Mufarisayo yamutumira abibonye, atangura kwivugana mu mutima ati: “Iyaba uwu muntu yari uwuvugishwa n’Imana, yari kumenya uwuriko aramukorako, akamenya uwu mugore uwo ari we, ko ari umunyavyaha.”
Yesu aca aramubwira ati: “Simoni, ndafise ico ndakubwira.” Simoni na we ati: “Mbarira, Mwigisha!”
Yesu aca amucira umugani ati: “Habaye muntu yaguranye idenariyo abantu babiri; umwe amuha ibihumbi amajana atanu, uwundi ibihumbi bitanu.
Abonye ata n’umwe muri abo ashoboye kumwishura, aca ayabahebera bompi. None ni nde muri abo babiri azomukunda cane?”
Simoni na we arishura ati: “Nibaza ko ari uwo yahebewe menshi.” Yesu aca amubwira ati: “Wishuye neza.”

Aca ahindukira araba wa mugore, hanyuma abwira Simoni ati: “Wabonye uwu mugore? Aho ninjira mu nzu yawe ntiwampaye amazi yo kwoza ibirenge, ariko we yatotesheje ibirenge vyanje n’amosozi yiwe, abihanaguza imishatsi yiwe.
Ntiwangumbiriye mu kundamutsa, ariko kuva ninjira ntahengeshanya kunsomagura ku birenge.
Ntiwansize amavuta ku mutwe, ariko we yansize amavuta amota cane ku birenge.
Nuko rero ndakubwire, yerekanye urukundo rwinshi kuko yahariwe ivyaha vyiwe vyinshi. Ariko uwahariwe bike, yerekana urukundo ruke.”
Yesu aca abarira wa mugore ati: “Ivyaha vyawe urabihariwe.”
Abandi batumire baca batangura kubazanya bati: “Mbega uwu ni nde, aho yubahuka kuvuga ko aharira abantu ivyaha?”
Yesu aca abarira wa mugore ati: “Ukwizera kwawe kwagukijije, igire amahoro.”
Inyuma y’ivyo, Yesu agendagenda mu bisagara no mu mihana, avuga Ubutumwa Bwiza bw’Ubwami bw’Imana. Bamwe cumi na babiri bari kumwe na we,
hamwe n’abagore bakize impwemu mbi n’izindi ngwara, ari bo Mariya Magadalena yirukanywemwo abadayimoni indwi,
Yowana muka Kuza umunyabigega wa Herode, Suzana hamwe n’abandi benshi. Abo bagore bashigikira Yesu n’abigishwa biwe bakoresheje uburyo bwabo.
Umusi umwe, abantu isinzi bakorana bavuye mu bisagara bitandukanye, maze Yesu abacira uwu mugani ati:
“Habaye umurimyi yagiye kubiba imbuto ziwe. Ariko arabiba, zimwe zigwa i ruhande y’inzira, abantu barazihonyanga, inyoni zo mu kirere na zo zirazinobagura.
Izindi zigwa ku rutare; zimeze zica ziruma kuko hatari habomvye.
Izindi na zo zaguye mu mahwa; zimeze zikurana na yo, aca arazinyoha.
Ariko hari izaguye mw’ivu ryiza, zirakura kandi zirama, zimbuka incuro ijana.” Ahejeje kubacira uwo mugani, yongerako ati: “Uwufise amatwi yo kwumva niyumve.”
Abigishwa biwe baca bamubaza insiguro y’uwo mugani.
Na we ababwira ati: “Ni mwebwe mwahawe kumenya amabanga y’ivy’Ubwami bw’Imana. Ariko ku bandi nkoresha imigani kugira ngo, ‘naho boraba ntibabone, kandi naho bokwumviriza ntibatahure.’
Iyi ni yo nsiguro y’uwu mugani: imbuto ni ijambo ry’Imana.
Abantu bamwe bameze nk’isi y’i ruhande y’inzira. Iyo abo bantu bumvise ijambo ry’Imana, Satani araza akarikura mu mitima yabo kugira ngo ntibizere ngo bakizwe.

Hari abandi bantu bameze nk’isi yo ku rutare. Abo na bo iyo bumvise ijambo ry’Imana, baryakirana umunezero, ariko kubera ritagira imizi muri bo, bizera akanya gato. Hagize ibibagerageza, baca bata ukwizera.

Hari n’abameze nk’isi yamezeko amahwa. Abo na bo bagiheza kwumva ijambo ry’Imana, imyitwarariko y’ivy’ubu buzima, ubutunzi n’ibihimbaro vy’iyi si biraza bikanyoha icatewe muri bo, hanyuma bikababuza gukura mu vy’impwemu.
Ariko hari n’abandi bameze nk’ivu ryiza. Abo ni abakirana ijambo ry’Imana umutima mwiza utagira uburyarya, kandi bakarigumya; maze kubera ukwihangana, bakama ivyamwa vyinshi.
Nta wudomeka itara hanyuma ngo aryubikeko igiseke canke ngo arinyegeze musi y’uburiri. Ahubwo aritereka ku giterekwako itara kugira ngo riboneshereze abinjira mu nzu.
Kuko ata canyegejwe kitazonyegururwa, kandi ata cagizwe ibanga kitazomenyekana.
Nuko rero mwiyubare ku vyo mwumva. Uwufise vyinshi azokwongererezwa, uwufise bike na we azokwakwa n’ivyo yibaza ko afise.”
Nyina wa Yesu na bene nyina baje kumuraba babura aho baca ngo bamushikire kuko hari abantu benshi cane.
Umuntu umwe aca amubwira ati: “Nyoko na bene nyoko bahagaze hanze, bariko barakurondera.”
Yesu amwishura ati: “Mama na bene mama ni abo bumva ijambo ry’Imana bakaryumvira.”
Umusi umwe Yesu yabariye abigishwa biwe ati: “Tujabuke tuje hakurya y’ikiyaga.” Nuko batambukira mu bwato, bafata urugendo.
Bakiriko barasoza, Yesu arasinzira. Haca haduka umuyaga mwinshi mu kiyaga, maze ubwato butangura kwuzura amazi; bari bageramiwe cane.
Abigishwa baca baja kumuvyura bavuga bati: “Mwigisha, mwigisha, turapfuye!” Nuko aravyuka akankamira uwo muyaga n’imipfunda, igihuhusi kirahagarara, ubwo nyene haba agahwekere!
Yesu aca abaza ba bigishwa ati: “Ukwizera kwanyu kuri he?” Maze baratangara, bagira n’ubwoba bwinshi, batangura kubazanya bati: “Mbega uwu ni umuntu ki? Ategeka umuyaga n’amazi kandi bikamwumvira!”
Nuko barasoza bashika mu ntara ya Gerasene, hakurya y’ikiyaga harabana n’i Galilaya.
