Yesu atambukiye ku nkengera y’ikiyaga, asanganirwa n’umugabo yarimwo abadayimoni, aje ava mu gisagara citwa Gerasa. Yari amaze igihe kirekire atambara impuzu canke ngo abe mu nzu; yaba mw’itongo ry’abapfuye.
Abonye Yesu, aca akoma induru, yikubita ku birenge vyiwe, asemerera n’ijwi rirenga ati: “Undonderako iki ga Yesu, Mwana w’Imana Musumbavyose? Ndakwinginze ntuntoteze!”

Ivyo yabivuze kuko Yesu yari yategetse iyo mpwemu mbi kumuvamwo. Kenshi iyo mpwemu mbi imufashe, naho bamubohesha iminyororo n’ivyuma amaguru n’amaboko kugira ngo agume hamwe, yarayicagagura, ya mpwemu mbi ikamutwara kuyerera mu gahinga.
Yesu aramubaza ati: “Witwa nde?” Na we arishura ati: “Nitwa Gitero,” kuko yarimwo abadayimoni benshi.
Ba badayimoni binginga Yesu ngo ntabarungike i kuzimu.
Hafi y’aho hari umukuku w’ingurube nyinshi zari ziragiwe ku musozi. Abo badayimoni binginga Yesu ngo abarungike muri izo ngurube, maze arabemerera.
Nuko ba badayimoni bava muri wa muntu, binjira muri za ngurube, na zo ziriruka zimanuka, zisuka mu kiyaga zicwa n’amazi.
Abari baragiye izo ngurube babibonye baca bariruka, baja kubivuga mu gisagara no mu mihana.
Maze abantu bava mu gisagara baza kuraba ivyabaye. Bashitse aho Yesu ari, babona wa muntu yakize abadayimoni, yicaye imbere ya Yesu, yambaye kandi afise ubwenge bukwiye, na bo bagira ubwoba.
Ababonye uko vyagenze baca babiganira ingene uwo muntu yari aboshwe n’abadayimoni yakize.
Nuko abantu bose bo mu ntara ya Gerasene baca binginga Yesu ngo abavireho, kuko bari bagize ubwoba bwinshi. Yesu aca yurira ubwato arigira.
Wa mugabo yakize abadayimoni yinginga Yesu ngo bajane, ariko Yesu aramwankira, amubwira ati:
“Subira i muhira ubarire abantu ivyo Imana yagukoreye.” Wa muntu aca arataha aca hose mu gisagara, agenda arabwira abantu ivyo Yesu yamukoreye.
Yesu asubiye inyuma asanganirwa n’abantu isinzi bari bamurindiriye.
Umugabo yitwa Yayiro, yari umukuru w’isinagogi, araza yikubita imbere y’ibirenge vya Yesu aramwinginga ngo bajane i muhira iwe,
kuko umukobwa wiwe yariko aracikana. Yari amufise wenyene kandi yari afise imyaka nka cumi n’ibiri. Yesu ari mu nzira agenda, yari akikijwe n’abantu isinzi bamugunda.
Hariho umugore yari amaze imyaka cumi n’ibiri agwaye ingwara yo mu gitereko yo kuva amaraso, vyaranse ko akira.
Aca yegera Yesu amuturutse inyuma, akora ku musozo w’impuzu yiwe. Ubwo nyene kwa kuva amaraso guca kurahera.
Yesu aca arabaza ati: “Ni nde ankozeko?” Bose babihakanye, Petero aramubwira ati: “Mwigisha, abantu ni benshi kandi bariko barakugunda.”
Yesu aravuga ati: “Hari umuntu yankozeko kuko hari ubushobozi numvise bumvuyemwo.”
Wa mugore abonye atagishoboye kwinyegeza, aca aza ajugumira, yikubita imbere y’ibirenge vya Yesu, aca amubwirira imbere ya bose icatumye amukorako, kandi ko yaciye akira ako kanya nyene.
Yesu aramubwira ati: “Mwana wanje, ukwizera kwawe kuragukijije. Igire amahoro.”
Akiriko aravuga, haca haza umuntu avuye kwa Yayiro, wa mukuru w’isinagogi, abwira Yayiro ati: “Umukobwa wawe yamaze gucikana. Nta co ubandanya ugora umwigisha.”
Yesu avyumvise aca abarira Yayiro ati: “Ntutinye, ariko wizere, araja gukira.”
Ashitse mu nzu kwa Yayiro ntiyemera ko hagira umuntu n’umwe binjirana, kiretse Petero, Yohana, na Yakobo, hamwe na se na nyina b’uwo mwana.
Ico gihe abantu bose bariko baramuririra. Yesu arababarira ati: “Nta co murira kuko ntiyapfuye, ahubwo arasinziriye.”
Na bo baramutwenga, kuko bari bazi neza ko umwana yapfuye.
Yesu aca afata ukuboko kwa wa mukobwa, amubwira ati: “Mwana wanje, vyuka!”
Ubwo nyene impwemu y’abazima imusubiramwo, arahaguruka. Maze Yesu ababwira ngo bamugaburire.
Abavyeyi biwe baratangara cane, ariko Yesu arabihanikiriza ngo ntihagire uwo babwira ivyabaye.
Umusi umwe Yesu yakoranije bamwe cumi na babiri, abaha ububasha bwo kwirukana abadayimoni no gukiza ingwara,
aca abarungika kwigisha ivy’Ubwami bw’Imana no gukiza abarwaye.
Arababarira ati: “Ntihagire ikintu na kimwe mujana ku rugendo, yaba inkoni, umufuko, ivyokurya, amahera, canke impuzu yo gukuranya.
Aho bazobakira, muzogume muri iyo nzu nyene gushika muvuye muri ico gisagara.
Aho batazobakira, muzokunkumure umukungugu wo mu birenge vyanyu, kugira ngo bizobabere icagiriji.”
Nuko baca bafata inzira, baca mu mihana itandukanye, bavuga Ubutumwa Bwiza, bakiza n’abarwaye aho baca hose.
Herode Antipa avyumvise arazazanirwa, kuko hariho abavuga ngo Yohana Umubatizi yazutse mu bapfuye,
abandi bakavuga ngo Eliya yabiyeretse, abandi na bo bakibaza ngo ni umwe mu bavugishwa n’Imana ba kera yazutse mu bapfuye.
Ariko Herode aravuga ati: “Ko Yohana ari jewe namuciye umutwe, uwo we numva ni nde?” Ni ko guca arondera ingene yomubona.
Intumwa zigarutse ziganira Yesu ivyo zakoze. Yesu aca ajana na zo baja ahiherereye, aharabana n’igisagara citwa Betesayida,
ariko abantu barabimenya, baca baramukurikira. Yesu arabakira, aca atangura kubabwira ivy’Ubwami bw’Imana, akiza n’abari bagwaye.
Bugorovye, bamwe cumi na babiri baza aho Yesu ari bamubwira bati: “Erega rungika aba bantu baje mu bisagara no mu mihana kurondera ivyokurya n’indaro, kuko turi mu gahinga.”
Arabishura ati: “Nimubagaburire mwebwe nyene.” Na bo baramubwira bati: “Erega dufise imikate itanu n’ifi zibiri gusa. None ushaka ko tuja gusuma ibikwiye isinzi ry’abantu nk’iri.”
(Ico gihe hari nk’abagabo ibihumbi bitanu.) Ariko Yesu abarira abigishwa biwe ati: “Nimubicarike mu migwi ya batanu batanu.”
Nuko abantu bose baricara.
Aca afata ya mikate itanu na za fi zibiri, arangamiza mw’ijuru, abishimira Imana. Hanyuma arabimanyagura, abihereza abigishwa ngo bagaburire abantu.
Bose bararya kandi barahaga. Hanyuma Abigishwa begeranya ibiseke cumi na bibiri vyuzuye utumanyu twasigaye.
Umusi umwe Yesu yariko arasenga yiherereye, ari kumwe n’abigishwa biwe. Arababaza ati: “Mbega abantu bavuga ko ndi nde?”
Baramwishura bati: “Bamwe bavuga ngo uri Yohana Umubatizi, abandi ngo uri Eliya, ariko hari n’abavuga ko uri umwe mu bavugishwa n’Imana ba kera yazutse.”
Aca arababaza ati: “None mweho muvuga ko ndi nde?” Petero aramwishura ati: “Uri Kristo yaje ava ku Mana.”
Yesu aca arabihaniza ashimitse ngo ntihagire uwo babibwira
Aca ababwira ati: “Umwana w’Umuntu ategerezwa kubabazwa mu buryo bwinshi, akankwa n’abatware, n’abakuru b’abaherezi n’abigisha b’ivyagezwe. Kandi azokwicwa hanyuma azuke ku musi ugira gatatu.”
Yongera kubabwirira bose hamwe ati: “Uwugomba kunkurikira, ni yihebe, yikorere umusaraba wiwe ku musi ku musi, ankurikire.
Kuko uwugomba gukiza ubugingo bwiwe azobubura, ariko uwubuheba ku bwanje azobukiza.
Vyomarira iki umuntu kuronka ubutunzi bw’isi bwose ariko akabura ubugingo canke akabwonona?
Umuntu wese azogira isoni zo kunyemera no kwemera amajambo yanje, Umwana w’Umuntu na we azogira isoni zo kumwemera niyagaruka ari mu bwiza bwiwe, mu bwa Data no mu bw’abamarayika biwe bera.
Ndababwire ukuri, bamwe mu bo turi kumwe hano ntibazopfa batabonye Ubwami bw’Imana.”
Haheze nk’imisi umunani Yesu ababwiye ivyo, ahitana Petero, Yohana na Yakobo, baduga ku musozi gusenga.
Akiriko arasenga, mu maso hiwe hahinduka ukundi, impuzu ziwe zirakayangana, zica ibibatsi.
Ubwo nyene haboneka abantu babiri: Mose na Eliya,
bari mu bwiza bw’Imana, batangura kuganira na Yesu, bavugana ingene yari agiye kurangiza igikorwa ciwe mu gupfira i Yerusalemu.
Petero na bagenziwe bari basinziriye cane; bikanguye babona ubwiza bwa Yesu, na ba bagabo bari bahagararanye na we.

Mose na Eliya bakiriko baratandukana na Yesu, Petero aramubarira ati: “Mwigisha, bitubereye vyiza kuba hano. Reka tuhashinge amahema atatu: iryawe, irya Mose, n’irya Eliya.” (Ariko Petero ntiyari azi ivyo ariko aravuga.)
Akiriko aravuga, igicu kiraza kirabapfuka. Abo bigishwa bagira ubwoba bwinshi igicu kibatwikiriye.
Maze humvikana ijwi muri ico gicu, rivuga riti: “Uwu ni Umwana wanje natoranije. Nimumwumvirize!”
Iryo jwi rihejeje kwumvikana, basanga Yesu asigaye ari wenyene. Ba bigishwa baca barahora, muri iyo misi ntibabwira umuntu n’umwe ivyo babonye.
Bukeye, bariko baramanuka bava kuri uwo musozi, abantu isinzi baza gusanganira Yesu.
Umwe muri abo bantu arasemerera ati: “Ndakwinginze untabarire umuhungu wanje, kuko ndamufise ari umwe.
Impwemu mbi imufashe, aca atangura gukoma induru, hanyuma ikamujegeza, agaca abimba ifuro mu kanwa. Iramubabaza cane kandi imurekura bigoranye.
Ninginze abigishwa bawe ngo bayirukane ariko vyabananiye.”
Yesu aravuga ati: “Yemwe bantu b’iki gihe mutizera kandi mwononekaye mu mitima, nzobana namwe gushika ryari ndabihanganira? Zana uwo muhungu wawe hano.”
Bariko baramuzana, ya dayimoni imukubita hasi iramujegeza. Ariko Yesu akankamira iyo mpwemu ihumanye, akiza uwo muhungu, amusubiza se.
Abari ngaho bose batangazwa cane n’ububasha bukomeye bw’Imana. Bagitangajwe n’ivyo yari ahejeje gukora, Yesu abwira abigishwa biwe ati:
“Nimunyumvirize neza kandi mushire umutima ku vyo ngira ndababwire: Umwana w’Umuntu agiye gutabwa mu maboko y’abantu.”
Ariko bo ntibatahura ico ababwiye. Insiguro y’ayo majambo yari ihishijwe, bituma batayimenya, kandi batinya no kugira ico babimubazako.
Maze haduka impari hagati mu bigishwa bashaka kumenya umukuru muri bo.
Yesu amenye ivyo bariko bariyumvira mu mitima, aca ahamagara umwana mutoya amuhagarika i ruhande yiwe.
Arababarira ati: “Uwakira umwana muto nk’uwu mw’izina ryanje ni jewe aba yakiriye; kandi uwunyakiriye wese aba yakiriye uwantumye. Uwa nyuma muri mwebwe ni we mukuru muri mwese.”
Yohana aramubwira ati: “Mwigisha, twabonye umuntu yirukana abadayimoni mw’izina ryawe, duca turamubuza kuko atari kumwe natwe.”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Ntimukamubuze, kuko uwutabagwanya aba ari ku ruhande rwanyu.”
Igihe ciwe co kuduzwa mw’ijuru cegereje, Yesu afata ingingo yo kuja i Yerusalemu.
Aca arungika abamwitangira imbere, baja mu mihana y’i Samariya kugira ngo bamutegurire aho azoshikira.
Ariko abantu baho banka kumwakira kuko yari ahaciye aja i Yerusalemu.
Abigishwa biwe Yohana na Yakobo babibonye, babaza Yesu bati: “Mwami, duhamagare umuriro ukoroke uvuye mw’ijuru ubatongore?”
Yesu aca arahindukira, arabakankamira [ati: “Ntimuzi impwemu ibakoresha iyo ari yo! Umwana w’Umuntu ntiyazanywe no guhonya abantu, ahubwo yazanywe no kubakiza.” ]
Nuko baca baja mu yindi mihana.
Bari mu nzira bagenda, umuntu umwe araza abarira Yesu ati: “Nditeguye kugukurikira aho uja hose.”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Imbwebwe zirafise imyobo zibamwo n’inyoni zo mu kirere zirafise ivyari, ariko Umwana w’Umuntu ntagira n’aho akika umusaya.”
Yesu aca abarira uwundi muntu ati: “Nkurikira.” Ariko wa muntu aramwishura ati: “Mwami, ndeka mbanze ngende mpambe data.”
Yesu aramubwira ati: “Reka abapfuye bahambe abapfuye babo, ariko wewe genda uvuge ivy’Ubwami bw’Imana.”
Hanyuma uwundi na we araza avuga ati: “Mwami, ndagukurikira, ariko reka mbanze ngende nsezere umuryango wanje.”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Nta muntu araba inyuma ariko ararimisha inka aba abereye Ubwami bw’Imana.”
Ivyo biheze, Umwami Yesu aca arungika abandi mirongo irindwi na babiri, abarungika ari babiri babiri, ngo babe baramwitangira imbere mu bisagara n’ahandi hantu hose yari yimirije kuja.
Arababarira ati: “Ivyimburwa ni vyinshi, ariko abimbuzi ni bake. Nimwinginge nyene ivyimburwa arungike abimbuzi mu vyimburwa vyiwe.
Nimugende! Ndabarungitse nk’intama mu bikoko vy’inkazi.
Ntihagire amahera, isakoshi canke ibirato vyo gukuranya mwitwaza; kandi ntimuramutse abantu mu nzira.
Igihe cose mwinjiye mu nzu y’umuntu, muzobanze muramutse muti: ‘Amahoro abe kuri iyi nzu.’
Nimwasanga abo muri iyo nzu ari abanyamahoro, umuhezagiro wanyu uzoba kuri bo. Atari uko na ho, umuhezagiro wanyu uzobagarukako.
Muze mugume muri iyo nzu nyene, mufungura kandi munywa ivyo babahaye, kuko umukozi wese abereye impembo yiwe. Ntimuze muve mu nzu muja mu yindi.
Nimwinjira mu gisagara bakabakira, muzofungure ivyo muhasanze.
Mukize abarwaye, mwongere mubabwire muti ‘Ubwami bw’Imana burabegereye.’
Ariko nimwinjira mu gisagara ntibabakire, muzoje mu mayira yaho, muvuge muti:
‘N’umukungugu wo mu gisagara canyu uri ku birenge vyacu turawukunkumuye kugira ngo bibabere icagiriji, ariko mumenye neza ko Ubwami bw’Imana bubegereye.’
Ndababwire ukuri, ku musi w’imanza, i Sodomu hazogira agahengekerezo kurusha ico gisagara.

Uzobona ibara, yewe Korazini! Uzobona ibara yewe Betesayida! Kuko iyo ibitangaza vyakorewe iwanyu bikorerwa i Tiro n’i Sidoni, abaho baba barihanye kuva kera, bakambara amagunira, bakisiga n’iminyota.
Ariko ku musi w’imanza, i Tiro n’i Sidoni hazogira agahengekerezo kurusha mwebwe.
Nawe Kaperinawumu, mbega wibaza ko uzoduzwa gushika mw’ijuru? Haba na mba! Ahubwo uzokororerwa i Kuzimu mu kibanza c’abapfuye.
Uwubumvira ni jewe aba yumviye, kandi uwubanka ni jewe aba yanse. Uwunyanse na we aba yanse uwantumye.”
Bamwe mirongo irindwi na babiri bagarutse, baza bafise umunezero mwinshi bavuga bati: “Mwami, n’abadayimoni baratwumvira mw’izina ryawe.”
Arababwira ati: “Nabonye Satani akoroka nk’umuravyo ava mw’ijuru.
Ehe ndabahaye ububasha bwose bwo kunesha umwansi: muzohonyora inzoka na sikoropiyo muzimene imitwe, kandi nta na kimwe kizogira ico kibagira.
Ariko ntimunezerwe n’uko impwemu mbi zibumvira, ahubwo munezerwe n’uko amazina yanyu yanditse mw’ijuru.”

Muri ako kanya, Yesu yuzura umunezero wa Mpwemu Yera, aca avuga ati: “Ndagushima Data, Mwami w’ijuru n’isi, kuko ivyo wabihishije abigira abanyabwenge n’abahanga, ukabihishurira abameze nk’abana bato. Egome Data, kuko uko ari ko washimye kubikora.
Data yaranyizigiye anzeza vyose. Nta n’umwe azi Umwana atari Data, kandi nta n’umwe azi Data atari Umwana, n’uwo Umwana ahisemwo kumuhishurira.”
Maze arahindukira, abwira abigishwa biwe bonyene ati: “Harahiriwe amaso abona ivyo muriko murabona.
Kuko ndababwira ko abavugishwa n’Imana n’abami benshi bipfuje kubona ivyo muriko murabona ntibabibona, bipfuza no kwumva ivyo muriko murumva, ntibavyumva.”
Umusi umwe, umwigisha w’ivyagezwe yavuye hasi kugira ngo atege Yesu umutego, aramubaza ati: “Mwigisha, nokora iki kugira ngo ndagwe ubugingo budashira?”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Ivyagezwe vya Mose bivuga iki? Ubitahura gute?”
Aramwishura ati: “ ‘Ukundishe Uhoraho Imana yawe umutima wawe wose, ubugingo bwawe bwose, inkomezi zawe zose, ubwenge bwawe bwose’; kandi, ‘Ukunde mugenzawe nk’uko wikunda.’ ”
Yesu aramubwira ati: “Wishuye neza. Genda ubigenze uko, uzobaho ibihe bidashira.”
Ariko wa muntu agomvye kwisigura, aca abaza Yesu ati: “None mugenzanje ni nde?”

Mu kumwishura ico kibazo, Yesu amubwira ati: “Habaye umugabo w’Umuyuda yariko aramanuka ava i Yerusalemu aja i Yeriko, hanyuma agwa mu maboko y’abambuzi. Bamwambura ivyo yari afise vyose, baramukubita, bamusiga ari hafi gupfa.
Maze akirambaraye aho hantu, haca haza umuherezi yari amanukanye iyo nzira nyene. Amubonye, aca kure yiwe ku rundi ruhande rw’inzira, arirenganira.
Hanyuma haca Umulewi na we nyene aramubona, ariko aca aca kure yiwe ku rundi ruhande rw’inzira, arireganira.
Ariko mu nyuma haza Umusamariya, ashika aho wa muntu arambaraye. Amubonye, amutera ikigongwe.
Aca aramwegera, asomoza ibikomere vyiwe umuvinyu, abisiga amavuta ya elayo, hanyuma abipfukisha igitambara. Aca amushira ku ndogoba yiwe, amutwara mu nzu y’ingenzi, abandanya amwitaho.
Bukeye asokorora idenariyo zibiri azisigarana uwujejwe iyo nzu, amubwira ati: ‘Uwu muntu mumwiteho cane. Ninagaruka nzoriha ayo muzoba mwakoresheje arenga kuri aya.’
None muri abo bose, ni nde yabonetse nk’umugenzi w’uwo muntu yaguye mu bambuzi?”
Wa mwigisha w’ivyagezwe aramwishura ati: “Ni uwo yamugiriye impuhwe.” Yesu aca aramubwira ati: “Genda nawe ukore uko.”
Nuko Yesu n’abigishwa biwe babandanije urugendo, bashika mu mihana, ahaba umugore yitwa Marita, na we abaha ikaze iwe.
Marita yari afise mwene nyina yitwa Mariya. Maze Mariya aragenda yicara imbere y’Umwami Yesu, yumviriza inyigisho ziwe.
Ariko Marita we yari yatwawe n’ibikorwa vyinshi vyo gutegura inzimano. Nuko abaza Yesu ati: “Mwami, mbega nta co bikubwiye kubona mwene mama yantanye ibikorwa? Mubwire aze amfashe.”
Ariko Umwami Yesu aramwishura ati: “Marita, Marita, reka guhagarika umutima, wigora muri vyinshi.
Hari ikintu kimwe gusa gikenewe kuruta ibindi. Mariya yahisemwo ikintu ciza, kandi ntazocakwa.”
Umusi umwe Yesu yari ahantu ariko arasenga. Ahejeje, umwe mu bigishwa biwe aramubwira ati: “Mwami, twigishe gusenga nk’uko Yohana yigishije abigishwa biwe.”
Arababwira ati: “Mu gusenga mukwiye kuvuga muti: ‘Data, izina ryawe niryubahwe, Ubwami bwawe nibuze.
Uduhe ivyokurya bidukwiye ku musi ku musi.
Uduharire ivyaha vyacu, kuko natwe duharira umuntu wese aducumuyeko. Ntudutererane ibitugerageza.’ ”
Yongera ababwira ati: “Dufate ko umwe muri mwebwe afise umugenzi, akaja iwe hagati mw’ijoro, akamubwira ati: ‘Mugenzi, ntabara ungurane imikate itatu.
Umwe mu bagenzi banje arangendeye ubu nyene, kandi singira ico ndamuzimana.’
Maze uwo mugenzi wiwe akamwishura ari mu nzu ati: ‘Nta co ungora, namaze kwugara umuryango kandi twe n’abana banje twamaze kuryama. Sinshobora rero kuvyurwa no kuguha imikate.’
Ndababwire ukuri, naho atovyuka ngo amuhe iyo mikate kubera ari umugenzi wiwe, yovyuka akamuha ivyo akeneye vyose kubera yashishikaye kumugobera ata dusoni.
Ni co gituma nanje ndababwiye nti: ‘Musabe muzohabwa, murondere muzoronka, mudodore muzokwugururirwa.’
Kuko uwusaba wese arahabwa, uwurondera araronka, n’uwudodora arugururirwa.
Ni nde muvyeyi muri mwebwe umwana yosaba ifi akamuha inzoka?
Canke amusavye igi akamuha sikoropiyo?
Nimba mwebwe mushobora guha ingabire nziza abana banyu kandi muri babi mu mitima, mbega So wo mw’ijuru ntazorushiriza guha Mpwemu Yera abamumusavye?”
Umusi umwe Yesu yirukanye umudayimoni yari yateye umuntu kuba ikiragi. Amuvuyemwo, wa muntu aca aravuga, maze abantu baratangara cane.
Ariko bamwe muri bo bavuga bati: “Ni Beyelizebuli, umukuru w’abadayimoni amushoboza kwirukana abadayimoni.”
Abandi na bo bagerageza gutega imitego Yesu mu kumusaba ikimenyetso kivuye mw’ijuru.
Yesu amenye ivyo bariko bariyumvira, aca ababwira ati: “Ubwami bwose bwiciyemwo ibice buba bugiye gusenyuka. Kandi iyo umuryango wiciyemwo ibice uba ugiye gusambuka.
Nimba Satani yigwanije, akicamwo ibice, none ubwami bwiwe bworama gute? Ibi ndabivuze kuko munyagiriza ko nirukana abadayimoni mu bushobozi bwa Beyelizebuli.
None nimba Beyelizebuli ari we anshoboza kwirukana abadayimoni, abigishwa banyu bo babishobozwa na nde? Ni co gituma ari bo bazobatsindisha.
Ariko nimba ububasha bw’Imana ari bwo bunshoboza kwirukana abadayimoni, Ubwami bw’Imana bwashitse muri mwebwe.
Iyo umuntu w’umunyenkomezi kandi afise ibigwanisho bikwiye araririye inzu yiwe, ivyo atunze biba mu mutekano.
Ariko iyo atewe n’uwumurusha inkomezi akamunesha, amutwara ivyo bigwanisho yari yizigiye, akamunyaga n’ivyo atunze, akabihako n’abandi.
Uwutari kumwe nanje wese arangwanya, kandi uwutariko aramfasha kwegeranya wese aba ariko arasanzaza.
Iyo impwemu ihumanye ivuye mu muntu, ica igenda iyerera mu bugaragwa irondera aho yoruhukira. Ihabuze ica ivuga iti: ‘Reka nisubirire muri ya nzu nahoramwo.’
Ishitse, iraheza igasanga ya nzu isukuye, kandi itunganije neza.
Maze ica igenda ikazana izindi mpwemu mbi indwi ziyirusha ububi, zikinjira muri wa muntu, zikibera ngaho. Ivya nyuma vy’uwo muntu biba bibi kurusha ivya mbere.”
Yesu akiriko aravuga ivyo, umugore yari ngaho avuga n’ijwi rirenga ati: “Hahiriwe umuvyeyi yakuvyaye akakwonsa.”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Ahubwo hahiriwe abumva ijambo ry’Imana bakarishira mu ngiro.”
Abantu bamaze kumwegera ari benshi, Yesu ababwira ati: “Abantu ba kino gihe ni babi. Basaba ikimenyetso, ariko nta kindi kimenyetso bazohabwa kiretse ica Yona.
Nk’uko Yona yabaye ikimenyetso ku bantu b’i Ninewe, ni ko n’Umwana w’Umuntu azoba ikimenyetso ku bantu ba kino gihe.

Ku musi wo guca imanza, umwamikazi w’i Sheba azohaguruka yagirize abantu ba kino gihe kandi abatsindishe, kuko yahagurutse akava ku mpera z’isi aje kwumviriza amajambo y’ubwenge ya Salomo; ariko raba uwuruta Salomo ari hano.
Ku musi wo guca imanza, abantu b’i Ninewe bazohaguruka bagirize abantu ba kino gihe kandi babatsindishe, kuko bo bihanye bamaze kwumva ubutumwa bwa Yona; ariko raba uwuruta Yona ari hano.
Nta muntu yodomeka itara ngo aheze arihishe canke ngo aryubikeko igiseke. Ariko arishira ku giterekwako itara kugira ngo riboneshereze abinjira mu nzu bose.
Amaso yawe ni yo matara y’umubiri. Iyo amaso yawe abona neza, umubiri wawe wose uba mu muco. Ariko iyo abona nabi, umubiri wawe wose uba mu mwijima.
None rero wiyubare umuco wibaza ko uri muri wewe ntusange ari umwijima.
Vyongeye, umubiri wawe wose niwaba mu muco, ata rugingo na rumwe ruri mu mwijima, uzokayangana nk’aho urasiwe n’umuco w’itara.”
Yesu akiriko aravuga, umwe mu Bafarisayo aramutumira ngo bajane iwe amuzimane. Nuko ashitse, aja ku meza.
Wa Mufarisayo aratangara cane abonye ko Yesu ariye adakaravye.
Maze Umwami Yesu aca amubwira ati: “Mwebwe Abafarisayo mwitwararika cane kwoza inyuma h’igikombe n’ah’isahani, ariko mwuzuye ubukunzi bw’inda n’ubugizi bwa nabi.
Mwa mburabwenge mwe! Mbega Imana yabumvye imbere si yo yabumvye n’inyuma?
Nuko rero nimuhe aboro ku vyo mufise, maze ibindi vyose kuri mwebwe bizoba bihumanuwe.

Muzobona ibara yemwe Bafarisayo, kuko mutanga ikigiracumi kuri vyose, gushika no ku mboga zo mu matongo yanyu, ariko mukirengagiza guca imanza zibereye, no gukunda Imana. Mwari mukwiye gutanga ico kigiracumi, n’ivyo bindi mutavyirengagije.
Muzobona ibara mwebwe Abafarisayo, kuko mukunda ivyicaro vy’icubahiro mu masinagogi no kuramutswa mu cubahiro mu makoraniro.
Muzobona ibara kuko mumeze nk’imva zitaboneka, abantu bakazicako batabizi.”
Umwe mu bigisha b’ivyagezwe aramubwira ati: “Mwigisha, erega uvuze uko natwe uba udututse!”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Namwe bigisha b’ivyagezwe, muzobona ibara kuko muremereza abantu imitwaro iremereye, kandi ubwanyu mutanayikozako urutoke.
Muzobona ibara kuko mwubakira imva z’abavugishwa n’Imana, kandi ari ba sogokuruza banyu babishe.
Muri ivyabona kandi mwemezanya n’ivyo ba sogokuruza banyu bakoze; bo bishe abavugishwa n’Imana, namwe mububakira imva.
Ni co gituma Imana mu bwenge bwayo yavuze iti: ‘Nzobarungikira abavugishwa n’intumwa, bamwe muri bo bazobica, abandi babahame.’
None rero, abantu b’iki gihe muzoharurwako amaraso y’abavugishwa n’Imana bose yasheshwe kuva isi ikiremwa,
uhereye ku ya Abeli ugashitsa ku ya Zakariya yiciwe hagati y’igicaniro n’ihema ry’ibonaniro. Ndababwire ukuri, ingaruka z’ayo maraso yose zizoba ku bantu ba kino gihe.
Muzobona ibara yemwe bigisha b’ivyagezwe kuko mwatwaye urupfunguruzo rwo kumenya Imana. Mwebwe ubwanyu ntimwinjiye mu Bwami, ahubwo mwabujije n’abashaka kwinjira.”
Yesu ahejeje kuvuga ivyo, aca ava aho hantu. Abafarisayo n’abigisha b’ivyagezwe baca batangura kumugwanya cane, bamubaza ibibazo ku bintu bitandukanye,
kugira ngo barabe ko bomufatira ku vyo yovuga.

Muri ako kanya nyene, abantu ibihumbi n’ibihumbi bariko baragwirirana, gushika aho ata waronka aho ahonyora. Yesu aca atangura kubigisha ahereye ku bigishwa biwe, abagabisha ati: “Mwirinde umwambiro w’Abafarisayo, ari bwo buryarya.
Nta cagizwe ibanga kitazomenyekana, kandi nta canyegejwe kitazonyegururwa.
Ivyo mwavugiye ahatabona bizokwumvikanira ahabona, kandi ivyo mwongoreraniye mu vyumba abantu bazobivugira hejuru ku mazu basemerera.
Bagenzi banje, umve ndababwire: ntimugatinye abica umubiri ariko inyuma y’ivyo ata kindi bashobora kubagira.
Ariko ngira ndababwire uwo mukwiye gutinya: mutinye Imana yo ishobora kwica umubiri, ikagira n’ububasha bwo kuwuta mu muriro wa Gehinomu. Ndababwiye ukuri, abe ari yo mutinya.
Mbega utunyoni dutanu ntitugurwa ubusa bw’amahera? Ariko Imana ntiyibagira na kamwe muri two.
Mbere n’imishatsi yo ku mitwe yanyu yaraharuwe yose. Nuko rero ntimutinye, kuko musumvya agaciro utunyoni twinshi.
Ndababwire ukuri, umuntu wese azonyemanga imbere y’abantu, Umwana w’Umuntu na we azomwemanga imbere y’abamarayika b’Imana.
Ariko uwuzonyihakana imbere y’abantu, nanje nzomwihakana imbere y’abamarayika b’Imana.
Kandi umuntu wese atuka Umwana w’Umuntu azobiharirwa, ariko uwutuka Mpwemu Yera ntazobiharirwa.
Nibabashengeza mu masinagogi, imbere y’abatware n’abategetsi, ntimuze muhagarikwe imitima n’ivyo muzokwireguza canke muzovuga.
Mpwemu Yera azobaha ivyo mukwiye kuvuga ako kanya nyene.”
Umwe mu bari ngaho abwira Yesu ati: “Mwigisha, mbwirira uwo tuvukana yemere tugabure ivyo twarazwe.”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Ni nde yangize umucamanza wanyu n’umuhagarikizi wo kubagaburira ivyanyu?”
Aca ababwira ati: “Mube maso, mwirinde guhahamira ivy’isi, kuko ubuzima bw’umuntu ntibuhagaze kw’itunga ryinshi afise.”
Aca abacira umugani ati: “Habaye umugabo w’umutunzi yarimye itongo ryiwe aronka umwimbu mwinshi cane.
Aribwira ati: ‘Mbega nkore iki ko mbuze aho nkwiza umwimbu wanje?’
Aca yigira inama ati: ‘Reka ndabigenze gutya: ndasambura ibigega vyanje hanyuma nubake ibibiruta. Aho ni ho noronka aho mbika ingano zanje n’ubundi butunzi.
Hanyuma mpeze mbwire umutima wanje nti: “Mutima wanje, icara uruhuke, urye, unywe, unezerererwe ubuzima, kuko ufise ibizogutunga imyaka myinshi.” ’
Ariko Imana iramubarira iti: ‘Wa gipfu we, iri joro nyene ubuzima bwawe urabwakwa. None ivyo waruhiye bizoba ivya nde?’
Uko ni ko bizogenda kuri abo bose biyegeraniriza ubutunzi bwabo ariko badatunze mu buryo bw’Imana.”
Yesu aca abwira abigishwa biwe ati: “Ni co gituma ndababwira nti: ntimukiganyire kubera ivyokurya mukeneye kugira ngo mubeho; canke ivyo kwambara imibiri ikeneye.
Ubuzima buraruta cane ivyokurya, kandi umubiri uraruta cane ivyambarwa.
Nimwitegereze ibikona: ntibibiba kandi ntivyimbura, ntibigira n’ububiko canke ibigega, ariko Imana irabigaburira. None mwebwe ntimuruta cane inyoni?
Ni nde muri mwebwe yoshobora kwiyongera akanya na gatoya ko kubaho kubera kwiganyira?
Nimba mutishoboza ikintu gito nk’ico, ni kuki mwiganyira ku bindi?
Nimwitegereze ingene amashurwe yo ku misozi akura. Ntakora kandi ntajisha impuzu. Ariko ndababwiye ko na Salomo ubwiwe mu cubahiro ciwe cose atigeze ashaza nka rimwe muri yo.
Nimba Imana yambika gutyo ivyatsi vyo ku misozi, biriho uno musi ariko ejo bikazotererwa mu ziko, mbega ntizorushirizaho kubambika, yemwe ab’ukwizera guke!
Kandi ntimugashire umutima ku vyo muzorya canke muzonywa; ntimukiganyire kuri ivyo.
Kuko n’abantu bo mu mahanga yose yo kw’isi na bo ivyo ni vyo birukira ubudahumeka, ariko mweho So wo mw’ijuru arazi ko ivyo vyose mubikeneye.
Ahubwo nimubanze mwitwararike Ubwami bw’Imana, ivyo na vyo izobibaha nk’inyongera.
Yewe busho buto, ntutinye kuko So wo mw’ijuru bimuhimbara kuguha Ubwami.
Nimugurishe ivyo mutunze, mubihe aboro. Mwironderere imifuko ibika amahera itazoshira, n’ubutunzi budahera bwo mw’ijuru, aho abasuma badashika, n’imiswa itazobwonona.
Kuko aho ubutunzi bwanyu buri ari ho imitima yanyu izoba.
Mwame mukenyeye kandi amatara yanyu yame yaka,
mumere nk’abanyarugo barindiriye ko shebuja ava mu bukwe kugira ngo bace bamwugururira niyashika akadodora.
Hahiriwe abo bakozi shebuja azosanga bagiteramye bamurindiriye. Ndababwije ukuri ko na we azokenyera akabicarika, hanyuma akabagaburira.
Harahiriwe abo bakozi shebuja azosanga bagiteramye bamurindiriye, naho yoza mu gicugu canke bugiye guca.
Mutahure ibi: iyaba nyene inzu yomenye isaha igisuma kizira ko, ntiyokwemera ko kimena inzu yiwe.
Namwe mukwiye kwama mugavye, kuko Umwana w’Umuntu azoza mu gihe mutamwiteze.”
Petero aramubaza ati: “Mwami, uwu mugani uwuciriye twebwe gusa, canke uwuciriye bose?”
Umwami Yesu aramwishura ati: “Mbega umunyabigega w’umwizigirwa kandi w’umunyabwenge ni nde? Ni uwo shebuja ashobora guha ubukuru bwo kuganza abandi bakozi no kubagaburira mu gihe gikwiye.
Azoba ahiriwe uwo mukozi shebuja azosanga akora gutyo niyagaruka.
Ndababwire ukuri, azoshika amuzeza ivyo atunze vyose.
Ariko vyogenda gute hamwe uwo mukozi yokwibwira mu mutima ati: ‘Databuja yatevye kugaruka,’ hanyuma agatangura gukubita abandi bakozi, akirira, akinywera, akiborererwa?
Shebuja azoshika umusi uwo mukozi atari yiteze ko ashikirako, no kw’isaha atazi. Azomuhimbagura hanyuma amusangize ikibanza n’abatizera.
Uwo mukozi yari asanzwe azi ivyo shebuja agomba hanyuma ntavyitegurire ngo abikore, azohanwa bikomeye.
Ariko uwutazi ivyo shebuja agomba, hanyuma agakora ibitari vyo, azohanwa buhoro. Uwahawe vyinshi azosabwa vyinshi, kandi ujwejwe vyinshi azobazwa vyinshi.
Naje kwatsa umuriro kw’isi; ese iyo uba umaze kwaka!
Hari umubatizo ntegerezwa kubatizwa, kandi mpagaritswe umutima na wo kugeza ndawubatijwe.
Mbega mwiyumvira ko naje kuzana amahoro kw’isi? Haba na mba! Ahubwo naje gutuma abantu bacanamwo.
Uhereye ubu, mu muryango w’abantu batanu bazocanamwo, batatu bagwanye babiri, babiri bagwanye batatu.
Umugabo azogwanya umuhungu wiwe, umuhungu na we agwanye se; umugore azogwanya umukobwa wiwe, umukobwa na we agwanye nyina; umugore azogwanya umukazana wiwe, umukazana na we agwanye inabukwe.”
Yongera abwira isinzi ry’abantu bari aho ati: “Iyo mubonye igicu kivuye mu burengero, ubwo nyene muca muvuga muti: ‘Imvura igira igwe,’ kandi biba uko nyene.
Mubonye umuyaga uhuhuse uva mu bumanuko, muca muvuga muti: ‘Hagira haze ubushuhe,’ kandi bica biba uko nyene.
Mwa ndyarya mwe, ko mushobora gutahura ibimenyetso vy’ibihe murabiye ku biba kw’isi no kw’ijuru, ni igiki kibabuza gutahura ivy’iki gihe?
Ni kuki mudashobora guca urubanza, mugahitamwo ikibereye?

Nihagira umuntu aja kukwagiriza ku mucamanza, wihutire kwiyuzuza na we mutarashikayo. Ahandi ho, azogushikana imbere y’umucamanza, hanyuma na we agutange ku mukuru w’ibohero, maze na we agute mw’ibohero.
Ndakubwire ukuri, ntuzovayo utarishe n’igiceri ca nyuma umuheraniye.”
Bamwe mu bari ngaho baca babwira Yesu inkuru y’abantu b’i Galilaya Pilato yishe akavanga amaraso yabo n’ay’ibimazi bariko baratanga.
Yesu arababwira ati: “Mbega mwibaza ko abo bantu b’i Galilaya bababajwe gutyo kubera bari abanyavyaha kurusha abandi Banyagalilaya?
Haba na mba! Ariko nimutihana namwe muzohona nka bo.
Canke mwibaza ko bamwe cumi n’umunani bapfa igihe umunara wabagwako i Silowamu bari abanyavyaha kurusha ababa i Yerusalemu bose?
Haba na mba! Ariko nimutihana namwe muzohona nka bo.”
Aca abacira uwu mugani ati: “Umuntu umwe yari afise igiti c’umusukoni giteye mu murima wiwe w’imizabibu. Umusi umwe aja kuraba ko hari icamwa yosangako, arabura.
Aca abarira umukozi yari ajejwe uwo murima ati: ‘Maze imyaka itatu nza kurondera ivyamwa kuri uwu musukoni, ariko singire ico ndonka. Giteme, kuko nta cotuma kibandanya conona isi.’
Wa mukozi aramubarira ati: ‘Databuja, cihanganire uwundi mwaka, ndakibagarire nongere ndagitabire.
Nicama bizoba ari vyiza, nikitama na ho uzoheza ugiteme.’ ”
Umusi umwe Yesu yariko arigisha mw’isinagogi kandi hari kw’Isabato.
Aho hari umugore yari amaze imyaka cumi n’umunani amugajwe n’impwemu mbi. Yari yarahetamye umugongo, ntiyashobora kugororoka.
Yesu amubonye aca aramuhamagara ngo aze aho ari, amubwira ati: “Mupfasoni, ingwara yawe irakize.”
Aca amurambikako ibiganza. Ako kanya nyene, aca aragororoka, ahimbaza Imana.

Ariko umukuru w’isinagogi ababazwa n’uko Yesu akijije umuntu ku musi w’Isabato. Aca abarira abari aho ati: “Imisi y’ibikorwa ni itandatu. Muzohore muza gukizwa ingwara muri iyo misi, ariko atari ku musi w’Isabato.”
Umwami Yesu aca arishura ati: “Mwa ndyarya mwe! Ni nde muri mwebwe atozitura inka canke indogoba yiwe mu ruhongore ku musi w’Isabato ngo ayijane kunywa amazi?
Mbega uwu mugore akaba n’umukobwa wa Aburahamu yari amaze imyaka cumi n’umunani aboshwe na Satani, ntiyari akwiye kubohorwa, naho ari ku musi w’Isabato?”
Avuze ivyo, abamugwanya bose baramaramara. Ariko abandi bose bari banezerejwe cane n’ibitangaza yariko arakora.
Nuko Yesu aravuga ati: “Mbega Ubwami bw’Imana bumeze nk’iki? Nobugereranya n’iki?
Bumeze nk’akabuto k’igiterwa citwa mutaride umuntu yateye mu murima wiwe, karakura gahinduka igiti, maze inyoni zo mu kirere ziraza zarika mu mashami yaco.”
Yongerako ati: “Ubwami bw’Imana nobugereranya n’iki?
Bugereranywa n’umwambiro umugore akoresha mu gukora imikate. Naho yokoresha umwambiro muke mw’ifu ingana n’ibiro mirongo ibiri na bitanu, uwo mwambiro muke utuma igikandu cose gikakama.”
Nuko Yesu aca mu bisagara no mu mihana yigisha, yerekeye i Yerusalemu.
Umuntu umwe aramubaza ati: “Mwami, ubwo abakizwa ntibazoba bake?” Yesu aramwishura ati:
“Mugire umwete wo guca mw’irembo ryaga, kuko ndababwire ukuri, benshi bazogerageza kwinjira ariko ntibabishobore.
Nyene inzu niyahaguruka akugara umuryango, muzohagarara inyuma mudodora, mutakamba muti: ‘Nyakwubahwa, twugururire.’ Na we azobishura ati: ‘Sindabazi kandi sinzi n’iyo muva.’
Namwe muzovuga muti: ‘Twarira kandi twanywera imbere yawe, mbere wigishiriza mu mabarabara y’iwacu.’
Ariko azobishura ati: ‘Sindabazi kandi sinzi n’iyo muva. Mviraho mwa nkozi z’ibibi mwe!’
Ni ho hazoba amarira no guhekenya amenyo kubera umubabaro, nimwabona Aburahamu, Isaka na Yakobo n’abavugishwa bose mu Bwami bw’Imana, namwe muterewe hanze.
Abantu bazova mu buseruko no mu burengero, mu buraruko no mu bumanuko, bahabwe ivyicaro mu mazimano mu Bwami bw’Imana.
Kandi mumenye ko hari bamwe mu bari inyuma bazoba ab’imbere, na bamwe mu bari imbere bazoba ab’inyuma.”
Ico gihe, bamwe mu Bafarisayo baca baza aho Yesu ari, bamubwira bati: “Va ngaha ugende, kuko Herode Antipa agomba kukwica.”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Genda mubwire iyo mbwebwe ko ndiko ndirukana abadayimoni nongera nkiza abarwaye uno musi n’ejo; ku musi ugira gatatu nzoba ndangije igikorwa canje.
Uko biri kwose, ntegerezwa kubandanya urugendo rwanje uno musi n’ejo na hirya y’ejo, kuko nta handi umuvugishwa akwiriye kwicirwa atari i Yerusalemu.

Yewe Yerusalemu, yewe Yerusalemu! Wewe wica abavugishwa n’Imana, ugatera amabuye abagutumweko. Ni kangahe nagerageje kwegeranya abana bawe nk’uko inkoko yegerenya imiswi yayo mu mababa yayo, ariko ukanyankira!
None raba inzu yanyu igiye kuba akahebwe. Ndababwira ukuri ko mutazosubira kumbona kugeza aho muzovugira muti: ‘Hahezagirwe uwuje mw’izina ry’Uhoraho.’ ”
Umusi umwe, hari kw’Isabato, Yesu aja kuzimanwa mu nzu y’umwe mu bakuru b’Abafarisayo, kandi abari ngaho bose bari bamuhanze amaso, bamugenza.
Imbere yiwe hari umugabo arwaye ingwara yo kuvyimba umubiri.
Yesu abaza Abafarisayo n’abigisha b’ivyagezwe ati: “Mbega biremewe gukiza umuntu ku musi w’Isabato?”
Ariko ntibagira ico bamwishura. Maze Yesu aca amukorako, aramukiza, aramurungika arigira.
Aca ababaza ati: “Ni nde muri mwebwe yoba afise umwana akagwa mu kinogo ntamukureyo, canke inka yiwe ikagwayo ntayikureyo, ngo ni uko ari ku musi w’Isabato?”
Na ho nyene ntibashobora kuronka ico bamwishura.
Yesu abonye ukuntu abatumire bahitamwo ivyicaro vy’imbere, aca abacira umugani ati:
“Nibagutumira mu bukwe, ntuze uhitemwo icicaro c’imbere, kuko bishoboka ko hari uwugusumvya icubahiro yatumiwe.
Muri ico gihe, nyene urubanza azoza akubwire ati: ‘Mubise yicare.’ Maze uzogenda uramaramara kwicara mu kibanza c’inyuma ya bose.
Ariko nibagutumira, uze uhitemwo icicaro c’inyuma kugira ngo nyene urubanza abe ari we aza akubwire ati: ‘Mugenzi, kaze mu cicaro c’imbere.’ Ico gihe uzoba utewe iteka imbere y’abandi batumire bose.
Kuko uwishira hejuru wese azocishwa bugufi, ariko uwicisha bugufi azoshirwa hejuru.”
Yesu aca abarira uwamutumiye ati: “Niwategura umusi mukuru, ntuze utumire abagenzi, abavukanyi, incuti, canke ababanyi batunze. Kuko na bo bazogutumira, maze impera yawe ibe iyo.
Ahubwo niwategura umusi mukuru, uze utumire abakene, ibimuga, abacumbagira n’impumyi.
Aho ni ho uzohezagirwa. Naho badashobora kubikwishura, Imana izobiguhembera mw’izuka ry’abagororotsi.”
Umwe mu bari ngaho ahejeje kwumva ayo majambo, aca abarira Yesu ati: “Harahiriwe uwuzofungura ku mazimano yo mu Bwami bw’Imana.”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Habaye umuntu yateguye umusi mukuru, atumira abantu benshi.
Igihe co kuzimana kigeze, atuma umukozi wiwe kubwira abatumire ati: ‘Nimuze, vyose vyatunganye.’
Ariko bose baca batangura kwerekana ibibafatiriye bituma batoza. Uwa mbere ati: ‘Unyihanganire, mpejeje kugura itongo, ngira nje kuriraba.’
Uwundi na we ati: ‘Ndakwingize umbabarire, naguze inka cumi zirima, ngiye gusuzuma ko zikora neza.’
Uwundi na we ati: ‘Sinshobora kuza kuko narongoye.’

Wa mukozi aragaruka abwira shebuja ingene vyagenze. Maze na we arashavura cane, aca amubwira ati: ‘Genda mu mabarabara no mu mayira yo mu gisagara, uzane abakene, abacumbagira, impumyi, hamwe n’ibimuga.’
Ahejeje kubikora, wa mukozi abwira shebuja ati: ‘Databuja, ivyo wantumye nabikoze, ariko haracasigaye ibibanza bigaragara.’
Shebuja aramubarira ati: ‘Genda mu mayira y’inyuma y’igisagara no mu mirombero, ugobere abantu baze kugira ngo inzu yanje yuzure.
Ndababwire ukuri, nta n’umwe mu bo nari natumiye ubwa mbere aja no kwumviriza ku mazimano yanje.’ ”
Yesu ari mu nzira agenda, hari isinzi ry’abantu bari bamukurikiye. Maze Yesu, arahindukira ababwira ati:
“Uwugomba kunkurikira ariko ntiyanke se, canke nyina, canke umugore wiwe, canke abana, canke abo bavukana, ndetse n’ubuzima bwiwe na bwo, ntashobora kuba umwigishwa wanje.
Kandi uwutikorera umusaraba wiwe ngo ankurikire, ntashobora kuba umwigishwa wanje.
Ni nde muri mwebwe agomvye kwubaka igorofa, atobanza kwicara ngo aharure neza ko afise ivyo kuyuzuza?
Kuko niyamara kwubaka umushinge hanyuma ntashobore kuyuzuza, abazoyibona bose bazomutwenga,
bivugire bati: ‘Uwu muntu yatanguye kwubaka inzu ntiyashobora kuyuzuza.’
Canke, mbega umwami afise abasoda ibihumbi cumi atewe n’uwundi mwami afise abasoda ibihumbi mirongo ibiri, ntiyobanza kwicara akaraba neza ko yoshobora kugwanya uwo mwami amuteye?
Abonye ko atoshobora kumugwanya, aca arungika intumwa ku wumuteye akiri kure, kugira ngo babaze ivyotuma babana amahoro.
Nuko rero, umuntu wese muri mwebwe adaheba ivyiwe vyose, ntashobora kuba umwigishwa wanje.
Umunyu ni ngirakamaro. Ariko iyo umaze gutakaza uburyohe bwawo, mbega bwosubiramwo gute?
Nta co uba ukimarira ivu canke umwavu wo muri nyabarega; haba hasigaye kuwuta hanze. Uwufise amatwi yo kwumva niyumve!”
Umusi umwe abatozakori n’abanyavyaha bari bakikije Yesu bamwumviriza.
Maze Abafarisayo n’abigisha b’ivyagezwe batangura kwidodomba bati: “Uwu mugabo yicarana n’abanyavyaha, agasangira na bo!”
Yesu aca abacira uwu mugani ati:
“Hamwe muri mwebwe hoba hari uwufise intama ijana hanyuma imwe muri zo ikazimira, ntiyosiga izo mirongo icenda n’icenda mu gahinga, akaja kurondera iyo yazimiye gushika ayitoye?
Kandi ayitoye yoyiterera ku rutugu anezerewe.
Ashitse i muhira, yoca ahamagara ababanyi n’abagenzi akababwira ati: ‘Nimuze tunezeranwe kuko natoye intama yanje yari yazimiye.’
Ndababwire ukuri, no mw’ijuru haba umunezero mwinshi iyo umunyavyaha umwe yihanye gusumba uwo bagirira abagororotsi mirongo icenda n’icenda badakeneye kwihana.
Canke nk’umugore yoba afise ibiceri cumi vy’ifeza, hanyuma kimwe kigatakara, mbega ntiyokwatsa itara, agakubura inzu yose, akakirondera gushika agitoye?
Kandi agitoye yohamagara ababanyi n’abagenzi bose, akababwira ati: ‘Nimuze tunezeranwe kuko natoye igiceri canje c’ifeza cari catakaye.’
Ni ko n’abamarayika b’Imana bagira umunezero iyo umunyavyaha umwe yihanye.”
Yesu abandanya ababwira ati: “Habaye umugabo yari afise abahungu babiri.
Umusi umwe, umuhungu muto aritora abarira se ati: ‘Data, mpa umugabane w’ubutunzi norazwe.’ Nuko se abagaburira ubutunzi bwiwe.
Haciye imisi mike wa muhungu muto yegeranya ubutunzi bwiwe, aja mu gihugu ca kure, yononera rya tunga ryiwe mu buhumbu.
Amaze gusesagura bwa butunzi bwose, haca hatera amapfa muri ico gihugu, maze wa muhungu arakena.
Nuko aja gushumbira umuntu wo muri ico gihugu, na we amurungika mu mirima yiwe kumuragirira ingurube.
Uwo muhungu arasonza gushika aho yipfuza ivyokurya vy’ingurube, ariko na vyo nta n’umwe yabimuha.
Ariko umusi umwe akenge karagaruka, aribwira ati: ‘Kwa data hari abakozi benshi kandi bararya bagasigaza, ariko jeho inzara igira inyicire hano.
Ngira mpaguruke nsubire kwa data ndamubwire nti: Data naracumuye ku Mana yo mw’ijuru, ncumura no kuri wewe.
Sinkibereye kwitwa umwana wawe; ntabara umfate nk’umwe mu bakozi bawe.’
Nuko afata akayira aja kwa se. Akiri kure, se aramubona, afatwa n’ibigumbagumba, ariruka aja kumusanganira, aramugumbira, aramusomagura.
Wa muhungu abarira se ati: ‘Data, naracumuye ku Mana yo mw’ijuru, ncumura no kuri wewe. Sinkibereye kwitwa umwana wawe.’
Ariko se aca abarira abakozi biwe ati: ‘Nimwihute muzane ikanzu nziza iruta izindi muyimwambike, mumwambike n’impeta ku rutoke, n’ibirato ku birenge.
Hanyuma muzane n’impfizi ivyibushe muyibage, turye, tunezerwe,
kuko umwana wanje yari yarapfuye none arazutse, yari yarazimiye none arazimurutse.’ Nuko baca batangura kugira umusi mukuru.
Igihe ivyo vyaba, umuhungu mukuru yari mu murima. Ariko arataha, yegereye i muhira, yumva abacuraranga n’abatamba.
Aca ahamagara umwe mu bakozi amubaza ibiriko biraba.
Aramwishura ati: ‘Wa muhungu muvukana yagarutse, so aca abaga impfizi ivyibushe, kuko yagarutse akiri muzima.’
Wa muhungu mukuru aca arashavura, yanka no kwinjira mu nzu. Se aca arasohoka aja kumuhoyahoya,
ariko uwo muhungu aramwishura ati: ‘Data, raba iyi myaka yose maze ndagukorera, numvira amategeko yawe yose. Ariko ntiwigeze umpa n’impene ikiri nto kugira ngo nezeranwe n’abagenzi banje.
Ariko raba uwu muhungu wawe yononeye itunga ryose mu bamaraya, aragarutse uca umubagira impfizi ivyibushe!’
Se aramubwira ati: ‘Mwana wanje, wewe turamana imisi yose, kandi ivyo mfise vyose ni ivyawe.
Vyari bikwiye ko tugira umusi mukuru tukanezerwa kuko umuvukanyi wawe yari yarapfuye none arazutse, yari yarazimiye none arazimurutse.’ ”
Inyuma y’aho Yesu abwira abigishwa biwe ati: “Habaye umutunzi yari afise umunyabigega asesagura.
Umusi umwe aramuhamagara, amubaza ati: ‘Ivyo ndakwumvako ni ibiki? Harura ivyo nakujeje ubinsubize, kuko ntukibereye kuzezwa ubutunzi bwanje.’
Wa munyabigega aca aribaza ati: ‘Mbega ndabigenza gute ko databuja agira ankure mu kazi? Nta nkomezi mfise zo kurima, kandi gusega vyontera isoni.
Ndatoye ico ngiye gukora, kugira ngo ninava muri aya mabanga, abantu bazompe indaro.’
Maze ahamagara abo yahaye amadeni bose. Uwa mbere amubaza ati: ‘Databuja umuheraniye ibingana gute?’
Na we yishura ati: ‘Utugunguru ijana tw’amavuta ya elayo.’ Wa munyabigega aca amubwira ati: ‘Akira urupapuro wandike utugunguru mirongo itanu.’
Abaza uwa kabiri na we ati: ‘Databuja umuheraniye ibingana gute?’ Na we yishura ati: ‘Imifuko ijana y’ingano.’ Aca amubwira ati: ‘Akira urupapuro wandike mirongo umunani.’
Maze shebuja ashima amayeri uwo munyabigega asesagura yakoresheje. Ni ko n’abana b’iyi si bazi ubwenge bwo kwitunganiriza ivy’ubuzima kurusha abana b’umuco.
Umve ndababwire: Ubutunzi bwanyu bwo mw’isi nimubukoreshe mu kwironderera abagenzi, kugira ngo nibwahera muzokwakirwe mu mazu y’ibihe bidashira.
Uwubaye umwizigirwa muri bike azozezwa vyinshi, kandi uwuzotakaza ubwizigirwa muri bike azobutakaza no kuri vyinshi.
None mutabaye abizigirwa mu vy’ubutunzi bwa hano kw’isi, ni nde yobazeza ivy’ubutunzi nyakuri?
Kandi mutabaye abizigirwa mu gutunganya ivy’ubutunzi bw’abandi, ni nde azobaha ubutunzi mwiganzira?

Nta mukozi n’umwe yoshobora gushimisha abakoresha babiri: agerageje kunezereza umwe, yosanga yababaje uwundi; kandi agerageje kuba umwizigirwa kuri umwe, yosanga yahemukiye uwundi. Nta muntu ashobora gukoreshwa n’Imana ngo yongere akoreshwe n’amahera.”
Abafarisayo, kubera ko bakunda amahera cane, bumvise ivyo vyose baca baramutwenga.
Na we arababwira ati: “Mwebwe mwigira abagororotsi mu maso y’abantu, ariko Imana irazi imitima yanyu. Kuko ivyo abantu baha agaciro kanini ari ibisesema imbere y’Imana.
Igihe c’ivyagezwe vya Mose n’abavugishwa cagarukiye kuri Yohana. Kuva ico gihe, ubutumwa bwiza bw’Ubwami bw’Imana buravugwa, kandi abinjira muri ubwo Bwami barabubandanira.
Ariko biroroshe cane ko ijuru n’isi bikurwaho, hako agakwabu ko mu vyagezwe kokurwaho.
Umugabo yirukanye umugore wiwe hanyuma akarongora uwundi mugore aba asambanye, kandi umugabo arongoye umugore yahukanye aba asambanye.
Habaye umutunzi yama yambaye mpuzu nziza z’igiciro kinini, kandi mu buzima bwiwe bwa misi yose yibera mu misi mikuru.
Kw’irembo ryiwe hama haryamye umukene yitwa Lazaro, asega.
Umubiri wiwe wari wuzuye ibikomere, akama yipfuza utwo kurya dukorotse tuva ku meza y’uwo mutunzi, mbere n’imbwa zama ziza kurigata ivyo bikomere vyiwe.
Igihe carageze uwo mworo arapfa, maze abamarayika baraza bamudugana mu gikiriza ca Aburahamu. Mu nyuma, wa mutunzi na we arapfa, arahambwa,
Ariko arababarizwa i kuzimu, yunamura amaso abona Aburahamu ari kure cane, na Lazaro ari mu gikiriza ciwe.
Wa mutunzi arasemerera ati: ‘Data Aburahamu, ngirira ikigongwe, urungike Lazaro, akoze isonga ry’urutoke rwiwe mu mazi, ampfuvye ku rurimi kuko ndiko ndababarizwa cane muri uno muriro.’
Ariko Aburahamu aramwishura ati: ‘Mwana wanje, ibuka ingene mu buzima bwawe kw’isi waronse ivyo wipfuza vyose, Lazaro na we aba mu magorwa menshi. Ubu ariko arahozwa, na we uri mu mibabaro.
Kandi uretse n’ivyo, hagati yacu na wewe hari imanga nini ku buryo ata wushobora kuva ino ngo aze iyo, kandi ata wushobora kuva iyo ngo aze ino.’
Wa mutunzi arishura ati: ‘Ndakwinginze data Aburahamu, rungika Lazaro agende mu muryango kwa data.
Ndafise abo tuvukana batanu, nshaka ko agenda kubaburira kugira ngo na bo ntibaze baze hano hantu ho kubabarizwa.’
Aburahamu aramwishura ati: ‘Bafise ivyagezwe vya Mose n’ivyanditswe n’abavugishwa; nibabikurikize.’
Wa mutunzi na we ati: ‘Oya data Aburahamu, ivyo ntibikwiye. Kumbure hagize uwugenda avuye mu bapfuye bokwihana.’
Ariko Aburahamu aramwishura ati: ‘Batumviye Mose n’abavugishwa n’Imana, nta wundi bokwumvira, n’aho yoba azutse mu bapfuye.’ ”
Umusi umwe Yesu yabwiye abigishwa biwe ati: “Ibituma abantu bacumura ntibizoreka kuza, ariko aragowe umuntu abizana.
Ikimukwiye ni uko yoboherwa ibuye rinini kw’izosi, agatererwa mu kiyaga, hako atuma hagira n’umwe muri aba bato acumura.
Nuko rero mwiyubare mu vyo mukora. Umuvukanyi wawe niyacumura, umwihanize. Niyihana, umuharire.
Niyagucumurako incuro indwi ku musi, akagaruka incuro indwi nyene akubwira ati: ‘Ndihanye mbabarira,’ uze umuharire.”
Intumwa zibwira Umwami Yesu ziti: “Mwigisha, twongerereze ukwizera.”
Arabishura ati: “Iyo muba mwari mufise ukwizera kungana n’akabuto k’igiterwa citwa mutaride, mwobwiye iki giti muti ‘Randuka, ushingwe mu kiyaga,’ kandi cobumviye.
Ni nde muri mwebwe, afise umukozi, yohengera avuye kurima canke kuragira, akamubwira ati: ‘Kaze ku meza dufungure’?
Mbega ntaca avuga ati: ‘Ntegurira imfungurwa, hanyuma wambare neza ungaburire, ninaheza gufungura na we uraheza ufungure’?
Mbega arashimira uwo mukozi ko yakoze ivyo yamutegetse vyose? Haba na mba!
Nuko rero namwe nimwaheza gukora ivyo mwategetswe vyose, muze muvuge muti: ‘Turi abakozi b’imburakimazi, twakoze ivyo dutegerezwa gukora.’ ”
Yesu ariko araja i Yerusalemu, aca ku rubibe rwa Samariya na Galilaya.
Agira ashikire imihana, haza abanyamibembe cumi baza guhura na we, ariko bahagarara kure yiwe.
Barasemerera bati: “Yesu, Mwigisha, tugirire impuhwe!”
Ababonye, arababwira ati: “Nimugende, mwiyereke abaherezi.” Bakiri mu nzira bagenda, baca barakira imibembe, barahumanuka.
Umwe muri bo abonye ko yakize, aca asubira inyuma aho Yesu yari ari, ashima Imana n’ijwi rirenga.
Amushikiriye, yikubita imbere y’ibirenge vyiwe, aramushimira. Kandi yari Umusamariya.
Yesu arabaza ati: “Mbega abakize bagahumanuka ntibari cumi? None abandi icenda bari he?
Nta n’umwe yagarutse guha icubahiro Imana atari uwu munyamahanga?”
Aca aramubwira ati: “Haguruka wigire, ukwizera kwawe kwagukijije.”
Umusi umwe Abafarisayo babajije Yesu aho Ubwami bw’Imana buzozira, na we arabishura ati: “Ubwami bw’Imana ntibuza mu buryo bubonwa n’amaso,
kandi nta wuzovuga ngo: ‘Ehe buri hano’ canke ngo: ‘Ehe buri hariya.’ Kuko Ubwami bw’Imana buri hagati muri mwebwe.”
Aca abwira abigishwa biwe ati: “Hazogera igihe mwipfuza kubona n’umusi umwe mu misi y’Umwana w’Umuntu, ariko ntimuzowubona.
Abantu bazobabwira bati: ‘Ehe ari hariya!’ Canke ngo: ‘Ehe ari hano!’ Ntimuze mujeyo canke ngo mubakurikire.
Kuko nk’uko umuravyo uravya ukaboneshereza ijuru ryose, ni ko bizomera Umwana w’Umuntu niyaza ku musi wiwe.
Ariko azobanza kubabazwa cane no kwankwa n’abantu b’iki gihe.
Nk’uko vyari bimeze mu gihe ca Nowa, ni ko bizomera no mu gihe c’Umwana w’Umuntu.
Bararya, baranywa, bararongora, bagashingiza, gushika umusi Nowa yinjiye mu bwato, maze umwuzure ukaza ukabatikiza bose.
Ni ko vyari bimeze no mu gihe ca Loti. Bararya, baranywa, barasuma, baradandaza, bararima, barubaka amazu,
gushika umusi Loti yaviriye i Sodomu, maze umuriro n’ibizuku bikoroka bivuye mw’ijuru, birabarigita bose.
Ni ko bizoba no ku musi Umwana w’Umuntu azohishurirwako.
Kuri uwo musi, uwuzoba ari hejuru ku nzu, ntazosubire mu nzu kurondera ivyiwe. N’uwuzoba ari mu murima, ntaze asubire i muhira.
Mwibuke ivyashikiye muka Loti.
Uwugomba gukiza ubugingo bwiwe azobubura, ariko uwuzobuheba azobukiza.
Ndababwire, abantu babiri bazoba baryamye ku buriri bumwe, umwe azojanwa, uwundi asigare.
Abagore babiri bazoba bariko barasya hamwe, umwe ajanwe, uwundi asigare. [
Abagabo babiri bazoba bari kumwe mu murima, umwe ajanwe, uwundi asigare.” ]
Maze abigishwa baramubaza bati: “None ivyo bizobera he ga Mwami?” Na we arabishura ati: “Aho umuvyimba uzoba uri, ni ho ibikona bizokoranira.”
Yesu aca abacira umugani, kugira ngo abereke ko bakwiye kwama basenga, ntibadendebukirwe.
Arababwira ati: “Mu gisagara kimwe habaye umucamanza atubaha Imana kandi atasonera n’abantu.
Kandi muri ico gisagara hari umugore yama aza kumwinginga ati: ‘Ncira urubanza runkiza uwundenganya.’
Uwo mucamanza amara igihe atamwumviriza. Ariko arateba aribwira ati: ‘Ni vyo, nsintinya Imana kandi sinsonera n’abantu,
ariko kubera uwu mupfakazi arangoye cane; ngira ndamutunganirize kugira ngo ntabandanye aza kunduhisha.’ ”
Umwami Yesu yongerako ati: “Nimwumve ivyo uwo mucamanza agabitanya yavuze.
Mbega Imana ntizotunganiriza abo yatoranije, bayitakambira ijoro n’umurango? Mbega mwibaza ko izobatevya?
Ndababwire ukuri, izokwihuta kubatunganiriza. Ariko none, aho Umwana w’Umuntu azogarukira, azosanga ukwizera kw’isi?”
Yesu yongera acira uwu mugani abishimira ukugororoka kwabo bagakengera abandi, ati:
“Abantu babiri baduze mu rusengero gusenga, umwe yari Umufarisayo uwundi akaba umutozakori.
Wa Mufarisayo ahagarara ukwiwe, asenga avuga ati: ‘Mana ndagushima ko ntameze nk’abandi: abasuma, inkozi z’ikibi, abasambanyi, kandi simeze nk’urya mutozakori.
Nisonzesha kabiri mu ndwi, kandi ntanga ikigiracumi c’ivyo ndonka vyose.’
Ariko wa mutozakori ahagarara kure, ntiyubahuka no kurangamiza mw’ijuru, yamara yikubita ku gikiriza, avuga ati: ‘Mana, ngirira imbabazi, jewe umunyavyaha.’

Ndababwire ukuri, uwo mutozakori yatashe yemewe nk’umugororotsi imbere y’Imana, ariko kuri wa Mufarisayo si ko vyagenze. Kuko uwishira hejuru wese azocishwa bugufi, ariko uwicisha bugufi azoshirwa hejuru.”
Umusi umwe abavyeyi bazanye abana babo bato aho Yesu ari kugira ngo abakoreko abahezagire. Ariko abigishwa barabakankamira.
Ariko Yesu asaba ko babamuzanira, abwira abigishwa biwe ati: “Nimureke abana baze aho ndi, ntimubabuze, kuko Ubwami bw’Imana ari ubw’abameze nka bo.
Ndababwire ukuri, umuntu wese atakira Ubwami bw’Imana nk’umwana muto ntazokwigera abwinjiramwo.”
Umutware umwe aramubaza ati: “Mwigisha mwiza, nokora iki kugira ngo ndagwe ubugingo budashira?”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Unyitira iki mwiza? Nta mwiza ahari, kiretse Imana yonyene.
Urazi ko amabwirizwa avuga ngo: ‘Ntugasambane, ntukice, ntukibe, ntukagirize abandi ibinyoma, wubahe so na nyoko?’ ”
Na we yishura ati: “Ayo yose nayakurikije kuva nkiri muto.”

Yesu yumvise iyo nyishu aca amubwira ati: “Hari ikintu kimwe ugihajije. Genda ugurishe ivyo utunze vyose, maze amahera ukuyemwo uyahe aboro; ni ho uzoronka ubutunzi mw’ijuru. Hanyuma uce uza unkurikire.”
Wa muntu avyumvise arababara cane kuko yari atunze cane.
Yesu abonye ukuntu ababaye, aca avuga ati: “Biragoye cane ko abatunzi binjira mu Bwami bw’Imana.
Vyokworoha ko ingamiya ica mu gatoboro k’urushinge rubarira kurusha ko umutunzi yinjira mu Bwami bw’Imana.”
Abavyumvise baramubaza bati: “None, nimba biri uko, ni nde ashobora gukizwa?”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Ibidashobokera abantu bishobokera Imana.”
Maze Petero aramubarira ati: “Twebwe twasize ivyacu vyose turagukurikira!”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Ndababwire ukuri, nta muntu yasize inzu, canke umugore, canke abavukanyi, canke abavyeyi, canke abana kubera Ubwami bw’Imana,
atazovyishurwa incuro nyinshi muri iki gihe, kandi mu gihe kizoza akazoronka ubugingo budashira.”
Hanyuma Yesu aca yihereranya bamwe cumi na babiri, arababwira ati: “Ehe tugira tuduge i Yerusalemu, aho Ivyanditswe n’abavugishwa n’Imana vyose ku Mwana w’Umuntu bizomushikirako.
Azotangwa ahabwe Abanyamahanga, bamucokore, bamutuke, bamucireko amate,
bamukubite, hanyuma bamwice. Ariko ku musi ugira gatatu, azozuka.”
Ariko abigishwa ntibigera batahura ikintu na kimwe muri ivyo ababwiye. Insiguro yavyo yari ihishijwe, bituma badatahura ico ashatse kubabwira.
Yesu agira ashike i Yeriko, hari impumyi yari yicaye ku nzira isegerereza.
Yumvise abantu benshi bariko bararengana, ibaza ibiriko biraba.
Na bo bayibwira bati: “Ni Yesu w’i Nazareti ariko ararengana.”
Aca arasemerera ati: “Yesu, Mwana wa Dawidi, ngirira impuhwe!”
Abari imbere ya Yesu baramuzibiza ngo ahore, ariko arushiriza gusemerera ati: “Mwana wa Dawidi, ngirira imbabazi!”
Yesu aca arahagarara, asaba ko bamumuzanira. Amushikiriye, Yesu aramubaza ati:
“Ushaka ko ndagukorera iki?” Na we arishura ati: “Mwami, ndashaka guhumuka.”
Yesu aramubwira ati: “Humuka, ukwizera kwawe kuragukijije.”
Ako kanya nyene aca arahumuka, akurikira Yesu ashima Imana. Abari aho bose babibonye bashima Imana.
Nuko Yesu yinjira mu gisagara ca Yeriko, ahaca arengana.
Muri ico gisagara hari umuntu yitwa Zakayo, yari umutozakori mukuru, kandi yari atunze cane.
Yashaka kubona Yesu, ariko ntivyakunda kuko hari isinzi ry’abantu, na we akaba yari mugufi.
Nuko ariruka yurira igiti c’umusukomora cari i ruhande y’inzira, kuko ari ho Yesu yagira ace.
Yesu ahashitse, ararangamiza, amubwira ati: “Zakayo, ururuka ningoga, kuko uwu musi nyene nkwiye kurara iwawe.”
Nuko aca arururuka ningoga, amwakira iwe yuzuye umunezero.
Ababibonye bose batangura kwidodomba bati: “Agiye kurara mu nzu y’umunyavyaha!”
Ariko Zakayo arahaguruka, abarira Umwami Yesu ati: “Mwami, ngira mfate ica kabiri c’ivyo ntunze ndakigaburire aboro, kandi nimba hari uwo nivye, ndabimuriha incuro zine.”
Yesu aca avuga ati: “Uwu musi agakiza kinjiye muri iyi nzu, kuko uwu na we ni umwana wa Aburahamu.
Umwana w’Umuntu yazanywe no kurondera hamwe no gukiza abazimiye.”
Bakiriko baramwumviriza, Yesu arabandanya abacira umugani, kuko yari yegereje gushika i Yerusalemu, kandi ico gihe abantu bibaza ko Ubwami bw’Imana buca bushika ubwo nyene.
Ababwira ati: “Umuntu ava mu muryango utunze, yagiye mu gihugu ca kure kwimikwa nk’umwami, hanyuma ngo aheze agaruke.
Imbere yo kugenda akoranya cumi bo mu bakozi biwe, abaha mina cumi, ababwira ati: ‘Nimwakire aya mahera, mugende muyadandarishe gushika aho nzogarukira.’
Ariko abantu bo mu gihugu ciwe baramwanka, bituma barungika intumwa inyuma yiwe zija kuvuga ziti: ‘Uwo muntu ntidushaka ko aba umwami wacu.’
Ariko arimikwa nk’umwami, hanyuma aragaruka. Aca atumako ba bakozi yaha amahera, kugira arabe ingene bungutse.
Uwa mbere araza, avuga ati: ‘Databuja, mina yawe yungutse izindi cumi.’
Aca amubwira ati: ‘Wakoze neza, mukozi wanje mwiza. Ko wabaye umwizigirwa muri bike, ndaguhaye kuganza ibisagara cumi.’
Uwa kabiri araza avuga ati: ‘Databuja, mina yawe yungutse izindi zitanu.’
Shebuja aramwishura ati: ‘Ndaguhaye kurongora ibisagara bitanu.’
Ariko uwundi mukozi araza abwira shebuja ati: ‘Databuja, akira mina yawe; nayibitse mu gitambara ndayinyegeza kure.
Naratinye kuko nzi ko uri umuntu agoye; wanura ivyo utanikiye, ukimbura ivyo utarimye.’
Shebuja aramwishura ati: ‘Ngira ndagucire urubanza mfatiye ku vyo wivugiye wewe nyene, wa mukozi mubi we! Nimba wari uzi ko ndi umuntu agoye, nanura ivyo ntanikiye, nkimbura ivyo ntarimye,
ni kuki utajanye amahera yanje ku bayadandarisha kugira ngo ngarutse ndonke amahera yanje n’inyugu yayo?’
Nuko abwira abari bahagaze aho ati: ‘Nimumwake mina yiwe muyihe uwufise cumi.’
Baca bavuga bati ‘Databuja, erega asanzwe afise cumi!’
Na we arabishura ati: ‘Ndababwire ukuri, uwufise vyinshi azokwongererezwa, uwufise bike na we azokwakwa na bike afise.
Abo bansi banje na bo badashaka ko ndababera umwami, nimubazane hano mubicire imbere yanje.’ ”
Yesu ahejeje kuvuga ivyo, aca arabandanya aduga i Yerusalemu.
Yegereje i Betifage n’i Betaniya ku Musozi wa Elayono, atuma babiri mu bigishwa biwe, ababwira ati:
“Nimugende muri iriya mihana iri imbere yanyu; nimwahashika murahasanga inyana y’indogoba iziritse ata muntu n’umwe arayigenderako. Muce muyizitura, muyizane hano.
Nihagira uwubabaza ati: ‘Ni kubera iki muyizituye?’ Mumwishure muti: ‘Umwami arayikeneye.’ ”
Nuko abatumwe baragenda, basanga ibintu bimeze nk’uko yari yabibabwiye.
Bakiriko barayizitura, nyeneyo arababaza ati: “Ni kuki muzitura iyo ndogoba?”
Baca bishura bati: “Umwami arayikeneye.”
Baca bayizanira Yesu, bayisasako impuzu zabo, bayimwicarikako.
Kandi aho yaca hose, abantu baca basasa impuzu zabo mu nzira.

Yegereye ahari inzira imanuka iva ku Musozi wa Elayono, isinzi ry’abigishwa biwe batangura guhimbaza Imana n’akanyamuneza kenshi n’amajwi arenga, kubera ibitangaza vyinshi bari bamaze kubona, bavuga bati:
“Hahezagirwe umwami aje mw’izina ry’Uhoraho!” “Amahoro abe mw’ijuru, n’icubahiro hejuru mw’ijuru!”
Bamwe mu Bafarisayo bari muri iryo sinzi babwira Yesu bati: “Mwigisha, hoza abo bigishwa bawe!”
Arabishura ati: “Ndababwire ukuri, naho bohora, amabuye yosemerera.”
Yegereye Yerusalemu, yitegereza igisagara, arakiririra,
avuga ati: “Ese na we iyo umenya icotuma uronka amahoro uwu musi! Ariko noneho ivyo bihishijwe amaso yawe.
Kuko igihe kizogushikako, aho abansi bawe bazokwubaka ibirindiro impande zawe zose, bagukikuze, bagusugereze impande zose.
Bazogusambura, bagutikizanye n’ababa muri wewe. Ntibazosigaza ibuye na rimwe rigeretse ku rindi, kuko utigeze umenya igihe Imana yakugendereye.”
Yinjiye mu rusengero, aca atangura kwirukana abariko bararudandarizamwo.
Ababwira ati: “Handitswe ngo: ‘Inzu yanje izoba iyo gusengeramwo,’ ariko mweho mwayihinduye ‘ubwihisho bw’ibisuma.’ ”
Imisi yose Yesu yama yigishiriza mu rusengero. Ariko abakuru b’abaherezi, abigisha b’ivyagezwe n’abatware b’Abayuda baho bose bagumye barondera ukuntu bomwica.
Ariko ntibaronka aho bamuca kuko abantu bose bakunda cane kwumviriza inyigisho ziwe.
Umusi umwe Yesu yariko arigisha abantu mu rusengero, ababwira Ubutumwa Bwiza. Maze abakuru b’abaherezi, abigisha b’ivyagezwe n’abakuru b’Abayuda baza aho ari.
Baramubaza bati: “Ni ubuhe bubasha butuma ukora ivyo? Ni nde yabuguhaye?”
Arabishura ati: “Reka nanje ndababaze. Nimumbarire:
Mbega umubatizo wa Yohana wavuye ku Mana yo mw’ijuru canke ku bantu?”
Baravugana hagati yabo bati: “Nitwavuga tuti: ‘Wavuye ku Mana yo mw’ijuru,’ ahava atubaza ati: ‘None ni kuki mutizeye ivyo Yohana yavuze?’
Nitwavuga tuti: ‘Wavuye ku bantu,’ abantu bose baradutera amabuye kuko baremera ata gukekeranya ko Yohana yari uwuvugishwa n’Imana.”
Nuko baramwishura bati: “Ntituzi uwabumuhaye.”
Yesu na we arabwira ati: “Nanje sindababwira aho ububasha butuma nkora ibi buva.”
Hanyuma Yesu acira umugani abari aho, avuga ati: “Habaye umuntu yarimye uruzabibu, hanyuma aruzeza abarimyi, afata urugendo rwa kure, amarayo igihe kinini.
Iyimbura rigeze, atuma umukozi wiwe kuri ba barimyi kugira ngo bamuhe igice c’umwimbu w’inzabibu kimwegukira. Ariko ba barimyi bafata uwo mukozi baramukubita, bamurungika iminwe misa.
Hanyuma arungika uwundi mukozi, na we nyene baramutuka, baramukubita, bamurungika iminwe misa.
Arungika n’uwa gatatu; we baramukomeretsa, bamuterera inyuma y’uruzabibu.
Nyene uruzabibu aribaza ati: ‘Mbega yemwe ngire gute? Reka ndungike umuhungu wanje nkunda cane, kumbure wewe bazomusonera.’
Ariko ba barimyi bakimubona baca batangura kuvugana bati: ‘Uwu ni we azoba samuragwa. Reka tumwice kugira ngo twegukire ivyo yorazwe.’
Nuko bamukwegera inyuma y’umurima w’uruzabibu bamwicirayo. None mwibaza ko nyene uruzabibu niyaza azobagira gute?
Azoza yice abo barimyi, maze urwo ruzabibu aruzeze abandi.” Abantu bavyumvise, baca bavuga bati: “Ivyo ntibikabe.”
Yesu aca arabitegereza, arababaza ati: “None aya majambo yo mu Vyanditswe akurikira asobanura iki: ‘Ibuye abubatsi bagaye ni ryo ryahindutse irigumya imfuruka.’
Umuntu wese azogwa kuri iryo buye azovunagurika, uwo rizogwako rizomusya.”
Abigisha b’ivyagezwe n’abakuru b’abaherezi barondera ingene bomufata ubwo nyene, kuko bari batahuye ko ari bo ariko aravuga muri uwo mugani, ariko batinya abantu.
Nuko batangura kumugenza, bahera abantu bigize intungane ngo bamutegere mu majambo avuga, kugira ngo barabe ko boronka ivyo bamurega ku bategetsi b’Abaroma.
Ba bantu babaza Yesu bati: “Mwigisha, turazi ko uvuga kandi wigisha ivy’ukuri. Nta ho uhengamira, kandi wigisha inzira y’Imana mu kuri kwose.
None rero tubwire: biremewe gutanga ikori rya Kayisari, canke ntivyemewe?”
Yesu abonye ubugunge buri muri bo, aca ababwira ati:
“Nimunyereke igiceri c’idenariyo. Iyi shusho n’ibi vyandiko biriko ni ivya nde?” Barishura bati: “Ni ivya Kayisari.”
Aca ababwira ati: “Nuko rero, ivya Kayisari mubihe Kayisari, ivy’Imana na vyo mubihe Imana.”
Ntibabaye bagishobora kumufatira ku vyo avuga ku mugaragaro, ahubwo batangajwe n’inyishu yiwe, baca barahora.
Maze bamwe mu Basadukayo, ari bo batemera ivy’izuka ry’abapfuye, baza aho Yesu ari baramubaza bati:
“Mwigisha, Mose yanditse avuga ko umuntu apfuye agasiga umugore atagira abana, uwo bavukana ategerezwa gucura uwo mupfakazi kugira ngo aronkere uruvyaro uwo muhisi.
Rero, harigeze kuba abavukana indwi. Mukuru muri bo ararongora, ariko apfa atavyaye.
Uwa kabiri arongora wa mupfakazi,
n’uwa gatatu bigenda uko, gushika no ku w’indwi bose biba nk’uko, bapfa ata wusize umwana.
Maze haheze igihe na wa mugore arapfa.
None ku musi w’izuka ry’abapfuye uwo mugore azoba uwa nde, ko yabaye umugore w’abo indwi bose?”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Abantu bo muri kino gihe bararongora kandi bararongorwa.
Ariko abazoba babereye gushika muri ya si izoza no mw’izuka ry’abapfuye ntibazorongora canke ngo barongorwe.
Vyongeye ntibazoba bagipfa, kuko bazoba bameze nk’abamarayika. Ni abana b’Imana, kuko ari abana b’ukuzuka.
Ku bijanye n’izuka ry’abapfuye, na Mose yaravyerekanye, aho yandika ivy’igisaka caka kidatemuka, avuga ko Uhoraho ari ‘Imana ya Aburahamu, ya Isaka n’iya Yakobo.’
Si Imana y’abapfuye, ni Imana y’abazima, kuko kuri yo bose bariho.”
Bamwe mu bigisha b’ivyagezwe barishura bati: “Uvuze neza, Mwigisha.”
Ntibabaye bacubahuka kumubaza ikibazo na kimwe.
Yesu aca ababwira ati: “Ni kubera iki muvuga ngo Kristo ni mwene Dawidi?
Dawidi ubwiwe ni we yivugiye mu gitabu ca Zaburi ati: ‘Uhoraho yabariye Umwami wanje ati: “Icara i buryo bwanje
kugeza abansi bawe bose ndabashize musi y’ibirenge vyawe.” ’
None nimba Dawidi amwita ‘Umwami,’ yoba umwana wiwe gute?”
Yesu abwira abigishwa biwe, abari aho bose bumva, ati:

“Mwirinde abigisha b’ivyagezwe. Bakunda kugendagenda bambaye amakanzu maremare y’icubahiro, no kuramutswa mu cubahiro mu makoraniro y’abantu. Bakunda kandi guhabwa ivyicaro vy’icubahiro mu masinagogi no mu misi mikuru.
Banyaga imiryango y’abapfakazi bakabatwara ivyabo, kandi bakabandanya biyerekana nk’abantu beza mu gusenga amasengesho maremare. Ni co gituma bazohanwa kurusha abandi.”
Yesu akiri mu rusengero, yunamura amaso abona abatunzi bashize amashikanwa yabo mu co bayatorezamwo.
Yongera abona n’umupfakazi na we ashizemwo ibiceri bibiri.
Aca avuga ati: “Ndababwire ukuri, uwu mupfakazi w’umukene atanze vyinshi kurusha abandi bose.
Abandi bose batanze amashikanwa ku musesekara w’ubutunzi bwabo, ariko we, mu bukene bwiwe, atanze ivyomubeshejeho vyose.”
Bamwe mu bigishwa batangura gushima ingene urusengero rwari rusharijwe n’amabuye meza cane hamwe n’ibindi vyashikaniwe Imana vyo kurushariza. Maze Yesu arababwira ati:
“Ku bijanye n’ibi muriko murabona, nagira ndababwire ko ata buye na rimwe rizosigara rigeretse ku rindi; yose azosamburirwa hasi.”
Baca baramubaza bati: “Mwigisha, ivyo bizoshika ryari? Ni ikihe kimenyetso kizokwerekana ko bigiye gushika?”
Na we arabishura ati: “Mwiyubare ntihagire umuntu n’umwe abazimiza. Kuko benshi bazoza biyita izina ryanje, bavuga ngo: ‘Ni jewe Kristo,’ kandi ngo: ‘Igihe kirashitse.’ Ntimuze mubakurikire.
Nimwumva intambara n’imigumuko, ntimuze muhagarike imitima. Ivyo bitegerezwa kubanza gushika, ariko iherezo rya vyose ntirizoba rirashika.”
Yongera ababwira ati: “Ihanga rizotera irindi hanga, ubwami butere ubundi bwami.
Hazoba ukunyiganyiga kw’isi gukomeye kandi guteye ubwoba; hazotera amapfa n’ingwara z’ivyaduka mu ntara zitandukanye. Hazoba ibiteye ubwoba n’ibimenyetso bihambaye biva mw’ijuru.
Ariko imbere y’uko ivyo bishika, bazobahama, babafate, babatware mu masinagogi no mu mabohero, babarengutse imbere y’abami n’abatware babahora izina ryanje.
Ako kazoba ari akaryo ko kunshingira intahe.
Ariko ntimuze muhagarikwe imitima n’ivyo muzokwireguza,
kuko nzobaha amajambo n’ubwenge bizotuma abababuranya badashobora kubahaririza canke ngo babahinyuze.
Mbere n’abavyeyi banyu, abo muvukana, incuti n’abagenzi bazobahinduka, kandi bazokwica bamwe muri mwebwe.
Abantu bose bazobanka babahora izina ryanje.
Ariko nta n’agashatsi ko ku mitwe yanyu kazotakara
Nimwashobora kwihangana muzorokora ubugingo bwanyu.
Nimwabona Yerusalemu ikikujwe n’ingabo, muzoce mumenya ko isenyurwa ryayo ryegereje.
Nuko abazoba bari i Yudaya baze bahungire ku misozi, abari mu gisagara bakivemwo, kandi abazoba bagiye mu misozi, ntibaze bagaruke mu gisagara.
Kuko iyo misi izoba ari iy’ukwihora kw’Imana, kugira ngo Ivyanditswe bishike.
Ese ukuntu iyo minsi izoba ari iy’umubabaro utagira ingene wovugwa ku bagore bibungenze n’abazoba bonsa! Kizoba ari igihe c’umubabaro mwinshi mu gihugu, n’uburake bw’Imana kuri ubu bwoko.
Benshi muri bo bazokwicishwa inkota, canke batwarwe nk’inyagano mu mahanga yose yo kw’isi. Igisagara ca Yerusalemu kizohonyangwa n’Abanyamahanga kugeza igihe Abanyamahanga bagenewe kirangiye.
Hazoba ibimenyetso ku zuba, ku kwezi no ku nyenyeri. Kw’isi na ho, amahanga azogira ubwoba abure uko agira, kubera ukubomborana kw’amazi yo mu biyaga hamwe n’imipfunda.
Imitima y’abantu izohagarara bishwe n’ubwoba, babonye ibigira bishike kw’isi, kuko ivy’inkomezi biri mu kirere bizonyiganyizwa.
Inyuma y’ivyo, umuntu wese azobona Umwana w’Umuntu aje ku gicu, afise ububasha n’ubwiza butangaje.
Nimwabona ivyo bibaye, muze muhaguruke, mushire ubwoba, ugucungurwa kwanyu kuzoba kwegereje.”
Nuko Yesu abacira umugani ati: “Nimurabire ku giti c’umusukoni canke ku kindi giti ico ari co cose.
Iyo bizanye amababi, muca mumenya ko agatasi kari hafi.
None rero nimwabona ivyo vyose, muzoce mumenya neza ko Ubwami bw’Imana buri hafi.
Ndababwire ukuri, abo muri runo rungamwe ntibazopfa bose ivyo vyose bitarashika.
Ijuru n’isi bizokurwaho, ariko amajambo yanje ntazokwigera akurwaho.
Mwiyubare, imitima yanyu ntiremerwe n’akaborerwe hamwe n’ibihimbaro bijanye na ko, canke imyitwarariko y’ivy’ubu buzima, kugira ngo uwo musi ntuze ubashikeko giturumbuka,
kuko uko ari ko uzoshika ku bari kw’isi bose.
Nuko rero mwame maso, musenge kugira ngo muze muronke inkomezi zibashoboza kurengana ivyo vyose, no kugira ngo muze mushobore guhagarara imbere y’Umwana w’Umuntu.”
Imisi yose Yesu yama yigishiriza mu rusengero, ku mugoroba akava mu gisagara akaja kurara ku Musozi wa Elayono,
kandi abantu benshi bama baza mu gatondo mu rusengero kumwumviriza.
Umusi Mukuru w’Imikate Itarimwo Umwambiro, ari wo musi wa Pasika wegereje,
abakuru b’abaherezi n’abigisha b’ivyagezwe barondera akaryo ko kwica Yesu, ariko batinya abantu.
Nuko Satani yinjira muri Yuda Isikariyote, umwe muri bamwe cumi na babiri,
na we aca aja kwumvikana n’abakuru b’abaherezi hamwe n’abakuru b’abarinzi b’urusengero ingene yobashikiriza Yesu.
Na bo baranezerwa cane, baca bamwemerera amahera.
Yuda na we aravyemera, aca atangura kurondera akaryo keza ko kumubashikiriza ata bantu benshi bahari.
Maze Umusi Mukuru w’Imikate Itarimwo Umwambiro urashika, kandi kuri uwo musi bategerezwa gutanga ikimazi c’umwagazi w’intama wa Pasika.
Yesu abarira Petero na Yohana ati: “Nimugende mudutegurire ivyokurya vya Pasika.”
Baramubaza bati: “Ni hehe ugomba ko tubitegurira?”
Arabishura ati: “Mucinjira mu gisagara, muraja guhura n’umuntu yikoreye umubindi w’amazi. Muce mumukurikira gushika mu nzu aja kwinjiramwo,
hanyuma mubwire nyene urugo muti: ‘Umwigisha arashaka kumenya: Icumba aja gusangiriramwo ivya Pasika n’abigishwa biwe kiri he?’
Na we araja kubereka icumba kinini co hejuru, kirimwo ibikenewe vyose. Aho abe ari ho mubitegurira.”
Nuko baragenda basanga bimeze nk’uko yabibabwiye, maze bategura ivyokurya vya Pasika.
Isaha ishitse, Yesu n’intumwa ziwe baca baricara, barafungura.
Yesu arababwira ati: “Nari naripfuje cane gusangira namwe iyi Pasika imbere y’uko mbabazwa.
Kuko ndabamenyesheje ko ntazosubira kurya iyindi, kugeza insiguro yayo ishikijwe mu Bwami bw’Imana.”
Nuko afata igikombe, agishimira Imana, ababwira ati: “Nimwakire munywe mwese.
Kuko ndababwire, sinzosubira kunywa ku muvinyu w’imizabibu, gushika aho Ubwami bw’Imana buzozira.”
Aca afata n’umukate, awushimira Imana, arawumanyura, awubahereza avuga ati: “Iki ni ikimenyetso c’umubiri wanje watanzwe ku bwanyu; muzohore mubikora mu kunyibuka.”
Bahejeje gufungura, agira uko nyene, afata igikombe, avuga ati: “Iki gikombe ni isezerano rishasha rivuye mu maraso yanje, asesetse ku bwanyu.
Kandi ehe raba uwugira angurishe twicaranye hano dusangira.
Umwana w’Umuntu azopfa nk’uko vyanditswe, ariko aragowe uwo muntu amugurishije.”
Baca batangura kubazanya hagati muri bo uwokwubahuka gukora ivyo.
Maze haduka impari hagati yabo, bagomba kumenya umukuru muri bo.
Yesu arababwira ati: “Abami b’Abanyamahanga babatwaza umukazo, kandi ababafiseko ububasha bose bashaka kwitwa abagiraneza.
Ariko ntimukabe nka bo. Ahubwo uwibaza ko ari mukuru muri mwebwe namere nka mutoya muri mwebwe, kandi umukuru amere nk’umukozi wanyu.
Mbega hagati y’uwuri ku meza afungura n’umukozi amutegurira imfungurwa ni nde mukuru? Mbega si uwicaye ku meza? Ariko jewe ndi hano muri mwebwe nk’uwubakorera.
Mwebwe mwagumanye nanje mu bihe vyo kugeragezwa kwanje.
Nanje ndabahaye Ubwami, nk’uko Data yabumpaye nanje,
kugira ngo muze murire mwongere munywere ku meza yanje mu Bwami bwanje, kandi muze mwicare ku ntebe z’icubahiro mucire imanza imiryango cumi n’ibiri y’Abisirayeli.
Simoni, Simoni, umviriza! Satani yabasavye kugira ngo abagosore nk’uwugosora ingano.
Ariko, wewe nagusengeye kugira ngo ntutakaze ukwizera, kandi niwamara kwihana ukangarukako uze ukomeze bene So.”
Petero aramwishura ati: “Mwami, nditeguye kujana nawe no gushika mw’ibohero, mbere no gupfana na we.”
Yesu aramubwira ati: “Petero, ndakubwire ukuri, isake itarabika uzoba umaze kunyihakana gatatu kose uvuga ko utanzi.”
Yesu aca arababaza ati: “Igihe nabarungika ata saho, ata mufuko canke ibirato, hari ico mwakenye?” Baramwishura bati: “Nta na kimwe.”
Aca arababwira ati: “Ubu rero uwufise amahera mu mufuko nayibangikanye, uwufise isakoshi ayitore, kandi n’uwudafise inkota agurishe umutamana wiwe ayigure.
Ndababwire, iri jambo ryavugishijwe kuri jewe ngo: ‘Yafashwe nk’umwe mu bagarariji,’ ritegerezwa gushika. Ni ukuri, ivyanditswe kuri jewe bigira bishike.”
Abigishwa biwe baramubwira bati: “Mwami, ehe turafise inkota zibiri.” Arabishura ati: “Izo ziramaze.”
Hanyuma Yesu aca ajana n’abigishwa biwe ku Musozi wa Elayono nk’uko yari asanzwe abigenza.
Bashitseho, Yesu arababwira ati: “Nimusenge kugira ngo ntimutsindwe n’amageragezwa.”
Aca yigira kure gato nk’aho umuntu yotera ibuye, arapfukama arasenga ati:
“Data, ubigomvye, ndakwinginze unkure imbere iki gikombe c’imibabaro. Ariko ntibibe nk’uko jewe ngomba, yamara bibe uko wewe ugomba.”
Maze umumarayika aramwiyereka avuye mw’ijuru, amwongera inkomezi.
Nuko arasenga cane, yuzuye umubabaro mwinshi, icuya ciwe gicika nk’amama y’amaraso atonyangira hasi.
Yunamutse ahejeje gusenga, asubira aho ba bigishwa biwe bari bari, asanga barasinziriye, baremerewe n’umubabaro.
Arababaza ati: “Ni kuki musinziriye? Nimuvyuke, musenge kugira ngo ntimutsindwe n’amageragezwa.”
Yesu akiriko aravuga, haca haza isinzi ry’abantu, barongowe na Yuda, umwe muri ba bigishwa cumi na babiri. Nuko yegera Yesu, aramusoma.
Yesu aramubwira ati: “Yuda, ugurishije Umwana w’Umuntu mu kumusoma?”
Abigishwa ba Yesu babonye ibigira bibe baramubaza bati: “Mwami, tubivune na za nkota?”
Umwe muri bo aca akubita inkota umukozi w’umuherezi mukuru, amuca ugutwi kw’i buryo.
Yesu aca arasemerera ati: “Geza aho, biramaze!” Yesu aca akora kuri kwa gutwi, aramukiza.
Yesu aca abwira abaherezi bakuru, abarinzi b’urusengero n’abatware bari baje kumufata, ati: “Mbega mbaye umugumutsi, aho muza kumfata mwitwaje inkota n’amahiri?
Imisi yose namana namwe mu rusengero, ntimwigeze mumfata. Ariko noneho igihe canyu ni iki; umwijima ugira uganze.”
Nuko baramufata bamutwara mu rugo rw’umuherezi mukuru. Petero na we arabakurikira agendera kure inyuma yabo.
Ariko bamaze gushika mu rugo bagacana umuriro bakicara, Petero na we yaciye yicarana na bo.
Maze incoreke imwe iramubona ariko arota. Iramwihweza, ica ivuga iti: “Uwu mugabo yari kumwe na Yesu.”
Ariko arabihakana, abwira uwo mugore ati: “Haba na mba, sindanamuzi!”
Haciye akanya, uwundi muntu aramubona, avuga ati: “Na wewe uri umwe muri bo.” Petero yishura uwo muntu ati: “Eka sindi kumwe na bo.”
Haciye nk’isaha, uwundi muntu arabishimangira ati: “Ni ivy’ukuri uwu yari kumwe na Yesu, kuko ava i Galilaya.”
Petero yishura uwo muntu ati: “Sinzi n’ivyo uriko uravuga.” Akiriko aravuga, isake ica irabika.
Umwami Yesu aca arahindukira, araba Petero mu maso. Petero na we aca yibuka ya majambo Yesu yari yamubwiye ati: “Uno musi nyene, isake itarabika, uza kuba umaze kunyihakana gatatu.”
Petero aca asohoka hanze, araturikisha ararira.
Maze abagabo bari bamurinze batangura kumucokora no kumukubita.
Bamupfunga igitambara mu maso, bamubwira bati: “Vugishwa! Ni nde agukubise?”
Bongera bamubwira n’ayandi majambo menshi yo kumutuka.
Bukeye, inama nkuru y’abatwara ubwo bwoko irakorana, irimwo abakuru b’abaherezi n’abigisha b’ivyagezwe, maze Yesu ajanwa imbere yabo.
Baramubaza bati: “Tubwire! Uri Kristo?” Yesu arabishura ati: “Naho nobibabwira ntimwovyemera,
kandi nobabaza ikibazo ntimwonyishura.
Ariko kuva ubu Umwana w’Umuntu agiye kwicara i buryo bw’Imana y’ububasha.”
Bose baramubaza bati: “Ugomvye kuvuga rero ko uri Umwana w’Imana?” Na we arishura ati: “Muvuze ukuri, ndi we.”
Baca bavuga bati: “None hari ibindi vyabona dukeneye? Ntituvyiyumviye bimwiviriye mu kanwa?”
Nuko abari mu nama bose bavira hasi rimwe bamujana kwa Pilato,
batangura kumurega bavuga bati: “Uwu muntu twasanze ariko aragumura abantu bo mu bwoko bwacu, ababuza gutanga ikori rya Kayisari, kandi yigira Kristo, umwami.”
Pilato aca abaza Yesu ati: “Woba uri umwami w’Abayuda?” Yesu aramwishura ati: “Uvuze ukuri.”
Pilato aca abarira abakuru b’abaherezi n’isinzi ry’abantu bari aho bose ati: “Uwu muntu simbona ikimwagira.”
Ariko barushiriza kuvuga bati: “Agumura abantu i Yudaya hose biciye mu nyigisho ziwe. Yatanguriye i Galilaya none raba ashitse n’ino i Yerusalemu.”
Pilato avyumvise aca abaza ati: “Uwu muntu ava i Galilaya?”
Yumvise ko Yesu atwarwa mu ntara ya Herode Antipa, aca aramumurungikira, kandi ico gihe Herode yari i Yerusalemu.
Herode abonye Yesu, aranezerwa cane kuko yari amaze igihe kirekire yipfuza kumubona. Yari yarumvise ivyiwe, maze yipfuza kumubona akora igitangaza.
Nuko abaza Yesu ibibazo vyinshi ariko ntiyishura na kimwe.
Abakuru b’aherezi n’abigisha b’ivyagezwe bari bahagaze ngaho, bamwagiriza bashimitse.
Herode n’abasoda biwe baca batangura kumushinyagurira no kumucokora. Baca bamwambika impuzu y’ubwami, baramurungika asubira kwa Pilato.
Kuva uwo musi Herode na Pilato baca baba abagenzi, kuko imbere y’aho bari abansi.
Pilato aca akoranya abakuru b’abaherezi, abatware n’abari aho bose,
ababwira ati: “Mwanzaniye uwu muntu muvuga ko yateye imigumuko, ariko namusambishirije imbere yanyu, nta caha camwagiriye.
Ndetse na Herode nta co yamwagirije kuko mwiboneye ko yamudusubije. Nta co yakoze cotuma yicwa.
Ndamukubitisha gusa, hanyuma ndamurekure.” [
Igihe cose kuri Pasika, Pilato yama abarekurira imbohe imwe.]
Ariko bose basemerera icarimwe bati “Uwo muntu nabambwe, uturekurire Baraba.”
(Uwo Baraba yari yatawe mw’ibohero yagirizwa umugumuko wari wabaye mu gisagara hamwe n’ubwicanyi.)
Kubera ko Pilato yagomba kurekura Yesu, yongera avugana n’iryo sinzi ry’abantu.
Ariko bo barushiriza gusemerera bati: “Nabambwe! Nabambwe!”
Yongera kubabaza ubwa gatatu ati: “None ni ikihe caha yakoze? Nta kintu na kimwe nabonye yakoze cotuma yicwa. Ariko ndamutanga bamutonagure gusa, hanyuma ndamurekure.”
Noneho baca bashira urwamo hejuru basaba ko Yesu abambwa, gushika aho Pilato arengerwa,
aca abemerera ico bamusavye.
Nuko aca arekura wa mugabo yari apfunzwe yagirizwa imigumuko n’ubwicanyi, uwo bari basavye ko yobarekurira, hanyuma abaha Yesu ngo bamukoze ico bashaka.
Abasoda batwaye Yesu kumubamba bafata Simoni w’i Kurene, yari avuye mu mirima, baca bamukorera umusaraba, agendera inyuma ya Yesu.
Maze abantu isinzi baramukurikira, harimwo n’abagore bagenda baramuririra baboroga.
Yesu arahindukira arababarira ati: “Bakobwa b’i Yerusalemu, nta co mundirira. Nimwiririre mwebwe, muririre n’abana banyu.
Kuko igihe kigiye gushika, aho abantu bazovuga bati: ‘Hahiriwe abagore batigeze bavyara, n’inda zitigeze zibungenga, hamwe n’amabere atigeze yonsa.’
Hanyuma ‘bazobwira imisozi bati: “Tugweko!” n’imitumba bati: “Tunyegeze!” ’
Kuko nimba bagiriye gutya igiti kibisi, mbega icumye co bizokigendera gute?”
Kandi hariho n’abandi bagabo babiri b’inkozi z’ikibi, na bo bajanwa kwicirwa hamwe na Yesu.
Babashikanye ahantu hitwa Nyagihanga, abasoda baca baramubamba, ari kumwe na za nkozi z’ikibi, umwe i buryo uwundi i bubamfu bwiwe.
Maze Yesu aravuga ati: “Data, bababarire, kuko ntibazi ico bariko barakora.” Maze bagabura impuzu za Yesu hakoreshejwe ubufindo.
Abantu isinzi bari aho babiraba; abakuru b’Abayuda na bo bamucokora, bavuga bati: “Yakijije abandi, niyikize na we turabe, ko yigira ngo ni Kristo, Uwatoranijwe n’Imana.”
N’abasoda baraza baramushinyagurira, bamuha inkarisha kugira ngo anywe,
bamubwira bati: “Nimba uri umwami w’Abayuda, niwikize turabe!”
Baca bamanika icandiko hejuru yiwe kivuga ngo: uwu ni umwami w’abayuda.
Umwe muri za nkozi z’ikibi zibambanywe na we aramutuka ati: “Ko uri Kristo, niwikize hanyuma udukize natwe.”
Ariko mugenziwe aramukankamira avuga ati: “Mbega wewe ntutinya n’Imana kandi waciriwe urubanza rumwe n’urwiwe?
Twebwe twahaniwe ikiri ukuri, kuko turiko twishura ibihwanye n’ivyo twakoze. Ariko uwu we nta kibi na kimwe yakoze.”
Aca avuga ati: “Yesu, uranyibuka niwagaruka mu Bwami bwawe.”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Ndakubwire ukuri, uno musi nyene uraza kubana nanje muri paradizo.”
Hari nk’isaha zitandatu z’umurango, maze umwijima utwikira igihugu cose gushika isaha icenda,
kuko izuba ryari ryazimye. Maze igitambara co mu rusengero na co gitabukamwo kabiri.
Yesu aca arasemerera n’ijwi rirenga ati: “Data, mu biganza vyawe ni ho nshize impwemu yanje.” Ahejeje kuvuga ivyo, aca aracikana.
Umusoda mukuru w’Umuroma yari aho abonye ibibaye, aca ashima Imana avuga ati: “Ni ukuri, uwu muntu yari intungane.”
Rya sinzi ry’abantu bari bakoraniye aho baje gushengerera ibiriko biraba babonye ibibaye, basubira inyuma buzuye umubabaro, bishishitira.
Ariko abari bazi Yesu, harimwo na ba bagore bari bamukurikiye kuva i Galilaya, bagumye bahagaze aho bakurikiranira kure ivyariko biraba.
Hari umugabo yitwa Yosefu, yari mu bagize inama nkuru y’abatwara ubwoko bw’Abayuda, akaba yari umuntu mwiza kandi w’intungane.
Ntiyari ashigikiye abandi mu ngingo zose bafashe n’ivyo bakoze. Yava mu gisagara c’Abayuda citwa Arimataya, kandi yari yiteze ukuza kw’Ubwami bw’Imana.
Nuko aja kwa Pilato, amusaba ikiziga ca Yesu.
Hanyuma akimanura ku musaraba, akizingira mu gitambara cera, aca agishira mu mva nshasha yimbwe mu gitandara, itari bwigere ihambwamwo umuntu na rimwe.
Ivyo vyabaye ari ku musi wo kwitegurira Isabato, kandi yagira itangure.
Nuko ba bagore bavana na Yesu i Galilaya, bakurikira Yosefu, barabona ya mva, babona n’ukuntu ikiziga ca Yesu kiryamitsweyo.
Baca basubira i muhira bategura ibimota neza n’amavuta yo gusiga ikiziga. Ariko Isabato igeze bararuhuka kugira bubahirize icagezwe.
