Ku musi wa mbere utangura indwi, hakiri kare mu gitondo, ba bagore bafata vya bimota neza bari bateguye, baja ku mva.
Bahashitse, basanga ikibuye cari cugaye imva catembagajwe,
hanyuma barinjira, ariko ikiziga c’Umwami Yesu ntibakibona.
Bakizazaniwe haca haboneka abagabo babiri bambaye impuzu zica ibibatsi, bahagarara i ruhande yabo.
Ba bagore bagira ubwoba bwinshi, bakubita ibipfukamiro hasi barunama, ariko ba bagabo barababwira bati: “Ni kuki muronderera umuntu muzima mu bapfuye?
Ntari hano, yazutse. Nimwibuke ivyo yababwiye akiri kumwe namwe i Galilaya,
ati: ‘Umwana w’Umuntu azotabwa mu maboko y’abanyavyaha, bamubambe ku musaraba. Ariko ku musi ugira gatatu azozuka mu bapfuye.’ ”
Nuko baca baribuka amajambo yavuze.
Bagarutse bavuye ku mva, bashika babarira bamwe cumi n’umwe n’abandi bose ivyabaye vyose.
Abo bagore bagiye kubwira intumwa ivyabaye bari Mariya Magadalena, Yowana, na Mariya nyina wa Yakobo, n’abandi bagore bari kumwe na bo.
Ariko intumwa ntizavyemera kuko ivyo abo bagore bavuga vyasa n’imigani kuri bo.
Ariko Petero we arahaguruka agenda yiruka aja ku mva. Ashitseyo, arunama araba mu mva, abona vya bitambara vyera gusa, aca asubira inyuma yibaza ivyabaye.
Kuri uwo musi nyene, abigishwa babiri ba Yesu bariko baja mu gisagara citwa Emawusi kiri nko ku birometero cumi na bibiri uvuye i Yerusalemu,
bagenda baganira ku vyabaye vyose.
Bakiriko baraganira bahanahana ivyiyumviro, Yesu aca arabegera ajana na bo.
Ariko amaso yabo anyegezwa uwo ari we, ntibamumenya.
Yesu arababaza ati: “Ivyo mugenda muraganira ni ibiki?” Nuko baca barahagarara, bijiriwe cane.
Umwe muri bo yitwa Kirewofasi aca amubaza ati: “Ni wewe wenyene waje i Yerusalemu utamenye ivyahabereye muri iyi misi?”
Na we arababaza ati: “Ni ibiki vyabaye?” Baramwishura bati: “Ni ivya Yesu w’i Nazareti. Yari umuvugishwa n’Imana, yuzuye ubushobozi mu vyo yavuga no mu vyo yakora, imbere y’Imana n’imbere y’abantu.
Abakuru b’abaherezi n’abatware bacu baramutanze ngo acirwe urubanza rwo gupfa, maze baramubamba,
natwe twari twizeye ko ari we yocunguye Abisirayeli. Kandi uwu ni umusi ugira gatatu ivyo bibaye.
Ikigeretseko, hari abagore bo muri twebwe badutangaje. Bagiye ku mva uno musi mu gitondo,
ariko ntibabona ikiziga ciwe. Baje batubwira ko abamarayika babiyeretse, bababwira ko ari muzima.
Bamwe mu bagenzi bacu bagiye ku mva babisanga nk’uko ba bagore babivuze, ariko we ntibamubonye.”
Yesu aca ababwira ati: “Yemwe bantu b’ubwenge buke mwe! Birabagora kwizera mu mitima yanyu ivyo abavugishwa n’Imana bavuze.
Mbega Kristo ntiyategerezwa kubabazwa gutyo imbere y’uko yinjira mu bwiza bwiwe?”
Nuko ahera ku vyanditswe na Mose n’abavugishwa bose, abasigurira ico Ivyanditswe bimuvugako.
Bagira bashike mu gisagara bari bagiyemwo, Yesu amera nk’uwushaka kubandanya.
Ariko baramwinginga cane bati: “Gumana natwe kuko buriko burira, kandi umusi ugeze kure.” Nuko Yesu agumana na bo.
Bicaye bagira bafungure, Yesu afata umukate, awushimira Imana, arawumanyagura, arawubahereza.
Amaso yabo aca aruguruka, baramumenya, ariko aca arakamangana, ntibasubira kumubona.
Baca batangura kubazanya bati: “Mbega imitima yacu ntiyariko iragurugumba igihe yariko aravugana natwe mu nzira, adusigurira Ivyanditswe?”
Ubwo nyene baca barahaguruka basubira i Yerusalemu. Bashitseyo, basanga bamwe cumi n’umwe n’abari kumwe na bo bakoraniye hamwe,
bariko bavuga bati: “Ni ukuri Umwami yazutse, kandi yiyeretse Simoni.”
Maze abo bigishwa babiri na bo babiganira ivyabaye mu nzira bariko baragenda, n’ukuntu bamumenye amaze kumanyagura umukate.
Bakiriko barababwira ivyabaye, Yesu araza ahagarara hagati yabo, arababwira ati: “Amahoro abane namwe!”
Baterwa n’ubwoba bwinshi kuko bibaza ko babonye umuzimu.
Yesu arababaza ati: “Ni kuki mufise ubwoba no gukekeranya mu mitima yanyu?
Ehe nimurabe ibiganza n’ibirenge vyanje. Ni jewe nyene. Nimunkoreko maze mumenye ko ntari umuzimu, kuko umuzimu utagira inyama n’amagufa nk’ivyo mumbonana.”
Ahejeje kuvuga ivyo, abereka ibiganza n’ibirenge vyiwe.
Bakizazaniwe kubera umunezero n’ugutangara kwinshi, arababaza ati: “Nta vyokurya mufise?”
Nuko bamuzanira ikimanyu c’ifi yokeje,
na we arayakira, ayirira imbere yabo.
Aca ababarira ati: “Ibi ni vyo nari narababwiye nkiri kumwe namwe, ko ivyanditswe kuri jewe vyose mu Vyagezwe ya Mose, mu vyanditswe n’abavugishwa n’Imana no muri Zaburi, bitegerezwa gushika.”
Aca abugurura ubwenge kugira ngo batahure Ivyanditswe.
Arababwira ati: “Handitswe ngo ‘Kristo azobabazwa, apfe, hanyuma azuke mu bapfuye ku musi ugira gatatu,
kandi ubutumwa bw’ukwihana n’uguharirwa ivyaha buzovugwa mw’izina ryiwe mu mahanga yose, uhereye i Yerusalemu.’
Namwe muri ivyabona vyo gushingira intahe ivyo.
Ehe ngiye kubarungikira ingabire Data yasezeranye, ariko mugume mu gisagara gushika muhawe ubushobozi buvuye mw’ijuru.”
Maze Yesu aca abajana inyuma y’igisagara, hafi y’i Betaniya, aramvura amaboko arabahezagira.
Akiriko arabahezagira, aca abavamwo, aduzwa mw’ijuru.
Baca barapfukama baramusenga, hanyuma basubira i Yerusalemu buzuye umunezero mwinshi.
Imisi yose bama mu rusengero, bahimbaza Imana.
Mu ntango ya vyose, Jambo yariho. Uwo Jambo yari kumwe n’Imana, kandi yari Imana.
Yari kumwe n’Imana mu ntango ya vyose.
Imana ni we yakoresheje mu kurema vyose; mu vyaremwe vyose nta na kimwe Imana yaremye itamukoresheje.
Muri we ni ho hari ubugingo, kandi ubwo bugingo bwari umuco w’abantu.
Umuco wakiye mu mwijima, ariko umwijima ntiwawumenye.
Imana yatumye umuntu yitwa Yohana,
aza gushingira intahe uwo muco kugira ngo bose bizere kubera intahe yiwe.
Yohana ubwiwe si we yari uwo muco; ahubwo yaje ari icabona co gushingira intahe uwo umuco.
Umuco w’ukuri wakira umuntu wese wariko uraza mw’isi.
Jambo yari mw’isi kandi isi yaremwe na we, ariko ab’isi ntibamumenye.
Yaje mu biwe, ariko abiwe ntibamwakira.
Ariko abamwakiriye bose, bakizera izina ryiwe, yabaye uburenganzira bwo guhinduka abana b’Imana.
Abo ntibavyawe mu buryo busanzwe, biciye mu kwipfuza kw’umubiri canke mu gushaka kw’umugabo; ahubwo bavyawe n’Imana.
Jambo yahindutse umuntu abana natwe, yuzuye ubuntu n’ukuri. Natwe twariboneye ubwiza bwiwe; ni ubwiza bw’Umwana w’ikinege akura kuri Se.
(Yohana yamushingiye intahe aho yasemerera ati: “Uwu ni we navugako igihe navuga nti: ‘Uwuje inyuma yanje aranduta cane kuko yariho jewe ntarabaho.’ ”)
Ku butunzi bwiwe busesekaye, twese twaronseko ubuntu bugeretse ku bundi.
Ivyagezwe vyatanzwe biciye kuri Mose, ariko ubuntu n’ukuri twabihawe biciye muri Yesu Kristo.
Nta muntu n’umwe yigeze abona Imana. Ariko Umwana w’ikinege, na we ubwiwe asanzwe ari Imana, akaba ari mu gikiriza ca Se, ni we yayiduhishuriye.
Iyi ni yo ntahe Yohana yashinze igihe abakuru b’Abayuda b’i Yerusalemu bamutumako abaherezi n’Abalewi ngo bamubaze uwo ari we.
Ntiyatinye kubishura, ahubwo yabivuze avyemanga ati: “Jewe sindi Kristo.”
Na bo baramubaza bati: “None uri nde? Woba uri Eliya?” Na we ati: “Sindi we.” Na bo bati: “Woba uri wa muvugishwa n’Imana?” Arabishura ati: “Oya.”
Ubwa nyuma, baravuga bati: “None uri nde? Tubwire ico tuja kwishura abadutumye. Wewe uvuga ko uri nde?”
Nuko Yohana yishura akoresheje amajambo y’uwavugishwa n’Imana Yesaya ati: “Ndi ijwi ry’uwusemerera mu bugaragwa ati: ‘Nimugororere Uhoraho inzira.’ ”
Mu bari barungitswe kubaza Yohana harimwo Abafarisayo.
Nuko baramubaza bati: “None nimba utari Kristo, ntube Eliya, canke uwuvugishwa n’Imana, ni kuki ubatiza?”
Yohana arishura ati: “Jewe mbatiza abantu mu mazi, ariko hagati muri mwebwe hahagaze umuntu mutazi.
Uwo ni we aza inyuma yanje, ariko ntibimbereye no gupfundurura utugozi tw’ibirato vyiwe.”
Ivyo vyose vyabereye ahitwa Betaniya, hakurya y’uruzi Yorodani, aho Yohana yabatiriza.
Ku musi ukurikira, Yohana abonye Yesu aje amutumbereye, aravuga ati: “Ng’uwu Umwagazi w’intama w’Imana, akura ivyaha vy’abari mw’isi.
Uwu ni we navuga, igihe navuga nti: ‘Uwuje inyuma yanje aranduta cane, kuko yariho jewe ntarabaho.’
Nanje ubwanje sinari ndamuzi, ariko icatumye nza mbatiza mu mazi, kwari ukugira ngo ahishurirwe Abisirayeli.”
Maze Yohana ashinga intahe avuga ati: “Nabonye Mpwemu Yera amanuka ava mw’ijuru mw’ishusho y’inuma, amugumako.
Nanje ubwanje sinari ndamuzi, ariko uwantumye kubatiza mu mazi ni we yambwiye ati: ‘uwo uzobona Mpwemu yururukirako akamugumako, ni we azobatiza abantu muri Mpwemu Yera.’
Ivyo narabibonye, ni co gituma nshinga intahe ko uwo ari Umwana w’Imana.”
Ku musi ukurikira, Yohana yari ahagaze ha handi nyene ari kumwe na babiri mu bigishwa biwe.
Abonye Yesu arengana, aravuga ati: “Ng’uwu Umwagazi w’intama w’Imana!”
Ba bigishwa biwe babiri bavyumvise, baca bakurikira Yesu.
Yesu ahindukiye, abona ko bamukurikiye. Arababaza ati: “Mwipfuza iki?” Baramwishura bati: “Rabi (bisigura ‘Mwigisha’), watse indaro he?”
Arabishura ati: “Nimuze muhirabire.” Aho hari nk’isaha cumi. Nuko bajana na we, babona aho yatse indaro, baca bamarana na we uwo muhingamo.
Umwe muri ba bigishwa babiri bumvise ivyo Yohana yavuze bagaca bakurikira Yesu, yitwa Andereya kandi yavukana na Simoni Petero.
Nuko Andereya aca aja kurondera mwene nyina Simoni, amubwira ati: “Twabonye Mesiya” (bisigura Kristo).
Maze aca amuzana aho Yesu ari. Nuko Yesu yihweza Petero, aramubwira ati: “Uri Simoni mwene Yohana, ariko ugiye kwitwa Kefa” (bisigura Petero).
Ku musi ukurikira, Yesu afata ingingo yo kuja i Galilaya. Ariko aragenda, ahura na Filipo, amubwira ati: “Nkurikira!”
Filipo yava mu gisagara citwa Betesayida, ari na co Andereya na Petero bavamwo.
Nuko Filipo asanga Natanayeli aho ari, amubwira ati: “Twabonye umwe Mose yavugako mu vyagezwe, n’abavugishwa n’Imana bakamwandikako. Ni Yesu w’i Nazareti, mwene Yosefu.”
Natanayeli aramubaza ati: “Hari iciza cova i Nazareti?” Filipo aramwishura ati: “Ingo uvyirabire.”
Yesu abonye Natanayeli aje amutumbereye, amuvugako ati: “Ng’uwu Umwisirayeli w’ukuri atagira ubugunge.”
Natanayeli aramubaza ati: “Wamenye gute?” Yesu aramwishura ati: “Igihe wari wicaye musi y’igiti c’umusukoni, imbere yuko Filipo aguhamagara, nakubona.”
Natanayeli aca aravuga ati: “Rabi, uri Umwana w’Imana, uri Umwami wa Isirayeli.”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Wizeye kubera nakubwiye ko nakubonye igihe wari wicaye musi y’igiti c’umusukoni? Uzobona ibihambaye kurusha ivyo.”
Yongerako ati: “Ndababwire ukuri, muzobona ijuru ryuguruye, abamarayika b’Imana baduga bongera bamanuka ku Mwana w’Umuntu.”
Haciye imisi ibiri, haba ubukwe ahantu hitwa Kana i Galilaya, kandi nyina wa Yesu ni ho yari ari.
Yesu n’abigishwa biwe na bo bari batumiwe muri ubwo bukwe.
Umuvinyu uheze urubanza rutarahera, Mariya nyina wa Yesu abwira Yesu ati: “Nta muvinyu basigaranye.”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Muvyeyi, ivyo hari ico biturabako? Igihe canje ntikirashika?”
Ariko Mariya abwira abakozi ati: “Ico ababwira cose mugikore.”
Hafi yaho hari impange z’amazi zibajwe mu mabuye Abayuda bakoresha mu mugenzo wabo wo kwihumanura, kandi impange imwe yashobora kujamwo nk’amaritiro ijana.
Yesu abwira abakozi ati: “Nimwuzuze izo mpange amazi.” Nuko barazuzuza gushika ku mbiga.
Maze arababwira ati: “Nimudaheko mushire umuteretsi.” Na bo babikora nk’uko ababwiye.
Nuko wa muteretsi yumviriza ya mazi yari yamaze guhinduka umuvinyu. Ntiyari azi aho yavuye, ariko abakozi bayadashe bo bari bahazi. Ni ko guhamagara umukwe,
amubwira ati: “Abandi bantu bose batanga umuvinyu uryoshe cane ubwa mbere, hanyuma abatumire bamaze guhimba, bagatanga uwutaryoshe cane; ariko wewe wagumye uzimana uwuryoshe gushika n’ubu!”
Iki ni co gitangaza ca mbere Yesu yakoze, akaba yagikoreye i Kana mu ntara ya Galilaya. Uko ni ko Yesu yerekanye icubahiro ciwe, maze abigishwa biwe baramwizera.
Hanyuma y’ivyo, Yesu aja i Kaperinawumu ari kumwe na nyina, na bene nyina n’abigishwa biwe, bahamara imisi mike.
Imisi mikuru ya Pasika y’Abayuda yegereje, Yesu aduga i Yerusalemu.
Ashitse mu rusengero, ahasanga abantu bariko baradandaza inka, intama n’inuma; n’abandi bicaye bariko baravunja amafaranga ku mameza.
Yesu atora imigozi ayitsibamwo ikimoko, yirukana abantu bose mu rusengero, asohora n’intama n’inka, asanzaza ibiceri vy’abavunja amafaranga, atembagariza n’imeza zabo hasi.
Abariko baragurisha inuma arababwira ati: “Sohora ibi bintu! Reka guhindura inzu ya Data isoko!”
Abigishwa biwe baca baribuka ijambo ryo mu Vyanditswe Vyera rivuga ngo: “Ishaka mfitiye inzu yawe ryaka muri jewe nk’umuriro.”
Abayuda baramubaza bati: “Ni ikihe gitangaza wokora cotwereka ububasha ufise bwo gukora ibi?”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Nimusambure uru rusengero, nanje ndarwubaka mu misi itatu.”
Na bo baramwishura bati: “Kwubaka uru rusengero vyafashe imyaka mirongo ine n’itandatu, none nawe uvuga ko worwubaka mu misi itatu?”
Ariko Yesu yavuze urusengero, ashaka kuvuga umubiri wiwe.
Amaze kuzuka, abigishwa biwe baciye bibuka ko ivyo yari yarabivuze, baca bizera Ivyanditswe n’amajambo Yesu yari yaravuze.
Yesu ari i Yerusalemu ku Musi mukuru wa Pasika, abantu benshi baramwizeye babonye ibitangaza akora.
Ariko Yesu ntiyabizigira kuko yari azi imitima yabo bose.
Ntiyari akeneye ko bamubwira uko umuntu ameze, kuko yari azi ibiri mu mutima w’umuntu wese.
Hari umuntu yitwa Nikodemu, yari Umufarisayo akaba n’umwe mu bagize inama nkuru y’idini ry’Abayuda.
Umusi umwe aza kuraba Yesu mw’ijoro aramubwira ati: “Rabi, turazi ko uri umwigisha yavuye ku Mana, kuko nta muntu yoshobora gukora ibitangaza ukora, Imana itari kumwe na we.”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Ndakubwire ukuri, nta muntu n’umwe ashobora kubona Ubwami bw’Imana, atavutse ubwa kabiri.”
Nikodemu aramubaza ati: “Mbega umuntu ashaje yoshobora kuvuka ubwa kabiri gute? Yoshobora gusubira mu nda ya nyina, akongera akavuka?”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Ndakubwire ukuri, nta muntu n’umwe ashobora kwinjira mu Bwami bw’Imana atavyawe n’amazi na Mpwemu.
Umubiri uvyara umubiri, ariko Mpwemu avyara impwemu.
Ntutangazwe n’uko ndakubwiye nti: ‘Utegerezwa kuvuka ubwa kabiri.’
Umuyaga uhuhutira aho ushaka, wewe ukumva uhuhuta gusa, ariko ntushobora kumenya iyo uzanana canke iyo uja. Uko ni ko bimera no ku wuvyawe na Mpwemu.”
Nikodemu aramubaza ati: “None ivyo bishoboka bite?”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Wewe ko uri umwigisha yubashwe muri Isirayeli, bigenda gute ngo ntutahure ibi?
Ndakubwire ukuri, twebwe tuvuga ivyo tuzi, kandi dushingira intahe ivyo twabonye, ariko ntimwemera intahe yacu.
Nimba nababwiye ibintu vyo kw’isi ntimwizere, mwoshobora mute kwizera ndababwiye ivyo mw’ijuru?
Nta n’umwe arigera aduga mw’ijuru, kiretse Umwana w’Umuntu yamanutse avayo.
Nk’uko Mose yamanitse inzoka ku giti mu bugaragwa, ni ko n’Umwana w’Umuntu ategerezwa kumanikwa,
kugira ngo uwumwizera wese aronke ubugingo budashira.
Kuko Imana yakunze abari kw’isi cane, bituma itanga Umwana wayo w’ikinege, kugira ngo uwumwizera wese ntaranduke, ariko aronke ubugingo budashira.
Erega Imana ntiyatumye Umwana wayo kw’isi gucira urubanza abari kw’isi, ahubwo yamutumye kugira ngo ibakize biciye muri we.
Uwizeye Umwana w’Imana ntashobora gutsindwa n’urubanza. Ariko uwutamwizera wese aramaze gutsindwa n’urubanza, kuko atizeye izina ry’Umwana w’ikinege w’Imana.
Iki ni co kibatsindisha: umuco waje mw’isi, ariko abantu bakunda umwijima kuruta umuco, kuko ibikorwa vyabo ari bibi.
Umuntu wese akora ibibi yanka umuco, kandi ntiyegera umuco kuko atinya ko ibikorwa vyiwe bibi bija ahabona.
Ariko umuntu wese akora ivy’ukuri yegera umuco, kugira ngo bigaragare ko ivyo akora abikorera mu kwubaha Imana.”
Hanyuma y’ivyo, Yesu ajana n’abigishwa biwe mu ntara ya Yudaya, agumana na bo igihe abatiza.
Ico gihe Yohana na we yariko arabatiriza ahitwa Ayinoni hafi y’i Salimu, kuko hari amazi menshi, kandi abantu baguma baza kubatizwa.
(Aho hari imbere yuko Yohana atabwa mw’ibohero.)
Bamwe mu bigishwa ba Yohana batangura guharira n’uwundi Muyuda umwe ku bijanye n’umugenzo wo kwihumanura.
Nuko baza aho Yohana ari bamubwira bati: “Rabi, wa muntu yari kumwe na we hakurya y’uruzi Yorodani, umwe washingira intahe, ariko arabatiza kandi abantu bose baja iyo ari.”
Yohana arabishura ati: “Nta co muntu ashobora kuronka atagihawe kivuye mw’ijuru ku Mana.
Mwebwe ubwanyu muri ivyabona ko navuze nti: ‘Jewe sindi Kristo, ahubwo natumwe kumutegurira inzira.’
Erega umugeni ni uw’umukwe. Ariko umugenzi ahagarikiye umukwe amuhagarara i ruhande akamwumviriza, akanezerwa no kwumva ijwi ryiwe. Uwo ni wo munezero wanje kandi uruzuye.
Akwiye kurushiriza kuba mukuru, nanje nkarushiriza kuba muto.
Uwamanutse ava mw’ijuru aruta bose, uwaje ava kw’isi ni uw’isi kandi avuga nk’uw’isi nyene, ariko uwaje ava mw’ijuru aruta bose.
Uwo ashingira intahe ivyo yabonye n’ivyo yumvise, yamara nta n’umwe yemera intahe yiwe.
Ariko uwemera intahe yiwe wese aba yemeje ko Imana ivuga ukuri.
Uwo Imana yatumye avuga amajambo y’Imana, kuko Imana imuha Mpwemu itamupimiye.
Se arakunda Umwana kandi yamuhaye kuganza vyose.
Uwizera Umwana afise ubugingo budashira, ariko uwutamwizera ntazoronka ubugingo budashira, ahubwo uburake bw’Imana buguma kuri we.”
Nuko Yesu yumva ko Abafarisayo bamenye ko aronka kandi akabatiza abigishwa benshi kurusha Yohana.
Ariko Yesu ubwiwe si we yabatiza, ahubwo bari abigishwa biwe.
Nuko aca ava i Yudaya asubira i Galilaya.
Mu kujayo, vyabaye ngombwa ko aca i Samariya.
Nuko ashika mu gisagara c’i Samariya citwa Sukara, hafi y’itongo Yakobo yari yarahaye umuhungu wiwe Yosefu.
Aho ni ho hari iriba rya Yakobo. Yesu aruhijwe n’urugendo, yicara kuri iryo riba. Aho hari nk’isaha zitandatu z’umurango.
Nuko haza umugore w’Umunyasamariya kuvoma amazi, Yesu aramubwira ati: “Mpa amazi yo kunywa.”
(Ico gihe, abigishwa biwe bari bagiye mu gisagara kurondera ivyokurya.)
Wa Musamariyakazi aramubwira ati: “Wewe uri Umuyuda nanje ndi Umusamariyakazi. Bigenda gute ngo unsabe amazi yo kunywa?” (Mu bisanzwe, Abayuda n’Abasamariya baranenana.)
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Iyo uba wari uzi ingabire y’Imana, akamenya n’uwugusavye amazi yo kunywa uwo ari we, wari kumusaba na we akaguha amazi y’ubugingo.”
Wa mugore aramwishura ati: “Nyakwubahwa, nta co ufise co kuvomesha kandi iriba ni rirerire. Ayo mazi y’ubugingo woyakura he?
Wewe uruta sogokuruza Yakobo yaduhaye iri riba kandi na we ubwiwe akanywa amazi yaryo, n’abana biwe n’ibitungwa vyiwe?”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Umuntu wese anywa kuri aya mazi azosubira kugira inyota,
ariko uwunywa amazi ntanga ntazosubira kugira inyota. Ahubwo ayo mazi azohinduka isoko ridudubiza muri we, rizana ubugingo budashira.”
Wa mugore aramubwira ati: “Nyakwubahwa, mpa kuri ayo mazi kugira ngo sinzosubire kunyoterwa ngo name nza ngaha kuvoma.”
Yesu aramubwira ati: “Genda uhamagare umugabo wawe uce ugaruka.”
Aramwishura ati: “Nta mugabo mfise.” Yesu aramubwira ati: “Uvuze ukuri! Nta mugabo ufise.
Kuko wabanye n’abagabo batanu, kandi n’uwo muri kumwe ubu si umugabo wawe. Ivyo uvuze ni ukuri.”
Wa mugore aramwishura ati: “Nyakwubahwa, ndabona ko uri uwuvugishwa n’Imana.
Ba sogokuruza basengera kuri uwu musozi, ariko mwebwe Abayuda muvuga ko ikibanza co gusengeramwo ari i Yerusalemu.”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Mupfasoni, nunyizere: igihe kiraje aho mutazorinda kuja gusengera Data kuri uwu musozi canke i Yerusalemu.
Mwebwe Abasamariya musenga ico mutazi, ariko twebwe dusenga ico tuzi, kuko agakiza gaturuka mu Bayuda.
Ariko igihe kiraje kandi kirashitse aho abasenga b’ukuri bazosenga Data mu Mpwemu no mu kuri. Abo ni bo basenzi Data arondera.
Imana ni impwemu, kandi abayisenga bakwiye kuyisenga mu Mpwemu no mu kuri.”
Wa mugore aravuga ati: “Ndazi ko Mesiya (yitwa Kristo) azoza. Niyaza, azodusobanurira vyose.”
Yesu aramubwira ati: “Jewe nyene turiko turavugana, ni jewe Kristo.”

Muri ako kanya, abigishwa biwe baragaruka, maze batangazwa cane no kubona Yesu ariko aravugana n’umugore. Ariko ntihagira uwubahuka kumubaza ati: “Ushaka iki?” canke ati: “Ni kuki uvugana n’uwo mugore?”
Wa mugore asiga umubindi wiwe kw’iriba, asubira mu gisagara, abarira abantu ati:
“Nimuze murabe umuntu yambwiye ivyo nakoze vyose. Ashobora kuba ari we Kristo.”
Nuko baca barasohoka bava mu gisagara baja iyo Yesu ari.
Muri ico gihe, abigishwa bariko baramwinginga bati: “Rabi, gira ico ufunguye.”
Ariko arababwira ati: “Ndafise ivyokurya mwebwe mutazi.”
Abigishwa barabazanya bati: “Mbega hari uwoba yamuzaniye ivyokurya?”
Yesu arababwira ati: “Ivyokurya vyanje ni ugukora ivyo uwantumye agomba, no guheraheza igikorwa ciwe.
Mbega ntimuvuga ngo: ‘Hasigaye amezi ane ngo iyimbura rishike’? Umve ndababwire, nimwunamure amaso yanyu murabe! Imirima ireze, igeze kwimbura.
N’ubu, uwimbura ariko arahabwa impembo yiwe kandi ariko aregeraniriza ivyimburwa mu bugingo budashira, kugira ngo uwubiba n’uwimbura bazonezeranwe.
Kuko wa mugani uvuga ukuri ngo: ‘Umwe arabiba, uwundi akimbura.’
Nabarungitse kwimbura aho mutabiriye akuya. Abandi baracumukuye, none ni mwebwe mwironkeye inyungu mu buruhe bwabo.”
Nuko Abasamariya benshi bo muri ico gisagara bizera Yesu kubera wa mugore yababwiye ati: “Yambwiye ivyo nakoze vyose.”
Bashitse aho ari, baramwinginga ngo agumane na bo, maze ahamara imisi ibiri.
Kandi kubera amajambo yiwe, n’abandi benshi barizera.
Babwira wa mugore bati: “Ubu ntitucizeye kubera ivyo watubwiye gusa; kuko twamwiyumviye, kandi twamenye neza ko ari we Mukiza w’isi.”
Haheze imisi ibiri, Yesu ava i Samariya aja i Galilaya.
(Yesu ubwiwe yari yaravuze ko ata wuvugishwa n’Imana ahabwa iteka mu gihugu ciwe.)
Ashitse i Galilaya, Abanyagalilaya baramwakira. Bari barabonye ivyo yakoreye i Yerusalemu ku Musi mukuru wa Pasika, kuko ari yo bari bari.
Yongera kuja i Kana mu ntara ya Galilaya, hamwe yahindura amazi umuvinyu. Aho hari umutware yakora i bwami yari afise umuhungu arwariye i Kaperinawumu.
Yumvise ko Yesu yashitse i Galilaya avuye i Yudaya, aja iyo ari aramwinginga ngo aje i Kaperinawumu amukirize umuhungu wiwe yari ku mpfiro.
Yesu aramubwira ati: “Mbega ntimushobora kwizera mutabonye ibimenyetso n’ibitangaza?”
Wa mutware akora i bwami aramubwira ati: “Nyakwubahwa, ingo tujane iwanje umwana wanje ataracikana.”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Nutahe, umwana wawe ni muzima.” Nuko wa muntu yizera amajambo ya Yesu, aca arataha.
Akiri mu nzira, abakozi biwe baza kumusanganira bamubwira ko umuhungu wiwe ari muzima.
Ababajije igihe umuhungu wiwe yakiriye, bamubwira bati: “Ejo isaha indwi z’umuhingamo ni ho umururumbo wahera.”
Se w’umwana aca asanga hari kuri ya saha Yesu yamubwira ati: “Umwana wawe ni muzima.” Nuko aca yizera Yesu we n’abo mu nzu yiwe bose.
Iki cabaye igitangaza ca kabiri Yesu yakoze agarutse i Galilaya avuye i Yudaya.
Hanyuma y’ivyo, Yesu aduga i Yerusalemu ku musi mukuru w’Abayuda.
Aho i Yerusalemu, hafi y’irembo ry’intama, hari ikidengeri citwa Betesida mu rurimi rw’Igiheburayo, cari gikikujwe n’amabaraza atanu.
Muri ayo mabaraza, hari haryamye abarwayi benshi, harimwo impumyi, abacumbagira, n’abanyunyutse. [Bari barindiriye ko amazi azikuruka.
Kuko rimwe na rimwe umumarayika w’Umwami Imana yaramanuka akazikurura amazi. Maze uwa mbere aterewe mu kidengeri amazi azikurutse, yaca akira ingwara iyo ari yo yose yaba arwaye.]
Umwe muri bo, yari amaze imyaka mirongo itatu n’umunani arwaye.
Yesu amubonye aryamye aho, akamenya n’uko amaze igihe kirekire arwaye, aramubaza ati: “Urashaka gukira?”
Wa muntu arwaye aramwishura ati: “Nyakwubahwa, nta muntu mfise wo kunterera mu kidengeri iyo mazi azikurutse; kuko nkiriko ndagerageza kujayo, nsanga hari uwantanzeyo.”
Maze Yesu aramubwira ati: “Haguruka, ikorere ikirago cawe ugendagende.”
Ubwo nyene wa muntu arakira, aterura ikirago ciwe atangura kugendagenda. Ivyo vyabaye ku musi w’Isabato.
Abakuru b’Abayuda babwira wa muntu yakize bati: “Uwu ni umusi w’Isabato; ivyagezwe ntibikwemerera kwikorera ikirago cawe.”
Arabishura ati: “Umuntu yankijije ni we yambwiye ati: ‘Ikorere ikirago cawe ugendagende.’ ”
Na bo baramubaza bati: “Ni nde yakubwiye ngo wikorere ikirago cawe ugendagende?”
Wa muntu yakize ntiyari azi uwamukijije awo ari we, kuko Yesu yaciye yigira, kandi aho hantu hari abantu benshi.
Mu nyuma, Yesu amusanga mu rusengero aramubwira ati: “Urabona ko wakize! Ntuze usubire gucumura kugira ngo ntuze ushikirwe n’icago kirengeye ico wahorana.”
Wa muntu aca aragenda abwira ba bakuru b’Abayuda ko ari Yesu yamukijije.
Nuko abakuru b’Abayuda batangura guhama Yesu, kuko yakoze ivyo ku musi w’Isabato.
Ariko Yesu arababwira ati: “Gushika n’ubu Data ariko arakora; kandi nanje ndiko ndakora.”
Ivyo vyatumye Abayuda barushiriza kurondera ingene bomwica; kuko uretse kutubahiriza Isabato, yavuze ko Imana ari Se, gutyo yigira uwungana n’Imana.
Yesu arababwira ati: “Ndababwire ukuri, Umwana nta co ashobora gukora acigeneye, ariko akora ico abonye Se akora gusa. Ico se akora, ni co n’Umwana akora.
Kuko Se arakunda Umwana akamwereka ivyo ariko arakora vyose. Ndetse azomwereka ibikorwa bikomeye kuruta ibi, kugira ngo mwumirwe.
Kuko nk’uko Data azura abapfuye akabaha ubugingo, ni ko n’Umwana aha ubugingo uwo ashatse kubuha.
Vyongeye, Data nta muntu acira urubanza. Ahubwo yahaye Umwana ububasha bwose bwo guca imanza,
kugira ngo bose bubahe Umwana nk’uko bubaha Se. Uwutubaha Umwana, ntiyubaha na Se yamutumye.
Ndababwire ukuri, umuntu wese yumva ijambo ryanje, akizera uwantumye, afise ubugingo budashira. Kandi uwo ntazotsindwa n’urubanza, ahubwo aramaze kuva mu rupfu aja mu bugingo.
Ndababwire ukuri, igihe kiraje kandi kirashitse, aho abapfuye bazokwumva ijwi ry’Umwana w’Imana kandi abazoryumva bazogira ubugingo.
Nk’uko Data afise ubugingo muri we, ni ko yahaye Umwana kugira ubwo bugingo muri we.
Kandi yamuhaye ububasha bwo guca imanza kuko ari Umwana w’Umuntu.
Ibi ntibibatangaze, kuko igihe kiraje aho abari mu mva bose bazokwumva ijwi ryiwe,
hanyuma bazuke. Abakoze ivyiza, bazozukira ubugingo, abakoze ibibi na bo bazukire gutsindwa n’urubanza.
Jewe nta co nshobora gukora nigeneye. Nca urubanza nkurikije ivyo Data ambwiye gusa, kandi urubanza rwanje ruragororotse, kuko ntakora ivyo nigombeye, ahubwo nkora ivyo uwantumye agomba.
Nimba nishingira intahe, intahe yanje si iy’ukuri.
Hari uwundi anshingira intahe, kandi ndazi ko intahe anshingira ari iy’ukuri.
Mwatumye intumwa kuri Yohana, kandi intahe yanshingiye ni iy’ukuri.
Si ukuvuga ko nkeneye intahe z’abantu; ariko ibi ndabivuze kugira ngo mukizwe.
Yohana yari nk’itara ryaka rikabonesha, kandi mwamaze igihe munezererewe umuco wiwe.
Intahe mfise iraruta iya Yohana. Kuko ibikorwa Data yampaye gushitsa ari na vyo ndiko ndakora, bishinga intahe ko ari Data yantumye.
Kandi na Data yantumye ubwiwe aranshingira intahe. Ntimurigera mwumva ijwi ryiwe canke ngo mumubone amaso mu yandi,
kandi n’ijambo ryiwe ntiriguma muri mwebwe, kuko mutizera uwo yatumye.
Mwiga Ivyanditswe n’umwete mwinshi kuko mwibaza ko bishobora kubaha ubugingo budashira. Ivyo Vyanditswe nyene ni vyo binshingira intahe,
yamara ntimushaka kuza aho ndi ngo muronke ubwo bugingo.
Jewe sindondera gushimwa n’abantu,
kuko ndabazi, ndazi ko ata gukunda Imana kuri mu mitima yanyu.
Naje mw’izina rya Data, ariko ntimwanyakira; yamara nihagira uwundi aza mw’izina ryiwe ubwiwe, muzomwakira.
Mbega mwokwizera gute kandi murondera gushimana hagati yanyu, aho kurondera gushimwa n’Imana imwe rudende?
Ariko ntimwibaze ko ari jewe nzobagiriza imbere ya Data. Uwubagiriza ni Mose, uwo mwizigiye.
Iyo mwizera Mose, nanje mwonyizeye, kuko yanditse avuga kuri jewe.
None nimba mutizera ivyo yanditse, mwokwizera gute amajambo yanje?”
Hanyuma y’ivyo, Yesu arajabuka aja ku ruhande rwo hakurya y’ikiyaga c’i Galilaya (ari co kiyaga c’i Tiberiya).
Abantu isinzi baramukurikira kuko bari babonye ibitangaza yari yakoze mu gukiza abarwaye.
Nuko Yesu aduga ku musozi yicarana n’abigishwa biwe.
Ico gihe Umusi mukuru wa Pasika w’Abayuda wari wegereje.
Yesu abonye abantu isinzi baje bamugana, abarira Filipo ati: “Ni hehe twogurira ivyokurya vyo kugaburira aba bantu bose?”
Yabajije ico kibazo nk’uwumugeza, kuko we yari azi ico agiye gukora.
Filipo aramwishura ati: “Naho tworonka idenariyo amajana abiri, ntitwokuramwo ivyokurya bikwiye n’umutamiro w’umwe umwe.”
Umwe mu bigishwa biwe yitwa Andereya, yavukana na Simoni Petero, abwira Yesu ati:
“Hano hariho umuhungu afise imikate y’ingano itanu n’ifi zibiri. Ariko vyomara iki ku bantu bangana uku?”
Yesu aravuga ati: “Nimubicarike.” Aho hantu hari ubwatsi bwinshi. Nuko ba bantu baricara (abagabo bonyene bashika ibihumbi bitanu).
Yesu afata ya mikate, ayishimira Imana, ayiha abari bicaye aho. Na za fi azigenza uko. Abantu bararya barikura.
Bamaze guhaga bose, Yesu abwira abigishwa biwe ati: “Nimwegeranye utumanyu twasigaye, ntihagire ibipfa ubusa.”
Nuko begeranya utumanyu twa ya mikate itanu y’ingano abantu bariye, buzuza ibiseke cumi na bibiri.
Abantu babonye igitangaza Yesu akoze baravuga bati: “Ni ivy’ukuri uwu ni wa muvugishwa twari twiteze kw’isi.”
Yesu amenye ko bagira baze ngo bamwimike ku nguvu nk’umwami, aca asubira ku musozi ari wenyene.
Bugorovye, abigishwa ba Yesu bamanuka ku kiyaga.
Kubera bwari bwije kandi Yesu atari bwagaruke aho bari bari, burira ubwato kugira ngo bajabuke ikiyaga baje i Kaperinawumu.
Ico gihe, umuyaga wariko urahuhuta cane bituma haba imipfunda myinshi mu kiyaga.
Bamaze gusoza nk’ibirometero bitanu, babona Yesu agendagenda ku mazi yegera ubwato barimwo, maze bagira ubwoba.
Yesu arababwira ati: “Ni jewe; ntimugire ubwoba.”
Nuko bashaka kumwuriza mu bwato, ariko buba burashitse ku nkengera aho bari bagiye.
Ku musi ukurikira, ba bantu isinzi bari basigaye hakurya y’ikiyaga bibuka ko hari ubwato bumwe gusa, kandi ko Yesu atinjiranye n’abigishwa biwe muri bwo, ahubwo ko bijanye bonyene.
N’ubundi bwato bwinshi buvuye i Tiberiya, buraza bushika hamwe Umwami Yesu yahezagirira imikate abantu bakayifungura.
Abantu bamaze kubona ko Yesu n’abigishwa biwe atari ho bari, baca binjira muri ubwo bwato baja i Kaperinawumu kumuronderayo.
Bamusanze aho yari ari hakurya y’ikiyaga, baramubaza bati: “Mwigisha, washitse hano ryari?”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Ndababwire ukuri, ntimuriko mundondera kubera mwatahuye ibitangaza mwabonye nkora, ahubwo mundondera kuko nabagaburiye imikate mugahaga.
Ntimugakorere ivyokurya bibora, ahubwo nimukorere ivyokurya bihoraho kandi bitanga ubugingo budashira, ivyo Umwana w’Umuntu azobaha, kuko Imana Data ari we yahaye ububasha bwo gukora ivyo.”
Baramubaza bati: “Natwe turashaka gukora ibikorwa vy’Imana. None tubigenze gute?”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Iki ni co gikorwa Imana ishaka ko mukora: nimwizere uwo yatumye.”
Baramubwira bati: “Mbega nta gitangaza wokora kugira ngo tukibone hanyuma twizere? Ni ikihe wokora?
Ba sogokuruza bacu baririye manu mu bugaragwa. Ivyanditswe bivuga biti: ‘Mose yabahaye imikate ivuye mw’ijuru ngo bayirye.’ ”
Yesu arababwira ati: “Ndababwire ukuri, Mose si we yabahaye imikate ivuye mw’ijuru, ariko Data ni we yayibahaye, kandi ni we abaha umukate w’ukuri uvuye mw’ijuru.
Kuko umukate w’Imana ni uwumanuka uvuye mw’ijuru ugaha isi ubugingo.”
Baramubwira bati: “Nyakwubahwa, turagusavye wame uduha uwo mukate imisi yose.”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Ni jewe mukate w’ubugingo. Uwuza aho ndi ntazosubira gusonza, kandi uwunyizera ntazosubira kunyoterwa.
Ariko nk’uko nabibabwiye, muramaze kumbona yamara ntimurizera.
Ariko abo Data yampaye bose, bazoza aho ndi kandi sinzokwigera ndabirukana.
Kuko sinamanutse mva mw’ijuru nje gukora ivyo nshaka, ariko nazanywe no gukora ivyo uwantumye ashaka.
Kandi ivyo uwantumye ashaka ni ibi: ko ntatakaza n’umwe mu bo yampaye, ariko ashaka ko nzobazura ku musi wa nyuma.
Kuko ico Data ashaka ni uko uwubonye Umwana akamwizera agira ubugingo budashira, kandi nanje nzomuzura ku musi wa nyuma.”
Maze Abayuda batangura kumwidogera kuko avuze ati: “Ni jewe mukate wamanutse uva mw’ijuru.”
Baravuga bati: “Mbega uwu si Yesu mwene Yosefu? Se na nyina ntitubazi? None ni gute avuga ngo: ‘Namanutse mva mw’ijuru’?”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Nimureke kwidoga hagati muri mwebwe.
Nta muntu n’umwe ashobora kuza aho ndi Data yantumye atamuzanye, kandi nzomuzura ku musi wa nyuma.
Abavugishwa n’Imana banditse bati: ‘Bose bazokwigishwa n’Imana.’ Ni co gituma umuntu wese yumvirije Data akakira inyigisho ziwe, aza aho ndi.
Ivyo ntibisigura ko hari umuntu amaze kubona Data; uwatumwe avuye ku Mana wenyene ni we amaze kubona Data.
Ndababwire ukuri, uwizera afise ubugingo budashira.
Ni jewe mukate w’ubugingo.
Ba sogokuruza banyu baririye manu mu bugaragwa, yamara barapfuye.
Ariko hano hari umukate uva mw’ijuru, kandi uwuwurya ntazopfa.
Ni jewe mukate w’ubugingo wamanutse uva mw’ijuru. Umuntu wese arya uwo mukate azobaho ibihe bidashira. Uwo mukate ni umubiri wanje nzotanga kugira ngo isi igire ubugingo.”
Maze Abayuda batangura guharira hagati yabo bashavuye bati: “Ni gute uwu mugabo yoduha umubiri wiwe ngo tuwurye?”
Yesu arababwira ati: “Ndababwire ukuri, ni mutarya umubiri w’Umwana w’Umuntu mukanywa n’amaraso yiwe, nta bugingo muzogira muri mwebwe.
Ariko umuntu wese arya umubiri wanje akanywa n’amaraso yanje afise ubugingo budashira, kandi nzomuzura ku musi wa nyuma.
Kuko umubiri wanje ni ico kurya c’ukuri n’amaraso yanje ni ico kunywa c’ukuri.
Umuntu wese arya umubiri wanje akanywa n’amaraso yanje aguma muri jewe nanje nkaguma muri we.
Data yantumye ni muzima kandi ndiho ku bwiwe; ni ko n’uwundya na we azobaho ku bwanje.
Uwu ni wo mukate wamanutse uva mw’ijuru; ntusa na ya manu ba sogokuruza banyu baririye mu bugaragwa ariko bagapfa. Uwurya uwu mukate azobaho ibihe bidashira.”
Yesu yavuze ivyo ariko arigishiriza mw’isinagogi i Kaperinawumu.
Benshi bo mu bigishwa biwe bavyumvise baravuga bati: “Izi nyigisho ziragumye. Ni nde yozemera?”
Yesu amenye ko abigishwa biwe bariko baridoga, arababaza ati: “Mbega ivyo ndababwiye birabatsitaje?
None hamwe mwobona Umwana w’Umuntu aduga asubira iyo yaje ava, mwovuga iki?
Mpwemu w’Imana ni we atanga ubugingo, umuntu nta co yokwishoboza. Amajambo nababwiye arimwo impwemu kandi ni ubugingo.
Ariko bamwe muri mwebwe ntibizera.” Kuko kuva mu ntago, Yesu yari azi abatizera n’uwuzomugurisha.
Yongerako ati: “Ni co gituma nababwiye ko ata muntu ashobora kuza aho ndi atabishobojwe na Data.”
Kuva ico gihe benshi mu bigishwa biwe baca baragenda ntibasubira kumukurikira.
Yesu ahindukirira bamwe cumi na babiri arababaza ati: “Mbega namwe murashaka kwigira?”
Simoni Petero aramwishura ati: “Mwami, twokuvako tugakurikira nde? Erega wewe ufise amajambo atanga ubugingo budashira!
Twebwe twarakwizeye turatahura ko uri Uwera w’Imana.”
Yesu aca arababwira ati: “Sinabatoranije muri cumi na babiri? Ariko umwe muri mwebwe ni uwa Satani.”
(Aho yariko avuga Yuda, mwene Simoni Isikariyote. Kuko naho yari umwe muri bamwe cumi na babiri, ni we yari agiye kumugurisha.)
Inyuma y’ivyo, Yesu agendagenda mu ntara ya Galilaya. Ntiyashaka kugenda mu ntara ya Yudaya kuko abakuru b’Abayuda baho bariko barondera ingene bomwica.
Ico gihe, umusi mukuru w’insago Abayuda bahimbaza wari wegereje.
Nuko bene nyina ba Yesu baramubwira bati: “Va mu ntara ya Galilaya uje mu ntara ya Yudaya kugira ngo abigishwa bawe babayo babone ibikorwa ukora.
Nta muntu arondera kumenyekana hanyuma ngo akore yinyegeje. Ko uriko urakora ibikorwa nk’ibi, niwiyereke isi!”
Mu bisanzwe, na bene nyina na bo ntibamwizera.
Yesu arababwira ati: “Igihe canje ntikirashika. Kuri mwebwe igihe cose ni ciza.
Isi ntishobora kubanka, ariko jewe iranyanka kuko ndayagiriza ibikorwa bibi.
Mwebwe nimugende ku musi mukuru. Jewe sinjayo kuko igihe canje kitarashika.”
Ahejeje kubabwira ivyo, aca aguma mu ntara ya Galilaya.
Ariko bene nyina bamaze kugenda ku musi mukuru, Yesu na we aragenda ariko ntiyajayo ku mugaragaro, agenda yinyegeje.
Kuri uwo musi mukuru, abakuru b’Abayuda bariko bararondera Yesu, babaza bati: “Ari he?”
Muri iryo sinzi ry’abantu bari aho, hari urusaku rwinshi bavugana ku vya Yesu. Bamwe bavuga bati: “Ni umuntu mwiza.” Abandi bakavuga bati: “Oya, ni umuntu azimiza abantu.”
Ariko nta n’umwe yubahuka kuvuga ivyiwe ku mugaragaro kuko batinya Abayuda.
Umusi ugeze hagati, Yesu yinjira mu rusengero atangura kwigisha.
Abayuda bamwumvise baratangara, barabaza bati: “Uwo mugabo azi vyinshi cane kandi atize. Ivyo bishoboka gute?”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Inyigisho ntanga si izanje, ziva ku wantumye.
Umuntu wese ahisemwo gukora ivyo Imana ishaka azotahura nimba inyigisho zanje ziva ku Mana canke ko ari amajambo yanje gusa.
Uwuvuga amajambo yiwe ubwiwe, aba arondera icubahiro ciwe, ariko uwurondera icubahiro c’uwamutumye avuga ukuri, nta binyoma biri muri we.
Mbega Mose ntiyabahaye Ivyagezwe? Ariko nta n’umwe muri mwebwe avyubahiriza. Ni kuki mushaka kunyica?”
Abantu benshi baravuga bati: “Wewe uboshwe na dayimoni. Ni nde ashaka kukwica?”
Yesu arababwira ati: “Nakoze igitangaza kimwe ku musi w’Isabato mwese muratangara.
Ariko namwe iyo mwubahiriza icagezwe ca Mose co gukeba abana b’abahungu ku musi w’Isabato, ico na co ni igikorwa. (Ariko ico cagezwe nticazanywe na Mose, catanguriye kuri ba sogokuruza.)
Nimba mushobora gukeba umwana w’umuhungu ku musi w’Isabato kugira ngo mwubahirize icagezwe ca Mose, ni kuki munshavurira iyo nkijije umuntu ku musi w’Isabato.
Nimureke guca imanza mufatiye ku vyo mubona, nimuce imanza zigororotse.”
Ico gihe bamwe mu bantu baba i Yerusalemu batangura kubazanya bati: “Mbega uwu si wa muntu bashaka kwica?
Raba, ariko aravuga ku mugaragaro, kandi nta co bamugize. None abakuru boba bemeye vy’ukuri ko ari we Kristo?
Ariko turazi iyo uwu mugabo ava; Kristo ni yaza, nta muntu n’umwe azomenya iyo aje ava.”
Yesu akiriko arigisha mu rusengero arasemerera ati: “Ni vyo muranzi, kandi murazi aho mva. Yamara sinaje mu bushobozi bwanje. Uwantumye ni umunyakuri, kandi ntimumuzi.
Ariko jewe ndamuzi kuko mva iwe kandi ni we yantumye.”
Maze abantu baca bagerageza kumufata ariko nta n’umwe yashoboye kumukozako ukuboko kuko igihe ciwe kitari bwashike.
Ariko benshi mu bari aho baramwizeye, bavuga bati: “None Kristo niyaza azokora ibitangaza birenze ivyo uwu ariko arakora?”
Abafarisayo bumvise ivyo abantu bariko barongoreranira kuri Yesu, baca bafatanya n’abakuru b’abaherezi batuma abarinzi b’urusengero gufata Yesu.
Yesu aravuga ati: “Ndi kumwe namwe igihe gito gusa, hanyuma nzoca nsubira ku wantumye.
Muzondondera ariko ntimuzombona; kandi ntimushobora gushika aho ngiye.”
Abayuda baravugana bati: “Mbega uwu mugabo afise umugambi wo kuja he, aho tudashobora kumubona? Yoba ashaka kuja mu Bayuda baba mu Bagiriki? Yoba ashaka kuja kwigisha Abagiriki?
Yashatse kuvuga iki aho yavuga ngo: ‘Muzondondera ariko ntimuzombona,’ canke ngo: ‘aho ngiye ntimushobora kuhashika’?”
Ku musi wa nyuma w’iyo misi mikuru, ari wo uruta iyindi, Yesu arahaguruka avuga n’ijwi rirenga ati: “Uwunyotewe wese naze aho ndi anywe.
Uwunyizera wese, inzuzi z’amazi y’ubugingo zizotemba ziva mu mutima wiwe, nk’uko Ivyanditswe bivuga.”
Aho Yesu yashaka kuvuga kuri Mpwemu Yera, uwo abamwizera bari bagiye guhabwa. Gushika ico gihe Mpwemu Yera ntiyari bwatangwe, kuko Yesu atari bwashike mu bwiza bwiwe.
Bumvise ayo majambo, bamwe mu bantu bari aho baravuga bati: “Ni ivy’ukuri uwu muntu ni uwuvugishwa n’Imana!”
Abandi bavuga bati: “Ni Kristo.” Abandi na bo bati: “Kristo ntashobora kuva i Galilaya.
Mbega Ivyanditswe ntibivuga ko Kristo azova mu ruvyaro rwa Dawidi i Betelehemu, igisagara Dawidi yabayemwo?”
Maze bituma abantu batumvikana kubera Yesu.
Bamwe muri bo bashaka kumufata, ariko nta n’umwe yubahutse kumukozako ukuboko.
Hanyuma abarinzi b’urusengero bagarutse aho abaherezi bakuru n’Abafarisayo bari batazanye Yesu, barababaza bati: “Ni kuki mutamuzanye?”
Ba barinzi barabishura bati: “Nta muntu yigeze kuvuga nk’uko uwu mugabo avuga!”
Abafarisayo barababaza bati: “Mushaka kuvuga ko namwe yabazimije?
Nta n’umwe muri twebwe abakuru canke Abafarisayo yamwizeye.
Abamwizeye ni iryo sinzi ry’abantu batazi Ivyagezwe, kandi abo bariko umuvumo!”
Umufarisayo yitwa Nikodemu, umwe yaja aho Yesu yari ari mw’ijoro, arababaza ati:
“Mbega Ivyagezwe vyacu biratwemerera gucira urubanza umuntu tutabanje kumwumviriza ngo tumenye ivyo yakoze?”
Na bo baramwishura bati: “Mbega nawe uva i Galilaya? Urasoma neza Ivyanditswe uzobona ko ata wuvugishwa n’Imana ava i Galilaya!” [
Nuko inama ica irahera, bose barataha.
Nuko Yesu aduga ku Musozi wa Elayono.
Kare mu gitondo c’umusi ukurikira asubira mu rusengero, maze abantu bakoranira aho ari, na we aricara arabigisha.
Abigisha b’ivyagezwe n’Abafarisayo bazana umugore bafashe ariko arasambana, bamuhagarika imbere y’abari aho bose.
Babaza Yesu bati: “Mwigisha, uwu mugore yafashwe ariko arasambana.
Ivyagezwe vya Mose bivuga ko umugore nk’uwu akwiye kwicishwa amabuye. None ubivugako iki?”
Babajije Yesu ico kibazo kugira ngo bamutege umutego, maze baronke aho bahera mu kumwagiriza. Ariko Yesu arunama atangura kwandikisha urutoke hasi.
Ba bigisha b’ivyagezwe n’Abafarisayo babandanije bamubaza, aca urunamuka arababwira ati: “Umuntu atagira icaha muri mwebwe nabe ari we aba uwa mbere mu kumutera ibuye.”
Aca asubira kwunama abandanya yandika hasi.
Bavyumvise, baca batangura gusohoka umwe umwe uhereye ku bakuze, kugeza aho Yesu asigarana na wa mugore ahagaze imbere yiwe.
Yesu arunamuka aramubaza ati: “Mbega abariko barakwagiriza bagiye he? Nta n’umwe yaguciriye urubanza?”
Na we aramwishura ati: “Oya, nyakwubahwa.” Yesu aramubwira ati: “Nanje nta rubanza ndagucira. Niwigire ariko ntugasubire gukora icaha.” ]
Nuko Yesu abandanya yigisha ba bantu, ababwira ati: “Jewe ndi umuco w’isi. Uwunkurikira ntazogendera mu mwijima, ahubwo azoronka umuco w’ubugingo.”
Abafarisayo baramubwira bati: “Noneho wishingiye intahe! Intahe nk’iyo si iy’ukuri.”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Naho nishingiye intahe, intahe yanje ni iy’ukuri, kuko ndazi iyo naje mva n’iyo ndiko ndaja. Ariko mwebwe ntimuzi iyo naje mva n’iyo ndiko ndaja.
Mwebwe muca imanza nk’abantu, ariko jewe nta n’umwe ncira urubanza.
Iyo ndamutse nca urubanza, ruba ari urw’ukuri, kuko simba ndi jenyene, mba ndi kumwe na Data yantumye.
Mu Vyagezwe vyanyu haranditswe ko intahe y’ivyabona bibiri aba ari iy’ukuri.
Jewe ndishingira intahe, kandi na Data yantumye arayinshingira.”
Na bo baramubaza bati: “Mbega So ari he?” Yesu arabishura ati: “Ntimunzi kandi na Data ntimumuzi. Kuko iyo mumenya uwo ndi we, na Data mwari kumumenya.”
Yesu yavuze ayo majambo ariko yigishiriza mu rusengero, ahagaze hafi y’ico batorezamwo amashikanwa. Ariko nta n’umwe yamufashe kuko igihe ciwe kitari bwashike.
Yesu yongera kubabwira ati: “Ngiye kugenda, kandi muzondondera, ariko muzopfira mu vyaha vyanyu. Aho ngiye kuja, ntimushobora kuhashika.”
Ivyo vyatumye Abayuda bibaza bati: “None agiye kwiyahura? Ni kuki avuze ngo: ‘Aho ngiye kuja, ntimushobora gushikayo’?”
Yesu arabandanya ati: “Mwebwe muri abo kuri iyi si, ariko jewe nkomoka hejuru. Muri ab’ino si, ariko jewe sindi uw’ino si.
Ni co gituma nababwiye ko muzopfira mu vyaha vyanyu; kuko nimutizera ko ndi uwo nababwiye ko ndi, muzopfira mu vyaha vyanyu.”
Baramubaza bati: “None uri nde?” Yesu arabishura ati: “Ndi urya namye ndababwira ko ndi kuva mu ntango.
Mfise vyinshi nobavugako kandi mfise vyinshi vyobatsindisha. Ariko mbwira ab’isi ivyo numvise uwantumye avuga gusa, kandi avuga ukuri.”
Ariko ntibashoboye gutahura ko ariko avuga Se.
Nuko Yesu arababwira ati: “Nimwamara kumanika Umwana w’Umuntu ku musaraba ni ho muzomenya ko ndi uwo ndiko ndababwira, kandi ko ata co nkora nigeneye, ahubwo ko mvuga ivyo Data yanyigishije.
Kandi uwantumye ari kumwe nanje; ntiyandetse jenyene, kuko nama nkora ibimunezereza.”
Maze benshi mu bamwumvise avuga ayo majambo baramwizeye.
Nuko Yesu abwira Abayuda bari bamwizeye ati: “Ikizokwerekana ko muri abigishwa banje vy’ukuri ni ugushira mu ngiro inyigisho zanje.
Muzomenya ukuri, na kwo kuzobaha ukwidegemvya.”
Na bo baramwishura bati: “Twebwe turi uruvyaro rwa Aburahamu, ntitwigeze tuba abagurano b’umuntu n’umwe. Ni gute utubwira ngo tuzoronka ukwidegemvya!”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Ndababwire ukuri, umuntu wese akora icaha ni umugurano waco.
Kandi umugurano ntafise ikibanza gihoraho mu muryango, ariko umwana yama ari uwo mu muryago wiwe.
None rero, Umwana niyabagira abidegemvya, muzoba abidegemvya vy’ukuri.
Ndazi ko muri uruvyaro rwa Aburahamu. Ariko muriko murondera ingene mwonyica kuko ijambo ryanje ritagira ikibanza mu mitima yanyu.
Ndiko ndababwira ivyo nabonanye Data, ariko mwebwe mukurikiza ivyo mwigishijwe na so.”
Baramwishura bati: “Data ni Aburahamu.” Yesu arababwira ati: “Iyo muba muri abana ba Aburahamu, mwari gukora ivyo Aburahamu yakora.
Raba ndababwiye ukuri nigishijwe n’Imana, none mushaka kunyica. Aburahamu ntiyigeze akora ibisa n’ivyo.
Mwebwe mukora nk’ivyo so akora.” Na bo baramwishura bati: “Twebwe ntituri abana b’ibivyarwa. Imana ubwayo ni yo Data.”
Yesu arababwira ati: “Iyo Imana ija kuba ari yo So, mwari kunkunda, kuko naje hano ntumwe na yo. Sinaje nirungitse, ni Imana yantumye.
Ni kuki mudatahura inyigisho zanje? Ni kubera mudashobora no kwumviriza amajambo yanje.

Muri abana ba so, Satani, kandi mugomba gushitsa ibikorwa bibi so ashaka. Yamye ari umwicanyi kuva mu ntango. Yamye yanka ukuri, kuko ata kuri kuri muri we. Iyo avuga ibinyoma, aba ariko avuga ururimi kavukire, kuko ni umubeshi kandi ni se w’ibinyoma.
Ni co gituma iyo ndababwiye ukuri, ntimushobora kunyizera.
Hari n’umwe muri mwebwe ashobora kunyagiriza icaha? None nimba ndababwira ukuri, ni kuki mutanyizera?
Uwuva ku Mana wese yakira amajambo y’Imana. Mwebwe ntimuyakira kuko mutari ab’Imana.”
Abayuda baramwishura bati: “Ntitwihenze aho twavuga ko uri Umusamariya kandi ko uboshwe n’umudayimoni!”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Jewe simboshwe n’umudayimoni; nubaha Data ariko mwebwe ntimunyubaha.
Jewe sinironderera icubahiro; ariko hariho uwukindonderera kandi ni we mucamanza.
Ndababwire ukuri, umuntu wese yumvira amajambo yanje ntazokwigera apfa.”

Abayuda bumvise ayo majambo baramubwira bati: “Ubu rero turatahuye neza ko uboshwe n’umudayimoni! Yaba Aburahamu canke abavugishwa n’Imana barapfuye, none wewe uvuze ngo: ‘Umuntu wese yumvira amajambo yanje ntazokwigera apfa!’
Mbega uruta sogokuruza Aburahamu, ko we n’abavugishwa n’Imana bapfuye? Wewe wigira iki?”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Nimba niha icubahiro, icubahiro canje nta co kimaze. Data, uwo muvuga ko ari Imana yanyu, ni we ampa icubahiro.
Naho mutamuzi, jewe ndamuzi. Iyo mvuga ko ntamuzi, nari kuba mbaye umubeshi nkamwe, ariko ndamuzi kandi ndumvira ijambo ryiwe.
Sokuruza wanyu Aburahamu yari yiteganye umunezero umusi wo kuza kwanje; yarawubonye kandi yaranezerewe.”
Abayuda baramubaza bati: “Nta n’imyaka mirongo itanu uramara none uvuze ngo warabonye Aburahamu?”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Ndababwire ukuri, Aburahamu ataravuka, jewe nariho!”
Bumvise ayo majambo baca batora amabuye ngo bayamutere, ariko Yesu aca arinyegeza, arasohoka ava mu rusengero.
Yesu ariko ararengana, abona umuntu yavutse ari impumyi.
Abigishwa biwe baramubaza bati: “Mwigisha, ni nde yacumuye bigatuma uwu muntu avuka ari impumyi: mbega ni we canke ni abavyeyi biwe?”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Ntivyavuye ku vyaha vyiwe canke ku vy’abavyeyi biwe, ariko ibi vyabaye kugira ngo ubushobozi bw’Imana bwiyerekanire muri we.
Dutegerezwa gukora ibikorwa vy’uwantumye hakibona. Ijoro riraje, aho ata wushobora gukora.
Nkiri mw’isi, ndi umuco w’isi.”
Ahejeje kuvuga ayo majambo, acira amate hasi, avuruga utwondo akoresheje ayo mate; adusiga ku maso ya wa muntu.
Aramubwira ati: “Genda wiyuhagire ku kidengeri c’i Silowamu” (Silowamu bisigura “Uwatumwe”). Wa muntu aragenda ariyuhagira, agaruka abona.
Ababanyi biwe n’abari bamuzi ari impumyi isegerereza barabaza bati: “Mbega uwu si wa muntu yahora yicara asegerereza?”
Bamwe baravuga bati: “Ni we.” Ariko abandi baravuga bati: “Oya, ni uwo basa.” Ariko wa muntu arababwira ati: “Ni jewe!”
Baramubaza bati: “None vyagenze gute ngo amaso yawe ahumuke?”
Arabishura ati: “Umuntu bita Yesu ni we yavuruze utwondo atunsiga ku maso, hanyuma ambwira ati: ‘Genda wiyuhagire ku kidengeri c’i Silowamu.’ Naciye njayo ndiyuhagira, none ndabona.”
Baramubaza bati: “None uwo muntu ari he?” Arababwira ati: “Sindahazi.”
Nuko bajana wa muntu yahoze ari impunyi imbere y’Abafarisayo,
kuko Yesu yari yavuruze utwondo, agakiza iyo mpumyi ku musi w’Isabato.
Abafarisayo na bo babaza wa muntu ingene yahumutse, na we abishura ati: “Yansize utwondo ku maso, nca ndiyuhagira, none ndabona.”

Bamwe mu Bafarisayo baravuga bati: “Uwu muntu yakoze ibi ntava ku Mana, kuko ntiyubahiriza umusi w’Isabato.” Ariko abandi barabaza bati: “None umunyavyaha yoshobora gukora ibitangaza nk’ibi?” Maze ivyo bituma bacanamwo.
Nuko basubira kubaza umwe yahoze ari impumyi bati: “None wewe wibaza iki kuri uwo muntu yagukijije ubuhumyi?” Wa muntu arabishura ati: “Ni uwuvugishwa n’Imana.”
Abakuru b’Abayuda baranse kwemera ko yahora ari impumyi none akaba yakize, kugeza batumyeko abavyeyi biwe.
Bashitse, barababaza bati: “Uwu yoba ari umuhungu wanyu? Yoba yavutse ari impumyi? None habaye iki ko abona?”
Abavyeyi biwe barabishura bati: “Ico tuzi, ni umwana wacu kandi yavutse ari impunyi.
Ariko ntituzi uko vyagenze ngo ahumuke kandi ntituzi uwamukijije. Nimumwibarize arakuze, arashobora kwivugira.”
Abavyeyi biwe bishuye uko kuko batinya abakuru b’Abayuda. Abo bakuru bari bafashe ingingo ko umuntu wese azovuga ko Yesu ari Kristo azokwirukanwa mu rusengero.
Ni co gituma bavuze bati: “Nimumwibarize, arakuze.”
Basubira gutumako wa muntu yahora ari impumyi ubugira kabiri, baramubwira bati: “Ubaha Imana, utubwire ukuri, kuko turazi ko urya muntu yagukijije ari umunyavyaha.”
Arabishura ati: “Aba umunyavyaha, ataba we, ivyo nta co ndabiziko. Ico nzi ni uko nahora ndi impumyi ariko ubu nkaba mbona.”
Baramubaza bati: “None yakoze iki? Yaguhumuye gute?”
Arabishura ati: “Ivyo namaze kubibabwira ariko ntimwashatse kuvyumva. Ni kuki mushaka kuvyumva kandi? Mwoba mushaka kuba abigishwa biwe namwe?”
Baca baramutuka, bamubwira bati: “Ni wewe uri umwigishwa wiwe, twebwe turi abigishwa ba Mose!
Turazi ko Imana yavuganye na Mose, ariko ntituzi iyo uwo muntu yaje ava.”
Wa muntu yahoze ari impumyi arabishura ati: “Ivyo biratangaje cane! Ntimuzi iyo yaje ava, kandi yampumuye?
Turazi ko Imana itumva ugusenga kw’abanyavyaha, ariko ko yumva ugusenga kw’umuntu ayubaha agakora ivyo ishaka.
Nta muntu n’umwe yari bwumve aho umuntu yakijije uwavutse ari impumyi.
Iyo uwo muntu ataba yaje ava ku Mana, nta co yari gushobora gukora.”
Baramwishura bati: “Wewe wavukiye mu vyaha wongera ubikuriramwo, none uriko uratwigisha!” Nuko baca baramwirukana mu rusengero.
Yesu yumvise ko bamwirukanye mu rusengero, aja kumurondera, aramubwira ati: “Mbega urizera Umwana w’Umuntu?”
Wa muntu aramubaza ati: “Yoba ari nde ga nyakwubahwa, kugira ngo ndamwizere?”
Yesu aramubwira ati: “Wamaze kumubona kuko ni we muriko muravugana.”
Wa muntu aravuga ati: “Mwami, ndizeye.” Nuko aca aramwunamira.
Yesu aca aravuga ati: “Naje muri iyi si guca urubanza, kugira ngo impumyi zihumuke, maze abibaza ko babona na bo ndabereke ko ari impumyi.”
Bamwe mu Bafarisayo bari kumwe na we, bumvise ayo majambo, baramubaza bati: “Ushaka kuvuga ko natwe turi impumyi?”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Iyo muba impumyi, ntimwokwagiriwe n’icaha, ariko ko mwemeza ko mubona, icaha canyu kigumaho. ”
Ndababwire ukuri, umuntu wese yinjira adaciye mu muryango w’uruhongore rw’intama, ariko akuririra ahandi, uwo ni igisuma kandi ni umwambuzi.
Uwinjira aciye mw’irembo ni we mwungere w’intama.
Umurinzi w’irembo aramwugururira, kandi intama zirumva ijwi ryiwe. Ahamagara intama ziwe mu mazina yazo, akaziturutsa.
Amaze kuzisohora zose, azija imbere, na zo zikamukurikira kuko zizi ijwi ryiwe.
Ntizishobora gukurikira uwo zitazi, ahubwo ziramuhunga kuko zitazi ijwi ryiwe.
Ivyo Yesu yabibabwiye mu mugani, kandi abamwumviriza ntibashoboye gutahura ico ashatse kuvuga.
Nuko Yesu yongera kubabwira ati: “Ndababwire ukuri, ni jewe rembo ry’intama.
Abanyitangiye imbere bose bari ibisuma n’abambuzi, ariko intama ntizabumvirije.
Ni jewe rembo; umuntu wese yinjiye aciye muri jewe azokizwa. Azokwinjira, asohoke kandi aronke ikimutunga.
Igisuma ntikizanwa n’ikindi atari ukwiba, ukwica no gutikiza; ariko jewe naje kugira ngo intama zigire ubugingo, kandi zibugire busagutse.
Jewe ndi umwungere mwiza. Umwungere mwiza yitangira intama ziwe.
Umucangero arahunga iyo abonye ibingira rije. Arata intama agahunga kuko atari umwungere wazo kandi intama zitari iziwe, maze rya bingira rikitera mu ntama rikazishwiragiza.
Umucangero arahunga kuko akorera amahera kandi atababaye intama.
Jewe ndi umwungere mwiza; ndazi intama zanje kandi na zo ziranzi,
nk’uko Data anzi nanje nkamumenya. Ni co gituma ntanga ubugingo bwanje ku bwazo.
Ndafise n’izindi ntama zitari muri uru ruhongore. Na zo ntegerezwa kuzizana. Zizokwumva ijwi ryanje, maze habe umukuku umwe n’umwungere umwe.
Igituma Data ankunda ni uko ntanga ubuzima bwanje kugira ngo nzosubire kubwakira.
Nta muntu n’umwe ashobora kubunyaka, ndabutanga ari uko ndabishatse. Mfise ubushobozi bwo kubutanga n’ubwo kubwakira gushasha. Iki ni co Data yantegetse gukora.”
Abayuda bumvise ayo majambo, baca basubira gucanamwo.
Benshi muri bo bavuga bati: “Aboshwe n’umudayimoni kandi arasara. Ni kuki mumwumviriza?”
Ariko abandi bavuga bati: “Aya majambo si ay’umuntu aboshwe n’umudayimoni. Mbega umudayimoni yohumura amaso y’impumyi?”
Ico gihe i Yerusalemu hariko habera imisi mikuru yo kwibuka ishikirizwa ry’urusengero, kandi hari mu gihe c’imbeho nyinshi cane.
Yesu ariko aragendagenda mu rusengero mw’ibaraza rya Salomo,
Abayuda bari aho baramukikuza, bamubaza bati: “Uzodutomorera ryari? Nimba uri Kristo, bitubwire neza.”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Narabibabwiye ariko ntimwanyizera. Ikibishingira intahe ni ibikorwa nkora mw’izina rya Data,
ariko ntimwizera kuko mutari abo mu ntama zanje.
Intama zanje zumva ijwi ryanje; ndazizi na zo zirankurikira.
Nanje ndaziha ubugingo budashira, kandi ntizizokwigera zipfa. Nta n’umwe ashobora kuzinkura mu kuboko.
Data yazimpaye aruta bose; nta muntu n’umwe ashobora kuzikura mu kuboko kwa Data.
Kandi twe na Data turi umwe.”
Nuko Abayuda bongera gutora amabuye ngo bayamutere,
ariko Yesu arababwira ati: “Ko nakoreye imbere yanyu ibikorwa vyiza vyinshi ndabitumwe na Data, none ni ikihe muri ivyo gitumye mugomba kuntera amabuye?”
Baramwishura bati: “Ntitugomba kugutera amabuye kubera igikorwa ciza, ahubwo tuguhora gutuka Imana; kuko uri umuntu asanzwe, ariko ukigira Imana!”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Mbega mu vyagezwe vyanyu, ntihanditswe ko Imana yavuze iti: ‘Navuze ko muri imana’?
Murazi ko ata gishobora guhindura Ivyanditswe. None nimba ababwiwe iryo jambo biswe ‘imana,’
none vyocura iki ku wo Data yatoranije nk’uwiwe bwite hanyuma akamurungika kw’isi? Ni kuki munyagiriza ko ntutse Imana, mvuze nti: ‘Ndi Umwana w’Imana’?
Nimba ntakora ibikorwa vya Data, ntimunyizere!
Ariko nimba nkora ibikorwa vya Data, naho mutonyizera jewe, nimwizere ibikorwa nkora, kugira ngo mumenye kandi mutahure ko Data ari muri jewe nanje nkaba muri we.”
Nuko bagerageza kumufata kandi, ariko arabacika.
Yesu aca asubira hakurya ya Yorodani mu kibanza Yohana yabatirizamwo mu misi ya mbere, ahamara igihe.
Abantu benshi baza aho ari, baravuga bati: “Naho Yohana ata gitangaza yakoze, ivyo yavuze vyose kuri uwu muntu vyari ukuri.”
Maze benshi mu bari aho bizera Yesu.
Hariho umuntu yitwa Lazaro yava i Betaniya yari arwaye. Betaniya cari igisagara Mariya na Marita mwene nyina babamwo.
(Uwo Mariya ni umwe yasuka amavuta atamirana ku birenge vy’Umwami Yesu akabihanaguza imishatsi yiwe. Musazawe, Lazaro, ni we yari arwaye.)
Nuko bashiki ba Lazaro batumako Yesu bati: “Mwami, umwe ukunda ararwaye.”
Yesu avyumvise, aravuga ati: “Ingwara ya Lazaro si iyo kumwica. Ahubwo ni iyo kwerekana icubahiro c’Imana, kugira ngo Umwana w’Imana ahabwe icubahiro biciye muri yo.”
Yesu yarakunda Marita na mwene nyina Mariya na Lazaro.
Ariko inyuma yo kwumva ko Lazaro arwaye, yamaze aho yari ari iyindi misi ibiri.
Hanyuma abwira abigishwa biwe ati: “Ingo dusubire i Yudaya.”
Abigishwa biwe baramubaza bati: “Mwigisha, haheze imisi mike cane Abayuda bashatse kugutera amabuye, none ushaka gusubirayo?”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Mbega umurango ntugizwe n’amasaha cumi n’abiri? Uwugenda ku murango ntashobora gutsitara, kuko abonesherezwa n’umuco w’iyi si.
Ariko iyo umuntu agenda mw’ijoro arashobora gutsitara kuko ata muco uba uhari.”
Ahejeje kuvuga ivyo, arababwira ati: “Umukunzi wacu Lazaro arasinziriye; ariko ngira nje kumuvyura.”
Abigishwa baramwishura bati: “Mwami nimba asinziriye, azokira.”
Yesu yashaka kuvuga ko Lazaro yapfuye, ariko bo bibaza ko ari ugusinzira gusanzwe.
Nuko aca arabitomora ati: “Lazaro yapfuye,
kandi ndanezerewe ku bwanyu kubona atari yo nari ndi, kuko muraja kunyizera. Nimuze tuje kumuraba.”
Toma (uwo batazira Ihasa) abwira abigishwa bagenziwe ati: “Reka tugende natwe dupfane na Yesu.”
Yesu ashitse i Betaniya, asanga Lazaro amaze imisi ine ari mu mva.
Betaniya hari hafi y’i Yerusalemu, nko ku birometero bitatu.
Abayuda benshi bari baje kwa Marita na Mariya kubaremesha inyuma y’urupfu rwa musaza wabo.
Marita yumvise ko Yesu aje, arasohoka aja kumusanganira, ariko Mariya aguma i muhira.
Maze Marita abwira Yesu ati: “Mwami, iyo uja kuba hano, musazanje ntaba yarapfuye.
Ariko n’ubu ndazi ko ico usaba Imana cose ikiguha.”
Yesu aramubwira ati: “Musazawe azozuka.”
Marita aramwishura ati: “Ndazi ko azozuka ku musi wa nyuma.”
Yesu aramubwira ati: “Ni jewe kuzuka n’ubugingo. Uwunyizera wese, naho yopfa, azobaho.
Umuntu wese aba muri jewe kandi akanyizera ntazokwigera apfa. Ivyo uravyizera ga Marita?”
Marita aramwishura ati: “Egome Mwami, ndizera ko uri Kristo, Umwana w’Imana, umwe ategerezwa kuza mw’isi.”
Ahejeje kuvuga ayo majambo, aca aja guhamagara mwene nyina Mariya aramwihereranya, amubwira ati: “Umwigisha ari hano kandi arashaka kukubona.”
Mariya avyumvise aca arahaguruka ubwo nyene aja iyo Yesu ari.
Yesu ntiyari bwinjire mu mihana, yari akiri aho bahuriye na Marita.
Abayuda bari kumwe na Mariya mu nzu bamuremesha babonye ahagurutse yihuta agaca asohoka, baramukurikira, kuko bibaza ko yoba agiye ku mva kuririrayo.
Nuko Mariya ashika aho Yesu ari aramubona, aca apfukama imbere yiwe, amubwira ati: “Mwami, iyo uja kuba hano, musazanje ntaba yarapfuye.”
Yesu abonye amarira ya Mariya n’ay’Abayuda bari bazananye na we, afatwa n’ibigumbagumba arababara cane.
Arababaza ati: “Mwamuhamvye he?” Baramwishura bati: “Mwami ingo wirabire.”
Yesu aca ararira.
Abayuda bari aho baravuga bati: “Ehe ingene yamukunda!”
Ariko bamwe baravuga bati: “None ko yakijije ya mpumyi, ntiyari gushobora gukingira Lazaro urupfu?”
Nuko Yesu ashika ku mva akibabaye. Iyo mva yari isenga ryugaje ikibuye kinini.
Yesu arababwira ati: “Nimukureho ico kibuye.” Ariko Marita, mushiki w’uwapfuye aramubwira ati: “Mwami, honuka cane kuko amazeyo imisi ine!”
Yesu aramubwira ati: “Sinakubwiye ko niwizera uja kubona ubwiza bw’Imana?”
Nuko bakuraho ca kibuye. Maze Yesu arangamiza hejuru aravuga ati: “Data, ndagushimiye kuko unyumva iyo nsenga.
Ndazi ko wama unyumva, ariko ibi ndabivuze ku neza y’aba bantu bahagaze hano, kugira ngo bizere ko ari wewe wantumye.”
Ahejeje kuvuga ayo majambo aca arasemerera ati: “Lazaro, sohoka!”
Wa muntu yari yarapfuye arasohoka, amaboko n’ibirenge vyiwe bikizingiriyeko impuzu bamuhamvyemwo, mu maso hiwe hazingiriyeko igitambara. Yesu arababwira ati: “Nimumubohore, mumureke agendagende.”
Ivyo vyatumye Abayuda benshi bari baje kugarukira kuri Mariya bizera Yesu, bamaze kubona ivyo akoze.
Ariko bamwe muri bo baciye baja ku Bafarisayo bababwira ivyo Yesu yakoze.
Nuko abakuru b’abaherezi n’Abafarisayo baca bakoranya inama nkuru y’abatwara ubwoko bw’Abayuda. Barabazanya bati: “Dukore iki? Uwu mugabo ariko akora ibitangaza vyinshi.
Nitwamureka akabandanya uku, abantu bose bazomwizera, maze Abaroma baze bigarurire urusengero rwacu n’igihugu cacu.”
Nuko umwe muri bo yitwa Kayafa, ari na we yari umuherezi mukuru uwo mwaka, aravuga ati: “Ntimuzi ico muriko muravuga!
Ntimubona ko ari vyiza ko umuntu umwe apfira abantu hako igihugu cose kigwa mu kaga?”
Ivyo ntiyabivuze avyigeneye; ariko nk’umuherezi mukuru muri uwo mwaka, yaravugishijwe ko Yesu yari agiye gupfira igihugu cose.
Kandi si igihugu ca Isirayeli gusa, ahubwo yari agiye gupfira n’abana b’Imana bashwiragiriye mu mahanga, kugira ngo abegeranirize hamwe, abagire umwe.
Kuva uwo musi baca batangura gutegura ingene bokwica Yesu.
Ivyo vyatumye Yesu adasubira kugendagenda ku mugaragaro mu Bayuda. Ahubwo yaciye aja mu karere ko hafi y’ubugaragwa, mu gisagara citwa Efurayimu, agumanayo n’abigishwa biwe.
Imisi mikuru ya Pasika Abayuda bahimbaza yari yegereje, kandi abantu benshi bava mu mihingo yose y’igihugu bakaja i Yerusalemu kugira ngo bagire umugenzo wo kwihumanura imbere y’uko Pasika ishika.
Abantu baguma barondera Yesu mu rusengero, babazanya bati: “Mwibaza ko azoza mu misi mikuru?”
Abakuru b’abaherezi n’Abafarisayo bari batanze itegeko ko umuntu wese yobona aho Yesu ari yoca aja kubibabwira kugira ngo bamufate.
Hagisigaye imisi itandatu ngo Pasika ishike, Yesu aja i Betaniya, aho Lazaro umwe yari yazuye yaba.
Nuko bategurira amazimano Yesu, kandi Marita ni we yazimana, Lazaro na we akaba umwe mu basangira na Yesu.

Maze Mariya afata icupa ryiza ririmwo amavuta amota cane kandi y’igiciro kinini ahinguwe mu giti bita narada, ayasuka ku birenge vya Yesu, aca abihanaguza umushatsi wiwe. Inzu yose yuzura ugutamirana kw’ayo mavuta.
Ariko umwe mu bigishwa biwe yitwa Yuda Isikariyote, ari we yahavuye amugurisha, aravuga ati:
“Ni kuki aya mavuta atagurishijwe ngo amahera avuyemwo afashe aboro? Igiciro cayo kingana n’idenariyo amajana atatu. ”
Ivyo ntiyabivuze abitewe no kubabara aboro, ariko yabitewe n’uko yari umusuma. Ni we yari ajejwe ububiko bw’amahera y’abigishwa, kandi kenshi yarayihako akayakoresha ivyiwe.
Yesu arishura ati: “Nimureke kumugora! Ibi abikoze nk’uwuntegurira guhambwa.
Aboro bo muzokwamana, ariko jewe ntimuzonyamana.”
Abayuda bamenye ko Yesu ari i Betaniya, baza ari benshi kumuraba no kuraba Lazaro, umwe yari yazuye mu bapfuye.
Ivyo vyatumye abakuru b’abaherezi bagira imigambi yo kwica Lazaro na we,
kuko kubera we, Abayuda benshi bariko barabavako bizera Yesu.
Ku musi ukurikira, abantu benshi bari baje mu misi mikuru ya Pasika bumva ko Yesu ari mu nzira aja i Yerusalemu.
Maze baca amashami y’ibigazi, baja kumusanganira basemerera bati: “Hozana!” “Hahezagirwe uwuje mw’izina ry’Uhoraho!” “Hahezagirwe Umwami wa Isirayeli.”
Nuko Yesu afata indogoba ayicarako, gutyo aba ashikije Ivyanditswe bivuga ngo:
“Ntutinye, Mukobwa w’i Siyoni; raba, umwami wawe araje, yicaye ku nyana y’indogoba.”
Abigishwa ntibatahuye ubwo nyene ibiriko biraba. Ariko Yesu amaze kwinjira mu bwiza bwiwe, ni ho bibuka ko ivyo bamukoreye vyari vyaranditswe kuri we.
Abantu benshi bari kumwe na Yesu igihe yahamagara Lazaro ngo ave mu mva, akamuzura mu bapfuye, babandanije bakwiza inkuru y’ivyo babonye.
Ni co gituma abantu benshi barondera iyo ari. Bari bumvise ko yakoze ico gitangaza.
Nuko Abafarisayo baravugana bati: “Murabona ko ata co turiko turashikako. Isi yose iriko iramukurikira!”
Mu bantu bari baje i Yerusalemu mu misi mikuru ya Pasika gusenga, harimwo Abagiriki.
Nuko begera Filipo yava i Betesayida mu ntara ya Galilaya baramubwira bati: “Mushingantahe, twipfuza kubona Yesu.”
Filipo aca aragenda abibwira Andereya, maze uko ari babiri baca baja kubibwira Yesu.
Yesu arabishura ati: “Igihe kirashitse Umwana w’Umuntu ahabwe icubahiro ciwe.
Ndababwire ukuri, iyo urutete rw’ingano rudatewe mw’ivu ngo rupfe, ruguma ari rumwe gusa. Ariko iyo rutewe rugapfa, bituma rwama izindi ntete nyinshi cane.
Umuntu wese akunda ubuzima bwiwe muri iyi si azobubura, ariko umuntu wese yanka ubuzima bwiwe muri iyi si azobuzigama ibihe bidashira.
Umuntu wese ashaka kuba umwigishwa wanje ategerezwa kunkurikira, kuko umukozi wanje ategerezwa kuba aho ndi. Kandi Data azoha icubahiro umuntu wese ankorera.
Mfise uruhagarara mu mutima, mbega mvuge nti: ‘Data, nkiza iyi saha’? Ariko iki ni co canzanye, iki gihe ni co canzanye.
Data, hesha izina ryawe icubahiro.” Nuko ijwi ryumvikana rivuye mw’ijuru riti: “Nararihesheje icubahiro, kandi nzosubira ndariheshe icubahiro.”
Abantu benshi bari ngaho bumvise iryo jwi, bavuga ko ari umuturagaro, abandi na bo ngo ni umumarayika yavuganye na we.
Yesu arababwira ati: “Iri jwi ntirivuze ku neza yanje, ni ku neza yanyu.
Igihe co gucira iyi isi imanza kirageze; umutware wayo agira atererwe hanze.
Kandi ninamara kumanikwa hejuru y’isi, nzokwiyegeranirizako abantu bose.”
Ivyo yabivuze ashaka kwerekana urupfu yari agiye gupfa.
Ba bantu isinzi baramwishura bati: “Ivyagezwe bitubwira ko Kristo azokwamaho. None uvuze uti: ‘Umwana w’Umuntu azomanikwa hejuru’? Uwo ‘Mwana w’Umuntu’ ni nde?”

Maze Yesu arababwira ati: “Umuco wanje usigaje igihe gito co kubaboneshereza. Nimugendere mu muco bigishoboka, umwijima utarabahwikira. Umuntu wese agendera mu mwijima ntashobora kumenya iyo ariko araja.
Nimwizere umuco mukiwufise, kugira ngo mube abana b’umuco.” Ahejeje kuvuga ayo majambo, Yesu aca aragenda arabinyegeza.
Naho Yesu yakoreye ibitangaza vyinshi imbere y’abantu, benshi ntibamwizeye.
Ibi vyabaye kugira ngo ijambo ry’uwavugishwa n’Imana Yesaya rishike, aho yanditse avuga ati: “Mwami, ni nde yizeye Ubutumwa Bwiza twavuze? Ni ba nde Uhoraho yahishuriye ukuboko kwiwe kw’ubushobozi?”
Ni co gituma batashobora kwizera, kuko Yesaya yongeye yandika ati:
“Uhoraho yabagize impumyi akomantaza imitima yabo, kugira ngo amaso yabo ntabone, n’imitima yabo ntitahure, ngo boye kumpindukirira nanje ngo ndabakize.”
Ibi Yesaya yabivuze kuri Yesu, kuko yabonye ivyo muri kazoza maze avuga ku vy’ubwiza bwa Kristo.
Ariko rero benshi baramwizeye, harimwo na bamwe mu bakuru b’Abayuda. Ariko ntibavyemera ku mugaragaro kubera gutinya ko Abafarisayo babirukana mw’isinagogi;
kuko bakunda gushimwa n’abantu kurusha gushimwa n’Imana.
Nuko Yesu arasemerera ati: “Uwunyizera ntaba yizeye jewe gusa, ariko aba yizeye n’uwantumye.
Uwumbonye aba abonye uwantumye.
Naje nk’umuco uboneshereza iyi si, kugira ngo ntihagire abanyizera baguma mu mwijima.
Jewe sincira urubanza umuntu yumva amajambo yanje ntayashire mu ngiro. Kuko sinaje gucira isi urubanza, ahubwo naje gukiza isi.
Ariko uwutanyakiriye akanka n’amajambo yanje azotsindwa n’urubanza; amajambo nababwiye ni yo azomutsindisha ku musi wa nyuma.
Sinavuze ivyo nigeneye. Data yantumye ni we yantegetse kuvuga amajambo yose navuze.
Kandi ndazi ko ivyo ategeka bizana ubugingo budashira. Ivyo mvuga ndabivuga nk’uko Data yabintegetse.”
Buca ari Umusi mukuru wa Pasika, Yesu yari azi ko igihe ciwe co kuva mw’isi ngo asubire kwa Se cashitse. Yari yarakunze abiwe bari mw’isi, kandi yarabakunze gushika ku mwanya wa nyuma.
Nuko ku mugoroba w’uwo musi, Yesu asangira n’abigishwa biwe, kandi Satani yari yamaze gushira muri Yuda, mwene Simoni Isikariyote, iciyumviro co kugurisha Yesu.
Yesu yari azi ko Se yamuhaye ububasha ku bintu vyose. Yari azi ko yaje ava ku Mana kandi ko yagira asubireyo.
Nuko arahaguruka ava ku meza, akura umutamana wiwe, afata igitambara co kwihanaguza aragikenyera.
Ahejeje, afata amazi ayasuka mw’ibesani, atangura kwoza ibirenge vy’abigishwa biwe, abihanaguza ca gitambara yakenyera.
Ashikiriye Simoni Petero, Petero aramubwira ati: “Mwami, ni wewe ugira unyoze ibirenge!”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Ntushobora gutahura ico ndiko ndakora ubu nyene, ariko uzogitahura hanyuma.”
Petero aramubwira ati: “Oya, wewe ntuzokwigera unyoza ibirenge!” Yesu aramwishura ati: “Ni ntakwoza ibirenge, nta co tuzoba duhuriyeko.”
Simoni Petero na we ati: “Mwami, nimba ari uko rero ntunyoze ibirenge gusa, unyoze n’ibiganza n’umutwe na vyo.”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Uwumaze kwoga umubiri wose, aba akeneye kwoga ibirenge gusa, kuko umubiri wiwe wose uba usukuye. Mwebwe muratunganye naho atari mwese.”
Yesu yari azi uwugiye kumugurisha, ni co gituma yavuze ko batari batunganye bose.
Ahejeje kuboza ibirenge, aca yambara wa mutamana wiwe asubira mu cicaro ciwe. Arababaza ati: “Muratahuye ico ndabakoreye?
Munyita ‘Umwigisha n’Umwami,’ kandi ivyo muvuga ni vyo, kuko ni ko biri.
Nimba jewe, Umwigisha wanyu n’Umwami wanyu, ndabogeje ibirenge, namwe mukwiye kwozanya ibirenge.
Ndaberetse akarorero kugira ngo namwe mukore nk’uko nabakoreye.
Ndababwire ukuri, umukozi ntaruta shebuja, kandi intumwa ntiruta uwayitumye.
Ivyo murabimenye, ariko muzohezagirwa ni mwabishira mu ngiro.
Ibi sindabivuze kuri mwebwe mwese; kuko ndazi abo natoranije. Ariko ibi bishitsa Ivyanditswe bivuga ngo: ‘Uwo twasangiye ivyokurya vyanje, ni we yahindukiriye kungwanya.’
Ndabibabwiye bitaraba, kugira ngo nivyashika muze mwizere ko ndi uwo ndi we.
Ndababwire ukuri, umuntu wese yakira intumwa yanje aba anyakiriye; kandi uwunyakiriye aba yakiriye uwantumye.”
Yesu ahejeje kuvuga ayo majambo, agira uruhagarara mu mutima wiwe, maze ashinga intahe avuga ati: “Ndababwire ukuri, umwe muri mwebwe agiye kungurisha.”
Abigishwa barabana mu maso, bibaza uwo ariko aravuga.
Umwe muri bo, uwo Yesu yakunda, yari yegamiye mu gikiriza ca Yesu bari ku meza.
Simoni Petero avunira akagohe uwo mwigishwa, amubwira ati: “Mubaze uwo ari we.”
Na we yegamira Yesu aramubaza ati: “Mwami, ni nde?”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Ni uwo nza gukoreza umukate mw’isahani nkawumuha.” Yesu ahejeje kuwukoza mw’isahani awuha Yuda, mwene Simoni Isikariyote.
Yuda amaze kurya uwo mukate, Satani aca amwinjiramwo. Yesu aramubwira ati: “Nyarutsa ukore ico wateguye gukora.”
Ariko mu bariko barasangira na we nta n’umwe yamenye igituma amubwiye ayo majambo.
Kubera Yuda ari we yari ajejwe ikigega, bamwe bibajije ko Yesu amusavye kugura ibikenewe vy’umusi mukuru, canke kugira ico aha abakene.
Yuda agiheza kurya wa mukate, aca arasohoka kandi hari mw’ijoro.
Yuda amaze kugenda, Yesu aravuga ati: “Umwana w’Umuntu agira ahabwe icubahiro, kandi n’Imana igira ihabwe icubahiro muri we.
Kandi nimba Imana igira ihabwe icubahiro muri we, na yo igiye kumuha icubahiro vuba.
Bana banje, nsigaje igihe gito cane ndi kumwe namwe. Muzondondera, kandi nk’uko nabibwiye Abayuda, namwe ndabibabwiye: ntimushobora gushika aho ngiye kuja.
Ndabahaye icagezwe gishasha: Nimukundane. Nk’uko nabakunze, ni ko namwe mukwiye gukundana.
Nimwakundana, bose bazomenya ko muri abigishwa banje.”
Simoni Petero aramubaza ati: “Mwami, ugiye kuja he?” Yesu aramwishura ati: “Ntushobora kunkurikira aho ngiye, ariko uzonkurikira hanyuma.”
Petero aramubwira ati: “Mwami, ni kuki ntogukurikira ubu? Nditeguye no gupfa ndakuzira!”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Gupfa unzira? Ndakubwire ukuri, isake itarabika, uzoba umaze kunyihakana gatatu kose.”
“Ntimuhagarike imitima yanyu, mwizere Imana kandi nanje munyizere.
Mu nzu kwa Data hari ivyumba vyinshi, kandi ngiye kubategurira aho kuba. Iyo bitaba biri uko, nari kubibabwira.
Ninaheza kubategurira aho kuba, nzogaruka kubatora, kugira ngo mubane nanje aho nzoba ndi.
Kandi murazi inzira ijayo.”
Toma aramubaza ati: “Mwami, ntituzi iyo ugiye kuja, none twomenya inzira ijayo gute?”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Ni jewe nzira n’ukuri n’ubugingo. Nta n’umwe ashobora gushika kwa Data atanciyeko.
Iyo muja kuba munzi vy’ukuri, mwari kuba muzi na Data. Noneho kuva ubu muramuzi kandi mwaramubonye.”
Filipo aramubwira ati: “Mwami, twereke Data, ivyo bizoba bikwiye.”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Filipo, inyuma y’iki gihe cose tumaranye, uracavuga ko utanzi? Uwumbonye wese aba abonye Data! None ni kuki uvuze uti: ‘Twereke Data’?
Mbega ntiwizera ko ndi muri Data, Data na we akaba muri jewe? Amajambo ndababwira si ayo nigenera, ahubwo Data ambamwo ni we akorera muri jewe igikorwa ciwe.
Nimube munyizera iyo ndababwiye ko ndi muri Data, Data na we akaba muri jewe; canke na ho, munyizere kubera ibikorwa mwabonye nkora.
Ndababwire ukuri, uwunyizera wese azokora ibikorwa nk’ivyo nakoze, mbere azokora n’ibibiruta, kuko jewe ngiye kuja kwa Data.
Ico muzosaba cose mw’izina ryanje nzogikora, kugira ngo Data ahabwe icubahiro biciye mu Mwana.
Ni ukuri, ico muzosaba cose mw’izina ryanje, nzogikora.
Nimwaba munkunda, nimushire mu ngiro amabwirizwa yanje.
Nanje nzosaba Data abahe uwundi Mwitsa azobana namwe ibihe vyose,
ni we Mpwemu w’ukuri. Isi ntishobora kumwakira, kuko itamubona kandi itamuzi. Ariko mwebwe muramuzi, kuko abana namwe kandi azoba muri mwebwe.
Sinzobasiga nk’impfuvyi; nzoza aho muri.
Hasigaye igihe gito isi ntisubire kumbona, ariko mwebwe muzombona, kandi ko ndiho, namwe muzobaho.
Uwo musi niwashika, muzotahura ko ndi muri Data, kandi ko namwe muri muri jewe, nanje nkaba muri mwebwe.
Umuntu wese yakira amabwirizwa yanje akayashira mu ngiro, ni we ankunda. Kandi uwunkunda Data azomukunda. Nanje nzomukunda ndanamwiyereke.”
Nuko Yuda (atari Isikariyote) aramubaza ati: “Mwami, ni kuki ushaka kwihishurira twebwe, aho kwihishurira isi?”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Uwunkunda azoshira mu ngiro inyigisho zanje. Data azomukunda, kandi twe na Data tuzoza tubane na we.
Uwutankunda ntazoshira mu ngiro inyigisho zanje. Kandi aya majambo mwumva si ayo nigeneye; ariko ni aya Data yantumye.
Ibi ndabibabwiye nkiri kumwe namwe.
Ariko Umwitsa, ari we Mpwemu Yera, uwo Data azorungika mw’izina ryanje, azobigisha vyose yongere abibutse ivyo nababwiye vyose.
Amahoro yanje ndayabasigaranye, kandi amahoro yanje ndayabahaye. Jewe singaba nk’uko isi igaba. None rero ntimuhagarike imitima canke ngo mugire ubwoba.
Mwibuke ivyo nababwiye: Ngiye kugenda ariko nzogaruka aho muri. Iyo muba munkunda, mwari kunezerezwa n’uko ngiye kuja kwa Data, kuko Data aranduta cane.
Ibi ndabibabwiye bitaraba, kugira ngo nivyashika muze mwizere.
Nta mwanya ngifise wo kubabwira vyinshi, kuko umutware w’iyi si agira aze. Jewe nta bubasha amfiseko,
ariko aje kugira ngo isi imenye ko nkunda Data kandi ko nkora nk’uko Data yantegetse. Nimuhaguruke, tugende.
Jewe ndi umuzabibu w’ukuri, Data na we ni we awitaho.
Ishami ryose ryo kuri jewe ritama ararica, ariko ishami ryose ryama ararituturira akarituganya kugira ngo rirushirize kwama.
Mwebwe muramaze gutungana kubera ijambo nababwiye.
Nimugume muri jewe, nanje ngume muri mwebwe. Nk’uko ishami ridashobora kwama riri ukwaryo, kiretse rigumye ku muzabibu, ni ko namwe mudashobora kwama mutagumye muri jewe.
Jewe ndi umuzabibu; namwe muri amashami. Nimwaguma muri jewe nanje nkaguma muri mwebwe, muzokwama ivyamwa vyinshi. Erega mutari kumwe nanje nta co mushobora gukora!
Uwutagumye muri jewe, ameze nk’ishami riterewe hanze rikuma; amashami ameze nk’iryo barayegeranya bakayaterera mu muriro agasha.
Nimwaguma muri jewe, amajambo yanje akaguma muri mwebwe, muze musabe ico mushaka cose, kandi muzogihabwa.
Iyo mwamye ivyamwa vyinshi, muba mwerekanye ko muri abigishwa banje kandi ivyo bihesha Data icubahiro.
Nk’uko Data yankunze, ni ko nanje nabakunze, nuko rero nimugume mu rukundo rwanje.
Nimwakurikiza amabwirizwa yanje, muzoguma mu rukundo rwanje, nk’uko nanje nakurikije amabwirizwa ya Data nkaguma mu rukundo rwiwe.
Ibi ndabibabwiye kugira ngo umunezero wanje ube muri mwebwe, kandi umunezero wanyu wuzure.
Ibwirizwa ryanje ni iri: Nimukundane nk’uko nabakunze.
Nta rukundo ruruta gutanga ubugingo bwawe ku bwa bagenzawe.
Muzoba muri abakunzi banje nimwakora ivyo mbategeka.
Sinkibita abakozi, kuko umukozi ntamenya ivyo shebuja akora. Mwebwe nabise abakunzi banje, kuko ivyo numvanye Data vyose nabibamenyesheje.
Si mwebwe mwantoranije, ni jewe nabatoranije. Nabashizeho kugira ngo mugende mwame ivyamwa, kandi ivyamwa bihoraho, kugira ngo ico muzosaba Data cose mw’izina ryanje azokibahe.
Iri ni ryo bwirizwa ryanje: Nimukundane.
Isi niyabanka, muze mwibuke ko yabanje kunyanka.
Iyo muba ab’isi, yobakunze nk’abayo. Ariko ntimukiri ab’isi. Narabatoranije ndabakura muri yo, ni co gituma ibanka.
Mwibuke ivyo nababwiye: ‘Umukozi ntaruta shebuja.’ Nimba barampamye, namwe bazobahama. Nimba barakurikije inyigisho zanje, bazokurikiza n’izanyu.
Ivyo bazobibakorera kubera jewe, kuko batazi uwantumye.
Iyo ntaza nkavugana na bo, ntibokwagirijwe icaha. Ariko noneho nta co bafise bireguza ku caha cabo.
Uwunyanka aba yanka na Data.
Iyo ntakorera hagati muri bo ibitangaza ata muntu n’umwe yigeze akora, ntibokwagirijwe icaha. Ariko barabonye ivyo nakoze vyose, yamara baranyanse, banka na Data.
Ibi bishitsa ivyanditswe mu Vyagezwe vyabo bivuga ngo: ‘Banyanse ata co bampoye.’
Ariko nzobarungikira Umwitsa, ari we Mpwemu w’ukuri azoza avuye kwa Data. Uwo niyaza, azonshingira intahe.
Kandi namwe muzonshingira intahe, kuko mwabanye nanje kuva mu ntango y’igikorwa canje.
Ibi ndabibabwiye kugira ngo ntimuzotakaze ukwizera nivyashika.
Bazobirukana mu masinagogi, kandi igihe kiraje aho abazobica bazokwibaza ko bariko bakorera Imana.
Ivyo bazobikora kuko batamenye Data nanje ntibamenye.
Ibi ndabibabwiye kugira ngo nivyashika, muze mwibuke ko nari narabibabwiye. Icatumye ntabibabwira mu ntango ni uko nari nkiri kumwe namwe.
Ariko ubu ngiye gusubira ku wantumye, kandi nta n’umwe muri mwebwe ambajije iyo ngiye kuja.
Yamara imitima yanyu yuzuye umubabaro kubera ivyo ndababwiye.
Ariko ndababwire ukuri, vyobabera vyiza ko ngenda, kuko nintagenda, Umwitsa ntazobazako. Ariko ninagenda, nzoca ndamubarungikira.
Uwo niyaza, azokwemeza abantu b’iyi si ivy’icaha, ukugororoka hamwe n’urubanza.
Ab’isi barihenda ku vy’icaha kuko banse kunyizera;
barihenda ku vy’ukugororoka, kuko ngiye gusubira kwa Data kandi mukaba mutazosubira kumbona.
Ku bijanye n’urubanza, barihenda kuko umutware w’iyi si yamaze gutsindwa n’urubanza.
Mfise vyinshi nashaka kubabwira, ariko ntimushobora kuvyihanganira ubu.
Ariko Mpwemu w’ukuri niyaza, azobarongorera mu kuri kwose. Ntazovuga ivyo yigeneye; ahubwo azovuga ivyo yumvise gusa, kandi azobabwira ibigiye kuba.
Azompesha icubahiro kuko azokwakira ivyanje akabibamenyesha.
Ivya Data vyose ni ivyanje. Ni co gituma mvuze ko Mpwemu azokwakira ivyanje akabibamenyesha.”
Yesu arabandanya ati: “Hasigaye igihe gito ntimusubire kumbona, ariko inyuma y’igihe gito muzosubira mumbone.”

Bumvise ayo majambo, bamwe mu bigishwa baravugana bati: “Ashatse kuvuga iki? Ngo: ‘Hasigaye igihe gito ntimusubire kumbona, ariko inyuma y’igihe gito muzosubira mumbone’ kandi ngo: ‘Ngiye kuja kwa Data’.”
Barongera babazanya bati: “ ‘Hasigaye igihe gito’ bisigura iki? Ntidutahura ico ashaka kuvuga.”

Nuko Yesu abonye ko bafise ico bashaka kumubaza, arababwira ati: “Muriko mubazanya ico nashatse kuvuga aho navuga nti: ‘Hasigaye igihe gito ntimusubire kumbona, ariko inyuma y’igihe gito muzosubira mumbone’?
Ndababwire ukuri, muzorira mugandare, ariko isi yo izonezerwa. Muzogira umubabaro, ariko umubabaro wanyu uzohinduka umunezero.
Iyo umugore agira yibaruke, agira umubabaro mwinshi kuko igihe ciwe co kwibaruka gishitse; ariko iyo umwana amaze kuvuka, yibagira wa mubabaro wiwe kuko anezerejwe no kubona ikibondo kivutse mw’isi.
Ni ko bimeze no kuri mwebwe: Iki ni igihe canyu c’umubabaro, ariko nitwasubira kubonana imitima yanyu izonezerwa, kandi nta n’umwe azoshobora kubatwara umunezero wanyu.
Uwo musi, nta kibazo na kimwe muzosubira kumbaza. Ndababwire ukuri, ico muzosaba Data cose mw’izina ryanje azokibaha.
Gushika ubu nta kintu na kimwe murasaba mw’izina ryanje. Nimusabe muzohabwa, kugira ngo umunezero wanyu wuzure.
Ibi ndabibabwiye mu migani, ariko igihe kiraje aho ntazosubira kubigishiriza mu migani, ariko nzobabwira ivya Data ndabitomoye.
Muri ico gihe muzosaba mw’izina ryanje. Simvuze ko nzobavugira kuri Data.
Oya, Data ubwiwe asanzwe abakunda kuko mwankunze, mukizera ko naje ntumwe n’Imana.
Naje mva kwa Data nza mw’isi, none ngiye kuva mw’isi nsubire kwa Data.”
Maze abigishwa biwe baramubaza bati: “Ubu rero uriko uvuga udakoresheje imigani.
Turatahuye ko uzi vyose, kandi ko bidakenewe ko umuntu akubaza ibibazo. Ivyo bitumye twizera ko waje uva ku Mana.”
Yesu arabishura ati: “Ubu rero murizeye?
Igihe kiri hafi kandi kirashitse, aho mugiye gushwiragira, umwe wese afate inzira yiwe, munsige jenyene. Ariko sindi jenyene kuko Data ari kumwe nanje.
Ibi ndabibabwiye kugira ngo mugire amahoro muri jewe. Muri iyi si muzohagirira amarushwa menshi, ariko nimuhumure jewe naranesheje isi.”
Yesu ahejeje kuvuga ayo amajambo, arangamiza mw’ijuru asenga ati: “Data, igihe kirashitse. Nuheshe Umwana wawe icubahiro, kugira ngo na we aguheshe icubahiro.
Wamuhaye ububasha ku bantu bose kugira ngo ahe ubugingo budashira abo wamuhaye bose.
Ubu ni bwo bugingo budashira: ko bakumenya wewe, Imana y’ukuri yonyene, na Yesu Kristo, uwo watumye.
Naguhesheje icubahiro hano kw’isi mu kurangiza igikorwa wampaye.
None Data numpe ca cubahiro nari mfise ndi kumwe nawe imbere y’uko isi ibaho.
Narakumenyekanishije ku bo wampaye ubakuye mw’isi. Bari abawe urabampa, kandi bumviye ijambo ryawe.
Ubu barazi ko ivyo mfise vyose vyavuye iwawe,
kuko nabahaye amajambo wampaye kandi barayakira. Bamenye badakekeranya ko naje mva iwawe kandi bizeye ko ari wewe wantumye.
Ndabasengeye; sinsengeye isi, ariko nsengeye abo wampaye, kuko ari abawe.
Abanje bose ni abawe, kandi abawe bose ni abanje. Kandi icubahiro canje kigaragarira muri bo.
