Jewe ngiye kuva mw’isi, nze aho uri, ariko bo baracari mw’isi. Data Wera, bazigamire mu bushobozi bw’izina ryawe, rimwe wampa, kugira ngo babe umwe nk’uko wewe nanje turi umwe.
Nkiri kumwe na bo, nabazigamiye mu bushobozi bw’izina ryawe, rimwe wampa. Narabarinze kandi nta n’umwe muri bo yazimiye kiretse umwe yategerezwa kuranduka kugira ngo Ivyanditswe bishike.
Data, ubu ndaje aho uri, ariko mvuze aya majambo nkiri mw’isi kugira ngo bagire umunezero wanje kandi bawugire wuzuye.
Nabahaye ijambo ryawe, kandi isi yarabanse kuko batakiri abayo, nk’uko nanje ntari uwayo.
Sindagusavye ngo ubakure mw’isi, ariko ndagusavye ngo ubarinde wa mubi.
Si ab’isi, nk’uko nanje ntari uwayo.
Bezeshe ukuri; ijambo ryawe ni ryo kuri.
Nk’uko wantumye mw’isi, nanje ndabatumye mw’isi.
Ku bwabo ndiyeza, kugira ngo na bo bezwe mu kuri.
Sinsengeye aba gusa. Ariko ndasengeye n’abandi bose bazokwizera biciye ku butumwa bw’aba.
Ndabasengeye ngo bose babe umwe; nk’uko wewe Data uri muri jewe nanje nkaba muri wewe, nibabe umwe muri twebwe, kugira ngo isi yizere ko wantumye.
Icubahiro wampaye narakibahaye, kugira ngo babe umwe nk’uko twe nawe turi umwe:
jewe mbe muri bo, nawe ube muri jewe, aho ni ho bazoba umwe vy’ukuri, kugira ngo isi imenye ko wantumye kandi ko ubakunda nk’uko unkunda.
Data, ndashaka ko abo wampaye babana nanje aho ndi, kugira ngo babone ubwiza bwanje, bumwe wampa, kuko wankunze isi itararemwa.
Data ugororotse, naho isi itakuzi, jewe ndakuzi, kandi aba barazi ko ari wewe wantumye.
Narakumenyekanishije muri bo, kandi nzobandanya ndakumenyekanisha kugira ngo urukundo unkunda rube muri bo kandi nanje mbe muri bo.”
Yesu ahejeje gusenga, ajabuka umwonga wa Kidironi ari kumwe n’abigishwa biwe, maze baja mw’itongo ryari hakurya.
Yuda, uwagira amugurishe, yari ahazi, kuko Yesu yakunda kujana n’abigishwa biwe muri iryo tongo.
Nuko Yuda aja muri iryo tongo, ajanye n’umurwi w’abasoda n’abarinzi b’urusengero barungitswe n’abakuru b’abaherezi n’Abafarisayo. Bari bafise ibimuri, amatara n’ibigwanisho.
Maze, kuko Yesu yari azi ibigiye kumushikira, arabegera arababaza ati: “Murondera nde?”
Baramwishura bati: “Yesu w’i Nazareti.” Na we ababwira ati: “Ni jewe.” (Kandi Yuda, uwagira amugurishe, yari ahagararanye na bo.)
Yesu avuze ati: “Ni jewe,” baca bagenza umugongo, baratemba.
Yesu yongera arababaza ati: “Murondera nde?” Baramwishura bati: “Yesu w’i Nazareti.”
Na we abishura ati: “Nababwiye ko ari jewe. Nimba ari jewe murondera, nimureke aba turi kumwe bigire.”
Ivyo yabikoze kugira ngo ashitse ico yari yavuze, aho yavuga ati: “Sinazimije n’umwe mu bo wampaye.”
Maze Simoni Petero, yari asanganywe inkota, arayisokora, ayikubita umukozi w’umuherezi mukuru, amuca ugutwi. (Uwo mugurano yitwa Malikusi.)
Yesu aca abwira Petero ati: “Subiza inkota mu rwubati. Mbega sinkwiye kunywa ku gikombe c’umubabaro Data yampaye?”
Nuko wa mugwi w’abasoda n’umukuru wabo hamwe na ba barinzi b’urusengero bafata Yesu baramuboha,
babanza kumujana kwa Anasi, sebukwe wa Kayafa, umuherezi mukuru muri uwo mwaka.
Kayafa ni we yari yahanuye abakuru b’Abayuda ababwira ko vyoba vyiza ko umuntu umwe apfira abantu.
Nuko Simoni Petero n’uwundi mwigishwa bakurikira Yesu. Uwo mwigishwa wundi yari azwi n’umuherezi mukuru, ivyo vyatumye yemererwa kwinjirana na Yesu mu rugo rw’umuherezi mukuru,
ariko Petero we asigara hanze. Maze wa mwigishwa yari azwi n’umuherezi mukuru aragaruka avugana n’umukobwa yarinda umuryango, na we yemerera Petero kwinjira.
Wa mukobwa arinda umuryango abaza Petero ati: “Ubwo wewe nturi umwe mu bigishwa b’uwu mugabo?” Petero aramwishura ati: “Oya sindi we.”
Kubera hari hakanye, abakozi n’abarinzi baciye bacana umuriro, bahagarara i ruhande yawo bota. Petero na we nyene ahagararana na bo yota.
Ico gihe, umuherezi mukuru yariko arasambisha Yesu ku vyerekeye abigishwa biwe n’inyigisho ziwe.
Yesu aramubwira ati: “Imisi yose navuganye n’abantu bose ku mugaragaro. Nigishirije mu masinagogi no mu rusengero, aho abantu bakoranira. Nta kintu na kimwe navuze ninyegeje.
Ni kuki munsambisha? Nimubaze abanyumvirije; barazi ivyo navuze.”
Yesu ahejeje kuvuga ayo majambo, umwe mu barinzi bari bahagaze hafi yiwe amukubita urushi mu maso, aramubaza ati: “Uko ni ko wishura umuherezi mukuru?”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Ninaba mvuze ibinyoma, vyerekane. Ariko nimba mvuze ukuri, unkubitiye iki?”
Nuko Anasi aca arungika Yesu aboshwe kwa Kayafa, umuherezi mukuru.
Ico gihe, Simoni Petero yari agihagaze ha handi yota umuriro. Nuko baramubaza bati: “Wewe utegerezwa kuba uri umwe mu bigishwa biwe!” Na we arabihakana ati: “Sindi we.”
Umwe mu bagurano b’umuherezi mukuru yari incuti ya wa muntu Petero yaca ugutwi aramubwira ati: “Wewe sinakubonye uri kumwe na we muri rya tongo?”
Petero yongera kubihakana, maze uwo mwanya nyene isake ica irabika.

Urubanza rwa Yesu imbere ya Kayafa rwaheze kare mu gitondo. Mu nyuma baciye bamujana ku kirimba c’uwaserukira ubwami bw’Abaroma. Ariko abakuru b’Abayuda ntibinjiye kuko banka kwihumanya kugira ngo bashobore guhimbaza umusi mukuru wa Pasika.
Nuko Pilato arasohoka aja aho bari, arababaza ati: “Uwu muntu mumwagiriza iki?”
Baramwishura bati: “Ntitwari kumukuzanira ata kimwagira.”
Pilato arababwira ati: “Nimumujane mwebwe nyene mumucire urubanza mukurikije amategeko yanyu.” Baramwishura bati: “Ntitwemerewe gucira umuntu urubanza rwo gupfa.”
Ibi vyabaye kugira ngo bishitse ico Yesu yari yaravuze igihe yavuga urupfu yari agiye gupfa.
Nuko Pilato asubira ku kirimba, ahamagara Yesu, aramubaza ati: “Uri Umwami w’Abayuda?”
Yesu aramubaza ati: “Ibi ubibajije bivuye muri wewe canke ni ivyo wumvise abandi bamvugako?”
Pilato aramwishura ati: “Ubona jewe ndi Umuyuda? Abo mu bwoko bwawe n’abakuru b’abaherezi banyu ni bo bakunzaniye. Wagirizwa iki?”
Yesu aramubwira ati: “Ubwami bwanje si ubwo muri iyi si. Iyo buba ubwo muri iyi si, abayoboke banje bari kungwanira bakabuza abakuru b’Abayuda kumfata. Ariko Ubwami bwanje si ubwo muri iyi si.”

Pilato aramubwira ati: “Urumva rero uri Umwami!” Yesu aramwishura ati: “Uvuze ukuri, ndi Umwami. Icatumye mvuka nkaza kw’isi kwari ukugira ngo nshingire intahe ukuri. Umuntu wese akunda ukuri aranyumviriza.”
Pilato aramubaza ati: “Ukuri ni iki?” Ahejeje kuvuga ivyo, aca arasohoka aja aho Abayuda bari bakoraniye, ababwira ati: “Nta kintu na kimwe kimwagira.
Ariko musanzwe mufise umugenzo wo kunsaba imbohe imwe mu gihe c’imisi mikuru ya Pasika. Mushaka ko ndabarekurira Umwami w’Abayuda?”
Barasemerera bati: “Oya, si we dushaka! Turekurire Baraba!” Uwo Baraba yari umugumutsi.
Nuko Pilato afata Yesu ategeka ko bamutonagura.
Abasoda bajisha urugori rw’amahwa, barumwambika ku mutwe, bamwambika n’impuzu y’ubwami,
bamwegera kenshi bavuga bati: “Turagize bwakeye, mwami w’Abayuda!” Bongera bamukubita mu maso.
Pilato yongera gusohoka abwira Abayuda bari bakoraniye aho ati: “Ngira ndamusohore ndamubazanire, ariko mumenye ko ata kibi na kimwe nasanze kimwagira.”
Nuko Yesu asohoka yambaye urugori rw’amahwa ku mutwe n’impuzu y’ubwami. Pilato arababwira ati: “Ng’uwu wa muntu!”
Abakuru b’abaherezi n’abarinzi b’urusengero bamubonye, barasemerera bati: “Nabambwe! Nabambwe!” Pilato arabishura ati: “Nimumujane mwebwe mumwibambire kuko ata kibi na kimwe nasanze kimwagira.”
Abakuru b’Abayuda baramwishura bati: “Dukurikije ivyagezwe vyacu, akwiye gupfa kuko yiyise Umwana w’Imana.”
Pilato yumvise ayo majambo, agira ubwoba bwinshi.
Aca asubiza Yesu mu kirimba, aramubaza ati: “Uri uwa he?” Ariko Yesu ntiyagira ico amwishura.
Pilato aramubaza ati: “Ni kuki utanyishura? Ntuzi ko mfise ububasha bwo kukurekura canke kukubamba?”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Nta bubasha wari umfiseko iyo utabuhabwa n’Imana. Ni co gituma uwakunshikirije yakoze icaha kiruta icawe.”

Kuva ako kanya, Pilato agerageza kurekura Yesu, ariko abakuru b’Abayuda babandanya basemerera bati: “Niwarekura uwo muntu, ntuzoba ukiri umugenzi wa Kayisari. Umuntu wese yiyita umwami aba agararije Kayisari.”
Pilato yumvise ayo majambo, asohora Yesu, yicara ku ntebe y’imanza, ahantu hitwa Umusezero w’Amabuye (mu rurimi rw’Igiheburayo hitwa Gabata).
Hari nk’isaha zitandatu ku musi wo kwitegurira Pasika. Nuko Pilato abwira Abayuda ati: “Ng’uwu umwami wanyu!”
Barasemerera bati: “Napfe! Napfe! Nabambwe!” Pilato arababaza ati: “Mushaka ko mbamba umwami wanyu?” Abakuru b’abaherezi baramwishura bati: “Nta wundi mwami dufise atari Kayisari.”
Pilato aca atanga Yesu kugira ngo bamubambe. Nuko baramufata baramujana.
Yesu asohoka yikoreye umusaraba wiwe, ajanwa ahantu hitwa Nyagihanga (mu Giheburayo hitwa Gologota).
Aho ni ho bamubamvye. Hari n’abandi bantu babiri babambanywe na we: umwe hirya, uwundi hino, Yesu na we asigara hagati.
Maze Pilato ategeka ko bandika icandiko bakakimanika ku musaraba. Ico candiko cavuga ngo: yesu w’i nazareti, umwami w’abayuda.
Abayuda benshi barasomye ico candiko, kuko aho Yesu yari abambwe hari hegereye igisagara, kandi ico candiko cari canditswe mu Giheburayo, mu Kilatini no mu Kigiriki.
Abakuru b’abaherezi babwira Pilato bati: “Reka kwandika ngo: ‘Umwami w’Abayuda,’ hindura wandike uti: yavuze ngo ni umwami w’Abayuda.”
Pilato arabishura ati: “Ico nanditse, nacanditse.”

Bahejeje kubamba Yesu, abasoda bafata impuzu ziwe bazigaburamwo kune, umusoda wese atwara umuce, basigaza ikanzu yiwe. Iyo kanzu ntiyagira umubaririro, yari igizwe n’igitambara kimwe kuva hejuru gushika hasi.

Baravugana bati: “Ntidukwiye kuyitabura. Reka tuyipfindire kugira ngo tumenye uwuyegukira.” Ibi vyabaye kugira ngo bishitse Ivyanditswe bivuga ngo: “Bagabuye impuzu zanje, bapfindira umutamana wanje.” Ivyo ni vyo abasoda bakoze.
Hafi y’umusaraba wa Yesu, hari hahagaze nyina, nyinabo, Mariya muka Kilopa na Mariya Magadalena.
Yesu abonye nyina ahagaze aho, na wa mwigishwa Yesu yakunda amwegereye, abwira nyina ati: “Muvyeyi, ng’uwo umwana wawe,”
abwira wa mwigishwa ati: “Ng’uwo umuvyeyi wawe.” Kuva ico gihe, wa mwigishwa aca ajana Mariya iwe.
Inyuma y’ivyo, Yesu amenye ko vyose birangiye, kandi kugira ngo Ivyanditswe bishike, aravuga ati: “Ndanyotewe.”
Hafi yaho hari umubindi urimwo inkarisha, maze abasoda bafata ipampa barijobeka muri ya nkarisha, baridugisha ishami rya ezobu ku munwa wa Yesu.
Yesu amaze kwumviriza kuri ya nkarisha, aravuga ati: “Birarangiye.” Nuko ajondamika umutwe aracikana.

Kubera ko wari umusi wo kwitegurira Isabato idasanzwe, kuko bwaca ari Pasika; abakuru b’Abayuda ntibashaka ko abantu baguma bamanitse ku misaraba ku musi w’Isabato. Ni co catumye basaba Pilato ko babavuna amaguru, bakururutsa ibiziga vyabo.
Nuko abasoda baraza bavuna amaguru ya bamwe babiri bari babambanywe na Yesu.
Ariko bashikiriye Yesu basanga yamaze gucikana, ntibaba bakimuvuna amaguru.
Umwe mu basoda acumita Yesu icumu mu rubavu, haseseka amaraso n’amazi.
Uwabibonye ni we yabishingiye intahe, kandi intahe yiwe ni iy’ukuri, kandi ashinga iyo ntahe kugira ngo mwizere.
Ibi vyabaye kugira ngo hashitswe Ivyanditswe bivuga ngo: “Nta na rimwe mu magufa yiwe rizovunika.”
Ahandi Ivyanditswe bivuga ngo: “Bazobona uwo bacumise.”

Inyuma y’ivyo, Yosefu w’i Arimataya asaba Pilato uruhusha rwo kumanura ikiziga ca Yesu. Uwo Yosefu yari umwigishwa wa Yesu, ariko mu kinyegero, kuko yatinya abakuru b’Abayuda. Pilato amwemereye, Yosefu araza ajana ikiziga ca Yesu.
Yari kumwe na Nikodemu, umwe yagendera Yesu mw’ijoro. Nikodemu yari yaje azanye nk’ibiro mirongo itatu vy’ibimota neza.
Nuko bafata ikiziga ca Yesu bakizingira mu bitambara vyera, bashiramwo na vya bimota neza, nk’uko Abayuda babigenza mu guhamba.
Hafi y’aho Yesu yabambwe hari itongo, kandi muri iryo tongo hari imva nshasha, itari bwigere ihambwamwo umuntu.
Kubera wari umusi wo kwitegurira Isabato y’Abayuda, kandi iyo mva ikaba yari hafi, Yosefu na Nikodemu baciye baryamika ikiziga ca Yesu muri iyo mva.
Kare mu gitondo ku musi wa mbere w’indwi, mu bucagucagu, Mariya Magadalena yazindutse ku mva asanga ca kibuye cari cugaye imva cakuweho.
Nuko ariruka aja kurondera Simoni Petero na wa mwigishwa wundi Yesu yakunda, arababwira ati: “Bakuye Umwami mu mva, kandi ntituzi iyo bamushize.”
Petero n’uwo mwigishwa wundi bafata inzira baja ku mva.
Uko ari babiri bagiye biruka, ariko wa mwigishwa wundi ariruka asiga Petero, ashika ku mva ubwa mbere.
Maze arunama araba mu mva, abonayo vya bitambara vyera ariko ntiyinjira.
Simoni Petero na we ashika inyuma yiwe, yinjira mu mva, abonayo vya bitambara vyera,
hamwe n’igitambara cari kizingiriye ku mutwe wa Yesu. Ico gitambara cari ukwaco kizinguruye.
Mu nyuma, wa mwigishwa yashika ku mva ubwa mbere na we yinjira mu mva, aravyibonera kandi arizera.
(Gushika ico gihe abigishwa ntibari bwatahure Ivyanditswe bivuga ko Yesu yategerezwa kuzuka mu bapfuye.)
Maze ba bigishwa baca basubira i muhira.
Ariko Mariya yari ahagaze hanze, hafi y’imva, arira. Akiriko ararira arunama araba mu mva,
abona abamarayika babiri bambaye impuzu zera, bicaye aho ikiziga ca Yesu cari kiryamye, umwe ahari umutwe, uwundi ahari ibirenge.
Baramubaza bati: “Mupfasoni, ni kuki uriko urarira?” Arabishura ati: “Batwaye Umwami wanje, kandi sinzi aho bamushize.”
Ahejeje kuvuga ivyo, arahindukira abona Yesu ahagaze hafi yiwe, ariko ntiyamumenya.

Yesu aramubaza ati: “Mupfasoni, ni kuki uriko urarira? Urondera nde?” Mariya yiyumviriye ko ari umurimyi wo muri iryo tongo, aramubwira ati: “Mushingantahe, nimba ari wewe wamutwaye, mbwira aho wamushize nje kumutora.”
Yesu aca aramuhamagara ati: “Mariya.” Na we arahindukira aramuraba, aca arasemerera mu rurimi rw’Igiheburayo ati: “Rabuni!” (bisigura “Mwigisha”).
Yesu aramubwira ati: “Ntumfatire, kuko ntaraja kwa Data. Ahubwo genda ubwire bene Data ko mvuze nti: ‘Ngiye kuduga kwa Data ari we So, Imana yanje ari yo Mana yanyu.’ ”
Mariya Magadalena aca aja aho abigishwa bari bari arababwira ati: “Nabonye Umwami!” Aca ababwira ivyo Yesu yamubwiye.

Ku mugoroba w’uwo musi, ari wo musi wa mbere w’indwi, abigishwa bari bakoraniye hamwe biyugaranye kuko batinya abakuru b’Abayuda. Maze Yesu araza ahagarara hagati yabo, arababwira ati: “Amahoro abane namwe!”
Ahejeje kuvuga ivyo, abereka ibiganza n’urubavu vyiwe. Abigishwa baranezerwa cane babonye Umwami.
Yesu yongera kubabwira ati: “Amahoro abane namwe! Nk’uko Data yantumye, ni ko nanje ndabatumye.”
Ahejeje kuvuga ivyo, abahumekerako, arababwira ati: “Nimwakire Mpwemu Yera.
Umuntu wese muzoharira ivyaha, azobiharirwa; kandi uwo mutazobiharira, ntazobiharirwa.”
Toma (uwo batazira Ihasa), umwe muri ba bigishwa cumi na babiri, ntiyari kumwe n’abandi bigishwa igihe Yesu yaza.

Abandi bigishwa baramubwira bati: “Twabonye Umwami!” Ariko arababwira ati: “Ivyo sinshobora kuvyemera ntiboneye inkovu z’imisumari mu biganza, nkazikozako urutoke rwanje, ngashira n’ikiganza canje mu nkovu yo mu rubavu rwiwe.”

Haheze indwi, abigishwa ba Yesu basubira gukoranira hamwe mu nzu, kandi na Toma yari kumwe na bo. Imiryango y’inzu yari yugaye, ariko Yesu araza ahagarara hagati yabo, arababwira ati: “Amahoro abane namwe!”
Maze abwira Toma ati: “Koza urutoke rwawe hano, urabe ibiganza vyanje. Gorora ukuboko kwawe ukore mu rubavu rwanje. Reka gukekeranya niwizere.”
Toma aramubwira ati: “Mwami wanje, Mana yanje!”
Yesu aramubwira ati: “Wizeye kubera umbonye? Hahirwa abizera batarinze kubona.”
Hari n’ibindi bitangaza vyinshi Yesu yakoreye mu maso y’abigishwa biwe bitanditswe muri iki gitabu.
Ariko ibi vyanditswe kugira ngo mwizere ko Yesu ari Kristo, Umwana w’Imana, kandi kugira ngo mumaze kwizera muronke ubugingo mw’izina ryiwe.
Inyuma y’ivyo, Yesu yiyereka abigishwa biwe ku kiyaga c’i Tiberiya. Ng’uku uko vyagenze:
Simoni Petero, Toma (uwo batazira Ihasa), Natanayeli w’i Kana i Galilaya, abahungu ba Zebedayo, n’abandi bigishwa babiri bari kumwe.
Simoni Petero arababwira ati: “Jewe ngiye kuroba.” Nabo baramubwira bati: “Turajana.” Nuko baragenda baja mu bwato, ariko ntibaroba ifi n’imwe iryo ijoro.
Kare mu gitondo, Yesu ahagarara ku nkengera y’ikiyaga, ariko ba bigishwa ntibashobora kumenya uwo ari we.
Arabahamagara ati: “Bagenzi, nta fi mufise?” Na bo bati: “Oya!”
Arababwira ati: “Nimuterere urusenga ku ruhande rw’i buryo bw’ubwato, muraronka.” Nuko baterera urusenga, maze ntibashobora kurukwega kubera ifi zari nyinshi.
Wa mwigishwa Yesu yakunda abwira Petero ati: “Ni Umwami!” Simoni Petero yumvise ko ari Umwami, aca yambara impuzu yiwe yo hejuru (kuko yari yayikuye) asimbira mu mazi.
Abandi bigishwa bagumye mu bwato bakwegera rwa rusenga rwuzuye ifi ku nkengera, kuko bari nko ku metero ijana.
Bururutse ubwato babona umuriro w’amakara wokejeko ifi, babona n’imikate.
Yesu arababwira ati: “Nimuzane zimwe muri izo muhejeje kuroba.”
Nuko Simoni Petero asubira mu bwato akwegera ku nkengera y’ikiyaga rwa rusenga rwuzuye ifi nininini, zishika ijana na mirongo itanu na zitatu. Ariko naho zari nyinshi, urusenga ntirwatabutse.
Yesu arababwira ati: “Nimuze mufungure.” Nta n’umwe muri ba bigishwa yubahutse kumubaza uwo ari we, kuko bari batahuye ko ari Umwami.
Nuko Yesu arabegera, abagaburira wa mukate, abaha n’ifi.
Ubwo bwagira gatatu Yesu yiyereka abigishwa inyuma yo kuzuka kwiwe.

Bahejeje gufungura, Yesu abwira Simoni Petero ati: “Simoni mwene Yohana, urankunda kurusha aba?” Petero aramwishura ati: “Egome, Mwami, urazi ko ndagukunda.” Yesu na we ati: “Gaburira imyagazi y’intama zanje.”
Yesu yongera kubaza Petero ati: “Simoni mwene Yohana, urankunda?” Aramwishura ati: “Egome, Mwami, urazi ko ndagukunda.” Yesu aramubwira ati: “Ragira intama zanje.”

Yesu amubaza ubugira gatatu Yesu ati: “Simoni mwene Yohana, mbega urankunda?” Petero aca arababara kuko Yesu amubajije ubugira gatatu ati: “Mbega urankunda?” Aramwishura ati: “Mwami, wewe uzi vyose, urazi ko ndagukunda.” Yesu aramubwira ati: “Gaburira intama zanje.
Ndakubwire ukuri, ukiri muto wariyambika ukaja aho ushaka; ariko niwasaza, uzogorora amaboko yawe, uwundi muntu akwambike akujane aho udashaka kuja.”
Yesu yavuze ivyo ashaka kwerekana urupfu Petero azopfa ahesha Imana icubahiro. Aca abwira Petero ati: “Nkurikira!”
Nuko Petero arahindukira abona wa mwigishwa Yesu yakunda ariko arabakurikira. (Uwo ni umwe yari yegamiye mu gikiriza ca Yesu bariko barafungura akamubaza ati: “Mwami, ni nde agiye kukugurisha?”)
Petero amubonye abaza Yesu ati: “Mwami, urya we ivyiwe bizogenda gute?”
Yesu aramwishura ati: “Nimba nshaka ko abaho gushika ngarutse, ivyo bigutwaye iki? Wewe nkurikira gusa.”
Ivyo vyatumye haba ibihuha hagati mu bizera ko uwo mwigishwa atazopfa. Ariko Yesu ntiyavuze ngo ntazopfa; yavuze ati: “Nimba nshaka ko abaho gushika ngarutse, ivyo bigutwaye iki?”
Uwo mwigishwa ni we ashingira intahe ivyo kandi ni na we yavyanditse. Kandi turazi ko intahe yiwe ari iy’ukuri.
Yesu yarakoze n’ibindi bintu vyinshi. Iyo vyose vyandikwa, nibaza ko n’isi yose itokwiwemwo ibitabu vyokwanditswe.
Yewe Teyofilo, mu gitabu ca mbere nanditse, navuze ivyo Yesu yakoze n’ivyo yigishije vyose kuva mu ntango y’igikorwa ciwe,
gushika ku musi yurizwa mw’ijuru, ahejeje guha amategeko, mu bushobozi bwa Mpwemu Yera, intumwa yari yatoranije.
Inyuma y’urupfu rwiwe, yamaze imisi mirongo ine aza ariyereka izo ntumwa, azereka n’ibemenyetso bigaragara vyemeza ko ari muzima, yongera ababwira ivy’Ubwami bw’Imana.
Umusi umwe, abigishwa bakoraniye hamwe, Yesu abaha iri tegeko ati: “Ntimuve i Yerusalemu, ariko murindire gushika Data abarungikiye ingabire yabasezeraniye, imwe nababwira.
Kuko Yohana yabatiza mu mazi, ariko mu gihe gito, muzobatizwa muri Mpwemu Yera.”
Abari bakoraniye hamwe na we baramubaza bati: “Mwami, none ubu ni ho ugomba ugarukane ubwami bwa Isirayeli?”
Arabishura ati: “Si ivyanyu kumenya ivy’ibihe n’imisi kuko Data ari we yabishizeho mu bubasha bwiwe.
Ariko muzohabwa ubushobozi Mpwemu Yera niyabazako; maze muzonshingira intahe i Yerusalemu, i Yudaya n’i Samariya hose, no gushika ku mpera z’isi.”
Ahejeje kubabwira ivyo, aca aduzwa mw’ijuru bamuraba, haza igicu kiramufuka, ntibaba bakimubona.
Bakirangamije mu kirere baraba ingene aduga, haboneka abagabo babiri bambaye amakanzu yera, bahagarara i ruhande yabo.
Barababaza bati: “Yemwe Bagabo b’i Galilaya, ni kuki muhagaze ngaha muraba mw’ijuru? Uwu Yesu akuwe muri mwebwe akajanwa mw’ijuru, azogaruka uko mubonye agiye.”
Nuko baca bava kuri uwo Musozi wa Elayono, basubira i Yerusalemu; ni urugendo rungana hafi ikilometero kimwe.

Bashitse, baca baja mu cumba co hejuru, ico bari bamazemwo imisi. Abo bari aba: Petero, Yohana, Yakobo, Andereya, Filipo, Toma, Baruteremi, Matayo, Yakobo mwene Alufayo, Simoni Umuzelote, na Yuda mwene Yakobo.
Bose bakoranira hamwe bahuje umutima n’inama mu masengesho, bari kumwe na Mariya nyina wa Yesu n’abandi bagore, hamwe na bene nyina ba Yesu.
Muri iyo misi, Petero ahagarara hagati y’abizera (bashika nk’ijana na mirongo ibiri),
ababwira ati: “Bene Data, Ivyanditswe vyategerezwa gushika kuri Yuda, umwe yaza arongoye abaje gufata Yesu. Ivyo Mpwemu Yera yari yarabivuze kera aciye kuri Dawidi.
Yuda yari umwe muri twebwe, kandi twari dusangiye igikorwa.”
(Ingero Yuda yahawe kubera ikibi yakoze yaguzwemwo itongo kandi ni ryo yaguyemwo, akoroka atanguje umutwe, inda yiwe irasaba, amara arasanzara.
Ababa i Yerusalemu bose bamenye iyo nkuru, baca bita iryo tongo Akelodama, bisobanurwa ngo Itongo ry’amaraso.)
Petero avuga ati: “Mu gitabu ca Zaburi handitswe ngo: ‘I muhira iwe haze habe umusaka, ntihagire n’umwe azohaba.’ Kandi ngo: ‘Aze asubirizwe mu mabanga yiwe y’uburongozi.’
Ni co gituma dukwiye gutora umwe mu bo twabanye mu gihe cose Umwami Yesu yagendanye natwe,
uhereye igihe yabatizwa na Yohana, gushika igihe yaduzwa mw’ijuru. Uwo azoheza abe icabona kimwe muri twebwe co gushingira intahe ukuzuka kwiwe.”
Nuko baca batanga amazina y’abantu babiri ngo batoremwo umwe. Umwe yari Yosefu bita Barusaba (akongera akitwa Yusito), uwundi yari Matiyasi.
Nuko barasenga, bavuga bati: “Ewe Mwami Imana, ni wewe uzi imitima y’abantu bose. None rero uwo utoranije muri aba babiri,
kugira ngo abandanye iki gikorwa c’intumwa, ico Yuda yataye akaja ukwiwe.”
Nuko bagira ubupfindo, Matiyasi aba ari we atorwa, aca yongerwa kuri bamwe cumi n’umwe.
Ku musi wa Pentekote, abizera bose bari bakoraniye hamwe.
Ubwo nyene haza igihinda kivuye mw’ijuru kimeze nk’umuyaga mwinshi w’igihuhusi, cuzura mu nzu barimwo.
Baca babona ibimeze nk’imbeya z’umuriro zitandukanije, zica zija kuri umwe umwe wese.
Bose baca buzura Mpwemu Yera, batangura kuvuga mu zindi ndimi nk’uko Mpwemu Yera abashoboje kuzivuga.
Kandi hariho Abayuda benshi bubaha Imana bari i Yerusalemu, bari baje bava mu mahanga yo musi y’ijuru.
Bumvise urwamo, baca basidukana n’iyonka, baratangara cane kuko umwe wese yumva abizera bavuga ururimi rwiwe.
Nuko barabazanya bati: “Aba bantu bose bariko baravuga si Abanyagalilaya?
None bigenda gute ngo umwe umwe wese muri twebwe yumve bavuga ururimi kavukire rw’iwabo?
Muri twebwe harimwo Abapariti, Abamedi, Abelamiti, n’abava i Mesopotamiya, i Yudaya i Kapadokiya, i Ponto, muri Aziya,
i Furugiya, i Pamfiliya, muri Egiputa no mu gice ca Libiya cegereye Kurene, n’abavuye i Roma
(bagizwe n’Abayuda n’abinjiye mw’idini ry’Abayuda), Abanyakirete, n’Abarabu. Kandi twese turabumva bavuga ibitangaza vy’Imana mu ndimi z’iwacu.”
Nuko bose barumirwa bongera barazazanirwa, babazanya bati: “Mbega ibi ni iki?”
Ariko bamwe barabacokora bavuga bati: “Aba bantu baborewe, banyoye igisama.”
Petero aca arahaguruka ari kumwe na bamwe cumi n’umwe, avuga n’ijwi rirenga abwira abari aho ati: “Bayuda benewacu, namwe mwese muri i Yerusalemu, nimuntege amatwi, mutahure neza ibibaye.
Aba bantu ntibaborewe nk’uko muvyiyumvira. Raba haracari isaha zitatu z’igitondo.
Ibi ni ivyari vyaravuzwe n’uwavugishwa n’Imana Yoweli, aho yavuga ati:

‘Uku ni ko Imana ivuze, iti: Mu bihe vya nyuma nzosuka Mpwemu wanje ku bantu bose; abahungu banyu n’abakobwa banyu bazovugishwa nanje, n’abasore banyu bazobona ivyo beretswe, abatama banyu bazorota inzozi.
N’abasavyi banje, abagabo n’abagore, muri iyo misi nzobasukako Mpwemu wanje kandi bazovugishwa nanje.
Nzokwerekana ibitangaza hejuru kw’ijuru n’ibimenyetso hasi kw’isi: amaraso, umuriro, n’ugupfunduka kw’umwotsi.
Izuba rizohinduka umwijima, ukwezi guhinduke amaraso, imbere y’ukuza kwa wa musi w’Uhoraho uhambaye kandi w’ubwiza.
Kandi umuntu wese azokwambaza izina ry’Uhoraho azokizwa.’
Yemwe Bisirayeli, Yesu w’i Nazareti yari umuntu yashingiwe intahe n’Imana mu bitangaza, utwumiza n’ibimenyetso Imana yamukoresheje muri mwebwe, nk’uko ubwanyu mubizi.
Uwo Yesu yatanzwe mu maboko yanyu ku bw’umugambi Imana yari yatareguye kuva kera, maze namwe mufashijwe n’abanyakibi n’abanyamahanga, mumwica mumubamvye ku musaraba.
Ariko Imana yaramuzuye mu bapfuye, imukura mu vyara vy’urupfu, kuko bitashoboka ko urupfu rumugumya.
Dawidi yaramuvuzeko ati: ‘Namye mbona Uhoraho imbere yanje. Kuko ari i buryo bwanje, sinzonyiganyizwa.
Ni co gituma umutima wanje unezerewe, ururimi rwanje rugahimbarwa, n’umubiri wanje ukaruhukana ivyizigiro,
kuko utazorekera umushaha wanje mu kibanza c’abapfuye, canke ngo uze ureke uwera wawe ngo abore.
Wamenyesheje inzira y’ubugingo, uzonyuzuza umunezero ndi imbere yawe.’
Bene Data, ndashobora kubabwira ntakekeranya ko sogokuruza wacu Dawidi yapfuye agahambwa, kandi n’imva yiwe iracari hano gushika uwu musi.
Yari umuvugishwa w’Imana kandi yari azi ko Imana yari yaramusezeraniye ishizeko n’indahiro ko izokwimika ku ngoma yiwe umwe mu ruvyaro rwiwe.
Yeretswe ivyo muri kazoza, avuga ivy’ukuzuka kwa Kristo, ko atarekewe i kuzimu mu kibanza c’abapfuye, kandi ko n’umubiri wiwe utaboze.
Uwo Yesu Imana yaramuzuye mu bapfuye, twese turi ivyabona vyo kubishingira intahe.
None rero, amaze gushika i buryo bw’Imana, yakiriye Mpwemu Yera, uwo Data yari yarasezeranye, hanyuma asuka ivyo muriko murabona kandi mwumva.
Dawidi ntiyaduze mw’ijuru, ariko ni we yavuze ati: ‘Uhoraho yabariye Umwami wanje ati: Icara i buryo bwanje
kugeza abansi bawe bose ndabashize musi y’ibirenge vyawe.’
Nuko rero Abisirayeli nibamenye ukuri badakekeranya ko uwo Yesu, uwo mwebwe mwabamvye, Imana yamugize Umwami na Kristo.”
Abari ngaho bose bavyumvise bibacumita mu mitima, babaza Petero n’izindi ntumwa bati: “Bagabo benewacu, dukore iki?”
Petero arabishura ati: “Umuntu wese muri mwebwe niyihane, abatizwe mw’izina rya Yesu Kristo, kugira ngo ivyaha vyanyu bibone guharirwa, ni ho muzoronka ingabire ya Mpwemu Yera.
Kuko iryo sezerano ari iryanyu, n’iry’abana banyu, n’iry’abari kure bose, abazohamagarwa n’Umwami Imana yacu bose.”
Petero aca abandanya ababwira ayandi majambo menshi yo kubinginga no kubahanura, avuga ati: “Nimuhunge uru runganwe rw’inkozi z’ibibi.”
Nuko abizeye ayo majambo ya Petero barabatizwa, abashika ibihumbi bitatu biyongera ku gitigiri c’abizera.
Maze abizera bose bashira imitima ku vyo intumwa zigisha, gusangira ivyabo, kumanyagura imikate, no gusenga.
Umuntu wese aterwa n’ubwoba ku bw’ibitangaza n’ibimenyetso vyinshi vyakorwa n’intumwa.
Abizera bose baba hamwe kandi basangira ivyabo vyose.
Bagurisha amatongo n’ivyo batunze vyose, bakagabura amahera, bivanye n’ubukene bw’umwe umwe wese.
Imisi yose bama bakoranira mu rusengero, bakamanyagurira imikate mu mihana yabo, bakongera bagasangirira hamwe bafise imitima ihuye kandi banezerewe.
Bama bashima Imana ibihe vyose kandi na bo bashimwa n’abantu bose, maze Umwami Imana na we akama abongerereza igitigiri c’abakizwa.
Umusi umwe Petero na Yohana bari baduze mu rusengero gusenga, hari kw’isaha y’icenda.
Hari umuntu yaremaye kuva akivuka yama azanwa imisi yose kw’irembo ryitwa Irembo Ryiza kugira ngo asege abaje mu rusengero.
Abonye Petero na Yohana bagira binjire mu rusengero, arabasega.
Maze Petero na Yohana barahindukira baramuraba, hanyuma Petero amubwira ati: “Nuturabe!”
Wa mugabo na we abahanga amaso cane yiteze ko hari ico bagira bamuhe.
Ariko Petero aravuga ati: “Ifeza n’inzahabu nta vyo mfise, ariko ico mfise ndakiguha. Mw’izina rya Yesu Kristo Umunyenazareti, va hasi utambuke!”
Aca amufata ukuboko kw’i buryo, aramuhagurutsa, ubwo nyene ibirenge vyiwe n’ingingo zavyo bica birakomera.
Nuko atangura gutambuka, yinjirana na bo mu rusengero, atambuka, yiterera hejuru, ahimbaza Imana.
Abantu bose bamubonye agendagenda ashima Imana,
bamenya ko ari umwe yahora yicara asegerereza kw’irembo ry’urusengero ryitwa Irembo Ryiza, barumirwa cane, batangazwa n’ivyamubayeko.
Kubera ko wa muntu yaguma yumiye kuri Petero na Yohana, abantu bose biruka iyo bari, barundana mw’ibaraza ryitwa Ibaraza rya Salomo, batangaye cane.
Petero abibonye, arababwira ati: “Yemwe Bisirayeli, ni kubera iki ibi bibatangaje? Ni kubera iki muturaba nk’aho umenga ni ubushobozi bwacu canke ukwubaha Imana kwacu kwatumye uwu muntu atambuka?
Imana ya Aburahamu, ya Isaka n’iya Yakobo, Imana ya ba sogokuruza, ni yo ishimagije umusavyi wayo Yesu, uwo mwatanze ngo yicwe, mukamwihakana imbere ya Pilato, naho we yari yahisemwo kumurekura.
Mwihakanye Uwera, Umugororotsi, musaba ko barekura umwicanyi.
Mwishe uwutanga ubugingo, ariko Imana yaramuzuye mu bapfuye, natwe turi ivyabona vyo kubishingira intahe.
Biciye mu kwizera izina rya Yesu, uwu muntu yakize. Ni izina rya Yesu n’ukwizera kuva kuri we vyamukijije neza nk’uko muvyibonera mwese.
None rero bavukanyi, ndazi ko mwabikoze mu kutamenya, co kimwe n’abatware banyu.
Ariko uko ni ko Imana yashikije ivyo yari yaravugiye mu kanwa k’abavugishwa na yo bose, ivuga ko Kristo akwiye kubabazwa.
Nuko rero nimwihane, muhindukire, kugira ngo ivyaha vyanyu bihanagurwe, ngo ibihe vy’impemburo bibone kuza, bivuye imbere y’Umwami Imana,
kugira yongere ibarungikire Kristo yabashiriweho, ari we Yesu.
Uwo akwiye kuja mw’ijuru kurindirirayo igihe ivy’Imana yavugiye mu kanwa k’abavugishwa na yo bera vyose bishitse.
Kuko Mose yavuze ati: ‘Uhoraho Imana yanyu azobahagurukiriza umuvugishwa ameze nkanje, imukuye muri mwebwe nyene. Muze mumwumvire mu vyo azobabwira vyose.
Uwutazomwumviriza aze arandurwe mu bwoko bwiwe.’
Kukaba nka ko, n’abandi bavugishwa bose uhereye kuri Samweli, baravugishijwe ku biriko biraba uno musi.
Muri abuzukuruza b’abo bavugishwa, n’abana b’isezerano Imana yagiranye na ba sogokuruza banyu. Yabwiye Aburahamu iti: ‘Mu ruvyaro rwawe ni ho imiryango yose yo mw’isi izohererwa umugisha.’
Igihe Imana yazura umusavyi wayo, yabanje kumutuma kuri mwebwe, kugira ngo umwe wese muri mwebwe ahabwe umugisha mu kuva mu nzira ziwe mbi.”
Abaherezi bari kumwe n’umukuru w’abarinzi b’urusengero hamwe n’Abasadukayo baca baraza aho Petero na Yohana bariko barigishiziza.
Maze bararaka cane kuko izo ntumwa zariko zigisha abantu ko muri Yesu hari ukuzuka kw’abapfuye.
Baca bafata Petero na Yohana, kandi kubera bwari bwije, babashira mw’ibohero gushika bukeye.
Ariko benshi mu bumvise ubutumwa barizeye, igitigiri c’abizera kirongerekana gushika hafi ibihumbi bitanu.
Bukeye, abatware, abashingantahe n’abigisha b’ivyagezwe bakoranira i Yerusalemu.
Anasi umuherezi mukuru ni ho yari ari, ari kumwe na Kayafa, na Yohana, na Alegizandere hamwe n’abandi benshi bo mu muryango w’abaherezi bakuru.
Nuko barengutsa Petero na Yohana, batangura kubabazagiza bati: “Ni mu buhe bushobozi, canke mw’izina rya nde mwakoze ivyo?”
Maze Petero, yuzuye Mpwemu Yera, aravuga ati: “Batware nanwe bashingatahe b’ubu bwoko,
uwu musi turiko turasambishwa kubera igikorwa ciza cakorewe ikimuga, tubazwa n’ingene cakize.

Nuko rero nimumenye neza ibi, mwebwe hamwe n’ubwoko bwose bwa Isirayeli: uwu muntu ahagaze imbere yanyu yakize mw’izina rya Yesu Kristo Umunyenazareti, uwo mwabamvye, ariko Imana ikamuzura mu bapfuye.
Ni we ‘buye ryatawe n’abubatsi, ariko ryahindutse irigumya imfuruka.’
Nta wundi agakiza karonkerwamwo, kuko ata rindi zina twahawe musi y’ijuru ryo gukirizwamwo.”
Babonye ubushizi bw’amanga bwari muri Petero na Yohana, bakamenya ko batize, ahubwo ko ari abantu batobato, baratangara cane, ariko bamenya ko bagendanye na Yesu.
Ariko kubera babona uwo muntu yakize ahagararanye na bo, nta co bari bafise bashobora gusubizayo.
Nuko barabataramura, batangura kuvugana hagati yabo.
Barabazanya bati: “Mbega aba bantu tubagire dute? Abantu bose baba i Yerusalemu barazi ko bakoze igitangaza c’akataraboneka, kandi natwe ntitwobiharira.
Ariko kugira tubuze ibi bintu kubandanya vyamamara mu bantu, reka tubabuze kubandanya bigisha muri iryo zina.”
Nuko barabahamagara, babihanikiriza kudasubira kuvuga canke kwigisha muri iryo zina rya Yesu.
Ariko Petero na Yohana barabishura bati: “Mbega mubona ko ikibereye imbere y’Imana, ari ukwubaha mwebwe gusumba kuyubaha?
Twebwe ntidushobora kureka kuvuga ivyo twiboneye kandi twiyumviye.”
Nuko babanza kubatera ubwoba cane, hanyuma barabarekura barataha. Ntibaronse ingene bari bubahane kubera abari aho bose bariko bashima Imana ku vyari vyabaye.
Uwo muntu yari yakize mu buryo bw’igitangaza yari afise imyaka irenga mirongo ine.
Petero na Yohana bamaze kurekurwa baca basubira aho bagenzi babo bari, babiganira ivyo abakuru b’abaherezi n’abashingantahe bababwiye.
Bavyumvise, bashira amajwi hejuru bose, basenga Imana, bavuga bati: “Mwami Imana uganje vyose, ni wewe waremye ijuru, isi n’ikiyaga, n’ibibibamwo vyose.
Ni wewe wavugiye muri Mpwemu Yera uciye mu kanwa k’umusavyi wawe, sogokuruza wacu Dawidi, uti: ‘Ni kuki abanyamahanga bateye umuvurungano, n’amoko akagira inama z’ubusa?
Abami bo mw’isi bakuye hasi, n’abatware bagiye hamwe ngo bagwanye Uhoraho n’uwo yarobanuje amavuta.’
Ni ivy’ukuri Herode na Pontiyo Pilato bifatanije n’Abanyamahanga hamwe n’ubwoko bwa Isirayeli bwo muri iki gisagara, kugira ngo bagwanye umusavyi wawe yera Yesu, uwo warobanuje amavuta.
Bashikije ico wari waramaze kugena ko kizoshika, mu bushobozi bwawe no mu gushaka kwawe.
None rero Mwami Imana, nurabe ingene badutera ubwoba, maze ushoboze abasavyi bawe kwigisha ijambo ryawe bashize amanga.
Gorora ukuboko kwawe maze ukize, ukore ibitangaza n’utwumiza mw’izina ry’umusavyi wawe yera Yesu.”
Bahejeje gusenga, aho bari bakoraniye haratigita, bose buzuzwa Mpwemu Yera, baca bigisha ijambo ry’Imana bashize amanga.
Abizera bose bari bahuje umutima n’inama muri vyose. Nta n’umwe yavuga ko ivyo atunze ari ivyiwe wenyene, ariko basangira ivyo bafise vyose.
Intumwa zibandanya gushingira intahe ukuzuka kw’Umwami Yesu zuzuye ubushobozi bwinshi, kandi ubuntu bw’Imana bwinshi bwaguma bugwira kuri bo bose.
Nta n’umwe yagira ico akeheje muri bo, kuko abari bafise amatongo canke amazu, babigurisha bakazana amahera vyaguzwe,
bakayashikiriza intumwa, maze na zo zikayabagabanganya, umwe umwe wese akaronka ayakwiranye n’ivyo akenye.
Nk’akarorero, Yosefu, Umulewi yava i Kupuro, uwo intumwa zita Baranaba (risobanura ngo Umuntu yirura),
yagurishije itongo maze azana amahera yose ayashikiriza intumwa.
Ariko hari umugabo yitwa Ananiya, yari afise umugore yitwa Safira. Bagurisha itongo ryabo babigiye inama.
Aca yumvikana n’umugore wiwe, bafata igice c’amahera bakuyemwo barakinyegeza, bazana ayasigaye bayashikiriza intumwa.
Maze Petero abaza Ananiya ati: “Ananiya, ni kuki Satani yujuje umutima guhenda Mpwemu Yera mu kunyegeza igice c’amahera wagurishije itongo ryawe?

Mbega utararigurisha ntiryari iryawe? Kandi umaze kurigurisha, amahera ntiyari ayawe? Vyakugendeye gute ngo wiyumvire mu mutima wawe ukore ikibi nk’ico? Erega si twebwe wahenze, ahubwo wahenze Imana!”
Ananiya acumva ivyo, agwa hasi arahwera. Abavyumvise ibibaye bose batekerwa n’ubwoba.
Maze abasore bari aho bava hasi, batekera ikiziga ciwe bakijana kugihamba.
Haciye nk’amasaha atatu umugore wiwe aca arashika, atazi ivyabaye.
Petero aramubaza ati: “Tubwire! Aya ni yo mahera yose mwe na Ananiya mwakuye mw’itongo mwagurishije?” Safira ati: “Egome, ni ayo.”
Petero aca amubwira ati: “Vyabagendeye gute ngo mwumvikane guhenda Mpwemu w’Umwami Imana? Raba ibirenge vy’abavuye guhamba umugabo wawe bigeze aho imbere y’umuryango, kandi na wewe barakujana.”
Ubwo nyene aca agwa hasi imbere y’ibirenge vya Petero, aracikana. Ba bantu baca barinjira, basanga na we arapfuye, baca baja kumuhamba, bamuryamika i ruhande y’umugabo wiwe.
Ishengero ryose n’abumvise ivyabaye bose baca bafatwa n’ubwoba bwinshi.
Inyuma y’ivyo, intumwa zibandanya zikora ibitangaza n’utwumiza mu bantu, kandi abizera bose bama bahurira hamwe mw’ibaraza rya Salomo, bahuje umutima n’inama.
Nta n’umwe yubahuka kwifatanya na bo, n’aho abantu babemera cane.
Ariko abantu benshi, abagabo n’abagore barizera Umwami, igitigiri cabo cama congerekana.
Vyatuma kandi abantu benshi bama bazana abagwaye bakabaryamika mu nderuzo no ku birago i ruhande y’inzira, kugira ngo Petero arenganye igitutu ciwe gipfume kibacako.
Abantu isinzi bama bakorana bavuye mu mihana ikikuje Yerusalemu, bazanye abagwaye n’abafashwe n’impwemu mbi, kandi bose barakira.
Maze umuherezi mukuru n’abo bari bafadikanije, bari mu muce b’Abasadukayo, babagirira ishari.
Nuko bafata intumwa bazishira mw’ibohero.
Ariko mw’ijoro, umumarayika w’Umwami Imana yugurura imiryango y’ibohero, arabasohora.
Maze arababwira ati: “Nimugende muhagarare mu rusengero, mubwire abantu ubutumwa bwuzuye bw’ivy’ubu bugingo bushasha.”

Bukeye binjira mu rusengero nk’uko babariwe, batangura kwigisha. Umuherezi mukuru n’abo bari bafatanije bashitse, baca bakoranya inama nkuru y’abarongoye ubwoko bw’Abisirayeli, baca barungika abarinzi b’urusengero kw’ibohero kuzana za ntumwa.
Ariko ba barinzi b’urusengero bashitse kw’ibohero, ntibabasangayo, baca basubira inyuma gutanga inkuru,
bavuga bati: “Twasanze ibohero ryugaye neza, n’abarinzi bahagaze ku miryango, ariko twuguruye twasanze ata n’umwe ariyo.”
Umukuru w’abarinzi b’urusengero n’abakuru b’abaherezi bavyumvise barazazanirwa cane bibaza ibishobora gukurikira.
Ubwo nyene haca haza umuntu, ababwira ati: “Ba bagabo mwashira mw’ibohero bahagaze mu rusengero bariko barigisha abantu.”
Wa mukuru w’abarinzi b’urusengero aca ajana n’abarinzi bari kumwe, baja kuzana za ntumwa. Ariko babazana ku neza badakoresheje inguvu, kuko batinya ko abantu bobatera amabuye.
Babashikanye, babashira imbere y’inama nkuru y’abarongoye ubwo bwoko, maze umuherezi mukuru atangura kubasambisha.
Arababwira ati: “Twari twabihanikirije kutigisha muri iryo zina. Ariko mwakwiragije inyigisho zanyu i Yerusalemu hose, kandi mwamaramaje kutwegekako amaraso y’uwo muntu.”
Petero n’izindi ntumwa barishura bati: “Dutegerezwa kwubaha Imana kuruta abantu!
Imana ya ba sogokuruza yazuye Yesu mu bapfuye, uwo mwari mwishe mumubamvye ku musaraba.
Imana yaramushize hejuru imwicarika i buryo bwayo nk’Umutware n’Umukiza, kugira ngo ahe Abisirayeli ukwihana n’uguharirwa ivyaha vyabo.
Ivyo twebwe turabishingira intahe, kandi na Mpwemu Yera arabishingira intahe, uwo Imana yahaye abamwumvira.”
Bavyumvise barashangashirwa, bagomba kubicisha.
Ariko hari Umufarisayo yitwa Gamaliyeli, yari umwigisha w’ivyagezwe, kandi yubahwa cane n’abantu bose. Arahaguruka, asaba ko bataramura gato izo ntumwa.
Aca ababwira ati: “Bagabo b’Isirayeli, mwiyumvire neza ku vyo mugomba kugirira aba bantu.
Mu misi iheze, uwitwa Teyuda yaje yigira uwuhambaye, abantu bashika amajana ane baramukurikira. Amaze kwicwa, abamukurikira bose baca barasanzara, ntibagira ico bashikako.
Inyuma yaho, Yuda Umunyagalilaya yaje mu misi y’urusansuma, arongoye umugwi w’abantu batera umudurumbanyo. Na we nyene yarishwe, abamukurikira barasanzara.
None rero n’ubu ndabahanure: Nimurekure aba bantu bigire! Kuko nimba ivyo bariko barakora vyavuye ku bantu, Nta ho bizoshika.
Ariko nimba biva ku Mana, ntimuzoshobora kubagwanya; ahubwo muzosanga muriko mugwanya Imana.”
Nuko bemera impanuro ziwe, bahamagaza za ntumwa, barazikubitisha, bazitegeka kudasubira kwigisha muri iryo zina rya Yesu, baca barabarekura barataha.
Izo ntumwa zica ziva imbere y’Inama Nkuru y’abarongoye ubwo bwoko zinezerewe, kuko Imana yari yabonye ko bibabereye kubabazwa bahorwa izina rya Kristo.
Imisi yose bama mu rusengero canke mu mihana, ntibigeze bahagarika kwigisha no kwamamaza inkuru nziza, bavuga ko Yesu ari we Kristo.
Muri iyo misi, igitigiri c’abigishwa caguma ciyongera. Abayuda bavuga Ikigiriki bari muri bo bidogera Abayuda b’imvukira ko birengagiza abapfakazi babo iyo batanga imfungurwa zo ku musi ku musi.
Bamwe cumi na babiri baca bakoranira hamwe n’abandi bigishwa, bavuga bati: “Si vyiza ko dufata minenegwe igikorwa co kugabura ijambo ry’Imana bitumwe no kugabura ivyokurya.
Bene Data, nimutoranye abantu indwi muri mwebwe, mushingira intahe ko buzuye Mpwemu Yera n’ubwenge, tubazeze ico gikorwa,
hanyuma natwe duheze twiyegurire igikorwa co gusenga no kwigisha Ijambo ry’Imana.”

Abari aho bose bashima ico ciyumviro, maze batoranya Sitefano, umuntu yari yuzuye ukwizera kandi yari yuzuye Mpwemu Yera, na Filipo, na Purokoro, Nikanori, Timoni, Parumena, na Nikola Umunyantiyokiya yinjiye mw’idini ry’Abayuda.
Nuko abo bantu bazanwa imbere y’intumwa, zirabasengera, zibarambitseko ibiganza.
Nuko ijambo ry’Imana ribandanya kwamamara, igitigiri c’abigishwa i Yerusalemu kiragwira cane, kandi n’abaherezi benshi b’Abayuda barizera.
Sitefano yari umuntu yuzuye ubuntu n’ububasha vy’Imana, yakoreye ibitangaza n’ibimenyetso vyinshi mu bantu.

Ariko abantu bamwebamwe bo mw’Isinagogi ry’abiyita Abagurano bidegemvya, ari bo Bayuda b’i Kurene n’abo muri Alegizanderiya, bafatanije n’abava mu ntara za Kilikiya na Aziya, bahagurukira rimwe guhaririza Sitefano.
Ariko ntibashobora guhagarara imbere y’ubwenge bwiwe hamwe n’Impwemu yamuvugisha.
Ni ko guca baha ingero abantu mu mpisho ngo baje kumudodobereza bati: “Twumvise Sitefano atuka Mose, yongera atuka n’Imana.”
Maze baca bagumura abantu bose, harimwo n’abashingantahe b’ubwo bwoko n’abigisha b’ivyagezwe, bafata Sitefano, bamutwara imbere y’inama nkuru y’abarongoye ubwo bwoko.
Baca bazana ibindi vyabona vy’ibinyona, bivuga bati: “Uwu mugabo yama atuka urusengero rwera n’amabwirizwa ya Mose.
Twaramwumvise avuga ko uwo Yesu w’i Nazareti azosambura urusengero yongere ahindure imigenzo Mose yadusigiye.”
Abari bicaye mu nama nkuru y’abarongoye ubwo bwoko bose bamwihweje, babona mu maso hiwe hasa n’ah’umumarayika.
Nuko umuherezi mukuru aramubaza ati: “Ivyo bakwagiriza ni vyo?”
Na we yishura ati: “Bavukanyi namwe bavyeyi, nimuntege amatwi ndababwire! Imana y’ubwiza yiyeretse sogokuruza Aburahamu akiri i Mesopotamiya, imbere y’uko aja kuba i Harani.
Yamubwiye iti: ‘Va mu gihugu cawe no mu bwoko bwawe, uje mu gihugu nzokwereka.’
Nuko Aburahamu ava mu gihugu c’Abakarudaya, aja kuba i Harani. Se wiwe amaze gupfa, Imana imurungika muri iki gihugu mubamwo.
Nta mugabane yamuhaye muri ico gihugu, nta n’aho guhonyoza ikirenge, ariko Imana yamusezeraniye ko we n’uruvyaro rwiwe bazokwegukira iki gihugu, n’aho ico gihe Aburahamu atari bwaronke umwana.
Imana yamubwiye iti: ‘Uruvyaro rwawe ruzoba abanyamahanga mu gihugu kitari icabo, kandi bazogirwa abagurano, bacinyizwe imyaka amajana ane.’
Imana yongera ivuga iti: ‘Ariko nzohana ihanga bazokorera nk’abagurano, kandi mu nyuma bazorivamwo, baze kunsengera muri iki kibanza.’

Nuko ica iha Aburahamu isezerano ryo gukebwa. Aburahamu na we avyara Isaka, amukeba ku musi ugira umunani. Isaka avyara Yakobo aramukeba, Yakobo na we avyara ba sogokuruza cumi na babiri, na we arabakeba.
Kubera ishari ba sogokuruza bagiriye Yosefu, bamugurishije muri Egiputa; ariko Imana yari kumwe na we,
maze imukiza amarushwa yiwe yose. Imuha ubwenge budasanzwe n’ikiganza ciza kuri Farawo, umwami wa Egiputa, na we amuha ubutware kuri Egiputa yose no mu bakozi biwe.
Igihe kimwe inzara itera muri Egiputa yose n’i Kanani, abantu babona amakuba, ba sogokuruza babura ivyokurya.
Yakobo yumvise ko muri Egiputa hariyo ingano, arungikayo ba sogokuruza incuro ya mbere.
Basubiyeyo ubwa kabiri, Yosefu yihishurira benewabo, Farawo na we abona kumenya umuryango wa Yosefu.
Maze Yosefu aca atumako se Yakobo n’umuryango wiwe wose. Bose hamwe bari mirongo irindwi na batanu.
Nuko Yakobo amanuka muri Egiputa. Mu nyuma arapfa, co kimwe na ba sogokuruza.
Ibisigarira vyabo vyatahukanwe i Shekemu, bishingurwa mu mva Aburahamu yari yaguriye abahungu ba Hamori i Shekemu.
Igihe c’uko Imana ishitsa amasezerano yahaye Aburahamu cegereje, igitigiri c’ubwoko bwacu cari kimaze kugwira, kirongerekana cane muri Egiputa.
Mu nyuma muri Egiputa himikwa uwundi mwami atigeze amenya ivya Yosefu.
Atwaza umukazo ubwoko bwacu, ategeka ba sogokuruza guta abana babo b’inzoya kugira ngo ntibabeho.
Ico gihe ni ho Mose yavuka, avuka ari umwana adasanzwe imbere y’Imana. Nuko arererwa mu muryango wiwe gushika ashikanye amezi atatu.
Amaze gutabwa, umukobwa wa Farawo aramutora, amurera nk’umwana wiwe bwite.
Nuko Mose yigishwa ubwenge bwose bw’Abanyegiputa, kandi aba uwuhambaye mu mvugo no mu ngiro.
Mose amaze imyaka mirongo ine, yumva mu mutima yotemberera benewabo b’Abisirayeli.
Maze asanga Umunyegiputa ariko akubita Umwisirayeli, aca aramutabara, maze amuhora mu kwica uwo Munyegiputa.
Mose we yibaza ko benewabo baza gutahura ko Imana yariko iramukoresha mu kubakiza. Ariko Abisirayeli bo ntibabitahura.
Bukeye Mose asanga aho Abisirayeli babiri bariko baragwana, agerageza kubumvikanisha, ababwira ati: ‘Mwa bagabo mwe, ko muri abavukanyi, ni iki gituma mugiriranira nabi?’
Uwariko agirira nabi mugenziwe aca asunura Mose, amubaza ati: ‘Ni nde yakugize umutware n’umucamanza wacu?
Ugomba kunyica nk’uko ejo wishe wa Munyegiputa?’
Mose avyumvise, aca ahungira mu ntara ya Midiyani, abayo nk’umunyamahanga, avyarirayo abahungu babiri.
Haheze imyaka mirongo ine, umumarayika yiyereka Mose mu mbeya z’igisaka cariko kirasha mu bugaragwa hafi y’umusozi Sinayi.
Maze Mose atangajwe n’ivyo abonye, yegera igisaka ngo arabe neza ivyo ari vyo, ni ko kwumva ijwi ry’Umwami Imana rivuga riti:
‘Ndi Imana ya ba sogokuruza bawe, Imana ya Aburahamu, ya Isaka n’iya Yakobo.’ Mose ahinda agashitsi kubera ubwoba bwinshi, ntiyubahuka gusubira kwunamuka ngo arabe.
Umwami Imana aramubwira ati: ‘Ambura ibirato vyawe, kuko aha hantu uhagaze ari ahera.
Nabonye agacinyizo abantu banje barimwo muri Egiputa, numva n’amaborogo yabo, none manukanywe no kubakiza. Egera hano, kuko ngomba kugutuma muri Egiputa.’

Uwu ni Mose nyene bari baranse igihe bavuga bati: ‘Ni nde yakugize umutware n’umucamanza wacu?’ Imana ubwayo ni yo yamwirungikiye ngo abe umutware n’umucunguzi wabo, biciye ku mumarayika yamwiyeretse ari mu gisaka caka umuriro.
Yabakuje muri Egiputa utwumiza n’ibitangaza yakoreye muri ico gihugu, ku kiyaga gitukura, no mu myaka mirongo ine bamaze mu bugaragwa.
Uwo ni Mose nyene yabwiye Abisirayeli ati: ‘Imana izobahagurukiriza umuvugishwa ameze nkanje muri mwebwe.’
Yari mw’ikoraniro mu bugaragwa, ari kumwe na wa mumarayika yavugana na we ku musozi Sinayi hamwe na ba sogokuruza, aca ahabwa n’amajambo mazima, ayo yadusigiye.
Ariko ba Sokuruza bacu baranse kumwumvira, baramwikunkumura, imitima yabo yipfuza kwisubirira muri Egiputa.
Nuko babwira Aroni bati: ‘Ducurire imana zizotuja imbere, kuko tutazi ivyashikiye Mose, uwadukuye mu gihugu ca Egiputa.’
Ico gihe ni ho bakora ikigirwamana mw’ishusho y’inyana y’inka. Bagishikanira ibimazi bongera bagira umusi mukuru wo kwigina ico kintu bari bakoresheje amaboko yabo.

Maze Imana yirabira hirya, irabareka ngo basenge ibiba ku kirere, baba bashikije ivyanditswe mu bitabu vy’abavugishwa, bivuga ngo: ‘Mbega hari ibimazi n’amashikanwa mwanshikaniye mu myaka mirongo ine mwamaze mu bugaragwa, Yemwe Bisirayeli?
Mwashize hejuru ihema rya Moleki, n’ikimenyetso c’inyenyeri c’imana yanyu Refani, ibishushanyo mwacuze ngo mubisenge. Nuko rero nzobirukana muhungire hakurya ya Babiloni.’
Ba sogokuruza bacu bari bafise ihema ry’isezerano mu bugaragwa. Ryari ryubatswe nk’uko Imana yari yategetse Mose, nk’uko ikigereranyo yari yeretswe cari kiri.

Bamaze guhabwa iryo hema, ba sogokuruza, barongowe na Yosuwa, baje bazanye iryo sandugu mu gihugu Imana yari ihejeje kwirukanamwo amahanga imbere yabo. Iryo hema ryagumye mu gihugu gushika ku gihe c’umwami Dawidi.
Dawidi na we agirirwa ubuntu bwinshi n’Imana, bituma asaba kwubakira ihema Imana ya Yakobo.
Ariko Salomo ni we yahavuye ayubakira inzu.
Ariko Iyisumbavyose ntiba mu nzu zubatswe n’amaboko y’abantu, nk’uko uwavugishwa n’Imana avuga ati:
‘Ijuru ni intebe yanje y’ubwami, isi na yo ni indava y’ibirenge vyanje.’ Ni ko Uhoraho avuze. ‘Mbega mwonyubakira inzu nyabaki? Canke ikibanza canje co kuruhukiramwo coba hehe?
Mbega ukuboko kwanje si kwo kwaremye ivyo vyose?’
Mwa ntagondwa mwe, imitima yanyu n’amatwi yanyu ntibirakebwa. Mumeze nka ba sogokuruza banyu: mwama mugarariza Mpwemu Yera.
Mbega hari umuvugishwa n’umwe ba sogokuruza banyu batahamye? Mbere bishe n’abavugishijwe ku kuza kwa wa Umugororotsi. None namwe ubu mwaramugurishije, muramwica,
kandi ari mwebwe mwakiriye ivyagezwe vy’Imana mubihawe n’abamarayika, ariko ntimwavyumvira.”
Bavyumvise, barashangashirwa, bamuhekenyera imisaya.
Ariko Sitefano yuzuye Mpwemu Yera, arangamiza mw’ijuru, abona ubwiza b’Imana, abona na Yesu ahagaze i buryo bw’Imana.
Aca avuga ati: “Ehe mbonye ijuru ryugurutse, mbona n’Umwana w’Umuntu ahagaze i buryo bw’Imana.”
Ariko avuga uko, baca bazibira amatwi yabo kugira ntibamwuve, bashira urwamo hejuru, baca bamuhundarirako icarimwe,
bamukwegera inyuma y’igisagara, batangura kumutera amabuye. Vya vyabona bikura imitamana yavyo, biyirambika imbere y’ibirenge vy’umusore yitwa Sawuli.
Bakiriko baramutera amabuye, Sitefano arasenga ati: “Mwami Yesu, akira ubugingo bwanje.”
Aca agwa apfukamye, asemerera ati: “Mwami, ntubaharureko iki caha.” Ahejeje kuvuga ivyo, aca aracikana.

Na Sawuli ni ho yari ari, kandi yari ashigikiye ko Sitefano yicwa. Uwo musi haca haduka ihamwa rikomeye kw’ishengero ry’i Yerusalemu, maze abigishwa bose, kiretse intumwa, basanzarira i Yudaya n’i Samariya.
Abantu bubaha Imana baraza bahamba Sitefano, baramugandarira cane.
Ariko Sawuli we agerageza gusambura ishengero; yinjira mu nzu ku yindi agafata abagabo n’abagore bizera, akabata mw’ibohero.
Abasanzaye bagenda barigisha ijambo ry’Imana aho baba bageze hose.
Nuko Filipo amanuka mu gisagara kimwe c’i Samariya, abwira abantu baho ivya Kristo.
Maze abantu isinzi bumvise amajambo ya Filipo, bakabona n’ibitangaza akora, baca bashira umutima ku nyigisho ziwe.
Kuko benshi barakira impwemu mbi, zikabavamwo zikoma induru, abanyunyutse n’abacumbagira bagakira.
Maze haba umunezero mwinshi muri ico gisagara.
Hari umugabo yitwa Simoni yari amaze igihe ari umunyamareba muri ico gisagara, agatangaza ab’i Samariya bose,
kandi abantu bose, abahambaye n’aboroshe, baramutangarira bakavuga bati: “Uwu mugabo ni bwa bushobozi bw’Imana, bita ‘Ubushobozi Buhambaye.’ ”
Bakunda kumwumviriza kuko yari amaze igihe abatangaza n’amareba yiwe.
Ariko bamaze kwizera Ubutumwa Bwiza babwiwe na Filipo ku vyerekeye Ubwami bw’Imana n’izina rya Yesu Kristo, abagabo n’abagore benshi barabatizwa.
Na Simoni na we arabatizwa, akurikira Filipo aho yaja hose, atangarira ibimenyetso n’ibitangaza Filipo yakora.
Intumwa zari i Yerusalemu zumvise ko i Samariya abantu bakiriye ijambo ry’Imana, zica zibarungikira Petero na Yohana.
Bashitseyo, baca barabasengera kugira ngo baronke Mpwemu Yera,
kuko nta muntu n’umwe muri bo yari bwaronke Mpwemu Yera; bari babatijwe mw’izina ry’Umwami Yesu gusa.
Maze Petero na Yohana babarambikako ibiganza, baronka Mpwemu Yera.
Simoni abonye ko abantu baronka Mpwemu Yera barambitsweko ibiganza n’intumwa, aca azizanira amahera,
azibwira ati: “Nimumpe nanje ubwo bubasha kugira ngo uwo nzorambikako ibiganza azoronke Mpwemu Yera.”
Petero aramwishura ati: “Amahera yawe aragapfana na we, kuko wibaza ko woshobora kugura ingabire y’Imana amahera.
Nta n’agace canke umugabane ufise muri iki gikorwa, kuko umutima wawe utagororotse imbere y’Imana.
Nuko niwihane ivyo vyiyumviro bibi, usenge Umwami Imana. Kumbure yoguharira ivyo vyiyumviro bibi biri mu mutima wawe.
Kuko ndabona ko wuzuye ishari ry’umururazi, kandi ko uri umugurano w’ikibi.”
Simoni aca yishura ati: “Nsengera ku Mwami Imana kugira ngo mu vyo uvuze ntihagire ikizombako.”
Bamaze gushinga intahe no kuvuga Ijambo ry’Umwami Imana, Petero na Yohana baca basubira i Yerusalemu, bagenda baravuga Ubutumwa Bwiza mu mihana myinshi y’i Samariya.
Maze umumarayika w’Umwami Imana abarira Filipo ati: “Va hasi ufate inzira ija mu bumanuko, iva i Yerusalemu ija i Gaza, imwe batagicamwo.”
Nuko afata inzira, akiriko aragenda ahura n’inkone y’Umunyetiyopiya, yari umutware akomeye, ajejwe ubutunzi bwa Kanidake, umwamikazi w’Abanyetiyopiya. Uwo muntu yari yagiye i Yerusalemu gusenga.
Ariko arataha, yicaye mu mukogote wiwe, yagenda arasoma igitabu c’uwavugishwa n’Imana Yesaya.
Mpwemu w’Imana abwira Filipo ati: “Egera uriya mukogote, uwugendere i ruhande.”
Nuko Filipo aranyaruka, agendera i ruhande ya wa mukogote, yumva wa muntu ariko asoma igitabu c’uwavugishwa n’Imana Yesaya. Aramubaza ati: “Mbega ivyo uriko urasoma urabitahura?”
Na we aramwishura ati: “Nobitahura gute atawubinsiguriye?” Aca asaba Filipo ngo yurire mu mukogote, baricarana.
Iyo nkone yariko isoma Ivyanditswe bivuga ngo: “Yatwawe nk’intama ijanwa kubagwa, atekereza nk’intama imbere y’uwuyimwa ubwoya, ntiyigera akurako umunwa.
Yarakengerewe abura uwumuburanira. Ni nde yovuga ivy’uruvyaro rwiwe? Kuko ubuzima bwiwe bwakuwe kw’isi?”
Maze iyo nkone ibaza Filipo iti: “Mbwira: uwu muntu uwavugishwa n’Imana avuga ko ni nde, ni we yivugako canke avuga ku wundi muntu?”
Filipo aca ahera kuri ivyo vyanditswe nyene, amubwira Ubutumwa Bwiza bwa Yesu.
Bakiri mu nzira bagenda, bashika ahantu hari amazi, ya nkone iravuga iti: “Ko hano hari amazi, ni igiki combuza kubatizwa?” [
Filipo aramwishura ati: “Niwaba wizeye n’umutima wawe wose, urashobora kubatizwa.” Na we arishura ati: “Ndizeye ko Yesu Kristo ari Umwana w’Imana.”]
Nuko aca ategeka ko bahagarika umukogote, barururuka baja mu mazi, Filipo aca aramubatiza.
Bavuye mu mazi, Mpwemu w’Imana aca ajana Filipo, ya nkone ntiyasubira kumubona, ariko ibandanya urugendo inezerewe cane.
Filipo aca asubira kubonekera muri Azoto, ahaca avuga Ubutumwa Bwiza mu bisagara vyose gushika ashitse i Kayisariya.
Ico gihe Sawuli yari acuzuye inzigo, ahiga kwica abigishwa b’Umwami Yesu. Nuko aja ku muherezi mukuru,
amusaba amakete atwara mu masinagogi y’i Damasiko, kugira ngo nihagira uwo basanga akurikira inzira y’Umwami Yesu, baba abagabo canke abagore, ace abatwara nk’imbohe i Yerusalemu.
Akigenda, yegereje i Damasiko, umuco uvuye mw’ijuru umurasirako giturumbuka impande zose.
Maze agwa hasi, yumva ijwi rimubwira riti: “Sawuli, Sawuli, uriko umpamira iki?”
Na we arabaza ati: “Uri nde ga Mwami?” Rya jwi na ryo riti: “Ndi Yesu, uwo uriko urahama.
Ariko haguruka ushike mu gisagara, ni ho uzobwirirwa ivyo ukwiye gukora.”
Abari kumwe na Sawuli bahagarara bumiwe, kuko bumva ijwi ariko batabona uwuvuga.
Sawuli ava hasi, ariko yugurura amaso, ntiyashobora kubona. Baca bamufata ukuboko bamutwara i Damasiko,
ahamara imisi itatu atabona, ata co arya kandi ata co anywa.
I Damasiko hari umwigishwa wa Yesu yitwa Ananiya. Maze Umwami Yesu amwiyereka mu nzozi, aramuhamagara ati: “Ananiya!” Na we arishura ati: “Sabwe Mwami!”
Umwami Yesu aramubwira ati: “Haguruka uje kw’Ibarabara Rigororotse, ushitse i muhira kwa Yuda, ubaze umugabo yitwa Sawuli ava i Taruso, kuko ariko arasenga.
Kandi mu nzozi, yabonye umuntu yitwa Ananiya aza kumurambikako ibiganza kugira ngo ahumuke.”
Ananiya arishura ati: “Mwami, narumvise benshi bavuga ivy’uwo muntu n’amabi yakoreye abera bawe i Yerusalemu.
Kandi yaje hano afise ububasha yahawe n’abakuru b’abaherezi kugira ngo afate abo bose bambaza izina ryawe.”
Ariko Umwami Yesu yishura Ananiya ati: “Genda, kuko uwo Sawuli ari igikoresho natoranije kugira ngo amenyekanishe izina ryanje mu Banyamahanga n’abami babo, ndetse no mu bwoko bwa Isirayeli.
Kandi jewe ubwanje nzomwereka imibabaro yose akwiye gucamwo ku bw’izina ryanje.”

Nuko Ananiya aca aja kuri ya nzu arinjira. Arambika ibiganza kuri Sawuli, avuga ati: “Mwene Data Sawuli, Umwami Yesu, uwakwiyeretse uri mu nzira uza, yakuntumyeko kugira ngo uhumuke kandi wuzure Mpwemu Yera.”
Ubwo nyene, ibintu bimeze nk’ibikaragashi biva ku maso ya Sawuli, arahumuka. Aca ava hasi arabatizwa.
Ahejeje gufungura, udutege turagaruka. Nuko Sawuli amarana imisi n’abigishwa i Damasiko.
Maze atangura kwigisha mu masinagogi ko Yesu ari Umwana w’Imana.

Abamwumva bose baratangara, bakabazanya bati: “Mbega uwu mugabo si umwe yahora atikiza abasenga izina rya Yesu i Yerusalemu? Mbega ntiyari yazanywe ino no gufata abizera kugira ngo abatware nk’imbohe ku bakuru b’abaherezi?”
Ariko inyigisho za Sawuli zirushiriza kugira ubushobozi mu kwemeza Abayuda b’i Damasiko ko Yesu ari we Kristo bituma bataronka ico basubizayo.
Haciye igihe, Abayuda barondera ingena bomwica,
ariko Sawuli amenya imigambi yabo mibi. Ijoro n’umurango bama bamutegereye ku marembo y’igisagara kugira ngo bamwice.
Ariko abigishwa biwe bahengera ari mw’ijoro, bamushira mu giseke, bamucisha mw’idirisha ry’uruzitiro, baramwururutsa.
Ashitse i Yerusalemu, agomba kwifatanya n’abandi bigishwa, ariko bose baramutinya, kuko batizera ko yahindutse umwigishwa vy’ukuri.
Ariko Baranaba aramufata amujana ku ntumwa, abasigurira ingene Sawuli yahuye n’Umwami Yesu ari mu nzira aja i Damasiko akavugana na we, n’ingene i Damasiko yigishije mw’izina rya Yesu ata bwoba.
Maze Sawuli aca agumana n’intumwa i Yerusalemu yidegemvya, yigisha ashize amanga mw’izina rya Yesu.
Yama avugana yongera aharira n’Abayuda bavuga Ikigiriki, ariko bo bakama barondera ingene bomwica.
Ariko abizera babimenye, baca bamumanukana i Kayisariya, bamurungika i Taruso.
Mu nyuma ishengero ry’i Yudaya, i Galilaya n’i Samariya rigira amahoro, rirakomera, rigendera mu kwubaha Umwami Imana, ryongera riragwira ryiruwe na Mpwemu Yera.
Nuko Petero agendagenda muri izo ntara zose, hanyuma amanuka kuramutsa abizera b’i Luda.
Maze ahasanga umugabo yitwa Ayineya, yari amaze imyaka umunani avundiye ku kirago kuko yari yarakongataye.
Petero aramubwira ati: “Ayineya, Yesu Kristo aragukijije. Haguruka wizingire ikirago cawe.” Ubwo nyene Ayineya aca arahaguruka.
Ababa i Luda n’i Sharoni bose bamubonye agendagenda, barihana bizera Umwami Yesu.
Kandi i Yopa hari imwigishwa yitwa Tabita (mu Kigiriki ryasobanura Dorukasi, ni ukuvuga Ingeregere), yama akora ibikorwa vyiza, afasha abakene.
Muri iyo misi aragwara, hanyuma arapfa. Ikiziga ciwe baracoza, bakibika mu cumba co hejuru.
Kubera i Luda n’i Yopa hari hegeranye, abigishwa b’i Yopa bumvise ko Petero ari i Luda, bamutumako abagabo babiri bati: “Turakwinginze ushike iwacu udatevye.”

Nuko Petero arahaguruka asubirana unyuma na bo. Bashitse baca bamutwara muri cuba co hejuru. Abapfakazi bose baraza bakikuza Petero bararira, bamwereka amakanzu n’izindi mpuzu Dorukasi yari yarabakoreye akiri kumwe na bo.
Maze Petero arabataramura bose, aca arapfukama arasenga. Hanyuma ahindukirira ikiziga, avuga ati: “Tabita, vyuka!” Nuko tabita arakanura. Abonye Petero, aca aravyuka aricara.
Petero aca amufata ukuboko aramuhagurutsa. Hanyuma ahamagara abizera, na canecane abapfakazi, amubashikiriza ari muzima.
Maze iyo nkuru ica yamamara i Yopa hose, kandi abantu benshi bizera Umwami Yesu.
Petero aca amara imisi myinshi i Yopa kwa Simoni, yakora ivyo gutunganya insato.
I Kayisariya hari umugabo yitwa Koruneliyo, yari umugabisha w’umuce w’ingabo bita Umuce w’Abataliyano.
We n’umuryango wiwe bari bariyeguriye kwubaha Imana. Yaratanga ivyiwe abifashisha aboro, kandi agasenga cane yamizako.
Umusi umwe, hari nk’igihe c’isaha icenda z’umuhingamo, yerekwa abona mu buryo bugarara umumarayika w’Imana yinjiye aho ari, akavuga ati: “Koruneliyo!”

Koruneliyo na we amuhanga amaso yuzuye ubwoba, aramubaza ati: “Ni iki ga Mwami?” Wa mumarayika aramwishura ati: “Amasengesho yawe n’ibikorwa vyawe vy’imbazi vyaduze biba nkishikanwa ry’icibutso imbere y’Imana.
Nuko rero rungika abantu i Yopa, bazane umugabo yitwa Simoni ari we Petero.
Ari kumwe na Simoni, akora ivyo gutunganya insato, inzu yiwe iri ku nkengera y’ikiyaga.”
Wa mumarayika baganira amaze kugenda, Koruneliyo aca ahamagara babiri mu bakozi bari kumwe n’umusoda yubaha Imana, yari umwe mu bamugendanira.
Nuko ababwira ivyabaye vyose aca abatuma i Yopa.
Bukeye, nk’igihe c’isaha zitandatu z’umurango, ba bantu bakiri mu nzira bagira bashike i Yopa, Petero aduga ku gisenge c’inzu gusenga.
Hanyuma arasonza, ashaka ico arya. Bakiriko barategura infungurwa, amera nk’uwerekwa.
Abona ijuru ryugurutse, abona ikintu kimeze nk’igitambara kinini cururutswa hasi gifashwe ku mitwe yaco uko ari ine.
Carimwo ibikoko vy’ubwoko bwose bigendera ku maguru ane, ibikwega inda hasi, hamwe n’ibiguruka mu kirere.
Maze yumva ijwi rimubwira riti: “Petero we, haguruka, ubage, urye.”
Petero na we yishura ati: “Oyaye Mwami, ntibikabe! Kuko jewe ntigeze ndya ikintu na kimwe gihumanye.”
Rya jwi ryongera kumubwira ubwa kabiri riti: “Ico Imana yahumanuye ntukacite igihumanye.”
Ivyo biba incuro zitatu, ca gitambara gica gisubira kuduzwa mw’ijuru.
Petero akiriko ariyumvira insobanuro y’ivyo yeretswe, ba bantu bavuye kwa Koruneliyo baba barashitse kuri ya nzu ya Simoni, bahagarara kw’irembo.
Maze barahamagara babaza ko Simoni yitwa Petero yoba ariho asembereye.
Petero akiriko ariyumvira kuri bimwe yerekwa, Mpwemu Yera aramubwira ati: “Simoni, hari abantu batatu bariko barakurondera.
Haguruka wururuke kandi ntutinye kujana na bo kuko ari jewe nabarungitse.”
Petero arururuka, abwira ba bantu ati: “Ni jewe muriko murarondera. Muzanywe n’iki?”

Ba bantu barishura bati: “Turungitswe na Koruneliyo, umugabisha w’abasoda ijana. Ni umugororotsi yubaha Imana, ashingirwa intahe n’ubwoko bw’Abayuda bwose. Umumarayika yamubwiye ngo agutumeko iwe kugira ngo yumve ivyo uri bumubwire.”
Nuko Petero aca arabakira ngo barare ngaho. Bukeye Petero ajana na bo, aherekejwe na bamwe bo mu bizera b’i Yopa.
Ku musi ukurikira barashika i Kayisariya, kandi Koruneliyo yari abiteze, yari yakoranije incuti n’abagenzi biwe.
Petero ashitse, Koruneliyo aca akubita ibipfukamiro hasi ngo amusenge.
Ariko Petero aramubwira ati: “Haguruka kuko nanje ndi umuntu nka we.”
Nuko bagenda baraganira binjira mu nzu, Petero asanga hari isinzi ry’abantu bahakoraniye.
Aca arababwira ati: “Murazi neza ko bitemewe ko Umuyuda yifatanya n’umunyamahanga canke ngo amugendere. Ariko Imana yanyeretse ko ntakwiye gufata umuntu n’umwe nk’uwuhumanye.
Ni co gituma igihe mwantumako nemeye kuza ntahigimanze. Nagomba rero kubaza icatumye muntumako.”
Koruneliyo aramwishura ati: “Haciye imisi itatu, nari iwanje ndiko ndasenga, hari nk’igihe c’isaha icenda. Hanyuma mbona umuntu yambaye impuzu zikayangana ahagaze imbere yanje
ambarira ati: ‘Koruneliyo, Imana yumvise amasengesho yawe, kandi yibutse n’ibikorwa vyawe vy’imbabazi.
Tumako Simoni bita Petero, ari i Yopa. Asembereye mu nzu kwa Simoni akora ibijanye no gutunganya insato, aba ku nkengera y’ikiyaga.’
Ni ko guca ndagutumako ubwo nyene, kandi wagize neza kuza. None rero ubu twese turi hano imbere y’Imana kugira ngo twumve ivyo Imana yagutumye kutubwira vyose.”
Nuko rero Petero aherako aravuga ati: “Ubu rero ni ho nkimenya vy’ukuri ko Imana idatoranya abantu ku butoni,
ariko ko mu mahanga yose umuntu wese ayubaha agakora ibigororotse imwemera.
Murazi ijambo Imana yarungikiye Abisirayeli, ryavuga Inkuru Nziza y’amahoro abonerwa muri Yesu Kristo, ari we Mwami wa bose.
Murazi ivyabaye i Yudaya hose, uhereye i Galilaya inyuma y’umubatizo Yohana yigisha;
ingene Imana yarobanuje Yesu w’i Nazareti Mpwemu Yera n’ubushobozi, n’ukuntu yagendagenda hose agira neza, akiza n’abari mu gacinyizo ka wa mubi, kuko Imana yari kumwe na we.
Natwe turi ivyabona vyo gushingira intahe ivyo yakoze vyose mu gihugu c’Abayuda n’i Yerusalemu. Yishwe abambwe ku musaraba,
ariko Imana yaramuzuye mu bapfuye ku musi ugira gatatu, ituma asubira kuboneka.
Ntiyabonywe na bose, kiretse twebwe abo Imana yari yaratoranije nk’ivyabona, twasangiye na we amaze kuzuka mu bapfuye.
Kandi yadutuma kwigisha abantu no gushinga intahe ko ari we Imana yashiriyeho kuba umucamanza w’abazima n’abapfuye.
Abavugishwa n’Imana bose baramushingira intahe ko uwumwizeye wese azoharirwa ivyaha mw’izina ryiwe.”
Petero akiriko aravuga ayo majambo, Mpwemu Yera amanukira ku bumvise ubwo butumwa bose.
Abizera bari barakebwe bari bazananye na Petero batangazwa cane n’uko ingabire ya Mpwemu Yera yasutswe no ku Banyamahanga na bo,
kuko babumvise bavuga mu ndimi zitamenyekana, bahimbaza Imana. Maze Petero aravuga ati:
“Mbega hari uwobuza aba bantu kubatizwa mu mazi, kandi baronse Mpwemu Yera nk’uko natwe twamuronse?”
Nuko asaba ko bababatiza mw’Izina rya Yesu Kristo. Baca binginga Petero ngo amarane na bo imisi na mikeya.
Intumwa n’abandi bizera b’i Yudaya bumva ko Abanyamahanga na bo bakiriye ijambo ry’Imana.
Petero asubiye i Yerusalemu, abizera bakebwe ari bo Bayuda baramunegura,
bati: “Winjiye mu nzu y’abatakebwe, usangira na bo!”
Nuko Petero ahera ku ntango, abasigurira neza vyose uko vyagenze. Arababwira ati:

“Nari i Yopa ndiko ndasenga, hanyuma mera nk’uwutwawe n’agatiro, nca ntangura kwerekwa. Mbona ikintu kimeze nk’igitambara kinini cururuka kiva mw’ijuru gifashwe ku mitwe yaco uko ari ine, gishika aho nari ndi.
Nihweje muri co, mbona ibikoko bigendera ku maguru ane, inyamaswa zo mw’ishamba, ibikwega inda hasi hamwe n’ibiguruka mu kirere.
Nca numva ijwi rimbarira riti: ‘Petero we, haguruka, ubage urye.’
Nanje ndishura nti: ‘Oyaye Mwami, ntibikabe! Kuko jewe ntigeze ndya ikintu na kimwe gihumanye.’
Rya jwi ryongera kuvuga ubwa kabiri rivuye mw’ijuru riti: ‘Ico Imana yahumanuye ntukacite igihumanye.’
Ivyo biba incuro zitatu, ca gitambara gica gisubira kuduzwa mw’ijuru.
Ubwo nyene abantu batatu bantumweko bavuye i Kayisariya baba barashitse imbere y’inzu nari nsembereyemwo.
Mpwemu Yera ambarira ko nojana na bo ntakekeranije. Aba bene Data batandatu baramperekeje i Kayisariya, maze twese twinjira kwa Koruneliyo,
na we aca atubwira ko yabonye umumarayika ahagaze mu nzu iwe amubwira ati: ‘Rungika abantu i Yopa bazane umuntu yitwa Simoni ari we Petero.
Azokuzanira ubutumwa buzogukizanya n’abo mu nzu yawe bose.’
Ntanguye kuvuga, Mpwemu Yera abazako nk’uko yatujeko mu ntango.
Nca nibuka ivyo Umwami Yesu yavuze, ati: ‘Yohana yabatiza mu mazi, ariko mwebwe muzobatizwa muri Mpwemu Yera.’
None rero nimba Imana yabahaye ingabire nk’iyo yaduhaye, twebwe twizeye Umwami Yesu Kristo, mbega jewe nari iki aho noba intambamyi ku gikorwa c’Imana?”
Bavyumvise ntibagira ico basubizayo, ahubwo bashima Imana, bavuga bati: “Erega noneho Imana ihaye Abanyamahanga na bo akaryo ko kwihana ivyaha vyabo ngo baronke ubugingo budashira.”
Nuko abari barasabagiye kubera ihamwa ryari ryatanguranye n’urupfu rwa Sitefano baragenda gushika i Foyinika, i Kupuro n’i Antiyokiya, babwira ijambo ry’Imana Abayuda bonyene.
Ariko bamwe muri bo, abava i Kupuro n’i Kurene, baja muri Antiyokiya, batangura kwigisha n’Abagiriki na bo, bababwira Ubutumwa Bwiza bw’Umwami Yesu Kristo.
Ikiganza c’Umwami Imana cari kuri bo, bituma abantu benshi bizera, bahindukirira Umwami Yesu.
Inkuru zabo zishikira ishengero ry’i Yerusalemu, maze barungika Baranaba muri Antiyokiya.
Ashitseyo akibonerako ubuntu bw’Imana bwabaye kuri bo, aranezerwa cane, yongera arabinginga bose ngo bashishikare gukurikira Umwami n’imitima yabo yose.
Kubera ko Barunaba yari umugwaneza, yuzuye Mpwemu Yera n’ukwizera, igitigiri kinini c’abantu barizeye Umwami Yesu.
Inyuma y’aho Barunanaba aca aja i Taruso kurondera Sawuli.
Amubonye, aca amujana muri Antiyokiya, bompi bamarana umwaka n’ishengero, bigisha abantu benshi cane. Aho muri Antiyokiya ni ho abigishwa bitiwe ubwa mbere Abakristo.
Muri ico gihe, abavugishwa n’Imana bamwe bamanutse bava i Yerusalemu, baja muri Antiyokiya.
Umwe muri bo yitwa Agabo, arahaguruka, yuzuye Mpwemu Yera, avuga ko ikigoyi kizotera mu bwami bw’Abaroma bwose. (Ivyo vyahavuye bishika ku ngoma ya Kilawudiyo.)
Nuko abigishwa bo muri Antiyokiya, bivanye n’ico umwe umwe wese ashoboye, bafata ingingo yo kurungikira imfashanyo abizera b’i Yudaya.
Nuko barabishitsa, barungikira infashanyo zabo abakuru b’ishengero ry’i Yerusalemu, zitwawe na Baranaba na Sawuli.
Muri ico gihe, ni ho umwami Herode Agiripa yatangura gufata bamwe mu bo mw’isheshengero, atangura kubahama.
Nuko afata Yakobo, yavukana na Yohana, amwicisha inkota.
Abonye binejereje Abayuda, afata na Petero. Ivyo vyabaye mu gihe c’imisi mikuru y’imikate itarimwo umwambiro.
Amaze kumufata, amushira mw’ibohero amuha imigwi ine y’abasoda bane bane bakuranwa kumurinda. Herode yagomba kuzomucira urubanza ku mugaragaro inyuma ya Pasika.
Nuko Petero ashirwa mw’ibohero, ariko ishengero riguma risenga Imana n’umwete mwinshi ku bwiwe.
Buca Herode amucira urubanza, Petero yari asinziriye, aryamye hagati y’abasoda babiri, abohesheje iminyororo ibiri. Abandi basoda bari baraririye ku muryango w’ibohero.
Umumarayika w’Umwami Imana aca araza, umuco urasira mu cumba Petero yarimwo, amukoma mu rubavu, aramukangura, amubwira ati: “Vyuka ningoga!” Ubwo nyene ya minyororo ica imuva ku bikonjo, irakoroka.
Wa mumarayika aca abarira Petero ati: “Ambara impuzu n’ibirato vyawe.” Nuko Petero aravyambara. Wa mumarayika arasubira ati: “Ambara umutamana wawe, unkurikire.”
Maze Petero aca aramukurikira barasohoka, ariko ntiyari azi ko ivyo uwo mumarayika ariko arakora vyari ivy’ukuri. Yiyumvira ko yariko arerekwa.

Nuko baca ku bararirizi ba mbere n’aba kabiri, bashika no ku rugi rw’irembo ryaja mu gisagara, rwari urw’icuma. Maze ruriyugurura, bararengana, barasohoka. Bagishika mw’ibarabara, wa mumarayika asiga Petero, ntiyasubira kuboneka.
Ni ho Petero yatora akenge, avuga ati: “Ubu rero ndamenye vy’ukuri ko Umwami Imana yarungitse umumarayika kundokora mu vyara vya Herode n’ivyo Abayuda bari bateguye kungirira vyose.”
Amaze gutahura ivyo, aca aja i muhira kwa Mariya nyina wa Yohana ari we Mariko, aho abizera benshi bari bakoraniye bariko barasenga.
Petero aradodora ku rugi rwo kw’irembo, umukobwa w’umuguranokazi yitwa Roda aca aza kuraba uwudodoye.
Yumvise ijwi rya Petero, aranezerwa cane, aca asubira inyuma yiruka atuguruye, avuga ati: “Ni Petero ari kw’irembo!”
Baca bamubwira bati: “Na mba wataye ubwenge!” Ariko babonye ashishikaye kuvyemeza, baca bavuga bati: “Ashobora kuba ari umumarayika wiwe!”
Ariko Petero ashishikara kudodora, buguruye urugi basanga ni we, baratangara cane.
Petero aca arabamama ngo batekereze, aca abiganira ido n’ido ukuntu Umwami Imana yamukuye mw’ibohero. Arababwira ati: “Murabibwira Yakobo n’abandi bene Data.” Aca ava aho aragenda.
Bukeye, haba uruhagarara hagati y’abasoda, bibaza ivyashikiye Petero.
Herode Agiripa amaze kumurondeza hose bakamubura, aca agira itohoza mu basoda, aca ategeka ko babica. Maze Herode aca ava i Yudaya yigira i Kayisariya, amarayo igihe.

Yari yamye atumvikana n’abantu b’i Tiro n’i Sidoni, maze na bo baja hamwe bamusaba umubonano. Bafashijwe na Bulasito, umukuru w’abategura icumba c’umwami, basaba kugiranira amasezerano y’amahoro, kuko ivyo bihugu vyasumira mu bwami Herode yatwara.
Isango rigeze, Herode yambara ikanzu y’inyambarabami, yicara ku ntebe y’ubwami, abwira ijambo abari ngaho.
Maze abantu basemererera rimwe bavuga bati: “Iyi ni imana ivuze, si umuntu.”
Ariko, kubera Herode atahesheje Imana icubahiro, akemera ko abantu bamuninahaza, ubwo nyene umumarayika aca aramukubita, aribwa n’inyo, aca arapfa.
Nuko ijambo ry’Imana rishishikara kugwira no kwamamara.
Baranaba na Sawuli baheraheza igikorwa cabo, bagaruka i Yerusalemu, baza bazananye na Yohana, ari we Mariko.
Mw’ishengero ryo muri Antiyokiya hari abavugishwa n’Imana n’abigisha ari bo Baranaba, Simeyoni bita Mwirabure, Lukiyo Umunyakurene, Manayeni yari yakuranye na Herode Antipa, hamwe na Sawuli.
Bariko barasenga Imana bisonzesheje, Mpwemu Yera ababarira ati: “Ntoraniriza Baranaba na Sawuli, bankorere igikorwa nabahamagariye.”
Bahejeje kwisonzesha no gusenga, baca babarambikako ibiganza, barabarungika.
Nuko baragenda batumwe na Mpwemu Yera, bamanuka i Seluwukiya, baca bafata ubwato buja mw’izinga rya Kupuro.
Bageze i Salamini bavuga ijambo ry’Imana mu masinagogi y’Abayuda, kandi Yohana Mariko yagendana na bo abakorera.
Nuko bagendagenda iryo zinga ryose gushika bashitse i Pafo. Aho bahahuriye n’Umuyuda w’umunyamareba yigira umuvugishwa, yitwa Bari Yesu,
yagendanira Serejiyo Pawulo, icariho ca Kayisari; uwo yari umuntu w’umunyabwenge. Nuko Serejiyo Pawulo atumako Baranaba na Sawuli, kugira ngo yumve ijambo ry’Imana.
Ariko wa munyamareba Eluma (izina ryiwe ni ko risobanurwa mu Kigiriki), arabahaririza agomba guhuvya ukwizera kwa ca cariho ca Kayisari.
Nuko Sawuli, ari we yitwa Pawulo, yuzuye Mpwemu Yera, amuhanga amaso,
amubwira ati: “Uri umwana wa wa mubi, umwansi w’ivyiza vyose! Uzogeza ryari kubuza abantu kugororokera Umwami?

Noneho rero Imana ibanguye ukuboko ngo iguhane. Ugiye guhuma, kandi kuva ubu ntuzosubira kubona umuco w’izuba.” Ubwo nyene amaso yiwe yuzura umwijima, buramwirira, atangura kujuragirika mu mpande zose arondera uwomufata ukuboko.
Ca cariho ca Kayisari kibibonye kirizera kuko catangajwe cane n’izo nyigisho zavuga ivy’Umwami Yesu.
Bavuye i Pafo, Pawulo n’abo bari kumwe baca bafata ubwato baja i Pamfiliya ahitwa Peruga, Yohana Mariko aca abasigaho asubira i Yerusalemu.
Hanyuma bava i Peruga baja muri Antiyokiya h’i Pisidiya. Ku musi w’Isabato baja mw’isinagogi baricara.

Ibitabu vy’ivyagezwe n’ivy’abavugishwa n’Imana bihejeje gusomwa, abakuru b’isinagogi baca batuma umuntu ababaza ati: “Bene Data, nimwaba mufise ijambo ryo gutera intege ishengero, nimuhaguruke mwigishe.”
Pawulo ahagurutse, arabamama ngo bacereze, arababwira ati: “Yemwe Bisirayeli namwe Banyamahanga mwubaha Imana, muntege amatwi!
Imana y’ubwoko bwa Isirayeli ni yo yatoranije ba sogokuruza, ibaha kuba ihanga rikomeye mu gihugu c’ikinyamahanga ca Egiputa, hanyuma ibakuzayo ukuboko kwayo kw’ubushobozi,
yihanganira ubugaba bwabo imyaka mirongo ine mu bugaragwa.
Yaranduye amahanga indwi yo mu gihugu c’i Kanani, igiha ubwoko bwacu ngo bucegukire.
Ivyo vyose vyabaye nko mu kiringo c’imyaka amajana ane na mirongo itanu. Inyuma yivyo Imana yabahaye abacamanza gushika mu gihe c’uwavugishwa n’Imana Samweli.
Ariko mu nyuma bayisaba umwami, na yo ibaha Sawuli mwene Kishi, yava mu muryango wa Benyamini, abaganza imyaka mirongo ine.
Imaze gukura Sawuli, yimitse Dawidi ngo abe umwami wabo. Yamushingiye intahe iti: ‘Nironkeye Dawidi mwene Isayi, umuntu ahuye n’uko umutima wanje ugomba, azoshitsa ivyo ngomba vyose.’
Mu ruvyaro rw’uyo muntu, ni ho Imana yacishije Yesu, umukiza w’Abisirayeli, nk’uko yari yarabisezeranye.
Imbere y’ukuza kwa Yesu, Yohana yigisha ukwihana n’ukubatizwa ku bantu ku Bisirayeli bose.
Yohana ariko arasozera igikorwa ciwe, yavuze ati: ‘Mwibaza ko ndi nde? Sindi wa wundi mwiteze, haba na mba. Ariko hari uwuje inyuma yanje; ntibimbereye no gupfundurura utugozi tw’ibirato vyiwe.’
Bene Data, buzukuruza ba Aburahamu, namwe Banyamahanga mwubaha Imana, ni twebwe ubu butumwa bw’agakiza bwarungikiwe.
Ababa i Yerusalemu n’abatware babo ntibamenye Yesu, ariko baramutsindishije, baba bashikije amajambo y’abavugishwa n’Imana yama asomwa ku musi w’Isabato.
Naho atacamwagira cari gutuma bamucira urwo gupfa, basavye Pilato kumwicisha.
Bamaze gushitsa ivyanditswe kuri we vyose, bamumanuye ku musaraba bamushira mu mva.
Ariko Imana yaramuzuye mu bapfuye,
hanyuma amara imisi myinshi yiyereka abagendanye na we kuva i Galilaya gushika i Yerusalemu. Ubu ni bo bariko baramushingira intahe mu bwoko bwacu.
Natwe rero turi ngaha tubabwira iyi nkuru nziza: Ico Imana yasezeraniye ba sogokuruza
yagishikije ku bwacu, twebwe abana babo, mu kuzura Yesu mu bapfuye. Ibi ni vyo vyanditswe muri Zaburi ya kabiri ngo: ‘Uri umwana wanje; uwu musi ndakuvyaye.’
Imana yaramuzuye mu bapfuye kugira ngo ntaze yigere abora. Imana yabivuze muri aya majambo, iti: ‘Nzobaha imigisha yejejwe kandi idahinduka, iyo nasezeraniye Dawidi.’
Ahandi naho havuga ngo: ‘Ntuzoreka uwera wawe ngo abore.’
Dawidi amaze gukora ivyo Imana igomba mu gihe ciwe, yarasinziriye, ahambwa hamwe na ba sekuruza, umubiri wiwe urabora.
Ariko uwo Imana yazuye mu bapfuye ntiyigeze abora.
None rero bene Data, turabamenyesha ko ari muri Yesu mumenyesherezwa inkuru yo guharirwa ivyaha.
Muri we, uwizera wese aba abohowe icaha ciwe cose, ari kwo kwemerwa n’Imana nk’abagororotsi, ukwo mutashobora guhabwa n’ivyagezwe vya Mose.
Mwiyubare rero kugira ngo ivyo abavugishwa bavuze ntibibashikeko, aho bavuga ngo:
‘Nimwitegereze, mwa bacokoranyi mwe, mutangare maze munyike. Kuko mu gihe canyu ngiye gukora kintu, mutokwigera mwemera, naho hogira uwukibabwira.’ ”
Mu gihe Pawulo na Barunaba bariko barasohoka bava mw’isinagogi, abantu barabinginga ngo azogaruke ku musi w’Isabato ikurikira kugira ngo bashishikare kwigisha kuri ayo majambo.
Abantu bamaze gutaha, benshi bo mw’isinagogi y’Abayuda hamwe n’abandi bizeye Imana bakurikira Pawulo na Baranaba, na bo bagenda barabahimiriza ngo bagume mu buntu bw’Imana.
Ku musi w’Isabato ukurikira, igisagara nka cose cari cakoranye ngo bumvirize ijambo ry’Umwami Imana.
Abayuda babonye ayo masinzi bagira ishari, batangura kuvuga ibinyuranye n’ivyo Pawulo yariko aravuga, banamutuka.

Pawulo na Baranaba baca barabishura ata bwoba bati: “Ni mwebwe mwari mukwiye kwumva ijambo ry’Imana ubwa mbere. Ariko ko muryanse, mukabona ko mutabereye ubugingo budashira, duhindukiriye Abanyamahanga.
Kuko Umwami yari yadutegetse ati: ‘Nagushiriyeho kuba umuco ku Banyamahanga, kugira ngo uzoshikane agakiza ku mpera z’isi.’ ”
Abanyamahanga bavyumvise baranezerwa cane, bahimbaza Ijambo ry’Umwami Imana; abari baratoranirijwe ubugingo budashira, barizera.
Nuko ijambo ry’Imana ryamamara muri iyo ntara yose.
Ariko Abayuda bosha abagore b’icubahiro bubaha Imana, hamwe n’abagabo baganza igisagara, batangura guhama Pawulo na Baranaba, babirukana muri iyo ntara.
Pawulo na Barunaba na bo bakunkumura umukungugu wo mu birenge vyabo, baca baja muri Ikoniyo.
Kandi abigishwa bo muri Antiyokiya bari bafise umunezero mwishi, buzuye Mpwemu Yera.
Muri Ikoniyo, Pawulo na Barunaba binjira mw’isinagogi nk’uko bahora babigenza. Maze bavuga Ubutumwa Bwiza batarya umunwa, bituma Abayuda n’Abanyamahanga benshi bizera.
Ariko Abayuda banse kwizera bagumura abandi Banyamahanga babatera kwanka abizera.
Ariko Pawulo na Barunaba bahamara igihe kitari gito, bavugira Umwami Yesu bashize amanga, na we agashingira intahe Ubutumwa bw’Ubuntu bavuga, mu kubakoresha ibitangaza n’utwumiza.
Maze abantu bo muri ico gisagara bicamwo imigwi, bamwe begamira Abayuda, abandi begamira intumwa.
Mu nyuma, Abayuda n’Abanyamahanga bamwe, bari kumwe n’abatware babo, baja inama yo kugirira nabi intumwa no kuzicisha amabuye.
Intumwa zibimenye, zica zihungira mu bisagara vya Lusitira na Derube biri i Lukawoniya, no mu micungararo.
N’aho nyene babandanije bahavuga Ubutumwa Bwiza.
I Lusitira hari umugabo yama yicaye kuko yari amugaye ibirenge. Yari yavutse amugaye, ntiyari yarigeze atambuka.
Nuko yumviriza Pawulo ariko arigisha, Pawulo na we aramwihweza, abona afise ukwizera kwotuma akira.
Pawulo aca avuga n’ijwi rirenga ati: “Haguruka, uhagarare ku birenge vyawe!” Ubwo nyene wa mugabo aca arabaduka, aca atangura gutambuka.
Ishengero ribonye ivyo Pawulo akoze, bavuga n’amajwi arenga mu Kinyalukawoniya bati: “Imana zadushwayemwo zambaye imibiri y’abantu!”
Baranaba bamwita Zeyusi, Pawulo na we bamwita Heremesi, kuko ari we yigisha kenshi.
Maze umuherezi wa Zeyusi azana impfizi z’inka n’ingori z’amashurwe kw’irembo ry’igisagara; aho ni ho hari ingoro y’iyo mana. We n’iryo sinzi ry’abantu bagomba gushikanira ibimazi izo ntumwa.
Ariko Pawulo na Baranaba bavyumvise, bitabagurirako impuzu, birukanka mu bantu basemerera bati:

“Mbega bagenzi, ivyo bintu mubikorera iki? Erega turi abantu nka mwebwe! Twabazaniye Ubutumwa Bwiza, bubabwira guhindukira mukava mu bitagira ikimazi, mukaza ku Mana nzima, yaremye ijuru, isi n’ikiyaga, n’ibibibamwo vyose.
Mu bihe vyaheze, yaretse amahanga yose ngo yigenze uko yipfuza.
Ariko ntiyigeze ihengeshanya kubiyereka mu vyiza yabakorera: yabaha imvura iva kw’ijuru n’umwimbu mwinshi mu gihe cavyo, ibaha ivyokurya bikwiye, ikuzuza imitima yanyu umunezero.”
Naho Pawulo yari avuze amajambo nk’ayo, intumwa vyarazigoye kubabuza kuzishikanira ibimazi.
Maze haca haza Abayuda bari bavuye i Antiyokiya no muri Ikoniyo, bosha abari aho bose, batera amabuye Pawulo, bamukwegera inyuma y’igisagara bibwira ko yapfuye.
Ariko abandi bigishwa bamaze kuza bakegeranira aho yari ari, aca arahaguruka, asubira mu gisagara. Bukeye we na Baranaba baca barahava, baja i Derube.
Nuko bavuga Ubutumwa Bwiza muri ico gisagara kandi baharonka igitigiri kinini c’abigishwa. Hanyuma baca basubira i Lusitira, muri Ikoniyo no muri Antiyokiya
binginga abigishwa ngo bagume bahagaze mu kwizera. Bababwira bati: “Dutegerezwa guca mu bitubabaza vyinshi kugira twinjire mu Bwami bw’Imana.”
