Pawulo na Barunaba, bamaze gusenga no kwisonzesha, baca bagena abakuru b’amashengero yose, babaragiza Umwami Yesu bari bizeye.
Nuko baca baca muri Pisidiya bashika i Pamfiliya.
Bavuga Ijambo ry’Imana i Peruga, baca bamanuka muri Ataliya.
Bavuye muri Ataliya, baciye bafata ubwato basubira muri Antiyokiya ho muri Siriya, aho bari basengewe ng’Ubuntu bw’Imana buzobane na bo ku bw’ico gikorwa bari barangije.
Bashitse muri Antiyokiya, bakoranya ishengero baryiganira ivyo Imana yabakoresheje vyose, n’ukuntu yugururiye imiryango Abanyamahanga na bo bakizera.
Maze baguma aho, babana n’abigishwa igihe kitari gito.
Hari abantu bavuye i Yudaya baja muri Antiyokiya, bigisha abizera bati: “Mudakebwe nk’uko imigenzo twigishijwe na Mose ibitegeka, ntimushobora gukizwa.”

Maze Pawulo na Barunaba binjira mu bihari bikomeye n’abo bantu. Nuko ishengero rica rirungika Pawulo na Baranaba, baherekejwe n’abandi bizera b’iryo shengero, ngo baduge i Yerusalemu, kugira ngo bashikirize ico kibazo intumwa n’abakuru b’ishengero.
Nuko ishengero rimaze kubarungika, baca i Foyinike n’i Samariya, biganira abandi bizera ingene Abanyamahanga na bo bizeye Imana, ivyo bitera umunezero mwinshi bene Data bose.
I Yerusalemu bakiriwe n’ishengero hamwe n’intumwa ziri kumwe n’abakuru b’ishengero, na bo babiganira ivyo Imana yabakoresheje vyose.
Ariko bamwe mu bizera bahora ku ruhande rw’Abafarisayo barahaguruka, bavuga bati: “Abanyamahanga bategerezwa gukebwa no gukurikiza ivyagezwe vya Mose.”
Nuko intumwa n’abakuru b’ishengero barakorana bigira hamwe ico kibazo.

Inyuma y’ibihari vyinshi, Petero ava hasi, arababwira ati: “Bene Bata, murazi ko mu minsi iheze Imana yantoranije muri mwebwe kugira ngo mbwire Abanyamahanga Ubutumwa Bwiza maze na bo bumve, hanyuma bizere.
Imana, yoyo izi imitima y’abantu, yerekanye ko ibemeye mu kubaha Mpwemu Yera, nk’uko yamuduhaye.
Ntiyadutandukanije na bo, kuko yejeje imitima yabo kuko bizeye.
None rero, ni kubera iki mugomba kugerageza Imana mu kuremeka abigishwa imitwaro twebwe ndetse na ba sogokuruza tutashoboye kwikorera?
Ahubwo twizera ko twese dukizwa n’ubuntu bw’Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo.”
Ishengero ryose rica riracereza, bumviriza Pawulo na Baranaba, na bo bababwira ivy’ibitangaza n’utwumiza Imana yabakoresheje mu Banyamahanga.
Baheje kuvuga, Yakobo aca afata ijambo, aravuga ati: “Bene Data, nimuntege amatwi.
Simoni Petero yadusiguriye ingene kuva mu ntango Imana yitayeho Abanyamahanga kugira ngo ibitoranirizemwo abazokwitirirwa izina ryayo.
Amajambo y’abavugishwa n’Imana aremeranya n’ivyo, kuko handitswe ngo:
‘Inyuma y’ivyo nzogaruka, nsubire nubake inzu ya Dawidi yasambutse. Nzosubira nubake imisaka yaho ndayisanure,
kugira ngo abandi bantu bose baze barondere Uhoraho, barimwo n’Abanyamahanga bitirirwa izina ryanje, ni ko Uhoraho abikora avuze,’
uwabimenyekanishije uhereye kera cane.
Ni co gituma mbona tudakwiye kuremera Abanyamahanga bariko bahindukirira Imana.
Ahubwo dukwiye kubandikira, tukabwira ko bokwirinda kurya ivyaterekerewe ibigirwamana, bakirinda ingeso mbi z’ubusambanyi, kutarya ibikoko vyanizwe, n’amaraso.
Kuko ivyagezwe vya Mose vyama vyigishwa kuva kera mu masinagogi no mu bisigara, bigasomwa buri sabato.”

Nuko intumwa n’abakuru b’ishengero, bari kumwe n’ishengero ryose, baca batora bamwe mu banyeshengero, babarungika i Antiyokiya baherekeje Pawulo na Baranaba. Nuko batoranya Yuda ari we Barusaba, na Silasi, bari abarongozi mu bandi bizera.
Maze babarungikana ikete ryavuga ritya: Twebwe bene So, intumwa n’abakuru b’ishengero, Turabaramukije mwebwe abanyamahanga bizera bo muri Antiyokiya, i Siriya n’i Kilikiya.
Twarumvise ko hari bantu bamwe muri twebwe baje iwanyu tutabatumye, bababwira amajambo abaca ivutu, abahagarika imitima.
Ni co gituma twumvikanye gutoranyamwo abo dutuma, bazananye na bene Data dukunda cane, ari bo Baranaba na Pawulo,
abagabo bahevye ubuzima bwabo ku bw’izina ry’Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo.
Kandi turabarungikiye Yuda na Silasi kugira ngo bemeze n’amajambo y’akanwa kabo ivyo tubandikiye.
Kuko Mpwemu Yera vyamubereye vyiza, kandi natwe bitubera vyiza kutabaremereza ikintu na kimwe kirengeye ivyo tubasaba, ari vyo vy’ibi:
Muze mwirinde kurya ivyaterekerewe ibigirwamana, amaraso canke inyama z’ibikoko binizwe, kandi mwirinde ingeso mbi z’ubusambanyi. Nimwavyirinda muzoba mugize neza. Turabasezeye.
Nuko abo bantu baca barabarungika bamanuka muri Antiyokiya, bakoranya ishengero, babashikiriza rya kete.
Barisomye baranezerwa cane kuko ryarimwo ubutumwa bubatera intege.
Yuda na Silasi, bari basanzwe ari abavugishwa n’Imana, bongera bababwira amajambo menshi yo kubatera intege no kubakomeza.
Nuko bahamara igihe, hanyuma abizera bo muri Antiyokiya barabasezera n’umuhezagiro w’amahoro, maze na bo basubira ku babatumye. [
Ariko Silasi ahitamwo kugumayo.]
Ariko Pawulo na Baranaba bagumye muri Antiyokiya, aho bo n’abandi benshi bigishije bongera bavuga Ijambo ry’Umwami Yesu.
Haheze igihe, Pawulo abarira Baranaba ati: “Ingo dusubire mu bisagara twigishijemwo Ijambo ry’Imana, turabe ingene bene Data bifashe.”
Baranaba yipfuza ko Yohana Mariko ajana na bo,
ariko Pawulo we abona ko bitabereye ko bojana kuko yigeze kubata i Pamfiliya, ntiyabandanyana na bo mu gikorwa.
Nuko haba ukutumvikana gukomeye, bituma batandukana. Baranaba ajana na Mariko, bafata ubwato baja i Kupuro.
Pawulo ahitamwo kujana na Silasi, bamaze gusengerwa n’abizera bakabaragiza ubuntu bw’Umwami Imana.
Aca agendagenda muri Siriya no muri Kilikiya, akomeza amashengero yaho.
Nuko Pawulo ashika i Derube, hanyuma aja i Lusitira, aho umwigishwa yitwa Timoteyo yaba. Nyina yari Umuyudakazi yizera, ariko se yari Umugiriki.
Yavugwa neza n’abizera b’i Lusitira n’abo muri Ikoniyo.
Maze Pawulo yipfuza kujana na we ku rugendo yari ariko, araheza abanza kumukeba ku gitsina gabo kubera Abayuda bo muri ako karere, kuko bose bari bazi ko se yari Umugiriki.
Mu bisagara bacamwo, bagenda barashikiriza abizera ivyashinzwe n’intumwa n’abakuru b’ishengero b’i Yerusalemu babahimiriza kuvyitondera.
Nuko amashengero arakomezwa mu kwizera, kandi igitigiri c’abizera kirongerekana ku musi ku musi.
Pawulo na bagenziwe baca mu ntara za Furugiya na Galatiya, kuko Mpwemu Yera yari yababujije kuvuga Ijambo ry’Imana muri Aziya.
Bashikiriye urubibe rwa Musiya, bagerageza kwinjira i Bituniya, ariko naho nyene Mpwemu wa Yesu ntiyabemerera.
Nuko baca baca i Musiya bamanuka i Tirowa.
Mw’ijoro, Pawulo arerekwa abona umuntu w’i Makedoniya ahagaze amubwira ati: “Turakwinginze uze i Makedoniya udutabare.”
Pawulo amaze kwerekwa ivyo, duca turitegura ubwo nyene tuja i Makedoniya, kuko twari dutahuye neza ko Imana iduhamagariye kuja kuvugayo Ubutumwa Bwiza.
Nuko tuva i Tirowa mu bwato turaramiriza gushika i Samotirake, ku musi ukurikira naho dushika i Neyapoli.
Tuvuye aho, tuja i Filipi, igisagara gikuru c’i Makedoniya cari carigaruriwe n’Abaroma. Ico gisagara tukimaramwo imisi.
Ku musi w’Isabato, turasohoka tuja inyuma y’igisagara ku ruzi, twibaza ko dushobora kuronka ahantu ho gusengera. Nuko turicara dutangura kuyaga n’abagore bari bahakoraniye.

Umwe mu bariko baratwumviriza yitwa Lidiya, yava i Tuwatira, akaba yari umudandaza w’impuzu z’agaciro kandi yubaha Imana. Nuko Umwami Imana yugurura umutima wiwe, yakira Ubutumwa Pawulo yariko aravuga.
We n’abo mu nzu yiwe bamaze kubatizwa, aca aradutumira iwe avuga ati: “Nimba mubona ko ndi uwizera Umwami Yesu, nimuze mube iwanje.” Nuko aratugobera gushika twemeye.
Umusi umwe, turiko turaja ha hantu ho gusengera, duhura n’umuguranokazi yari afise impwemu yo kuragura, yatuma amenya ivya kazoza, agacira amahera menshi ba shebuja mu kuragura.
Maze wa mukobwa akurikira Pawulo n’abo twari kumwe bose, asemerera ati: “Aba bantu ni abakozi b’Imana Musumbavyose, baje kubabwira inzira ibashikana ku gakiza.”
Nuko amara imisi avuga ivyo, gushika aho Pawulo adundumirwa, arahindukira abwira iyo mpwemu ati: “Mw’izina rya Yesu Kristo, ndagutegetse, muvemwo.” Ubwo nyene ya mpwemu ica iramuvamwo.
Maze ba shebuja babonye ko bagiye guhomba amahera yahora abacira, bafata Pawulo na Silasi, babajana imbere y’abatware, mu kibanza gikoraniramwo abantu benshi.
Babazana imbere y’abacamanza b’Abaroma, bavuga bati: “Aba bantu ni Abayuda, kandi bariko baragumura igisagara,
bigisha imigenzo twebwe Abaroma tutemerewe gukurikiza.”
Abari aho bose baca bakurira hasi Pawulo na Silasi, ba bacamanza baca bategeka ko babambura impuzu bakabakubita ibimoko.
Bamaze kubakubita cane, baca babaterera mw’ibohero, bategeka umukuru w’ibohero kubarinda cane kugira ngo ntibatoroke.
Kubera iryo tegeko ahawe, aca abashira mu cumba c’ibohero kiri kure, amaguru yabo ayabohera hagati y’ibiti.
Nko mu gicugu hagati, Pawulo na Silasi bariko barasenga bongera baririmba indirimbo zo gutazira Imana, izindi mbohe zarabumva.
Ubwo nyene haba nyamugigima ikomeye cane, inyiganyiza amatanguriro y’ibohero. Imiryango y’ibohero iriyugurura, iminyororo yari iboshe imbohe zose izivako.
Umurinzi w’ibohero yikanguye asanga imiryango yose iruguruye, maze asokorora inkota ngo yiyice kuko yibaza ko imbohe zatorotse.
Ariko Pawulo arasemerera ati: “Reka ntugire ico wigira, twese turi hano.”
Wa murinzi w’ibohero aca atumako urumuri, yiruka mu cumba Pawulo na Silasi barimwo, yikubita imbere y’ibirenge vyabo.
Aca abasohokana hanze, ababaza ati: “Ba nyakwubahwa, nokora iki kugira ngo nkizwe?”
Baramwishura bati: “Izere Umwami Yesu, urakizwa, wewe n’abo mu nzu yawe.”
Baca bamubwira Ijambo ry’Umwami Imana, we n’abo mu nzu yiwe bose.
Iyo saha, muri iryo joro nyene, aca abajana kuboza ibikomere vyabo, maze we n’abo mu nzu yiwe bose baca barabatizwa.
Nuko abajana iwe, arabagaburira, kandi we n’abo mu nzu yiwe bose buzura umunezero kuko bari bizeye Imana.
Bukeye, abacamanza batuma abasoda kuri wa murinzi w’ibohero, ati: “Rekura abo bantu.”
Wa murinzi w’ibohero aca abarira Pawulo ati: “Abacamanza bategetse ko mwe na Silasi murekurwa. None rero murashobora kwigira. Mugende amahoro.”

Ariko Pawulo na Silasi baramwishira bati: “Badutonaguriye imbere y’abantu tutanaburanye kandi urubanza rwadutsinze kandi turi Abaroma, bagirako baduta mw’ibohero, none bagomba kuturekura mu mpisho? Ntibishoboka! Nibaze bo nyene ubwabo, babe ari bo batwirekurira.”
Ba basoda baca baja kubibwira abacamanza. Bumvise ko Pawulo na Silasi ari Abaroma, baca bagira ubwoba.
Baca baja kubahoyahoya, babasohora ibohero, babaherekeza babinginga ngo bave muri ico gisagara.
Pawulo na Silasi bavuye muri iryo bohero baca baja kwa Lidiya, babonana n’abandi bene Data, babatera intege mu kwizera, baca baragenda.
Maze Pawulo na Silasi baca muri Amfipoli na Apoloniya, bashika i Tesalonike, ahari isinagogi y’Abayuda.
Pawulo yinjira mw’isinagogi nk’uko yari asanzwe abigenza. Amara amasabato itatu akurikirana aharira na bo ku Vyanditswe Vyera,
abasigurira yongera abereka ko Kristo yategerezwa kubabazwa no kuzuka mu bapfuye. Akababwira ati: “Uwu Yesu ndiko ndababwira, ni we Kristo.”
Bamwe mu Bayuda banyurwa n’izo nyigisho, baca bifatanya na Pawulo na Silasi, co kimwe n’igitigiri kinini c’Abagiriki bubaha Imana, hamwe n’abagore b’abanyacubahiro batari bake.

Ariko bamwe mu Bayuda bibatera ishari, baca bakoranya abantu b’imburakimazi babakuye mu mabarabara yaho, bagira umugwi munini, hanyuma batangura gutera imigumuko mu gisagara. Nuko binjira mu nzu kwa Yasoni barondera Pawulo na Silasi, kugira ngo babajane imbere y’ikoraniro.

Bababuze baca bafata Yasoni na bamwe muri bene Data, babajana babakwega imbere y’abacamanza, basemerera bati: “Aba bagabo Pawulo na Silasi bateye imigumuko kw’isi hose, none bashitse na hano mu gisagara cacu.
Yasoni ni we yabahaye indaro, kandi bariko barenga amategeko ya Kayisari, bavuga ko hariho uwundi mwami yitwa Yesu.”
Abantu bose n’abatware b’igisagara bavyumvise bagira uruhagarara.
Maze abatware b’ico gisagara baka Yasoni n’abari kumwe na we ingwati y’amafaranga, hanyuma barabarekura.
Bugorovye, bene Data barungika Pawulo na Silasi i Beroya. Bashitseyo, binjira mw’isinagogi y’Abayuda.

Abantu b’i Beroya bari bugurutse kurusha ab’i Tesalonike, kuko bakiriye Ubutumwa Bwiza n’ishaka ryinshi, bakama basesangura Ivyanditswe ku musi ku musi, kugira ngo barabe ko ivyo Pawulo abigisha ari ivy’ukuri.
Nuko benshi mu Bayuda barizera, co kimwe n’abagore n’abagabo b’abanyacubahiro b’Abagiriki.
Maze Abayuda b’i Tesalonike bumvise ko Pawulo ariko yigisha ijambo ry’Imana i Beroya, baca bajayo, bosha abantu gutera imigumuko.
Ubwo nyene bene Data baca barungika Pawulo ajana inzira ija ku kiyaga, ariko Silasi na Timoteyo baguma i Beroya.
Abaherekeje Pawulo bamushikana muri Atenayi, baca basibura i Beroya. Nuko Pawulo abatuma kuri Silasi na Timoteyo ababwira ko boca bamusangayo badatevye.
Pawulo akibarindiririye muri Atenayi, agira intuntu mu mutima kubera ibigirwamana vyinshi yabonye muri ico gisagara.
Ivyo vyatumye yama aja mw’isinagogi yaho, agaharira n’Abayuda n’Abagiriki bubaha Imana, kandi imisi yose yama aja mu bibanza abantu bahuriramwo, agahaririraho n’abo ahasanze.

Maze umugwi w’abanyabwenge bitwa Abepikureyo n’Abasitoyiko, batangura guharira na we. Bamwe barabaza bati: “Mbega ivyo ariko aradedemba ni ibiki?” Abandi bakavuga bati: “Umenga ariko avuga ivy’imana z’inyamahanga.” Ivyo babivuze kuko Pawulo yariko ababwira Ubutumwa Bwiza bwa Yesu n’izuka.
Nuko bamujana imbere y’abagize inama nkuru y’igisagara ari yo bita Areyopago, bamubwira bati: “Twoshobora kumenya izo nyigisho nshasha uzanye?
Ivyo uzanye bimeze nk’ivyaduka mu matwi yacu, tugomba kumenya ivyo ari vyo.”
(Mu bisanzwe abantu bo muri Atenayi n’abanyamahanga bahaba bama bahura ata kindi kibahuje atari ukuvuga n’ukwumviriza inkuri nshasha.)
Nuko Pawulo ahagarara imbere y’ikoraniro rya Areyopago, avuga ati: “Yemwe bantu bo muri Atenayi, ndabona ko mwubaha cane imana zanyu mu buryo bwose.
Kuko igihe nariko ndagendagenda ndaba ivyo mukoresha mu gusenga, nabonye n’igicaniro canditsweko ngo: ic’imana itazwi. None rero iyo musenga mutazi niyo ngira ndababwire.
Imana yaremye isi n’ibiyirimwo ni yo Mwami y’ijuru n’isi kandi ntiba mu ngoro zubatswe n’abantu.
Ntikeneye ko abantu bayifasha nkaho umenga hari ico ibuze, kuko ari yo nyene iha abantu ubuzima no guhumeka, hamwe n’ibindi vyose.
Mu ruvyaro rw’umuntu umwe yakuyemwo amoko yose iyakwiza kw’isi yose. Ni yo yabashiriyeho igihe bazobaho, ibashingira n’imbibe z’aho bazoba.
Imana yakoze ivyo kugira ngo abantu bayirondere, kandi kugira ngo kumbure nibagerageza kuyirondera baze bayibone, n’aho itari kure y’umuntu n’umwe muri twebwe.
Ni kubera yo tubayeho, tukagendagenda, kandi tukagira ubuzima. Nk’uko bamwe mu bahinga banyu babivuze, ‘Turi uruvyaro rwayo.’
None rero, ko turi uruvyaro rwayo, ntidukwiye kwiyumvira ko Imana imeze nk’igishushanyo gikozwe mu nzahabu, mw’ifeza canke mw’ibuye, mu buhinga n’amaboko vy’abantu.
Ibihe vy’ubutamenya Imana yaravyihanganiye, ariko ubu ihamagarira abantu aho bari hose kwihana,
kuko yashinze umusi izocira imanza isi mu bugororotsi, ikoresheje uwo yagenye. Iyo Imana yabigaragaje kuri bose mu kumuzura mu bapfuye.”
Bumvise ivyo kuzuka kw’abapfuye, bamwe baritwengera, ariko abandi bavuga bati: “Tuzosubira kukwumviriza kuri ivyo ikindi gihe.”
Nuko Pawulo aca ava muri iryo koraniro.
Ariko bamwe mu bari aho baca bacika abigishwa ba Pawulo, barizera. Muri abo harimwo Diyonisiyo, umwe mu bagize inama Areyopago, umugore yitwa Damari, hamwe n’abandi.
Inyuma y’ivyo Pawulo aca ava muri Atenayi aja i Korinto.

Aho hari Umuyuda yitwa Akwilasi, imvukira y’i Ponto, yari aheruka kuva mu Butaliyano ari kumwe n’umugore wiwe Pirisila, kuko Kayisari Kilawudiyo yari yategetse ko Abayuda bose birukanwa i Roma. Maze Pawulo aca aja kubarondera.
Kubera ko bari basangiye umwuga wo kujisha amahema, yaciye abana na bo, barakorana.
Ku misi yose y’Isabato Pawulo yama aja mw’isinagogi guharira n’Abayuda n’Abagiriki, akagerageza kwemeza.
Silasi na Timoteyo bashitse i Korinto bavuye i Makedoniya, Pawulo aca ahebera umwanya wiwe wose igikorwa co kuvuga Ubutumwa Bwiza, ashingira intahe Abayuda ko Yesu ari we Kristo.
Ariko abonye ko Abayuda bamuhaririza bakanamutuka, aca akunkumura impuzu ziwe, ababwira ati: “Amaraso yanyu azobe ku gatwe kanyu. Jewe kuri ivyo ndera. Uhereye ubu ngiye kwigisha Abanyamahanga.”
Nuko aca ava mw’isinagogi aja ku nzu yari i ruhande, kwa Titiyo Yusito, umuntu yubaha Imana.
Kirisipo, umukuru w’isinagogi n’abo mu nzu yiwe bose bizera Umwami Imana, kandi ab’i Korinto benshi bumvirije Pawulo barizera, bongera barabatizwa.
Umusi umwe hari mw’ijoro, Umwami Imana abarira Pawulo mu ndoto ati: “Ntutinye! Bandanya uvuga, ntucereze,
kuko ndi kumwe na we. Nta n’umwe azogufata ngo akugirire nabi, kuko mfise abantu benshi muri kino gisagara.”
Nuko Pawulo aca amara umwaka n’amezi atandatu i Korinto yigisha ijambo ry’Imana.
Igihe Galiyo yatwarira Kayisari muri Akaya, Abayuda bahuje umutima n’inama kugwanya Pawulo, bamutwara ku bacamanza
bamwagiriza bati: “Uwu mugabo ariko yemeza abantu gusenga Imana mu buryo butemewe n’ivyagezwe.”
Ariko Pawulo agira afate ijambo, Galiyo abwira Abayuda ati: “Yemwe Bayuda, iyo muba mwariko mumwagiriza ikibi canke icaha gikomeye, vyari kwumvikana ko nkwiye gufata umwanya nkabumviriza.
Ariko ko numva ari ingorane y’amajambo, amazina n’ivyagezwe vyanyu, nimurwicire mwebwe nyene. Sinshobora guca imanza nk’izo.”
Aca arabirukana bava mu nzu y’ubucamanza.
Nabo baca basimbira kuri Sositene umukuru w’isinagogi, bamukubitira aho nyene imbere y’inzu y’ubucamanza. Ariko Galiyo ntiyavyitaho.

Inyuma y’ivyo, Pawulo amara igihe aba i Korinto, hanyuma asigayo bene Data, afata ubwato aja muri Siriya, aherekejwe na Pirisila na Akwilasi. Imbere yo gufata urugendo, Pawulo yabanje guca i Kenkireya aho yimweshereje umushatsi kubera isezerano yari yarasezeranye.
Bashitse muri Efeso, Pawulo abasiga ngaho, we aragenda yinjira mw’isinagogi y’Abayuda guharira na bo.
Bamusavye ngo amarane na bo iyindi misi, ntiyabemerera.
Ariko mu kubasezera ababwira ati: “Nzogaruka hanyuma Imana niyabishaka.” Nuko afata ubwato ava muri Efeso,
ashika i Kayisariya. Avayo aduga i Yerusalemu kuramutsa ishengero, hanyuma amanuka muri Antiyokiya h’i Siriya.
Amaze igihe gito muri Antiyokiya, avayo agendera ahantu hatandukanye mu ntara za Galatiya na Furugiya, akomeza abizera bose.
Ico gihe Umuyuda yitwa Apolo, yari yavukiye muri Alegizanderiya, ashika muri Efeso. Yari umuntu azi kuvuga neza, kandi yari afise ubumenyi bwinshi mu Vyanditswe Vyera.
Yari yarigishijwe inzira y’Umwami Yesu, kandi n’aho yari yabatijwe umubatizo wa Yohana gusa, yigisha ivya Kristo ashize amanga mu kuri kwose.
Pirisila na Akwilasi bumvise ingene yigisha mw’isinagogi ashize amanga, baca bamujana iwabo, babandanya kumusigurira neza inzira y’Imana.
Apolo yipfuje kuja muri Akaya, bene Data bamutera intege, batako bandikira ikete abigishwa baho kugira baze bamwakire. Ashitseyo agirira ikimazi kinini abari barizeye ku bw’ubuntu bw’Imana,
kuko akoresheje Ivyanditswe Vyera, yatsindira ku mugaragaro ivyiyumviro vy’Abayuda bamuhaririza, akabemeza ko Yesu ari we Kristo.
Apolo akiri i Korinto, Pawulo afata inzira ica mu gihugu hagati, aragenda ashika muri Efeso, ahasanga abigishwa.
Arababaza ati: “Mwarakiriye Mpwemu Yera igihe mwizera?” Baramwishura bati: “Haba na mba. Mbere ntitwari bwumve n’uko Mpwemu Yera abaho.”
Maze Pawulo arababaza ati: “None mwabatijwe uwuhe mubatizo?” Baramwishura bati: “Umubatizo wa Yohana.”
Pawulo arababwira ati: “Umubatizo wa Yohana wari uwo kwihana. Yahamagarira abantu kwizera uwagira aze inyuma yiwe, uwo na we ni Yesu.”
Bavyumvise, baca babatizwa mw’izina ry’Umwami Yesu.
Pawulo abarambitseko ibiganza, Mpwemu Yera aca abazako, batangura kuvuga izindi ndimi no kuvugishwa n’Imana.
Abari aho bari nk’abagabo cumi na babiri.
Pawulo aca yinjira mw’isinagogi, amara amezi atatu yigisha ashize amanga, aharira n’abantu akabemeza ivy’Ubwami bw’Imana.

Ariko bamwe bakomantaza imitima banka kwizera, banebagura ku mugaragaro inzira y’Umwami Yesu. Nuko Pawulo aca ava muri iryo sinagogi, agenda ajanye n’abizera, abandanya avuganira mu nyubakwa uwitwa Turano yigishirizamwo.
Amara imyaka ibiri abikora uko, gushika Abayuda n’Abagiriki bose baba muri Aziya bumvise ijambo ry’Umwami Imana.
Imana ikoresha Pawulo ibitangaza bidasanzwe,
gushika aho n’igitambara canke impuzu yakozeko abantu babikoza ku barwaye, bagakira ingwara n’ababoshwe n’impwemu mbi zikabavamwo.

Maze Abayuda bamwe bigenera kugenda hirya no hino, bagerageza kwirukana impwemu mbi ngo zive mu bantu bakoresheje izina ry’Umwami Yesu. Bavuga bati: “Mw’izina rya Yesu, umwe Pawulo yigisha, ndagutegetse muvemwo!”
Kandi hari n’abahungu indwi b’Umuyuda yitwa Sikewa, umwe mu baherezi bakuru, bakora nk’uko.
Umusi umwe impwemu mbi irabishura iti: “Yesu ndamuzi, na Pawulo ndamuzi. None mwebwe muri ba nde?”
Wa muntu yarimwo impwemu mbi aca abasimbirako, abarusha inkomezi, arabakubita gushika aho bahunga inzu barimwo bari gusa, bavirirana.
Abayuda n’Abagiriki baba muri Efeso bamenye iyo nkuru, bose batekerwa n’ubwoba, maze Izina ry’Umwami Yesu rishirwa hejuru.
Maze benshi mu bari bizeye baraza, baratura bongera bavugira ku mugaragaro ivyo bakoze.
Abahora bakora ivy’amareba, bazana ibitabu vyabo babituririra ku mugaragaro. Igiciro c’ivyo bitabu, yari ibiceri vy’ifeza ibihumbi mirongo itanu.
Maze ijambo ry’Umwami Imana rikwiragira henshi kandi rigira ubushobozi.
Inyuma y’ivyo, Pawulo, asunitswe na Mpwemu, aca afata ingingo yo kuja i Yerusalemu, aciye i Makedoniya no muri Akaya. Yavuga ati: “Mvuyeyo, ntegerezwa guca nja i Roma.”
Aca arungika babiri mu bamufasha ibikorwa, ari bo Timoteyo na Erasito, baja i Makedoniya, na we aca amara ikindi gihe gito muri Aziya.
Muri iyo misi nyene haduka imigumuko ivuye ku bijanye n’Inzira y’Umwami Imana.

Iyo migumuko yadutse ivuye ku mugabo yitwa Demetiriyo yari afise umwuga wo gucura ibintu mw’ifeza, ni na we yakora mw’ifeza utunyabugoro tw’ikigirwamanakazi Arutemi, kandi uwo mwuga wazanira inyungu nini abawukora.
Nuko akoranya abandi bacuzi bari basangiye umwuga, ababwira ati: “Bagenzi, murazi ko uwu mwuga ari wo udutungishije.
None murumva ingene wa mugabo Pawulo yemeje abantu, akazimiza benshi muri Efeso, ndetse no muri Aziya yose. Avuga ko imana zikozwe n’abantu atari imana na mba.

Kandi urudandazwa rwacu si rwo rwonyene ruzota agaciro, ariko n’ingoro y’imanakazi ihambaye Arutemi ntizosubira kwubahwa, ndetse na Arutemi, ari yo manakazi isengwa muri Aziya no kw’isi yose, izoba yambuwe icubahiro c’ubumana bwayo.”
Bavyumvise barashavura cane, batangura gusemerera bati: “Arutemi, imana y’Abanyefeso, irahambaye!”
Mu mwanya muto igisagara cose cuzura imigumuko. Abantu bose biruka baja mu kibaza c’ibirori, bagenda barakwega Gayo na Arisitariko, abari bagendanye na Pawulo kuva i Makedoniya.
Pawulo agomvye guseruka imbere y’ikoraniro, abigishwa baramwankira.
Na bamwe mu batware b’iyo ntara, bari abagenzi ba Pawulo, bamutumako bamwinginga ngo ntahirahire ngo yinjire muri ico kibanza kiberamwo ibirori.
Ariko ikoraniro rirazazanirwa kuko bamwe bayogora bavuga ibi, abandi bakayogora bavuga ibindi. Ndetse benshi muri bo ntibari bazi n’igituma bari ngaho.
Bamwe mw’ikoraniro bumvisha Alegizandere, uwo Abayuda bashize imbere, ivyariko biraba. Nuko na we arabamama kugira ngo asigure ibiriko biraba.
Babonye ko ari Umuyuda, baca badugiriza urwamo rimwe bamara nk’amasaha abiri bavuga bati: “Arutemi, imana y’Abanyefeso, irahambaye!”
Umunyamabanga w’igisagara arabahoyahoya, ababwira ati: “Yemwe bantu bo muri Efeso, abantu bose barazi ko mu gisagara ca Efeso ariho hari ingoro ya Arutemi, n’igishusho cayo cakorotse kiva mw’ijuru.
None rero, ko ivyo atawubihakana, Nimutekane, ntimuhave mukora ivyo mutiyumviriyeko.
Aba bantu mwabazanye ngaha kandi ata na kimwe bivye mu ngoro canke ngo batuke imana yacu.
Nimba Demetiriyo n’abandi bacuzi bagenziwe bafise ivyo babagiriza, sentare ziruguruye, kandi n’abacamanza barahari, barabitwarira.
Hakaba hariho n’ibindi mwipfuza gushikiriza, bizotunganirizwa mw’ikoraniro ribijejwe.
Erega turashobara kwagirizwa imigumuko kubera ibibaye uno musi. Kandi nta co twokwireguza kuko nta kintu na kimwe gifadika cabitumye.”
Ahejeje kuvuga ivyo, aca acura iryo koraniro.
Ya migumuko iheze, Pawulo aca atumako abigishwa abatera intege, hanyuma arabasezera, afata urugendo aja i Makedoniya.
Nuko aca muri iyo ntara yose aremesha abizera n’inyigisho nyishi zo kubatera intege, maze ashika mu Bugiriki,
ahamara amezi atatu. Agira afate ubwato ngo aje muri Siriya, amenya ko hari Abayuda bamugiriye inama, aca afata ingingo yo gusubira i Makedoniya,
ajana na Sopatero mwene Puro w’i Beroya, na Arisitariko na Sekundo b’i Tesalonike, na Gayo w’i Derube, na Timoteyo, na Tukiko na Tirofimo bo muri Aziya.
Maze abo baba baragenda, baturindirira i Tirowa.
Natwe tuva i Filipi inyuma y’imisi mikuru y’imitsima itarimwo umwambiro, tubasanga i Tirowa haheze imisi itanu, duca tuhamara imisi indwi.
Ku mugoroba w’umusi w’Isabato duhurira hamwe ngo dusangire ingaburo y’Umwami, hanyuma Pawulo arabigisha gushika mu gicugu kuko bwaca agenda.
Icumba co hejuru twari twakoraniyemwo, carimwo amatara menshi.
Maze umusore yitwa Eyutuko yari yicaye kw’idirisha, aremerwa n’itiro ryinshi Pawulo ariko arigisha. Amaze gusinzira cane, arakoroka avuye ku nzu yo hejuru igira gatatu, bamutora yapfuye.
Maze Pawulo arururuka, amwubamako, aramubumbatira, avuga ati: “Ntimuhagarike imitima, ni muzima!”
Nuko aca asubira hejuru, basangira ingaburo y’Umwami. Pawulo aca abandanya yigisha gushika bukeye, hanyuma aragenda.
Nuko batahana wa musore ari muzima, batewe intege cane.
Nuko tuva aho, twitangira Pawulo imbere, dufata ubwato butujana muri Aso, aho twategerezwa guhurira na Pawulo. Yari yabiteguye uko kuko we yashaka kujayo ajanye ibarabara.
Adusanze muri Aso, twaciye tujana mu bwato gushika i Mitulene.
Bukeye tubandanya urugendo, dushika hafi y’izinga Kiyosi. Ku musi ukurikira, turashishikara dushika i Samosi, maze ku musi ukurikira dushika i Mileto.
Pawulo aca ahitamwo kubandanya adahagaze muri Efeso, kuko yanka kumara uwundi mwanya muri Aziya. Yariko yihutira ko, hamwe bimushobokeye, yoshika i Yerusalemu ku musi wa Pentekoti.
Tukiri i Mileto, Pawulo aca atumako abakuru b’ishengero ryo muri Efeso, kugira ngo baze babonane.
Bashitse, arababwira ati: “Murazi ingene nabanye namwe uhereye ku musi wa mbere nashikiye muri Aziya gushika uno musi.
Nakoreye Umwami Imana nciye bugufi kandi ndira cane, nihanganira amageragezwa menshi avuye ku mitego y’Abayuda.
Murazi ko mu vyashobora kubagirira ikimazi vyose ata na kimwe nabahishije, uhubwo navuze ubutumwa nongera nigisha mu makoraniro no mu nzu zanyu.
Nigishije Abayuda n’Abagiriki ko bakwiye kwihana bagahindukirira Imana mu kwizera Umwami Yesu.
None rero, ngoberewe na Mpwemu Yera, ngiye i Yerusalemu, ariko sinzi ibizonshikira ndi yo.
Ico nzi gusa ni uko, mu bisagara vyose ncamwo, Mpwemu Yera aguma amburira ko umunyororo n’amakuba bindindiriye.
Ariko mbona ko ubuzima bwanje ata co bwoba bumaze hamwe ntorangiza urugendo, ngansozera igikorwa Umwami Yesu yanshinze co kubwira abantu Ubutumwa Bwiza bw’ubuntu bw’Imana.
None rero ndazi ko mwebwe abo nabwiye Ubutumwa Bwiza bw’Ubwami ata n’umwe azosubira kumbona.
Ni co gituma ndabamenyesha uwu musi ko nera ku maraso yanyu mwese, ko atazomparurwako.
Kuko ata na kimwe mu vyo Imana yashaka ko mumenya vyose ntababwiye.
Nuko rero mwirinde mwebwe ubwanyu mwongere murinde n’ubusho Mpwemu Yera yabahaye ngo mububere abungere. Muragire ishengero ry’Imana, iryo yaguze amaraso y’umwana wayo.
Ndazi ko ninamara kugenda hazokwaduka abigisha b’ibinyoma bameze nk’amabingira y’inkazi binjire muri mwebwe, kandi bazogirira nabi ubusho.
No muri mwebwe nyene hari abazokwadukana inyigisho zo kugoramika ukuri kugira ngo bikwegereko abigishwa.
Nuko rero mube maso kandi mwibuke ko mu myaka itatu tumaranye ntigeze mpengeshanya, ijoro n’umurango, kuburira umuntu wese muri mwebwe n’amarira menshi.
Ubu rero ndabaragije Imana n’ijambo ry’ubuntu bwayo, ryo rishobora kubakomeza mu kwizera no kubaha kuragwa ivyiza hamwe n’abera.
Sinigeze nipfuza ifeza, inzahabu canke impuzu vy’umuntu n’umwe.
Namwe ubwanyu murazi ko nakoresheje amaboko yanje nkibeshaho nkongera nkabeshaho n’abo twagendana.
Muri vyose, naberetse akarorero keza ko dutegerezwa gukora cane kugira ngo dufashe abatishoboye, twibuka amajambo y’Umwami Yesu ubwiwe, we yavuze ati: ‘Hari umugisha mu gutanga kurusha mu guhabwa.’ ”
Ahejeje kuvuga ivyo, aca apfukama hamwe na bo barasenga.
Bose baraturikisha bararira, bamusezera bamugumbira.
Icabababaje kurusha ibindi, ni uko yari yababwiye ko batazosubira kumubona ukundi. Nuko baca baramuherekeza gushika ku bwato.
Tumaze gusezera abakuru bo muri Efeso no gutandukana na bo, duca twurira ubwato tuja i Kosi. Ku musi ukurikira tuja i Rodo, hanyuma tuvayo tuja i Patara.
Tuhashitse tuhasanga ubwato buja i Foyinike, duca turabwurira turagenda.
Dushitse hafi y’izinga Kupuro, turisiga i bubamfu, tugenda dutumbereye i Siriya, maze dushika i Tiro, aho ubwato twarimwo bwategerezwa kwururukiriza ivyo bwari butwaye.
Twururutse tuhasanga abigishwa baho, duca tumarana na bo imisi indwi. Baca bavugishwa na Mpwemu Yera ko Pawulo adakwiye kubandanya urwo rugendo ruja i Yerusalemu.
Ariko iyo ndwi iheze, duca turabandanya urugendo. Bene Data bose, bari kumwe n’abagore n’abana, baraduherekeza kuva mu gisagara gushika ku nkengera y’ikiyaga. Tuhashitse, turapfukama turasenga.
Tumaze gusezerana, duca twurira ubwato, na bo basubira iwabo.
Nuko tubandanya urugendo kuva i Tiro, dushika i Putolemiya, aho twamaze umusi umwe turamutsa bene Data.
Bukeye turabandanya dushika i Kayisariya, dushikira kwa Filipo umuvugabutumwa, umwe muri bamwe ndwi batoranywa i Yerusalemu ngo bakore igikorwa co kugaburira imfungurwa abapfakazi.
Yari afise abakobwa bane batararongogwa, bafise ingabire yo kuvugishwa n’Imana.
Tuhamaze imisi, haza uwuvugishwa n’Imana yitwa Agabo, yari amanutse ava i Yudaya.

Ashitse aho turi, afata umukanda wa Pawulo, awibohesha amaboko n’amaguru, avuga ati: “Mpwemu Yera avuze ati: ‘Uku ni ko Abayuda b’i Yerusalemu bazoboha nyene uwu mukanda, hanyuma bamurekurire mu maboko y’Abanyamahanga.’ ”
Tuvyumvise, twe n’ababa aho twinginga Pawulo tumusaba ngo ntashishikare urugendo ruja i Yerusalemu.
Pawulo aratwishura ati: “Ni kuki murira, mumbabariza umutima? Siniteguriye kubohwa gusa, ahubwo niteguriye no gupfira i Yerusalemu ku bw’izina ry’Umwami Yesu.”
Tubonye tudashobora kumugondoza turamureka, tuvuga tuti: “Ivyo Imana ishaka bibe ari vyo biba.”
Inyuma y’ivyo duca turitegura, tuduga i Yerusalemu.
Bamwe mu bigishwa b’i Kayisariya baraduherekeza badushikana kwa Munasoni, aho twategerezwa kurara. Uwo Munasoni yava i Kupuro kandi yari umwe mu ba mbere bizeye Kristo.
Dushitse i Yerusalemu, bene Data batwakirana umunezero.
Bukeye Pawulo ajana natwe tuja kuraba Yakobo, kandi n’abandi bakuru b’ishengero ni ho bari bari.
Pawulo arabaramutsa, abiganira ido n’ido ry’ivyo Imana yamukoresheje mu Banyamahanga mu gikorwa ciwe.
Bavyumvise bashima Imana, hanyuma bamubwira bati: “Mwene Data, ehe raba ingene ibihumbi vyinshi vy’Abayuda bizeye, kandi bose buzuye ishaka ryo kwubahiriza ivyagezwe vya Mose.
Ariko bumvise ko wigisha Abayuda bose baba mu Banyamahanga ngo bave mu vyagezwe vya Mose, kandi ngo ntibakebe abana babo, canke ngo babeho nk’uko imigenzo y’Abayuda ibitegeka.
None tubigenze dute? Nta nkeka bazokwumva ko waje.
Turagusavye rero ukore ico tukubwira. Hari abagabo bane bari kumwe natwe bagize isezerano imbere y’Imana.
Jana na bo, ugirane na bo umugenzo w’ukwihumanura, kandi ubarihire n’amahera kugira ngo bimoshe. Gutyo abantu bose bazobona ko ivyo bakwumviseko atari vyo, ariko ko na we ubayeho witondera ivyagezwe.
Naho ku vyerekeye abanyamahanga bizera, nibakurikize ingingo twarabandikiye mw’ikete: birinde kurya ivyaterekerewe ibigirwamana, amaraso canke inyama z’ibikoko binizwe, n’ingeso mbi z’ubusambanyi.”
Bukeye Pawulo aca ajana na ba bantu, yihumanurira hamwe na bo, hanyuma aja mu rusengero kumenyesha umusi umugenzo wo kwihumanura uzorangirirako, maze ibimazi bigatangwa ku bw’umwe umwe muri bo.
Imisi indwi y’umugenzo wo kwihumanura igira irangire, Abayuda bamwe bo muri Aziya babona Pawulo mu rusengero. Baca bagumura ikoraniro ryose, baramufata.

Barasemerera bati: “Yemwe Bisirayeli, dutabare! Uwu ni wa mugabo agenda arigisha abantu bose aho aciye hose, atyoza ubwoko bwacu, ivyagezwe n’uru rusengero. Ikigeretseko, yazanye Abagiriki mu rusengero, ahumanya iki kibanza cera.”
(Ivyo babivuze kubera bari baheruka kubona Umunyefeso yitwa Tirofimo ari kumwe na Pawulo mu gisagara, baca bibaza ko yamujanye mu rusengero.)
Maze umugumuko ukwira igisagara cose, abantu baza bariruka bavuye mu mihingo yose. Bafata Pawulo, bamukwegera inyuma y’urusengero, ubwo nyene imiryango yarwo ica irugarwa.
Bagira bamwice, inkuru ica ishikira umukuru w’abasoda b’Abaroma ko igisagara ca Yerusalemu cose kiri mu mugumuko.

Aca akoranya bamwe mu batwara imigwi y’abasoda ijana n’abo batwara, baca banyuragirana hagati mu bantu. Abariko batera imigumuko babonye uwo mukuru w’abasoda n’ingabo ziwe, baca barahagarika gukubita Pawulo.
Wa mukuru w’abasoda aca araseruka, aramufata, ategeka ko bamubohesha iminyororo ibiri, hanyuma abaza uwo ari we n’ico yakoze.
Bamwe mw’isinzi ryari aho bagasemerera bavuga bimwe, abandi bakavuga ibindi. Kubera ko uwo mukuru w’abasoda atashobora kumenya ukuri bitumwe n’urwamo rw’abantu, ategeka ko Pawulo ajanwa mw’ikambi.
Pawulo ashitse ku ngazi z’amabuye ziduga mw’ikambi, imigumuko iba myinshi cane, bica biba ngombwa ko abasoda bamutwara bamureruye.
Isinzi ry’abari bamukurikiye bagenda barasemerera bati: “Mwice! Mwice!”
Abasoda bashikanye Pawulo mw’ikambi, abaza wa mukuru w’abasoda ati: “Noshobora kugira ico ndababaza?” Na we aramwishura ati: “Urazi Ikigiriki?
Wewe nturi wa Munyegiputa yatera umugararizo mu misi iheze, agatwara mu bugaragwa abicanyi ibihumbi bine?”
Pawulo arishura ati: “Ndi Umuyuda w’i Taruso muri Kilikiya, umunyagisagara kidasanzwe. Ndakwinginze unyemerere ngire ico mbwira aba bantu.”
Wa mukuru w’abasoda yemerera Pawulo, na we ahagarara ku ngazi, arabamama ngo batekane. Habaye agacerere, aca avugana na bo mu rurimi rwabo rw’Igiheburayo.
Arababwira ati: “Bavukanyi namwe bavyeyi, nimwumvirize ukwiregura kwanje.”
Bumvise avugana na bo mu Giheburayo, baca barahora, haba agacerere kenshi. Pawulo aca arabandanya ati:

“Ndi Umuyuda, navukiye i Taruso muri Kilikiya, ariko nakuriye hano i Yerusalemu, nigishwa na Gamaliyeli kwitondera ivyagezwe vya ba sogokuruza mu kuri kwavyo kwose. Nagize ishaka ryinshi ryo kwubaha Imana nk’uko namwe muri hano uwu musi muyubaha.
Nahama abakurikira inzira y’Umwami Yesu gushika naho bamwe bapfa, ngafata abagore n’abagabo nkabata mw’ibohero.

Ivyo umuherezi mukuru n’abagize Inama Nkuru y’Abayuda bose bashobora kubishingira intahe. Mbere ni na bo bampaye amakete nshira Abayuda benewacu b’i Damasiko, maze njayo gufata abizera baho ngo ndabazane i Yerusalemu ari imbohe, kugira ngo bahanwe.
Nk’igihe c’isaha zitandatu z’umurango, ndiko ndegereza i Damasiko, umuco uvuye mw’ijuru undasira impande zose.
Maze ngwa hasi hanyuma numva ijwi rimbarira riti: ‘Sawuli! Sawuli! Uriko umpamira iki?’
Nanje ndabaza nti: ‘Uri nde ga Mwami?’ Rya jwi riranyishura riti: ‘Ndi Yesu w’i Nazareti, uwo uriko urahama.’
Abo twari kumwe barabona umuco ariko ntibumva ijwi ry’uwo twariko turavugana.
Nanje ndamubaza nti: ‘None nkore iki ga Mwami?’ Umwami Yesu aranyishura ati: ‘Haguruka uje i Damasiko, ni ho uzokwigishirizwa ivyo wategekanirijwe kuzokora.’
Abo twagendanye baca bamfata ukuboko bantwara i Damasiko, kuko wa muco mwinshi wari watumye mpuma amaso.
Muri ico gisagara hariho umuntu yitwa Ananiya. Yari umuntu yubaha Imana, akitondera ivyagezwe, kandi Abayuda bose baho bamushingira intahe nziza.
Nuko aza kundaba, ampagarara i ruhande ambwira ati: ‘Sawuli, humuka.’ Ako kanya nyene nca ndahumuka, ndamubona.
Maze aravuga ati: ‘Imana ya ba sogokuruza yagutoranirije kumenya ivyo igomba, kubona wa Mugororotsi, no kwumva ijwi ryiwe.
Uzomubera icabona co gushingira intahe ivyo wabonye n’ivyo wumvise imbere y’abantu bose.
None ni igiki kigutebeje? Va hasi ubatizwe, wambaze izina ryiwe, ubone kwozwa ivyaha vyawe.’
Maze kugaruka i Yerusalemu, umusi umwe ndi mu rusengero ndiko ndasenga nderekwa,
mbona Umwami Yesu ambwira ati: ‘Ihute uve i Yerusalemu kuko abaho batazokwemera intahe unshingira.’
Nca ndamwishura nti: ‘Mwami, aba bantu barazi ko naciye mu masinagogi yose ngata mw’ibohero nkongera ngakubitisha abakwizera.
Kandi igihe amaraso ya Sitefano uwagushingira intahe yaseseka, ni ho nari, nemeza ko yicwa, mfatiye impuzu abariko baramwica.’
Aca arambwira ati: ‘Genda, nzogutuma kure, mu Banyamahanga.’ ”
Gushika kuri ayo majambo, abantu bari bakiriko baramwumviriza. Maze baca batangura gushira urwamo hejuru bati: “Mukure kw’isi! Uwo ntakwiye kubaho!”
Bagishira urwamo hejuru, bata impuzu bongera basurira umukungugu hejuru,
wa mukuru w’abasoda aca ategeka ko Pawulo ajanwa mw’ikambi, bakamusambisha bamukubita kugira ngo bamenye igituma abantu bose bahagurukiye rimwe kumwiyamiriza.
Bamaze kumuboha ngo bamukubite, Pawulo aca abaza umukuru w’abasoda ijana yari ahagaze aho ati: “Mbega biremewe n’amategeko gukubita Umuroma, ata rubanza rwamutsinze?”
Na we avyumvise aca aja kuri wa mukuru wabo amubwira ati: “Mbega ubigenza gute? Erega wa mugabo ni Umuroma.”
Wa mukuru avyumvise aca aja kubaza Pawulo ati: “Mbwira, uri Umuroma?” Pawulo aramwishura ati: “Egome ndi we.”
Wa mukuru ati: “Na jewe ndi we, kandi natanze amahera menshi kugira ngo ndonke ubwo bwenegihugu.” Pawulo na we amubwira ati: “Ariko jeho navutse ndi Umuroma.”
Abagira bamusambishe baca basubira inyuma ubwo nyene. Na wa mukuru w’abasoda agira ubwoba kuko yabohesheje Pawulo, kandi ari Umuroma.
Bukeye bwaho, uwo mukuru w’abasoda akoranya abakuru b’abaherezi n’abagize Inama Nkuru y’Abayuda. Yashaka kumenya neza ico Abayuda bagiriza Pawulo. Nuko aca aramubohora, amuhagarika imbere yabo.
Maze Pawulo ahanga amaso Inama Nkuru y’Abayuda ababwira ati: “Bavukanyi, gushika uno musi, namye ngendera imbere y’Imana, ata jwi rinyagiriza ikibi.”
Ananiya, umuherezi mukuru, aca ategeka abari hafi ya Pawulo ko bamukubita ku munwa.
Pawulo aca avuga ati: “Imana izogukubita, wa ndyadya we umeze nk’igihome gisize irangi ryera! Uriko uncira urubanza wisunga ivyagezwe none ubirenzeko utegeka ko bankubita!”
Abari bahagaze i ruhande ya Pawulo baca bamubwira bati: “Nta soni! Urubahutse gutuka umuherezi mukuru w’Imana!”
Pawulo arabishura ati: “Bavukanyi, sinamenye ko ari umuherezi mukuru; kuko handitswe ngo: ‘Ntimukavuge nabi n’umwe mu baganza ubwoko bwanyu.’ ”

Pawulo amenye ko mu bari ngaho harimwo Abasadukayo n’Abafarisayo, aca abwira abagize iyo Nama Nkuru ati: “Bavukanyi, jewe ndi Umufarisayo, kandi na data ni Umufarisayo. Aha ndiko ncirwa urubanza kuko mfise ivyizigiro ko hariho ukuzuka kw’abapfuye.”
Avuze uko, haca haduka ukutumvikana hagati y’Abafarisayo n’Abasadukayo, ikoraniro rica ryicamwo kubiri.
Mu bisanzwe, Abasadukayo bavuga ko ata kuzuka, ata bamarayika canke impwemu bibaho, ariko Abafarisayo bo bemera ko ivyo vyose bibaho.

Maze urwamo ruba rwinshi, hanyuma bamwe mu bigisha b’Ivyagezwe b’Abafarisayo bava hasi bavuga bashize amanga bati: “Uwu muntu twebwe tubona ata caha kimwagira. Nta wubizi, yoba yavuganye n’impwemu canke n’umumarayika!”
Impari ziba nyinshi gushika aho wa mukuru w’abasoda agira ubwoba, yibaza ko bahava batabagura Pawulo. Aca ategeka abasoda ngo bamanuke bamunyakure, bamuhungishirize mw’ikambi.
Mw’ijoro, Umwami Yesu araza ahagarara i ruhande ya Pawulo, amubwira ati: “Humura! Nk’uko wanshingiye intahe i Yerusalemu, ni ko uzonshingira intahe n’i Roma.”
Bukeye Abayuda bagira inama, bashirako n’indahiro ko batazogira ico barya canke ngo banywe batarica Pawulo.
Abari muri iyo nama barenga mirongo ine.
Nuko baja ku bakuru b’abaherezi n’abatware, bababwira bati: “Twarahiye ko ata co turya tutarica Pawulo.
None rero, mwebwe n’Inama Nkuru y’Abayuda, nimusabe umukuru w’abasoda amubarungikire, mumubwire ko mugomba kumenya ivyiwe neza. Natwe turiteguye guca tumwica atarashika ngaha.”
Ariko umwishwa wa Pawulo yumva iyo nama, aca yiruka kw’ikambi abibarira Pawulo.
Pawulo aca abarira umwe mu bakuru b’abasoda ijana ati: “Jana uwu musore ku mukuru w’abasoda; arafise ico agomba kumubwira.”
Na we aca aramujana kuri wa mukuru w’abasoda. Amubwira ati: “Pawulo, umwe ari mw’ibohero, ansavye ngo nzane uwu musore, kuko afise ico agomba kukubwira.”
Wa mukuru w’abasoda aca afata ukuboko wa musore, amwinjiza mu nzu, aramubaza ati: “Ugomba kumbarira iki?”
Wa musore aca avuga ati: “Abayuda bagiye inama yo kugusaba ngo urungike Pawulo imbere y’Inama Nkuru y’Abayuda ejo, babesha ko hari amakuru bashaka kumubaza.

Ntuvyemere kuko muri bo hari abagabo barenga mirongo ine bagomba kumutegera. Kandi basezeranye ko badasubira kurya canke ngo banywe bataramwica. Ubu bamaze kwitegura, barindiriye ko wemera gusa kumurungika.”
Wa mukuru w’abasoda aca arungika wa musore, amwihanikirije ati: “Ntihagire n’umwe ubwira ko ibi wabimbwiye.”

Wa mukuru w’abasoda aca ahamagara abakuru b’abasoda ijana babiri, ababwira ati: “Nimutegure abasoda amajana abiri, abagendera ku mafarasi mirongo irindwi, hamwe n’abandi amajana abiri bagwanisha amacumu, mwitegurire kuja i Kayisariya isaha zitatu z’ijoro.
Mutegurire Pawulo amafarasi kugira ngo ashikirizwe Felisi, umukuru w’intara, ata nkomanzi.”
Aca yandika ikete muri aya majambo:
Jewe Kilawudiyo Lusiyasi, Ndabaramukije nyakwubahwa Felisi, umukuru w’intara.
Uwo mugabo ndabarungikiye yari yafashwe na bamwe mu Bayuda, kandi bagira bamwice, maze jewe n’ingabo twari kumwe turahashika turamutabara, kuko nari namenye ko ari Umuroma.
Kugira menye ico bamwagiriza, namujanye mu Nama Nkuru y’Abayuda.
Nca nsanga bamwagiriza ibijanye n’ivyagezwe vyabo, ariko nta co nasanze kimwagira cotuma ashirwa mw’ibohero canke ngo yicwe.
Numvise ko bagize inama yo kumwica, nca mpitamwo kumubarungikira ubwo nyene, kandi nategetse ko abamwagiriza babazanira ibirego bamurega.
Ba basoda baca bakora nk’uko bategetswe, bajana Pawulo mw’ijoro, bamushikana ahitwa Antipatiri.
Ku musi ukurikira, abasoda bagendera hasi basubira mw’ikambi, abagendera ku mafarasi baba ari bo babandanya baherekeza Pawulo.
Bashitse i Kayisariya, bashikiriza rya kete wa mukuru w’intara, bongera bamushikiriza na Pawulo.
Wa mukuru w’intara arisomye, aca abaza Pawulo iyo ava. Yumvise ko ava i Kilikiya,
aca amubwira ati: “Nzokwumviriza urubanza rwawe abakwagiriza nibashika.” Aca ategeka ko Pawulo arindirwa ku kirimba kwa Herode.
Haciye imisi itanu, umuherezi mukuru Ananiya amanuka i Kayisariya ari kumwe n’abatware n’umucamanza yitwa Teritulo, bazana ibirego barega Pawulo kuri wa mukuru w’intara.

Pawulo arengukijwe, Teritulo atangura kumwagiriza avuga ati: “Nyakwubahwa, tumaze igihe kirekire turi mu mahoro kubera intwaro yawe nziza, kandi ubwenge bwawe bwatumye hahinduka vyinshi mu gihugu cacu.
Kandi muri vyose na hose ga nyakwubahwa Felisi, turabigushimira bivuye ku mutima.
Ariko ntiriwe ndakwicisha amajambo, ndakwinginze utugirire ubuntu utwumvirize akanya gato.
Twasanze uwu mugabo ari inkozi y’ikibi. Agumura Abayuda aho bari kw’isi yose akabatera kugarariza. Ni we arongoye idini ry’ubuzimire ry’Abanazareti,
kandi yagerageje no guhumanya urusengero, maze turamufata. [Twashaka kumucira urubanza twisunze ivyagezwe vyacu,
ariko Lusiyasi umukuru w’abasoda araza amudushikura mu maboko ku nguvu,
ategeka ko abamwagiriza baza kukwitura.] Nawe niwamwibariza uraza gusanga ko ivyo tumwagiriza ari ukuri.”
Maze abandi Abayuda baca bahuriza hamwe mu kwemeza ko ivyo Teritulo yavuze vyose ari ukuri.
Wa mukuru w’intara ahaye ijambo Pawulo ngo avuge, yiregura avuga ati: “Ndazi ko haheze imyaka myinshi ucira imanza abo muri iki gihugu; ni co gituma nezerejwe no kwiregura imbere yawe.
N’aho wotohoza, wosanga ata misi cumi n’ibiri iheze ngiye i Yerusalemu gusenga.
Aba bariko baranyagiriza ntibigeze basanga ndiko ndaharira n’umuntu n’umwe, canke ngo ngumure abantu haba mu rusengero, mu masinagogi, canke ahandi aho ariho hose muri ico gisagara.
Aba bantu ntibashobora kwerekana ivyemeza ivyo bariko baranyagiriza.

Ariko ndemera ko nsenga Imana ya ba sogokuruza nk’uwukurikira ya Nzira, iyo bo bise idini ry’ubuzimire. Nizera ibihwanye n’ivyo ivyagezwe vyigisha vyose, hamwe n’ivyanditswe mu bitabu vy’abavugishwa n’Imana.
Mfise ivyizigiro mu Mana, co kimwe n’aba bantu, ko hazoba ukuzuka kw’abagororotsi n’abanyakibi.
Ni co gituma nkora ibishoboka vyoshe kugira namane umutima utanyagiriza ikibi na kimwe imbere y’Imana n’imbere y’abantu.
Inyuma y’imyaka myinshi ndi mu mahanga, nagarutse i Yerusalemu nzaniye imfashanyo abakene, nje no gutanga ibimazi.
Igihe bansanga mu rusengero, nari mu migirwa y’ukwihumanura. Nta bantu benshi twari kumwe kandi nta muvurungano wari uhari.
Ariko hari bamwe mu Bayuda bo muri Aziya. Ni bo bari kuza imbere yawe bakagira ico bavuze hamwe boba bafise ico banyagiriza.
Canke abari ngaha, nibavuge icaha basanze kinyagira igihe narengutswa imbere y’Inama Nkuru y’Abayuda,
uretse iki kimwe nasemereye mpagaze imbere yabo mvuga nti: ‘Aha ndiko ncirwa urubanza kuko nizera ko hariho ukuzuka kw’abapfuye.’ ”
Maze Felisi, yari asanzwe azi neza ivy’Inzira y’Umwami Yesu, aca yungururiza urubanza ku rindi sango, avuga ati: “Lusiyasi umukuru w’abasoda niyaza nzoheza ndabacire urubanza.”
Nuko ategeka umukuru w’abasoda ijana kuguma arinze Pawulo, ariko amuhe umwidegemvyo kandi yemerere n’abagenzi biwe kumufasha mu vyo yokenera.
Haheze imisi myinshi, Felisi azanana n’umugore wiwe Durusila, yari Umuyudakazi, atumako Pawulo kugira ngo amwumvirize avuga ivy’ukwizera Kristo Yesu.

Pawulo ariko aravuga ku vy’ukugororoka, ku vy’ukwirinda no ku ivy’urubanza rugiye kuza, Felisi aca aratinya, aca amubwira ati: “Niwigire, ivyo biramaze. Ninaronka akandi karyo keza nzosubira ndagutumeko.”
Kubera yari yiteze ko Pawulo ashobora kumuha igiturire, yama amutumako kenshi bakaganira.
Haheze imyaka ibiri, Felisi asubirirwa na Porukiyo Fesito, ariko kubera Felisi yagomba kunezereza Abayuda, asiga adakuye Pawulo mw’ibohero.
Inyuma y’imisi itatu Fesito ashitse i Kayisariya, aca aduga i Yerusalemu,
abonana n’abaherezi bakuru n’abatware b’Abayuda, na bo bamushikiriza ivyo barega Pawulo.
Maze binginga Fesito ngo abashimishe yimurire Pawulo i Yerusalemu, kuko bategura kumutegerera mu nzira ngo bamwice.
Fesito arabishura ati: “Pawulo apfungiwe i Kayisariya, kandi nanje ndi mu gusubirayo vuba.
Nihagire bamwe mu barongozi banyu baza tujane, bamwagiririze hariya, nimba hari ikibi yakoze.”
Nuko amarana na bo imisi umunani hanyuma asubira i Kayisariya. Ku musi ukurikira, akoranya abacamanza, maze arengutsa Pawulo.
Pawulo arengutse, Abayuda bari bamanutse bava i Yerusalemu baramukikuza, bamwagiriza ivyaha bihambaye badashobora kuronkera ivyemezo.
Maze Pawulo na we ariregura, avuga ati: “Sinigeze ncumura ku vyagezwe vy’Abayuda, canke ku rusengero, canke kuri Kayisari.”
Kubera Fesito yagomba gushimisha Abayuda, aca abaza Pawulo ati: “Uriteguye kuduga i Yerusalemu kugira ngo uburanire imbere yanje hariya?”
Pawulo arishura ati: “Ubu mpagaze imbere y’ubucamanza bwa Kayisari, kandi ni ho ntegerezwa kuburanira. Nta caha nokoreye Abayuda nk’uko na we ubizi neza.

Nimba hari icaha na kimwe kinyagira cotuma nicwa, sinanse gupfa. Ariko nimba ivyo bariko baranyagiriza atari vyo, nta n’umwe afise uburenganzira bwo kundekurira kuri aba Bayuda. Nsavye kwungururiza kwa Kayisari.”
Fesito amaze gukebukana n’abajanama biwe, aca avuga ati: “Ko witwaye kwa Kayisari, uzoburanira kwa Kayisari.”
Haheze imisi mike umwami Agiripa ashika i Kayisariya ari kumwe na Berenise baje gukeza Fesito.
Kubera bahamaze imisi myinshi, Fesito araronka akaryo ko kuganira n’uwo mwami ivya Pawulo. Aravuga ati: “Hano hari umugabo Felisi yasize ari imbohe.
Igihe naja i Yerusalemu, abakuru b’abaherezi n’abashingantahe b’Abayuda, baramwitwariye bashaka ko ndamutsindisha.
Nababwiye ko bitari mu migenzo y’Abaroma gucira urubanza umuntu adahawe umwanya wo kuburana n’abamwitwariye ngo aronke akaryo ko kwiregura ku vyo bamwagiriza.
Abamwagiriza bashitse hano, sinatebeje urubanza, ku musi ukurikira, naciye nicara ku ntebe y’imanza, ndengutsa n’uwo mugabo.
Abamwagiriza bahagurutse ngo bavuge, ntibamwagirije icaha na kimwe mu vyo nari niteze.
Ariko bari bafise ivyo bapfa na we bijanye n’idini ryabo hamwe n’umugabo yitwa Yesu yari yarapfuye, ariko Pawulo we akemeza ko ari muzima.
Jewe sinabona uko noca urwo rubanza, ni co gituma nasavye ko Pawulo yoja i Yerusalemu kugira ngo uburanire yo kuri ivyo bamwagiriza.
Ariko Pawulo asavye ko yokwungururiza kwa Kayisari, naciye ntegeka ko aguma apfungiwe ngaha gushika ndamurungitse.”
Agiripa aca abwira Fesito ati: “Nanje ndashaka kwiyumvira uwo muntu.” Aramwishura ati: “Ejo uzomwiyumvira.”

Ku musi ukurikira, Agiripa na Berenise baza bari kumwe n’abagendanyi benshi, binjira muri sentare baherekejwe n’abasoda bakurubakuru hamwe n’abubahwa bo muri ico gisagara. Fesito aca ategeka ko bazana Pawulo.

Fesito avuga ati: “Mwami Agiripa, namwe mwese mukoraniye ngaha, murabona uwu mugabo! Abayuda bose baranyitwayeko bambwira ivyiwe haba i Yerusalemu canke ngaha i Kayisariya, basemerera ko adakwiye kwongera kubaho.
Ariko jewe nasanze ata kintu na kimwe yakoze cotuma yicwa, ariko kubera yamaze gusaba kwungururizwa kwa Kayisari, nahisemwo kuzomurungika i Roma.

Ariko nabuze ikintu gifadika nandikira Kayisari cerekeye uwu muntu. Ni co gituma namuzanye ngaha imbere yanyu mwese, na canecane imbere yawe mwami Agiripa, kugira ngo tumaze gutohoza ivyiwe, ndonke ico nandikira Kayisari.
Ntibibereye ko ndungika imbohe nterekanye ico yagirizwa.”
Agiripa na we abarira Pawulo ati: “Urahawe uburenganzira bwo kwiregura.” Pawulo aca aramvura ukuboko, atangura kwiregura, avuga ati:
“Mwami Agiripa, ngiriwe ubuntu bwo guhagarara imbere yawe uno musi, niregura ku vyo nagirizwa n’Abayuda,
na canecane ko wewe usanzwe uzi neza imigenzo y’Abayuda n’impari zabo. None rero ndakwinginze unyumvirize wihanganye.
Abayuda bose barazi ingene nabayeho kuva nkiri umwana, ingene nakuze haba mu gihugu navukiyemwo canke i Yerusalemu.
Baranzi neza kuva kera, kandi bashatse bobishingira intahe ko nabayeho nk’umwe mu Bafarisayo, umuce urusha iyindi mu gushimikira ku migenzo mw’idini ryacu.
None igitumye mpagaze imbere y’ubucamanza uwu musi n’uko nizigiye ivyo Imana yasezeraniye ba sogokuruza.
Ivyo ni vyo imiryango yacu cumi n’ibiri yiteze kubona bishika; ni co gituma bakorera Imana n’umwete mwinshi ijoro n’umurango. Kandi ga mwami, ivyo vyizigiro nyene ni vyo bituma Abayuda banshengeza.
Mbega ni kuki muri mwebwe hari abibaza ko bidashoboka ko Imana izura abapfuye?
Nanje ubwanje nahora niyumvira ko nkwiye gukora ibishoboka vyose ngo ngwanye izina rya Yesu Umunyenazareti.
Kandi ivyo narabikoze i Yerusalemu. Nahawe ububasha n’abakuru b’abaherezi bwo gufata abizera no kubata mw’ibohero; kandi mu kubacira urwo gupfa, nari mu bavyemeza.
Kenshi nava mw’isinagogi nja mu yindi nkabakubitisha, nkabategeka gutuka izina rya Yesu. Muri iryo pfuhe nyeneryo kubagwanya, nashitse no mu bisagara vyo mu mahanga kubahamirayo.
Umusi umwe nari ngiye muri ivyo bikorwa nyene i Damasiko, nahawe ububasha kandi ntumwe n’abakuru b’abaherezi.
Maze ga mwami, nko kw’isaha ya gatandatu y’umurango, ndi mu nzira ngenda, mbona umuco mwinshi uva mw’ijuru, uruta uw’izuba, uturasira impande zose twe n’abo twari kumwe.
Twese duca tugwa hasi, maze numva ijwi rimbarira mu Giheburayo riti: ‘Sawuli, Sawuli, uriko umpamira iki? Nta wukubita umugere ku muhunda.’
Nanje nca ndamubaza nti: ‘Uri nde ga Mwami?’ Na we ati: ‘Ndi Yesu uwo uriko urahama.
None rero va hasi uhagarare, kuko ndakwiyeretse kugira ngo ndagutume nk’umukozi wanje, kandi nk’icabona co gushingira intahe ivyo wambonyeko n’ivyo nzokwereka.
Nzokurokora mu maboko y’ubwoko bwawe no mu maboko y’Abanyamahanga, abo ndagutumyemwo,
kugira ngo ubugurure amaso, bave mu mwijima baje mu muco, ubakure mu bubasha bwa Satani ubazane ku Mana, baharirwe ivyaha vyabo, maze bahabwe ikibanza mu bejejwe babihawe no kunyizera.’
None rero Mwami Agiripa, numviye ivyo neretswe bivuye mw’ijuru.

Nahereye ku b’i Damasiko, hanyuma nja mu b’i Yerusalemu n’i Yudaya hose, ntibagiye no mu Banyamahanga, nigisha ko bakwiye kwihana bakagaruka ku Mana, kandi bagakora ibikorwa bikwiranye n’ukwihana kwabo.
Ico ni co catumye Abayuda bamfatira mu rusengero bakagomba kunyica.
Ariko Imana yagumye indinda gushika uwu musi. None mpagaze ngaha nshingira intahe abakuru n’abato. Nta co ndiko ndavuga kirengeye ivyo abavugishwa n’Imana na Mose bavuze ko bizoshika,
ko Kristo akwiye kubabazwa, akaba impfura mu kuzuka mu bapfuye, maze akamamaza umuco mu bwoko bwiwe no mu Banyamahanga.”
Ageze aho, Fesito aca amuciramwo asemerera ati: “Erega Pawulo wasaze! Ivyigwa vyinshi wize vyaragusarishije.”
Pawulo asubizayo ati: “Nyenicubahiro Fesito, sinasaze. Ivyo ndiko ndavuga ni ukuri kandi biratahuritse.
Ibi umwami asanzwe abizi. Ibi ndiko ndabivuga nshize ubwoba kuko ndazi ko na we nyene abizi, kuko ntivyakorewe mu kinyegero.
Mwami Agiripa, mbega ntiwizera ivyo abavugishwa bavuze? Ndazi ko uvyizera.”
Agiripa aca abaza Pawulo ati: “Wibaza ko mu kanya gato nk’aka woshobora kuntahuza nkaba Umukristo?”
Pawulo asubizayo ati: “Umwanya waba muto canke munini, nta co bitwaye. Ico nsaba Imana n’uko atoba wewe gusa, ariko n’abariko baranyumviriza bose uwu musi bomera nkanje, uretse iyi minyororo.”
Umwami, umukuru w’intara na Berenise n’abari bicaranye na bo baca barahaguruka, baragenda.
Bavuye muri iyo sentare, bagenda baraganira, bavuga bati: “Uwu muntu nta co yakoze cotuma yicwa canke ngo ashirwe mw’ibohero.”
Agiripa abarira Fesito ati: “Iyaba atari yaramaze kwungururiza kwa Kayisari, yaca arekurwa.”

Bamaze gufata ingingo ko tuja mu Butaliyano n’ubwato, Pawulo be n’izindi mbohe bashikirizwa umukuru w’abasoda ijana yitwa Yuliyo, yari umwe mu basoda bakuru bo mu muce w’abacungera ubuzima bwa Kayisari.
Nuko twurira ubwato bwava muri Aduramutiyo bugaca ku bivuko vyo mu ntara ya Aziya, turagenda. Kandi Arisitariko Umunyamakedoniya w’i Tesalonike twari kumwe.
Ku musi ukurikira twururukira i Sidoni. Pawulo agira ikiganza ciza kuri Yuliyo, amwemerera kuja ku bagenzi biwe kugira ngo bamufashe mu vyo akeneye.
Tuvuye aho, duca tugendera hafi y’izinga rya Kupuro kugira ngo twikingire umuyaga kuko wari uduturutse imbere.
Tumaze kurengana akarere kari hagati ya Kilikiya na Pamfiliya, duca twururukira i Mura muri Lukiya.
Wa mukuru w’abasoda ijana aca asanga hari ubwato bwo muri Alegizanderiya buja mu Butaliyano, aca arabutwuriza.

Nuko tumara imisi itari mike tugenda bukebuke, dushika i Kinido bitugoye cane. Umuyaga utubujije kubandanya, duca tugenda twegereye uruhande rw’izinga rya Kirete rurabana n’i Salumone kugira ngo twikingire umuyaga.
Nuko tugenda twisunze urwo ruhande bitugoye, dushika ahantu hitwa Ibivuko Vyiza, hafi y’igisagara citwa Laseya.
Aho twahataye umwanya munini, kandi kubandanya urugendo kwari nk’ukwiheba kuko hari inyuma y’umusi mukuru w’impongano. Pawulo arababurira ati:
“Bagenzi, ndabona ko uru rugendo ruja kubamwo ingorane nyinshi, n’ubuhombe bwinshi ku bwato, ku vyo butwaye, ndetse no ku buzima bwacu.”
Ariko wa mukuru w’abasoda ijana aho kwumviriza Pawulo, yumviriza uwugendesha ubwato na nyenebwo.

Kubera bitari vyoroshe kumara muri ico kivuko igihe c’imbeho nyinshi cane cari kigiye kuza, benshi mu bari mu bwato bahitamwo ko twobandanya, kugira ngo bishobotse tumare ico gihe i Foyinike. Foyinike cari ikivuko c’i Kirete caraba mu bumanuko bushira uburengero no mu buraruko bushira uburengero.
Akayaga gakeya gaturuka mu bumanuko gahuhuse, baca bibaza ko urugendo ruja kugenda neza. Baca batangura gusoza bagendera hafi y’izinga rya Kirete.
Tutarashika kure, haduka igihuhusi gikomeye citwa Ewulakuloni kiza giturutse kuri iryo zinga.
Maze ubwato butangirwa n’umuyaga, ntivyakunda ko bubandanya. Duca turareka umuyaga udutwara iyo ushaka.
Duca tugenda twegereye izinga rito ryitwa Kawuda kugira ngo dushobore kwikinga umuyaga, twiyegereza akato ko kwifashisha mu gihe c’impanuka bitugoye cane.

Bamaze kukaduza mu bwato, baca bakabohesha imigozi. Kubera batinya ko bwohava bubajana mu musenyi ushaya w’ahitwa Suriti muri Libiya, baca barekurira mu kiyaga icuma kiremereye kiboheye ku migozi, hanyuma barareka umuyaga ukubeba ubwato ubujana iyo ushaka.
Nuko tuba muri ako kaga ko kuzungagizwa n’ibihuhusi kugeza aho batangura guta mu mazi bimwe mu vyari mu bwato ku musi ukurikira.
Ku musi ugira gatatu, bo nyene baterera mu mazi ibikoresho bimwebimwe ubwato bukenera.
Haheze imisi myinshi ata zuba canke inyenyeri tubonye, kandi umupfunda iguma isuriranya, tugera aho dutakaza ivyizigiro vyo gukira.
Haheze igihe abantu ata co barya, Pawulo ahagarara imbere yabo aravuga ati: “Bagenzi, mwari mukwiye kunyumviriza, mukareka kuva i Kirete. Gutyo mwari kuba mwirinze aka kaga n’uru ruhombo.
Ubu rero ndabasavye mugumye imitima, kuko ata n’umwe muri mwebwe azotakaza ubuzima; ubwato bwonyene ni bwo buzosaba.
Muri iri joro nyene, umumarayika w’Imana nitirirwa kandi nkorera, yampagaze i ruhande
ambarira ati: ‘Ntutinye Pawulo we! Utegerezwa kuzoburanira imbere ya Kayisari; kandi kubera wewe, Imana izozigama ubuzima bw’abo muri kumwe bose.’
Nuko rero bagenzi, nimugumye imitima, kuko ndizera ko Imana izobishitsa nk’uko yabimbwiye.
Ariko rero, hariho izinga rimwe ubu ubwato buzosabirako.”
Mw’ijoro ry’umusi ugira cumi na kane, twari tugikubebwa n’umuyaga mu kiyaga ca Adiriyatiko. Nko mu gicugu, abagendesha ubwato bumva ko umenga turegereje umusozi.
Bagera uburebure bw’amazi gushika hasi musi y’ubwato, basanga ni nk’imetetero mirongo ine. Haheze akanya barasubira basanga ni nk’imetero mirongo itatu.
Batinye ko ubwato bwohava bwiseka ku mabuye, baca barekurira mu mazi ivyuma bine biremereye biboheye ku migozi bibuza ubwato kugenda bibohewe ku bwato inyuma, barira ko bwoca.
Maze abatwara ubwato bagerageza gutoroka ngo babuvemwo, bururutsa ka kato ko kwifashisha mu gihe c’impanuka, babesha ngo bagiye kurekurira mu mazi ivyuma vy’imbere na vyo.
Maze Pawulo abwira wa mukuru w’abasoda ijana ati: “Abo batagumye mu bwato ntimushobora kurokoka.”
Maze abasoda baca bacagagura imigozi yari iboshe ako kato gaca gakorokera mu kiyaga karatwarwa.
Bugiye guca, Pawulo yinginga abantu bose ngo bagire ico barya. Ababwira ati: “Raba haciye imisi cumi n’ine mwihebuye ata co mutamira.
None rero ndabasavye murabe ico murya, kugira ngo mubeho; kuko nta n’umwe muri mwebwe azotakaza n’agashatsi ko ku mutwe wiwe.”
Avuze ivyo, afata umukate awushimira Imana imbere yabo, arawumanyagura, aca atangura kurya.
Bose baca bararema, na bo batangura kurya.
Abari muri ubwo bwato twese hamwe twari abantu amajana abiri na mirongo irindwi na batandatu.
Bamaze kurya bagahaga, baca bata ingano mu kiyaga kigira ngo baremurure ubwato.
Bukeye ntibashobora kumenya iyo ntara barimwo iyo ari yo, ariko babonye ahantu hari umusenyi ku nkengera y’ikiyaga, bafata ingingo yo gutumberezayo ubwato ngo babuhagarikeyo hamwe bibashobokeye.

Nuko bacagagura ya migozi yari ifashe vya vyuma, babirekurira mu mazi, babohora n’imigozi yari iboshe ingafe, baduza igihuzu c’imbere kugira ngo umuyaga usunike ubwato ubujana imbere, basoza batumbereye ku musenyi wo ku nkengera.
Ariko ubwato buca bwiseka mu musenyi mwishi burahagarara, umutwe wabwo uruma mu musenyi, igihande c’inyuma na co kirasaba kubera imipfunda yacisekako n’inkomezi nyinshi.
Abasoda baca baja inama yo kwica imbohe zose kugira ngo ntihagire izoga ngo zihunge zibacike.
Ariko kubera wa mukuru w’abasoda ijana yashaka gukingira Pawulo, ababuza kubikora. Aca ategeka ko abazi kwoga bobanza bagasimbira mu mazi bagashika impore i musozi.
Abasigaye baca bogera ku mbaho n’ibimanyu vy’ubwato, gutyo bose bashika impore i musozi.
Tumaze kurokoka impore i musozi, tumenya ko iryo zinga ryitwa Malita.
Abantu baba kuri iryo zinga batwakirana ubugwaneza budasanzwe, baca baducanira umucanwa kuko imvura yariko iragwa kandi hari hakanye.
Maze Pawulo yegeranya umukama w’inkwi agashira ku muriro, haca havamwo inzoka y’ikimata ibabuwe n’umuriro imukomora ku kuboko kandi ikumatako.

Abantu bo muri iryo zinga babonye ico gikoko yenenena ku kuboko kwiwe, barabwirana bati: “Uwu muntu ategerezwa kuba ari umwicanyi, kuko n’aho yari akize ikiyaga, urubanza rw’Imana ntirumwemereye kubaho.”
Pawulo aca akunkumurira ico gikoko mu muriro, kandi ubumara bwayo ntibwagira ico bumugira.
Abantu bari biteze ko aca avyimba canke agapfa ubwo nyene. Ariko barindiriye umwanya muremure bakabona nta co abaye, baca barahindura batangura kuvuga ko Pawulo ari imana.
Hafi y’aho hari itongo ry’umukuru w’iryo zinga yitwa Pubiliyo. Na we atwakirana ubugwaneza, aduha indaro, tuhamara imisi itatu.
Se wa Pubiliyo yari arwaye inyonko n’amacinya, arembeye ku buriri. Nuko Pawulo yinjira aho ari aramusengera amurambitseko ibiganza, aca arakira.
Ivyo bibaye, abarwayi bose bo kuri iryo zinga baca baraza Pawulo arabasengera, barakira.
Maze ivyo bibaye, baduha icubahiro cinshi, hanyuma hageze ko tugenda badutekerera ivyo tuzokenera vyose mu rugendo.

Tuhamaze amezi atatu, duca twurira ubwato bwava muri Alegizanderiya bwari bwabujijwe kubandanya urugendo n’igihe c’imbeho nyinshi cane. Umutwe wabwo wariko ikimenyetso c’ibigirwamana vy’amahasa bibiri vyitwa Kasitori na Polugisi.
Dushitse i Sirakusi tuhamara imisi itatu.
Tuhavuye, twaciye tubandanya dushika i Regiyo. Bukeye, umuyaga w’i bumanuko urahuhuta, maze mu misi ibiri tubona gushika i Puteyoli.
Aho twahasanze bene Data, baca baratwakira badusaba ko twomarana na bo imisi indwi. Hanyuma turabandanya dushika i Roma.
Maze Bene Data baho bumvise ko dushitse, baca baraza badusanganirira kw’Isoko rya Apiyusi, abandi badusanga ku Nzu z’Ingenzi Zitatu. Pawulo ababonye ashima Imana kandi ararema mu mutima.
Dushitse i Roma, Pawulo ahabwa uruhusha rwo kuba mu nzu ya wenyene, ari kumwe n’umusoda amucunze.

Haheze imisi itatu, Pawulo atumako abarongozi b’Abayuda baho. Bamaze gukorana, Pawulo arababwira ati: “Bavukanyi, naho ata kibi nakoreye ubwoko bwacu canke ngo ndenge ku migenzo ya sogokuruza, ndi i Yerusalemu narafashwe, nshirwa mu minwe y’Abaroma.
Bamaze gutohoza neza ivyanje, bipfuza kundekura kuko ata kibi na kimwe canyagira cari gutuma nicwa.
Maze mbonye ko Abayuda banse ingingo yo kundekura, nca nitwara kuri Kayisari. Ariko ntivyari bitumwe nuko ngomvye kuburanya ubwoko bwanje.
Ni co gituma nabinginze ngo muze kugira ngo tuganire, ndabamenyeshe ko mbohewe ivyizigiro ubwoko bw’Abisirayeli bwari bwiteze.”
Baca baramwishura bati: “Nta kete na rimwe twigeze turonka rivuye i Yudaya rivuga ivyawe, kandi nta wo muri benewacu n’umwe yaje ava hariya ngo atubwire ikibi na kimwe kuri wewe.
Ariko twashaka kukwiyumvira utubwire ivyo wizera, kuko turazi ko ahantu hose bavuga nabi uwo mugwi w’idini urimwo.”

Baca bashinga uwundi musi bazobonanirako, hanyuma baza ari benshi bamusanga mu nzu yabamwo. Kuva mu gitondo gushika mw’ijoro, arabasigurira yongera abemeza ivy’Ubwami bw’Imana, agerageza kubatahuza ivya Yesu Kristo akoresheje ibitabu vy’ivyagezwe vya Mose n’ivy’abavugishwa n’Imana.
Bamwe bemera ivyo ababariye, abandi banka kuvyizera.
Nuko hagera ko bataha bagiharira, hanyuma Pawulo ababwira ijambo ryo kubasezera ati: “Mpwemu Yera yavuga ukuri igihe yavuga kuri ba sogokuruza banyu, avugishije Yesaya ati:
‘Genda ubwire ubwo bwoko uti: Kwumva muzokwama mwumva ariko ntimuzokwigera mutahura, kuraba muzokwama muraba ariko ntimuzokwigera mubona.

Kuko imitima y’ubu bwoko ikomantaye; amatwi yabo ntashobora kwumva, kandi amaso yabo barayahumiriza Ahandi ho bobonesheje amaso yabo, bakumvisha amatwi yabo, bagatahurisha imitima yabo; maze bagahindukira nanje nkabakiza.’
Nuko rero nimumenye ko ivy’ako gakiza k’Imana n’Abanyamahanga babishikirijwe, kandi bo bazokakira!” [
Abayuda bumvise ayo majambo, basubira inyuma bayaharirako cane.]
Pawulo aca amara imyaka ibiri yibana mu nzu akose, akama yakira abaza kumuraba bose.
Yama yigisha ivy’Ubwami bw’Imana n’ivya Yesu Kristo, ashize amanga rwose kandi ata ntambamyi.
Ndabandikiye jewe Pawulo, umugurano wa Kristo Yesu, nahamagariwe kuba intumwa, ntoranirizwa kuvuga Ubutumwa Bwiza bw’Imana,
ubwo yari yarasezeranye kuva kera ibicishije ku bavugishwa na yo, nk’uko biri mu Vyanditswe Vyera.
Ubwo Butumwa Bwiza bwerekeye Umwana wayo: mu buryo bw’umubiri yakomotse mu ruvyaro rw’umwami Dawidi,
mu buryo bw’impwemu y’ubugororotsi agaragara ari Umwana w’Imana mu kuzuka mu bapfuye ku bw’ubushobozi bwa Mpwemu Yera. Uwo ni Yesu Kristo Umwami wacu.
Imana yangiriye ubuntu biciye muri we, impa kuba intumwa ku bw’icubahiro ciwe, kugira ngo nshobore gushikana Abanyamahanga ku kuyizera no kuyumvira.
Namwe abari i Roma muri bamwe muri abo banyamahanga bahamagariwe kuba aba Yesu Kristo.

Nuko rero ndabandikiye mwebwe ab’i Roma, mukundwa n’Imana kandi mwahamagariwe kuba abantu bayo bejejwe: Ubuntu n’amahoro biva ku Mana Data wa twese no ku Mwami wacu Yesu Kristo bibe kuri mwebwe mwese.
Imbere ya vyose, nagomba gushimira Imana yanje ku bwa mwebwe mwese ndabicishije kuri Yesu Kristo, kuko ukwizera kwanyu kwamamaye mw’isi yose.
Imana nkorera n’umutima wanje wose mu kuvuga Ubutumwa Bwiza bw’Umwana wayo, ni yo cabona ko ntahengeshanya kubibuka
igihe cose nsenze. Kimwe mu vyo nsengera, ni uko Imana, nimba bihuye n’ugushaka kwayo, yomfasha kugira ngo nshobore kuza kubaramutsa.
Nipfuza kubagendera kugira ngo dusangire ingabire za Mpwemu, ndabakomeze mu Mwami.
Ico ngomba ni ukubonana namwe kugira ngo ndabatere intege mu kwizera, maze nanje nterwe intege n’ukwizera kwanyu.

Bene Data, nshaka ko mumenya ko nagerageje kenshi kuza kubaramutsa, ariko ko bitarankundira kugeza ubu. Ngomba gukorana namwe kugira ngo ndonke ivyamwa vyo mu buryo bw’impwemu, nk’uko maze kubibona mu bandi Banyamahanga.
Kuko ntegerezwa kwitaho bose, abateye imbere n’abadateye imbere, abize n’abatize.
Ni co gituma, mfise inyota yo kubabwira Ubutumwa Bwiza namwe ababa i Roma.
Ubutumwa Bwiza ntibuntera isoni, kuko ni ubushobozi bw’Imana buzanira uwizeye wese agakiza, uhereye ku Muyuda ukageza ku Mugiriki.
Ubwo Butumwa Bwiza buduhishurira ingene Imana itugira abagororotsi mu maso yayo, kandi ivyo tubihabwa n’ukwizera kwonyene; nk’uko Ivyanditswe Vyera bivuga ngo: “Umugororotsi azobeshwaho n’ukwizera.”
Uburake bw’Imana bwarahishuwe buvuye mw’ijuru, ubwo irakira ukutayubaha kwose n’ububi bw’abantu, kuko mu ngeso zabo mbi bagwanya ukuri ngo ntikugaragare.
Yamara ibikenewe vyose kugira ngo bamenye Imana biragaragara mu maso yabo, kuko Imana ubwayo yabishize ahabona.
Kuva isi iremwa, ivyerekeye Imana bitabonwa n’aya maso: ubushobozi bwayo buhoraho, n’ubumana bwayo, biraboneka neza vyerekanywe n’ivyo yaremye. Ni co gituma ata muntu n’umwe afise ico yokwireguza.
Ariko naho bamenye Imana, ntibayubashe nk’Imana canke ngo bayishime uko bikwiye, ahubwo ivyiyumviro vyabo vyabandanije kuba bibi, imitima yabo itagira ubwenge yuzura umwijima.
Bavuga ko bafise ubwenge, ariko ni ibipfu.
Aho gusenga Imana y’icubahiro kandi idapfa, basenga ibishushanyo bibajwe bifise ishuho y’umuntu apfa, iy’inyoni, iy’ibikoko n’iy’ibikwega inda hasi.
Ivyo vyatumye Imana ibareka kugira ngo bakore ibiteye isoni imitima yabo yipfuza, gutyo bakoreranira ibikorwa bihumanya imibiri yabo.
Ukuri kwerekeye Imana bagukavye ikinyoma, hanyuma barasenga bongera bakorera ivyaremwe, babikorera ivyo bari bakwiye gukorera Umuremyi, we abereye gushimwa ibihe vyose! Amen.

Ivyo ni vyo vyatumye Imana ibaheba ngo bakore ibiteye isoni imitima yabo yipfuza. Mbere n’abagore babo bataye ibanga ry’abubatse nk’uko Imana yaritegekanije, biyononesha guhuza ibitsina n’abandi bagore nka bo.

N’abagabo na bo bahevye amabanga y’abubatse n’abagore babo nk’uko Imana yabitegekanije, biyononesha guhuza ibitsina n’abagabo nka bo. Abagabo bakoranye n’abandi bagabo ibiteye isoni, hanyuma bahabwa igihano gikwiranye n’ubuzimire bwabo.
Kuko banse kumenya Imana, na yo yarabahevye, irabareka ngo bakurikire ivyiyumviro vyabo bipfuye, bakore ibintu batari babereye gukora.
Ubuzima bwabo bwuzuyemwo ivyaha vy’uburyo bwose: ubukozi bw’ikibi. Buzuye ukwipfuza ivy’abandi, urwanko, ishari, ubwicanyi, gutongana, gusukana, guhendana, urusaku,
kuvuga nabi abandi, kwanka Imana, gutukana, kwibona, kwishira hejuru, ubuhizi mu gukora ikibi, kugarariza abavyeyi,
guhindagurika, kudashitsa ivyo bemeye, kugira imitima ikomantaye hamwe no kutagira impuhwe.
Kandi naho bazi ko Imana icira abakora ivyo urubanza rwo gupfa, ntibashishikara kubikora gusa, ahubwo bashima n’abandi babikora.
None rero, wewe ushobora kwibaza ko wocira imanza abameze batyo, ariko nawe umeze nka bo nta co wokwireguza. Kuko nimba ucira imanza abandi kandi ukora nk’ivyo bakora, na wewe uba wiciriye urubanza.
Twese turazi yuko urubanza Imana icira abakora nk’ivyo ari urw’ukuri.
None wewe ucira imanza abandi, kandi ukora nk’ivyo bakora, wibaza ko uzokira urubanza rw’Imana?
Canke ntubona ingene Imana igira neza, yihangana kandi idahaniraho? None ivyo nta co bikubwiye? Mbega ntubona ko mu kugira neza kwayo Imana ishaka kugushikana ku kwihana ivyaha vyawe?
Ariko kubera ufise umutima ukomantaye utagomba kwihana, uriko wikwegera guhanwa, ku musi w’uburake bw’Imana aho urubanza rwayo rugororotse ruzohishurirwa.
Imana “izoha umuntu wese ingero ikwiranye n’ibikorwa yakoze.”
Izoha ubugingo budashira abashishikara gukora ivyiza, bakagira umwete mu kurondera ubwiza, icubahiro no kudapfa bitangwa na yo.
Ariko izosuka uburake n’ubushangashirwe bwayo kuri abo bose birukira ivyo imitima yabo ihahamiye, batumvira ukuri, bagakurikira ikibi.
Ivyago n’imibabaro bizoshika ku muntu wese akora ibibi; uhereye ku Muyuda ukageza ku Munyamahanga.
Ariko abakora ivyiza, bazohabwa ubwiza, icubahiro n’amahoro biva ku Mana; uhereye ku Muyuda ukageza ku Munyamahanga.
Kuko Imana idahengama ngo igire abo ikunda n’abo yanka.
Abacumura badafise ivyagezwe vya Mose bazohona ivyo vyagezwe bitarinze kurabwa, kandi abacumura bari musi y’ivyagezwe bazocirwa urubanza n’ivyo vyagezwe.
Kuko kwumva gusa ivyagezwe ntikutugira abagororotsi mu maso y’Imana, ahubwo kuvyumvira ni kwo kutugira abagororotsi mu maso yayo.
Abanyamahanga badafise ivyagezwe, iyo bakoze ivyo ivyagezwe bisaba, bamera nk’aho babifise mu mitima yabo, naho batabifise.

Gutyo baba berekanye ko ivyagezwe vy’Imana vyanditswe mu mitima yabo. Kuko ijwi ryo mu mitima yabo n’ivyiyumviro vyabo bibagiriza iyo bariko barakora ibibi canke bikabahumuriza iyo bariko barakora ivyiza.
Nuko rero, ubu ni bwo Butumwa Bwiza mvuga: umusi uraje, aho Imana izocira imanza ivyo abantu bagize amabanga yabo, ibicishije kuri Yesu Kristo.
None kuri wewe bimeze gute? Wiyita Umuyuda, ukishimikiza ivyagezwe vy’Imana, ukishimira ko ufitaniye imigenderanire idasanzwe n’Imana.
Urazi ivyo Imana ishaka ko ukora, kandi urazi guhitamwo iciza kuko wigishijwe ivyagezwe.
Wizigira ko uri indongozi y’impumyi, umuco w’abari mu mwijima,
umwigisha w’abatagira ico bazi, n’umumenyereza w’abakiri bato. Uzi neza ko Ivyagezwe bishobora kuguha kumenya ukuri kwose.
None, wewe ko wigisha abandi ni kuki utiyigisha nawe? Ko wigisha abandi ngo: Ntimukibe, ni kuki wiba?
Ko wigisha abantu ngo ntibasambane, ni kuki usambana? Ko uvuga ko wanka ibigirwamana, ni kuki wiba ibikoresho vyo mu ngoro zavyo?
Wishimira ko ufise ivyagezwe, ariko utukisha Imana mu kutabikurikiza.
Ni co gituma Ivyanditswe Vyera bivuga ngo: “Ni mwebwe mutukisha izina ry’Imana mu Banyamahanga.”
Umugenzo w’Abayuda wo gukebwa ufise agaciro mu gihe umuntu yumvira ivyagezwe vy’Imana, ariko igihe atavyumvira nta co aba arushije uwutigeze akebwa.
Mbega abanyamahanga batigeze bakebwa nibumvira ivyagezwe vy’Imana, ntizobemera nk’ubwoko bwayo naho batigeze bakebwa?
Mu vy’ukuri, abanyamahanga batakebwe, ariko bagakora ivyo ivyagezwe vy’Imana bivuga, bazotuma mutsindwa n’urubanza mwebwe Abayuda mwakebwe kandi mufise Ivyanditswe ariko ntimuvyumvire.
Ikigira umuntu Umuyuda w’ukuri si ugukomoka ku bavyeyi b’Abayuda gusa kandi ugukebwa nyakuri si ukwo ku mubiri.

Ahubwo Umuyuda w’ukuri ni umuntu afise umutima utunganye imbere y’Imana, kandi ugukebwa nyakuri ni ukwo mu mutima. Ico ni igikorwa ca Mpwemu w’Imana, si igikorwa c’Ivyagezwe. Umuntu nk’uwo ashimwa n’Imana aho gushimwa n’abantu.
Mbega none akamaro ko kwitwa Umuyuda ni akahe? Canke agaciro ko gukebwa ni akahe?
Mu vy’ukuri bifise ikimazi muri vyinshi. Ubwa mbere, Abayuda ni bo Imana yahaye amajambo yayo.
Ni ivy’ukuri ko bamwe muri bo batabaye abizigirwa. None ukutizigirwa kwabo kurakuraho ubwizigirwa bw’Imana?

Haba na mba! Naho abantu bose boba ababeshi, Imana yo iguma ari inyakuri. Ni co gituma Ivyanditswe Vyera bivuga ngo: “Mu vyo uvuga vyose uzokwama uboneka uri umugororotsi, kandi n’imbere y’ubucamanza uzokwama utsinda.”
Ariko bamwe bashobora kuvuga bati: Ivyaha vyacu birafise iciza, kuko vyereka abantu ukugororoka kw’Imana. None Imana ibiduhaniye ntiyoba iturenganije? (Iki ni iciyumviro c’abantu.)
Ntibishoboka ko Imana irenganya! Kuko nimba Imana itagororotse, yoshobora ite gucira imanza isi yose?
Vyoshoboka ko hari abaciyumvira bati: “None nimba ububi bwanje burushiriza kwerekana ko Imana ari inyakuri kandi bikayihesha icubahiro, ni kuki yoncira urubanza nk’umunyavyaha?”
Mbere hariho n’abatubeshera ngo tuvuga ko dukwiye gucumura cane, kugira ngo havemwo ivyiza! Abavuga ivyo bazocirwa urubanza rubakwiriye.
None tuvuge ko twebwe Abayuda twoba turi beza kurusha Abanyamahanga? Haba na mba! Kuko twamaze kwerekana ko abantu bose, baba Abayuda canke abanyamahanga, bari musi y’ububasha bw’icaha,
nk’uko handitswe ngo: “Nta muntu agororotse, nta n’umwe;
nta n’umwe atahura, kandi nta n’umwe arondera Imana.
Bose barazimiye, maze bacika imburakimazi; nta n’umwe akora iciza, nta n’umwe.”
“Imihogo yabo imeze nk’imva zirangaye, indimi zabo zivuga ibinyoma gusa.” “Ubumara bw’inzoka buri ku minwa yabo.”
“Akanwa kabo kuzuye imivumo n’umururazi.”
“Ibirenge vyabo vyirukira kuvisha amaraso;
aho baciye bahasiga imisaka n’ubworo,
kandi ntibigeze bamenya inzira z’amahoro.”
“Nta gutinya Imana kuri muri bo.”
Noneho turazi ko ivyo ivyagezwe vyigisha biraba abaganzwa na vyo, kugira ngo ntihagire uwuronka ico yireguza kandi isi yose iboneke ko ikwiye gutsindwa n’urubanza rw’Imana.
Ni co gituma ata muntu n’umwe azokwemerwa n’Imana nk’umugororotsi, abihawe no kwubahiriza ivyagezwe. Igikorwa c’ivyagezwe ni ukutwerekana ko turi abanyavyaha.
Ariko noneho, Imana yaraduhishuriye ingene dushobora kuronka ukugororoka kwayo tutisunze ivyagezwe, nk’uko Mose n’abavugishwa n’Imana babishingiye intahe mu gihe ca kera.
Ukwizera Yesu Kristo ni kwo kwonyene gutuma twemerwa n’Imana nk’abagororotsi imbere yayo. Kandi ivyo Imana ibikorera uwizera Yesu Kristo wese, ata we ikumiriye.
Kuko abantu bose baracumuye, bituma badashikira ubwiza bw’Imana.
Ariko Imana, mu buntu bwayo, itwemera nk’abagororotsi mu maso yayo biciye mu gucungurwa turonkera muri Kristo Yesu.

Imana yamutanze kugira ngo abe ikimazi, atange amaraso yiwe abe impongano y’ivyaha vy’uwo wese yemeye kumwizera. Imana yabikoze gutyo kugira ngo yerekane ukugororoka kwayo, kuko yihanganiye abantu ntiyabahanira ibigabitanyo bakoze muri kahise.
Ivyo yabikoze kugira ngo yerekane ukugororoka kwayo muri iki gihe; kandi kugira ngo yongere yerekane ubwo bugororotsi bwayo nyene, yemeye gufata abizera Yesu nk’abagororotsi.
None twokwirata iki? Nta na kimwe! Kuko kwemerwa n’Imana kwacu ntikuva ku kwubahiriza ivyagezwe, ariko kuva ku kwizera.
None rero, tuvuga ko umuntu yemerwa nk’umugororotsi imbere y’Imana biciye mu kwizera gusa, ntibiva ku kwubahiriza ivyagezwe.
Mbega, Imana ni iy’Abayuda gusa? Si n’iy’Abanyamahanga na bo? Egome, ni iy’Abanyamahanga na bo nyene.
Hari Imana imwe gusa, kandi yemera abantu ko bagororotse biciye mu kwizera, baba Abayuda canke abanyamahanga.
None dushimikiye cane ku kwizera, tuba dushaka kwirengagiza ivyagezwe? Haba na mba! Ahubwo iyo twizeye tuba twemeje yuko ivyagezwe bivuga ukuri.
Mbega none twovuga iki kuri Aburahamu sogokuruza? Yatahuye iki ku vyerekeye ingene umuntu yemerwa n’Imana nk’umugororotsi?
Iyo Aburahamu yemerwa n’Imana nk’umugororotsi kubera ibikorwa vyiza yakoze, yari kuba afise ico yirata. Ariko imbere y’Imana si ko vyagenze.
Ivyanditswe Vyera bivuga iki? Bivuga ko, “Aburahamu yizeye Imana, hanyuma ukwo kwizera kwiwe gutuma Imana imwemera nk’umugororotsi.”
Iyo umuntu akoze igikorwa, impembo bamuhemba ntiba ari ingabire, aba aronse ikintu yakoreye ategerezwa guhabwa.
Ariko Imana ntiyemera abantu ko bagororotse, kubera ibikorwa vyabo, ibemera kubera bayizeye yo iharira abanyavyaha.
Ivyo ni vyo Dawidi yavuga yerekana amahirwe y’umuntu yemewe n’Imana nk’umugororotsi, itaravye ibikorwa yakoze:
“Harahiriwe abantu Imana yababariye ibikorwa vyabo bibi; ivyaha vyabo bigaharirwa.
Harahiriwe umuntu Uhoraho atazoharurako ivyaha vyiwe.”

None, ayo mahirwe Dawidi avuga ni ay’Abayuda gusa? Oya, na mba! Ni n’ay’abanyamahanga na bo nyene. Kuko, twamaze kuvuga ko Aburahamu yizeye Imana, maze ukwo kwizera kwiwe gutuma Imana imwemera nk’umugororotsi.
Mbega none ivyo vyabaye ryari? Imana yoba yamwemeye nk’umugororotsi amaze gukebwa canke atarakebwa? Mu vy’ukuri, Imana yamwemeye nk’umugororotsi atarakebwa!

Yakebwe mu nyuma, kandi ukwo gukebwa kwiwe cari ikimenyetso cerekana ko kubera ukwizera kwiwe, Imana yari yaramaze kumwemera nk’uwugororotse imbere yuko akebwa. Gutyo, mu buryo bw’impwemu Aburahamu ni we sekuruza w’abizera bose naho boba batakebwe, kandi Imana irabemera ko bagororotse, kubera ukwizera kwabo.
Kandi mu buryo bw’impwemu, Aburahamu ni sekuruza w’abo bose bakebwe, ariko ni mu gihe bafise ukwizera nk’ukwo yari afise imbere y’uko akebwa.

Mu vy’ukuri, Imana ntiyahaye Aburahamu n’abazomukomokako bose isezerano ryo kuragwa isi kubera kwumvira ivyagezwe, ahubwo yarimuhaye kubera yayizeye, maze na yo ica imwemera nk’umugororotsi mu maso yayo.
Nimba isezerano ari iry’abumvira ivyagezwe gusa, rero ukwizera nta co kumaze kandi n’isezerano ry’Imana nta gaciro rifise.
Ivyagezwe bizana uburake bw’Imana ku wubirengako wese, kandi iyo bitahari ntihaba kubirengako.

Nuko rero, isezerano ryatanzwe kubera ukwizera kugira ngo bigaragare ko ari ingabire Imana itanga ku buntu, kandi ko rigenewe abakomoka kuri Aburahamu bose, baba abubahiriza ivyagezwe canke abizera nk’uko yizera, kuko Aburahamu ari we sekuruza w’abizera bose.

Ivyo ni vyo Ivyanditswe Vyera vyavuga igihe Imana yavuga ngo: “Nakugize sekuruza w’amahanga menshi.” Ivyo rero vyabaye kuko Aburahamu yizeye Imana ishobora kuzura n’uwapfuye, ikarema n’ibintu bishasha ibikuye mu busa.
Mbere no mu gihe vyaboneka ko ata vyizigiro bikiriho, Aburahamu we yabandanije yizera, gutyo aba sekuruza w’amahanga menshi kuko Imana yari yavuze iti: “Uko ni ko abagukomokako bazongana.”
Ico gihe yari afise hafi imyaka ijana, ariko ukwizera kwiwe ntikwigeze kugabanuka, naho umubiri wiwe wari umaze kuba akaheze, kandi na Sara akaba yasa n’utagishobora kuvyara.
Aburahamu ntiyigeze anyiganyiga mu kwizera isezerano ry’Imana, ahubwo ukwizera kwiwe kwagumye gukomera, kandi ivyo vyahesheje Imana icubahiro.
Yari azi ko Imana ishoboye gushitsa ico yasezeranye.
Ukwo kwizera kwiwe kwatumye Imana imwemera nk’umugororotsi.
Aya majambo avuga ngo: “Imana imwemera nk’umugororotsi,” ntiyanditswe ku bwiwe wenyene,
ahubwo natwe ni ayacu kuko twizeye uwazuye Umwami wacu Yesu amukuye mu bapfuye.
Uwo, Imana yaramutanze ngo apfe azira ivyaha vyacu hanyuma imuzura mu bapfuye kugira ngo atume twemerwa na yo nk’abagororotsi.
Kuva twemewe nk’abagororotsi imbere y’Imana biciye mu kwizera, dufitaniye amahoro na yo kubera igikorwa Yesu Kristo Umwami wacu yadukoreye.
Tumaze kumwizera; Kristo yadushikanye muri ubu buntu turimwo, kandi dufise umunezero no kwizigira ko tuzosangira na we ubwiza bw’Imana.
Ikigeretseko, n’iyo duciye mu mibabaro, turanezerwa kuko tuzi yuko ivyo bituma tumenyerezwa kwihangana.
Ukwihangana na kwo gutuma tugumana ubwizigirwa no mu bihe bigoye; ivyo na vyo bikadutera kugumana ivyizigiro.
Kandi, ivyo vyizigiro ntibitetereza, kuko Imana yasutse urukundo rwayo mu mitima yacu ibicishije muri Mpwemu Yera yaduhaye.
Igihe twari tukiri abanyantegenke, Kristo yaraje, aza mu gihe Imana yashinze, maze aradupfira twebwe abanyavyaha.
Gupfira umugororotsi bisanzwe bigoye; naho womenga birumvikana ko hatobura uwemera gupfira umuntu w’intungane.
Ariko, Imana yo yatweretse urukundo rwayo rwinshi mu gutuma Kristo kudupfira kandi tukiri abanyavyaha.
Ikindi, ko twemewe n’Imana nk’abagororotsi kubera amaraso ya Kristo, nta nkeka ko n’uburake bw’Imana na bwo azobudukiza.
