Kuko nimba Imana yaduhaye kwuzura na yo biciye mu rupfu rw’Umwana wayo tukiri abansi bayo, ntidukekeranya ko, ubu tumaze kwuzura na yo, tuzokizwa n’ubugingo bwiwe.
Kandi si ivyo vyonyene, ubu dufise umunezero kubera imigenderanire myiza dufitaniye n’Imana kuko Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo yatwujuje na yo.
Icaha cinjiye mw’isi giciye ku muntu umwe ari we Adamu, kandi ico caha cazanye urupfu. Ivyo vyatumye urupfu rushika ku bantu bose, kuko bose bacumuye.
Mu vy’ukuri, n’imbere y’uko Imana iha Mose Ivyagezwe, icaha cari mw’isi. Ariko Imana ntiyabibagiriza kuko ata vyagezwe vyari bwatangwe.
Yamara kuva mu gihe ca Adamu gushika mu gihe ca Mose, abantu bagumye bapfa, mbere n’abatarenze ku cagezwe bahawe n’Imana nka Adamu barapfuye. Uwo Adamu yari ishusho ya Kristo, uwari agiye kuza.

Ariko hariho itandukaniro rinini hagati y’icaha ca Adamu n’ingabire y’ubuntu bw’Imana. Ni ivy’ukuri ko abantu benshi bapfuye kubera icaha c’uwo muntu umwe. Yamara ubuntu bw’Imana n’ingabire y’imbabazi yatanze biciye ku wundi muntu, ari we Yesu Kristo, birengeye ivyo.

Ibiva mu ngabire y’ubuntu bw’Imana biratandukanye cane n’ivyavuye mu caha c’umuntu umwe kuko inyuma y’icaha ca Adamu hakurikiye gutsindwa n’urubanza, ariko ingabire y’ubuntu bw’Imana yatumye twemerwa na yo naho dufise ivyaha vyinshi bitwagira.

Ni ivy’ukuri ko kubera icaha c’umuntu umwe, urupfu rwashitse ku bantu bose. Ariko, biciye ku wundi muntu umwe, ari we Yesu Kristo, Imana yahaye abana b’abantu ivyiza birengeje: yabagiriye ubuntu butagira akagero ibemera ko bagororotse kandi yemera ko bazoganzanya na Kristo mu buzima.

Ni ukuri, nk’uko icaha c’umuntu umwe, ari we Adamu, cazaniye abantu bose gutsindwa n’urubanza, ni ko n’igikorwa kimwe co kugororoka ca Yesu cazaniye abantu bose kwemerwa n’Imana nk’abagororotsi no kuronka ubugingo.
Nk’uko umuntu umwe yanse kwumvira Imana bigatuma abantu benshi bahinduka abanyavyaha, ni ko no kwumvira Imana kw’uwundi muntu umwe, kuzotuma benshi bahinduka abagororotsi.
Ivyagezwe vyatanzwe kugira ngo abantu bose bashobore kubona ingene ari abanyavyaha. Ariko uko abantu barushirije gucumura cane, ni ko n’ubuntu bw’Imana butangaje bwarushirije kuba bwinshi.

Rero, nk’uko icaha caganje abantu bose kikabashikana ku rupfu, ni ko n’ubuntu bw’Imana butangaje bwashitse ku bantu bose bukabaha kwemerwa n’Imana nk’abagororotsi, maze bigatuma bagira ubugingo budashira bubonerwa muri Yesu Kristo Umwami wacu.
Mbega none tuvuge iki? Dushishikare gukora ivyaha kugira ngo ubuntu bw’Imana bwongerekane?
Ntibikabe! Abapfuye ku caha twoba tukikibamwo dute?
Mbega ntimuzi yuko twebwe ababatirijwe kuba umwe na Kristo Yesu, twafatanijwe na we no mu rupfu rwiwe?
Ivyo bivuga ko twapfuye hanyuma tugahambanwa na we mu kubatizwa, kugira ngo, nk’uko yazuwe mu bapfuye n’ubushobozi bw’ubwiza bwa Data, abe ari ko natwe tubaho mu bugingo bushasha.
Kandi nimba twagizwe umwe na Kristo mu rupfu rwiwe, natwe tuzozurwa nk’uko na we yazuwe.
Turazi neza ko kamere muntu kacu k’icaha kabambanywe na Kristo ku musaraba, kugira ngo inkomezi z’uwu mubiri w’icaha zihindurwe ubusa, ntituze dusubire kuba abagurano b’icaha.
Kuko iyo umuntu apfuye aba atandukanye no gukora ivyaha.
Nimba rero twarapfanye na Kristo, twizera ko tuzobanaho na we.
Turabizi neza ko Kristo yazutse mu bapfuye, kandi ntazosubira gupfa. Urupfu nta bubasha rukimufiseko.
Igihe yapfa, yapfuye rimwe rizima kugira ngo amare icaha ubushobozi. Ariko noneho ko ariho, ariho kugira ngo aheshe icubahiro Imana.
None rero, namwe nimufate ko mwapfuye, ko icaha kitakibafiseko ubushobozi, kandi ko muriho muri ab’Imana muri Kristo Yesu.
Icaha ntikikaganze mu mibiri yanyu izopfa umusi umwe, kandi ntimukumvire ivyipfuzo bibi vy’imibiri yanyu.

Ntihakagire urugingo na rumwe rw’umubiri wanyu ruheberwa icaha, ngo rube igikoresho c’ibibi. Ahubwo, mwihe Imana rwose, nk’abazutse bavuye mu bapfuye. Imibiri yanyu muyihindure ibikoresho vyo kugororoka ku bw’icubahiro c’Imana.
Icaha ntikikabaganze kuko ntimukirongorwa n’ivyagezwe, ahubwo muri musi y’ubuntu bw’Imana.
None, ko ubuntu bw’Imana bwatubohoye tukaba tutakiganzwa n’ivyagezwe, bisigura ko dushobora kubandanya dukora ivyaha? Ntibikabe!

Mbega ntimuzi ko iyo umuntu yahisemwo kuganzwa n’ikintu ahinduka umugurano waco? Umuntu ashobora kuba umugurano w’icaha, bikamushikana ku rupfu, canke agahitamwo kwumvira Imana, bikamushoboza kubaho ubuzima bugororotse.
Ariko, Imana ishimwe, kuko naho mwigeze kuba abagurano b’icaha, ubu mwarumviye n’imitima yanyu yose ukuri kuri mu nyigisho mwakiriye.
Ubu mwarabohowe ntimukiri abagurano b’icaha, ahubwo mwahindutse abagurano bo kugororoka.

Kubera intege nke za kamere muntu mufise, ndiko nkoresha imvugo isanzwe, kugira ngo mushobore kuvyumva. Kera mwari mwaratanze imibiri yanyu ngo ibe ibikoresho vy’ibiterasoni n’umugararizo, kandi ivyo vyatuma murushiriza kuba abagarariji. None rero nimwitange kugira ngo muhinduke abagurano bo kugororoka, maze mushobore kuba abera.
Igihe mwari abagurano b’icaha, mwari mufise umwidegemvyo wo gukora ibitagororotse.
Mbega none igihe mwabikora mwungutse iki, ko n’ubu mubiraba mukamaramara? Kandi ivyo bintu amaherezo yavyo ni urupfu.
Ubu rero ko mwabohotse mutakiganzwa n’icaha, mwahindutse abagurano b’Imana, inyungu yanyu ni ubuzima bwiyeguriye Imana, kandi ivyo bibashikana ku bugingo budashira.
Kuko impembo y’icaha ni urupfu, ariko ingabire Imana itanga ku buntu ni ubugingo budashira duheshwa no kwizera Kristo Yesu, Umwami wacu.
Mbega bene Data, ko mwebwe muzi ivy’amategeko, ntimuzi yuko amategeko agenga umuntu akiri muzima?
Nk’akarorero, umugore yubatse, amategeko amufatanya n’umugabo wiwe mu gihe cose uwo mugabo akiriho, ariko uwo mugabo apfuye, ayo mategeko ntaba akimumuboheyeko.

Bishitse akarongorwa n’uwundi mugabo kandi uwa mbere akiriho, bamwita umusambanyikazi. Ariko iyo umugabo wiwe wa mbere apfuye, amategeko ntaba akimubuza kurongorwa n’uwundi mugabo, kandi iyo abikoze ntaba asambanye.

Ni ko biri no kuri mwebwe, bene Data: ku bijanye n’ivyagezwe, namwe mwarapfuye, ntimukiganzwa na vyo, kuko mugize umubiri wa Kristo. Ubu rero muri ab’uwo yazutse mu bapfuye kugira ngo twamire Imana ivyamwa vyiza.
Igihe twari tukiganjwe na kamere muntu kacu ka kera, ivyipfuzo vy’ivyaha vyishimikiza ivyagezwe bigakorera mu mibiri yacu, kandi ivyo twakora vyose vyadushikana ku rupfu.

Ubu ivyagezwe ntibikituboshe, kuko twapfuye kuri vyo bikaba bitakituganza. Nuko rero dushobora gukorera Imana, atari muri bwa buryo bwa kera bwo kwumvira ivyagezwe vyanditse, ariko mu buryo bushasha bwo kuba muri Mpwemu.

Mbega none tuvuge iki? Tuvuge ko ivyagezwe ari icaha? Haba na mba! Ahubwo ivyagezwe vyatumye menya icaha ico ari co. Mu vy’ukuri sinari kwigera menya ico ari co kwipfuza, iyo ivyagezwe bitaba bivuga ngo: “Ntukipfuze.”
Kuva ubwo, icaha caciye kironka akaryo ko gukangura muri jewe ivyipfuzo vy’uburyo bwose! Iyo ivyagezwe bitaba biriho, icaha nticari kugira ubushobozi.
Kera ivyagezwe bitaraza nari muzima. Hanyuma menye ico amabwirizwa avuga icaha gica kiba kizima nanje ndapfa.
Maze nsanga ibwirizwa ryo mu vyagezwe, ryonshikanye ku bugingo rinzaniye urupfu rwo mu buryo bw’impwemu.
Icaha rero gica kironka akaryo ko kunsuka gihawe n’iryo bwirizwa, kandi gikoresheje iryo bwirizwa nyene gica kiranyica.
Ariko naho biri uko, ivyagezwe biratunganye, kandi n’amabwirizwa yavyo aratunganye, aragororotse kandi ni meza.

None ivyo bishoboka gute? Mbega ikintu ciza conzanira urupfu? Haba na mba! Icaha cakoresheje ikintu ciza mu ntumbero yo kunyica. Ivyo vyerekana ingene icaha ari kibi, kuko gikoresha n’amabwirizwa meza y’Imana mu gukora ikibi.
Ivyagezwe ubwavyo ni ivy’impwemu, ariko jewe ndi umuntu w’umunyantege nke ajakariye icaha.
Nanje ubwanje sinitahura, kuko ivyo nipfuza gukora si vyo nkora, ahubwo nsanga nakoze ivyo nanka.
None rero iyo nkoze ivyo ntashaka gukora, mba nemeje ko ivyagezwe ari vyiza.
Kandi ko nkora ivyo ntashaka, vyerekana ko atari jewe ndabikora, ariko ko ari icaha kiba muri jewe.
Ndazi neza ko, muri kamere kanje k’icaha ata ciza kimbamwo, kuko naho nipfuza gukora ibigororotse, sindabishobora.
Mu vy’ukuri, ivyiza ngomba gukora si vyo nkora, ahubwo ibibi ntagomba gukora nsanga ari vyo nakoze.
Iyo nkoze ivyo ntagomba, bisigura ko atari jewe ndabikora, ariko ko ari icaha kiba muri jewe kibinkoresha.
Nasanze hari icagezwe kimbamwo: iyo ngomba gukora ivyiza, nsanga nakoze ibibi.
Ndakunda ivyagezwe vy’Imana n’umutima wanje wose.
Ariko, hariho ikindi cagezwe kigwanya ico umutima wanje wemera. Ico na co, kingira imbohe y’icagezwe c’icaha gikorera mu mubiri wanje.
Ewe jewe ndagowe! Ni nde azombohora uwu mubiri unjana mu rupfu?
Imana ishimwe yo imbohora biciye muri Yesu Kristo Umwami wacu! Nuko rero, mu mutima wanje ndipfuza cane kwumvira ivyagezwe vy’Imana, ariko muri kamere muntu kanje njakariye icagezwe c’icaha.
Ubu rero, abari muri Kristo Yesu nta rubanza rukibatsinda.
Kuko icagezwe ca Mpwemu atanga ubugingo carambohoye biciye muri Kristo Yesu, kinkurako icagezwe c’icaha n’ic’urupfu.

Ivyagezwe vya Mose ntivyashobora gukora ivyo, kubera intege nke za kamere kacu k’icaha. Ico ivyagezwe bitashoboye gukora, Imana yagikoze mu gutuma Umwana wayo, yaje afise umubiri nk’uw’umunyavyaha kugira ngo abe ikimazi c’ivyaha. Kandi muri uwo mubiri, Imana irangiza ububasha icaha cari kidufiseko mu kuwutanga nk’ikimazi c’ivyaha vyacu; gutyo icira urubanza icaha mu mubiri.
Ivyo yabikoze kugira ngo dushobore gushitsa ivyo ivyagezwe bisaba, kuko tutakirongorwa na kamere kacu k’icaha, ariko turongorwa na Mpwemu.
Abarongorwa na kamere kabo k’icaha bashira imitima ku vyipfuzo vy’umubiri, ariko abarongorwa na Mpwemu Yera, bashira imitima ku vyo Mpwemu agomba.
Kurongorwa na kamere k’icaha bijana mu rupfu. Ariko kurongorwa na Mpwemu bishikana ku bugingo n’amahoro.
Kuko abaganzwa na kamere k’icaha ni abansi b’Imana. Ntibumvira ivyagezwe vyayo, kandi nta bushobozi bafise bwo kuvyumvira.
Ni co gituma abarongorwa na kamere kabo k’icaha badashobora guhimbara Imana na gatoya.
Ariko mweho, ntimurongorwa na kamere k’icaha, murongorwa na Mpwemu, nimba Mpwemu w’Imana aba muri mwebwe. Kandi umuntu wese adafise Mpwemu wa Kristo, si uwa Kristo.
Ariko nimba Kristo aba muri mwebwe, naho imibiri yanyu izopfa kubera icaha, Mpwemu ni we abaha ubugingo kuko mwemewe n’Imana nk’abagororotsi.
Nimba Mpwemu w’Imana yazuye Kristo mu bapfuye aba muri mwebwe, nta kabuza ko Imana izoha imibiri yanyu ipfa ubugingo, biciye muri Mpwemu wayo aba muri mwebwe.
Kubera ivyo rero bene Data, ntidutegerezwa gukora ivyo kamere kacu k’icaha kadutegeka gukora.
Kuko nimba murongorwa na kamere kanyu k’icaha muzopfa, ariko nimba Mpwemu yarabashoboje kwica ibikorwa bibi vya kamere muntu kanyu ka kera, muzobaho.
Abarongorwa na Mpwemu w’Imana bose ni bo bana b’Imana;
kuko Mpwemu mwahawe atari uwo kubagira abagurano ngo mwongere gutinya; ahubwo mwakiriye Mpwemu abagira abana b’Imana. Uwo ni we atuma dusemerera, tukabwira Imana tuti: “Aba, Data.”
Kuko Mpwemu ubwiwe avugana n’impwemu yacu akatwemeza ko turi abana b’Imana.
Kandi ko turi abana, turi n’abaragwa: turi abaragwa b’Imana, abaraganwa na Kristo. Ariko nimba dushaka gusangira na we ubwiza bwiwe, dutegerezwa gusangira n’umubabaro wiwe na wo.
Niyumvira ko imibabaro turimwo ata ho ihuriye na gatoya n’ubwiza tuzohishurirwa,
kandi ivyaremwe vyose birindiranye igishika igihe Imana izohishura abana bayo.
Kuko ivyaremwe vyose vyisanze musi y’umuvumo w’Imana, naho bitabihisemwo. Ariko bifise ivyizigiro
ko na vyo nyene bizobohorwa bikava mu buja bwo kubora, bigahabwa ku bwiza n’umwidegemvyo vy’abana b’Imana.
Kugeza n’ubu ivyaremwe vyose binihishwa n’umubabaro nk’umuvyeyi ari ku bise.

Ariko si vyo vyonyene biniha; natwe abizera, naho dufise Mpwemu Yera muri twebwe nk’ivyeze ubwa mbere vy’ubwiza tuzohabwa, turaniha mu mitima yacu kuko turindiranye igishika kugirwa abana b’Imana bwegu, ari kwo gucungurwa kw’imibiri yacu.
Ivyo ni vyo twiteze kuva dukijijwe. Iyo icari citezwe kibonetse, kwitega kuba kurangiye. None hari umuntu yokwitega ico yamaze kubona?
Ariko ko twiteze ivyo tutarabona, dutegerezwa kubirindira twihanganye.
Kandi Mpwemu Yera ni we adufasha mu ntege nke zacu. Mu vy’ukuri ntituzi ico dukwiye gusengera, ariko Mpwemu Yera aradusengera aniha iminiho idashobora gusigurwa n’amajambo.
Kandi Imana isuzuma imitima, iramenya neza ico Mpwemu yiyumvira, kuko Mpwemu adusengera twebwe abejejwe nk’uko Imana igomba.
Kandi turazi ko muri vyose Imana ikora ishakira ineza abayikunda, abo yahamagaye nk’uko biri mu mugambi wayo.
Kuko Imana yabamenye kera, ibatoraniriza gusa n’Umwana wayo imbere y’igihe, kugira ngo abe imfura muri bene Se benshi.
Abo yatoranije kera, yarabahamagaye; abo yahamagaye, yabahinduye abagororotsi; abo yahinduye abagororotsi, yabahaye ubwiza.
Mbega none tuvuge iki? Nimba Imana iri mu ruhande rwacu, ni nde yodutsinda?
Ko itimanye Umwana wayo bwite, ariko ikamutanga ku bwacu twese, mbega ntizorushiriza kutugabira vyose hamwe na we?
Ni nde azorega abo Imana yatoranije? Nta n’umwe, kuko Imana ni yo ibahindura abagororotsi.
None ni nde azobatsindisha? Nta n’umwe, kuko Kristo Yesu yadupfiriye, ikigeretseko yarazutse ku bwacu, ubu yicaye mu kibanza c’iteka i buryo bw’Imana kandi aradusengera.
Ni nde yodutandukanya n’urukundo rwa Kristo? Mbega ni ivyago, canke ni imibabaro, canke ni uguhamwa, canke ni inzara, canke ni ubukene, canke ni kuba mw’irinde, canke ni urupfu?
Nk’uko Ivyanditswe Vyera bivuga ngo: “Kubera wewe, twama tugeramiwe n’urupfu umwanya wose; dufatwa nk’intama zijanywe kubagwa.”
Ariko naho bimeze uko, dufise intsinzi yuzuye ku bwa Kristo yadukunze.
Kandi ndizera neza ntakekeranya ko ata kintu na kimwe codutandukanya n’urukundo rw’Imana. Nta rupfu canke ubugingo, nta bamarayika canke abatware, nta biriho canke ibizoza, nta bushobozi na bumwe,
bwaba ubwo mw’ijuru canke ubwo kw’isi, nta na kimwe mu vyaremwe vyose codutandukanya n’urukundo rw’Imana rwahishuriwe muri Kristo Yesu, Umwami wacu.
Mvuga ukuri nk’uwa Kristo simbesha; ijwi ryo mu mutima wanje na Mpwemu Yera biranshingira intahe:
umutima wanje wuzuye intuntu n’umubabaro udahera
ku bwa benewacu b’Abayuda. Nopfuma mba ikivume ngatandukana na Kristo, nimba ivyo vyotuma abo mu bwoko bwanje bakizwa.
Abo mvuga ni Abisirayeli: Imana yabagize abana bayo, ibahishurira ubwiza bwayo, igiriranira amasezerano na bo, ibaha n’ivyagezwe vyayo. Yabahaye kandi ibakwe ryo kuyisenga ibaha n’amasezerano yayo.
Ba sekuruza babo ni Abaheburayo ba rurangiranwa; mu buryo bw’umubiri, Yesu Kristo ubwiwe akomoka muri ubwo bwoko kandi uwo ni we Mana iri hejuru ya vyose, akwiye gushimwa ibihe vyose. Amen.
Ivyo ntibisigura ko ivyo Imana yasezeraniye Abisirayeli vyabaye impfagusa. Haba na mba! Kuko abavukiye mw’ihanga rya Isirayeli bose si Abisirayeli.
Kandi abakomoka kuri Aburahamu bose, ntibaca baba uruvyaro rwiwe nyakuri. Kuko Ivyanditswe Vyera bivuga ngo: “Uruvyaro nagusezeraniye uzoruronka biciye muri Isaka.”
Ibi bisigura ko abavutse mu buryo bw’umubiri atari bo bana b’Imana, ahubwo abavutse mu buryo bw’isezerano ni bo bana ba Aburahamu.
Imana ni yo yatanze isezerano iravuga iti: “Umwaka ugeze aha uwu ugeze, nzogaruka kandi Sara azoba afise umwana w’umuhungu.”
Uwo mwana ni sogokuruza wacu Isaka. Igihe yarongora Rebeka yamuvyayeko abana babiri b’amahasa.
Ariko imbere y’uko bavuka, batarakora ikibi canke iciza, aronka ijambo rivuye ku Mana. Iryo jambo ryavuga ko Imana itoranya abantu ikurikije intumbero yayo, itaravye ibikorwa vyabo.
Yamubwiye iti: “Bukuru azokorera Butoyi.” Ivyo yabivuze imbere y’uko bavuka;
nk’uko Ivyanditswe Vyera bivuga ngo: “Nahisemwo gukunda Yakobo, ndamurutisha Esawu.”
None ivyo bivuga ko Imana irenganya? Haba na mba!
Kuko Imana yabariye Mose iti: “Nzogirira imbabazi uwo nzozigirira, kandi nzogirira impuhwe uwo nzozigirira.”
Nuko rero, ni Imana ihitamwo uwo igirira imbabazi. Ntidushobora kubihitamwo canke ngo tubikorere.
Kuko Ivyanditswe Vyera biravuga kuri Farawo, umwami wa Egiputa ngo: “Naguhisemwo kugira ngo nerekanire kuri wewe ubushobozi bwanje kandi kugira ngo izina ryanje rimenyekane kw’isi yose.”
Nuko rero, Imana ihitamwo kwerekana imbabazi zayo ku bo igomba kuzerekanirako, kandi igahitamwo gukomantaza imitima y’abo igomvye.
Urashobora kuvuga uti: “Nimba ibintu bimeze gutyo, ni kuki Imana ivuga ko abantu batayumvira? Mbega ni nde ashobora kwanka ugushaka kwayo?”
Ariko none uri nde wewe ngo uharirize Imana? Mbega ikibumbano cobwira uwakibumvye kiti: “Ni kuki wambumvye gutya?”
Mbega umubumvyi ntafise uburenganzira bwo kubumba mw’ibumba rimwe inkono ishobora gukoreshwa ivy’iteka, n’iyindi igenewe ibikorwa bisanzwe?
N’Imana na yo, naho ifise uburenganzira bwo kwerekana uburake n’ubushobozi bwayo, irihanganira cane abantu bategerezwa kurandurwa n’uburake bwayo.
Ivyo ibikora kugira ngo ubutunzi bw’ubwiza bwayo burushirize gukayanganira abo yerekanirako imbabazi zayo, bateguriwe ubwo bwiza kuva kera.
Kandi natwe turi muri abo yatoranije, bamwe ibakuye mu Bayuda abandi ibakuye mu Banyamahanga.
Imana yaravugishije Hoseya ku vyerekeye abanyamahanga iti: “Abantu batahora ari abantu banje, nzobita abantu banje; kandi abo ntahora nkunda, nzobakunda”;
mbere, “Mu kibanza babwiriwemwo ngo: ‘Ntimuri abantu banje,’ ni ho bazobwirirwa ngo: ‘Muri abana b’Imana nzima.’ ”
Ku vyerekeye Isirayeli, Yesaya yarasemereye aravuga ati: “Naho Abisirayeli ari benshi bangana n’umusenyi wo kw’isesero ry’ikiyaga, bakeya gusa ni bo bazorokoka.
Kuko Uhoraho azoshitsa kuri iyi si ivyo yavuze avyuzuze rwose kandi ningoga.”
Kandi ivyo Yesaya yari yarabivugishijwe imbere y’aho ati: “Iyo Uhoraho Mushoboravyose atadusigariza abadukomokako bakeya; tuba twararanduwe nk’ab’i Sodomu, tuba twaraherengetejwe nk’ab’i Gomora.”
Mbega ivyo bisigura iki? Bivuga ko Abanyamahanga batigeze barondera ukugororoka, bakuronse baguhawe n’ukwizera.
Ariko Abisirayeli bagerageje cane kwemerwa n’Imana mu gukurikiza ivyagezwe, ntibigeze babishikako.
Ni kuki bitashoboka? Kuko baguma barondera kwemerwa n’Imana mu kugerageza kwumvira ivyagezwe aho kwizera Imana. Uko ni ko batsitaye kuri rya buye ritsitaza,
iryo Ivyanditswe Vyera bivugako ngo: “Ehe ndashira i Siyoni ibuye ritsitaza, n’urutare rugwisha. Ariko uwumwizera ntazokwigera amaramara.”
Bene Data, ico umutima wanje wipfuza cane kandi nsaba Imana, ni uko Abisirayeli bokizwa.
Ndashobora gushinga intahe yuko bafise ishaka ryinshi mu vy’Imana, ariko iryo shaka ryabo ntirihagaze ku bumenyi nyakuri.
Kuko batatahuye inzira ituma abantu bemerwa n’Imana nk’abagororotsi, bakanka no kwisunga iyo nzira, baciye bicira inzira yabo yo kwemerwa n’Imana mu kugerageza kwubahiriza ivyagezwe.
Mu vy’ukuri Kristo yashikije intumbero ivyagezwe vyari vyarashiriweho. Ni co gituma umuntu wese amwizeye aca yemerwa n’Imana nk’umugororotsi.
Kuko Mose yanditse avuga ati: “Umuntu ashaka kwemerwa n’Imana nk’umugororotsi yisunze ivyagezwe, azobeshwaho na vyo.”
Ariko ukwemerwa n’Imana nk’umugororotsi biciye mu nzira yo kwizera kuvuga kuti: “Ntukibaze mu mutima ngo mbega ni nde azoduga mw’ijuru?” (bisigura, kuzana Kristo kw’isi)
canke ngo: “Ni nde azomanuka i kuzimu iyo abapfuye bari?” (bisigura: kuzura Kristo mu bapfuye).
Kuko Ivyanditswe Vyera bivuga biti: “Ijambo riri hafi yawe; mbere riri mu kanwa kawe no mu mutima wawe.” Iryo jambo ni bwo Butumwa bwo kwizera tuvuga.
Niwaturisha akanwa kawe ko Yesu ari Umwami, ukizera mu mutima wawe ko Imana yamuzuye mu bapfuye, uzokizwa.
Kuko umuntu yizeye mu mutima aca yemerwa n’Imana nk’umugororotsi, kandi iyo yatuje akanwa kiwe bituma akizwa.
Ivyanditswe Vyera bivuga biti: “Umuntu wese amwizera ntazokwigera amaramara.”
Kandi kuri ivyo, nta tandukaniro riri hagati y’Abayuda n’abanyamahanga, kuko bose bafise Umwami umwe kandi atanga cane agahaza ivyiza uwumwambaje wese.
Kuko “Umuntu wese azokwambaza izina ry’Uhoraho azokizwa.”
None abantu bokwambaza bate uwo batarizera? Kandi bomwizera bate batarumva ivyiwe? Canke bokwumva ivyiwe bate ata wubibabwiye?
Mbega hoho abantu bovuga ivyiwe bate ata wabatumye? Ni co gituma Ivyanditswe Vyera bivuga ngo: “Ese ukuntu ibirenge vy’abazanye Ubutumwa Bwiza ari vyiza!”
Ariko rero si abantu bose bemera kwakira Ubutumwa Bwiza, kuko Yesaya yavugishijwe ngo: “Mwami ni nde yizeye Ubutumwa Bwiza twavuze?”
Mu vy’ukuri ukwizera kuzanwa no kwumva Ubutumwa Bwiza, ari ryo jambo rya Kristo.

Ariko rero ndabaza: mbega none Abayuda iryo jambo nta ryo bumvise? Egome cane bararyumvise! Kuko Ivyanditswe Vyera bivuga ngo: “Ijwi ryavyo ryumvikanye mw’isi yose; kandi ivyo yavuze vyashitse ku mpera z’isi.”

Nkongera nkabaza: Mbega Abisirayeli ntibigeze baritahura? Egome cane bararitahuye, kuko Mose ari we yabanje kuvuga ati: “Nzobateza kwipfuza ivy’abantu batari babereye no kwitwa ihanga; ndabateze kugirira ishari ihanga ritagira n’ugutahura.”
Mu nyuma, Yesaya na we yavuze ashize amanga ati: “Nabonywe n’abatariko baranandondera, niyereka abatariko baranabaza ivyanje.”
Ariko ku vyerekeye Isirayeli, Imana yaravuze iti: “Umusi wose niriwe nshanje amaboko, ndayategeye ubwoko butumvira kandi bw’intagondwa.”
Ndongera nkibaza nti: Mbega Imana yoba yarahevye abantu bayo ari bo Bisirayeli? Haba na mba! Jewe ubwanje ndi Umwisirayeli, uruvyaro rwa Aburahamu, nkaba nkomoka mu muryango wa Benyamini.
Imana ntiyahevye abantu bayo yatoranije kuva kera. Mbega murazi ico Ivyanditswe Vyera bivuga kuri ivyo? Uwavugishwa n’Imana Eliya yareze Abisirayeli ku Mana ati:
“Uhoraho, bishe abavugishwa bawe, basangangura n’ibicaniro vyawe. Ni jewe jenyene nsigaye kandi nanje bariko barandondera ngo banyice.”
Mbega inyishu y’Imana yabaye iyihe? Yamubwiye iti: “Naribikiye abantu ibihumbi indwi batigeze bapfukamira ikigirwamana Bayali ngo bagisenge.”
No muri kino gihe ni ko bimeze, harasigaye Abisirayeli bakeya bakiri abizigirwa kuko ubuntu bw’Imana bwabazigamye.
Ivyo vyavuye ku buntu bw’Imana gusa, ntivyavuye ku bikorwa vyiza bakoze. Kuko, iyo biba vyavuye ku bikorwa vyiza bakoze, ubuntu bw’Imana ntibwoba bukibaye ubuntu vy’ukuri.

Mbega ivyo bisigura iki? Bivuga ko benshi mu Bisirayeli bataronse kwemerwa n’Imana naho babironderana ishaka ryinshi. Ni abantu bakeya gusa batoranijwe n’Imana babironse, ariko imitima y’abandi yashishikaye gukomantara,
nk’uko Ivyanditswe Vyera bivuga ngo: “Imana yabahinduye ibiyingiyingi; bafise amaso ariko ntibabona, bafise amatwi ariko ntibumva, gushika n’uno musi.”
Dawidi na we yavuze, ati: “Reka indya zo ku meza yabo zibabere umutego n’ikinogo co kugwamwo, ibuye ritsitaza n’ingero bakwiranye.
Reka amaso yabo ahume ntibashobore kubona, n’imigongo yabo yame ihetamye ibihe vyose!”

Nuko rero ndabaza: None abantu b’Imana baratsitaye bagwa ubutakivyuka? Haba na mba! Ariko kugwa kwabo kwatumye agakiza gashikira Abanyamahanga, kugira ngo bibatere kugira ishari, maze bipfuze ako gakiza na bo.
Nimba kutumvira kwabo kwatungishije isi kandi nimba Abanyamahanga bahawe umugisha n’uko Abisirayeli banse agakiza, iyumvire ingene isi izohezagirwa igihe bazohindukirira Imana n’imitima yabo yose.
Ni mwebwe Banyamahanga ndiko ndabwira kuko Imana yampamagariye kuba intumwa mu Banyamahanga. Ico gikorwa ndakinezererewe,
kugira ngo ntume Abisirayeli bagirira ishari ico mwebwe abanyamahanga mufise, bikunze ndokore bamwe muri bo.
Kuko nimba kwigizwayo kwabo kwazaniye agakiza abo kw’isi bose, mbega kwemerwa kwabo ntikuzozana ivyiza birushirije? Bizomera nko gusubiza ubuzima abari barapfuye!
Nimba ikimanyu c’umukate cashikaniwe Imana nk’ivyeze ubwa mbere cejejwe, umukate wose uba wejejwe; kandi nimba imizi y’igiti yejejwe, n’amashami na yo nyene aba yejejwe.

Mwebwe abanyamahanga, mugereranywa n’amashami y’igiti c’umwelayo wo mw’ishamba, yatewe ku giti c’umwelayo wo mu murima. Mwasubiriye amwe mu mashami yaco yaciwe, muca musangira n’ayasigaye ingaburo iva mu mizi y’uwo mwelayo w’umurimano.
Nuko rero, ntimukishime kuri ayo mashami yaciwe, kuko mwebwe muri amashami gusa, ntimuri imizi. Imizi ni yo ibashigikiye.
Ariko urashobora kuvuga uti: “Erega ayo mashami y’ukuri yaciwe kugira ngo nterwe mu kibanza cayo.”
Ukwo ni ukuri. Ariko wibuke ko ayo mashami yaciwe kubera ukutizera, kandi nawe uhagumijwe n’ukwizera. Rero, ntiwishime ahubwo utinye.
Kuko nimba Imana itihanganiye Abayuda bagereranywa n’amashami y’ukuri, na wewe yohava itakwihanganira.

Raba rero ingene Imana igira neza, ariko kandi igahambara: yahambariye abaguye, ariko wewe ikugirira ubuntu, nimba ushishikara kugendera muri ukwo kugira neza kwayo. Bitari ukwo, na wewe uzocibwa nta kabuza.
Kandi Abisirayeli nibemera guhindukira bakava mu kutizera kwabo, bazosubira baterwe ku giti bahozeko, kuko Imana irashoboye kubikora.

Mu vy’ukuri, wewe muri kamere muntu kawe umeze nk’ishami ry’umwelayo wo mw’ishamba. Nimba rero Imana yakoze ikintu kinyuranye n’uko ibintu bisanzwe bimeze, ikemera kugutera ku mwelayo wo mu murima, bizoyorohera cane gusubiza amashami y’ukuri aho yahoze?

Bene Data, ndagomba ko mumenya iri banga ngira ndababwire kugira ngo bibarinde ubwibone. Bamwe mu Bisirayeli bafise imitima ikomantaye, ariko ivyo bizorangira igitigiri c’Abanyamahanga binjira mu gakiza gikwiye.
Ico gihe, Abisirayeli bose bazokizwa, nk’uko handitswe ngo: “Umurokozi azova i Siyoni, kandi azohindura aba Yakobo abakure mu kutubaha Imana.
Iri ni ryo sezerano nzobashitsako ninabakurako ibicumuro vyabo.”

Benshi mu Bisirayeli ubu ni abansi b’Ubutumwa Bwiza, kandi ivyo bizanira inyungu mwebwe abanyamahanga. Ariko, ku bijanye no gutoranywa, iracabakunda kubera ba Sekuruza babo Aburahamu, Isaka na Yakobo.
Kuko Imana idasubira ku ngabire yatanze canke ngo ihebe abo yatoranije,
nk’uko namwe abanyamahanga mwigeze kuba mu mugararizo, mutumvira Imana, ariko ubu mukaba mwaragiriwe imbabazi kubera Abisirayeli bagararije.
Babaye abagarariji, kugira ngo nk’uko namwe mwagiriwe imbabazi, na bo baze bazigirirwe.
Kuko abantu bose baragararije Imana, bituma ibafata nk’imbohe. Ivyo ibikora kugira ngo ibagirire imbabazi bose.
Mbega ubwinshi bw’ubwenge n’ubumenyi vy’Imana! Ingingo ifata ntizitahurika kandi inzira zayo ntizimenyekana.
“Ni nde yigeze amenya ivyiyumviro vy’Uhoraho? Canke ni nde yayibereye umujenama?”
“Hari uwoba yarigeze kugurana Imana kugira ngo ize imwishure?”
Vyose ni yo ibitanga, bibeshejweho n’ubushobozi bwayo kandi biriho kugira ngo biyiheshe icubahiro. Icubahiro cose kibe icayo ibihe vyose! Amen.

None rero bene Data, kubera izo mbabazi nyinshi Imana yatugiriye, ndabinginga ngo mushikanire Imana imibiri yanyu nk’ibimazi bifise ubugingo, vyejejwe kandi biyihimbara. Uko ni ko kuyisenga kwanyu kwoyihimbara.

Ntimukigane inyifato n’imigenzo y’isi ya kino gihe, ariko mureke Imana ibahindure rwose mu kubaha ukwiyumvira gushasha. Aho ni ho muzoshobora gutahura ivyo Imana ibagombako, kuko ni vyo vyiza, ni vyo biyihimbara kandi ni vyo bitunganye rwose.

Nisunze ubuntu nahawe n’Imana, ndahanuye umuntu wese muri mwebwe ngo ntiyifate uko atari mu kwiyumvira ko ari uwuhambaye, ariko yicishe bugufi mu kwifata uko ari, yisunze urugero rwo kwizera Imana yamuhaye.
Nk’uko iyi mibiri yacu ifise ibihimba bitandukanye kandi ivyo bihimba bigakora ibikorwa bitandukanye,
ni ko no mu mubiri wa Kristo bimeze: turi ibihimba vyinshi bigize umubiri umwe, kandi kuri wo, twese tuba dufatanye.
Dufise ingabire zitandukanye, bivanye n’ubuntu Imana yatugiriye. Nimba ufise ingabire yo kuvugishwa n’Imana, ubikore ukurikije ukwizera wahawe.
Nimba ingabire yawe ari ugufasha abandi, ubikore neza. Nimba ingabire yawe ari ukwigisha, igisha neza.

Nimba wahawe ingabire yo gutera intege abandi, ube uwutera intege koko. Nimba wahawe ingabire yo gutanga, tangana umutima ubikunze. Nimba wahawe kurongora abandi, ubikorane umwete. Nimba wahawe ingabire yo kugira impuhwe, uzigire unezerewe.
Urukundo rwanyu ntirube urw’agahemo. Mwanke ibibi, mwumire ku vyiza.
Urukundo rwanyu rurangwe no kugiriranira igishika nk’abavukana, kandi umuntu wese anezerezwe no gushira imbere mugenziwe.
Ntimukabe abanebwe, ahubwo mwamane umwete mu mitima yanyu wo gukorera Umwami Imana.
Ivyizigiro vyanyu bitume mugumana umunezero. Mwihanganire imibabaro kandi mushishikare gusenga.
Mufashe bene Data mu vyo bakenye kandi mwakirane hagati yanyu.
Muhezagire ababagirira nabi, ntimubavume ahubwo mubahezagire.
Abanezerewe, munezeranwe na bo, abarira murirane na bo.
Mubane amahoro n’abandi. Ntimukishire hejuru, ahubwo munezerezwe no kwifatanya n’abaciye bugufi. Ntimukiyite abanyabwenge.
Ntimukishure inabi uwayibagiriye. Ahubwo mwitwararike gukora ivyiza mu maso y’abantu bose.
Nimba bishoboka, igihe cose vyoba biva kuri mwebwe, mubane amahoro n’abantu bose.
Abo nkunda, ntimukihore uwubagiriye nabi, ariko mubirekere uburake bw’Imana, kuko handitswe ngo: “Uguhora ni ukwanje, ni jewe nzokwishura umuntu ibikwiranye n’ivyo yakoze.”
Vyongerako ngo: “Umwansi wawe niyasonza, uramugaburira; niyanyoterwa umuhe ico kunywa. Niwakora uko, uzoba umusutse amakara yaka ku mutwe.”
Ikibi ntikikakuneshe ngo abe ari co ukora, ariko ukinesheshe gukora iciza.
Umuntu wese akwiye kwubaha abategetsi, kuko ata butegetsi na bumwe bubaho Imana itabushizeho. Ubutegetsi buriho bwashizweho n’Imana.
Ni co gituma, umuntu wese agarariza ubutegetsi, aba agararije urutonde rw’Imana, kandi uwukoze ivyo aba yikwegeye gutsindwa n’urubanza.
Kuko abatware ntibateye ubwoba ku bakora ibibereye, ahubwo bateye ubwoba ku bakora ibibi. Woba ugomba kutagira ubwoba imbere y’abategetsi? Kora ibibereye bazogushimira.
Kuko abategetsi ni abakozi batumwe n’Imana ku neza yawe. Ariko nimba ukora ibibi, birumvikana ko utegerezwa gutinya, kuko bafise ububasha bwo kuguhana. Ni abakozi Imana yatumye guhana inkozi z’ibibi.
Ni co gituma ubwirizwa kubumvira, atari mu ntumbero yo kugira ngo ntuhanwe, ariko kandi kubera ijwi ryo mu mutima ribidutegeka.
Ni co gituma ukwiye gutanga ikori neza, kuko abategetsi baba bariko barakorera Imana iyo barangura igikorwa cabo co gutegeka.
Uhe umuntu wese ivyo akwiriye guhabwa: abakwiriye guhabwa amakori mubahe amakori, uwukwiriye gutinywa mumutinye, uwukwiriye iteka mumutere iteka.
Ntihagire umwenda mugirira umuntu n’umwe, kiretse uwo gukundana, kuko uwukunda abandi, aba ashikije ivyagezwe.
Amabwirizwa avuga ngo: “Ntugasambane; ntukice; ntukibe; ntukipfuze ivy’abandi,” hamwe n’ayandi nk’ayo akoranirijwe muri iri rimwe rivuga ngo: “Ukunde mugenzawe nk’uko wikunda.”
Uwukunda nta kibi na kimwe yogirira uwo akunda. Uwukunda, aba ashikije ivyagezwe vyose.
Kandi ivyo mukwiye kubishishikara kuko muzi igihe tugezemwo. Iki ni igihe co kwikangura, kuko agakiza kacu katwegereye kurusha ca gihe twatangura kwizera.
Ijoro riritereye, bugira buce. Kubera ivyo, twiyambure ibikorwa vy’umwijima, twambare ibigwanisho vy’umuco.
Twigenze neza nk’abagenda ku murango. Twirinde kudandahirwa no kuborerwa. Twirinde ubusambanyi no kugendera mu biteye isoni. Twirinde gutongana no kugiriranira ishari.
Ahubwo, murondere gusa n’Umwami Yesu Kristo, aho kwitaho imibiri yanyu ngo mushitse ivyo yipfuza.
Mwakire mwene Data wundi atarakomera mu kwizera, ntimumucire urubanza ku vyo atarasobanukirwa neza.
Nk’akarorero, uwukomeye mu kwizera ashobora kurya indya zose. Uwundi na we, kubera atarakomera mu kwizera, agahitamwo kurya imboga gusa.
Uwushobora kurya indya zose, ntakwiye gukengera uwutarya zose, kandi uwutarya indya zose, ntakwiye gukengera uwurya zose, kuko na we nyene Imana yaramwakiriye.
Uri nde wewe ucira imanza umukozi w’uwundi muntu? Akoze neza canke nabi, ivyo biraba shebuja. Kandi noneho azokora neza kuko Umwami Imana afise ubushobozi bwo kumukomeza.
No ku vyerekeye imisi, hari uwiyumvira ko hari umusi wejejwe kuruta iyindi, uwundi akiyumvira ko yose ingana ku bijanye no gusenga Imana. Umuntu wese akwiye kumenya neza ivyo yizera ku giti ciwe.

Uwubahiriza umusi kanaka abikora ahesha icubahiro Imana. Uwurya indya zose abikora ahesha icubahiro Imana, kuko abikora ayishimira. N’uwirinda kurya bimwebimwe na we nyene abikora ahesha icubahiro Imana kandi abiyishimira.
Erega nta muntu n’umwe muri twebwe abaho canke apfa ku bwiwe.
Nimba turiho, tubayeho kugira ngo duheshe icubahiro Umwami Imana. Kandi nimba dupfuye, dupfa kugira ngo duheshe icubahiro Umwami Imana. Nuko rero turiho canke dupfuye, tuguma turi ab’Umwami Imana.
Kuko icatumye Kristo apfa akazuka ni ukugira ngo abe umwami w’abazima n’abapfuye.
None wewe ni kuki ucira imanza mwene Data wundi? Canke ni kuki umukengera? Wibuke ko twese tuzohagarara imbere y’intebe y’imanza y’Imana.
Ivyanditswe Vyera bivuga biti: “ ‘Ndahiye ukubaho kwanje,’ ni ko Uhoraho avuze, ‘amavi yose azompfukamira; n’indimi zose zizokwatura ko ndi Imana.’ ”
Nuko rero, umuntu wese muri twebwe azokwisigura imbere y’Imana ku bijanye n’ubuzima bwiwe kw’isi.
Twirinde rero guciranira imanza. Ahubwo, twigire inama yo kutagira ikintu na kimwe dukora cotsitaza canke kikagwisha mu caha mwene Data wundi.
Ndazi neza ntakekeranya, nemejwe n’Umwami Yesu, ko ata kintu na kimwe gihumanye ubwaco. Ariko nimba hariho umuntu yiyumvira ko ikintu kanaka gihumanye, ico kintu gicika igihumanye kuri we.
Iyo ivyo urya bitsitaza mwene Data wundi, hanyuma ugashishikara ubirya, ntuba ukiriko uragendera mu rukundo. Ntukemere rero ko indya urya zituma uwo Kristo yapfiriye akora icaha akaranduka.
Wirinde kugira ngo ico ukoze ubona ko ari ciza coye gutukwa n’abantu.
Kuko igihambaye mu Bwami bw’Imana si ukurya no kunywa, ahubwo ni ubuzima bugororotse, amahoro n’umunezero bitangwa na Mpwemu Yera.
Iyo umuntu akorera Kristo ameze gutyo, ahimbara Imana kandi akemerwa n’abantu.
None rero, muze turonderane umwete kubana amahoro no gukomezanya hagati yacu.
Ntugasambure igikorwa c’Imana kubera ivyokurya. Mu vy’ukuri, nta co kurya na kimwe gihumanye, ariko ni bibi kurya indya zituma mwene Data wundi agwa mu caha.
Ni vyiza kutarya inyama canke kutanywa umuvinyu canke kudakora ikindi kintu na kimwe cotuma mwene Data wundi agwa mu caha.
Ico wizera kuri ivyo kibe hagati yawe n’Imana gusa. Harahiriwe umuntu akora ikintu yumva ko ari ic’ukuri ata jwi rimwagiriza mu mutima.

Ariko iyo umuntu agikekeranya ku bijanye no kurya canke kureka kurya ikintu kanaka, iyo abirenzeko akakirya, aba yihamagariye gutsindwa n’urubanza, kuko ataba yemezwa neza ko ivyo ari vyo yari akwiye gukora. Ikintu cose umuntu akora kitavuye ku kwizera kimubera icaha.
Twebwe abakomeye mu kwizera dukwiye kwihanganira abadakomeye mu kwizera, ntiturondere ibitunezereza gusa.
Dukwiye gufasha bagenzi bacu gukora ibibereye mu ntumbero yo kubafasha gukura mu kwizera.
Na Kristo ubwiwe ntiyabayeho arondera kwinezereza. Ahubwo, Ivyanditswe Vyera bivuga biti: “Ibitutsi abantu bagututse, vyose vyashikiye kuri jewe.”
Kuko ivyanditswe kera vyose vyanditswe kugira ngo bitwigishe. Bidushoboza kwihangana, bikadutera n’intege kugira ngo dushobore kwizigira ko Imana izoshitsa ivyo yasezeranye.
Imana, yo iduha kwihangana ikadutera intege, ibahe guhuza umutima n’inama nk’uko bibereye abakurikira Kristo Yesu,
kugira ngo mwese hamwe muhimbaze Imana Se w’Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo n’umutima umwe n’ijwi rimwe.
Nk’uko Kristo yabakiriye, namwe abe ari ko mwakirana kugira ngo biheshe Imana icubahiro.
Mwibuke ko Kristo yaje ari uwukorera Abayuda kugira ngo abereke ko Imana ari umwizigirwa ku masezerano yasezeraniye ba sekuruza.

Vyongeye, yazanywe no kugira ngo n’Abanyamahanga na bo bahabwe akaryo ko guhimbaza Imana kubera imbabazi zayo, nk’uko Ivyanditswe Vyera bivuga biti: “Ni co gituma nzogutazira mu Banyamahanga; nzotazira izina ryawe mu ndirimbo.”
Birongera bikavuga biti: “Yemwe Banyamahanga, nimunezeranwe n’ubwoko bwayo.”
Ahandi na ho bivuga biti: “Nimutazire Uhoraho, yemwe Banyamahanga mwese, namwe mahanga, mumushire hejuru namwe moko yose.”
Ahandi na ho Yesaya yavugishijwe ati: “Uwukomoka kuri Isayi azoza; azohaguruka kugira ngo aganze amahanga; muri we ni ho Abanyamahanga bose bazoshira ivyizigiro.”
Imana, yo itanga ivyizigiro, ibuzuze umunezero n’amahoro kuko muyizera, kugira ngo murushirize kwizigira amasezerano yayo mubishobojwe na Mpwemu Yera.
Bene Data, jewe ubwanje ndazi neza ntakekeranya ko mwuzuye ineza n’ubumenyi bwose kandi ko mushoboye kwigishanya.
Ariko ndabandikiye kuri bimwebimwe nshize amanga nk’uwubibutsa kubera ubuntu Imana yangiriye
bwo kuba intumwa ya Kristo Yesu mu Banyamahanga. Ndababwira Ubutumwa Bwiza kugira ngo ndabashikanire Imana nk’ikimazi cemerwa na yo, cejejwe na Mpwemu Yera.
Ndafise rero imvo zituma nezerererwa igikorwa nkorera Imana muri Kristo Yesu.
Yamara rero nta kintu mfise nokwirata kiretse ico Kristo yankoresheje mu majambo no mu bikorwa, kugira ngo nshikane Abanyamahanga ku kwumvira Imana.
Abo bemejwe n’ubushobozi bwagaragariye mu bitangaza n’utwumiza hamwe n’ubushobozi bwa Mpwemu w’Imana. Uko ni ko navuze Ubutumwa Bwiza bwa Kristo kuva i Yerusalemu kugeza nshitse muri Ilurikumu.
Ico namye nipfuza kwari ukuvuga Ubutumwa Bwiza ahantu izina rya Kristo ritarigera rivugwa, kugira ngo sinubake ku rufatiro rwashizweho n’uwundi muntu.
Nakoze nisunze iri jambo ryo mu Vyanditswe Vyera rivuga riti: “Abatigeze bumva ivyiwe, bazomubona; kandi abatigeze bamwumva, bazotahura ivyiwe.”
Icatumye nteba kuza iwanyu, ni uko nariko ndavuga Ubutumwa muri izo ntara.
Ubu rero ko nahejeje ibikorwa nahora nkorera muri izo ntara nkaba nari maze iyi myaka yose ndindiriye, ndipfuza cane kubagendera.
Ndiko ndategura kuja muri Esupanye maze mpite ndabaramutsa. Nitwamarana inkumbu, muzoheza mumfashishe ivyankenerwa kugira mbandanye urugendo.
Ariko imbere yo kuza, nzobanza kuja i Yerusalemu gushikiriza bene Data baho imfashanyo.
Amashengero y’i Makedoniya no muri Akaya yahimbawe no kwegeraniriza imfashanyo abakene bo mu bizera b’i Yerusalemu.

Ivyo babikoranye umunezero, ariko mu vy’ukuri bari babafitiye umwenda, kuko Abanyamahanga baronse umugisha wo mu buryo bw’impwemu uvuye ku Butumwa Bwiza bashikirijwe n’abizera b’i Yerusalemu. Ni co gituma na bo bahisemwo kubafashisha ku vy’ubutunzi bwabo.
Ninaheza ico gikorwa co kubashikiriza iyo mfashanyo, nzoheza mpite ndabaramutsa ngiye muri Esupanye.
Kandi ndazi neza ko aho nzozira tuzosangira umugisha wa Kristo wuzuye.
Ariko bene Data, ndabinginga mw’izina ry’Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo no mu rukundo rwa Mpwemu Yera ngo mumfashe kugwana intambara mu masengesho.
Munsengere kugira ngo Imana ize indinde abatizera b’i Yudaya, kandi n’abizera na bo b’i Yerusalemu baze bemere imfashanyo ndabashiriye.
Maze, Imana ibishatse, nzoheza nze iwanyu nuzuye umunezero, gutyo nduhurwe no kubana namwe.
Imana, yo itanga amahoro, ibane namwe mwese. Amen.
Ndafise ivyiza mvuga kuri mwene Data Foyibe, umudiyakonikazi mu rusengero rw’i Kenkireya.
Ndabasavye muze mumwakire mw’izina ry’Umwami wacu nk’uko bibereye abera b’Imana. Muze mumufashe mu vyo azokenera vyose, kuko yagiriye ikimazi benshi na canecane jewe.
Muntahirize Pirisila na Akwilasi, abakoranye nanje igikorwa ca Kristo Yesu.
Ni kenshi bahatswe gupfa bagomba gukiza ubuzima bwanje. Ivyo, si jewe jenyene ndabibashimira, ariko ni amashengero yose y’Abanyamahanga.
Muntahirize ishengero rikoranira mu nzu yabo. Muntahirize umukunzi wanje Epayineto, uwabaye uwa mbere mu bizeye Yesu Kristo mu ntara ya Aziya.
Muntahirize Mariya, yitanze cane mu gukorera mwebwe.
Muntahirize Anduroniko na Yuniya, Abayuda bagenzanje twabanye mw’ibohero. Ni abantu bubashwe cane mu zindi ntumwa kandi barantanze kwizera Kristo.
Muntahirize Ampuliyato, umukunzi wanje mu Mwami wacu.
Muntahirize Uribano, uwo dusangiye igikorwa muri Kristo, na Sitakusi nkunda cane.
Muntahirize Apelesi, umugabo yagaragaje ko ari umwizigirwa kuri Kristo. Kandi muntahirize abo mu nzu kwa Arisitobulo.
Muntahirize Herodiyoni, Umuyuda mugenzanje. Muntahirize abo mu nzu kwa Narasisi bizera Umwami Yesu.
Muntahirize Tirifina na Tirifoza, bitanze cane mu gukorera Umwami. Muntahirize kandi n’umukunzi wanje Perisida, yitanze cane mu gukorera Umwami.
Muntahirize Rufusi, yatoranijwe mu Mwami, hamwe na nyina kandi nanje yahavuye ambera mama.
Muntahirize Asunkirito, Fulegoni, Heremesi, Patorobasi, Herumasi na bene Data bari kumwe na bo.
Muntahirize Filologo, Yuliya, Nerewusi na mushikiwe, hamwe na Olumpasi na bene Data bose bari kumwe na bo.
Muramukanye mu kugumbirana kwera. Amashengero yose ya Kristo arabatasha.
Bene Data, ndabinginga ngo mwirinde ababigisha inyigisho zo kubacanishamwo no kuzimiza abizera zitandukanye n’izo mwigishijwe. Abameze gutyo mubigireyo.
Kuko abakora ivyo, ntibariko bakorera Umwami wacu Kristo, ahubwo bakorera inyungu zabo gusa. Amajambo yabo yo kuryosharyosha hamwe n’imvugo nziza, ni vyo bahendesha abantu b’imitima yoroshe.
Ariko abantu bose barazi ko mwumvira Umwami Yesu, kandi ivyo birampimbara cane. Ndagomba ko muba abanyabwenge mu kumenya ivyiza, ariko mu bibi mube nk’abatagira ico bazi.
Kandi Imana, itanga amahoro izofyonyorera vuba Satani musi y’ibirenge vyanyu. Ubuntu bw’Umwami wacu Yesu bubane namwe.
Timoteyo, uwo dukorana, arabaramutsa, co kimwe na Lukiyo, Yasoni na Sosipateri Abayuda bagenzanje.
Nanje Terutiyo, nafashije Pawulo kwandika iri kete, ndabaramukije mw’izina rya Yesu.
Gayo, ampaye indaro hamwe n’ishengero ryose rikoranira iwe barabaramutsa. Erasito, umunyabigega w’igisagara, hamwe na mwene Data Kwarito barabaramutsa. [
Ubuntu bw’Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo bubane namwe mwese. Amen.]

Imana, yo ishobora kubakomeza mu kwizera, nk’uko Ubutumwa nahawe buvuga ihabwe icubahiro. Ubwo Butumwa buvuga Yesu Kristo kandi bwerekana umugambi Imana ifise kuri mwebwe abanyamahanga, wari waragizwe ibanga kuva kera.

Ariko nk’uko abavugishwa n’Imana bari barabivuze kandi nk’uko Imana Ihoraho yari yarabitegetse kuva kera, ubwo butumwa bwarahishuwe kugira ngo abanyamahanga aho bari hose, na bo bashobore kuyizera no kuyumvira.
Icubahiro cose kibe ic’Imana yo nyene ubwenge bwose, ibihe vyose mw’izina rya Yesu Kristo! Amen.
Jewe Pawulo nahamagariwe kuba intumwa ya Kristo Yesu bivuye ku gushaka kw’Imana, hamwe na mwene Data Sositene,

Turabandikiye mwebwe abo mw’ishengero ry’Imana riri i Korinto, mwejejwe muri Kristo Yesu kandi mwahamagariwe kuba abera, hamwe n’abo bose bambaza izina ry’Umwami Yesu Kristo aho bari hose, bakamwambaza nk’Umwami wabo ari we Mwami wacu:
Ubuntu n’amahoro biva ku Mana Data wa twese no ku Mwami wacu Yesu Kristo bibe muri mwebwe.
Nama nshima Imana ku bwanyu ku bw’ingabire y’ubuntu mwaherewe muri Kristo Yesu.
Muri we mwahawe ubutunzi mu buryo bwose, haba mu mvugo no mu bumenyi mufise.
Ivyo vyerekana ko intahe ya Kristo twabashingiye yabaye ukuri muri mwebwe.
Ni co gituma ata ngabire n’imwe muhajije muri iki gihe mukirindiranye igishika uguhishurwa kw’Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo.
Ni we azobaha gushikama gushika kw’iherezo, kugira ngo muzobe mutagira umugayo ku musi Yesu Kristo azogarukirako.
Imana yabahamagariye kunywana n’Umwana wayo Yesu Kristo Umwami wacu, ni iyo kwizigirwa, izobikora.
Ndabinginga bene Data, mw’izina ry’Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo, ngo muhuze muri vyose, kandi ntihabeho ukwicamwo ibice, ariko mutunganywe rwose muhuje umutima n’inama.
Bene Data, bamwe bo mu muryango wa Kilowe bambwiye ko hari imitongano muri mwebwe.

Ico ngomba kuvuga ni iki: umwe muri mwebwe avuga ngo: “Jewe ndi umwigishwa wa Pawulo”; uwundi na we ati: “Jewe ndi umwigishwa wa Apolo”; uwundi na we ati: “Jewe ndi uwa Kefa”; hakaba n’uwundi avuga ati: “Jeho ndi umwigishwa wa Kristo gusa.”
Mbega Kristo agabuwemwo ibice? Mbega Pawulo yarababambiwe? Mbega mwabatijwe mw’izina rya Pawulo?
Ndashimira Imana ko ata n’umwe nabatije muri mwebwe kiretse Kirisipo na Gayo,
nta n’umwe rero ashobora kuvuga ko yabatijwe mw’izina ryanje.
(Egome narabatije n’abo mu muryago wa Setefana, ariko atari abo, sinibuka ko hari uwundi muntu n’umwe noba narabatije.)
Kuko Kristo ntiyantumye kubatiza, ariko yantumye kuvuga Ubutumwa Bwiza, ntakoresheje amajambo y’ubwenge bw’abantu, kugira ngo simpindure ubusa ubushobozi bw’umusaraba wa Kristo.
Mu bisanzwe ubutumwa bw’umusaraba ni ubujuju ku bariko barahona, ariko kuri twebwe abariko barakizwa, ni ubushobozi bw’Imana.
Kuko handitswe ngo: “Nzosangangura ubwenge bw’abanyabwenge, n’ubumenyi bw’abiyita ko bazi vyinshi ndabuhindure ubusa.”
None umunyabwenge ari he? Umwigisha w’ivyagezwe ari he? Umunyabihari w’iki gihe ari he? Mbega Imana ntiyafashe ubwenge bw’iyi si ikabuhindura ubujuju?
Kuko Imana mu bwenge bwayo yabonye ko ab’isi batoyimenya bakoresheje ubwenge bwabo, ni co gituma yahisemwo gukirisha abizera amajambo y’Ubutumwa Bwiza, ayo bamwe bita ubujuju.
Abayuda bashaka kubona ibimenyetso, Abagiriki na bo bakarondera kubitahurisha ubwenge bwabo.
Ariko tweho twigisha Kristo yabambwe: uwo ni igitsitaza ku Bayuda, n’ubujuju ku Banyamahanga.
Ariko ku bahamagawe, baba Abayuda canke Abagiriki, Kristo ni ubushobozi n’ubwenge vy’Imana.
Kuko ivyitwa ubujuju vy’Imana birusha ubwenge abantu kandi ivyitwa intege nke vy’Imana birusha inkomezi abantu.
Bene Data, mwibuke uko mwari igihe mwahamagarwa. Benshi muri mwebwe ntimwari abanyabwenge dufatiye ku vyo abantu baraba. Benshi ntimwari abahambaye, kandi benshi ntimuvuka mu miryango ikomeye.
Ariko Imana yahisemwo ivy’ubujuju vy’iyi si kugira ngo imaramaze abiyita abanyabwenge, kandi yahisemwo ibinyantege nke vy’iyi si kugira ngo itetereze ibinyenkomezi.
Imana yahisemwo ibitagira ikimazi vy’iyi si n’ibikengerwa ndetse n’ibitariho kugira ngo ihindure ubusa ibiriho.
Ivyo yabikoze kugira ngo ntihagire n’umwe agira ico yirata imbere y’Imana.
Imana ni yo yabagize umwe na Kristo Yesu, we yatubereye ubwenge buva ku Mana. Ni we kugororoka kwacu, ukwera kwacu kandi ni we gucungurwa kwacu gukomokako.
Ni co gituma handitswe ngo: “Uwirata wese yirate ko yamenye Umwami Yesu.”
Bene Data, igihe naza iwanyu, sinaje mfise amajambo aryohoye arimwo ugushira amazinda, canke ubwenge bw’abantu mu kubamenyesha ibanga ry’Imana.
Kuko nahisemwo kutagira ikindi mvuga igihe nari kumwe namwe, atari Yesu Kristo wenyene, umwe yabambwa ku musaraba.
Naje iwanyu ndi umunyantege nke, mfise ubwoba, kandi mpinda agashitsi.
Ubutumwa bwanje n’ukwigisha kwanje ntivyarimwo ubwenge bwinshi n’amajambo yo kwemeza abantu, ariko yagaragaramwo ubushobozi bwa Mpwemu Yera,
kugira ngo ukwizera kwanyu ntiguhagarare ku bwenge bw’abantu, ahubwo guhagarare ku bushobozi bw’Imana.
Ariko ku bakuze mu kwizera, ubutumwa tuvuga ni ubw’ubwenge: ubwo bwenge si ubw’iki gihe canke ubw’abatware b’iki gihe bazokurwaho.
Ahubwo tubabwira ubwenge bw’Imana bwagizwe ibanga, bwari bwaranyegejwe, ariko Imana ikaba yarabuduteguriye isi itararemwa kugira ngo buzoduhe ubwiza.
Nta n’umwe wo mu baganza b’iki gihe yigeze abutahura, kuko iyo baba barabutahuye, ntibaba barabamvye Umwami w’ubwiza.
Ivyanditswe bivuga biti: “Ivyo amaso atigeze abona, ivyo amatwi atigeze yumva, n’ivyo ubwenge butigeze bwiyumvira, ni vyo Imana yateguriye abayikunda.”
Ariko ivyo Imana yarabiduhishuriye muri Mpwemu wayo. Mpwemu asesangura vyose, mbere n’ibihishijwe vy’amabanga y’Imana.
Nk’uko ata wushobora kumenya ivyiyumviro vy’umuntu atari impwemu yiwe, nta n’uwushobora kumenya ivyiyumviro vy’Imana atari Mpwemu wayo.
Kandi ntitwahawe impwemu y’iyi si, ariko twahawe Mpwemu ava ku Mana, kugira dutahure ivy’akaburarugero Imana yaduhereye ubuntu.
Ivyo tubabwira ntitubivugisha ubwenge bw’abantu, ariko tubabwira ivyo duhawe na Mpwemu, tukabivuga mu kuri kwa Mpwemu, dukoresheje n’amajambo duhawe na Mpwemu.
Umuntu adafise Mpwemu ntashobora kwakira ibiva kuri Mpwemu w’Imana, kuko bisa n’ubujuju kuri we, kandi ntashobora kubitahura kuko bisesangurwa biciye muri Mpwemu.
Abantu bafise Impwemu basesangura vyose ariko bobo nta wubaserangura,
kuko handitswe ngo: “Ni nde yigeze amenya ivyiyumviro vy’Uhoraho kugira ngo amugire inama?” Ariko tweho turabitahura kuko dufise ivyiyumviro vya Kristo.
Bene Data, igihe nari kumwe namwe sinabigishije nk’uko nokwigisha abantu bakuze mu Mpwemu, nabigishije nk’abantu basanzwe bo mw’isi, nk’abana bato mu vy’ukwizera Kristo.
Nabahaye amata, sinabahaye ivyokurya bigumye, kuko ntimwari bwagere kubishobora, kandi n’ubu ntimurabishobora.

Muracagendera mu ngeso zanyu za kera zo mw’isi kuko muracagiriranira ishari kandi muracatongana. None ivyo ntivyerekana ko mukigendera mu ngeso zanyu za kera? Mbega ntimubayeho nk’abandi bose batizera?
Iyo umwe muri mwebwe avuze ati: “Jewe ndi umwigishwa wa Pawulo,” uwundi ati: “Nanje ndi umwigishwa wa Apolo,” ntimuba muriko mwigenza nk’ab’iyi si?
Mbega Apolo ni iki, canke Pawulo ni iki? Ni abakozi b’Imana basanzwe babafashije mu gushika ku kwizera nk’uko Imana yakoresheje umwe umwe wese muri bo.
Jewe nabivye imbuto, Apolo na we arazivomera, ariko Imana ni yo yazikujije.
None rero, yaba uwabivye, yaba uwavomeye, bompi nta co bamaze. Imana yonyene ikuza ni yo ihambaye.
Uwubiba n’uwuvomera bompi bafise intumbero imwe, kandi umwe wese azoherwa impera ku gikorwa yakoze,
kuko twempi dukorera Imana, namwe muri umurima w’Imana, muri inzu yayo.
Kubera ubuntu nagiriwe n’Imana, nashizeho urufatiro nk’umwubatsi w’umuhinga, hanyuma haza uwundi na we akaba ariko ararwubakako. Ariko uwurwubakako wese yiyubare uburyo arwubakako.
Kuko ata wushobora gushiraho urundi rufatiro atari urwo nashizeho, ari rwo Yesu Kristo.
Uwurwubakako wese ashobora gukoresha ibikoresho bitandukanye: inzahabu, ifeza, amabuye y’agaciro, ibiti, ibishakashaka canke ivyatsi.
Ariko umusi w’imanza uzogaragaza igikorwa c’umwe umwe wese kuko uzohishuranwa n’umuriro, kandi uwo na wo uzokwerekana agaciro k’igikorwa c’umuntu wese.
Ibikorwa vyiwe nivyarama, azohabwa impera.
Ariko uwo muriro niwabitongora, uwo mwubatsi azohomba impera yavyo, ariko wewe arokoke ameze nk’uwokowe mu muriro.
Mbega ntimuzi ko muri ingoro y’Imana kandi ko Mpwemu w’Imana aba muri mwebwe?
Nihagira uwusambura ingoro y’Imana, Imana na yo izomurandura, kuko ingoro y’Imana yejejwe, kandi iyo na yo akaba ari mwebwe.
Ntimwihende! Nimba muri mwebwe hari uwibaza ko ari umunyabwenge afatiye ku rugero rw’ubwenge bwo mw’isi, yari akwiye kuba ikijuju kugira ngo ashobore kuba umunyabwenge w’ukuri,
kuko imbere y’Imana ubwenge bw’iyi si ari ubujuju, nk’uko Ivyanditswe Vyera bivuga biti: “Imana ifatira abigira abanyabwenge mu bugunge bwabo.”
Ahandi na ho handitswe ngo: “Umwami Imana arazi ivyiyumviro vy’uwigira umunyabwenge, kandi arazi ko ari ubusa gusa.”
Nuko rero ntihakagire uwirata ko ari umwigishwa w’umuntu n’umwe, kuko vyose ari ivyanyu:
yaba Pawulo, yaba Apolo, yaba Kefa, yaba isi, yaba ubugingo canke urupfu, yaba ibiriho canke ibizoza, vyose ni ivyanyu,
namwe muri aba Kristo, Kristo na we ni uw’Imana.
Nuko rero mwese mudufate nk’abakozi ba Kristo, abo Imana yajeje kumenyekanisha amabanga yayo yahishuye.
Iyo umukozi ajejwe ibintu, ico asabwa ni ukuba umwizigirwa.
Ku binyerekeye, nta co bintwaye gucirwa urubanza namwe canke n’ubundi bucamanza bwose bw’abantu. Ariko jewe ubwanje nta rubanza nicira.
Mu mutima wanje nta jwi rinyagiriza ikibi, ariko ivyo ntibisigura ko nera. Umwami Imana ni we ancira urubanza.

Ni co gituma mudakwiye guca urubanza igihe co guca imanza kitaragera; nimurindire gushika Umwami Yesu agarutse. Ni we azonyegurura ivyanyegejwe mu mwijima, yongere ashire ahabona ivyiyumviro vyo mu mitima y’abantu. Aho ni ho umuntu wese azohabwa n’Imana ishimwe rimukwiye.

Bene Data, natanze akarorero kuri jewe no kuri Apolo ku bwanyu, kugira ngo mutwigireko iri jambo rivuga riti: “Ntimukarenge ku vyanditswe;” aho ni ho ata n’umwe muri mwebwe azokwirata kuba umwigishwa w’umwe ngo amurutishe uwundi.
Mbega ni nde yababwiye ko muruta abandi? Hari ico mufise mutahawe? None nimba mwaragihawe, ni kuki mwishira hejuru nk’aho mutagihawe?
Mwibaza ko mukwije vyose! Mwibaza ko mumaze gutunga! Muramaze no kuba abami tutari kumwe! Icompa mukaba abami vy’ukuri kugira ngo tuganzanye namwe.

Ariko nibaza ko twebwe intumwa tumeze nk’imbohe z’intambara zigenewe kwicwa. Imana yadushize ku murongo inyuma y’abadufashe mpiri, mu birori vyazo vyo kwigina intsinzi. Twahindutse akamenyo kw’isi yose, mu maso y’abamarayika no mu maso y’abantu.
Turi ibijuju ku bwa Kristo, ariko mweho mwigira abanyabwenge muri Kristo. Turi abanyantegenke, ariko mweho mwigira abanyenkomezi. Muri abanyacubahiro, ariko twebwe turakengeretse.
Gushika n’ubu turasonza kandi tukanyoterwa, ntitugira ico twambara, turakubitwa, kandi ntitugira aho tuba.
Dukoresha amaboko yacu tukaruha kugira ngo turonke ibidutunga. Duhezagira abatuvuma, tukihanganira guhamwa.
Iyo batuvuze nabi, twishurana ubugwaneza. Gushika n’ubu dufatwa nk’umwavu wo kw’isi, ivyatawe na bose.
Sindabandikiye ibi kugira ngo ndabamaramaze, ahubwo nipfuza kubaburira nk’abana banje nkunda cane.
Kuko naho mufise abarezi ibihumbi cumi muri Kristo, ntimufise ba so benshi, kuko ni jewe nabavyaje Ubutumwa Bwiza muri Kristo Yesu.
Ndabinginga rero ngo munyigane.
Ni co gituma nabarungikiye Timoteyo, umwana wanje nkunda kandi w’umwizigirwa mu Mwami. Azobibutsa ingene mbayeho muri Kristo Yesu, nk’uko ndavyigisha hose mu mashengero yose.
Bamwe muri mwebwe batewe n’ubwibone bibaza ko ntazoza kubagendera.
Ariko, Umwami Imana niyabikunda, nzobagendera vuba, kandi sinzokwumviriza gusa amajambo y’abo bantu b’ubwibone, ahubwo nzorondera kumenya nimba bakoreshwa n’ubushobozi bw’Imana.
Kuko Ubwami bw’Imana atari amajambo gusa, ahubwo ni ubushobozi.
Mbega mugomba nzobagendere nzanye inkoni yo kubahana? Canke icoba ciza ni uko noza mfise umutima w’urukundo n’ubugwaneza?
Narumvise ko hari ingeso y’ubusambanyi hagati muri mwebwe, ubusambanyi butaba no mu Banyamahanga: numvise ko hari umugabo yarongoye umugore wa se.
Kandi ikibabaje, aho gutuntuzwa n’ivyo, maze umuntu yabikoze mukamutaramura muri mwebwe, mubandanya mwishira hejuru.
N’aho ntari kumwe namwe mu buryo bw’umubiri, ndi kumwe namwe mu buryo bw’impwemu. Uwo muntu yakoze ivyo naramaze kumucira urubanza nk’aho noba ndi kumwe namwe.
Nuko rero nimwakorana mw’izina ry’Umwami wacu Yesu, nanje nkabana namwe mu buryo bw’impwemu, ubushobozi bw’Umwami wacu buzoba buri hagati muri twebwe,
maze uwo muntu muze mumuhe Satani kugira ngo akamere k’icaha kiwe karanduke, ariko impwemu yiwe izorokoke ku musi w’Umwami Imana.
Ntivyari bikwiye ko mwishira hejuru. Mbega ntimuzi ko icaha kimeze nk’umwambiro mukeya bashira mu gikandu maze kigatutumba cose?
Nimukure rero muri mwebwe umwambiro wa kera, kugira ngo mube igikandu kitagira umwambiro. Mu vy’ukuri ni co muri, kuko Kristo, umwagazi w’intama wa Pasika, yatanzwe nk’ikimazi ku bwacu.

Ni co gituma dukwiye guhimbaza uwo musi mukuru tudakoresheje imikate irimwo umwambiro wa kera, ari wo mwambiro w’ubugunge n’ubukozi bw’ikibi, ariko dukoresheje imikate itarimwo umwambiro, ari yo mikate itagira uburyarya kandi irimwo ukuri.
Igihe nabandikira ubwa mbere nari nababujije kwifatanya n’abantu b’ingeso z’ubusambanyi.
Simvuga abantu bo mu b’iyi si bagendera mu ngeso z’ubusambanyi, canke ingunge, canke abasuma, canke abasenga ibigirwamana, kuko vyosaba ko muva muri iyi si kugira mushobore kwirinda abantu nk’abo.
Ahubwo nababwira kutifatanya n’uwigira mwene Data ariko ari umusambanyi, ingunge, asenga ibigirwamana, avuga nabi abandi, aborerwa, canke yiba. Umuntu nk’uwo ntimukwiye no gusangira ivyokurya.
Si igikorwa canje gucira urubanza abatari mw’ishengero, ariko ni igikorwa canyu gucira urubanza ababandanya bakora ivyaha bari mw’ishengero.
Imana ni yo izocira urubanza abatizera, ariko nk’uko Ivyanditswe bivuga, “Nimwirukane inkozi y’ikibi iri hagati muri mwebwe.”
Iyo umwe muri mwebwe agize ico apfa na mwene Data wundi, ni kuki amwitwarira mu batubaha Imana ngo babe ari bo babacira urubanza, aho kwitura abizera ngo babatature?
Mbega ntimuzi ko abizera ari bo bazocira imanza isi? None nimba muzocira imanza isi, mwonanirwa no gutatura amatati asanzwe?
Mbega ntimuzi ko muzocira imanza n’abamarayika? Nuko rero murashoboye gutatura amatati asanzwe yo muri buno buzima.
None iyo hadutse amatati yo muri ubu buzima, ni kuki muja kuronderera abacamanza mu bantu batanemewe mw’ishengero?
Ibi ndabivuze kugira ngo ndabamaramaze. Birashoboka ko muri mwebwe habura n’umwe afise ubwenge, ashoboye gutatura amatati ari hagati mu bizera?
Ariko aho gutatura ayo matati mwebwe nyene, mwene Data umwe yitwarira mugenziwe, kandi akamwitwarira ku batizera!
No kuba mufitaniye imanza hagati yanyu, ivyo vyonyene vyerekana ko mwamaze kunanirwa. Ni kuki mudashobora kwihanganira akarenganyo? Ni kuki mudashobora kwihanganira ababiba?
Ariko ntibitangaje na mwebwe ubwanyu murarenganya mukongera mukiba, kandi ivyo mukabikorera bene Data bandi.

Mbega ntimuzi ko inkozi z’ibibi zitazoragwa Ubwami bw’Imana? Ntimukibeshe: abihumanisha ibijanye n’ubusambanyi, abasenga ibigirwamana, abasambanyi, abagabo bihindura abagore mu bumaraya, abahuza ibitsina basangiye,
abasuma, ingunge, imborerwa, abavuga nabi abandi, n’abambuzi ntibazoragwa Ubwami bw’Imana.
Kandi bamwe muri mwebwe bari bameze nk’abo. Ariko mwarogejwe, murezwa, mwongera mwemerwa n’Imana nk’abagororotsi mw’izina ry’Umwami Yesu Kristo, mubihawe na Mpwemu w’Imana yacu.
Hari uwuvuga ati: “Vyose ndavyemerewe.” Ni vyo, ariko si vyose bingirira akamaro. Naho vyose ndavyemerewe, sinemera kuganzwa n’ikintu na kimwe.

Uwundi avuga ati: “Ivyokurya ni ivy’inda, n’inda ni iy’ivyokurya kandi Imana izobirandura vyompi.” Yamara umubiri ntiwaremewe kuganzwa n’ubusambanyi, ariko waremewe kuba uw’Umwami Imana, kandi ni we awitaho.
Imana, mu bushobozi bwayo, yazuye Umwami Yesu mu bapfuye, kandi natwe izotuzura.
Mbega ntimuzi ko imibiri yanyu ari ibihimba vy’umubiri wa Kristo? None nubahuke mfate ingingo z’umubiri wa Kristo, ndazifatanye n’umumaraya? Ntibikabe!
Mbega ntimuzi ko uwifatanije n’umumaraya aba abaye umwe na we mu mubiri? Kuko Ivyanditswe Vyera bivuga biti: “Uko ari babiri bazohinduka umubiri umwe.”
Ariko uwifatanije n’Umwami Imana aba abaye umwe na we mu buryo bw’impwemu.
Mwirinde ubusambanyi. Ikindi caha cose umuntu akora ntigifata umubiri. Ariko uwusambana aba acumuye ku mubiri wiwe.
Mbega ntimuzi ko imibiri yanyu ari ingoro za Mpwemu Yera aba muri mwebwe, uwo mwahawe n’Imana? Erega ntimuciganza
kuko mwaguzwe igiciro kinini. Nuko rero mwubahishe Imana imibiri yanyu.
Ku bijanye n’ivyo mwambajije mw’ikete mwanyandikiye, ni vyiza ko umuntu atorongora.
Ariko kubera ubusambanyi buhari, umugabo wese akwiye kugira umugore wiwe, kandi umugore wese akwiye kugira umugabo wiwe.
Umugabo ategerezwa kurangura amabanga y’abubatse n’umugore wiwe, n’umugore wiwe ni uko nyene.
Umugore ntaganza umubiri wiwe kuko ni uw’umugabo wiwe, kandi n’umugabo ntaganza umubiri wiwe kuko ni uw’umugore wiwe.

Ntihakagire uwiyima uwundi, kiretse mwumvikanye kwihangana igihe gito, kugira ngo mufate umwanya wo gusenga. Hanyuma mukwiye gusubira kwegerana kugira ngo Satani ntaronke aho abaca ngo abageragereshe ukubura ukwihangana kwanyu.
Ibi ndabibabwiye nk’impanuro si itegeko ndabahaye.
Ico nipfuza ni uko abantu bose boba nkanje. Ariko umuntu wese afise ingabire yisangije yahawe n’Imana; umwe agira ingabire kanaka, uwundi akagira iyindi.
Abatubatse n’abapfakaye bakwiye kuguma uko bari, nk’uko nanje ndi.
Ariko nimba batoshobora kwihangana, bakwiye kwubaka, kuko umuntu yopfuma yubaka aho kwicwa n’ukwipfuza.
Ku bubatse, ntanze iri tegeko, ritavuye kuri jewe ariko rivuye ku Mwami Imana: umugore ntakahukane n’umugabo wiwe.
Ariko bishitse akahukana, ntaze asubire kurongorwa, canke na ho aze asubirane n’umugabo wiwe. N’umugabo na we ntakirukane umugore wiwe.
Abandi na bo, ibi ni vyo ndababwira, ariko ni jewe ubwanje, si Umwami Imana: mwene Data niyaba afise umugore atizera hanyuma uwo mugore agashaka kugumana na we, ntaze amwirukane.
Kandi mwene Data niyaba afise umugabo atizera, maze uwo mugabo akaba ashaka kugumana na we, ntaze avane na we.
Kuko umugabo atizera yezwa biciye ku mugore wiwe, kandi n’umugore atizera yezwa biciye ku mugabo wiwe. Ahandi ho abana banyu bobaye abahumanye, ariko noneho barejejwe.

Ariko umugabo atizera canke umugore atizera agomvye kwigira, mumureke yigire. Muri ico gihe uwo mugabo canke uwo umugore yizera ntaba akibohewe ku wo bubakanye atizera, kuko Imana yaduhamagariye kuba mu mahoro.
Mbega wa mugore we, ni igiki kikwemeza ko umugabo wawe azokizwa kubera wewe? Canke wa mugabo we, ni igiki kikwemeza ko umugore wawe azokizwa kubera wewe?
Ariko rero umuntu wese akwiye kubandanya abaho ubuzima Umwami yamuhitiyemwo, no kuguma uko yari ari imbere y’uko Imana imuhamagara. Iri ni ryo tegeko ntanga mu mashengero yose.
Nk’akarorero, nimba umugabo yari yarakebwe imbere y’uko ahamagarwa, ntarondere kuba uwudakebwe. Niyaba na ho atari yarakebwe igihe yahamagarwa, ntarondere gukebwa.
Ugukebwa canke ukudakebwa vyompi nta co bimaze. Igihambaye ni ugukurikiza amabwirizwa y’Imana.
Umuntu wese akwiye kuguma uko yari ameze igihe Imana yamuhamagara.
Nimba wari umugurano igihe Imana yaguhamara, ntibiguhagarike umutima. Ariko niwaronka ibakwe ryo kwidegemvya, uridegemvya.
Kuko uwahamagawe n’Umwami ari umugurano aba abaye uwidegemvya mu Mwami, kandi uwahamagawe n’Umwami yidegemvya aba abaye umugurano wa Kristo.
Mwaguzwe igiciro kinini; nuko rero ntimukabe abaja b’abantu.
Bene Data, umuntu wese agume nk’uko yari ameze igihe Imana yamuhamagara.
Ku vyerekeye abatararongorwa, nta bwirizwa nahawe n’Umwami, ariko ndababwira ico niyumvira nk’umuntu w’umwizigirwa yagiriwe ubuntu n’Umwami.
Kubera ibihe bigoye turimwo, niyumvira ko umuntu yoguma uko asanzwe ari ubu.
Nimba wararongoye, nturondere kwahukana. Nimba utarongoye, nturondere kurongora.
Urongoye nta caha uba ukoze, kandi inkumi irongowe, nta caha iba ikoze. Ariko abarongora bazobona amakuba menshi muri buno buzima, nanje nshaka kuyabarinda.
Bene Data, ico ngomba kuvuga ni uko igihe gisigaye ari gito. Uhereye ubu, abafise abagore ntibiteho cane ivy’ingo zabo gusa,
abarira babeho nk’abatababaye, abari mu munezero babeho nk’abatawufise, abagura ibintu babifate nk’ibitari ivyabo.
Abari mu rudandazwa ntibatwarwe na rwo, kuko iyi si urimwo ubu izokurwaho vuba.
Nipfuza ko mubaho mwidegemvya, ata mwitwarariko w’ivy’ubu buzima. Umugabo atarongoye yitwararika ibikorwa vy’Umwami, akama arondera kumunezereza.
Ariko uwarongoye yitwararika ivy’ino si, arondera ingene yonezereza umugore wiwe.

Imyitwarariko yiwe igabuwemwo kubiri. Umugore canke inkumi itarongowe yitwararika ibikorwa vy’Umwami. Yihebera Umwami mu mubiri no mu mpwemu. Ariko uwarongowe yitwararika ivy’ino si, arondera ingene yonezereza umugabo wiwe.
Ibi ndiko ndabivuga ku neza yanyu, sindiko ndabaremereza amategeko. Nshaka ko mukora ikiborohereza gukorera neza Umwami ata bibasamaza.
None rero, umusore niyaba yipfuza cane umukobwa bazokwubakana, agatinya ko azohava amukorera ibidakwiye kuko vyanse ko yihangana, namurongore nk’uko avyipfuza, nta caha azoba akoze.
Ariko nimba umusore yafashe ingingo mu mutima wiwe yo kutarongora, avyihitiyemwo kandi akaba ashoboye kwigumya, na we nyene aba agize neza.
Nuko rero uwurongoye inkumi yahisemwo aba agize neza, ariko uwutarongoye aba agize neza gusumba.
Umugore aba abohewe ku mugabo iyo akiriho. Ariko umugabo amaze gupfa, umugore aba afise uburenganzira bwo kurongorwa n’uwo ashaka, mu gihe uwo mugabo yubaha Imana.
Ariko jewe niyumvira ko yonezerwa gusumba agumye uko yari ari, kandi nanje ndabahaye iyi mpanuro ndongowe na Mpwemu w’Imana.
Ku bijanye n’ivyashikaniwe ibigirwamana, ndazi ko twese dufise ico tubiziko. Ariko ubumenyi butuma umuntu yishira hejuru; urukundo ni rwo rwubaka.
Iyo umuntu yibwira ko azi ikintu, ntaba arakimenya gushika ku rugero yategerezwa gushitsako mu kukimenya.
Ariko uwukunda Imana we na yo iramuzi.
None rero ku bijanye n’ivyashikaniwe ibigirwamana, turazi ko ikigirwamana ari ubusa ngaha kw’isi, kandi ko hari Imana imwe gusa.
Hari ivyitwa “imana” vyinshi kw’isi no mw’ijuru, kandi hari abantu basenga imana nyinshi n’abami benshi.
Ariko tuzi ko hari Imana imwe, ari yo Data, yaremye vyose kandi tubayeho ku bwayo. Hari Umwami umwe, ari we Yesu Kristo. Vyose vyaremewe muri we, kandi muri we ni ho twaherewe ubugingo.

Ariko abizera bose ntibamenye ibi. Bamwe baramenyereye ibigirwamana gushika aho n’ubu, iyo bariye ivyashikaniwe ivyo bigirwamana, bumva umenga basenze imana zifise ubugingo, gutyo imitima yabo igahumana kubera intege nke zabo.
Kuko ntitwemerwa n’Imana kubera ivyo turya, kandi nta co dutakaza iyo tubiretse, kandi nta co twunguka iyo tubiriye.
Ariko mube maso kugira ngo umwidegemvyo wanyu ntube igitsitaza ku banyantegenke.
Mbega umuntu w’umunyantege nke niyabona wewe umusumvya ugutahura uriko ararya ivyo mu nzu y’ibigirwamana, ntibizotuma abirya na we kubera intege nke ziwe?
Nuko rero, uwo mwene Data w’umunyantege nke Kristo yapfiriye, ntimumuranduze ugutahura kwanyu.
Mucumuye kuri bene Data muri ubwo buryo, muba mucumuye kuri Kristo.
Ni co gituma, nimba ivyokurya vyotuma mwene Data akora icaha, sinzokwigera ndya inyama kugira ngo sintume atsitara akagwa.
Mbega sindi uwidegemvya? Mbega sindi intumwa? Mbega siniboneye Yesu Umwami wacu amaso mu yandi? Mbega ntimuri ivyamwa vy’ibikorwa nakoreye Umwami?
N’aho ntoba intumwa ku bandi, kuri mwebwe ndi yo. Namwe ubwanyu muri icemeza uko ndi intumwa y’Umwami.
Iki ni co nireguza ku bancira imanza.
Mbega sinemerewe guhabwa ivyokurya n’ivyo kunywa?
Mbega sinemerewe kubana n’umugore yizera nk’uko izindi ntumwa, abavukanyi b’Umwami Yesu Kristo na Kefa babigira?
Canke ni jewe na Baranaba dutegerezwa gukora twenyene kugira ngo twitunge?
Ni nde yoba umusoda hanyuma agategerezwa kwibeshaho? Ni nde yotera uruzabibu hanyuma ntarye ivyamwa vyarwo? Ni nde yoragira amasho hanyuma ntanywe amata yayo?
Mbega ibi ndabibabwiye bivuye mu vyiyumviro vy’abantu? Canke n’ivyagezwe vya Mose birafise ico bibivugako?
Muri ivyo vyagezwe haranditse ngo: “Ntimukazibire umunwa w’inka iriko irasekura ingano.” Mbega mwibaza ko ngaha Imana yariko ivuga indogoba gusa?
Nta nkeka ibi ni twebwe yari ibivuzeko. Ibi vyandikiwe twebwe kugira ngo uwurima n’uwimbura bizigire kuzoronka umugabane wabo ku mwimbu.
Ko twababivyemwo imbuto mu buryo bw’impwemu, ntitwari dukwiye kubimburamwo ivyokurya vy’umubiri?

Nimba abandi babigisha bafise uburenganzira bwo kuronka ibibabeshaho muri mwebwe, mbega twebwe ntitwari dukwiye kuronka ibirenze? Ariko ntitwigeze duharanira ubwo burenganzira. Ahubwo turimenya muri vyose kugira ntitube inzitizi ku Butumwa Bwiza bwa Kristo.
Mbega ntimuzi ko abakora mu rusengero barya ivyo mu rusengero, kandi ko n’abakora ku gicaniro barya ivyashikanywe ku gicaniro?
Ni muri ubwo buryo nyene, Umwami yategetse ko abavuga Ubutumwa Bwiza bazotungwa n’ubwo Butumwa nyene.

Ariko sinigeze ngwanira na kimwe muri ibi nari nemerewe, kandi sindabandikiye iri kete kugira ngo mutangure kumpa ibimbeshaho. Nopfuma mpfa hako ntakaza ibi vyirato vyo kuvuga ubutumwa ata we ndemereye.
Ariko iyo mvuze ubutumwa, sinshobora kuvyirata kuko mba nshikije itegeko ry’Imana. Noba ngowe ntavuze ubutumwa bwiza.
Mvuze ubutumwa bivuye ku mutima ubikunze, ndonka impera. Ariko ndabuvuze umutima utabikunze, kuba ari ukwikurayo.
Mbega impera yanje ni iyihe? Ni uko mvuga Ubutumwa Bwiza ata we ndemereye, ntahagaze ku burenganzira nari mfise nk’umuvugabutumwa.
N’aho ndi uwidegemvya nkaba ntajakariye umuntu n’umwe, nigira umugurano ku bantu bose kugira ngo nshobore kuzana benshi kuri Kristo.
Ku Bayuda nabaye nk’uwuganzwa n’ivyagezwe n’aho ntaganzwa na vyo, kugira ngo nzane kuri Kristo abaganzwa n’ivyagezwe.
Ku banyamahanga batagira ivyagezwe nabayeho nk’uwutabigira n’aho nganzwa n’ivyagezwe vy’Imana, nkubaha ivyagezwe vya Kristo, kugira ngo nzane abatagira ivyagezwe kuri Kristo.
Ku banyantegenke nigize umunyantege nke kugira ngo nzane abanyantegenke kuri Kristo. Nabaye vyose kuri bose kugira nkore ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo hagire bamwe muri bo bakizwa.
Ibi vyose ndabikora kugira Ubutumwa Bwiza bukwire hose, maze nanje nze mpabwe imigisha ijana na bwo.
Ntimuzi ko mw’ihiganwa hiruka benshi, ariko uwuhabwa umudari akaba umwe? Nuko rero muhiganwe nk’abazohabwa umudari.
Abaja mw’ihiganwa bose bagira imyiteguro ikomeye. Bayigira kugira bazoronke impera ihera, ariko twebwe tugira imyiteguro kugira tuzoronke impera ihoraho.
Nuko rero siniruka nk’uwutagira intumbero, canke uwugwana akubita ibipfunsi ahusha uwo bagwana.
Ntoza indero umubiri wanje, nkawugira umuja wanje, kugira ngo maze kuvuga Ubutumwa Bwiza sinsange narushijwe mw’ihiganwa, ngahusha impera.
Bene Data, singomba ko mwibagira ko ba sogokuruza mu bugaragwa bagendera musi y’igicu, kandi ko bose bajabutse baciye mu kiyaga.
Muri ico gicu no muri ico kiyaga, bose babatiririjwe kuba abigishwa ba Mose.
Bose bariye ivyokurya bimwe vy’impwemu,
banywa no ku kinyobwa kimwe c’impwemu; kuko banyoye ku gitandara c’impwemu cabaherekeza, ico gitandara na co cari Yesu Kristo ubwiwe.
Ariko benshi muri bo ntibanezereye Imana, kuko imivyimba yabo yandagaye mu bugaragwa.
Ivyo vyose vyabaye ngo bitubere akarorero kugira ngo imitima yacu ntiyipfuze gukora ivyaha nk’uko babigize.
Ntimugasenge ibigirwamana nk’uko bamwe muri bo babisenze, nk’uko handitswe ngo: “Baricaye bararya, baranywa, hanyuma barahaguruka barinezereza.”
Ntituje mu busambanyi nk’uko bamwe muri bo babigize, maze ku musi umwe gusa hagapfa abantu ibihumbi mirongo ibiri na bitatu.
Ntitugerageze Kristo nk’uko bamwe babigize bakamarwa n’inzoka.
Kandi ntimukidodombe nk’uko bamwe babigize, maze bakicwa n’umumarayika muranduzi.
Ivyo vyashitse kugira ngo bitubere akarorero ko kutuburira, twebwe abo mu gihe ca nyuma.
Nuko rero uwibaza ko ahagaze, yiyubare ntagwe.

Nta kibagerageza cabashikiye kidashikira abandi. Kandi Imana ni iyo kwizigirwa, ntizobareka ngo mugeragezwe n’ivyo mudashobora kwihanganira. Mu gihe co kugeragezwa, izobacira inzira kugira ngo mushobore kuvyihanganira.
None rero abo nkunda, mwirinde gusenga ibigirwamana.
Ndababwira nk’abafise ugutahura. Nimurabe mwebwe nyene ko ivyo ndababwira atari ukuri.
Iyo tunywera ku gikombe Imana yahezagiye, mbega ntituba dusangiye ku maraso ya Kristo? Iyo tumanyura umukate, ntituba dusangiye ku mubiri wa Kristo?
Iyo dusangiye ku mukate umwe tuba tubaye umubiri umwe n’aho turi benshi.
Nimurabe Abisirayeli: mbega abarya ivyashikanywe ntibaba bifatanirije hamwe ku gicaniro?
Mbega ngomvye kuvuga ko ivyashikaniwe ibigirwamana canke ibigirwamana ubwavyo ata co bimaze?
Haba na mba. Ivyashikaniwe ibigirwamana biba vyashikaniwe abadayimoni, ari na co gituma ntashaka ko musangira n’abadayimoni.
Ntimushobora kunywera ku gikombe c’Umwami hanyuma ngo mwongere munywere ku gikombe c’abadayimoni. Ntimushobora kurira ku meza y’Umwami hanyuma ngo mwongere murire ku meza y’abadayimoni.
Mbega mugomba tuvyure ishari ry’Umwami? Mwibaza ko tumusumvya inguvu?
Muvuga muti: “Vyose turavyemerewe,” yamara si vyose bigira ikimazi. Muvuga muti: “Vyose turavyemerewe,” yamara si vyose vyubaka.
Ntihakagire uwurondera ineza yiwe gusa, ariko twiteho no kugirira abandi neza.
Muze murye inyama izo ari zo zose zashowe mu kaguriro, ata co murinze kuzibazako,
kuko “isi ari iy’Umwami Imana, n’ibiri muri yo vyose.”
Uwutizera niyagutumira iwe gufungura ukagenda, uzofungure ivyo akuzimanye vyose ata co urinze kuvyibazako.
Ariko niyakubwira ati: “Ibi vyashikaniwe ibigirwamana,” ntuzobirye ku bw’ineza y’uwo munyantegenke yabikubwiye, kugira ngo ntagire ijwi rimwagiriza mu mutima.
Nta co bitwaye kuri mwebwe, ariko hari ico vyica kuri uwo yabibabwiye. Umwidegemvyo wanje ntukwiye kuba igitsitaza ku bandi.
Iyo ndabiriyeko nshimira Imana, kubera iki abantu bancira imanza kuri ivyo vyokurya nashimiye Imana?
Nuko rero iyo murya canke munywa, canke mukora ikindi kintu cose, mubikore muhesha Imana icubahiro.
Ntihakagire uwo mutsitaza, yaba Umuyuda canke Umugiriki, canke abo mw’ishengero ry’Imana.
Na jewe ngerageza kunezereza bose mu vyo nkora vyose. Simpfa gukora ibimpimbara, ariko nkora ibihimbara abandi kugira benshi bashike ku gakiza.
Munyigane nk’uko nanje nigana Kristo.
Ndabashimira cane ko munyibuka mu vyo mukora vyose, kandi mukaba mwarumiye ku nyigisho zanje nk’uko nazibahaye.
Ariko hari ico mukwiye kumenya: umutwe w’umugabo ni Kristo, umutwe w’umugore ni umugabo wiwe, umutwe wa Kristo na wo ni Imana,
Umugabo asenga canke avugishwa n’Imana atwikiriye umutwe aba asuzuguje umutwe wiwe.
Ariko umugore asenga canke akavugishwa n’Imana adatwikiriye umutwe wiwe aba asuzuguje umutwe wiwe, co kimwe n’iyo yiharanguje.
Umugore adatwikiriye umutwe wiwe ariko arasenga, akwiye kumobwa. Kandi nimba ari igiterasoni ku mugore kumwa umushatsi canke kwiharanguza, nawutwikire.
Umugabo ntakwiye gutwikira umutwe wiwe, kuko umugabo ni ishusho y’ubwiza bw’Imana; ariko umugore ni ishusho y’ubwiza bw’umugabo.
Kuko umugabo ntiyavuye mu mugore, ariko umugore yavuye mu mugabo;
kandi umugabo ntiyaremwe ku bw’umugore, ariko umugore yaremwe ku bw’umugabo.
Ni co gutuma rero, kubera abamarayika batwihweza, umugore akwiye gutwikira umutwe wiwe, kugira yerekane ko ari musi y’ubundi bubasha.
Ariko mu Mwami, umugore agengwa n’umugabo, kandi umugabo agengwa n’umugore.
Kuko nk’uko umugore yavuye mu mugabo, umugabo na we avyarwa n’umugore. Ariko ibintu vyose biva ku Mana.
Nabe ari mwebwe nyene mwicira urubanza: Mbega birabereye ko umugore asenga Imana adatwikiriye umutwe wiwe?
Mbega mu vyo kamere y’ibintu itwigisha, si ibiterasoni ko umugabo atereka umushatsi,
ariko umugore awuteretse umubera ubwiza bwiwe? Kuko yawuhawe ngo umubere nk’igitambara kimutwikira.
Ariko nimba hariho uwufise ibihari kuri ibi, nobabwira ko ata wundi mugenzo atari uwo, kandi n’ayandi mashengero y’Imana ni wo akurikiza.
Mu vyo ngira ndababwire, sindabashima na gato, kuko amakoraniro yanyu yuzuyemwo ibibi gusumba ivyiza.
Ica mbere, narumvise ko iyo mukoraniye mu rusengero mwicamwo ibice, kandi ndakeka ko birashobora kuba ari vyo.
Koko hategerezwa kuba ukwitandukanya muri mwebwe, kugira ngo abemerwa n’Imana bagaragare.
Iyo mukoranye, ntimurya ku ngaburo y’Umwami,
kuko iyo mufungura, bamwe muri mwebwe bihutira gufungura ivyabo ntibasangire n’abandi. Ivyo bituma haba abataha bashonje, abandi batashe baborewe.
Mbega ntimufise iwanyu aho mwofungurira mukongera mukanywera? Canke mushaka kwonona urusengero rw’Imana no kumaramaza abakenye? Ndababwire iki? Ndabashime n’ibi bintu mukora? Ntibikabe!
Kuko ico nahawe n’Umwami ari co nanje nabashikirije: muri rya joro Umwami Yesu yafatwa, yakiriye umukate,
awushimira Imana, arawumanyura, avuga ati: “Uwu ni umubiri wanje watanzwe ku bwanyu. Muzohore mubikora mu kunyibuka.”
Bahejeje gufungura agira uko nyene, afata igikombe, avuga ati: “Iki gikombe ni isezerano rishasha, ryemejwe n’amaraso yanje. Muzohore mukinywako mu kunyibuka.”
Kuko igihe cose muzorya uwu mukate mukanywera no kuri iki gikombe, muzoba muriko muramenyekanisha urupfu rwanje gushika aho nzogarukira.
Ni co gituma rero uwurya umukate akanywa no ku gikombe uko bitabereye azokwagirwa no gucumura ku mubiri n’amaraso y’Umwami.
Umuntu wese akwiye kwisuzuma imbere yo kurya kuri uwo mukate no kunywera kuri ico gikombe.
Kuko uwurya uwo mukate canke akanywera kuri ico gikombe adahaye icubahiro umubiri wa Kristo aba yikwegeye gucirwa urubanza.
Ni co gituma bamwe muri mwebwe bagira intege nke, bakagwara kandi bamwe muri mwebwe bakaba baranapfuye.
Iyo twirimbuye twebwe nyene tukicira urubanza, Imana ntiba ikiruduciriye.
Ariko Umwami aduciriye urubanza, aba adutoje indero kugira ngo ntituzociribwe urubanza hamwe n’iyi si.
None rero bene Data, iyo mukoraniye ku ngaburo y’Umwami, mube murindirana.
Uwuzokwumva ashonje cane azofungure iwe kugira ngo yoye kwikwegera gutsindwa n’urubanza. Ku bindi bibazo mwanyandikiye, nzobaha inyishu ninashika iwanyu.
Bene Data, ibijanye n’ingabire za Mpwemu Yera, nshaka ko mubitahuzwa neza.
Murazi ko mukiri abanyamahanga mwazimizwa n’ibigirwamana bitavuga.
Ni co gituma ndababwira ko ata wuvugishwa na Mpwemu w’Imana yovuga ati: “Yesu ni ikivume,” kandi nta wovuga ati: “Yesu ni Umwami,” kiretse abivugishijwe na Mpwemu Yera.
Hari ingabire zitandukanye ariko Mpwemu azitanga ni umwe.
Imirimo ni myinshi ariko Umwami dukorera ni umwe.
Ibikorwa vy’Imana ni vyinshi, ariko iyo Mana nyene ni yo ibikorera muri twebwe twese.
Mpwemu w’Imana yiyerekanira mu ngabire kuri umwe umwe wese ku neza ya bose.
Bamwe bahawe na Mpwemu gutanga impanuro zirimwo ubwenge, abandi uwo Mpwemu nyene abaha ubumenyi budasanzwe,
abandi abaha ingabire y’ukwizera, abandi abaha gukiza ingwara,
abandi abaha ububasha bwo gukora ibitangaza, abandi abaha kuvugishwa n’Imana, abandi abaha gusesangura impwemu, abandi abaha kuvuga mu ndimi, abandi na bo abaha kuzisigura.
Izo ngabire zose zitangwa na Mpwemu umwe, bivanye n’uko agomba kuzitanga.
Umubiri ni umwe n’aho ugizwe n’ibihimba vyinshi; kandi n’aho ibihimba vyawo ari vyinshi bigize umubiri umwe. N’umubiri wa Kristo ni uko.
Twese twabatijwe na Mpwemu umwe mu mubiri umwe: Abayuda, Abagiriki, abagurano, n’abidegemvya, kandi twese twahawe Mpwemu umwe.
Umubiri ntugizwe n’igihimba kimwe, ugizwe n’ibihimba vyinshi.
Ikirenge kivuze giti: “Ko ntari ukuboko, sindi igihimba c’umubiri,” ivyo ntivyotuma kireka kuba igihimba c’umubiri.
Kandi ugutwi kuvuze guti: “Kuko ntari ijisho, sindi igihimba c’umubiri,” ivyo ntivyotuma kureka kuba igihimba c’umubiri.
Mbega nka hamwe umubiri wose woba ijisho gusa, wokwumvira he? Canke na ho nka hamwe umubiri wose woba ugutwi, womoterwa biciye he?
Ariko noneho Imana yashize ibihimba bitandukanye ku mubiri, kimwekimwe cose aho biyihimbaye kugishira.
Umubiri ntiwoba umubiri mu gihe woba ugizwe n’igihimba kimwe gusa.
Nk’uko bimeze rero, hari ibihimba vyinshi ariko umubiri ni umwe.
Ijisho ntiryobarira ukoboko riti: “Sindagukeneye,” kandi umutwe ntiwobwira ibirenge uti: “Sindabakeneye.”
Ahubwo n’ibihimba vyose womenga ni bitobito kurusha ibindi birakenewe cane.
Kandi ibihimba womenga ntivyubashwe cane ni vyo twitwararika cane kwambika. Ibihimba tutipfuza ko bija ahabona ni vyo twitwararika gufata neza,
ariko ibija ahabona tubifata ibisanzwe. Imana yafatanije ibihimba vy’umubiri vyose ica iha icubahiro ibitagifise,
kugira ngo ntihabe ukwitandukanya kw’umubiri, ahubwo ibihimba vyose vyitaneho ku rugero rungana.
Iyo hagize igihimba kimwe kigwara, ibindi vyose bigwarana na co. Kandi iyo igihimba kimwe cubashwe, ibindi vyose binezeranwa na co.
Namwe muri umubiri wa Kristo, kandi umwe wese muri mwebwe ni igihimba c’umubiri cawo.

Ibi ni vyo bihimba vy’umubiri Imana yashize mw’ishengero: hari intumwa, abavugishwa n’Imana, abigisha, abakora ibitangaza, abafise ingabire zo gukiza ingwara, abafise ingabire zo gufasha abandi, abafise ingabire z’uburongozi, n’abavuga indimi zitandukanye.
Bose si intumwa, kandi si abavugishwa n’Imana, si abigisha kandi bose ntibakora ibitangaza.
Bose ntibafise ingabire zo gukiza ingwara, ntibavuga mu ndimi zitamenyekana, kandi bose ntibasobanura indimi.
Ariko mwipfuze ingabire zisumba izindi zose. Reka ndabereke inzira irashe gusumba izindi zose.
Naho novuga mu ndimi z’abantu n’iz’abamarayika ntagira urukundo, noba meze nk’inkengeri canke icuma gisamirana.
Naho nogira ingabire yo kuvugishwa n’Imana, nkagira ukwizera kwokwimura imisozi ariko ntagira urukundo, vyoba ari ubusa.
Naho nofata ivyanje vyose nkabiha abakene, ndetse naho notanga umubiri wanje kugira ngo ngire ico nirata ariko ntagira urukundo, vyoba ari ubusa.
Urukundo rurihangana, rugira ubugwaneza. Ntirugira ishari kandi ntirwishira hejuru.
Ruriyoroheje, ntirurondera inyungu zarwo, ntirutwarwa n’ishavu, kandi ntirubika ikibi.
Urukundo ntirunezerererwa ikibi, ariko runezererwa ukuri.
Urukundo rurenzako muri vyose, rwizigira vyose, rwizera vyose, rwihanganira vyose.
Kuvugishwa n’Imana, kuvuga mu ndimi zitamenyekana, n’ubwenge budasanzwe bizohera. Ariko urukundo ruzokwamaho ibihe vyose.
Ubwenge dufise ubu ni agace, kandi n’ukuvugishwa n’Imana kwacu kwerekana agace.
Ariko igihe kizogera aho vyose bizokwuzuzwa, maze ivy’ibice bikazokurwaho.
Nkiri umwana navuga kandi nkiyumvira nk’umwana. Ariko maze gukura ivy’ubwana nabitaye kure yanje.
Ivyo tubona ubu ni nk’ivyijiji mu cirore, ariko hazogera igihe tuzobona neza vyose amaso mu yandi. Ubu tuzi agace, ariko hari igihe tuzomenya vyose, nk’uko Imana ituzi neza.
None rero hari ibintu bitatu bizokwamaho: ukwizera, ivyizigiro n’urukundo. Ariko igikuru muri vyose ni urukundo.
Murondere kugira urukundo kandi mwipfuze cane kuronka ingabire za Mpwemu, na canecane ingabire y’ukuvugishwa n’Imana.
Uwuvuga mu ndimi zitamenyekana ntaba ariko arabwira abantu ahubwo aba ariko arabwira Imana, kandi nta n’uwushobora kumutahura. Impwemu yiwe iba iriko iravuga amabanga.
Ariko uwuvugishwa n’Imana aba ariko arabwira abantu kugira ngo bakomezwe, baterwe intege bongere birurwe.
Uwuvuga mu ndimi zitamenyekana aba ariko ariyubaka we nyene, ariko uwuvugishwa n’Imana aba ariko arubaka ishengero.

Vyobaye vyiza mwese muvuze mu ndimi, ariko ikirengeye ni uko mwovugishwa n’Imana. Uwuvugishwa n’Imana arahambaye gusumba uwuvuga mu ndimi, kiretse mu gihe yoba ashobora kuzisobanura kugira ishengero ryose rikomezwe.
