Bene Data, mbega iyo nza iwanyu mvuga mu ndimi, nari kubamarira iki ntabazaniye ivyo nahishuriwe, amajambo y’ubwenge, ubuvugishwa canke inyigisho?
Ni ko bimeze no ku bicurarangisho bisanzwe bitagira ubuzima, nk’umwironge canke inanga. Mbega bivuze co kimwe, hari uwoshobora kumenya ikivugijwe?
Kandi n’inzamba itavugijwe mw’ijwi ribereye, abasoda ntibomenya ko bahamagawe ngo baje ku rugamba.
No kuri mwebwe ni uko. Mutavuze amajambo atahuritse y’ururimi rwanyu, nta womenya ico muriko muravuga. Mwoba muriko mubwira ikirere gusa.
Kw’isi hari indimi nyinshi, kandi nta na rumwe rutagira ico rusigura.
None rero, ntaronse insiguro y’ivyo mbariwe noba ndi umunyamahanga kuri uwo ambarira, kandi na we nyene yoba ari umunyamahanga kuri jewe.
Na mwebwe ni uko. Ko mufise umwete wo kurondera ingabire za Mpwemu, mukore ibishoboka kugira muronke ingabire zubaka ishengero.
Ni co gituma nimba hari uwuvuga mu ndimi zitamenyekana yari akwiye gusenga Imana ngo imushoboze gusobanura ivyo avuga.
Kuko iyo nsenga mu ndimi zitamenyekana, impwemu yanje ni yo iba iriko irasenga, ariko simba ndiko nkoresha ubwenge bwanje.
None ndabigenze gute? Nzosengesha impwemu yanje, ariko nzosengesha n’ubwenge. Nzoririmbisha impwemu yanje, ariko kandi nzoririmbisha n’ubwenge bwanje.
Nimwaba muriko muratazira Imana n’impwemu zanyu zonyene, abatabitahura bokwifatanya namwe gute, bakavuga “Amen” ku bw’amashimwe yanyu, kandi batumva ivyo muvuga?
Mushobora kuba muriko murashima Imana cane, ariko ntibizofasha abariko barabumva.
Ndashima Imana ko mvuga mu ndimi kubasumvya.
Ariko mu rusengero, mpitamwo kuvuga amajambo yumvikana atanu arimwo inyigisho aho kuvuga amajambo ibihumbi cumi mu ndimi zitamenyekana.
Bene Data, ntimube nk’abana bato mu gutahura ibi. Mube abana bato ku bijanye n’icaha, ariko mube nk’abakuze mu gutahura ibintu nk’ibi.
Mu vyagezwe haranditswe ngo: “Nzobwira abantu banje mu ndimi zitazwi, nkoresheje akanwa ka ba kavantara. Ariko na ho nyene, ntibazonyumvira.” Ni ko Umwami Imana avuze.
Indimi zitamenyekana rero ni ikimenyetso ku batizera, si ku bizera. Ariko ubuvugishwa ntibuhari ku neza y’abizera, ni ku y’abatizera.
None rero, abatizera canke abantu badatahura ivyo kuvuga mu ndimi zitamenyekana baje mu makoraniro y’ishengero yanyu, bakumva muvuga mu ndimi zitamenekana, bazokwibaza ko mwasaze.

Ariko abatizera canke abadatahura ivyo kuvuga indimi zitamenyekana nibaza bagasanga mwese muriko muravugishwa, bazokwemezwa mu mitima yabo ko ari abanyavyaha, kandi ko bazocirirwa urubanza n’ivyo muvuga,
maze ivyinyegeje mu mitima yabo bizobe bigiye ahabona. Bazoheza bakubite ibipfukamiro hasi bahimbaze Imana, bavuge bati: “Vy’ukuri Imana iri kumwe namwe!”

Muri make rero bene Data, iyo mukoraniye hamwe, hazoba uwuririmba, uwundi yigishe, uwundi avuge ico Imana yamuhishuriye, uwundi avuge mu ndimi zitamenyekana, uwundi na we azisobanure. Ariko vyose bikorwe ku buryo bibubaka mwese.
Abantu nka babiri canke batatu gusa abe ari bo bavuga mu ndimi zitamenyekana kandi havuge umwe umwe, hongere habeho uwuzisobanura.
Ata musobanuzi ahari, uwo muntu ntazovuge mu rusengero, azokwiganirire n’Imana wenyene.
Abantu nka babiri canke batatu bazotange ubuvugishwa, abandi na bo basese, bihweze ivyavuzwe.
Nimba hari uwicaye mu rusengero hanyuma akagira ico abwiwe n’Umwami Imana, uwari asanzwe ariko aravuga azoce abanza ahagarike.
Abavugishwa n’Imana bose bazokuranwa kuvuga, umwe avuge uwundi ahejeje, kugira mugire ico mutahuye hanyuma muterwe intege.
Abavugishwa n’Imana bategerezwa kuganza impwemu zabo, bagakuranwa kuvuga,
kuko Imana yacu atari Imana y’akajagari, ariko ari Imana y’amahoro, nk’uko bigenda mu mashengero yose y’abera.
Abagore bazogume banumye mw’ishengero. Ntibemerewe kuvuga, ahubwo bicishe bugufi nk’uko ivyagezwe bivuga.
Bafise ico babaza, bazokibarize abagabo babo i muhira. Kuko bitabereye ko umugore avuga mu makoraniro y’ishengero.
Mbega ijambo ry’Imana ryamutse muri mwebwe? Canke mwibaza ko ari mwebwe mwenyene ryahawe?
Nimba muri mwebwe hari uwibwira ko ari umuvugishwa n’Imana canke afise ingabire za Mpwemu Yera, akwiye kwemera ko ivyo ndabandikiye ari ibwirizwa rivuye ku Mwami Imana.
Uwutavyemera, na we ntazokwemerwa.
None rero bene Data, mwipfuze kuvugishwa n’Imana, kandi ntimubuze abavugishwa n’Imana mu ndimi zitamenyekana.
Ariko vyose bikorwe mu buryo bubereye, kandi mu rutonde.
Ubu na ho bene Data, nagomba kubibutsa Ubutumwa Bwiza nababwiye, ubwo mwakiriye mukabugumamwo.
Ubwo Butumwa ni bwo bubakiza mwumiye ku majambo nababwiye. Ahandi ho ukwizera kwanyu kwoba ari ukw’ubusa.
Kuko ivyo nahawe ari vyo nabashikirije nk’ivy’igiciro vya mbere: ko Kristo yapfiriye ivyaha vyacu, nk’uko Ivyanditswe bibivuga,
ko yahambwe hanyuma akazuka ku musi ugira gatatu nk’uko Ivyanditswe bibivuga,
kandi ko yiyeretse Kefa, hanyuma yiyereka bamwe cumi na babiri.
Inyuma yaho yiyerekera rimwe bene Data barenga amajana atanu, kandi n’aho benshi muri bo bamaze gupfa, bamwe muri bo baracariho.
Maze yiyereka Yakobo, yongera yiyereka n’izindi ntumwa zose,
Ubwa nyuma aranyiyereka nanje, nk’uwavutse mu gihe kitari co.
Koko ndi uwa nyuma mu ntumwa kandi simbereye kwitwa intumwa, kuko nahamye ishengero ry’Imana.
Ariko ndi uwo ndi kubera ubuntu bw’Imana, kandi ubwo buntu ntibwapfuye ubusa. Nakoze cane gusumba izindi ntumwa, ariko ntiyari jewe, bwari ubuntu bw’Imana bwakorera muri jewe.
Ariko yaba jewe, yaba bo, ivyo ni vyo twigisha, kandi ni vyo mwizeye.
None rero nimba twigisha ko Kristo yazutse mu bapfuye, ni kubera iki bamwe muri mwebwe bavuga ko ata zuka ry’abapfuye rihari?
Nimba ata zuka ry’abapfuye rihari, na Kristo rero ntiyazutse.
Kandi nimba Kristo atazutse, inyigisho zacu ni iz’ubusa, kandi n’ukwizera kwanyu ni ukw’ubusa.
Kandi ikirengeye ivyo, twebwe intumwa twoba tubeshera Imana, kuko twama dushinga intahe ko Imana yazuye Kristo mu bapfuye. Ariko nimba Imana itamuzuye mu bapfuye, koko nta zuka ry’abapfuye rihari.
Kandi nimba abapfuye batazozurwa, na Kristo ntiyazuwe mu bapfuye.
Nimba na ho Kristo atazutse, ukwizera kwanyu ni ukw’ubusa, muracagendera mu vyaha vyanyu.
N’abapfiriye muri Kristo ntibazosubira kubaho.
Nimba ivyizigiro vyacu muri Kristo ari ivy’ubu buzima gusa, turi abahombe gusumba abandi bantu bose.
Ariko koko Kristo yarazutse mu bapfuye, maze, nk’ivyeze ubwa mbere, aba icemeza ko abapfuye bazozuka.
Nk’uko urupfu rwazanywe n’umuntu, n’ukuzuka kw’abapfuye na kwo kuzanwa n’umuntu.
Nk’uko muri Adamu bose bapfuye, muri Kristo bose bazogirwa bazima.
Ariko hazoba urukurikirane mu kuzuka: Kristo yarazutse nk’ivyeze ubwa mbere; hanyuma abamukurikiye bose bazozuka niyagaruka.
Inyuma y’aho hazoca haza umuhero wa vyose, aho azotanga Ubwami akabushikiriza Imana Data, amaze gusangangura ububasha bwose, ubutware bwose n’ubushobozi bwose.
Kuko ategerezwa kuganza gushitsa ashize abansi biwe musi y’ibirenge vyiwe.
Umwansi azosangangurwa ubwa nyuma ni rupfu.

Kuko Ivyanditswe bivuga biti: “Imana yashize vyose musi y’ububasha bwiwe.” Ariko rero bivuze ko “vyose” biri musi y’ububasha bwiwe, biragaragara ko bitaba bishizemwo Imana kuko ni yo ishira vyose musi y’ububasha bwa Kristo.
Maze vyose nivyamara gushirwa musi y’ububasha bwa Kristo, na we azoja musi y’ububasha bw’Imana yashize vyose musi y’ububasha bw’Umwana wayo, ibe vyose muri vyose.
Nimba ata zuka ririho, none abo babatizwa mu kibanza c’abapfuye babigira biteze iki? Nimba abapfuye batazozuka, ni kubera iki hari ababatizwa mu kibanza cabo?
Kandi ni kubera iki natwe twishira mu ntambara umwanya wose?
Bene Data, ndababwije ukuri ko mpakwa kwicwa ku musi ku musi. Ibi ni ukuri nk’uko munezero mfise kubera ivyo Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo yakoze muri mwebwe.

Nimba naragwanye n’ibikoko vyo mw’ishamba muri Efeso, ata yindi nyungu niteze atari ivyizigiro vyo mu mubiri gusa, nzoba nungutse iki? Kandi nimba ata kuzuka kuriho, nk’uko wa mugani uvuga: “Reka twirire twongere twinywere, kuko ejo tuzopfa.”
Ntihagire uwubazimiza: “Abagenzi babi bonona ingeso z’umuntu.”
Garura ubwenge nk’uko bibereye, mureke kwama mukora ivyaha. Ibi ndabivuze kugira ngo ndabatere kugira isoni, kuko bamwe muri mwebwe bataramenya Imana na gato.
Ariko bamwe muri mwebwe barabaza bati: “Mbega abapfuye bozozuka gute? Bazoba bafise umubiri umeze gute?”
Mwa mburabwenge mwe! Imbuto ntishobora kumera itabanje gupfa.
Ico mubiba si urya mutumba w’igiterwa ukura, ahubwo ni imbuto zisanzwe, zaba ingano canke izindi mbuto.
Hanyuma Imana ikayiha umutumba nk’uko yabiteguye, kandi igatanga imitumba itandukanye bivanye n’imbuto.
Imibiri yose ntimeze co kimwe: abantu bafise imibiri yabo, ibikoko bikagira iyavyo, inyoni zikagira iyazo, n’amafi akagira iyayo.
Hari ibiba mu kirere, hakaba n’ibiba kw’isi, ariko ibiba mu kirere bifise ugukayangana kwavyo, ivyo kw’isi bikagira ugukayangana kwavyo.
Izuba rigira ugukayangana kwaryo, ukwezi kukagira ugukayangana kwakwo, inyenyeri na zo zikagira ugukayangana kwazo, kandi n’inyenyeri ubwazo zigira ugukayangana gutandukanye.
Ni ko bizoba bimeze ku musi w’izuka ry’abapfuye. Uwu mubiri uhambwa ni uwubora, ariko uzozurirwa kubaho ibihe vyose.
Imibiri yacu ihambwa ata co imaze, ariko izozurirwa ubwiza butangaje. Ihambwa ari iminyantegenke ariko izozurirwa kuba iminyenkomezi.
Ihambwa ari imibiri y’abantu nk’uko tuyibona, ariko izozurwa ari imibiri yo mu buryo bw’impwemu. Kuko nk’uko hari imibiri isanzwe, hariho n’imibiri yo mu buryo bw’impwemu.
Ivyanditswe bivuga ngo: “Umuntu wa mbere, ari we Adamu, yabaye uwufise ubuzima,” Adamu wa nyuma, ari we Kristo yaje ari Impwemu itanga ubugingo.
Uw’impwemu si we yaje ubwa mbere, habanje kuza uw’umubiri, hanyuma haza uw’impwemu.
Umuntu wa mbere, ari we Adamu, yavuye mw’ivu, uwo hanyuma, ni we Kristo, yavuye mw’ijuru.
Ab’isi bameze nk’uw’isi, ariko ab’ijuru bameze nk’uw’ijuru.
Kandi nk’uko twavutse dufise kamere muntu k’uw’isi, ni ko tuzosa n’uw’ijuru.
Ico ngomba kubabwira bene Data, ni uko uwu mubiri twambaye utazoragwa Ubwami bw’Imana, kandi ibibora vyose ntibizoragwa ibizohoraho.
Ariko reka ndababwire ibanga rihambaye: ntituzopfa, ahubwo tuzohindurwa ukundi.
Bizoba mu kanya isase, nk’uwukubise urugohe, igihe inzamba izovuga. Niyavuga abazoba barapfuye bazoca bazukira kubaho ibihe vyose. Natwe tuzoba tukiri bazima, tuzoca duhindurwa ukundi.
Uyu mubiri wacu ubora uzoca wambara ukutabora, kandi uwu mubiri wacu upfa uzoca wambara ukudapfa.
Maze uwu mubiri ubora umaze kwambara ukutabora, n’ugupfa kwawo kukambara ukudapfa, ni ho ibi vyanditswe bizoba bishitse, ngo: “Urupfu rwamizwe n’intsinzi.”
“Wa rupfu we, intsinzi yawe iri hehe? Wa rupfu we, uruboyi rwawe ruri he?”
Kuko icaha ni uruboyi rw’urupfu, kandi ububasha bw’icaha buri mu vyagezwe.
Ariko Imana ishimwe, kuko iduha intsinzi muri Yesu Kristo.
None bene Data nkunda, mushikame ntihagire ikibanyiganyiza. Mwihebere ibikorwa vy’Umwami kuko muzi neza ko ibikorwa vyanyu atari impfagusa mu Mwami.
Ku bijanye no kwegeranya uburyo bwo gufasha abizera b’i Yerusalemu, mubikore nk’uko nabihanuye amashengero y’i Galatiya.
Ku musi wa mbere w’indwi, umwe wese muri mwebwe arabika amahera ku yo yungutse. Ntimuzorindire ko nshika hiyo hanyuma ngo muce muyatoreza rimwe.
Ninashika hiyo, nzokwandika amakete nzorungikana abo muzoba mwatoranije kugira batware infashanyo zanyu i Yerusalemu.
Kandi nivyaba nkenerwa ko njana na bo, bazomperekeza.
Nzobagendera mvuye i Makedoniya kuko nipfuza gucayo.
Ndashobora kuzomarana namwe igihe, mbere nshobora kuhamara igihe c’imbeho nyinshi cane, kugira ngo muzomfashe ku bijanye no kubandanya urugendo, iyo nzoba ngiye hose.
Sinshaka kuhaca ndengana, nipfuza kumarana namwe umwanya ukwiye Umwami Imana abikunze.
Ariko mu kurindira nzoba ndagumye aha muri Efeso gushitsa ku musi wa Pentekote,
kuko hariho akaryo keza ko gukorera Imana naho hari abangwanya benshi.
Timoteyo niyashika hiyo, muzomwakire neza kugira agubwe neza muri mwebwe, kuko ariko akora igikorwa c’Umwami co kimwe nanje.
Ntihazogire uwumugaya, ahubwo mumuhezagize ibikenewe mu rugendo rwiwe agarutse. Twe na bene Data tumurindiranye igishika.
Ku vyerekeye mwene Data Apolo na we, naramwinginze ngo azanane n’abandi bene Data iwanyu, ariko ntiyipfuje kuza ubwo nyene, azoza niyaronka akaryo keza.
Mube maso, mushikame mu kwizera, mube abagabo, mugire umwete, mugire umutima rugabo.
Ivyo mukora vyose mubikore mu rukundo.
Murazi ko abo mu muryango wa Setefana ari bo bizeye ubwa mbere muri Akaya, baca bihebera gukorera abizera: ndabinginze rero bene Data,
ngo murongorwe n’abantu nka bo, canke n’abifatanije na bo muri ico gikorwa.
Naranezerewe cane numvise ko Setefana, Forotunate na Akayiko bashitse ngaha. Bamfashishije ivyo nari nkeneye vyose mu kibanza canyu.
Baranteye intege nk’uko babateye intege. Abantu nk’abo ni abo gushimira ku bw’ibikorwa vyiza bakora.
Amashengero yo muri Aziya arabatasha. Akwilasi na Pirisila na bo barabatasha cane mu Mwami, co kimwe n’ishengero rihurira mu nzu yabo.
Bene Data bose turi kumwe hano barabatasha. Muramukanye mu kugumbirana kwera.
Jewe Pawulo, ndabandikiye ndabatasha n’ukuboko kwanje.
Nimba hariho uwudakunda Umwami, uwo aravumwe. Kaze Mwami!
Ubuntu bw’Umwami wacu Yesu bubane namwe.
Ndabakunda mwese muri Kristo Yesu. Amen.
Jewe Pawulo, intumwa ya Kristo Yesu; yabihawe n’ugushaka kw’Imana, hamwe na mwene Data Timoteyo, Turabandikiye mwebwe ishengero ry’Imana ry’i Korinto, hamwe n’abera bose bo muri Akaya:
Ubuntu n’amahoro biva ku Mana Data wa twese no ku Mwami wacu Yesu Kristo bibe muri mwebwe.
Nihashimwe Imana, Se w’Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo, Data w’impuhwe n’ukwirura kwose,
we aduha ukwirurwa mu bihe vy’imibabaro kugira ngo natwe twiruze abandi ukwirurwa twahawe n’Imana.
Kuko nk’uko turushirizaho gusangira imibabaro na Kristo, ni na ko tuzorushiriza gusangira ukwirurwa na we.
Kandi nimba turiko turaca mu mibabaro, ni ukugira ngo mwirurwe mwongere muronke agakiza; nimba twiruwe, ni ukugira ngo namwe mwirurwe maze mushobore kwihanganira imibabaro isa n’iyo turiko turacamwo.
Ivyizigiro vyacu ku bwanyu birahamye, kuko turazi ko mufatanya natwe mu mibabaro yacu, kandi ko muzokwiruranwa natwe.
Bene Data, twibaza ko mukwiye kumenya imibabaro twabayemwo muri Aziya. Twaciye mu makuba arengeye ayo twashobora kwihanganira, dutakaza ivyizigiro, gushika aho twibaza ko tutorokotse.
Mu vy’ukuri, twumva ko twaciriwe urwo gupfa. Ariko ivyo vyabaye kugira ngo tureke kwizigira inkomezi zacu, ariko twizere Imana izura abapfuye.
Ni yo yadukijije ayo makuba yari kutwica, kandi ni yo izokwama idutabara. Muri yo ni ho twashize ivyizigiro vyacu kandi twizera ko izokwama idutabara.
Kandi namwe muzodushigikira mu masengesho, kugira ngo benshi bashime Imana ku bwacu, ku ngabire y’ubuntu yatugiriye mu kwishura amasengesho ya benshi.
Iki ni co twishimira: nk’uko umutima wacu ubishingira intahe, twigenjeje neza mw’isi, na canecane muri mwebwe, mu kwezwa no mu kuri biva ku Mana, turongowe n’ubuntu bw’Imana, atari ubwenge bw’abantu.
Kuko mu makete yacu tubandikira ivyo mushobora gusoma no gutahura gusa. Nizera ko
muzodutahura neza, n’aho mutadutahura neza ubu, ariko umusi Umwami Yesu azogarukirako, nk’uko natwe tubanezererewe.
Kuko nari nzi neza ko mudutahura kandi mukatwizera, nari nateguye kubagendera kugira ngo mugirirwe ubuntu kabiri.
Nari nateguye guca iwanyu ngiye i Makedoniya, nkongera nkahaca ngaruka, kugira mumfashe mu bikenewe ku rugendo rwanje nja i Yudaya.
Mbega nkibitegura sinari navyiyumviriyeko? Mbega nabaye nk’ab’isi bavuga “Egome” ariko mu mitima yabo ari “Oya”?
Nk’uko Imana ari umwizigirwa, ubutumwa bwacu ntibuvuga ngo “Egome” bisigura “Oya.”
Mu Mwana w’Imana Yesu Kristo, uwo twe na Silasi na Timoteyo twabigishije, ntiharimwo “Egome” na “Oya,” muri we ni “Egome” gusa.
Kuko amasezerano Imana yatanze yose ni “Egome” muri Kristo Yesu. Kandi muri we “Amen” tuvuga bisigura ngo “Egome” iraduga igahesha Imana icubahiro,
Imana ni yo iduha gukomerana namwe muri Kristo, kandi ni yo yaturobanuye,
idushirako ikimenyetso co kuba abayo, igashira Mpwemu wayo mu mitima yacu nk’ingwati y’ivyo yadusezeraniye vyose.
Imana ni yo ntanzeko icabona, ndahiye ubuzima bwanje, ko ivyo ndababwira ari ukuri. Igituma ntagarutse i Korinto, kwari ukugira ngo sindabateko ishavu.

Ariko ibi ntibisigura ko tugomba kubaremera tubabwira ngo mushire ukwizera kwanyu mu ngiro. Dushaka gukorera hamwe namwe kugira ngo umunezero wanyu wuzuzwe, kuko ukwizera kwanyu ni kwo kuzotuma mushikama.
Ni co gituma nafashe ingingo yo kudasubira kubagendera kugira ngo sinongere kubazanira umubabaro.
Kuko nimba narabateye umubabaro, hari abandi bazontera umunezero atari mwebwe nababaje?
Nabandikiye kurya kugira ngo ninaza sinzobabazwe n’abonteye umunezero. Ndizera neza ko iyo nezerewe munezeranwa nanje.
Nabandikiye mfise agahinda n’umubabaro mwinshi bivanze n’amarira, ntipfuza kubatera imibabaro, ariko nipfuza ko mumenya urukundo rwinshi ndabakunda.
Nimba hariho uwabateye umubabaro, si jewe yabikoreye, ni mwebwe mwese yabikoreye, canke bamwe muri mwebwe, kandi aha sindengeje urugero.
Abenshi muri mwebwe mwaramugwanije kandi ico gihano yahawe kiramaze.
Ni co gituma ubu hageze ko mumuharira, mukamwirura, ahandi ho umubabaro womuca intege.
Ndabinginga rero ngo musubire mumwereke urukundo.
Ikindi catumye ndabandikira kwari ukubageza ngo ndabe ko mukurikiza ivyo nababwiye vyose.
Uwo muntu mumuhariye, nanje nzoba ndamuhariye. Kandi igihe cose bikenewe ko ntanga imbabazi, ndabikora ku bwanyu ndi imbere ya Kristo,
kugira ngo Satani ntaronke aho adufatira, kuko turazi ivyo yiyumvira.
Igihe naja i Tirowa kuvuga Ubutumwa Bwiza bwa Kristo, nasanze Imana yanyugururiyeyo imiryango yo kubikora.
Ariko nagumanye umutima uhagaze kuko ntasanzeyo mwene Data Tito. Ni co gituma naciye ndabasezera nkaja i Makedoniya.
Ariko Imana ishimwe, yo yatugize imbohe zayo, ikaguma iturongora ubudasiba mu kwigina intsinzi ya Yesu. Iciye kuri twebwe, imenyekanisha Kristo kuri bose nk’umubavu umota neza.
Kuko ku Mana turi ubumote bwa Kristo, ku bariko barakizwa n’abariko baraja mu mahonero.
Ku bariko baraja mu mahonero turi umunuko w’urupfu, ariko ku bariko barakizwa turi akamoto k’ubuzima. Mbega ni nde abereye gukora igikorwa nk’iki?
Twebwe ntituvuga ijambo ry’Imana turondera inyungu nk’uko benshi babigira. Ahubwo muri Kristo tuvuga ukuri kwo mu mitima yacu turi imbere y’Imana, nk’abatumwe na yo.
Mbega dusubiriye gutangura kwihayagiza? Canke dukeneye amakete yo kuduhayagiza mwandikirwa canke mwandika, nk’uko bamwe bayakenera?
Ni mwebwe nyene makete yacu yanditswe mu mitima yacu, ayo bose basoma bakayatahura.

Muragaragaza ko muri ikete ryanditswe na Kristo, ryavuye mu gikorwa cacu, ritanditswe n’irangi ry’ikaramu, ariko ryanditswe na Mpwemu w’Imana nzima, atari ku bisate vy’amabuye ariko ku bisate vy’imitima y’abantu.
Ivyo turabizi neza kubera ukwizigira Imana guhambaye dufise muri Kristo.
Ntitwibaza ko dushoboye gukora ikintu na kimwe ku bw’inkomezi zacu, ariko Imana ni yo idushoboza gukora vyose.
Ni yo yatugize abakozi b’isezerano rishasha, isezerano ritavuye ku vyagezwe ariko rivuye kuri Mpwemu; kuko ivyagezwe birica ariko Mpwemu atanga ubugingo.

Igihe ivyagezwe vyandikwa ku bisate vy’amabuye indome ku yindi, ubwiza bw’Imana bwaciye bukayangana. Mu maso ha Mose harakayanganye gushika aho Abisirayeli batashobora kumuraba mu maso, ariko ukwo gukayangana kwari ukw’akanya gato. Nimba rero ivyagezwe bikora igikorwa co kuzanira abantu urupfu vyazananye n’ubwiza bungana gutyo,
mbega igikorwa ca Mpwemu Yera ntikizorushiriza kugira ubwiza burengeje?
Nimba igikorwa cadutsindisha cari cisakaje ubwiza, mbega igikorwa kituzanira ukugororoka ntikizorushiriza kwambara ubwiza?
Twovuga mbere ko imbere y’ubwo bwiza butangaje, ubwiza bwo hambere budasubira no kuboneka.
Kandi nimba ivya kera bihera vyari vyuzuye ubwiza, mbega ibishasha bizohoraho ntibizorushiriza kugira ubwiza burengeje?
Ko dufise ivyo vyizigiro, dufise ugushira amanga.
Ntitumeze nka Mose yahisha mu maso hiwe n’igitambara kugira ngo Abisirayeli ntibabone ukwo gukayangana, kandi kwari ukw’akanya gato.
Ariko ubwenge bwabo bwarimwo umwiza, kuko gushika n’ubu ico gitambara kibagumako iyo basoma ivy’isezerano rya kera. Nticigeze kibakurwako, kuko muri Kristo ari ho gikurirwaho.
No gushika uno musi, iyo basomye ivyagezwe vya Mose, ico gitambara kiguma gipfutse imitima yabo, bituma badatahura.
Ariko hagize uwuza ku Mwami Yesu, ca gitambara kimukurwako.
Umwami ni we Mpwemu, kandi aho Mpwemu w’Imana ari haba umwidegemvyo.

Natwe abakuweko ico gitambara, tugaragaza ubwiza bw’Umwami wacu, kandi tukaba turiko turahindurwa ngo duse na we, tuva mu bwiza tuja mu bundi, na bwo bukaba buva ku Mwami wacu, na we akaba ari we Mpwemu.
None rero, kubera ko Imana mu buntu bwayo yatwizigije iki gikorwa, imitima yacu ntihugumbwa.
Ariko twahevye ibiterasoni vyose twakora twinyegeje; ntidukoresha ubugunge, ntitugoramika ijambo ry’Imana. Ahubwo tuvugira ukuri ahabona, kugira ngo abantu bamenye abo turi imbere y’Imana.
Kandi nimba Ubutumwa Bwiza tuvuga budatahuritse, ni ku bariko baraja mu mahonero bonyene.
Umwami w’iyi si yarahumishije ubwenge bw’abatizera, kugira ngo ntibabone umuco w’Ubutumwa Bwiza bw’ubwiza bwa Kristo, we shusho y’Imana.
Kuko iyo tuvuga ubutumwa, ntitwivuga twebwe nyene. Ariko twigisha ko Yesu ari Umwami, natwe tukaba abakozi banyu ku bwa Kristo.
Imana yavuze iti: “Ahari umwijima nihabe umuco,” yatumye umuco wayo ukayangana mu mitima yacu kugira ngo turonke ugutahura ivy’ubwiza bw’Imana bukayanganira kuri Yesu Kristo.
Ariko twebwe ubwacu tumeze nk’udukono tumeneka turimwo ubwo butunzi buhebuje. Ni co cerekana ko ubushobozi buhambaye bukorera muri twebwe buva ku Mana, atari kuri twebwe.
Dushikirwa n’ingorane z’ubwoko bwose, ariko turi bazima. Turakehanirwa ariko ntiducika intege.
Turahamwa ariko ntituva ku Mana. Dukubitwa hasi ariko ntidupfa.
Mu mibabaro yacu, imibiri yacu isangira urupfu na Yesu kugira ngo ubuzima bwiwe bubonekere mu mibiri yacu.
N’aho turi bazima, twama duhakwa kwicwa ku bwa Yesu, kugira ngo ubuzima bwiwe bubonekere mu mibiri yacu ipfa.
Ni ukuvuga ko urupfu rukorera muri twebwe, kugira ngo ubugingo bukorere muri mwebwe.
Ariko twamizako tuvuga Ubutumwa Bwiza, kuko turi muri Mpwemu umwe n’umwanditsi wa Zaburi yavuze ati: “Nabanje kwizera, ari na yo mpamvu navuze.”
Turazi ko Imana yazuye Yesu mu bapfuye izotuzurana na we, itwerekane hamwe namwe imbere yiwe.
Imibabaro yose ducamwo ni ku bwanyu, kugira ngo ubuntu bw’Imana buriko burashikira benshi butume amashimwe asesekara, maze Imana ihabwe icubahiro.
Ni co gituma tudacika intege, naho imibiri yacu iriko irashira, umuntu wacu w’imbere aguma yiyubura ku musi ku musi.
Kuko imibabaro yacu naho ari mito kandi y’akanya gato, ituzanira ubwiza bw’akaburarugero kandi buzokwamaho.
None rero ntiduhanga amaso ku biboneka vy’ab’iki gihe, ariko tuyahanga ku bitaboneka, kuko ibiboneka ari ivy’akanya gato, ariko ibitaboneka bizokwamaho ibihe vyose.
Turazi neza ko iri ihema tubamwo ari wo mubiri wacu niwapfa ugakurwa kuri iyi si tuzoronka inyubakwa iva ku Mana, inzu izokwamaho yo mw’ijuru, itubatswe n’amaboko y’abantu.
Ivyo bitarashika, tunihira mu mubiri wacu, turindiriye kwambikwa imibiri yo mw’ijuru nk’ivyambarwa vyacu,
kuko tumaze kuyambara ntituzosangwa turi gusa.

Tukiri muri uwu mubiri twambaye, turaboroga, tukaruha, ariko ntibisigura ko twipfuza gupfa ngo tuwuvemwo. Ariko ni kubera twipfuza kwambara imibiri yacu mishasha, kugira ngo iyi mibiri ipfa ihindurwe iyizobaho ibihe vyose.
Imana ni yo nyene yabiduteguriye, ica iduha na Mpwemu wayo nk’ingwati yemeza ibizoza.
Nuko rero twama twumva turemye, naho tuzi ko tukiri muri iyi mibiri, tuba turi kure y’aho Umwami ari.
Tubayeho mu kwizera, ntitubayeho kubera ivyo tubona.
Twumva turemye nk’uko nabivuze, kandi icotubera ciza ni uko twova muri uwu mubiri, kuko twoca twigira i muhira kwibanira n’Umwami wacu.
Ariko ico twipfuza imbere ya vyose, ni ukunezereza Umwami wacu, haba mu kuguma muri uwu mubiri canke mu kuwuvamwo.
Kuko twese tuzohagarara imbere y’intebe y’imanza ya Kristo, kugira ngo umwe wese ahabwe impera y’ivyo yakoze akiri muri uwu mubiri, biba vyiza canke bibi.
Nuko rero kuko tuzi ico ari co kwubaha Umwami, dukora ibishoboka ngo twemeze abantu. Ico turi kiragaragarira Imana, kandi nizera ko namwe kibagaragarira mu mitima yanyu.

Ntituriko turondera kwemerwa namwe kandi, ariko dushaka kubaha akaryo ngo mwirate ku bwacu, kugira ngo muronke ico mwishura abishimira ibikorwa bihambaye bigaragarira amaso y’abantu ariko bitari mu mitima yabo.
Nimba tuboneka nk’ibijuju, ni ukugira ngo duheshe Imana icubahiro. Ariko nimba tuboneka nk’abanyabwenge, ni ku neza yanyu.
Kuko urukundo rwa Kristo ruratugobera. Kandi kubera tuzi ko Kristo yapfiriye bose, twese twarapfuye kuri kamere muntu kacu ka kera.
Kandi yapfiriye bose kugira ngo ntihagire uwubaho yinezereza ariko abeho anezereza uwamupfiriye akanamuzukira.
Ni co gituma uhereye ubu ata we tuciyumvirako twisunze ubwenge bw’abantu. Naho kera Kristo twamwiyumvira twisunze ubwenge bw’abantu, ubu si ko bikiri.
Kuko uwuri muri Kristo Yesu aba abaye icaremwe gishasha, ivya kera biba biheze, ibishasha biba bishitse.
Kandi ivyo vyose biva ku Mana yo yaduhaye kwuzura na yo biciye muri Kristo, ica iduha n’igikorwa c’umwuzuzo.
Kuko Imana yiyujuje n’isi muri Kristo itabaharuyeko ivyaha vyabo. Natwe yaduhaye ico gikorwa gihambaye co kuvuga ubutumwa bw’umwuzuzo.
None rero turi ivyariho vya Kristo, Imana iriko ibingingira muri twebwe. Natwe turabinginga mu gishingo ca Kristo ngo mwuzure n’Imana.
Imana yahinduye icaha uwutigeze acumura ku neza yacu, kugira ngo muri we ducike ukugororoka kw’Imana.
None rero ko dukorana n’Imana, turabinginga ngo ntimupfishe ubusa ubuntu bw’Imana.
Kuko Imana ivuga iti: “Igihe gikwiye kigeze narakwumvise, no ku musi wo gukirizwako naragutabaye.” Ndababwiye ko iki ari co gihe co kwemererwamwo, uwu ni wo musi wo gukirizwako.
Twirinda kugira uwo tubera igitsitaza kugira ngo igikorwa cacu ntikigawe.
Mu vyo dukora vyose, twerekana ko turi abakozi b’Imana b’ukuri mu kwihanganira amarushwa, imibabaro, n’ivyago vy’ubwoko bwose:
mu gukubitwa, mu gushirwa mw’ibohero, mu gukora ibikorwa vyinshi biruhije, mu kurara ijoro, mu gusonza.
Ivyo dukora vyose tubikorana imitima itanduye, dufise ubwenge, dufise ukwihangana n’ubugwaneza biva kuri Mpwemu Yera, no mu rukundo atari uruheyiheyi.
Twigisha Ijambo ry’Imana mu bwizigirwa no mu kuri kwaryo, kandi ubushobozi bw’Imana bukorera muri twebwe. Twitwaje ibigwanisho vy’ukugororoka mu kuryo no mu kubamfu.
Turakorera Imana abantu batwubaha canke batugaya, badutuka canke badushima. Turi imvugakuri, ariko batwita ababeshi.
Dufatwa nk’abatazwi ariko tuzwi na bose. Dusa n’abegereje urupfu ariko tubandanya tubaho. Turakubitwa ariko ntidupfa.
Turababazwa mu mitima ariko twamana umunezero. Dufatwa nk’abakenye ariko dutungishije benshi. Tuboneka nk’aho ata co dufise ariko dufise vyose.
Bagenzi b’i Korinto, twababwiranye umutima utagira uburyarya, kandi twabugururiye imitima yacu.
Ntitwananiwe no kubereka urukundo, ariko ni mwebwe mwugaye imitima yanyu.
None rero ndababwiye nk’abana banje ngo mwakire urukundo rwacu, mutwugururire imitima yanyu.
Ntimukifatanye n’abatizera, kuko ubugororotsi n’ubukozi bw’ikibi nta ho bihurira, kandi umuco n’umwijima nta co bisangiye.
Mbe Kristo na Beliyali hari ico bahurirako? Mbega uwizera n’uwutizera bohurira ku ki?
Mbega Imana hari ico yohurirako n’ibigirwamana? Turi ingoro y’Imana, kandi Imana yavuze iti: “Nzoba muri bo nongere ngendane na bo. Nzoba Imana yabo, na bo bazoba abantu banje.”
None rero, “Nimuve muri bo, mwitandukanye na bo, ni ko Uhoraho Imana avuze. Ntihagire igihumanye mukorako, nanje nzobiyegereza.”
Kandi, “Nzobabera So, namwe muzombera abahungu n’abakobwa, ni ko Uhoraho Mushoboravyose avuze.”
None rero bene Data, ko dufise ayo masezerano, nimuze twiyeze, twiyambure ivyonona imitima n’imibiri yacu vyose. Turondere ukwezwa kuvuye ku kwubaha no gutinya Imana.
Turabinginze ngo mutwugururire imitima yanyu. Nta we twacumuyeko, kandi nta we twazimije, kandi nta we twarondeyeko inyungu.
Ibi sindiko ndabivuga mu kubacira urubanza. Nababwiye ko muri mu mitima yacu, kandi ko turi kumwe namwe dupfa canke tubaho.
Ndabizeye cane kandi ndabanezererewe cane. Mwaranteye intege cane, kandi mu mibabaro yose naciyemwo, umunezero wanje urasesekaye.
Igihe twashika i Makedoniya, imibiri yacu ntiyigeze ironka agahengwe. Twahuye n’ingorane nyinshi: intambara zari zidukikuje, hamwe n’ubwoba bwari mu mitima yacu.
Ariko Imana itera intege abihebuye yaduhoresheje ukuza kwa Tito.

Twaranezerewe tumubonye tukumva n’ubutumwa bw’indemesho mwamurungikanye. Amaze kumbwira ingene mwipfuza ko nza iwanyu, n’ukuntu mubabajwe n’ivyadushikiye, hamwe n’ishaka mwerekanye mu kunyitaho, umunezero wanje wabaye uw’akaburarugero.
Naho nabateye imibabaro mw’ikete nabarungikiye, sindavyicuza. Naho nari nicujije ubwa mbere kubera nari nabonye ko nabababaje, wari umubabaro w’akanya gato.

Ubu ndanezerewe kubona nararibandikiye, atari kubera ryabababaje, ariko kubera umubabaro ryabateye watumye mwihana mugaheba inzira zanyu mbi. Ni wo mubabaro Imana ishaka ku bantu bayo, ari na co gituma, mu buryo bumwe canke ubundi, atari twebwe twabababaje.
Umubabaro uvuye ku Mana utera ukwihana, ukwihana na kwo gushikana ku gakiza, kandi ntutera ukwicuza. Ariko umubabaro wo muri iyi si ujana mu rupfu.

Nimurabe ico uwo mubabaro uvuye ku Mana wakoze muri mwebwe: wabateye umwete mwinshi, ishaka ryinshi ryo kugaragaza ko ata co mwagirizwa, kubabazwa n’akarenganyo, gutinya, inkumbu, ishaka, umwitwaririko wo kubona icaha gihanwa. Muri ivyo vyose mwarerekanye ko mwejejwe.
Intumbero yanje rero ntiyari ukwandika ku bagize nabi canke abagiriwe nabi. Nabandikiye kugira ngo mu nyonga z’Imana umwitwarariko mudufitiye ugaragare.
Ivyo rero vyaraduteye intege. Kandi icongeye ku kuntu mwaduteye intege, twaranezerewe cane no kubona ingene Tito yari anezerejwe n’ukuntu mwaruhuye umutima wiwe.
Naramubwiye ingene nabanezererewe, kandi ntimwigeze mumaramaza. Ariko nk’uko ivyo twababwiye vyose vyari ivy’ukuri, n’ukubirata kwacu kuri Tito kwari ukw’ukuri.
Kandi iyo yibutse ingene mwese mwamwumvira n’ukuntu mwamwakiranye igitinyiro n’icubahiro cinshi, umutima wiwe urushirizaho kubagirira igishika.
Ndanezerewe cane kuko nshobora kubizera muri vyose.
Bene Data, turashaka ko mumenya ubuntu Imana yagiriye amashengero y’i Makedoniya.
Bageragejwe n’ivyago vyinshi kandi bafise ubworo bw’akaburarugero. Ariko bafise umunezero usagutse, wagaragariye mu gutanga kwabo.
Ndabishingira intahe ko batanze uko bashoboye, ndetse n’ibirengeye uko bashoboye. Kandi batanze bavyishakiye bo nyene.
Baratwinginze kenshi ngo tubagirire ubuntu ngo bagire ico bakoze mu gutanga imfashanyo igenewe abera b’i Yerusalemu.
Bakoze ibirengeye ivyo twari twiteze, kanatsinda babanje kwitanga ubwabo, biha Umwami bongera baratwiha nk’uko Imana yabigomvye.
Ni co gituma twinginze Tito, uwabateye intege zo gutanga mu ntango, ngo agaruke abandanye ico gikorwa c’ubuntu akirangize.
Ariko nk’uko muri agakura mu kwizera, mu mvugo, mu bumenyi, mu mwete mwinshi no mu rukundo mudufitiye, mube agakura muri ubwo buntu bwo gutanga.
Ibi sindabibabwira nk’itegeko, ariko nshaka kumenya ko urukundo rwanyu atari uruheyiheyi tugereranije n’umwete ayandi mashengero afise.
Kuko muzi ubuntu bw’Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo, ko n’aho yari umutunzi wa vyose, yigize umukene ku bwanyu kugira ngo mu bukene bwiwe mube abatunzi.
Iyi ni yo nama yanje y’uko bikwiye kugenda: mu mwaka uheze mwabaye ab’imbere atari mu gutanga gusa, ariko no mu gufata ingingo yo kubikora.
None rero nimurangize ico gikorwa mwatanguye, kugira ngo rirya shaka mwerekanye mu ntango ribonekere mu kubishira mu ngiro. Mutange bivanye n’uko mwishoboye.
Kuko iyo umuntu afise umutima wo gutanga, Imana ntiyakira ico adafise, ahubwo yakira ico afise.
Ico twipfuza si uko bamwe bagira agahengwe namwe musigaye mu bukene, ariko ni uko mwogira ibingana.
Ubu mufise umusesekara, kandi murashoboye gufasha abakenye. Ikindi gihe kizoza aho na bo bazoba bafise umusesekara, bakabafasha mukenye. Aho ni ho hazoba hari ukungana.
Nk’uko Ivyanditswe bivuga: “Abegeranije vyinshi basanze bitarenze ivyo bakeneye, abegeranije bike na bo basanze bitari musi y’ivyo bari bakeneye.”
Ndashima Imana yashize mu mutima wa Tito umwitwarariko nk’uwanje ku bwanyu.
Kuko yakiranye umutima mwiza ugutera intege kwacu, kandi akaba afise inyota yo kugaruka iwanyu avyishakiye.
Tumurungikanye n’uwundi mwene Data ashimwa n’amashengero yose ku bw’ibikorwa vyiwe vy’Ubutumwa Bwiza.
Kandi ishengero ni ryo ryamugenye ngo aduherekeze dutwaye imfashanyo i Yerusalemu, igikorwa c’ubuntu gihesha Imana icubahiro, kikerekana umwete dufise mu gufasha abatishoboye.
Dushaka ko ata wodutora utunenge mu buryo dutanga izo mfashanyo.
Kuko twipfuza kubikora neza mu bwizigirwa, atari imbere y’Imana, ariko no mu maso y’abantu.
Tubarungikanye kandi n’uwundi mwene Data twabonyemwo ishaka muri vyinshi. Noneho iryo shaka ryabaye ryinshi ku bw’ivyizigiro afise muri mwebwe.
Nayo Tito we, ni umugenzi dufatanije igikorwa muri mwebwe; abo bandi bene Data na bo, ni intumwa z’amashengero, kandi bubaha Kristo.
Nuko rero nimubereke, imbere y’amashengero, icemeza ko urukundo mubafitiye ari urw’ukuri kandi ko dufise imvo ituma tubanezerererwa.
Ntivyari bikwiye ko ndinda kubandikira mwebwe abizera ivy’iki gikorwa co gutanga,

kuko ndazi inyota mufise yo gufasha. Namye ndavyirata kw’ishengero ry’i Makedoniya, ndababwira ko kuva mu mwaka uheze mwebwe abo muri Akaya mwari mwamaze kuvyitegurira, kandi ishaka ryanyu ni ryo ryatumye benshi bo mw’ishengero ry’i Makedoniya batangura gutanga.
Ariko ndungitse abo bene Data kugira ngo menye neza ko mwiteguye nk’uko nababwiye, kandi kugira mwegeranye imfashanyo zanyu. Sinshaka ko ivyirato vyanje ku bwanyu vyoba ivy’ubusa.
Kuko hamwe hogira ab’i Makedoniya tuzanana hanyuma bagasanga mutiteguye, twomaramara, ariko mwebwe mwomaramara kurusha kuko mwabivuganye ugushira amanga.

Ni co gituma nabonye ko ari nkenerwa kwinginga bene Data ngo babagendere imbere y’uko nza kugira ngo batunganye neza ico gikorwa co gutanga mwiyemeje. Mubitegure nk’igikorwa kivuye mu rukundo, atari ico musunikiwemwo.
Mwibuke bene Data: ababiba bike bimbura bike, kandi ababiba vyinshi bimbura vyinshi.
Umuntu wese atange ikivuye ku mutima. Ntimupfe gutanga canke ngo mutange kuko mubitegetswe, kuko Imana ikunda uwutangana umunezero.
Imana irashoboye kubuzuza ubuntu bwayo kugira ngo muri vyose na hose muronke ivyo mukeneye, mugire n’ibisagutse bituma mukora igikorwa ciza cose.
Nk’uko Ivyanditswe bibivuga: “Batanga isabagire ku bakene, ukugororoka kwabo kwamaho ibihe bidashira.”
None rero uwuha imbuto umurimyi akamuha n’ivyokurya, azobuzuriza imbuto mu bigega, yongere agwize umwimbu w’ukugororoka kwanyu.
Muzotungishwa mu buryo bwose kugira ngo muronke ico mutanga aho bizoba bikenewe hose, kandi imfashanyo muduha zizotuma abazironka bahimbaza Imana.
Ico gikorwa ntikizofasha mu kuronsa abera ivyo bakeneye gusa, ariko kizotuma banahimbaza Imana n’umunezero mwinshi muriko muragikora.
Kubera igikorwa mukora, bazohimbaza Imana kubera ukwumvira kwanyu guherekeza Ubutumwa Bwiza bwa Kristo muvuga, n’umutima w’urukundo mwerekana mu kubafasha no mu gufasha n’abandi na bo.
Kandi bazobasengera n’umutima w’urukundo, kubera ubuntu busesekaye Imana yabagiriye.
Imana ishimwe ku bw’iyi ngabire yayo y’akaburarugero!
Jewe Pawulo, ndabinginze n’umutima wiyoroheje no mu bugwaneza buva kuri Kristo, naho mwibaza ko ntari imvuzi imbere yanyu ariko nkabakarira iyo tutari kumwe.
Mbaye ndabinginga hakiri kare kugira ngo ninaza sinzorinde kubakarira nk’uko nzokarira abibaza ko dukurikira inyungu z’abantu.
Naho tuba muri iyi si, ntitugwana nk’ab’iyi si.
Ibigwanisho tugwanisha ntibimeze nk’ibigwanisho vy’iyi si. Ahubwo dufise ibigwanisho bifise ubushobozi buva ku Mana, bushobora gusambura ivyigize ibinani, no gusambura ivyiyumviro bibi.
Dusambura ivyiyumviro bibi vyose vyishize hejuru mu kubuza abantu kumenya Imana, tugafata mpiri ivyiyumviro vy’abagarariji vyose tukabashikana ku kwubaha Kristo.
Kandi nimwashika ku kwubaha kwose, tuzohana abo bose bazoba bakiri mu bikorwa vy’ubugarariji.
Nimurabire ku biboneka. Abavuga ko ari aba Kristo bategerezwa kumenya ko natwe turi aba Kristo co kimwe na bo.
Kuko naho nishimira ububasha Umwami wacu yaduhaye bwo kubakomeza atari ubwo kubasambura, ntibinteye isoni gukoresha ubwo bubasha.
Sinshaka kuboneka nk’aho ndiko ngerageza kubatera ubwoba mu makete ndabandikira,
kuko bamwe muri mwebwe bavuga bati: “Amakete ya Pawulo aragumye kandi arimwo uburake. Ariko iyo ari kumwe natwe aboneka nk’umunyantege nke adakwiye no kwumvirizwa.”
Abavuga uko bakwiye kumenya ko uko turi muri ayo makete tutari kumwe na we ari ko tuzoba tumeze mu bikorwa vyacu nitwaba kumwe namwe.

Ntitwubahuka kwiha ibibanza canke ngo twigereranye twebwe ubwacu nk’uko bamwe babigira. Abo bigereranya kuri bo ubwabo ni imburabwenge! Ntidushobora kuvuga ko turi ibitangaza nk’abo bababwira ko bahambaye cane. Bigereranya na bo nyene kandi bakigera kuri bo nyene. Ni imburabwenge.
Ariko ntitwishima mu birengeye aho tugeza ububasha. Twishimira ivyabereye mu bikorwa Imana yaduhaye, harimwo ivyo dukorera muri mwebwe.
Ntidushobora kwishimira ibirenze aho, nk’aho twoba tutigeze kubagendera, kuko n’iwanyu twahashitse tuzanye Ubutumwa Bwiza bwa Kristo.
Kandi ntidushobora no kwirata ngo turondere kwemerwa ku bw’ibikorwa vyakozwe n’abandi. Ivyizigiro vyacu ni uko ukwizera kwanyu kuzobandanya gukura, igikorwa cacu muri mwebwe kikaguka,
kugira ngo dushobore kuvuga Ubutumwa Bwiza mu yandi mahanga. Ni ho tutazokwirata ibikorwa vyakozwe n’abandi mu ntara zabo.
Nk’uko Ivyanditswe bivuga, “Uwirata wese yirate ko yamenye Umwami Yesu,”
kuko uwirata atari we yemerwa, ariko hemerwa uwushimwe n’Umwami.
Nizera ko muzokwihanganira ubupfu bwanje. Ndabinginze munyihanganire.
Mfise ipfuhe ryinshi mu Mana ku bwanyu. Nabemereye ko muzogira ubukwe n’umugabo umwe gusa, ari we Yesu Kristo, kugira ngo nzobashikane imbere yiwe muri inkumi zitagira agatosi.
Ariko ndatinya ko nk’uko Eva yahenzwe n’ubugunge bw’inzoka, namwe Satani ashobora kuzimiza ubwenge bwanyu mukava mu kwiha Kristo gutunganye kwanyu.

Kuko iyo hagize uwubigisha Yesu atari umwe twabigisha, canke mukaronka iyindi mpwemu itandukanye n’iyo mwakiriye ubwa mbere, canke mukaronka ubutumwa butandukanye n’ubwo mwemeye ubwa mbere, muravyihanganira.
Nibaza ko abo mwibaza ko ari intumwa zikomeye ata co bansumvya.
Nshobora kuba ntari imvuzi ariko simbuze ubumenyi, kandi ivyo twarabiberetse neza mu buryo bwose.
Mbega nakoze icaha aho nicisha bugufi kugira ngo ndabakuze mu kubabwira Ubutumwa Bwiza bw’Imana ata co ndabasavye?
Meze nk’aho nasahuye ayandi mashengero mu kwemera imfashanyo yayo kugira nshobore kubakorera ata co ndabasavye.

Kandi igihe nari kumwe namwe ngakena, nta we nigeze ndemera, kuko bene Data baje bava i Makedoniya bamfashishije ivyo nari nkeneye vyose. Namye nirinda kuremera umuntu n’umwe mu kintu na kimwe, kandi nzokwama ukwo.
Ndababwije ukuri kwa Kristo aba muri jewe: nta muntu n’umwe wo mu ntara ya Akaya yombuza kwirata ivyo.
Kubera iki mvuze uko? Mbega ni kubera ntabakunda? Haba na mba, n’Imana irabizi.
Nzobandanya nkora igikorwa canje muri mwebwe kugira ngo mbuze icitwazo abarondera ivyitwazo vyo kwirata ko bangana natwe mu vyo dukora.
Kuko abo bantu si intumwa z’ukuri, ni ababeshi bigira intumwa za Kristo.
Ariko nta gitangaje kuko na Satani yigira umumarayika w’umuco.
Nta gitangaje rero, n’abakozi biwe bashobora kwigira abakozi b’abagororotsi. Ku muhero wa vyose bazoronka impera ihwanye n’ibikorwa bakora.
Ndabisubiyemwo, ntihagire uwibaza ko ndi imburabwenge. Ariko nimba mwibaza ko ndi imburabwenge, nimunyumvirize nk’aho mwoba muriko mwumviriza imburabwenge, kugira ngo nanje nirate na gato.
Mu kwirata gutya sindiko mvuga nk’uko Umwami Yesu yovuga, ahubwo mvuze nk’igipfu.
Kandi kubera abandi bafise ivyo birata ivyo bakoze hano kw’isi nanje nogira ico nirata.
Muri vyose mwibaza ko muri incabwenge kandi muryoherwa no kwakira imburabwenge.
Ndetse mwihanganira n’ababagira abagurano, bakabarenganya bakabanyaga utwanyu, bakishira hejuru, bakabakubita urushi.
Numva mfise isoni zo kubabwira ko umenga twagize intege nke muri mwebwe, kubona tutigenjeje gutyo! Ariko nimba hari uwufise ico yokwubahuka kwirata, nanje ndagifise (ndabivugishijwe n’ubupfu).
Ni Abaheburayo? Nanje ndi we. Ni Abisirayeli? Nanje ndi we. Ni abana ba Aburahamu? Nanje ndi we.
Mbega ni abakozi ba Kristo? (Nataye ubwenge kubona ndiko mvuga uku) Ndabaruta. Nakoze cane kubasumvya, nashizwe mw’ibohero kenshi, nakubiswe kenshi katoharurwa, nahatswe gupfa kenshi.
Nakubiswe n’Abayuda incuro zitanu ibimoko mirongo ine ukuyemwo kimwe,
nakubiswe inkoni incuro zitatu, rimwe naratewe amabuye, namenekanywe n’ubwato incuro zitatu, namaze umusi n’ijoro mu kiyaga,

nagenze ingendo nyinshi kandi ndende. Nahatswe gutwarwa n’inzuzi, nahatswe kwibwa, nahatswe kwicwa n’ubwoko bwanje, nahatswe kwicwa n’Abanyamahanga, nahatswe kwicirwa mu bisagara, nahatswe kwicirwa mu misozi, nahatswe kugwa mu kiyaga, nahatswe kwicwa n’abigira bene Data.
Narakoze cane ndaruha, rimwe na rimwe nkarara maso. Narashonje ndanyoterwa, mfata ingendo ntagira imfungurwa, nicwa n’imbeho, ngenda gusa.
Ikirengeye ivyo, namana umwitwarariko ku bw’amashengero yose.
Iyo hagize uwuja mu ntege nke, nanje numva intege nke. Iyo hagize uwugwa numva umubabaro utovugwa.
Nimba nokwirata, nzokwirata ku bw’ibingaragaza nk’umunyantege nke.
Imana Se w’Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo, we akwiye gushimwa ibihe vyose, arazi ko mvuga ukuri.
Igihe nari i Damasiko, uwatwarira umwami Areta yashize abarinzi kw’irembo ry’igisagara ca Damaseni kugira ngo bamfate.
Ariko bene Data banshira mu giseke banyururutsa bancishije mw’idirisha ry’uruzitiro, ndamukira gutyo.
Birabereye ko mbandanya nirata naho ata co bimaze. Ariko ubu reka ndababwire ivyo neretswe kandi namenyeshejwe n’Umwami.
Ndazi umuntu umwe, muri Kristo, yatwawe mw’ijuru rya gatatu, haraciye imyaka cumi n’ine. Sinzi ko yari mu mubiri canke atari mu mubiri, nta vyo nzi, Imana ni yo ibizi.
Koko Imana yonyene ni yo izi ko yari mu mubiri canke yari yawukuwemwo, ariko ndamuzi.
Yajanywe mw’iparadizo, yumva ivyo ata woshobora gusigura, ivyo ata muntu yemerewe kuvuga.
Nk’uwaciye mu bintu nk’ivyo nari nkwiye kwirata, ariko sinirata inkomezi zanje, nzirata intege nke zanje.
Kandi naho nohitamwo kwirata, sinoba nihenze kuko noba ndiko mvuga ivy’ukuri. Ariko mpisemwo kubireka kugira ngo ntihagire abanyiyumvira ukurengeye uko bambona mu bikorwa vyanje no mu vyo nigisha.
Kugira ngo sinishire hejuru ku bw’ivyo neretswe vy’akaburarugero, nashizwemwo ingwara ibabaza kandi idakira mu mubiri, intumwa ya Satani yo kunsubiza hasi kugira ngo noye kwishira hejuru.
Ninginze Umwami Yesu incuro zitatu kugira ngo ayinkuremwo,

ariko anyishura ati: “Ubuntu bwanje buraguhaje, kuko ubushobozi bwanje bukorera muri wewe cane iyo uri mu ntege nke.” Ni co gituma nirata cane intege nke zanje, kugira ngo ubushobozi bwa Kristo bugume kuri jewe.
Ni co gituma, ku bwa Kristo, nezerererwa intege nke, ibitutsi, imiruho, uguhamwa, n’ingorane. Kuko iyo ndi umunyantege nke ari ho mba umunyenkomezi.
Ndiko mvuga nk’imburabwenge, ariko ni mwebwe mwabitumye. Ni mwebwe mwari mukwiye kunshingira intahe kuko naho ata co ndi, sindi inyuma ya bose muri za ntumwa zihambaye.
Igihe nari kumwe nawe, naraberetse vy’ukuri ko ndi intumwa. Kuko mu kwihangana kwinshi nakoze ibimenyetso n’ibitangaza muri mwebwe.
Mbega hari ico ayandi mashengero yaronse mwebwe mutaronse? Hariho kimwe gusa, sinabaremereye ku bijanye n’ivyo kwibeshaho. Nimba mubona ko bitari vyiza, muranyihanganira.

Ndiko nditegurira kubagendera irya gatatu, kandi na ho nyene sinzobaremera, kuko ico ngomba si ivyo mutunze, ngomba mwebwe nyene. Kuko mu bisanzwe abana si bo bari bakwiye kugaburira abavyeyi, ahubwo abavyeyi ni bo bagaburira abana babo.
None rero nzobaha ivyo mfise nongere ndabihe nanje ubwanje n’umunezero mwinshi. Ninabakunda rwose, mbega muzoca munkunda buhoro?
Namwe muremera ko ntababereye umutwaro. Ariko bamwe muri mwebwe bibaza ko ndi umunyabwenge, ko nabakuyeko inyungu mu bwenge.
Mbega abantu nabatumyeko hari inyungu babatse?
Ninginze Tito ngo aze iwanyu, azanana n’umwe mwene Data wundi. Mbega hari inyungu babakuyeko? Mbega ntitwakoreye mu Mpwemu imwe no mu buryo bumwe?
Mbega mwibaza ko ibi tubivuga mu kubisigurako? Twamye tuvugira imbere y’Imana nk’abari muri Kristo Yesu. Kandi ivyo dukora vyose ga bakundwa, ni ukugira mukomere mu kwizera.

Kuko ndatinya ko noza nkabasanga uko ntipfuza ko muba, canke mugasanga ntameze uko mushaka ko mba. Ndatinya ko hoba hakiri imitongano, inzigo, ishari ryinshi, ukwikunda, ugutukana, urusaku, ukwishira hejuru n’ukubura urutonde mu buzima.

Ndatinya kandi ko aho nzozira Imana izoncisha bugufi imbere yanyu, nkababazwa cane n’uko bamwe muri mwebwe batahevye ivyaha vyabo bakora kuva kera. Ntibihanye ivyonona, ubusambanyi, n’ibindi vy’isoni nke bakora.
Rizoba ari irya gatatu ndabagendeye. Nk’uko Ivyanditswe bibivuga, “Urubanza rwose ruzocibwe habanje kwumvirizwa ivyabona bibiri canke bitatu.”
Naraburiye abagumye mu vyaha igihe nabagendera ubwa kabiri. N’ubu ndabibasubiriyemwo n’aho tutari kumwe: ninagaruka, sinzokwihanganira umuntu n’umwe,
ko muriko murasaba ivyemeza ko Kristo avugira muri jewe. Ntananiwe no kubakiza, kuko akorana inkomezi muri mwebwe.
Naho yabambwe ari umunyantege nke, ubu abayeho mu bushobozi bw’Imana. Natwe ni nk’uko, turi abanyantegenke nk’uko Kristo yari, ariko ubushobozi bw’Imana buba muri twebwe iyo turiko turabakorera.
Mwisuzume kugira ngo mumenye ko muhagaze mu kwizera. Nimube ari mwebwe mwisuzuma. Musanzwe muzi ko Yesu Kristo ari muri mwebwe: atari uko, muzoba mwananiwe no kwisuzuma.
Kandi ndizera ko muzotahura ko tutananiwe no kwisuzuma nk’intumwa.

Ico tubasengera ku Mana ni uko ata kibi mwokora. Atari ukugira ngo abantu babone ko twahagaze neza mu kwisuzuma kwacu, ariko kugira ngo mukore ibibereye naho vyoba bisa nk’aho twananiwe mu gikorwa cacu.
Kuko ata co twemerewe gukora kinyuranye n’ukuri, ariko dutegerezwa guhagararira ukuri.
Turanezerwa iyo tuboneka nk’abanyantegenke ariko mukaboneka ko muri abanyenkomezi. Kandi turabasengera ngo mutunganywe rwose.
Ni co gituma ndabandikira ibi tutari kumwe, kugira ngo ninaza sinze ndabakarire mu bubasha nahawe n’Umwami, kuko ari ububasha bwo kubakomeza atari ubwo kubasambura.
Bene Data, ndangije ndabasezera. Murondere ugutunganywa, muterane intege, muhuze umutima n’inama, mubane amahoro, maze Imana y’amahoro n’urukundo izobana namwe.
Muramukanye mu kugumbirana kwera.
Abera b’Imana ba hano na bo barabatasha.
Ubuntu bw’Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo, urukundo rw’Imana n’ukunywana na Mpwemu Yera bibane namwe mwese.
Jewe Pawulo intumwa, ntatumwe n’abantu kandi bidaciye ku muntu n’umwe, ariko natumwe na Yesu Kristo n’Imana Data yamuzuye mu bapfuye,
hamwe na bene Data bose turi kumwe, Turabandikiye mwebwe amashengero y’i Galatiya:
Ubuntu n’amahoro biva ku Mana Data wa twese no ku Mwami wacu Yesu Kristo bibane namwe.
Uwo Kristo ni we yatanze ubugingo bwiwe ku bw’ivyaha vyacu, nk’uko Imana Data wa twese yari yarabigomvye, kugira ngo adukize iki gihe kibi turimwo.
Icubahiro kibe icayo ibihe vyose, Amen.
Ndatangajwe n’ingene mwihuse kuva ku Mana yabahamagariye kuba mu buntu bwa Kristo, mugakurikira ubundi butumwa butandukanye n’ubwo twababwiye,
kandi mu vy’ukuri ata bundi Butumwa Bwiza buhari. Biragaragara ko hariho abantu babatera kuzazanirwa mu kugoramika Ubutumwa Bwiza bwa Kristo.
Ariko, naho yoba twebwe, canke umumarayika avuye mw’ijuru, akaza ababwira Ubutumwa butandukanye n’ubwo twababwiye, umuvumo w’Imana ube kuri we!
Nk’uko twabivuze ubwa mbere, n’ubu ndabisubiyemwo: umuntu wese yobabwira ubutumwa butandukanye n’ubwo mwakiriye, umuvumo w’Imana ube kuri we!
Jewe ubu noba nkirondera kwemerwa n’abantu, aho kurondera kwemerwa n’Imana? Canke ubu noba nkirondera kunezereza abantu? Iyo mba nkirondera kunezereza abantu, simba ndi umukozi wa Kristo.
Bene Data, ndashaka ko mumenya ko Ubutumwa Bwiza nababwiye butavuye mu vyiyumviro vy’umuntu.
Sinabuhawe n’umuntu n’umwe, kandi si ubwo nigishijwe. Ariko, naburonse ndabuhishuriwe na Yesu Kristo.
Mwarumvise ingene nari mbayeho nkiri mw’idini ry’Abayuda, ingene nahama ishengero ry’Imana nkobeje rwose kugira ngo ndarizimanganye.
Ico gihe, nari imbere rwose mw’idini ry’Abayuda, kurusha abandi bo mu runganwe rwanje, kandi nari mfise umwete mwinshi cane wo kwitondera imigenzo ya ba sogokuruza.
Ariko kuva nkiri mu nda ya mama, Imana yari yarantoranije, impamagara mu buntu bwayo. Hanyuma vyayihimbaye
kumpishurira Umwana wayo kugira ngo nanje ndamumenyekanishe mu Banyamahanga; kandi ivyo bibaye, sinagishije inama umuntu n’umwe,
kandi sinabanje kuduga i Yerusalemu kubaza ababanje kuba intumwa imbere yanje, ahubwo naciye nja muri Arabiya, mu nyuma ngaruka i Damasiko.
Hanyuma, haheze imyaka itatu, ni ho naduga i Yerusalemu kugira ngo tumenyane na Kefa, tumarana imisi cumi n’itanu.
Nta yindi ntumwa twabonanye, kiretse Yakobo mwene nyina w’Umwami wacu.
Ndi imbere y’Imana sinshobora kubesha, ivyo ndabandikiye ni ukuri.
Mvuye aho, naciye nja mu ntara za Siriya na Kilikiya.
Amashengero ya Kristo y’i Yudaya ntiyari anzi.
Ico bari barumvise kuri jewe, ni inkuru yavuga ngo: “Wa muntu yahora aduhama ubu asigaye yigisha ukwizera yigeze kugerageza kuzimanganya.”
Maze bahimbaza Imana ku bwanje.
Hanyuma, haciye imyaka cumi n’ine, naciye nsubira ndaduga i Yerusalemu, ariko ico gihe twari kumwe na Baranaba, kandi na Tito twarajanye.

Nagiyeyo kubera ko Imana yari yampishuriye ko nkwiye kujayo. Nshitseyo, nabonanye mu mwiherero na bamwe mu barongozi b’ishengero b’imbere, ndabamenyesha Ubutumwa nigisha mu Banyamahanga. Nashaka kumenya neza ko igikorwa nakoze muri kahise n’ico ndiko ndakora ubu bitari ivy’ubusa.
Ariko, mbere na Tito twari kumwe, ntibigeze bamugobera ngo akebwe kandi ari Umugiriki.

Ivyerekeye ugukebwa vyazanywe n’abiyita abizera kandi atari bo, banyegeteye muri twebwe mu mpisho, bazanywe no kuraba umwidegemvyo dufise muri Kristo Yesu kugira ngo bishobotse bongere kuduhindura abaja b’imigenzo y’idini ry’Abayuda.
Ntitwigeze tubibemerera n’akanya isase, kugira ngo ukuri kw’Ubutumwa Bwiza kuzigamwe ku bwanyu.
Abarongozi b’imbere mw’ishengero nta co bari bafise bongera ku butumwa navuga. Kandi icubahiro cabo nta co cari kimbariye, kuko nzi ko Imana itarobanura abantu ku butoni.
Ahubwo, batahuye ko nahawe igikorwa co kuvuga Ubutumwa Bwiza mu batakebwe, nk’uko Petero na we yahawe ico gikorwa mu bakebwe.
Kuko uko Imana yariko ikorera muri Petero nk’intumwa mu Bayuda ni ko yariko ikorera muri jewe nk’intumwa mu Banyamahanga.

Yakobo, Kefa na Yohana, abari bazwi nk’inkingi z’ishengero, bamaze kubona ubuntu bw’Imana buri kuri jewe, baciye baduha ukuboko twe na Baranaba nk’ikimenyetso c’uko dufatanije ibikorwa. Baremeye ko twebwe dukwiye kuja mu Banyamahanga, na bo bakaja mu bakebwe.
Ico batwihanikirije kwari uko twokwibuka kwitwararika abakene, kandi ico nanje nkaba namye ndagifitiye ishaka kuva kera.
Ariko, igihe Kefa yaza muri Antiyokiya, namuharirije turi imbere y’abandi bose kuko vyaboneka ko ariko akora ibimutsindisha.
Agishika, yasangira n’Abanyamahanga, batari barakebwe. Ariko abantu barungitswe na Yakobo bashitse, aca atangura kwigira kure kubera gutinya abo bo mu mugwi w’abakebwe.
Abandi Bayuda baciye bifatanya na we muri ubwo buryarya, ndetse na Baranaba ubwiwe atwarwa na bwo.

Maze kubona ko batariko bakorera mu kuri kw’Ubutumwa Bwiza, nabwiye Kefa imbere y’abari aho bose nti: “Nimba wewe Umuyuda, wahevye imigenzo y’Abayuda ukabaho nk’Umunyamahanga, ni kuki ugoberera Abanyamahanga gukurikiza imigenzo y’Abayuda?
Twebwe twavutse turi Abayuda, ntituri Abanyamahanga b’abanyavyaha.

Ariko ico tuzi ni uko umuntu atemerwa n’Imana nk’umugororotsi kubera ibikorwa vy’ivyagezwe, ahubwo abihabwa no kwizera Kristo Yesu. Natwe nyene twizeye Kristo gutyo turonka kwemerwa n’Imana nk’abagororotsi kubera kumwizera, atari kubera gukurikiza ivyagezwe, kuko ata muntu n’umwe azokwemerwa n’Imana nk’umugororotsi kubera gukurikiza ivyagezwe.
Ariko nimba turondera kwemerwa n’Imana nk’abagororotsi biciye mu kwizera Kristo, maze tukagaragara nk’abanyavyaha kuko twahevye ivyagezwe; mbega bisigura ko Kristo abaye umukozi w’icaha? Haba na mba!
Ahubwo noba mbaye umunyavyaha, hamwe nosubira kwubaka ivyo nasambuye.
Kuko ngerageje gukurikiza ivyagezwe, birantsindisha. None rero, ku bijanye n’ivyagezwe, narapfuye, kugira ngo mbeho nkorera Imana. Nabambanywe na Kristo,
si jewe nkiriho; ariko ni Kristo ariho muri jewe. Nkiri muri uwu mubiri, mbayeho mu kwizera Umwana w’Imana yankunze akitanga ku bwanje.
Simfata minenegwe ubuntu bw’Imana, kuko nimba ukugororoka kwoshobora kuronkerwa mu vyagezwe, Kristo yoba yapfiriye ubusa.”
Mbega mwa Bagalatiya b’ibijuju, ni nde yabaroze? Ndazi neza ko ivy’urupfu rwa Yesu Kristo mwabishikirijwe neza nk’aho mwamwiboneye abambwe ku musaraba.
Rero, hariho ikintu kimwe conyene ngomba kumenya: Mbega mwahawe Mpwemu Yera kubera mwitondeye ivyagezwe vya Mose? Canke ni kubera mwizeye Ubutumwa Bwiza bwa Kristo mwumvise?
Mbega mwakabaye muri ibijuju gutyo? Mwahereye mu vy’Impwemu none ubu muriko mugerageza kuba abagororotse rwose mukoresheje ivy’umubiri?
Mbega imibabaro yose mwaciyemwo, yari iy’ubusa? Haba na mba ntiyari iy’ubusa.
Ngomba kandi kwongera kubabaza, mbega Imana yabahaye Mpwemu Yera yongera ikorera ibitangaza muri mwebwe kubera mwitondera ivyagezwe? Canke ni kubera mwizeye ivyo mwumvise?
Na Aburahamu na we “yizeye Imana, bituma imwemera nk’umugororotsi.”
Mutahure rero neza ko abana ba Aburahamu ari abo bizera Imana.

Ivyanditswe vyari vyarerekanye ko Imana izokwemera Abanyamahanga nk’abagororotsi biciye mu kwizera, ica ibwira inkuru nziza Aburahamu imbere y’igihe iti: “Muri wewe ni ho amahanga yose azohererwa umugisha.”
Nuko rero abizera Imana bose nk’uko Aburahamu yayizeye bahezagirwa co kimwe na we.
Ariko abizeye ko bazokizwa n’ivyagezwe bari musi y’umuvumo, kuko handitswe ngo: “Aravumwe umuntu adakurikiza ivyanditswe vyose mu gitabu c’ivyagezwe.”
Biraboneka rero ko ata muntu n’umwe ashobora kwemerwa n’Imana nk’umugororotsi kubera kwubahiriza ivyagezwe, kuko Ivyanditswe bivuga biti: “Umugororotsi azobeshwaho n’ukwizera.”
Ivyagezwe ntibihagaze ku kwizera, ariko bivuga biti: “Uwuzokora ivyo ivyagezwe vyose bibwiriza azobeshwaho na vyo.”
Kristo yadukijije umuvumo w’ivyagezwe aho yahinduka umuvumo ku bwacu, nk’uko vyanditswe ngo: “Haravumwe uwubambwe ku giti.”
Yaradukijije kugira ngo umugisha wahawe Aburahamu ushikire Abanyamahanga biciye muri Kristo Yesu, kandi kugira ngo biciye mu kwizera turonke Mpwemu Yera yasezeranywe.
Bene Data, reka dufatire ku karorero ko mu buzima busanzwe. Iyo umuntu agiriraniye isezerano n’uwundi, nta wushobora kurikuraho canke ngo agire ico aryongeyeko. N’aha ni ko bimeze.
Amasezerano yahawe Aburahamu n’umwana wiwe. Ivyanditswe ntibivuga ngo “n’abana biwe,” bisigura abantu benshi ariko bivuga biti “ku mwana wawe,” bisigura umuntu umwe, uwo na we ni Kristo.

Ico ngomba kubabwira aha ni iki? Nuko isezerano Imana yagiraniye na Aburahamu ritashoboye gukurwaho n’inyuma y’imyaka amajana ane na mirongo itatu igihe Imana yaha Mose ivyagezwe. Imana yari kuba irenze amasezerano.
Kuko nimba ugutorana kuva ku vyagezwe, ntikuba kukiva kw’isezerano. Ariko Imana mu buntu bwayo, yahaye Aburahamu ugutorana, ibimuhereye mw’isezerano.

None, ivyagezwe vyatangiwe iki? Vyatanzwe i ruhande y’isezerano kugira ngo vyereke abantu ivyaha vyabo. Ariko vyari vyashizweho gushika ku kuza kwa wa mwana yasezeranywe. Imana yatumye umumarayika aha ivyagezwe Mose, na we akaba yari umuhuza w’Imana n’abantu.
Umuhuza afasha iyo hari imigwi irenga umwe igomba kugiriranira amasezerano. Ariko Imana yo yari yonyene.
Mbega none hariho gusekana hagati y’ivyagezwe n’amasezerano y’Imana? Haba na mba! Nimba koko ivyagezwe vyari gushobora kuduha ubugingo bushasha, kubikurikiza kwari gutuma turonka ukugororoka.
Ariko Ivyanditswe bivuga ko isi yose ari imbohe y’icaha, ariko ko turonka isezerano ry’Imana riduha umwidegemvyo mu kwizera Yesu Kristo.
Imbere yuko ukwo kwizera kuza, twari imbohe z’ivyagezwe, twari tuboshwe gushika ukwizera guhishurwe.
Ni ukuvuga ko, ivyagezwe vyari nk’umurezi aturera gushika Kristo aje kugira ngo twemerwe n’Imana nk’abagororotsi tubihawe no kwizera.
None rero ko ukwizera kwabonetse, ntitukirezwe n’ivyagezwe.
Mwese muri abana b’Imana kubera kwizera Kristo Yesu,
kuko ababatijwe muri Kristo mwese mwambaye Kristo.
Nta Muyuda canke Umugiriki, nta mugurano canke uwidegemvya, nta mugore canke umugabo, mwese muri umwe muri Kristo Yesu.
Nimba muri aba Kristo, muri uruvyaro rwa Aburahamu, kandi muri abaragwa ku bw’isezerano Imana yahaye Aburahamu.
Ico ngomvye kuvuga ni uko iyo samuragwa akiri umwana, nta ho aba atandukaniye n’umugurano, naho ivya se vyose biba ari ivyiwe.
Aba musi y’uburongozi bw’abarezi biwe n’abandi bizigirwa, gushika ku myaka se yagenye.
No kuri twebwe ni uko vyari bimeze Kristo ataraza. Twari tumeze nk’abana bakiri bato; twari abagurano b’ubushobozi bw’impwemu butegeka iyi si.
Maze igihe gikwiye kigeze, Imana irungika Umwana wayo, avyagwa n’umugore, avukira mu vyagezwe,
kugira ngo acungure abaganzwa n’ivyagezwe, yongere atugire abana biwe bwite.
Kuko turi abana bayo, Imana yarungitse Mpwemu w’Umwana wayo mu mitima yacu. Ni we Mpwemu atuma dusemerera tuvuga tuti: “Aba, Data.”
Nuko rero ntimukiri abagurano, ariko muri abana b’Imana bwite. Kandi ko muri abana b’Imana bwite, Imana yabagize abaragwa.
Kera, mutaramenya Imana, mwari mujakariye ibigirwamana.

Ariko ubu ko mwamenye Imana, na canecane ko mwamenywe na yo, ni kuki mwasubiye muri ivyo bintu vy’intege nke vy’urufatiro kandi ata co bimaze. Mugomba gusubira kwongera kuba abaja b’iyo migenzo ukundi?
Mugomba kurondera ukwemerwa n’Imana mu kwubahiriza imisi mikuru, amezi, ibihe n’imyaka?
Ndatinya ko kumbure ivyo nakoze vyose muri mwebwe vyapfuye ubusa.
Ndabinginze bene Data ngo mumere nkanje mu kwidegemvya kuri ivyo bintu, nk’uko nanje nabaye nkamwe abanyamahanga mu kutaganzwa n’ivyagezwe. Nta kibi mwigeze munkorera aho naza kubigisha.
Nk’uko mubizi icatumye ndababwira Ubutumwa Bwiza ubwa mbere ni uko nari ndwaye mu mubiri.
Naho ingwara yanje yari ikigeragezo kuri mwebwe, ntimwigeze munsuzugura canke ngo mungaye. Ariko mwanyakiriye nk’umumarayika w’Imana, canke nk’aho ari Kristo Yesu ubwiwe.
None umunezero mwari mufise kiriya gihe wagiye hehe? Ndabashingira intahe ko iyo biba ari ibishoboka, mwari kwinogora amaso yanyu mukayampa.
Mbega none ubu nahindutse umwansi wanyu kubera ndababwira ukuri?
Abo bigisha b’ibinyoma babafitiye ishaka ryinshi, ariko intumbero yabo si nziza na mba. Ico bashaka ni ukubadukurako kugira ngo abe ari bo mukurikira.
Kugira ishaka ryo kubakorera ivyiza, ni vyiza mu gihe intumbero ari nziza, ariko baze bame bameze gutyo ntibabikore gusa mu gihe ndi kumwe namwe honyene.
Bana banje nkunda, abo nama ndiko ndatera ibise n’ubu kuzoshika igihe Kristo azogaragarira neza muri mwebwe,
ese iyo mba nari kumwe namwe ngashobora kworosha ijwi ryanje, kuko ivyanyu ndabuze n’ingene ndabifata!
Nimumbwire mwebwe mugomba kuganzwa n’ivyagezwe, mbega ntimuzi ico bivuga?
Handitswe ko Aburahamu yari afise abahungu babiri, umwe ku mugore w’umuguranokazi, uwundi ku mugore yidegemvya.
Uwavutse ku muguranokazi yavutse kubera ugushaka kw’umubiri, ariko uwavutse ku mugore yidegemvya yavutse kubera isezerano ry’Imana.
Ivyo twobifatirako ikigereranyo: abo bagore babiri bagereranywa n’amasezerano abiri. Isezerano rimwe ryavuye ku musozi Sinayi, rivamwo abana bavukira kuba abagurano: Uwo ni Hagari.
Hagari agereranywa n’umusozi Sinayi wo muri Arabiya, akagereranywa kandi n’igisagara ca Yerusalemu kuko ari mu bugurano bw’ivyagezwe, hamwe n’abana biwe.
Ariko uwundi mugore, ari we Sara, agereranywa na Yerusalemu wo mw’ijuru. Ni umugore yidegemvya, kandi ni we mama atuvyara.

Kuko handitswe ngo: “Nezerwa, mugore w’ingumba, wewe utavyaye abana; turikisha usemerere n’umunezero, wewe utigeze utera ibise; kuko abana b’umugore w’intabwa bazoba benshi gusumba ab’uwufise umugabo.”
Mweho, bene Data, muri abana b’isezerano nka Isaka.
Ico gihe uwavutse kubera gushaka kw’umubiri yarahamye uwavutse mu bubasha bwa Mpwemu. N’ubu ni ko bimeze.
Ariko Ivyanditswe bivuga iki? Bivuga ngo: “Irukana urya muguranokazi, kuko umuhungu wiwe atazosangira iragi n’umwana w’umugore yidegemvya.”
None rero bene Data, ntituri abana b’umuguranokazi, turi abana b’uwidegemvya!
Kristo yatubohoye kugira ngo aduhe umwidegemvyo. Hagarara mushikamye rero, ntimwongere kwemera umuntu n’umwe asubira kubaremereza imitwaro y’ubuja bw’ivyagezwe.
Muvyumve neza! Jewe Pawulo, ndababwiye nti: Nimba mwizeye ko ugukebwa kwanyu kubaha ukugororoka imbere y’Imana, kuri mwebwe Kristo nta co azoba amaze na gatoya.
Ndongeye kandi ndabibabwiye. Nimba mugomba gukebwa kugira ngo mwemerwe n’Imana, mutegerezwa kwitondera no gukurikiza ivyagezwe vya Mose vyose ata na kimwe kivuyemwo.
Kuko iyo mugerageza kurondera kwemerwa n’Imana nk’abagororotsi mu kwitondera ivyagezwe, muba mutandukanijwe na Kristo, muba mutakariye kure y’ubuntu bw’Imana.
Ariko twebwe turi muri Mpwemu twiteganye igishika kwakira mu kwizera ukugororoka Imana yadusezeraniye.
Kuko muri Kristo Yesu, ugukebwa canke ukudakebwa nta kimazi bifise. Igihambaye ni ukwizera gukorera mu rukundo.
Mwariko mugenda neza mu rugendo rwanyu. None ni nde yabatangiriye akababuza kwumvira ukuri?
Ivyo mwemejwe, ntivyavuye kuri umwe yabahamagara.
Izo nyigisho, ni “umwambiro mukeya ariko ukakamisha irobe ryose.”
Nizeye ko Imana izobarinda kwakira inyigisho zitari zo. Abariko babatera ukwo kuzazanirwa uko bari kwose bazobihanirwa.
Bene Data, nimba ngishishikara kwigisha ivyo gukebwa nk’uko bamwe babivuga, kubera iki noba nkiriko ndahamwa? Iyo mba ntacigisha agakiza kava ku musaraba wa Kristo, nta n’umwe biba bitsitaza.
Icompa abo babateramwo imivurungano, ngo mukebwe, bakagera aho bonyene bikona ubwabo.
Bene Data, mwebwe mwahamagariwe kwidegemvya. Ariko uwo mwidegemvyo ntubatere kurondera guhaza ivyipfuzo vya kamere k’icaha. Ahubwo urukundo rukwiye gutuma mukorera bagenzi banyu.
Ivyagezwe vyose bikoraniye muri iri bwirizwa rimwe rivuga ngo: “Ukunde mugenzawe nk’uko wikunda wewe nyene.”
Ariko nimba mwama mufise ivyo mupfa, mukama muryana, mwirinde ntimumarane.
Ndababwira nti: Murongorwe na Mpwemu Yera ni ho mutazoshitsa ivyo kamere k’icaha kanyu kipfuza.

Kuko kamere k’icaha kipfuza ibinyuranye n’ivyo Mpwemu agomba, kandi ivyo Mpwemu yipfuza binyuranye n’ivyo kamere k’icaha kipfuza. Vyompi bigwanira muri mwebwe mugasanga ntimushobora gukora ivyo mushaka.
Ariko nimwarongorwa na Mpwemu Yera ntimuzoba mukiganzwa n’ivyagezwe vya Mose.
Ibikorwa vya kamere muntu biragaragara, ni ibi: ubusambanyi, ibihumanya, ivy’isoni nke,
Gusenga ibigirwamana, uburozi, urwanko, amatati, ishari, uburake, ukwikunda, ukwicamwo ibice, kwitandukanya,
ukwipfuza kubi, akaborerwe, kurya birenze urugero n’ibindi bene ivyo. Ndababuriye ubugira kabiri, ko abakora ibintu nk’ivyo batazoragwa Ubwami bw’Imana.
Ariko ivyamwa vya Mpwemu Yera ni ibi: urukundo, umunezero, amahoro, ukwihangana, ingeso nziza, kugira neza, ubwizigirwa,
ubugwaneza, n’ukwirinda. Ibi nta cagezwe kibibuza.
Aba Kristo Yesu babamvye kamere muntu kabo hamwe n’ivyo gahahamiye n’ivyo kipfuza.
None rero, ko tubayeho ku bwa Mpwemu, reka turongorwe na we mu buzima bwacu bwose.
Twoye kwikakisha, twirinde kwandurutsanya no kugiriranira ishari.

Bene Data, nihagira uwufatwa ariko akora icaha, mwebwe muhagaze neza muri Mpwemu, mwategerezwa kumufasha gusubira mu nzira nziza mu bugwaneza. Ariko namwe nyene mwirinde cane kugira ngo ntumugeragezwe nka we.
Mwikoreranire imitwaro, ni ho muzoba mushikije icagezwe ca Kristo.
Iyo wibaza ko uhambaye kandi ata co uri, uba wihenze wewe nyene.
Umwe wese yari akwiye kwisuzuma mu bikorwa vyiwe, kugira ngo asanze yakoze neza bimushimishe, ariko ntabanze kwigereranya n’abandi,
kuko umuntu wese akwiye kwikorera umutwaro wiwe.
Uwigishijwe Ijambo ry’Imana, akwiye gusangira ivyiza vyose afise n’uwarimwigishije.
Ntimuhendwe: Imana nticokorwa. Ico umuntu abiba ni co azokwimbura.
Uwubiba kugira ngo anezereze kamere muntu kiwe, azokwimbura ukubora muri ako kamere nyene. Ariko uwubiba kigira ngo ahimbare Mpwemu, azokwimbura ubugingo budashira muri Mpwemu.
Dukore ivyiza tudacika intege, kuko igihe gikwiye kigeze tuzokwimbura, nitutarambirwa.
None rero, uko akaryo kose kabonetse, tugirire neza bose, na canecane abo mu nzu y’abizera.
Nimurabe ingene ndabandikiye mu ndome nkuru n’ukuboko kwanje!
Abagomba kwiyerekana ku bantu mu vy’umubiri, ni bo babagoberera gukebwa, kandi ikintu conyene gituma bakora ivyo ni ukwanka guhamwa bahorwa umusaraba wa Kristo.
Mbere n’abakebwe ntibashobora gukurikiza neza ivyagezwe vyose, ariko bagomba ko mukebwa kugira ngo bishimire ugukebwa kwanyu mu mibiri yabo.
Ariko jewe sinkagire ikindi nishimira atari umusaraba w’Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo. Ku bw’uwo, kuri jewe isi irabambwe, kandi nanje kuri yo ndabambwe.
Ugukebwa canke ukudakebwa, nta na kimwe gifise ikimazi, igihambaye ni ukuba icaremwe gishasha.
Amahoro n’imbabazi bibane n’abagendera iyo ngingo, kandi bibe no kuri Isirayeli y’Imana.
Uhereye ubu, ntihakagire umuntu yongera kungora, kuko mfise inkovu za Yesu ku mubiri wanje.
Bene Data nkunda, ubuntu bw’Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo bubane n’impwemu yanyu. Amen.
Jewe Pawulo, intumwa ya Kristo Yesu, kubera ugushaka kw’Imana, Ndabandikiye mwebwe abera bo muri Efeso, abizigirwa ba Kristo Yesu:
Ubuntu n’amahoro biva ku Mana Data no ku Mwami wacu Yesu Kristo bibe muri mwebwe.
Imana, Se w’Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo iragahezagirwa, yo yaduhezagiriye ahantu ho mw’ijuru imihezagiro y’impwemu yo mu buryo bwose muri Kristo.
Kuva isi itararemwa, Imana yari yaramaze kudutoranya muri Kristo, kugira ngo tube abejejwe batagira ico bagawa mu nyonga zayo. Kubera urukundo rwayo,
yari yaramaze gufata ingingo yo kutugira abana bayo biciye kuri Yesu Kristo. Ibi ni vyo yashaka kandi vyarayinezereye.
Ni co gituma duhimbaza Imana kubera ubwiza bw’ubuntu bwayo yatugiriye biciye mu Mwana wayo ikunda.
Muri we ni ho twaherewe ugucungurwa biciye mu maraso yiwe, ni kwo guharirwa ivyaha vyacu, kubera ubuntu bwayo bwinshi!
Ubwo buntu yarabudusutseko, ibuduhana ugutahura kwose n’ubwenge bwose.
Imana yaduhaye kumenya ibanga ry’umugambi wayo, uwo yari yarateguye gushira mu ngiro, mu kugira neza kwayo, ibicishije muri Kristo.
Uwo mugambi, Imana yashatse kuwushira mu ngiro igihe yashinze gishitse. Ni uwo kwegeraniriza hamwe ibiri mw’ijuru n’ibiri kw’isi vyose ikabishira musi y’inganji ya Kristo.
Ikigeretse kuri ivyo, kubera yuko twafatanijwe na Kristo, twararonse umugabane ku Mana, kuko yadutoranirije muri we kuva kera, kandi igatuma vyose bikorwa nk’uko umugambi wayo uri.
Intumbero y’Imana muri ivyo vyose, yari uko twebwe Abayuda, kuko ari twebwe twabaye aba mbere mu gushira ivyizigiro vyacu muri Kristo, duhesha Imana icubahiro.

Kandi namwe abanyamahanga mwarumvise Ubutumwa bw’ukuri, bwatumye Imana ibakiza, hanyuma mumaze kwizera Kristo, yabashizeko ikimenyetso cerekana ko muri abiwe mu kubaha Mpwemu Yera, uwo yari yarasezeranye kuva kera.
Uwo Mpwemu ni ingwati y’Imana yemeza ko tuzohabwa umugabane twasezeraniwe kandi ko yatuguze ngo tube abantu bayo. Ivyo yabikoze kugira ngo tuyishime kandi tuyihe icubahiro.
Ni co gituma, kuva numvise ukwizera Umwami Yesu kwanyu n’urukundo mukunda abantu b’Imana bose,
sinduhuka gushimira Imana ku bwanyu. Ndabibuka uko nsenze.
Nsaba Imana yo nyene icubahiro cose, Se w’Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo, Data w’ubwiza buhebuje, ngo abahe Mpwemu w’ubwenge no guhishurirwa, kugira ngo murushirize kumumenya.
Ndabasengera ngo amaso y’imitima yanyu amurikirwe kugira ngo mumenye ivyizigiro yabahaye igihe yabahamagara, n’ubwiza bwinshi bw’umugabane yateguriye abantu biwe batunganye.
Ndabasengera kandi ngo mutahure ubushobozi bw’Imana butogereranywa, bukorera muri twebwe abizera. Ubwo bushobozi ni bwo
yakoresheje igihe yazura Kristo ikamukura mu bapfuye, ikamwicarika mu kibanza c’iteka i buryo bwayo ahantu ho mw’ijuru,
hejuru y’ukuganza kwose n’ubukuru bwose, hejuru y’ubushobozi n’ubutegetsi bwose, hejuru y’izina ryose rishobora kuvugwa, haba muri iyi si y’uno musi canke mw’isi izoza.
Imana yashize ibintu vyose musi y’inganji ya Kristo, imugira umutwe uri hejuru ya vyose ku bw’ineza y’ishengero.
Ishengero ni ryo mubiri wa Kristo, kandi Kristo ari muri ryo mu buryo bwuzuye, ari muri vyose kandi hose.
Kera mwari mwarapfuye, mwishwe n’ibicumuro n’ivyaha vyanyu,
ivyo mwagenderamwo mukurikira inzira mbi z’isi, mwumvira wa mutware w’ubwami bwo mu kirere, ni we mpwemu ikorera mu mitima y’abantu batumvira Imana.
Natwe kera twigenza nka bo, twakurikira ivy’imibiri yacu yipfuza, tugakora ivyo iyi mibiri n’imitima vyacu bishaka. Kandi muri kamere muntu kacu twari abo gucibwa urubanza n’Imana nk’abandi bose.
Ariko kubera urukundo rwinshi Imana, yo mutunzi w’imbabazi, yadukunze,
yatugiranye bazima na Kristo igihe twari tugipfuye twishwe n’ivyaha vyacu. Ubuntu bw’Imana ni bwo bwabakijije.
Kandi Imana yatuzuranye na Kristo, itwicarikana na we ahantu ho mw’ijuru muri Kristo Yesu,
kugira ngo mu bihe bizoza ize yerekane ubutunzi bwinshi butogereranywa bw’ubuntu bwayo, ubwo yatweretse biciye mu buntu yatugiriye muri Kristo Yesu.
Ubuntu bwayo ni bwo bwabakijije ku bw’ukwizera. Kandi n’ivyo ntivyavuye kuri mwebwe, ni ingabire y’Imana.
Ntivyavuye no ku bikorwa vyiza mwakoze, kugira ngo hoye kugira umuntu n’umwe yohava yirata.
Kuko turi ibiremwa vy’Imana, yaturemye gusha muri Kristo Yesu kugira ngo dukore ibikorwa vyiza, ivyo yari yaraduteguriye gukora kuva kera.
Nuko mwibuke ko kera mwebwe Abanyamahanga mwitwa “abatakebwe” n’abo biyita “abakebwe” (bakebwe ku mubiri n’intoke z’abantu).
Mwibuke ko ico gihe mwari mutandukanijwe na Kristo, mutagira ubwenegihugu muri Isirayeli kandi ata co mwiteze ku masezerano Imana yasezeranye, mutagira ivyizigiro kandi mutagira Imana mw’isi.
Ariko ubu, mumaze kuba muri Kristo Yesu, mwebwe abari kure y’Imana kera mwigijwe hafi yayo biciye mu maraso ya Kristo.
Kuko ni we mahoro yacu, we yakuyeho amacakubiri yari hagati y’Abayuda n’abanyamahanga akabagira ihanga rimwe akuyeho igihome c’ubwansi cadutandukanya.

Yabikoze mu gukuraho ibikorwa vyose vyisunga amategeko n’amabwirizwa, abikuzaho umubiri wiwe. Intumbero kwari kugira ngo yiremere ubwoko bushasha akuye mu Bayuda no mu Banyamahanga, gutyo azane impore hagati yacu.
Kandi abagire umubiri umwe abahuze n’Imana biciye mu rupfu rwo ku musaraba, uwo yicishije ubwo bwansi bwari hagati yabo.
Yaraje ababwira inkuru nziza y’amahoro mwebwe abanyamahanga mwari kure, abwira amahoro n’Abayuda bari hafi.
Kuko duciye kuri we, twese hamwe twaronse uburenganzira bwo gushikira Data turi muri Mpwemu umwe.
Kubera ivyo rero, mwebwe ntimukiri abanyamahanga na ba kavantara, ariko muri abasangiye ubwenegihugu n’abera b’Imana kandi muri abo mu nzu yayo.
Mwubatswe kw’itanguriro ry’intumwa n’abavugishwa, Kristo Yesu akaba ari we buye rigumya imfuruka.
Muri we inyubakwa yose irafatanywa neza ikaduga kugira ngo ibe urusengero rwejejwe mu Mwami.
Kandi muri we namwe muriko murubakwa mufatanywa ngo mube ingoro aho Imana iba biciye muri Mpwemu wayo.
Ku bw’ivyo, jewe Pawulo, imbohe ya Kristo Yesu ku bwa mwebwe Abanyamahanga,
sinkekeranya ko mwumvise ivy’igikorwa Imana yanjeje muri mwebwe co kubashikiriza ubuntu bwayo,
kandi iryo ni ibanga nahishuriwe, nk’uko namaze kuvyandikako mu ncamake.
Nimwasoma ibi rero, muzoshobora gutahura uguhishurirwa mfise kw’iryo banga rya Kristo,
ryari ryarahishijwe abantu bo mu bihe bitandukanye vyarenganye ariko ubu rikaba ryahishuwe na Mpwemu arihishurira intumwa n’abavugishwa bera b’Imana.

Iryo banga ni iri: Abanyamahanga co kimwe n’Abisirayeli, bose iyo bizeye Ubutumwa Bwiza, basangira umugabane w’abana b’Imana. Bose bagize umubiri umwe, kandi basangiye n’isezerano ry’imihezagiro Imana yasezeranye muri Kristo Yesu.
Ku bw’ubuntu bwayo n’ubushobozi bwayo bwinshi, naratewe iteka ryo kuba umukozi w’ubwo Butumwa Bwiza ngo ndabukwize hose.
Naho ndi uwo hanyuma y’abera bose, ubwo buntu bw’Imana narabugiriwe, ndaronka iryo teka ryo kubwira Abanyamahanga ubutunzi butagira urugero bafise muri Kristo.
Natoranijwe kugira ngo nsigurire umuntu wese ivy’iryo banga ryari ryarahishijwe n’Imana, Umuremyi wa vyose, kuva mu bihe vya kera.
Intumbero y’Imana muri ivyo vyose, kwari ukugira ngo ubu, biciye mw’ishengero, abatware n’abafise ububasha b’ahantu ho mw’ijuru bamenye ubwenge butagira urugero bw’Imana.
Uwo ni wo mugambi wayo w’ibihe bidashira, uwo yashize mu ngiro biciye muri Kristo Yesu Umwami wacu.
Muri we, kandi biciye mu kumwizera dushobora kwegera Imana mu mwidegemvyo kandi tudakekeranya.
Ndabasaba rero ngo ntimwihebuzwe n’imibabaro ndiko ndacamwo ku bwanyu, kuko ni icubahiro canyu.
Ni kubera ivyo mpfukama imbere ya Data,
uwo imiryango yose yo mw’ijuru n’iyo mw’isi ikomokako.
Nsaba Imana ko bivuye ku butunzi butagira urugero bw’ubwiza bwayo, yobakomeza mu Mpwemu, mu kubaha ubushobozi biciye muri Mpwemu wayo,
kugira ngo Kristo abe mu mitima yanyu biciye mu kumwizera. Kandi ndasenga kugira ngo mwebwe, mumaze gushingwa neza mu rukundo rwiwe,
mugire ubushobozi bubafasha gutahurira hamwe n’abandi bera b’Imana bose: ubwaguke, uburebure, uburebure bw’igihagararo n’ubw’amaja epfo bw’urukundo rwa Kristo,
kandi ngo mumenye urwo rukundo rwa Kristo naho rurengeye uko rwoshobora kumenywa, kugira ngo mu buzima bwanyu mwuzuzwe mushike ku rugezo rwo kunengesera kwose mu kumenya Imana.
Nuko rero iyishobora gukora ibirengeye cane ivyo dusaba canke twiyumvira, nk’uko ubushobozi bwayo bukorera muri twebwe buri,
icubahiro kibe icayo mw’ishengero no muri Kristo Yesu uhereye ibihe vyose, kugeza ibihe bidashira! Amen.
Nuko, Jewe nk’imbohe y’Umwami, ndabinginga ngo mubeho ubuzima bubereye ihamagarwa ryanyu mwahamagawe n’Imana.
Mwame imisi yose mwicisha bugufi, mugira ubugwaneza kandi mwihanganiranira, ku bw’urukundo.
Mugire ishaka ryo kuzigama ubumwe bwo muri Mpwemu kandi mufatanywe n’umugozi w’amahoro.
Hari umubiri umwe n’Impwemu imwe, nk’uko mwahamagariwe ivyizigiro bimwe vyo muri kazoza;
Hari Umwami umwe, ukwizera kumwe, umubatizo umwe;
kandi hari Imana imwe, ni yo Data wa twese, iri hejuru ya bose, igakorera muri bose kandi ikaba muri bose.
Ariko umwe wese muri twebwe yahawe ubuntu nk’uko Kristo yabigenye.
Ni co gituma bivugwa ngo: “Hamwe yaduga iyo hejuru, yajanye inyagano nyinshi kandi yatanze ingabire ku bantu biwe.”
(Mbega “yaraduze” bivuga iki, ko no kumanuka yamanutse agashika i bwina ho mw’isi?
Uwo yamanutse ni we nyene yaduze gushika hejuru ahasumba amajuru yose, kugira ngo yuzure ahantu hose.)
Nuko rero Kristo ni we yatanze ingabire mw’ishengero, bamwe abaha kuba intumwa, abandi kuba abavugishwa, abandi kuba abavugabutumwa, abandi kuba abungere n’abigisha,
kugira ngo bashobore kwigisha abera na bo bakore igikorwa ciwe, bubake ishengero ari ryo mubiri wa Kristo.
Ivyo bikwiye kubandanya bikorwa kugeza aho twese tuzoshikira ku kugiriranira ubumwe mu kwizera no mu kumenya neza Umwana w’Imana, no gukura kugeza dushike ku rugezo rwo kunengesera kwa Kristo.
Aho rero ni ho tutazosubira kumera nk’inzoya, ngo dukubebwe tujanwa hirya no hino n’imipfunda, twongera tuzungagizwa n’umuyaga uwo ari wo wose w’inyigisho z’ibinyoma n’amayeri vy’abantu bazimiza.
Ahubwo, tuzovuga ukuri mu rukundo, dukure mu buryo bwose, kugeza dushike ku gusa na Kristo, we mutwe w’umubiri ari ryo shengero ryiwe.
Ni we atuma umubiri wose ukomera ugafatanywa neza n’ingingo zawo, ugakura neza kandi ukubakwa mu rukundo, mu gihe urugingo rwose rukoze igikorwa carwo.
Nuko ndababwira ibi kandi ndabihanikiriza mw’izina ry’Umwami: ntimukwiye kuguma mubaho nk’uko Abanyamahanga babaho, mu gukurikiza ivyiyumviro vyabo bitagira ikimazi.
Ubwenge bwabo buri mu mwijima kandi batandukanijwe n’ubugingo bw’Imana kubera ukutamenya kuri muri bo kuva ku gukomantara kw’imitima yabo.
Kubera ata kintu kigiteye isoni kuri bo, bisutse mu vy’ubuhumbu maze bakora ibihumanya vy’uburyo bwose, kandi buzuye ukwipfuza kwinshi.
Ariko mweho si gutyo mwize Kristo,
igihe mwumva maze mukigishwa ivyiwe, mukamenya ukuri kuva muri we.
Ku bijanye n’ingeso zanyu za kera, mwarigishijwe kwiyambura kamere k’icaha ari we muntu wanyu wa kera, abozwa n’ivyipfuzo vyiwe vy’uruhendo;
ngo mugirwe bashasha na Mpwemu mu vyiyumviro vyanyu no mu myifato;
hanyuma mwambare umuntu mushasha, yaremwe ngo ase n’Imana mu bugororotsi bw’ukuri no mu kwezwa.
Nuko rero umwe wese muri mwebwe niyiyambure ibinyoma, muvugane ukuri na bagenzi banyu, kuko turi ingingo zigize umubiri umwe.
“Ugushavura kwanyu ntikubakoreshe icaha,” kandi izuba ntirirenge mugishavuye,
kuko ishavu riha akaryo wa mubi.
Uwiba ntakongere kwiba, ariko atangure gukora, akoreshe amaboko yiwe mu buryo bwiza kugira ngo aronke ikimutunga n’ico gufashisha umukene.
Ntihakagire ijambo ribi riva mu kanwa kanyu, ariko iryo muvuze ryose, rize ribe ryiza kandi ryubaka abandi mu bijanye n’ivyo bakeneye, ryongere ribe irihesha ubuntu ababumva.
Kandi ntimukababaze Mpwemu Yera w’Imana, uwo mwahawe nk’ikidodo cemeza ko muri abiwe, ku bwa wa musi aho muzocungurirwa.
Mwiyambure umururazi wose, ubushangashirwe, uburake, ugutongana n’ugutukana, hamwe n’ibindi bibi vyose.
Mugiranire neza kandi mubabarane, mwongere muharirane nk’uko Imana yabahariye muri Kristo.
Nuko rero mwigane Imana, kuko muri abana bayo ikunda cane,
kandi mugendere mu nzira y’urukundo, nk’uko Kristo yadukunze akitanga ku bwacu ngo abe ubumote bwiza n’ikimazi bihabwa Imana.
Ariko muri mwebwe ntihabemwo ubusambanyi, canke ukwipfuza ukwo ari kwo kwose, canke ubukunzi bw’inda, kuko bidakwiye ku bera b’Imana.
Ntihakagire ibiterasoni, amajambo y’ubupfu canke ibitwenza bibi bigira ikibanza muri mwebwe, ahubwo habe amashimwe.
Kuko mukwiye kumenya neza ko: ata munyangeso mbi, uwanduye canke uwukunda inda; umuntu nk’uwo asenga ibigirwamana, azogira ico aragwa mu bwami bwa Kristo n’Imana.
Ntihagire uwubahendesha amajambo atagira ikimazi, kuko ibintu nk’ivyo bizana uburake bw’Imana ku batayumvira.
Nuko rero ntimukifatanye na bo mu vyo bakora.
Kuko kera mwari mwuzuye umwijima, ariko noneho ubu mufise umuco uva ku Mwami wacu. Nimubeho rero nk’abana b’umuco
(kuko icamwa c’umuco ni ineza y’uburyo bwose, ukugororoka n’ukuri),
kandi mumenye ibihimbara Umwami ivyo ari vyo.
Ntimwifatanye n’ibikorwa vy’impfagusa bikorerwa mu mwijima, ahubwo mubishire ahabona.
Biteye n’isoni kuvuga ivyo abatumvira Imana bakorera mu mpisho.
Ariko igishizwe ahabona n’umuco cose gica kiboneka; kandi ikirasiwe n’umuco kiba mu muco.
Ni co gituma bivugwa ngo: “Ikangure, wewe usinziriye, vyuka uve mu bapfuye, maze Kristo arakumurikira.”
Nuko mwirinde cane uko mubaho, ntimwigenze nk’imburabwenge, ahubwo mwigenze nk’abanyabwenge.
Akaryo kose muronse mugakoreshe neza, kuko imisi ari mibi.
Ntimube ibipfu, ariko mutahure ivyo Umwami abashakako ivyo ari vyo.
Ntimukaborerwe umuvinyu, kuko bijana abantu mu buhumbu. Ahubwo, mwuzure Mpwemu Yera,
mubwirane amazaburi n’indirimbo, zo guhimbaza ziva kuri Mpwemu. Muririmbe kandi mucurarangire Umwami bivuye mu mitima yanyu,
mushimira vyose Imana Data imisi yose, mw’izina ry’Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo.
Umwe wese agamburukire mugenziwe abitewe no kwubaha Kristo.
Bagore, mwumvire abagabo banyu nk’uko mwumvira Umwami Yesu.
Kuko umugabo ari we mutwe w’umugore nk’uko Kristo na we ari we mutwe w’ishengero ari ryo mubiri wiwe, na we akaba umukiza waryo.
Nuko rero nk’uko ishengero ryubaha Kristo, ni ko n’abagore bakwiye kwubaha abagabo babo muri vyose.
Bagabo, mukunde abagore banyu, nk’uko Kristo yakunze ishengero akaryigura
ngo arigire iryejejwe ritunganye, aryogesheje umwuhagiro w’amazi ari ryo Jambo ry’Imana.
Ivyo yabikoze kugira ngo aryiyegereze ari ishengero rikayangana, ritagira agatosi canke umunkanyari canke akandi gasembwa kose, ariko ryejejwe ritagira umugayo.
Muri iyo nzira nyene, abagabo bakwiye gukunda abagore babo nk’imibiri yabo bwite. Uwukunda umugore wiwe abayikunda.
Kandi murazi ko ata muntu yoshobora kwanka umubiri wiwe, ariko arawugaburira akawitwararika, nk’uko Kristo abikora kw’ishengero,
kuko turi ingingo z’umubiri wiwe.
“Ku bw’ivyo, nk’uko Ivyanditswe bivuga, umugabo azosiga se na nyina abane n’umugore wiwe ubutakivana, maze bompi babe nk’umubiri umwe.”
Iri ni ibanga rihambaye; ariko ni ishusho nziza yerekana ivya Kristo n’ishengero.
Rero, umwe wese muri mwebwe akunde umugore wiwe nk’uko yikunda, kandi umugore na we yubahe umugabo wiwe.
Bana, mwumvire abavyeyi banyu kuko muri ab’Umwami, kandi akaba ari vyo bibereye.
“Wubahe so na nyoko.” Ni co cagezwe ca mbere gifise isezerano:
