“Niwubahe so na nyoko kugira ngo ivyawe bize bigende neza kandi kugira ngo uze urambire kw’isi.”
Ba se, ntimuratse abana banyu; ahubwo mubarerere mu ngeso nziza zo kwubaha Umwami.
Bashumba, mwumvire ba shobuja bo mw’isi, mububaha kandi mubatinya, bivuye ku mitima, nk’uko mwokwubaha Kristo.
Mubumvire igihe cose, atari gusa iyo babahagarikiye. Ariko kuko muri abakozi ba Kristo, mugakora ivyo Imana igomba bivuye ku mitima.
Mukorane imitima yanyu yose, nk’aho mwoba muriko mukorera Umwami wacu, mutariko mukorera abantu,
kuko muzi neza ko Umwami azohembera umuntu wese ivyo yakoze, ari umugurano canke uwidegemvya.
Namwe ba shebuja, mugirire abagurano banyu nk’uko nyene. Ntimubatere ubwoba, kuko muzi yuko Shebuja wabo ari we wanyu ari mw’ijuru, kandi ko atarobanura abantu ku butoni.
Ijambo rya nyuma: mukomere mu Mwami wacu no mu bushobozi bwiwe bwinshi.
Mwambare ibigwanisho vyose Imana itanga, kugira ngo mushobore guhangana n’ubugunge bwose bwa wa mubi.

Kuko mu ntambara yacu ntituriko tugwana n’abafise umubiri n’amaraso, ariko tugwana n’abatware babi, n’abafise ububasha b’ahantu tutabona, n’abanyabushobozi bo mw’isi y’umwijima hamwe rero n’impwemu mbi z’ahantu ho mw’ijuru.
Nuko rero mwambare ibigwanisho vyose vy’Imana, kugira ngo ku musi ikibi caje, muze mushobore guhagarara mudatsinzwe kandi mumaze gukora vyose, mukomeze guhagarara mushikamye.
Nuko mushikame, mukenyeje umukanda w’ukuri, mwambaye icuma gikingira igikiriza ari kwo kugororoka,
ku birenge vyanyu mwambare ibirato ari kwo kwitegurira kuvuga Ubutumwa Bwiza bw’amahoro.
Icongeye kuri ivyo vyose, mwitwaze inkinzo y’ukwizera, iyo mushobora kuzimisha imyampi yose yaka umuriro ya wa mubi.
Mwambare n’inkofero y’agakiza, mwitwaze n’inkota ya Mpwemu, ari ryo jambo ry’Imana.
Kandi musengere muri Mpwemu ibihe vyose kandi mugire amasengesho y’uburyo bwose n’ukwinginga. Hamwe n’ivyo vyose, mwame muri maso kandi mwame musenga ubudasiba musengera abera b’Imana bose.
Kandi nanje munsengere, kugira ngo igihe cose mvuze, mpabwe amajambo kugira ngo menyeshe abantu ibanga ry’Ubutumwa Bwiza ntatinya,
ubwo mbereye umuserukizi mw’ibohero. Munsengere ngo ndabuvuge ntatinya, nk’uko bikwiye.
Tukiko, umuvukanyi nkunda kandi umukozi w’umwizigirwa mu Mwami, azobabwira vyose, kugira ngo namwe mumenye uko meze n’ivyo ndiko ndakora.
Ni muri iyo ntumbero ndamubarungikiye, kugira ngo mumenye uko tumerewe yongere aremeshe imitima yanyu.
Amahoro abe kuri bene Data, n’urukundo rufatanije n’ukwizera biva ku Mana Data no ku Mwami Yesu Kristo.
Ubuntu bube ku bakunda Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo hamwe n’urukundo rudahera.
Jewe Pawulo na Timoteyo abakozi ba Kristo Yesu, Turabandikiye mwese abera bo muri Kristo Yesu muri i Filipi, hamwe n’abarongozi b’ishengero n’abadiyakoni bose:
Ubuntu n’amahoro biva ku Mana Data wa twese no ku Mwami wacu Yesu Kristo bibane namwe.
Nama nshima Imana igihe cose ndabibutse.
Kandi igihe cose nsenze, nama ndabasengera nuzuye umunezero
kuko twafatanije gukwiza Ubutumwa Bwiza, uhereye igihe mwabwumva kugeza n’ubu.
Sinkekeranya ko Imana yatanguje ico gikorwa ciza muri mwebwe izokibandanya gushika ikirangije, ku musi Kristo Yesu azogarukirako.
Birabereye ko ndabiyumvira gutyo mwese, kuko ndabafise ku mutima. Mwese musangiye nanje ubuntu bw’Imana, haba mu gihe ndi mw’ibohero canke ndiko ndagwanira Ubutumwa Bwiza ndabwemanga.
Imana ni yo yomenya ingene ndabakunda n’ingene nipfuza kubabona n’umutima w’inkumbu ziva kuri Kristo Yesu.
Ico nsengera ni uko urukundo rwanyu rworushiriza kugwira, kandi mugakomeza kwunguka ubwenge n’ugutahura,
kugira ngo mushobore kumenya neza iciza kurusha ibindi ico ari co, mutanduye kandi mutagira umugayo gushika aho Kristo azogarukira.
Ndabipfuriza kwama mwuzuye ivyamwa vy’ukugororoka biva kuri Kristo Yesu, kugira ngo biheshe Imana icubahiro n’amashimwe.
Bene Data, ndashaka ko mumenya ko ivyanshikiye vyatumye Ubutumwa Bwiza butera buja imbere.
Kuko umuntu wese hano, mbere n’abacunze ikirimba bose barimwo, barazi neza ko ndi mw’ibohero kubera Kristo.
Kandi, bivuye ku kubohwa kwanje, bene Data ba hano barashize amanga mu Mwami, bituma bashobora kuvuga Ijambo ry’Imana bashize ubwoba.
Ni ivy’ukuri ko bamwe bavuga ivya Kristo babitewe n’ishari n’umutima w’impari, ariko hariho n’abavuga ivya Kristo bafise intumbero nziza.
Abo babikora kubera kunkunda, kuko bazi ko mbohewe hano kubera kugwanira Ubutumwa Bwiza.
Barya bandi bo bigisha Kristo ku bw’inyungu zabo, badasunitswe n’umutima utunganye, kuko kugomba kunteza imibabaro mu gihe ndi mw’ibohero.
Ariko ntaco bitwaye. Babikora mu kuri canke babikora mu buryarya, igihambaye ni uko Kristo ariko aravugwa. Kandi ivyo ndabinezererewe, mbere nzokomeza kubinezerererwa.
Kuko ndazi ko kubera amasengesho munsengera n’ubufasha bwa Mpwemu wa Kristo Yesu ivyo vyose bizotuma mbohorwa.

Mfise ivyizigiro vyinshi ko ntazokwigera maramazwa, ariko ko nzokomeza gushira ubwoba, nk’uko namye. Kandi ndizera ko ubu n’ibihe vyose Kristo azokwama ahabwa icubahiro mu mubiri wanje, haba mu kubaho kwanje canke mu rupfu rwanje.
Kuko kuri jewe, ubuzima ni Kristo, gupfa na kwo ni inyungu.
Mbandanije kubaho mu mubiri, vyotuma nama ivyamwa vyinshi ku bwa Kristo. Mu vy’ukuri, sinzi ico nohitamwo!
Numva vyose binkwega: gupfa nkigira kubana na Kristo, ni vyo birushirije kuba vyiza kuri jewe,
ariko ku bwanyu, iciza ni uko nobandanya kubaho mu mubiri.
Kandi kubera ivyo ndazi ntakekeranya ko nzokomeza kubaho, kugira ngo nkomeze kubafasha gukura no kwumva umunezero uva mu kwizera.
Ivyo bizotuma ninagaruka iwanyu, muzorushiriza kunezerwa muri Kristo Yesu kubera ibikorwa vyiza ariko arakorera muri mwebwe.

Muri vyose, mugire ingeso zijanye n’Ubutumwa Bwiza bwa Kristo kugira ngo, nshoboye kuza tukongera tukabonana canke bidashobotse, nzokwumve ko mushikamye kandi muri umwe mu Mpwemu, mufise umutima umwe, mugwanira ukwizera kuva ku Butumwa Bwiza.
Ntimuterwe ubwoba n’ababagwanya. Ico ni co kizobabera ikimenyetso ko bagiye kurandurwa, ariko ko mwebwe mugiye kuronka agakiza, na ko kakaba kava ku Mana yonyene.
Kuko mutagiriwe ubuntu bwo kwizera Kristo gusa, ahubwo mwahawe n’ubwo gushobora kubabazwa ku bwiwe.
Turi kumwe muri iyo ntambara. Mwarabonye ingene nayigwanye muri kahise, kandi murazi ko n’ubu nkiri muri yo.
Nimba hari ukuremeshwa muronka muri Kristo, nimba hari ukwirurwa kuva mu rukundo rwiwe, nimba hari ugufatanya muri Mpwemu, nimba hari ubugwaneza n’impuhwe,
nimwuzuze umunezero wanje mu kugira umutima umwe n’urukundo rumwe, muhuje umutima n’inama mu vyiyumviro no mu ntumbero.
Ntihakagire ico mukora musunitswe n’ukwikunda canke n’ukwishira hejuru, ariko mu kwicisha bugufi, mushire abandi imbere.
Ntihagire ico mukora muronderera inyungu zanyu gusa, ariko mwiyumvire no ku nyungu z’abandi.
Mu migenderanire yanyu, mugire inyifato nk’iyo Kristo Yesu yari afise:
We, naho yari Imana, ntiyigeze abona ko kungana n’Imana ari ikintu co kwumirako.
Ahubwo, yiyambuye ubumana bwiwe, yambara ishusho y’umugurano, acika uwusa n’abantu.
Kandi amaze kuboneka mw’ishusho y’umuntu, yicisha bugufi, aragamburuka gushika no ku rupfu, mbere urupfu rwo ku musaraba.
Ni co catumye Imana imushira hejuru cane, imuha izina rirengeye ayandi mazina yose
kugira ngo mw’izina rya Yesu, amavi yose aze apfukame, ari ay’ivyo mw’ijuru, ay’ivyo kw’isi n’ay’ivy’i kuzimu,
kandi indimi zose zize zature ko Yesu Kristo ari Umwami, kugira ngo biheshe Imana Data icubahiro.

Bakunzi banje, nk’uko mwamye mugamburuka igihe cose nari kumwe namwe, n’ubu ntari kumwe namwe, mukwiye kurushirizaho. Mukorane umwete ibikorwa bigaragaza agakiza kanyu, mwubaha Imana, muhinda agashitsi imbere yayo,
kuko Imana ari yo ikorera muri mwebwe, ikabaha ugushaka no gukora ivyo igomba.
Mukore vyose mutidodomba kandi mudaharira,
kugira ngo mubeho mutagira umugayo, mugororotse, mube abana b’Imana batagira agatosi mu bantu b’iki gihe bagoramye kandi bononekaye, abo mubonekamwo mwakaka nk’inyenyeri zo kw’ijuru.
Mugumye cane ijambo ritanga ubugingo, ni ho nzoronka ico nirata ku musi w’ukugaruka kwa Kristo, kuko ntazoba nirukiye ubusa, kandi igikorwa canje ntikizoba cabaye impfagusa.
Kandi naho ndi hafi gutanga ubuzima bwanje ngo busukwe nk’ishikanwa ry’ikinyobwa ku kimazi, ari vyo bikorwa biva mu kwizera kwanyu, ndabinezererewe kandi nezeranywe namwe mwese.
Kandi namwe mukwiye kunezeranwa nanje.
Umwami Yesu niyabikunda, nzobarungikira Timoteyo, kugira ngo nanje nzoterwe intege igihe nzokwumva amakuru yanyu.
Nta wundi n’umwe mfise abitwararitse vy’ukuri nka we.
Abandi bose bitayeho ivyabo, nta witayeho ivya Yesu Kristo.
Ariko murazi ko Timoteyo yerekanye ubwizigirwa bwiwe, kuko yakoranye nanje mu kuvuga Ubutumwa Bwiza, nk’uko umwana akorana n’umuvyeyi.
Nizigiye kuzoca ndamubarungikira maze kubona uko ivyanje bizoba vyifashe.
Kandi nanje nizeye ko Umwami azonshoboza kubagendera vuba.

Ariko, nabonye ko ari vyiza kurungika Epafurodite akagaruka iwanyu. Ni mwene Data vy’ukuri akorana nanje kandi agwanana nanje intambara. Mwamundungikiye nk’intumwa kugira ngo amfashe mu vyo nari nkeneye.
Ndamurungitse kuko abakumbuye cane kandi ahagaritswe umutima n’uko mwumvise ko yarwaye.
Ni vyo yararwaye ahakwa no gupfa, ariko Imana yamugiriye ubuntu nk’ubwo yangiriye, kugira ngo sinicwe no kugira umubabaro ukurwa n’uwundi.
Ni co gituma nezerewe cane no kumubarungikira, kugira ngo nimwamubona muze munezerwe, nanje nsubize umutima mu nda ku bwanyu.
Mumwakire mu Mwami n’umunezero mwinshi, mumuhe icubahiro kibereye abantu nka we,
kuko yahatswe gupfa azira igikorwa ca Kristo akongera agahakwa gupfa ariko ankorera ibikorwa mutari gushobora kunkorera muri hiyo.
Bene Data, munezerwe mu Mwami mu vyo mucamwo vyose! Ibi ntibingora gusubira kubibandikira, kuko ari kugira ngo bizigame ukwizera kwanyu.
Mwirinde za mbwa, mwirinde za nkozi z’ibibi, bamwe bababwira ko mutegerezwa kwikeba kugira ngo mukizwe.
Kuko, twebwe dusengera Imana muri Mpwemu, tukirata Kristo Yesu, kandi ntitwishimire ivy’umubiri, ni twebwe twakebwe vy’ukuri.
N’aho nari mfise imvo zo kwiyizigira kandi nimba hari n’abandi bibaza ko bafise imvo zotuma bishimira ivy’umubiri, jewe mfise nyinshi kubarusha.
Nakebwe ku musi ugira umunani, ndi Umwisirayeli ku bw’amaraso, wo mu muryango wa Benyamini, ndi Umuheburayo w’ukuri, ku bijanye n’ivyagezwe, ndi Umufarisayo,
ku vyerekeye ishaka, nahama ishengero, kandi ku vyerekeye ukugororoka kuzanwa n’ivyagezwe, nta mugayo wambonekako.
Ariko ivyo nahora nibaza ko bifise agaciro, ubu ndavyiyumvira nk’ibitagira ikimazi, kubera ivyo Kristo yakoze.

Ikirenze kuri ivyo, ni uko ibintu vyose ndavyiyumvira nk’ibitagira ikimazi kubera kumenya ikibirengeye ari co Kristo Yesu, Umwami wanje. Ku bw’uwo, nahevye ibindi vyose, ndabihindura ubusa kugira ngo ndonke Kristo,
kandi mboneke ndi muri we, ntafise ukugororoka kwanje kuzanwa n’ivyagezwe, ariko mfise ukugororoka kuzanwa n’ukwizera Kristo. Ni ukugororoka kuva ku Mana, kandi ukwo na kwo kuva ku kwizera.
Nipfuza kumenya Kristo no kumenya burya bushobozi bwamuzuye mu bapfuye no gusangira na we imibabaro yiwe, nse na we no mu rupfu rwiwe,
kugira ngo nanje nzobe mw’izuka ry’abapfuye.
Singomba kuvuga ko ivyo maze kubishikira, canke ko maze gutunganywa rwose. Ariko, ndabandanya kugira ngo nshikire ukwo gutunganywa kwatumye Kristo Yesu amfata.
Bene Data, siniyumvira ko maze gufata ico ndondera. Ariko, ico nkora ni iki kimwe: Nibagira ivyarenganye, ngakurikira ibiri imbere.
Ndabandanya kugira ngo nshike ku mpera y’umuhamagaro, hanyuma ndonke impera yo mw’ijuru, iyo Imana yaduhamagariye muri Kristo Yesu.
Abakuze mu kwizera twese twiyumvire dutyo. Nihagira ico tutumva co kimwe, Imana izokibatahuza.
Ariko ivyo tumaze gutahura tubigenderemwo.
Bene Data, mumfatireko akarorero, kandi mwigire kuri abo bose bakurikiza akarorero kacu.
Nari maze kubibabwira kenshi, kandi n’ubu ndongeye ndabibasubiriyemwo n’amarira menshi, ko hari benshi bigenza nk’abansi b’umusaraba wa Kristo.
Iherezo ryabo ni ukurandurwa. Imana yabo ni inda yabo, kandi ivyobateye isoni ni vyo bihimbaro vyabo. Nta kindi biyumvira atari ivy’iyi si gusa.
Ariko twebwe iwacu ni mw’ijuru, ni ho twiteze ko Umukiza azozanana, ni Umwami Yesu Kristo.
Azofata umubiri wacu w’intege nke kandi upfa, awuhindure umubiri w’ubwiza usa n’uwiwe, muri bwa bushobozi afise bumushoboza gushira vyose musi y’inganji yiwe.
None rero, bene Data, abo nkunda kandi nipfuza cane kubona, mwebwe munezero wanje n’igitsibo canje, muhagarare mushikamye mu Mwami Yesu, bakunzi banje.
Ndinginze Ewodiya na Sintike ngo basubize hamwe mu Mwami.

Kandi ndakwinginze nawe dufatanije mu gikorwa, ngo ufashe abo bagore, kuko babanye nanje cane mu gikorwa co kubwira abandi Ubutumwa Bwiza, co kimwe na Kelementi n’abandi twakoranye, abo amazina yabo yanditswe mu gitabu c’ubugingo.
Mwame munezerewe mu mwami, ndabisubiyemwo ubugira kabiri: nimunezerwe.
Ubugwaneza bwanyu bumenywe n’abantu bose, kuko Umwami wacu ari hafi.
Ntimukiganyire ku kintu na kimwe, ariko ivyo mukeneye vyose mubimenyeshe Imana mu gusenga no mu kwinginga, bifatanije no gukenguruka.
Maze amahoro y’Imana arengeye ugutahura kw’abantu azoca aza, azigamire imitima yanyu n’ubwenge bwanyu muri Kristo Yesu.
Ibisigaye bene Data, mushire ivyiyumviro vyanyu ku vy’ukuri vyose, ivy’ukwubahwa vyose, ivy’ukugororoka vyose, ibitunganye vyose, ivy’igikundiro vyose, ibishimwa vyose. Ivyo abe ari vyo mwiyumvira.
Ivyo mwigishijwe canke mwanyumvanye, canke ivyo mwambonyeko, mubishire mu ngiro. Imana y’amahoro izobana namwe.
Ndanezerewe cane mu Mwami kuko mwasubiriye kunyitaho. Ndazi ko mwamye munyitaho kuva kera ariko ntimwari bwaronke akaryo ko kubingaragariza.
Ibi sindabivugishijwe n’ubukene, kuko muri vyose namenyereye kubumbwa n’ivyo mfise.
Ndazi ico ari co kuba mu bukene, kandi ndazi kubaho mu musesekara. Narize ibanga ryo kubaho muri vyose, haba mu gahimbo canke mu nzara, haba mu musesekara canke mu bukene.
Nshobozwa vyose na Kristo ampa inkomezi.
Mwagize neza kwifatanya nanje mu mibabaro ndimwo.
Kandi nk’uko mubizi mwese ab’i Filipi, mu misi ya mbere igihe Ubutumwa Bwiza bwabashikira, igihe nagomba kuja i Makedoniya, ata rindi shengero na rimwe ryamfashishije ivyo nari nkeneye, atari mwebwe,
kuko n’igihe nari i Tesalonike, mwagumye mundungikira ivyo nari nkeneye.
Ibi sindabivugishijwe no gushaka ibindi, ariko nipfuje kubashimira ku neza mwangiriye.
Ubu mfise ivyo nkeneye vyose, ndetse n’umusesekara, kuko naronse ingabire nyishi mwarungikanye Epafurodite. Zimeze nk’amavuta amotesha neza, ikimazi cemerwa, gihimbara Imana.
Imana izobaha ivyo mukeneye vyose nk’uko ubutunzi bw’ubwiza bwayo butangaje buri muri Kristo Yesu.
Icubahiro kibe ic’Imana Data wa twese ibihe vyose, Amen.
Mundamukirize abera bose muri Kristo Yesu. Bene Data turi kumwe barabatasha.
Abera bose barabatasha, na canecane abo mu nzu kwa Kayisari.
Ubuntu bw’Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo bubane n’impwemu yanyu. Amen.
Jewe Pawulo, intumwa ya Kristo Yesu kubera ugushaka kw’Imana, na mwene Data Timoteyo,
Turabandikiye mwebwe abera b’Imana bo mu gisagara c’i Kolosayi, bene Data b’abizigirwa muri Kristo: Ubuntu n’amahoro biva ku Mana Data wa twese bibe muri mwebwe.
Imisi yose dushima Imana, Se w’Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo, iyo tubasengera,
kuko twumvise ukwizera Kristo Yesu kwanyu n’urukundo mufitiye abera b’Imana bose.
Ukwo kwizera n’urwo rukundo vyubakiye ku kwizigira ivyo Imana ibabikiye mw’ijuru. Ivyo vyizigiro na vyo mwabikuye mw’ijambo ry’ukuri mwumvise, ari ryo Butumwa Bwiza.

Ubwo Butumwa Bwiza bwabashikiriye ni na bwo buriko burakwiragira kw’isi yose. Buriko burama ivyamwa bwongera bugwira, nk’uko vyagenze no muri mwebwe uhereye igihe mwabwumviye ubwa mbere, mugatahura ubuntu bw’Imana nk’uko bumeze vy’ukuri.
Mwabubwiwe na Epafura, umukozi w’Imana dukunda kandi dusangiye igikorwa, akaba n’umukozi wa Kristo w’umwizigirwa abakorera.
Ni we yatubwiye ivy’urukundo rwanyu mwahawe na Mpwemu.
Ni co gituma, kuva igihe twumviye ivyanyu, tudahengeshanya kubasengera, dusaba Imana ngo ibuzuze ukumenya ivyo igomba mu bwenge bwose n’ugutahura bitangwa na Mpwemu,
kugira ngo mubeho nk’uko bibereye ab’Umwami Yesu, mwongere mumunezereze muri vyose: mwama ivyamwa mu gikorwa ciza cose kandi mukura mu vyo kumenya Imana.
Turanabasengera ngo mukomezwe n’ubushobozi bwose bw’ubwiza bwiwe, kugira ngo mushobore kwihanganira vyose no kurindirana umunezero,
mushima Data yabashoboje gusangira n’abera biwe umugabane mu bwami bw’umuco.
Yaradukijije adukura mu bubasha bw’umwijima, adushira mu bwami bw’Umwana wiwe akunda.
Muri we ni ho twaherewe ugucungurwa, ari kwo guharirwa ivyaha.
Kristo ni we shusho iboneka y’Imana itaboneka, imfura irengeye ivyaremwe vyose,

kuko vyose vyaremwe biciye muri we: ivyo mw’ijuru n’ivyo kw’isi, ibiboneka n’ibitaboneka, zaba intebe z’ubwami, ubukuru, ubutware, ubutegetsi; vyose vyaremwe biciye muri we, kandi biremerwa kuba ivyiwe.
We yabayeho vyose bitarabaho, kandi muri we ni ho vyose bifatanirizwa.
Ni we mutwe w’umubiri, ari ryo shengero; ni we tanguriro kandi ni we mfura mu kuzuka mu bapfuye; kugira ngo muri vyose abe agaheta,
kuko Imana yahimbawe n’uko ubumana bwayo bwuzuye buba muri we,
kandi biciye muri we yiyujuje n’ibintu vyose, vyaba ibiri kw’isi canke ibiri mw’ijuru; izanishije amahoro amaraso yiwe, ayo yaviriye ku musaraba.
Kera mwari kure y’Imana kandi mwari abansi bayo mu vyiyumviro vyanyu no mu bikorwa vyanyu bibi.
Ariko ubu yariyujuje namwe mu mubiri wa Kristo biciye mu rupfu rwiwe, kugira ngo ibashikane imbere yayo mwejejwe, mutagira agatosi kandi ata n’ico mwogawa,

nimba vy’ukuri mwagumye mu kwizera, mushinzwe neza kandi mutanyiganyiga mu vyizigiro vyanyu biva mu Butumwa Bwiza. Ubwo ni bwo mwumvise kandi bwavuzwe mu vyaremwe vyose biri musi y’ijuru. Ubwo ni bwo jewe, Pawulo, nabereye umukozi.
Ubu nezererewe imibabaro ndiko ndacamwo ku bwanyu. Mu mubiri wanje, ndiko ndashitsa ibisigaye ku mibabaro ya Kristo ku bw’umubiri wiwe, ari ryo Shengero.
Nahindutse umukozi waryo kubera igikorwa Imana yanjeje muri mwebwe co kubashikiriza ijambo ryayo ryuzuye.
Iryo jambo ni ibanga ryari ryarahishijwe imyaka n’iyindi, ariko ubu ryahishuriwe abizera.
Imana yahisemwo kumenyekanisha mu Banyamahanga ubutunzi n’ubwiza bw’iryo banga; iryo banga ni Kristo ari muri mwebwe, ivyizigiro vy’ubwiza.
Ni we twamamaza, tuburira kandi twigisha umuntu wese mu bwenge bwose, kugira ngo dushikane umuntu wese kuri Kristo, akuze mu buryo bw’impwemu ata co ahajije.
Ni co gituma nkora nkaruha cane, nkagwanisha ubushobozi bwiwe bwinshi bukorera muri jewe n’inkomezi.
Ndashaka ko mumenya ukuntu ndabagwanira intambara ihambaye mwebwe n’ab’i Lawodikiya, hamwe n’abatarigera bambona na rimwe bose.
Intumbero yanje ni uko bose baremeshwa mu mutima bari n’ubumwe buva mu rukundo, kugira ngo bagire ubutunzi bwuzuye bwo gutahura gushitse, kugira ngo bamenye iryo banga ry’Imana, ari ryo Kristo.
Muri we ni ho ubutunzi bwose bw’ubwenge no kumenya buhishijwe.
Ndababwiye ivyo kugira ngo ntihagire umuntu n’umwe abahendesha akarimi gasosa.
Kuko naho tutari kumwe mu mubiri, ndi kumwe namwe mu mpwemu nkanezerezwa no kubabona muhagaze neza kandi mushikamye mu kwizera Kristo kwanyu.
Nuko rero, nk’uko mwakiriye Kristo Yesu nk’Umwami, abe ari ko mushishikara kuba muri we,
mushinze imizi kandi mwubatswe neza muri we, mukomeye mu kwizera nk’uko mwigishijwe, kandi amashimwe yanyu ari menshi asesekaye.
Mwirinde ntihagire umuntu n’umwe abagira inyagano akoresheje amajambo y’uruhendo, yubakiye ku migenzo y’abantu hamwe n’ivya mbere vy’impwemu kandi vy’iyi si, ariko atari ivya Kristo.
Kuko muri Kristo ari ho ukunengesera kw’Imana kuza kukaba mu buryo bw’umubiri.
Kandi mwahawe ukunengesera muri Kristo, we mutwe w’ubukuru bwose n’ukuganza kwose.
Muri we mwarakebwe ugukebwa kutari ukwo mu buryo bw’umubiri. Ni ugukebwa mwakebwe na Kristo kwo kubambura akamere k’icaha.
Kuko igihe mwabatizwa mwahambanywe na we hanyuma muzukana na we kugira ngo mubeho ubuzima bushasha mwaronse biciye mu kwizera ubushobozi bw’Imana, yamuzuye imukuye mu bapfuye.
Igihe mwari mugipfuye mwishwe n’ivyaha vyanyu hamwe no kudakebwa kwa kamere kanyu k’icaha, Imana yabahinduye bazima muri Kristo. Yaduhariye ivyaha vyacu vyose,
ahindura ubusa icanditswe catwagiriza kandi cadutsindisha; agikuraho, akibamba ku musaraba.
Yambuye ibigwanisho abakuru n’abatware, abateterereza ahabona mu maso ya bose, abaneshesheje uwo musaraba.
Nuko rero ntimwemere ko hagira umuntu n’umwe abacira urubanza ku vyo murya canke munywa, canke ku misi mikuru y’idini, haba iy’ukwezi guserutse canke umusi w’Isabato.
Ivyo vyari igitutu c’ivyari bigiye kuzoza; ariko ishusho y’ukuri yari umubiri wa Kristo ubwiwe.

Ntihagire umuntu n’umwe abacira urubanza kubera inyungu mbi yishimikije uguca bugufi kutari kwo no gusenga abamarayika. Yihayagiza ko ivyo ari ivyo yeretswe. Ubwenge bwabo bwuzuye ivyaha butuma bishira hejuru ku vy’ubusa gusa.
Ntibagifatanye n’umutwe, ari wo Kristo, umubiri wose wisunga, ufatanijwe n’imitsi n’imisokoro, ugakura uko Imana ibitegetse.
Ko mwapfanye na Kristo ku vya mbere vy’impwemu kandi vy’iyi si, ni kuki, nk’aho mukiganzwa na yo, mucumvira amategeko yayo avuga ngo:
“Ntufate iki! Ntiwumvirize kuri kirya! Ntukore kuri kiriya!”?
Amategeko nk’ayo ni inyigisho z’abantu zijanye n’ibintu bigenda birahera uko tuba turiko turabikoresha.

Ayo mategeko mu vy’ukuri aboneka nk’aho womenga arimwo ubwenge, kuko asaba abantu gusenga uko bibwirije, no kwiyanka hamwe no kubabaza umubiri. Ariko nta bushobozi na butoya afise bwo kunesha ivyipfuzo vy’umubiri.
None rero ko mwazuranywe na Kristo, mushire imitima yanyu ku biri mw’ijuru, aho Kristo yicaye mu kibanza c’iteka i buryo bw’Imana.
Ubwenge bwanyu mubushire ku biri mw’ijuru, ntimubushire ku biri mw’isi.
Kuko mwapfuye, ubugingo bwanyu bukaba buhishijwe hamwe na Kristo mu Mana.
Aho Kristo, we bugingo bwanyu azoserukira, namwe muzoserukana na we muri mu bwiza.
Nuko rero, mwice ibintu vyose vya kamere k’isi: ubusambanyi, ibihumanya, ivyipfuzo vy’umubiri, ivyipfuzo bibi n’ugukunda amahera, ari kwo gusenga ibigirwamana.
Kuko ivyo bizotuma uburake bw’Imana buza.
Kera namwe mwabigenderamwo, mukiri mu buzima bwanyu bwo mw’isi.
Ariko ubu mukwiye kwiyambura ibintu vyose bisa n’ibi: uburake, kujingitwa, ububi bwose, kuvuga abandi nabi, kandi ntihagire amajambo ateye isoni asohoka ava mu kanwa kanyu.
Ntimukabeshane kuko mwiyambuye wa muntu wa kera n’ibikorwa vyiwe,
mukambara umuntu mushasha. Uwo na we yama ahinduka mu gutahura, akama arondera gusa n’Umuremyi wiwe.
Aha ntihaba hakiri Umugiriki canke Umuyuda, uwakebwe canke uwutakebwe, uwateye imbere canke uwutaratera imbere, umugurano canke uwidegemvya, ariko ni Kristo ari vyose kandi ari muri bose.
Nuko rero nk’abatoranijwe n’Imana, bera kandi bakundwa cane, mwambare umutima w’ikigongwe, ubugwaneza, guca bugufi, ubwitonzi no kwihangana.
Mushigikirane kandi mubabarirane iyo umuntu agize ico apfa na mugenziwe. Mubabarirane nk’uko Umwami Yesu yabababariye namwe.
Kandi ikirengeye vyose mwambare urukundo, ni wo mugozi udufatanya twese mu bumwe bushitse.
Amahoro ya Kristo aganze mu mitima yanyu. Kuko nk’uko mugize ingingo z’umubiri umwe, mwahamagariwe kubana mu mahoro. Kandi mube abama bashima.
Ijambo rya Kristo ribe muri mwebwe rigwiriye, mwigishanye kandi muhanurane mu bwenge bwose, muririmba amazaburi n’indirimbo n’amatazirano y’impwemu mushima Imana mu mitima yanyu.
Kandi ivyo mukora vyose, mu mvugo no mu ngiro, mubikore mw’izina ry’Umwami wacu Yesu, mushima Imana Data wa twese ku bwiwe.
Bagore, mwumvire abagabo banyu, nk’uko bibereye ab’Umwami wacu.
Bagabo, mukunde abagore banyu ntimubababaze ku mitima.
Bana, mwubahe abavyeyi banyu muri vyose, kuko ari vyo bihimbara Umwami wacu.
Ba se, ntimukabere abana banyu umururazi, vyotuma bacika intege.
Bagurano, mwumvire ba shobuja bo muri iyi si muri vyose; kandi mubigire atari iyo babahagarikiye gusa murondera ko bobashima, ariko mubikore n’umutima ubikunze mubitewe no kwubaha Umwami wacu.
Ivyo mukora vyose muhore mubikorana umutima wanyu wose, nk’aho mwoba muriko mubikorera Umwami wacu, atari abantu,
kuko muzi ko muzohabwa umugabane nk’impera yanyu n’Umwami wacu. Uwo Mwami mukorera ni Kristo.
Uwukora ikibi azohembwa ikibi, kuko Imana idaca urwa nkunzi.
Ba shebuja, mugirire ibigororotse kandi bibereye abagurano banyu, kuko mubizi namwe ko mufise Shobuja Mukuru mw’ijuru.
Mushishikarire gusenga, mube maso kandi mushima.
Kandi natwe mudusengere, kugira ngo Imana itwugururire umuryango wo kuvuga Ubutumwa, tumenyeshe abantu ibanga rya Kristo, iryo mbohewe.
Musenge kugira ngo ndaryamamaze mu buryo butomoye, nk’uko ntegerezwa.
Mugire ubwenge ku kuntu mubana n’abo hanze; kandi mukoreshe neza akaryo kose muhawe.
Ibiyago vyanyu bibe vyuzuyemwo ubuntu, birunzwe umunyu, kugira ngo mumenye uko mwishura umuntu wese.
Tukiko azobabwira amakuru yose anyerekeye. Ni mwene Data dukunda, umukozi w’umwizigirwa, uwo dusangiye igikorwa c’Umwami.
Ni muri iyo ntumbero ndamubarungikiye, kugira ngo mumenye uko tumerewe yongere aremeshe imitima yanyu.
Azananye na Onesimo, umuvukanyi w’umwizigirwa, umwe muri mwebwe. Bazobabwira ibiriko birabera hano vyose.
Arisitariko, mugenzi wacu dupfunganywe, arabaramutsa, hamwe na Mariko, muvyara wa Baranaba. (Mwarasiguriwe ivyiwe; niyaza iwanyu muze mumwakire.)
Yesu yitwa Yusito, na we nyene arabaramutsa. Abo ni bo bonyene bo mu Bayuda dukorana ivy’Ubwami bw’Imana, kandi bambereye indemeshanyo ikomeye cane.

Epafura, umwe muri mwebwe kandi akaba umukozi wa Kristo Yesu, arabaramutsa. Yama imisi yose abagwanira intambara mu gusenga, kugira ngo muhagarare mushikamye, mukuze mu mpwemu kandi mushize amanga, mwiteguriye gukora ivyo Imana igomba vyose.
Ndamushingira intahe ko yitanga ku bwanyu mwe n’ab’i Lawodikiya bose n’i Hiyerapolisi.
Muganga Luka, umuvukanyi akaba n’umugenzi, na Dema barabaramutsa.
Muntahirize abavukanyi b’i Lawodikiya, na Nimfa hamwe n’ishengero rikoranira mu nzu yiwe.
Iri kete nimwamara kurisomerwa, mukore ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo risomerwe ab’ishengero ry’i Lawodikiya, kandi namwe muze musome iryo bazobarungikira.
Mumbwirire Arukipo muti: “Gira ibishoboka vyose ushitse igikorwa wahawe n’Umwami.”
Jewe Pawulo, ndabandikiye ndabatasha n’ukuboko kwanje. Ubuntu bw’Imana bubane namwe.
Twebwe Pawulo, Silasi na Timoteyo, Turabandikiye, mwebwe abo mw’ishengero ry’i Tesalonike bari mu Mana Data no mu Mwami Yesu Kristo: Ubuntu n’amahoro bibane namwe.
Twama dushima Imana ku bwanyu, kandi tubasengera ubudahumeka.
Iyo tubasengera ku Mana ari yo Data, twama twibuka ibikorwa vyanyu biva ku kwizera, ibikorwa vyanyu bisunitswe n’urukundo, hamwe rero n’ukwihangana kuva mu vyizigiro mufise mu Mwami wacu Yesu Kristo.
Turazi neza, bene Data bakundwa b’Imana, ko yabatoranije,

kuko Ubutumwa Bwiza twabazaniye atari amajambo gusa, ariko bwarimwo ubushobozi, kuko Mpwemu Yera yabahaye ukwemezwa mu mitima ko ivyo twababwira kwari ukuri. Kandi murazi ingene twigenza muri mwebwe ku bwanyu.
Mwaratwiganye mwongera mwigana Umwami, kuko mwakiriye Ubutumwa n’umunezero uva kuri Mpwemu Yera, naho mwari mu mibabaro myinshi.
Ni co gituma mwabaye akarorero ku bandi bizera b’i Makedoniya no muri Akaya hose.

Ijambo ry’Umwami wacu ryarasamiranye riva iwanyu, ntiryashika i Makedoniya no muri Akaya gusa, ahubwo ukwizera Imana kwanyu kwaramenyekanye hose. Ni co gituma tutarinda kugira ico tubabwira ku vy’ukwo kwizera,
kuko na bo nyene ubwabo bama bavuga ukuntu mwatwakiriye neza, n’ukuntu mwahevye ibigirwamana mugahindukirira Imana nzima kandi y’ukuri.
Kandi baranavuga ukuntu mwiteganye igishika ukugaruka kw’Umwana w’Imana azoza avuye mw’ijuru, ari we Yesu, uwo Imana yazuye mu bapfuye. Ni we yadukijije uburake buzoza.
Bene Data, murazi neza ko ukubagendera kwacu kutabaye impfagusa.
Nk’uko mubizi, twari twabanje kubabarizwa turongera ducokorerwa i Filipi, ariko Imana iduha gushira ubwoba, tubabwira Ubutumwa Bwiza naho twariko turagwanywa bikomeye.
Kubatera intege kwacu ntikwava ku buzimire canke ku ntumbero mbi twari dufise, kandi ntitwarondera kubahenda.

Ariko, twabigisha nk’abantu bemewe n’Imana ikongera ikabazeza kuvuga Ubutumwa Bwiza. Ntituriko tugerageza kunezereza abantu, ariko dushaka kunezereza Imana, kuko ari yo isuzuma ivyiyumviro biri mu mitima yacu.
Murazi ko tutigeze na rimwe dukoresha amajambo asosa, canke ngo tugerageze kwiyerekana uko tutari, twironderera amaronko. Imana ni yo cabona cacu.
Ntitwigeze na rimwe turondera guhabwa icubahiro n’abantu, baba mwebwe, canke uwundi muntu uwo ari we wese, naho nk’intumwa za Kristo twari twemerewe kugira ivyo tubasavye dukoresheje ububasha dufise.
Ahubwo, twicishije bugufi tumera nk’abana batoya muri mwebwe. Twari tumeze kurya kw’umuvyeyi ariko yitaho abana biwe.
Twarabakunze cane bituma tutababwira Ubutumwa Bwiza bw’Imana gusa, ahubwo twabahaye n’ubuzima bwacu na bwo.
Nta nkeka, bene Data, ko mwibuka uburuhe n’ukubabazwa vyacu; ingene twakora ijoro n’umurango kugira ngo ntihagire umuntu n’umwe turemera igihe twariko tubabwira Ubutumwa Bwiza bw’Imana.
Namwe muri ivyabona hamwe n’Imana, vy’ingene twigenza hagati yanyu, twejejwe, tugororotse kandi turi inyankamugayo rwose.
Murazi ingene twafata umwe umwe wese muri mwebwe nk’uko umuvyeyi afata abana biwe.
Twarabatera intege, tukabaremesha, tukabahimiriza ngo mubeho ubuzima bubereye abantu b’Imana, yo yabahamagariye kuba mu Bwami bwayo n’ubwiza vyayo.

Turashima Imana kandi ko igihe mwakira ijambo ry’Imana mwatwumvanye, mutaryakiriye nk’amajambo asanzwe y’abantu, ariko mwaryakiriye nk’ijambo ry’Imana, nk’uko riri koko. Kandi iryo Jambo ni ryo ribandanya gukorera muri mwebwe abizera.
Bene Data, namwe mwabaye nk’amashengero y’Imana muri Kristo Yesu ari i Yudaya: mwahamwe n’ab’iwanyu nk’uko ayo mashengero na yo yahamwe n’Abayuda,
ari bo bishe Umwami Yesu n’abavugishwa, natwe bakatwangaza. Babaye igisesema ku Mana, bongera baba abansi b’abantu bose,
mu kugerageza kutubuza kwigisha Abanyamahanga kugira ngo bakizwe. Mu gukora ivyo, birundanirizako ivyaha. Ariko uburake bw’Imana bwabashitseko.
Ariko bene Data, tumaze gutandukana vy’akanya gato (ku bw’imibiri atari ku bw’imitima), twakoze uko dushoboye kwose kugira ngo tugaruke kubagendera kuko twari tubakumbuye cane.
Twaripfuje kuza iwanyu, kandi jewe Pawulo navyipfuje kenshi, ariko Satani aradutangira.
Mbega ikidutera ivyizigiro n’umunezero canke igitsibo tuzokwirata imbere y’Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo igihe azozira ni ikihe? Si mwebwe?
Ni koko muri ubwiza n’umunezero vyacu.
Ariko tubonye tutagishoboye kwihanganira kutamenya amakuru yanyu, twahisemwo gusigara twenyene muri Atenayi,
duca tubarungikira Timoteyo ngo abagendere. Ni mwene Data akorera Imana hamwe natwe mu kuvuga Ubutumwa Bwiza bwa Kristo. Tumurungitse kugira ngo abakomeze, yongere abaremeshe mu kwizera kwanyu,
maze ntimunyiganyizwe n’ibibagerageza. Ariko murazi neza ko ivyo biri mu vyo twateguriwe.
N’igihe twari kumwe namwe, twamye tubaburira ko dushobora guhamwa, kandi vyabaye ukwo nyene nk’uko na mwebwe mubizi neza.

Ni co gituma rero, kuko ntari ngishoboye kuvyihanganira, naciye ndungika Timoteyo kugira ngo nshobore kumenya ko ukwizera kwanyu kwoba kugikomeye. Nari mfise ubwoba ko wa mugeragezi yoba yarabagerageje, maze igikorwa cacu muri mwebwe kikaba cabaye impfagusa.

Ubu rero Timoteyo aherutse kugaruka avuye iwanyu, kandi yatuzaniye inkuru nziza y’ukwizera n’urukundo vyanyu. Yatubwiye ko mugira umunezero iyo mutwibutse, kandi ko mwipfuza gusubira kutubona nk’uko natwe twipfuza gusubira kubabona.
None rero bene Data, mu mibabaro n’ihamwa vyacu, turaremeshwa n’ukwo kwizera kwanyu.
Kumenya ko muhagaze mutanyiganyiga mu Mwami bisubiza intege mu buzima bwacu.
Mbega ni gute twoshimira Imana bikwiye umunezero dufise ku bwanyu?
Dusenga ubudahumeka ijoro n’umurango, kugira ngo bikunde tugaruke iwanyu tubafashishe ivyo muhajije mu kwizera kwanyu.
Imana yo nyene ari yo Data, n’Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo, baducire inzira kugira ngo dushobore kuzobagendera vuba.
Kandi dusenga ngo Imana yongerereze kandi isesekaze urukundo mugiriranira muri mwebwe, n’abandi bose, nk’uko urwacu rumeze kuri mwebwe.
Imana ikomeze imitima yanyu kugira ngo muzosangwe mutagira agasembwa, muri abera imbere y’Imana yacu ari yo Data wa twese, aho Umwami wacu Yesu azogarukira azananye n’abera biwe. Amen.
Bene Data, twarababwiye uko mukwiye kwigenza kugira ngo munezereze Imana, kanatsinda ni ko mubayeho. Ubu naho turabasaba tubinginga mw’izina ry’Umwami Yesu ngo murushirize.
Kuko murazi ivyo twabigishije turi mu bubasha bw’Umwami Yesu.
Ico Imana igomba ni uko mubaho mwejejwe, muri kure y’ivyaha vy’ubusambanyi.
Kandi ni uko umwe wese muri mwebwe yobaho aganza umubiri wiwe, yejejwe kandi yihesha agateka,
mudatwarwa n’ivyipfuzo vy’umubiri nk’abapagani batazi Imana.
Kandi muri ivyo vyose, ntihakagire uwugirira nabi mwene Se canke ngo amugunge, kuko Umwami azohana ivyaha nk’ivyo vyose nk’uko twari tumaze kubibabwira no kubibaburirako.
Imana ntiyaduhamagariye kuba abahumanye, ariko ishaka ko tugira ubuzima bwejejwe.
Ni co gituma uwanse kugendera izi nyigisho ataba yanse umuntu, ariko aba yanse Imana, yo ibaha Mpwemu wayo Yera.
Naho ku bijanye n’urukundo mu bavukana, ntitwokwirirwa turabibandikirako vyinshi, kuko Imana yo nyene yabiyigishirije ingene mukwiye gukundana.
Kandi ni ko biri, urwo rukundo mwararwerekanye kuri bene Data bose b’i Makedoniya. Bene Data, turabinginga, ngo murushirizeho kwerekana urukundo nk’urwo.
Mugire ishaka ryo kubaho ubuzima butekanye; umwe wese yiteho gukora ibimwerekeye kandi ajejwe, no gukoresha amaboko yiwe nk’uko twabibabwiye.
Kubaho kwanyu gutyo mu buzima bwa misi yose, bizotuma abo hanze batizera babubaha, kandi mwidegemvye imbere y’umuntu wese.
Bene Data, turashaka ko mumenya ibizoba ku basinziriye itiro ry’urupfu (abitavye Imana), kugira ntimwicwe n’umubabaro nk’abadafise ivyizigiro.
Uko twizera ko Yesu yapfuye hanyuma akazuka, ni ko twizera ko Imana imugarukanye azoza azananye n’abasinziriye muri we.
Dufatiye kw’Ijambo Umwami yivugiye, turababwiye ko natwe abazoba bakiri bazima, dusigaye gushika ku kugaruka kw’Umwami, tutazotanga abamaze gupfa kumusanganira.
Kuko, Umwami wacu ubwiwe azomanuka avuye mw’ijuru, azotegeka n’ijwi rirenga, hamwe n’akamo k’umumarayika mukuru n’uguhamagara kw’inzamba y’Imana, maze abapfiriye muri Kristo bazoca bazuka ubwa mbere.
Hanyuma, natwe abazoba bakiriho, tuzoca tuduganwa mu bicu, dusanganire Umwami mu kirere. Ni ho tuzoca tubana n’Umwami ibihe bitazoshira.
Nuko muremeshanye n’ayo majambo.
Bene Data, ku bijanye n’imisi n’ibihe ivyo bizoshikirako, ntitwari dukwiye no kurinda kubibandikira,
kuko musanzwe muzi neza ko umusi Umwami wacu azogarukirako uzoshika nk’igisuma mw’ijoro.
Igihe abantu bazoba bavuga bati: “Ni amahoro, nta nkomanzi,” ni ho ugutikizwa kuzobashikako giturumbuka, kurya umugore yibungenze afatwa n’ibise, kandi ntawuzorokoka.
Ariko mweho bene Data, kuko mutari mu mwijima, uwo musi ntuzobashikako giturumbuka nk’igisuma.
Mwese muri abana b’umuco n’abana b’umurango. Ntituri ab’ijoro, kandi ntituri ab’umwijima.
Ni co gituma tudakwiye kwifata nk’abandi basinziriye. Twame turi maso, twirinde akaborerwe.
Kuko abaryama baryama mw’ijoro, kandi n’ababorerwa baborerwa mw’ijoro.
Ariko ko turi ab’umurango, muze tugendane ubwenge, twambaye ukwizera n’urukundo nk’icuma gikingira igikiriza, n’ivyizigiro vy’agakiza nk’inkofero y’icuma.
Kuko Imana itadushiriyeho kuzorakirwa na yo, ariko yadushiriyeho kuronka agakiza mu Mwami wacu Yesu Kristo.
Yaradupfiriye kugira ngo ni yaza, twoba twarapfuye canke twoba tukiriho, tuzobane na we ibihe vyose.
None rero muremeshanye mwongere mukuzanye, nk’uko musanzwe muriko murabikora.
Bene Data, turabinginze ngo mwubahe abakorera muri mwebwe, babarongoye mu gikorwa c’Umwami, kandi babarongora mu vy’Impwemu.
Mububahe n’imitima yanyu yose mu rukundo ku bw’igikorwa cabo. Mubane amahoro.
Kandi, turabinginze bene Data ngo muhanure ibinebwe, muremeshe abadendebukiwe, mufashe abanyantegenke, mwihanganirane.
Mwirinde ntihagire uwusubiza inabi mugenziwe, ariko mugiriranire ubugwaneza muri mwebwe no ku bandi.
Mwame munezerewe ibihe vyose
Musenge ubudahumeka.
Mwame mushima Imana mu bibashikira vyose kuko ari kwo gushaka kw’Imana kuri mwebwe abari muri Kristo Yesu.
Ntimukazimye Mpwemu Yera.
Ntimugakengere ubuvugishwa,
ariko mubusuzume bwose, hanyuma mwumire ku vyiza.
Mwirinde ikibi cose.
Imana yo nyene, yo Mana y’amahoro, ibandanye ibeza; kandi impwemu, imishaha n’imibiri vyanyu bizosangwe bitagira agasembwa ku musi w’ukuza kw’Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo.
Iyabahamagaye ni iyo kwizigirwa, no kubishitsa izobishitsa.
Bene Data, mudusengere.
Muturamukirize bene Data bose n’ukugumbirana kwera.
Ndabingingiye imbere y’Umwami ngo iri kete rizosomerwe bene Data bose.
Ubuntu bw’Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo bubane namwe.
Twebwe Pawulo, Silasi na Timoteyo, Turabandikiye mwebwe ishengero ry’i Tesalonike riri mu Mana Data no mu Mwami Yesu Kristo:
Ubuntu n’amahoro biva ku Mana Data no ku Mwami Yesu Kristo bibane namwe.
Bene Data, birabereye ko dushima Imana ku bwanyu, kuko ukwizera kwanyu kubandanya gukomera, kandi n’urukundo mugiriranira hagati yanyu na rwo rukaba ruguma rugwira.
Ni co gituma mu yandi mashengero y’Imana yose twama turiko twirata mwebwe, tubabwira ivy’ukwihangana kwanyu n’ukwizera kwanyu muri mw’ihamwa hamwe n’ibindi bigeragezo muriko muracamwo.
Ivyo vyose ni ivyerekana ko urubanza rw’Imana rubereye, kandi icamwa c’ivyo ni uko muzoharurwa nk’ababereye Ubwami bw’Imana, ubwo muriko murababarizwa.
Imana iragororotse: izoteza imibabaro abo bose bariko barabababaza,

yongere ihe akaruhuko mwebwe muri mu mibabaro, co kimwe natwe. Ivyo bizoshika ku musi Umwami Yesu azohishurirwako avuye mw’ijuru mu kibengebenge gikomeye c’umuriro ari kumwe n’abamarayika biwe b’ubushobozi bwinshi.
Azohana abatazi Imana n’abatubaha ivyo Ubutumwa Bwiza bw’Umwami Yesu bwigisha.
Bazohanishwa ugutabwa mu muriro udashira no gutandukanywa n’Umwami hamwe n’ubwiza n’ububasha vyiwe.
Kuri uwo musi, azoba aje guhimbazwa n’abera biwe, gutazirwa n’abazoba baramwizeye bose. Muri bo namwe murimwo, kuko mwizeye intahe twabashingiye.

Ni co gituma twama tubasengera, dusaba Imana ngo ibafashe kugira ubuzima buhwanye n’umuhamagaro wayo, kandi kugira ngo mu bubasha bwayo, ishitse intumbero nziza n’ibikorwa vyiza vyanyu vyose biva mu kwizera.
Dusenga gutyo kugira ngo izina ry’Umwami wacu rishirwe hejuru muri mwebwe, kandi namwe mushirwe hejuru muri we, ku bw’ubuntu bw’Imana yacu n’Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo.
Bene Data, ku bijanye n’ukugaruka kw’Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo hamwe n’ingene tuzomusanganira tukabana na we,

turabinginze ngo ntimunyiganyige canke ngo muhagarike imitima kubera inyigisho womenga zivuye kuri twebwe (vyaba biciye mu buryo bwo kuvugishwa, canke amajambo canke ikete) zibabwira ko umusi w’Umwami wacu umaze gushika.
Ntihagire uwubabesha mu buryo na bumwe, kuko uwo musi utazoshika kugwanya Imana kutabanje kugaragara, kandi na wa muntu w’umugarariji atarahishurwa, uwagenewe kuzoranduka.
Azokwishira hejuru yongere agwanye icitwa imana cose n’igisengwa cose. Mbere azokwicara mu rusengero rw’Imana, yiyite Imana we nyene.
Mbega ntimwibuka ko nkiri kumwe namwe ibi nahora ndabibabwira?
Kandi murazi ko igitumye ataraza ubu, ari kugira ngo azohishurwe igihe gikwiye kigeze.
Kuko ubushobozi bw’umugararizo n’ubu buriko burakorera mw’ibanga, kandi buzoguma gutyo gushika ikimutangira kivuye mu nzira.
Aho ni ho wa muntu w’umugarariji azoca amenyekana, uwo Umwami Yesu azokwicisha impwemu zo mu kanwa kiwe, agasangangurwa n’ugukayangana kw’ukuza kwiwe.
Kuza kw’uwo mugarariji, kuzogaragazwa n’ibikorwa vya Satani, n’ubushobozi bwo gukora ibimyenyetso n’ibitangaza kugira ngo azimize abantu.
Azokoresha uruhendo rw’uburyo bwose kugira ashobore kuzimiza abaja mu mahonero, kuko banse gukunda no kwemera ukuri ari kwo kwari kubakiza.
Ni co gituma Imana ibarungikira ububasha bw’ubuzimire kugira ngo bemere ivyo binyoma,
hanyuma kubera yuko banse kwizera ukuri, ariko bakanezerererwa ikibi bazocirirwe urubanza.
Ariko birabereye ko dushima Imana ku bwanyu, bene Data bakundwa n’Imana, kuko muri nk’ivyeze ubwa mbere Imana yatoranirije ngo mukizwe biciye mu gikorwa c’ukweza ca Mpwemu no mu kwizera ukuri.
Yabahamagariye agakiza biciye mu Butumwa Bwiza twababwiye, kugira ngo muzosangire ubwiza n’Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo.
None rero bene Data, mushikame, mwumire ku vyo twabigishije, haba mu majambo twababwiye canke mw’ikete twabandikiye.
Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo we nyene, n’Imana Data wa twese yadukunze, kandi hamwe n’ubuntu bwayo baduhe ukuremeshwa kw’ibihe bidashira n’ivyizigiro vyiza,
baremeshe imitima yanyu bongere babakomeze mu bikorwa vyiza no mu majambo yanyu.
Mu kurangiza, bene Data, mudusengere kugira ngo Ubutumwa Bwiza bw’Umwami bwamamare ningoga kandi ijambo ryiwe ryubahwe nk’uko ryubashwe muri mwebwe.
Mudusengere kandi kugira ngo Imana idukize abanyakibi, kuko bose si abizera.
Ariko Umwami ni umwizigirwa, azobakomeza yongere abarinde wa mubi.
Dufise ukwizera mu Mwami ko mukora kandi ko muzoshishikara mukora ivyo tubahanura.
Umwami arongorere imitima yanyu mu rukundo rw’Imana no mu kwihangana kuva kuri Kristo.
Bene Data, turabageze mw’izina ry’Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo, ngo mwirinde uwitwa mwene Data wese mugabo w’ikinebwe, atagendera mu nyigisho twabahaye.
Kuko mwebwe nyene murazi ingene mubwirizwa gukurikira akarorero twabahaye. Ntitwigeze tuba ibinebwe igihe twari kumwe namwe,
kandi nta we twigeze turya ivyokurya tutabiguze. Ahubwo twakora ijoro n’umurango, tukaruha, tukabira icuya kugira ngo ntihagire uwo turemera muri mwebwe.
Twari dufise uburenganzira bwo gufashwa namwe, ariko ntitwabikoze kuko twashaka kubabera akarorero mwokurikiza.
N’igihe twari kumwe namwe twamye tubaha icagezwe kivuga ngo: “Uwudashaka gukora no kurya ntarye.”
Twarumvise ko bamwe muri mwebwe ari ibinebwe. Bareka gukora ariko bakita mu bitabaraba.
Abo bantu turabategetse tubinginga mw’izina ry’Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo ngo bame bakora kugira ngo babone kwibeshaho.
Namwe bene Data, ntimukadendebukirwe gukora ineza.
Mwitegereze neza uwo wese atumvira ivyo tubabwiye muri rino kete. Mubigire kure kugira ngo bitume bamaramara.
Ntimuze mubafate nk’abansi banyu, ariko mubaburire nk’abavukanyi.
Umwami w’amahoro we ubwiwe abahe amahoro ibihe vyose no mu buryo bwose. Umwami abane namwe.
Jewe Pawulo, ndabandikiye ndabatasha n’ukuboko kwanje, ni co kimenyetso mu makete yanje yose. Uku ni ko nandika.
Ubuntu bw’Umwami wacu yesu Kristo bubane namwe.
Jewe Pawulo, intumwa ya Kristo Yesu ku bw’ugushaka kw’Imana yo Mukiza wacu, na Kristo Yesu we vyizigiro vyacu,
Ndakwandikiye Timoteyo umwana wanje vy’ukuri mu kwizera: Ubuntu, imbabazi n’amahoro biva ku Mana Data wa twese, no ku Mwami wacu Kristo Yesu bibane na we.
Igihe naja i Makedoniya narakwinginze ngo ugume hiyo muri Efeso kugira ngo wihanize abigisha inyigisho z’ibinyoma ntibasubire kwigisha,
canke ngo bateshe umwanya abantu mu vy’imigani myinshi n’urukurikirane rudahera rwa ba sekuruza. Ivyo bizana impari, aho gufasha mu gikorwa c’Imana co gukiza, ico tumenya mu kwizera.
Intumbero y’inyigisho ni ukugira ngo abizera buzure urukundo ruva mu mitima itunganye, itarimwo ijwi ribagiriza ikibi, bafise ukwizera nyakwo.
Ivyo bamwe barabihushije, baja mu mpari zitagira ikimazi.
Bagomba kwigira abigisha bubashwe b’ivyagezwe, ariko ntibatahura ivyo bavuga naho babishingira intahe bashize amanga batyo.
Turazi ko ivyagezwe ari vyiza iyo umuntu abikoresheje neza.
Kandi turazi ko ivyagezwe bitashiriweho abagororotsi, ariko vyashiriweho abatumvira n’ibigaba, abatubaha Imana n’abanyavyaha, abadasonera Imana canke ivyejejwe, abica ba se canke ba nyina, abicanyi,
abasambanyi n’abahuza ibitsina kandi babisangiye, abadandaza abagurano, ababeshi, abarahira nabi, canke abakora ibindi vyose bidahwanye n’inyigisho z’ukuri
ziri mu Butumwa Bwiza bw’ubwiza bw’Imana ishemagizwa, ubwo najejwe.
Ndashimira Umwami wacu Kristo Yesu, we yampaye inkomezi, akambonamwo ubwizigirwa, akanzeza imirimo yiwe.
Naho nabanje kumuvugako ibibi, ngahama ishengero, nkaba umucokoranyi, naragiriwe imbabazi kuko nabikora mu kutamenya, no mu kutizera.
Ubuntu bw’Umwami wacu bwansutsweko bugwiriye, nuzura ukwizera n’urukundo biri muri Kristo Yesu.
Iri jambo ni iryo kwizigirwa, rikwiye kwakirwa n’abantu bose, rivuga ngo: Kristo Yesu yazanywe kw’isi no gukiza abanyavyaha, muri abo ndi agahebuza.
Ariko Imana yangiriye ubuntu kugira ngo muri jewe, umunyavyaha ruhebwa, Kristo Yesu yerekane akarorero k’ukwihangana kwiwe kutagira iherezo kuri abo bose bazomwizera bakaronka ubuzima budahera.
Icubahiro n’ubwiza bibe ivy’Umwami ahoraho, adapfa, ata boneka, we Mana imwe yonyene, ibihe bidashira. Amen.
Timoteyo, mwana wanje, aya ni yo mabwirizwa ndaguhaye, mfatiye ku majambo yigeze kukuvugishwako, kugira ngo niwayakurikiza uze ugwane intambara nziza,
uzigamye neza ukwizera, ata jwi rikwagiriza mu mutima. Kuko bamwe baritaye n’ibigirankana, ukwizera kwabo kuba imburakimazi nk’ubwato busavye.
Bamwe muri abo ni Humenayo na Alegizandere, abo nahaye Satani kugira ngo bibigishe kutavuga ibibi ku Mana.
Ndakwinginze rero, imbere ya vyose, kugira ngo wingingire abantu bose, ubasengere, ubasabire wongere ubashimire Imana.
Usengere abami n’abatware kugira ngo tubeho mu mahoro, dutekaniwe, mu kwubaha Imana kwose, no mu kutagira umugayo muri vyose.
Ibi ni vyo vyiza bishimisha Imana yo mukiza wacu,
yo ishaka ko abantu bose bakizwa bagashika ku kumenya ukuri.
Kuko hari Imana imwe, hakaba n’umuhuza umwe hagati y’Imana n’abantu, uwo na we ni umuntu, Kristo Yesu.
Yatanze ubuzima bwiwe nk’incungu ku bantu bose. Ubu ni bwo butumwa Imana yatanze igihe cayo kigeze.
Ni co gituma natowe nk’umuvuzi w’ubwo Butumwa nkongera nkaba intumwa, kugira ngo nigishe Abanyamahanga ivy’ukwizera n’ivy’ukuri. Mvuze ukuri sindengeje urugero.
Ndashaka ko abagabo aho bari hose basenga badugije ibiganza vyera, bataratse, batagira ibihari.
Kandi n’abagore ndashaka ko bagira inyambaro ibereye, badashazisha gutsiba imishatsi canke kwambara inzahabu, imaragarita canke impuzu z’igiciro kinini,
ariko bashazishe ibikorwa vyiza, bibereye abagore bavuga ko bubaha Imana.
Abagore baze bige banumye, n’ukwubaha kwinshi.
Singomba ko abagore bigisha canke bategeka abagabo. Bumvirize banumye.
Kuko Adamu yaremwe ubwa mbere, hanyuma haremwa Eva.
Kandi Adamu si we yahenzwe, umugore ni we yahenzwe, aca agwa mu caha.
Ariko abagore bazokirizwa mu kuvyara kwabo, ni baguma mu kwizera, mu rukundo, mu kwubaha Imana no mu kwicisha bugufi.
Iri jambo ni iryo kwizerwa: “Umuntu niyagomba kuba umurongozi w’ishengero, azoba yifuje igikorwa ciza.”
Umurongozi akwiye kuba inyankamugayo, umugabo afise umugore umwe, atekereje, aganza ingeso ziwe, yubahwa, yakira abantu, kandi ashoboye kwigisha,
atari imborerwa kandi adasinda, ariko afise ubugwaneza, adatera ibihari, kandi adakunda amahera.
Ategerezwa kuba uwushobora gutunganya urugo rwiwe, abana biwe bakamugamburukira kandi bakamusonera.
(Kuko uwudashoboye gutunganya urugo rwiwe, mbega yoshobora gutunganya ishengero ry’Imana gute?)
Ategerezwa kuba atakiri umwana mu kwizera, ahandi ho yohava agwa mu caha c’ukwishira hejuru, akazocirirwa urubanza rumwe na Satani.
Ategerezwa kandi kuba avugwa neza n’abo hanze, kugira ngo ntagwe mu mugayo no mu mutego wa Satani.
N’abadiyakoni na bo ni uko nyene, bategerezwa kuba abagabo bubashwe, b’imvugakuri, batavuga indimi zibiri, bataborerwa, kandi batirukira inyungu mbi.
Bategerezwa kandi kuba bazigamye neza ukuri kw’ukwizera, badafise ijwi ribagiriza mu mitima.
Bategerezwa kandi kubanza gusuzumwa, basanzwe ata mugayo, baheze bashirwe muri ico gikorwa c’ubudiyakoni.
Abagore babo na bo nyene bategerezwa kuba ari abagore bubashwe, batavuga nabi abandi. Bategerezwa kuganza ingeso zabo kandi bakaba abizigirwa muri vyose.
Umudiyakoni ategarazwa kuba umugabo afise umugore umwe, kandi ashoboye gutunganya abana biwe n’urugo rwiwe.
Abadiyakoni bazoba bakoze neza imirimo yabo bazohabwa icubahiro, bazogira ugushira amanga mu kwizera bafise muri Kristo Yesu.
Naho nizeye ko ndi mukuza kukuraba vuba, ivyo ndabikwandikiye kugira ngo,
bishitse ngateba, abantu babe baramenya ukwo bakwiye kwigenza mu nzu y’Imana, ari rwo rusengero rw’Imana nzima, rukaba n’inkingi n’urufatiro rw’ukuri.

Ikirengeye ivyo umuntu yokwibaza vyose, ikinyegezwa c’ukwizera kwacu kirahambaye: Kristo yabonetse mu mubiri, yemezwa na Mpwemu Yera, abonwa n’abamarayika, amenyekanishwa mu mahanga, yizerwa n’abo mw’isi, aduzwa mu bwiza bwo mw’ijuru.
Mpwemu Yera abivuga atomoye ko mu misi ya nyuma abantu bamwe bazova mu kwizera kwabo bakurikire impwemu zibesha n’inyigisho ziva ku badayimoni.
Izo nyigisho ziva ku babeshi b’abiyorobetsi, bafise ubwenge bwapfuye.
Babuza abantu kurongora, bakabategeka kutarya imfungurwa zimwezimwe, izo Imana yaremye kugira ngo abizeye bakamenya ukuri bazifungure bashima.
Kubera rero ivyo Imana yaremye vyose ari vyiza ntagikwiye gutabwa, ahubo dukwiye kuvyakira dushima,
kuko turazi ko vyezwa n’ijambo ry’Imana n’amasengesho.
Ibi niwabishikiriza bene Data, uzoba uri umukozi mwiza wa Kristo Yesu, yagaburiwe ubutumwa bw’ukwizera n’inyigisho nziza wakiriye.
Wirinde inkuru zipfuye n’imigani y’abakecuru. Ahubwo wimenyereze kwubaha Imana.
Ukwimenyereza kw’umubiri ni kwiza, ariko ukwimenyereza kwubaha Imana ni kwiza gusumba, kugira ikimazi muri ubu buzima no mu buzoza.
Iri jambo ni iry’ukuri, kandi ni iryo kwizigirwa.
Igituma dukora tukaruha, ni uko twizera Imana nzima, yo Mukiza w’abantu bose, na canecane w’abizera.
Uze wame wigisha ivyo.
Ntihagire uwukugaya kubera ukiri muto, ahubwo ubere akarorero abizera: mu mvugo no mu ngiro, mu rukundo, mu kwizera, no mu kugororoka.
Mu kurindira ko ndagushikira, wiyegurire gusomera abantu Ivyanditswe, kuvuga Ubutumwa Bwiza no kwigisha.
Ntufate minenegwe ingabire yawe, iyo wahawe n’ijambo ryakuvugishijweko, igihe warambikwako ibiganza n’abarongozi b’ishengero.
Ugire umwete muri ivyo. Witangire igikorwa cawe n’umutima wawe wose, ni ho bose bazobona ugutera imbere kwawe.
Wame wiyubara ku buzima bwawe, no ku vyo wigisha. Ubigiremwo umwete, ni ho uzokiza ubuzima bwawe n’ubw’abakwumva.
Ntugakankamire umutama, ariko umuhanure umwubashe nk’aho yoba ari so. Abakiri bato ubafate nka benewanyu,
abatamakazi ubafate nk’abavyeyi bawe, abagore bakiri bato ubafate nka bashiki bawe, kandi ubikore mu kwera kwose.
Witeho abapfakazi batagira uwubaraba.
Ariko umupfakazi afise abana n’abuzukuru, bakwiye kubereka ukwubaha Imana kwabo mu kubitwararika, ni ho bazoba bishuye abavyeyi babo ivyo babakoreye, kandi ivyo birahimbara Imana.
Umupfakazi atagira ic’epfo ca ruguru, asigaye ari wenyene, ashira ivyizigiro vyiwe mu Mana, akama ayisenga ijoro n’umurango kugira ngo imufashe.
Ariko umupfakazi abayeho yinezereza gusa aba yarapfuye naho yoba ari muzima.
Ivyo uzokwame uvyibutsa abantu, kugira ngo babeho batagira umugayo.
Umuntu n’atafasha umuryango wiwe na canecane abo mu nzu yiwe, aba yihakanye ukwizera kw’ukuri, kandi uwo aba ari inyuma y’uwutizera.
Umupfakazi akwiye kuja ku rutonde rw’abafashwa akwiye kuba arenza imyaka mirongo itandatu, akaba yari umwizigirwa ku mugabo wiwe,

kandi akaba ashingirwa intahe ku bw’ibikorwa vyiwe vyiza nko kurera neza abana, kwakira abandi i muhira, kwoza ibirenge vy’abera, gufasha abari mu ngorane, ndetse akaba yariyeguriye gukora ibikorwa vyiza vy’ubwoko bwose.
Na yo abapfakaye bakiri bato, ntuzobashire kuri urwo rutonde. Kuko ukwipfuza kw’umubiri kwabo kwohava kubarengera bakava mu kwiyegurira Kristo bakagomba kurongorwa.
Gutyo boba bikwegeye gutsindwa n’urubanza kuko boba barenze isezerano ryabo rya mbere.
Ikindi ni uko bashobora kuba ibinebwe, bakama bayerera inzu ku nzu bavuga urusaku, bita mu bitabaraba bongera bavuga ivyo batotegerejwe kuvuga.
Nohanura rero abapfakazi bakiri bato ko bosubira kurongorwa, bakavyara abana, bagatunganya ingo zabo. Ni ho umwansi atazoronka ico abavugako.
Kuko bamwe muri bo baza baramaze guta umurongo bakurikira Satani.
Nimba hari umugore atunze abapfakazi mu nzu iwe, nabe ari we abafasha kugira ngo ntibaremere ishengero, kugira ngo rifashe abatagira ic’epfo ca ruguru bonyene.
Abakuru b’ishengero barongoye ishengero neza bakwiye gufatwa neza na canecane abakora igikorwa co kuvuga ubutumwa no kwigisha.
Kuko Ivyanditswe bivuga ngo: “Ntimukazibire umunwa w’inka iriko irasekura ingano,” kandi ngo: “Umukozi aberwa n’impembo.”
Ntuze wumvirize ibirego bivugwa ku mukuru w’ishengero, kiretse bizanywe n’abantu babiri canke batatu.
Ariko nihagira uwuguma mu vyaha, uzomwihanikirize mw’ishengero ry’abantu kugira ngo abandi na bo babone gutinya.
Ndakwingingiye mu nyonga z’Imana na Kristo Yesu n’imbere y’abamarayika batoranijwe ngo ukurikize ivyo nakubwiye vyose udacishije i ruhande, kandi ntuze wigere ugira aka mwana wa mama.
Ntuze wihutire kurambika ibiganza ku bantu, kandi ntuze wifatanye n’abakora ivyaha. Wame wejejwe.
Ntuze wame unywa amazi yonyene, uje uranywa umuvinyu mukeya ku bw’ingorane y’umushihito wawe, kuko wama ugwaragurika.
Ivyaha vya bamwebamwe biribonekeza n’imbere y’uko babacira imanza. Ariko hari n’abandi ivyaha vyabo bimenyekana vyaratevye.
No ku bikorwa vyiza na vyo ni uko nyene; ibikorwa vyiza vya bamwebamwe biragaragara, ariko n’ibikorerwa mw’ibanga umusi umwe bizoja ahabona.
Abari mu bugurano bamenye ko ba shebuja bakwiye icubahiro cose, kugira ngo izina ry’Imana n’inyigisho zacu ntibitukwe.

Na yo ku bafise ba shebuja bizera Imana, nta mvo n’imwe yo kutabubaha kuko ari bene Se. Ahubwo bakwiye kurushirizaho kubakorera neza, kuko ivyo bakora bifasha abizera b’abakundwa. Ivyo bibe ari vyo uzohimiriza abantu.
Abigisha inyigisho zidahuye n’ivyo Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo yigishije ari vyo bizana ukugororoka,
baba buzuye ubwibone n’ukwishira hejuru n’ukubura ugutahura. Bafise impwemu yo kuvuga no guharira ku majambo. Ivyo nta kindi bizana atari ishari, ibihari, ibitutsi, ukwikekana,
n’uguharira ata ho gushikana hagati y’ab’ubwenge bwapfuye, banyazwe ukuri, kandi bigira abagororotsi kugira ngo bashike ku nyungu zabo mbi.
Ariko ukugororoka n’uguhazwa n’ivyo ufise bigira ikimazi kinini cane.
Kukaba nka ko, nta co twazanye kw’isi kandi nta co tuzoyikurako ni twayivako.
Iyo turonse ico turya n’ico twambara, biba bidukwiye.
Abagomba gutunga barageragezwa hanyuma bakagwa mu mitego y’ivyipfuzo vy’ubupfu, bitwara abantu mu guhomba no mu guhona.
Gukunda amahera ni umuzi w’ibibi vyose. Bamwe bagize umwitwarariko mwinshi wo kuronka amahera, maze bangarira kure y’ukwizera kw’ukuri, bita mu bibahagarika imitima.
Ariko wewe muntu w’Imana, uhunge ivyo vyose, ukurikirane ukugororoka, ukwubaha Imana, ukwizera, urukundo, ukwihangana n’ubugwaneza.
Ugwane intambara y’ukwizera. Uzigame cane ubugingo budashira wahamagariwe, igihe wagira ukwatura kwiza imbere y’ivyabona vyinshi.
Kandi ndakwinginze imbere y’Imana, yo itanga ubuzima kuri bose, n’imbere ya Kristo Yesu yashinze intahe nziza imbere ya Pontiyo Pilato,
ngo ukurikize ivyo ndakugeze, utagira umugayo gushika aho Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo azohishurirwa.
Kuko igihe gikwiye kigeze, Kristo azohishurwa avuye mw’ijuru, ahishuwe n’Imana nyaguhezagirwa, Imana nyene inganji, Umwami w’abami kandi Uwuganza abatware.
Niyo yonyene ifise ukudapfa, kandi iba mu muco ata muntu yoshobora kwegera, iyo ata muntu arabona kandi ata wushobora kuyibona. Icubahiro n’ububasha bibe ivyayo ibihe bidashira. Amen.
Wigishe abafise ubutunzi bw’iyi si kutishira hejuru no kudashira ivyizigiro vyabo muri bwo, kuko butaramba. Ariko bizigire Imana yo iduha vyose nk’umusesekara kugira ngo tubinezerererwe.
Ubigishe gukoresha amahera yabo mu gukora ivyiza: bakwiye kuba abatunzi mu bikorwa vyiza, no mu gufasha abakene no mu kugira imitima yiteguriye gusangira ivyabo n’abandi.
Nibakora uko, bazoba bariko bariziganiriza ubutunzi nk’urufatiro rwiza rwa kazoza rwo kugira ubuzima nyakuri.
Ewe Timoteyo, uzigame neza ico wahawe. Wirinde ibiyago n’impari vy’abiyita abanyabwenge kuko bidahwanye n’ukwizera.
Bamwe barataye ukwizera bakurikira ubwo bupfu. Ubuntu bubane namwe mwese.
Jewe Pawulo, intumwa ya Yesu Kristo, natoranijwe mu kugomba kw’Imana, ndabihawe n’isezerano ry’ubuzima riri muri Kristo Yesu,
Ndakwandikiye mwana wanje nkunda Timoteyo: Ubuntu, imbabazi n’amahoro biva ku Mana Data no ku Mwami wacu Kristo Yesu bibane na we.
Ndashima Imana nkorera n’umutima wanje wose nk’uko ba sogokuruza bayikorera. Nama nkwibuka iyo nsenga ijoro n’umutaga.
Nama nibuka amarira yawe igihe twatandukana, bikantera kwipfuza gusubira kukubona kugira ngo nuzure umunezero.
Nama nibuka ukwizera kwawe kwabanje kuba muri nyokuru wawe Lowisi no muri nyoko Ewunike, kandi ndizera ntakekeranya ko kuri no muri wewe.
Ni co gituma ndakwibutsa kwongera kwatsa ingabire Imana yaguhaye igihe nakurambikako ibiganza.
Kuko Imana itaduhaye Mpwemu w’ubwoba, ariko yaduhaye Mpwemu w’ububasha, w’urukundo kandi wo kuganza ingeso zacu.
Nuko rero ntukagire isoni zo gushingira intahe Umwami wacu, kandi ntuterwe isoni nanje imbohe yiwe. Ahubwo ku bw’inkomezi wahawe n’Imana, wemere ubabazanywe nanje ku bw’Ubutumwa Bwiza.

Kuko Imana ni yo yadukijije, iduhamagarira kubaho ubuzima bwejejwe. Ivyo ntiyabikoze kuko twari tubibereye, ariko ni ku bw’umugambi wayo n’ubuntu bwayo. Ubwo buntu twabuherewe muri Kristo Yesu ibihe bitarabaho,
ariko buhishurwa mu kuza kw’umukiza wacu Kristo Yesu, uwasambuye rwose ububasha bw’urupfu, agashira ahabona ubuzima n’ukudapfa biciye mu Butumwa Bwiza.
Kandi Imana yantoranirije kuba umuvuzi w’ubwo Butumwa Bwiza, nk’intumwa n’umwigisha.
Ni co gituma ndiko ndababazwa uku. Ariko singira isoni kuko ndazi uwo nizeye, kandi sinkekeranya ko ashoboye kuzigama ico namubikije gushika ku musi w’ukugaruka kwiwe.
Wame ufatira akarorero ku nyigisho z’ukuri wanyumvanye, uhagarare mu kwizera, no mu rukundo dufise muri Kristo Yesu.
Uzigame ingabire nziza wabikijwe, ufashijwe n’ububasha bwa Mpwemu Yera aba muri twebwe.
Urazi ko abo muri Aziya bose bantaye, harimwo Figelusi na Heremogeni.
Ariko Imana igirire ubuntu abo mu nzu kwa Onesiforo, kuko yangendeye kenshi akandemesha. Ntiyigeze aterwa isoni n’uko ndi mw’ibohero.
Igihe yaza i Roma, yarandondeye hose gushika arantora.
Umwami Imana amuhe kuzobona ubuntu buva kuri Kristo ku musi azogarukirako. Murazi ingene yamfashije mu buryo bwinshi igihe nari muri Efeso.
None rero na we, mwana wanje, ugirire inkomezi mu buntu turonkera muri Kristo Yesu.
Kandi ivyo wanyumvanye hari ivyabona vyinshi, uzovyigishe abantu b’ukwizerwa, na bo bazoshobora kuvyigisha abandi.
Wifatanye nanje mu kwihanganira imibabaro, nk’umusoda mwiza wa Kristo Yesu.
Ntawahawe kuba umusoda abandanya yivanga mu vy’ubuzima busanzwe ashobora guhimbara umukuru wiwe.
Ni co kimwe n’umunonotsi, ntashobora koronka agashimwe kiretse yahiganwe akurikije amategeko.
Uwaruhiye kw’isuka ni we yari akwiye kuba uwa mbere mu kurya ivyeze vyo mu mwimbu wiwe.
Ufate akanya wiyumvire ku vyo ndiko ndakubarira, Umwami Imana azoguha gutahura muri vyose.
Wame wibuka Yesu Kristo yazutse mu bapfuye, yavuye mu muryango wa Dawidi, nk’uko Ubutumwa nahawe buvuga. Ubwo ni bwo mbabarizwa,
gushika aho mbohwa nk’umwicanyi. Ariko ijambo ry’Imana ryo ntiribohwa.
Ni co gituma nihanganira vyose ku bw’abatoranijwe, kugira ngo na bo baronke agakiza kari muri Kristo Yesu, hamwe n’ubwiza butazoshira.
Iri jambo ni iryo kwizera: “Nitwapfana na we, tuzobana bazima na we.
Nitwihangana, tuzoganzanya na we. Nitwamwihakana, na we azotwihakana.
Naho tutoba abizigirwa, we aguma ari umwizigirwa, kuko ntashobora kwivuguruza.”
Ibi uzokwame ivyibutsa abantu, ubihanikiririza mu nyonga z’Imana ngo bareke guharirira ku majambo, kuko ata kimazi bifise, kandi bishobora kugwisha abavyumva.
Ukore ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo wame ugaragara nk’uwemewe imbere y’Imana, nk’umukozi anezerererwa igikorwa ciwe, kandi asigura neza ijambo ry’ukuri.
Wirinde ibiyago vy’ubupfu, kuko abavyamamwo bibatwara mu kutubaha Imana.
Inyigisho zabo zikwiragira nka kanseri mu mubiri. Muri bo harimwo Himenayusi na Filetusi.
Bataye inzira y’ukuri, bigisha ko izuka ry’abapfuye ryamaze kuba, maze basambura ukwizera kwa bamwe.
Ariko, imfatiro zikomeye zashizweho n’Imana zirashimangiye. Zanditsweko aya majambo ngo: “Uhoraho arazi abiwe”; kandi ngo: “Abatura izina ry’Uhoraho bose bave mu kugabitanya.”

Mu nzu nini ntihabamwo gusa ibikoresho bikozwe mu nzahabu canke mw’ifeza, habamwo n’ibikozwe mu biti, no mw’ibumba. Kandi bimwe vyagenewe gukoreshwa ivy’icubahiro, ibindi na vyo vyagenwe gukoreshwa ibikorwa bisanzwe.
Umuntu niyiyeza, azoba igikoresho c’icubahiro, cejejwe, kigirira akamaro nyene co, kandi giteguruwe gukora igikora ciza cose.
Uhunge ivyipfuzo bibi vy’ubusore, urondere ukugororoka, ukwizera, urukundo n’amahoro, wifatanije n’abambaza Umwami Imana n’imitima itanduye.
Wirinde ibihari vy’ubupfu ata kindi bishikanako atari induru.
Kandi umukozi w’Imana ntaharira, ahubwo agira ubugwaneza kuri bose, ashoboye kwigisha, yihanganira abanyabihari.
Abamugwanya abigisha mu bugwaneza, yizigiye ko Imana ishobora kubaha ukwihana gushobora kubashikana ku kumenya ukuri,
maze bakabona kwisubirako, bakava mu mutego wa Satani, kuko baba bagizwe imbohe zo gukora ivyo ashaka vyose.
Umenye neza: mu misi ya nyuma hazoba ibihe bigoye.
Abantu bazokwikunda, bakunde amahera, birate ivyabo, buzure ubwishime. Bazotuka Imana bongere bagararize abavyeyi babo, babe intashima, ntibubahe ivyejejwe.
Urukundo rwabo ruzotimba, babure uguharira. Bazonanirwa no kuganza ingeso zabo, banke iciza cose.
Bazoba abahemu, batazi kugenza buhoro, buzuye ukwishira hejuru, bakunda ibibanezereza bakabirutisha Imana.
Bigira abagororotsi ariko bihakanye ububasha bwobahaye ukugororoka. Uze witandukanye n’abantu nk’abo.
Bamwe muri bo banyengetera mu mazu bagahenda abagore b’abanyantege nke baremerewe n’ivyaha, baganzwa n’ivyipfuzo vyabo,
bama bakurikira inyigisho nshasha zose, ariko batari bushike ku kumenya ukuri.
Nk’uko Yane na Yambure bagwanije Mose, ni ko n’abo bantu bagwanya ukuri. Ubwenge bwabo bwarapfuye, kandi ukwizera kwabo ni ukw’ubusa.
Ariko nta ho bazoshika kuko ubupfu bwabo umusi umwe buzomenyekana nk’uko vyagenze kuri Yane na Yambure.
Ariko wewe urazi ivyo nigisha n’ukuntu nigenza, n’igituma nkora ivyo nkora. Urazi ukwizera kwanje n’ukwihangana kwanje, urukundo rwanje n’ugushikama kwanje.
Urazi uguhamwa n’imibabaro naciyemwo. Urazi ingene nahamwe ndi muri Antiyokiya, Ikoniyo n’i Lusitira. Ariko aho hose Umwami Imana yagiye arankiza.
Kanatsinda, uwuhisemwo kugira ubuzima bugororotse muri Kristo Yesu azotegerezwa guhamwa.
Ariko abanyakibi bazoshika kure mu bibi vyabo. Bazozimiza benshi kandi na bo ubwabo bazokwizimiza.
Ariko weho, wumire ku vyo wigishijwe ukavyakira. Urazi ko ari ivy’ukuri, kuko urazi uwabikwigishije.
Wamenye Ivyanditswe Vyera kuva ukiri umwana, na vyo biguha kugira ubwenge bwo kwakira agakiza kabonerwa mu kwizera Kristo Yesu.
Ivyanditswe vyose vyahumetswe n’Imana kandi bifise akamaro ko kwigisha ukuri, guhambarira abari mu bibi, gusubiza mu nzira nziza, no gutoza indero nziza mu bugororotsi,
kugira ngo umuntu w’Imana atunganywe rwose, agire ibikwiye ku bw’igikorwa ciza cose.
Ndakwingingiye mu nyonga z’Imana n’imbere ya Kristo Yesu, azocira urubanza abazima n’abapfuye aho azozira kwima ku ngoma yiwe:
wigishe Ijambo ry’Imana. Wame witeguye mu gihe kibereye n’ikitabereye; wemeze abantu ukuri, uhambarire abari mu bibi, wongere ubaremeshe mu kwihangana kwinshi no mu kwigisha neza.
Kuko igihe kigiye kuza aho abantu batazoba bacemera inyigisho z’ukuri. Bazokwumviriza ibiryohera amatwi yabo, birundanirize abigisha bazovuga ivyo bashaka kwumva gusa.
Bazokwihakana ukuri, bahindukirire imigani.
Ariko wewe, wame uri maso muri vyose, wihanganire ibikubabaza, ukore igikorwa c’umuvuzi w’Ubutumwa Bwiza, ushitse ku musozo ibango Imana yaguhaye.
Nayo jewe, ndi hafi yo gutanga ubuzima bwanje ngo busukwe nk’ishikanwa ry’ikinyobwa; igihe canje co kurangiza kirashitse.
Nagwanye intambara nziza, narangije urugendo, nazigamye ukwizera.
Ubu ndindiriye umudari wo kugororoka, uwo Umwami Imana, we mucamanza agororotse, azompa kuri uwo musi. Kandi ntazowuha jewe jenyene, azowuha n’abarindiranye igishika uguhishurwa kwiwe.
Gerageza uzoze kundaba vuba,
kuko Dema yarantaye aja i Tesalonike, kuko yakunze ivy’iyi si. Kireseni yagiye i Galatiya, Tito na we yagiye i Dalumatiya.
Luka wenyene ni we turi kumwe. Uzohitane Mariko muzanane, kuko yambereye uw’ikimazi kinini mu gikorwa canje.
Tukiko namurungitse muri Efeso.
Niwaza uzonzanire ikoti y’imbeho nasize kwa Karupo i Tirowa, n’ibitabu vyanje, na canecane imizingo y’ibitabu.
Alegizandere umucuzi yarambabaje cane. Umwami Imana amwishure ibihwanye n’ivyo yankoreye.
Kandi na wewe umwirinde kuko yaragwanije cane ivyo twigisha.
Igihe naja kuburana ubwa mbere, nta n’umwe yanshigikiye, bose barantaye. Ntibaze babiharurweko.
Ariko Umwami Imana yabaye ku ruhande rwanje, ampa inkomezi, kugira ngo mvuge Ubutumwa Bwiza bwuzuye, Abanyamahanga bose babwumve. Umwami Imana yankuye mu menyo y’intambwe.
Umwami Imana azonkiza ibitero vy’umwansi vyose, kandi azontahukana amahoro mu bwami bwiwe bwo mw’ijuru. Icubahiro kibe iciwe ibihe vyose, Amen.
Untahirize Pirisila na Akwilasi, n’abo mu muryango wa Onesiforo.
Erasito yasigaye i Korinto, kandi nasize Tirofimo agwariye i Mileto.
Wigore uzoshike hano imbere y’igihe c’imbeho nyinshi cane. Yeburusi, Pudensi, Linusi, Korodiya n’abandi bene Data bose barabaramutsa.
Umwami Imana abane n’impwemu yawe. Ubuntu bubane namwe mwese.
Jewe Pawulo, umukozi w’Imana n’intumwa ya Yesu Kristo ku bw’ukwizera kw’abatoranijwe n’Imana n’ukumenya ukuri gushikana ku kugororoka,
ukwizera n’ubumenyi bishingiye ku vyizigiro vy’ubugingo budashira turi kumwe n’Imana idapfa, ubwo twasezeraniwe isi itarabaho,
hanyuma igihe cayo kigeze ihishura ijambo ryayo biciye mu kuvuga Ubutumwa Bwiza nizigijwe n’icagezwe c’Imana, yo Mukiza wacu,
Ndakwandikiye Tito, umwana wanje vy’ukuri mu kwizera dusangiye: Ubuntu n’amahoro biva ku Mana Data no kuri Kristo Yesu Umukiza wacu bibane na we.
Icatumye ndagusiga i Kirete kwari kugira ngo utunganye ibitari bwatungane, wongere ugene abarongozi b’ishengero mu bisagara vyose nk’uko nari nabikweretse.
Umurongozi w’ishengero ategerezwa kuba inyankamugayo, umugabo afise umugore umwe, abana biwe bizera kandi batazwi nk’abigenza nabi canke abagarariji.

Umwungere w’ishengero ajejwe gutunganya ishengero ry’Imana. Ni co gituma akwiye kuba inyankamugayo. Ntakwiye kuba umunyabwibone, canke uwutwarwa n’ishavu. Ntakwiye kuba imborerwa, ashwana, canke arondera kuronka inyungu mbi.
Ariko akwiye kuba uwukunda kwakira abantu i muhira iwe, akunda kugira neza, aganza ingeso ziwe, agororoka, yejejwe kandi yirinda.
Ategerezwa kuba uwuzigama neza ijambo ry’ukwizera yigishijwe, kugira ngo ashobore kuremesha abandi mu vyizerwa vy’ukuri, no gutsinda abamuhaririza.
Kuko hari abantu benshi b’abagarariji, bavuga ibitagira ikimazi kandi babesha, kandi no mu bakebwe bakaba barimwo.
Bakwiye kuzibwa iminwa kuko bariko basambura inzu y’Imana mu kwigisha ivyo batari bakwiye kwigisha, kandi ivyo babikora ku bw’inyungu zabo mbi.
N’umwe mu bavugishwa babo yaravuze ati: “Abanyakirete bama babesha: ni ibikoko vy’inkazi, ni ibinebwe n’abakunzi b’inda.”
Ivyo avuga ni vyo. Ni co gituma ukwiye kubihanikiriza ushimitse, kugira ngo bakomezwe mu kwizera kw’ukuri.
Ntibasubire gutega amatwi imigani y’Abayuda, canke amabwirizwa y’abataye ukuri.
Nta kintu gihumanye ku bafise imitima idahumanye. Ariko ku bahumanye kandi batizera, nta kidahumanye, kuko ubwenge bwabo n’ivyiyumviro vyabo vyarononekaye.
Bigira abazi Imana ariko ibikorwa vyabo bikagaragaza ko bayihakana. Ni abo kwankwa, ntibumvira kandi nta gikorwa ciza na kimwe bashoboye gukora.
Ariko weho wigishe ibihwanye n’inyigisho z’ukuri.
Wigishe abatama kutarenza urugero mu kintu na kimwe, kuba inyankamugayo, kuganza ingeso zabo, kuba bazima mu kwizera, mu rukundo no mu kwihangana.
Abatamakazi na bo ubigishe kubaho batinya Imana, kutavuga abandi nabi kandi bataboshwe no gukunda umuvinyu, ariko bigishe abandi gukora ivyiza.
Bigishe abagore bakiri bato gukunda abagabo babo n’abana babo,
kuganza ingeso zabo kandi babe abatanduye, biteho ivy’ingo zabo, bagire ubugwaneza, bubahe abagabo babo, kugira ngo ntibatukishe ijambo ry’Imana.
Abakiri bato na bo ubahimiririze kuganza ingeso zabo.
Muri vyose ubabere akarorero mu gukora ivyiza. Ivyo wigisha vyose bibonekemwo ubwizigwa no kudafata ibintu minenegwe.
Amajambo yawe abe ay’ukuri, atagiramwo umugayo, kugira ngo abakugwanya baze bamaramare, babure ikibi batuvugako.
Wigishe abagurano kwubaha ba shebuja muri vyose, barondere kubanezereza muri vyose, birinde kubahaririza,
kandi ntibabibe, ariko berekane ko bashobora kuba abizigirwa rwose; gutyo bazotuma inyigisho z’Imana, yo Mukiza wacu, zihurumbirwa muri vyose.
Ubuntu bw’Imana buzana agakiza bwarahishuwe ku bantu bose.
Ni bwo butwigisha kwiyambura ukutubaha Imana n’ibihimbaro vy’isi, no kubaho tuganza ingeso zacu, tugororotse kandi twubaha Imana muri kino gihe,
turindiriye ivyizigiro vy’amahirwe, aho ubwiza bw’Imana yacu ihambaye n’Umukiza, ari we Yesu Kristo, buzohishurirwa.
Ni we yatwitangiye, araducungura kugira ngo tuve mu bubi bwacu bwose, atugira ubwoko bwejejwe yiharije, bufise ishaka ryo gukora ivyiza.
Ivyo ni vyo ukwiye kwigisha abizera. Ubahimiririze kubikora kandi ukosore abatabikora, kandi ubigire mu mubasha wahawe bwose. Ntukemerere umuntu n’umwe kugusuzugura.
Wame wibutsa abantu kwubaha abatware n’abategetsi, kugamburuka no gukora ivyiza.
Birinde kugira uwo batuka kandi birinde ibihari. Ariko babe abagwaneza, kandi bace bugufi imbere y’abantu bose.

Natwe twahora turi imburabwenge, turi abagarariji, twarahenzwe twongera tugirwa imbohe n’ivyipfuzo vy’ibihimbaro vy’ubwoko bwose. Twari twuzuye ubugunge n’ukwipfuza, twankwa kandi twankana hagati yacu.
Ariko ubuntu n’urukundo vy’Imana yo Mukiza wacu bimaze guhishurwa,
yaradukijije, atari uko twakoze ibigororotse, ariko kubera imbabazi zayo. Yadukijije mu kutwoza ivyaha vyacu biciye mu kuvuka ubwa kabiri, no mu buzima bushasha muri Mpwemu Yera.
Yasutse Mpwemu Yera kuri twebwe biciye muri Kristo Yesu Umukiza wacu,
kugira ngo tumaze kwemerwa nk’abagororotsi ku bw’ubuntu bwayo, tube abaragwa bafise ivyizigiro vy’ubugingo butazoshira.
Iri jambo ni iryo kwizigirwa, kandi ndashaka ko ushimikira kuri izi nyigisho kugira ngo abizigiye Imana bose babone kwiyegurira gukora ivyiza. Izo nyigisho ni nziza, zigirira akamaro uwuzumva wese.
Ariko wirinde impari z’ubupfu, ivy’urukurikirane rwa ba sekuruza, ibihari n’imishwano bifatiye ku vyagezwe n’amabwirizwa, kuko nta co bimaze kandi nta co bifasha uwuvyumva.
Nihagira uwuzana ivy’ukwicamwo ibice, uze umwihanize irya mbere n’irya kabiri, niyabandanya, uze umutaramure.
Kuko abantu nk’abo bataye inzira y’ukuri, kandi ivyaha vyabo birabatsindisha.
Ninakurungikira Arutemasi canke Tukiko, uze ugerageza unsange i Nikopolisi, kuko nahisemwo kuzomarayo igihe c’imbeho nyinshi cane.
Uze ukore ibishoboka vyose ufashe umucamanza Zena na Apolo nibafata urugendo, kugira ngo baronke ivyo bakeneye vyose.
Abantu bacu bakwiye kwiga kwitangira ibikorwa vyiza, kugira ngo bashobore gufasha mu bikenewe, ubuzima bwabo ntibube ubutagira ikimazi.
Abo turi kumwe hano bose barakuramutsa. Udutahirize abadukunda bose mu kwizera. Ubuntu bubane namwe.
Jewe Pawulo, imbohe ya Kristo Yesu, na mwene Data Timoteyo, Turakwandikiye wewe Filemoni, mwene Data dukunda cane kandi dusangiye ibikorwa,
na mushiki wacu Afiya, na Arukipo uwo dusangiye urugamba, n’ishengero rikoranira mu nzu yanyu:
Ubuntu n’amahoro biva ku Mana Data wa twese no ku Mwami wacu Yesu Kristo bibane namwe.
Nama nshima Imana ibihe vyose iyo ndiko ndagusengera,
kuko numvise ukwizera Umwami Yesu kuri muri wewe, n’urukundo ufitiye abizera bose.
Ndagusengera kugira ngo ukwizera dusangiye kwame ivyamwa, maze ubone gutahura ivyiza vyose dufise muri Kristo Yesu.
Urukundo rwawe rwanteye umunezero mwinshi rwongera runtera intege, kuko waremesheje imitima y’abizera.
Ni co gituma, naho muri Kristo nari gushobora kugutegeka gukora ivyo utegerezwa gukora,
mpisemwo kubikwingingira mu rukundo. Ndakwinginze jewe Pawulo, umutama kandi vyongeye ubu nkaba n’imbohe ya Kristo Yesu,
ningingira umwana wanje Onesimo, uwo navyaye ndi mw’ibohero.
Yahora ari imburakimazi kuri wewe, ariko ubu ni uw’ikimazi kuri wewe no kuri jewe.
Ndamukurungikiye kandi umenye ko afise umutima nk’uwanje.
Nashaka ko agumana nanje kugira ngo amfashe mu kibanza cawe muri iki gihe ndi imbohe kubera Ubutumwa Bwiza.
Ariko sinashatse kugira ico nkoze ntakugishije inama, kugira ngo iciza cose wonkorera ugikore bivuye ku mutima, ata gahato.
Birashoboka ko igituma yatandukanye na we igihe gito, kwari kugira ngo azogaruke ari uwawe ibihe vyose;

atakiri umugurano, ahubwo arengeye umugurano, ari mwene Data w’umukundwa. Ndamukunda cane ariko ndazi ko wewe umukunda kundusha, haba mu buryo bw’umubiri nk’umuvukanyi, canke nka mwene Data mu Mwami wacu.
None rero nimba unyemera nk’uwo musangiye igikorwa, umwakire nk’aho woba wakiriye jewe ubwanje.
Nimba hari ikibi yagukoreye canke hari ideni agufitiye, urimparureko.
Jewe Pawulo, ndabikwandikiye n’ukuboko kwanje: nzorikuriha. Sinorinda kukwibutsa ko nawe umfitiye ideni ry’ubuzima bwawe.
Ndakwinginze rero mwene Data ungirire ubwo buntu ku bw’Umwami; uremeshe umutima wanje muri Kristo.
Ndakwandikiye nizeye ko uzokora ivyo ndagusavye, ndetse n’ibirengeye.
Kandi untegurire icumba, kuko nizera ko Imana izokwishura amasengesho yawe, maze ikandekura nkagaruka iwanyu vuba.
Epafura, uwo dusangiye ukubohwa muri Kristo Yesu, arabatasha,
Mariko, Arisitariko, Dema na Luka, abo dusangiye ibikorwa, na bo nyene barabatasha.
Ubuntu bw’Umwami Yesu Kristo bubane n’impwemu yawe.
Kera Imana yavuganye na ba sogokuruza kenshi kandi mu buryo bwinshi iciye ku bavugishwa na yo.
Ariko muri iyi misi y’iherezo, yavuganye natwe iciye ku Mwana wayo. Uwo ni we Imana yagize samuragwa w’ibintu vyose, kandi ivyaremwe vyose yabiremye iciye muri we.

Uwo Mwana yerekana ugukayangana kw’ubwiza bw’Imana kandi ni we shusho nyayo iboneka y’ubumana bwayo. Vyongeye ni we ashigikije vyose ijambo ryiwe ry’inkomezi. Ahejeje gushiraho uburyo bwo kwoza ivyaha vyacu, yaciye yicara mu kibanza c’iteka i buryo bw’Imana y’icubahiro mw’ijuru.
Ibi vyerekana ko Umwana aruta cane abamarayika, nk’uko izina Imana yamuhaye riruta amazina yabo.
Ni nde mu bamarayika Imana yigeze ivugako iti: “Uri Umwana wanje; uwu musi ndakuvyaye”? Canke iti: “Nzomubera Se, na we azombera Umwana”?
Kandi igihe Imana yazana Umwana wayo w’imfura mw’isi, yavuze iti: “Abamarayika bose b’Imana nibamusenge.”
Ku bijanye n’abamarayika, yavuze iti: “Abamarayika bayo ibahindura imiyaga, abakozi bayo ikabagira imbeya z’umuriro.”
Ariko ku vyerekeye Umwana, ivuga iti: “Ukuganza kwawe, ewe Mana, kuzokwamaho. Ubugororotsi ni ryo cumu ry’inganji y’Ubwami bwawe.
Wakunze ubugororotsi, wanka ikibi; ni co gituma Imana, ari yo Mana yawe, yagutoranije, ikagusiga amavuta y’umunezero, ikakurutisha bagenzawe.”
Yongera iravuga iti: “Ni wewe, Uhoraho, washizeho amatanguriro y’isi, kandi amaboko yawe ni yo yaremye amajuru.
Ivyo bizoshira, ariko wewe wamaho. Vyose bizosaza nk’impuzu.
Uzobizinga nk’uwuzinga impuzu; bizohindurwa nk’uko bahindura impuzu. Ariko wewe uhora uko wamye, kandi imyaka yawe ntigira iherezo.”
Ni nde mu bamarayika Imana yigeze ivugako iti: “Icara i buryo bwanje kugeza abansi bawe bose ndabashize musi y’ibirenge vyawe”?
Mbega abamarayika bose si impwemu zikorera Imana? Ntiyazitumye gukorera abazoragwa agakiza?
Ni co gituma dutegerezwa kwitwararika cane ukuri twumvise, kugira ngo ntituzimire tukakuvamwo.
Nimba ubutumwa Imana yarungikanye abamarayika bwabonetse ari ukuri, kandi ukugarariza kwose n’ukutumvira kwose bikaronka igihano bikwiranye,
none twebwe tuzokira gute ni twanjanjwa ku gakiza gakomeye nk’ako? Umwami Yesu ubwiwe ni we yabanje kuvuga ivy’ako gakiza, hanyuma abamwumvise baratwemeza ko ari ukuri.
Imana na yo yashigikiye intahe yabo ibicishije mu bimenyetso n’ibitangaza bitandukanye yakoze, hamwe n’ingabire za Mpwemu Yera yatanze uko ibishatse.
Imana ntiyahaye abamarayika kuganza iyi si izoza turiko turavuga.
Ahubwo, mu Vyanditswe hari uwashinze intahe ati: “Mbega umuntu ni iki kugira ngo umwibuke, umwana w’umuntu kugira ngo umwiteho?
Habuze gato ngo umunganye n’abamarayika; kandi wamwambitse ubwiza n’icubahiro,

kandi ibintu vyose wabishize musi y’ububasha bwiwe.” Nimba Imana yashize vyose musi y’ububasha bw’umuntu, bisigura ko ata kintu na kimwe casigaye kitari musi y’ububasha bwiwe. Ariko gushika ubu ntitubona ko vyose biri musi y’ububasha bwiwe.
Ico tubona ni iki: Yesu yagizwe uwuri musi y’abamarayika igihe gito, none ubu yambaye ubwiza n’icubahiro kuko yadupfiriye twese. Ni ku bw’ubuntu bw’Imana Yesu yapfiriye abantu bose.

Vyari bikwiye ko Imana, yo yaremye vyose kandi bikaremerwa kuba ivyayo, itunganya rwose Yesu biciye mu mubabaro, kugira ngo ishikane abana bayo benshi mu bwiza bwayo, kuko Yesu ari we yatanguje inzira y’agakiza.
Yesu ni we yeza abantu ivyaha vyabo. Uweza hamwe n’abezwa bose bafise Se umwe. Ni co gituma Yesu bitamutera isoni kubita abavukanyi biwe.
Kuko yabwiye Imana ati: “Nzokwamamaza izina ryawe mu bavukanyi banje. Nzoguhimbaza ikoraniro rikoranye.”
Yaravuze kandi ati: “Nzokwizigira Imana.” Yongerako ati: “Jewe n’abana Imana yampaye.”
Abo bana hari ikintu basangiye: bose ni abantu. Yesu na we ubwiwe yahindutse umuntu nka bo kugira ngo, biciye mu rupfu rwiwe, amare inkomezi uwari afise ububasha bw’urupfu, ari we Satani.
Ubu ni bwo buryo bwonyene yari gushobora kubohora abantu bari babayeho ubuzima bwabo bwose nk’abagurano kubera gutinya urupfu.
Ikindi tuzi n’uko Umwana w’Imana ataje gufasha abamarayika; ahubwo yaje gufasha uruvyaro rwa Aburahamu.

Ni co gituma vyari bikwiye ko ahinduka agasa natwe abavukanyi biwe muri vyose; kugira ngo atubere Umuherezi Mukuru w’umunyembabazi kandi w’umwizigirwa imbere y’Imana, kugira ngo atange ikimazi gikura ivyaha vy’abantu.
Ni co gituma ashobora kudufasha iyo tugeragezwa, kuko na we yageragejwe n’imibabaro yaciyemwo.
Nuko rero bene Data, mwebwe mwahamagawe n’Imana, mwiyumvire cane kuri uwu Yesu, uwo twemera nk’intumwa n’Umuherezi Mukuru wacu.
Yabaye umwizigirwa imbere y’Imana yo yamujeje iki gikorwa, nk’uko Mose yakoze nk’umwizigirwa igihe Imana yamuzeza inzu yayo yose.
Ariko Yesu akwiye icubahiro kiruta ica Mose, nk’uko uwubatse inzu akwiye icubahiro kiruta ic’inzu yubatse.
Inzu yose irafise uwayubatse, ariko Imana ni yo yubatse vyose.
“Mose yabaye umwizigirwa mu nzu y’Imana nk’umukozi,” kugira ngo ashingire intahe ivyo Imana yari igiye kuvuga muri kazoza.
Ariko Kristo ni umwizigirwa nk’Umwana yahawe kuganza inzu y’Imana. Kandi iyo nzu ni twebwe, niyo twagumya ugushira amanga n’ivyizigiro dufise muri Kristo.
Ni co gituma Mpwemu Yera avuga ati: “Uwu musi nimwumva ijwi ryiwe,
ntimukomantaze imitima yanyu nk’uko Abisirayeli babikoze igihe bangarariza bakangerageza mu bugaragwa.
Aho ba sogokuruza banyu bangerageza bakancaca, naho bari barabonye ivyo nabakoreye imyaka mirongo ine.
Ni co gituma nabashavuriye, ndavuga nti: ‘Imitima yabo yama izimira, kandi ntibamenye inzira zanje.’
Ni co catumye ndahirana uburake nti: ‘Ntibazokwigera binjira aho kuruhukira nateguye.’ ”
Nuko rero bene Data, mwirinde kugira ngo ntihagire n’umwe muri mwebwe agira umutima mubi utizera ngo bitume ava ku Mana nzima.
Ahubwo, muhanurane imisi yose, tugishobora kuvuga “uwu musi,” kugira ngo ntihagire n’umwe muri mwebwe akomantazwa no guhendwa n’icaha.
Kuko twahindutse abafatanije na Kristo, nimba vy’ukuri tuzigamye, gushitsa kw’iherezo, ivyizigiro bishikamye nk’ivyo twatanguranye.
Mwibuke ico Ivyanditswe bivuga: “Uwu musi nimwumva ijwi ryayo, ntimukomantaze imitima yanyu nk’uko Abisirayeli babikoze igihe bayigarariza.”
Mbega ni ba nde bagararije Imana, kandi bari barumvise ijwi ryayo? Si bamwe bari bavuye muri Egiputa barongowe na Mose?
Mbega ni ba nde bashavuje Imana imyaka mirongo ine? Si bamwe bacumura maze imivyimba yabo ikagwa mu bugaragwa?
Mbe ni ba nde Imana yabarira igihe yarahira ko batazokwigera binjira aho kuruhukira yateguye? Si bamwe batayumvira?
Ico tubona ni uko, kubera ukutizera kwabo, batashoboye kwijira aho kuruhukira Imana yateguye.
Ni co gituma, ko isezerano ryo kwinjira aho kuruhukira yateguye rikiriho, dukwiye kwirinda kugira ngo ntihagire n’umwe muri mwebwe yohava atahashika.
Ubu butumwa bwiza buvuga ko Imana yateguye aho kuruhukira twabwumvise nk’uko na bo babwumvise. Ariko nta co bwabamariye kuko batabwakiranye ukwizera.

Ni twebwe abizeye gusa dushobora kwinjira aho kuruhukira Imana yateguye. Ariko ku bandi Imana yavuze iti: “Ni co catumye ndahirana uburake nti: ‘Ntibazokwigera binjira aho kuruhukira nateguye.’ ” Ariko rero ibikorwa vyayo vyaheze igihe yarema isi.
