Uwo Yesu Kristo ni we yaje akiyerekana biciye mu kubatizwa mu mazi no mu gusesa amaraso yiwe ku musaraba; si amazi gusa, ni amazi n’amaraso. Kandi Mpwemu Yera ni we abishingira intahe, kuko Mpwemu ni ukuri.
Hari ivyabona bitatu bishinga intahe:
Mpwemu, amazi n’amaraso; kandi uko ari bitatu bishinga intahe imwe.
Nimba twemera intahe ishinzwe n’abantu, intahe ishinzwe n’Imana yo irakomeye kurusha, kandi iyo ntahe yayishingiye Umwana wayo.
Umuntu wese yizera Umwana w’Imana arazi mu mutima wiwe ko iyo intahe ari iy’ukuri. Ariko umuntu wese atizera Imana aba ayigize umubeshi, kuko atizeye intahe Imana yashingiye Umwana wayo.
Iyo ntahe na yo ni iyi: Imana yaduhaye ubugingo budashira, kandi ubwo bugingo buri mu Mwana wayo.
Umuntu wese afise Umwana afise ubugingo; umuntu wese adafise Umwana w’Imana nta bugingo afise.
Ibi ndabibandikiye mwebwe mwizeye izina ry’Umwana w’Imana kugira ngo mumenye ko mufise ubugingo budashira.
Kandi ico tuzi tudakekeranya ni uko iyo tuyisavye ico ari co cose gihuye n’ugushaka kwayo itwumva.
Kandi uko tuzi ko itwumva iyo dusenze, ni ko tuzi kandi ko iduha ico tuyisavye.

Niwabona mwene Data wundi akoze icaha kitari ico kumwicisha, uze umusengere, Imana na yo izoha uwo muntu ubugingo. Ibi ndabivuze ku muntu yakoze icaha kiticisha. Ariko hariho icaha cicisha; simvuze ngo musengere umuntu yakoze icaha nk’ico.
Igikorwa cose kibi ni icaha, ariko hariho ivyaha biticisha.
Turazi ko ata muntu yavyawe n’Imana abandanya gukora icaha, kuko Umwana w’Imana aramurinda, kandi wa mubi nta co ashobora kumukorako.
Turazi ko turi abana b’Imana, kandi ko isi yose iri musi y’ububasha bwa wa mubi.

Turazi kandi ko Umwana w’Imana yaje akaduha ugutahura, kugira ngo tumenye Imana nyakuri. Ubu turi mu Mana nyakuri kuko turi mu Mwana wayo, Yesu Kristo. Ni we Mana nyakuri kandi ni we bugingo budashira.
Bana nkunda, mwirinde ikintu cose cotwara ikibanza c’Imana mu mitima yanyu.
Jewe umutama w’ishengero, Ndakwandikiye mupfasoni watoranijwe n’Imana n’abana bawe, abo nkunda mu kuri, kandi umuntu wese azi ukuri arabakunda,
kuko ukuri kuba muri twebwe kandi kuzogumana natwe ibihe bidashira:
Ubuntu, imbabazi n’amahoro biva ku Mana Data no kuri Yesu Kristo, Umwana wayo, bibandanye bibana natwe mu kuri no mu rukundo.
Vyaranezereye cane kubona bamwe mu bana bawe bagendera mu kuri, nk’uko Data yadutegetse.
Ubu na ho ga mupfasoni, sindakwandikiye ibwirizwa rishasha, ahubwo ndakwandikiye kimwe twakira kuva mu ntango: ko dukwiye gukundana.
Uru rukundo mvuga rusigura kwitondera amabwirizwa y’Imana, kandi yadutegetse gukundana, nk’uko mwavyumvise kuva mu ntango.
Ibi ndabivuze kuko ababeshi benshi bakwiragiye mw’isi. Abo ntibemera ko Yesu Kristo yaje yambaye umubiri. Umuntu wese ameze uko ni umubeshi kandi ni antikristo.
Mwirinde kugira ngo ntimutakaze ico twakoreye, ahubwo mushishikare kugira ngo muze muhabwe impembo ikwiye.
Umuntu wese azimira akava mu nyigisho za Kristo nta bucuti afitaniye n’Imana. Ariko umuntu wese aguma mu nyigisho za Kristo afitaniye ubucuti na Data n’Umwana.
Nihagira umuntu aza aho muri akazana inyigisho zitandukanye n’izi, ntimuze mumwakire mu nzu zanyu canke ngo mumuramutse.
Umuntu wese amwakiriye aba amushigikiye mu bikorwa vyiwe bibi.
Mfise vyinshi nshaka kubabwira, ariko sinshaka kubibandikira. Nizera ko nzobagendera tuvugana amaso mu yandi, kugira ngo umunezero wacu ube uwuzuye.
Abana b’umuvukanyi wawe, umupfasoni yatoranijwe n’Imana, barakuramutsa.
Jewe umutama w’Ishengero, Ndakwandikiye wewe Gayo, uwo nkunda mu kuri.
Mugenzi nkunda, ndakwipfuriza kugira amagara meza no kuroranirwa mu mubiri, nk’uko impwemu yawe imerewe.
Naranezerewe cane igihe bamwe muri bene Data baza bakambwira ingene uri umwizigirwa kandi ugendera mu kuri.
Nta munezero woza undutira kwumva ko abana banje bagendera mu kuri.
Mugenzi nkunda, werekana ubwizigirwa mu vyo uriko urakorera bene Data, naho ari abanyamahanga kuri wewe.
Na bo bashingiye intahe urukundo rwawe imbere y’ishengero. Ndakwinginze ubandanye ubashigikira mu vyo bakeneye mu buryo bunezereza Imana,
kuko bafashe urugendo bakorera izina rya Kristo, kandi ntibemeye gufashwa n’abatizera.
Dutegerezwa kwakira n’umutima mwiza abantu nk’abo kugira ngo dufatanye na bo gukorera ukuri.
Narandikiye ishengero; ariko Diyotirefe, akunda kwishira imbere, ntiyemera ikibanza cacu nk’abarongozi.
Ninaza, nzoshira ahabona ivyo ariko arakora, ibibi n’ibinyoma akwiragiriza atuvuga nabi. Uretse ko we ubwiwe yanka kwakira bene Data, ahubwo abuza n’abashaka kubakira, akanabataramura mw’ishengero.
Mugenzi nkunda, ntukigane ibibi, ariko wigane ivyiza. Umuntu wese akora ivyiza ava ku Mana. Umuntu wese akora ibibi ntarabona Imana.
Demetiriyo avugwa neza na bose, nk’uko ukuri na kwo kumushingira intahe. Natwe tumuvuga neza kandi urazi ko intahe yacu ari iy’ukuri.
Mfise vyinshi nshaka kukubwira, ariko sinshaka kubikwandikira.
Nizeye ko tuzobonana vuba, tukavugana amaso mu yandi.
Amahoro abane na we. Abakunzi turi kumwe barakuramutsa. Undamukirize abakunzi muri kumwe, umwe wese ku giti ciwe.
Jewe Yuda, umukozi wa Yesu Kristo n’umuvukanyi wa Yakobo, Ndabandikiye mwebwe abahamagawe, mukundwa n’Imana Data kandi muzigamwe na Yesu Kristo:
Imbabazi, amahoro n’urukundo bibe muri mwebwe birwiriye.
Bene Data nkunda, naho nari nipfuje cane kubandikira ku bijanye n’agakiza dusangiye, numvise ngoberwa kwandika ndabahimiriza ngo mugwanire ukwizera abera b’Imana bahawe rimwe rizima.

Ibi ndabivuze kuko hari abantu batubaha Imana binjiye muri mwebwe binyegeje, bakigisha ko ubuntu bw’Imana butwemerera kugendera mu buhumbu. Igihano c’abantu nk’abo cari caravuzwe mu Vyanditswe kuko bahakana Yesu Kristo, ari we Databuja wenyene n’Umwami.
Naho mwari musanzwe mubizi vyose, ndashaka kubibutsa ko Umwami Imana yatabaye ubwoko bw’Abisirayeli akabukura mu gihugu ca Egiputa, ariko hanyuma yahoneje abatizeye bo muri bo.

Kandi n’abamarayika batagumye mu bibanza Imana yabashizemwo, ariko bagahitamwo kubivamwo, Imana yabugaraniye ahantu h’umwijima, baboshwe n’iminyororo y’ibihe bidashira, barindiriye wa musi uhambaye w’imanza.

Kandi mwibuke Sodomu na Gomora n’ibisagara vyari bihakikije. Abantu baho bihaye gukora ivyaha vy’ubuhumbu n’ivy’ubusambanyi vy’ubwoko bwose. Ni co catumye Imana yabatanzeko akarorero mu kubahanisha umuriro udashira.
Uko ni ko n’abo bantu bagendera mu ndoto zabo, bonona imibiri yabo, bagasuzugura ububasha bw’Imana bagatuka ivy’icubahiro vyo mw’ijuru.
Ariko na Mikayeli, Umumarayika mukuru, aho yariko araharira na Satani bapfa umuvyimba wa Mose, ntiyubahutse kumutuka, ariko yavuze ati: “Uhoraho aguhane!”
Ariko abo bantu bo batuka ivyo badatahura. Bameze nk’ibikoko bitazi ubwenge kandi ivyo bibaza ngo barazi ni vyo bibahonya.
Abo bazobona ibara! Bajanye inzira ya Kayini, bakurikira amaronko maze barwa mu mutego Balamu yaguyemwo; bazohona kuko bagararije nka Kora.

Kubana na bo iyo musangira mu misi mikuru y’urukundo nk’abizera ni agatetereza, kandi ivyo babikora ata co basonera. Bameze nk’abungere biragira ubwabo. Bameze nk’ibicu bitagira imvura bikubebwa n’umuyaga. Bameze kandi nk’ibiti bitagira ivyamwa mu gihe c’iyera, vyaranduranywe n’imizi bipfa kabiri.
Ibikorwa biteye isoni vyabo vyiyerekana nk’ifuro rikwiragizwa n’imipfunda yo mu kiyaga. Bameze n’inyenyeri ziyerera, zabikiwe gutererwa mu cobo c’umwijima w’umuzitanya w’ibihe bidashira.
Enoki, uwo mu runganwe rugira indwi inyuma ya Adamu, yavugishijwe kuri abo bantu ati: “Raba Uhoraho azananye n’ibihumbi n’ibihumbi vy’abamarayika bera,
aje gucira imanza abantu bose, no kwemeza abanyavyaha bose ibikorwa vyo kutubaha Imana bakoze, n’ibitutsi vyose abatubaha Imana bayitutse.”
Abo bantu ni abanyamwikomo bama bidodombera abandi; bakurikira ivyipfuzo vyabo bibi; barishira hejuru kandi bakoresha amajambo meza babesha abandi mu kurondera inyungu.
Ariko mweho bakundwa, mwibuke ivyo intumwa z’Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo zari zaravuze imbere y’igihe.
Bababwiye bati: “Mu bihe vy’iherezo hazobaho abacokoranyi bakurikira ivyipfuzo vyabo vyo kutubaha Imana.”
Abantu nk’abo ni bo babacamwo ibice, bakurikira ivyipfuzo vyabo vy’ab’isi gusa, ntibagira Mpwemu.
Ariko mweho, bakundwa, mwiyubake mu kwizera kwanyu kwera cane kandi musengere muri Mpwemu Yera.
Mwizigamire mu rukundo rw’Imana mu kurindira ko Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo, mu mbabazi ziwe, abaha ubugingo budashira.
Mugirire impuhwe abakekeranya.
Mukize abandi mubakure mu muriro w’urubanza. Mwerekane imbabazi ku bandi ariko zivanze no gutinya. Yamara mwirinde no gukora ku mpuzu zandujwe n’imibiri yabo yandujwe n’ivyipfuzo vyabo bibi.
Imana irashoboye kubazigama ngo ntimurwe no kubashikana imbere y’ubwiza bwayo mutagira ico mwogawa kandi munezerewe cane.
Ni yo Mana yonyene n’Umukiza wacu. Icubahiro, ubukuru, inkomezi n’ububasha bibe ivyayo, biciye muri Yesu Kristo Umwami wacu, uhereye kera hose, ubu no gushitsa ibihe bidashira! Amen.
Iki gitabu kidonda ivyahishuwe na Yesu Kristo, ivyo Imana yamuhaye kugira ngo yereke abakozi biwe ibigiye gushika. Na we yabimenyekanishije mu kurungika umumarayika wiwe ku mukozi wiwe Yohana,
na we ashingira intahe ivyo yabonye vyose ku bijanye n’ijambo ry’Imana n’intahe ya Yesu Kristo.
Harahiriwe uwusoma aya majambo y’ubuvugishwa, kandi harahiriwe abayumva bakayashirako umutima, kuko igihe kiri hafi.
Jewe Yohana, Ndabandikiye mwebwe abo mu mashengero indwi yo muri Aziya: Ubuntu n’amahoro biva ku wuriho, uwamyeho kandi agira aze, no ku mpwemu indwi ziri imbere y’intebe y’inganji,

no kuri Yesu Kristo we cabona co kwizigirwa, imfura mu bapfuye, umutware aganza abami bo kw’isi bose, bibane namwe. Icubahiro cose kibe ic’uwadukunze, akatubohora mu vyaha vyacu abanje gusesa amaraso yiwe.
Yatugize ubwami bw’abaherezi bo gukorera Imana ari yo Se. Icubahiro n’ububasha bibe ivyayo ibihe vyose! Amen.
“Ehe azananye n’ibicu,” kandi “amaso yose azomubona; n’abamucimise bazomubona,” kandi isi yose “izoboroga ku bwiwe.” Nibibe gutyo, Amen.
“Ndi Alufa na Omega, Intango n’Iherezo,” ni ko Umwami Imana avuze, “uwuriho, uwamyeho kandi agira aze, Mushoboravyose.”

Jewe Yohana, mwene So mfatanije namwe mu mibabaro, mu Bwami bw’Imana no mu kwihangana, ivyo duhamagarirwa muri Yesu, nari najanywe mw’izinga rya Patimo mporwa ijambo ry’Imana no gushingira intahe Yesu.
Maze ku musi w’Umwami Imana, ndi muri Mpwemu, numva ijwi rivugira inyuma yanje rimeze nk’iry’inzamba isamirana,
riti: “Wandike mu gitabu ivyo ubona vyose maze ubirungikire amashengero indwi mu bisagara vya Efeso, Simuruna, Perugamo, Tuwatira, Sarudi, Filadelufiya, na Lawodikiya.”
Mpindukiye ngo ndabe uwuriko aramvugisha, nca mbona ibiterekwako amatara indwi bikozwe mu nzahabu,
kandi hagati muri vyo hari hahagaze uwusa n’Umwana w’Umuntu, yambaye ikanzu ishika ku birenge, akenyeje umukanda w’inzahabu mu gikiriza.
Umushatsi wiwe warera derere; amaso yiwe yasa n’imbeya z’umuriro.
Ibirenge vyiwe vyasa n’umuringa wakaka wavugutiwe mw’itanure, ijwi ryiwe na ryo ryari rimeze nk’amazi menshi asuma.
Mu kuboko kwiwe kw’i buryo yari afise inyenyeri indwi, kandi mu kanwa kiwe havamwo inkota y’ubugi bubiri ikarishe. Mu maso hiwe harakayangana nk’izuba ryo ku murango.
Ndamubonye nca nikubita imbere y’ibirenge vyiwe nk’uwupfuye. Ariko aca anshirako ikiganza c’i buryo ambarira ati: “Ntutinye. Ndi Uwa Mbere kandi ndi Uwa Nyuma.
Ndi Uwuriho; nari narapfuye none ndi muzima ibihe vyose. Kandi mfise urupfunguruzo rw’urupfu na kuzimu.
Wandike rero ivyo wabonye vyose, ibiriko biraba n’ibiza gukurikira.

Iyi ni yo nsiguro y’ikinyegezwa c’inyenyeri indwi wabonye mu kiganza canje, n’igiterekwako amatara gikozwe mu nzahabu: inyenyeri indwi ni abamarayika b’amashengero indwi, ibiterekwako amatara na vyo ni ayo mashengero indwi.
Wandikire umumarayika w’ishengero ryo muri Efeso uti: Uwufise inyenyeri indwi mu kuboko kw’i buryo kandi agendagenda hagati y’ibiterekwako amatara indwi, aravuga ati:
Ndazi ibikorwa vyawe, ukuruha kwawe, n’ukwihangana kwawe. Ndazi ko utihanganira inkozi z’ibibi, kandi ko wasuzumye abo bose bigira intumwa kandi atari zo, ukamenya ko ari ababeshi.
Wihanganiye imibabaro myinshi ku bw’izina ryanje, ntiwadendebukirwa.
Ariko ico nkugaya ni uko watakaje urukundo rwawe rwa mbere.
Niwibuke aho wavuye ukagwa, maze wihane, usubire ukore ibikorwa wakora ubwa mbere. Niyo utihana, nzoza nkure igiterekwako itara cawe mu kibanza caco.
Ariko hari ico ushimirwa: wanse ibikorwa vy’Abanikolayite, nkuko nanje ndavyanka.
Uwufise amatwi niyumve ico Mpwemu abwira amashengero. Uwuzonesha nzomuha kurya ku vyamwa vyo ku giti c’ubugingo, kiri muri paradizo y’Imana.
Wandikire umumarayika w’ishengero ry’i Simuruna uti: Uwa mbere akaba n’uwa nyuma, uwapfuye akazuka, aravuga ati.
Ndazi imibabaro yawe, n’ubukene bwawe, ariko uri umutunzi! Ndazi ibitutsi utukwa n’abiyita Abayuda kandi atari bo, ahubwo ari abo mw’isinagogi rya Satani.

Ntuterwe ubwoba n’imibabaro ugiye gucamwo, kuko wa mubi agiye gushira bamwe muri mwebwe mw’ibohero kugira ngo akugerageze. Muzobabazwa imisi cumi. Ariko niwaguma mu bwizigirwa gushika ku gupfa, nzoguha igitsibo c’ubugingo.
Uwufise amatwi niyumve ico Mpwemu abwira amashengero. Uwuzonesha ntazobabazwa na gato n’urupfu rwa kabiri.
Wandikire umumarayika w’ishengero ry’i Perugamo uti: Uwufise inkota ikarishe, ifise ubugi bubiri, aravuga ati.

Ndazi ko uba mu gisagara Satani afisemwo intebe y’inganji, ariko wumiye kw’izina ryanje. Ntiwamvuyeko no mu gihe ca Antipa, icabona canje c’ukwizigirwa, uwagandaguriwe muri mwebwe, mu gisagara ca Satani.
Ariko ico nkugaya ni uko hari bamwe muri mwebwe bagikurikira inyigisho za Balamu, uwatumye Balaki kugwisha Abisirayeli mu vyaha, bakarya ivyaterekerewe ibigirwamana bagakora n’ivyaha vy’ubusambanyi.
Kandi muri mwebwe hariho n’abakurikira inyigisho z’Abanikolayite.
None rero niwihane. Ahandi ho nzoza vuba kukugwanya nitwaje inkota yo mu kanwa kanje.

Uwufise amatwi niyumve ico Mpwemu abwira amashengero. Uwuzonesha nzomuha kurya kuri manu yahishijwe. Nzomuha kandi ibuye ryera ryanditseko izina rishasha; ntawuzomenya iryo zina kiretse uwuzohabwa iryo buye.
Wandikire umumarayika w’ishengero ry’i Tuwatira uti: Umwana w’Imana, uwufise amaso aca ibibatsi nk’imbeya z’umuriro, akagira n’ibirenge vyakaka nk’umuringa, aravuga ati.
Ndazi ibikorwa vyawe, urukundo rwawe, ukwizera kwawe, ukwitanga kwawe n’ukwihangana kwawe. Ndazi kandi ko ibikorwa vyawe vy’ubu biruta mu bwinshi ivyo wakora mu ntango.
Ariko ico nkugaya ni uko waretse uwo mugore Yezebeli yiyita umuvugishwa, akazimiza abantu banje, akabajana mu busambanyi no mu kurya ivyaterekerewe ibigirwamana.
Namuhaye umwanya ukwiye ngo yihane ariko ntagomba kuva mu ngeso ziwe z’ubusambanyi.
None rero nzomuterera ku gitanda c’imibabaro, kandi n’abasambana na we nzobatera imibabaro myinshi, kiretse bihanye bakareke ibikorwa vyabo bibi.
Nzokwica abana biwe bose. Aho ni ho amashengero yose azomenya ko ndi Imana isuzuma ivyanyegejwe mu mitima no mu vyiyumviro kandi ko nzoha umuntu wese impembo ikwiranye n’ivyo yakoze.
Ariko mwebwe abasigaye b’i Tuwatira mutifatanije n’izo nyigisho mbi, kandi mutakurikiye ivyo abantu bise amabanga akomeye ya Satani, ‘Nta wundi mutwaro ndabikoreza,
uretse kwumira ku co mufise gushika ngarutse.’
Uwuzonesha akabandanya anyumvira gushika kw’iherezo, nzomuha kuganza amahanga.
Azoyatwazanya umukazo, ayamenagure nk’uwumena inkono z’ibumba. Nzomuha ububasha nahawe na Data,
kandi nzomuha n’inyenyeri yo mu mutwenzi.
Uwufise amatwi niyumve ico Mpwemu abwira amashengero.
Wandikire umumarayika w’ishengero ry’i Sarudi uti: Uwufise mu biganza impwemu indwi z’Imana n’inyenyeri indwi aravuga ati: Ndazi ibikorwa vyawe. Abantu benshi bazi ko uri muzima kandi warapfuye.
Kanguka ukomeze ivyo usigaranye bigikomeye ariko bigiye gupfa, kuko ibikorwa vyawe bidatunganye imbere y’Imana.
Wibuke inyigisho wumvise ukazakira. Uzigendere wongere wihane. Niyo utakanguka nzoza nk’igisuma, kandi ntuzomenya igihe nzokugendera.
Ariko uracafise abantu bakeya i Sarudi batanduje impuzu zabo. Abo bazogendana nanje bambaye imyambaro yera kuko birababereye.
Uwuzonesha nzomwambika imyambaro yera. Sinzokwigera mpanagura izina ryiwe mu gitabu c’ubugingo, ahubwo nzorivuga imbere ya Data n’abamarayika biwe.
Uwufise amatwi niyumve ico Mpwemu abwira amashengero.

Wandikire umumarayika w’ishengero ry’i Filadelufiya uti: Uwera kandi uw’ukuri, uwufise urupfunguruzo rwa Dawidi mu kiganza; ico yuguruye nta wushobora kucugara, kandi ico yugaye nta wushobora kucugurura; aravuga ati.
Ndazi ibikorwa vyawe. Ehe, nakwugururiye umuryango ata n’umwe ashobora kwugara. Ndazi ko ufise intege nke, ariko wazigamye ijambo ryanje, ntiwanyihakana.
Ehe, nzozana abo mw’isinagogi rya Satani biyita Abayuda kandi atari bo, bapfukame imbere yawe, bamenye ko ndagukunda.
Ko witondeye ibwirizwa ryanje ryo kwihanganira ibikugerageza, nanje nzokurinda ibihe vy’amagorwa bigiye kuza kw’isi yose kugerageza abayibako.
Ehe ndaza vuba. Wumire ku co ufise kugira ngo ntihagire uwugutwara impera yawe.

Uwuzonesha nzomugira inkingi mu rusengero rw’Imana yanje, kandi ntazokwigera ahava. Nzomwandikako izina ry’Imana yanje, hamwe n’iry’igisagara c’Imana yanje, ni co Yerusalemu nshasha, imanuka iva mw’ijuru ku Mana yanje; kandi nzomwandikako izina ryanje rishasha.
Uwufise amatwi niyumve ico Mpwemu abwira amashengero.
Wandikire umumarayika w’ishengero ry’i Lawodikiya uti: Uwitwa Amen, umwizigirwa kandi icabona c’ukuri, uwuganza ivyaremwe n’Imana vyose, aravuga ati.
Ndazi ibikorwa vyawe. Ndazi ko udakonje kandi utabize. Ese iyo ukonja canke ukabira!
Ko uri akazuyazi, udakonje canke ngo ubire, ngira ndakudahwe.
Uvuga ngo uratunze, ufise vyinshi kandi ngo nta co ukenye. Ariko ntuzi ingene uri umugorwa ateye ikigongwe. Uri umukene, urahumye kandi ugenda gusa.

Ni co gituma ndaguhanura ngo ungureko inzahabu zivugutiwe mu muriro kugira ngo ube umutunzi. Ungureko imyambaro yera kugira ngo ufuke ubwambure bwawe buteye isoni, ungureko kandi n’umuti wo gusiga ku maso yawe kugira ngo ushobore kubona.
Uwo nkunda ndamukankamira, nkanamuhana. None rero, gira umwete, wihane.
Ehe mpagaze ku muryango ndiko ndadodora. Uwumva ijwi ryanje akugurura umuryango, ndinjira iwe dusangire.
Uwuzonesha nzomuha kwicarana nanje ku ntebe y’inganji, nk’uko nanje nanesheje nkicarana na Data ku ntebe y’inganji yiwe.
Uwufise amatwi niyumve ico Mpwemu abwira amashengero.”
Inyuma y’ivyo ndarangamiza, mbona umuryango wuguruye mw’ijuru. Rya jwi nari numvise ubwa mbere rivuga nk’inzamba, rimbwira riti: “Duga uze hano, ndakwereke ibigiye kuba inyuma y’ibi.”
Ako kanya nyene, ndi muri Mpwemu, mbona intebe y’inganji mw’ijuru, mbona n’uwuyicayeko.
Uwari ayicayeko yasa n’ibuye ry’igiciro ryitwa Yasipi hamwe n’iryitwa Sarudiyo. Kandi iyo ntebe yari izungurutswe n’umunywamazi usa n’ibuye ry’igiciro ryitwa Simaragido.
Iyo ntebe yari ikikujwe n’izindi mirongo ibiri na zine, zicaweko n’abashingantahe mirongo ibiri na bane bambaye impuzu zera n’ingori z’inzahabu ku mitwe yabo.
Kuri iyo ntebe hava imiravyo, urwamo n’imituragaro. Imbere y’iyo ntebe hari amatara indwi yaka, ari zo mpwemu indwi z’Imana.
Kandi imbere yayo hari igisa n’ikiyaga c’ibiyo kibonerana cane. Hagati na hagati n’ahakikuje iyo ntebe, hari ibinyabugingo vyuzuye amaso imbere n’inyuma.
Ikinyabugingo ca mbere casa n’intambwe, ica kabiri casa n’impfizi ikiri nto, ica gatatu cari gifise mu maso hasa n’ah’umuntu, ica kane cari kimeze nk’inkona iriko iraguruka.

Kimwekimwe cose muri vyo cari gifise amababa atandatu, cuzuye amaso hose n’imbere muri vyo. Ijoro n’umurango, ntivyahengeshanya kwama bivuga biti: “ ‘Uwera, uwera, uwera, ni we Mwami Imana Mushoboravyose,’ yamyeho, ariho, kandi agira aze.”
Igihe cose ivyo binyabugingo bihaye icubahiro uwicaye kuri ya ntebe kandi ariho ibihe bidashira,
ba bashingantahe mirongo ibiri na bane baca bikubita imbere y’uwicaye kuri ya ntebe, bagahimbaza uwuriho ibihe bidashira, bagashira hasi za ngori zabo imbere ya ya ntebe y’inganji, bavuga bati:
“Urabereye, Mwami Imana yacu, kwakira icubahiro n’ububasha kuko ari wewe waremye vyose, ugushaka kwawe ni ko kwatumye bibaho, biraremwa.”
Hanyuma mbona umuzingo w’igitabu mu kuboko kw’i buryo kw’uwari yicaye kuri ya ntebe y’inganji. Ico gitabu cari canditseko imbere n’inyuma, gihomesheje ishashara indwi.
Nongera mbona n’umumarayika w’inkomezi asemerera n’ijwi rirenga ati: “Ni nde abereye kumena ibintu indwi bimatanije uwu muzingo w’igitabu no kuwugurura?”
Ariko mu bo mw’ijuru canke mw’isi canke i kuzimu, ntihaboneka n’umwe ashoboye kuwugurura, canke ngo asome ibiri muri wo.
Nca ndarira cane kuko ata n’umwe abonetse abereye kwugurura uwo muzingo w’igitabu canke ngo asome ibiri muri wo.

Maze umwe muri ba bashingantahe arambwira ati: “Reka kurira! Ehe, intambwe yo mu muryango wa Yuda, uwukomoka mu muryango wa Dawidi, yaranesheje. Ni we abereye kumena ibintu indwi bimatanije uwo muzingo w’igitabu no kuwugurura.”

Nuko mbona Umwagazi w’Intama, usa n’uwishwe, uhagaze hambavu ya ya ntebe y’inganji, ukikujwe na vya binyabugingo bine na ba bashingantahe. Wari ufise amahembe indwi n’amaso indwi. Ayo maso ni zo mpwemu indwi Imana yarungitse mw’isi yose.
Wa mwagazi uraza wakira wa muzingo w’igitabu ugikuye mu minwe y’uwari yicaye kuri ya ntebe y’inganji.

Umaze kuwakira, vya binyabugingo bine na ba bashingantahe mirongo ibiri na bane baca bikubita imbere yawo. Umwe wese muri bo yari afise inanga, kandi bari bafise inzavya zikozwe mu nzahabu zuzuye ibimota neza, ari yo masengesho y’abera.

Baca baririmba indirimbo nsha, bavuga bati: “Urabereye kwakira uwo muzingo w’igitabu no kumena ibiwumatanije, kuko wishwe, amaraso yawe agacungurira Imana abantu bavuye mu miryango yose, mu ndimi zose, mu bwoko bwose no mu mahanga yose.
Wabagize abami n’abaherezi bo gukorera Imana yacu, kandi bazoganza kw’isi.”
Nongeye kuraba kandi, nca numva amajwi y’abamarayika ibihumbi n’ibihumbi bakikuje ya ntebe y’inganji, n’aya vya binyabugingo, na ba bashingantahe,
baririmba n’ijwi rirenga bati: “Umwagazi w’intama we yishwe, arabereye, kwakira ububasha, ubutunzi, ubwenge, inkomezi, icubahiro, ubwiza, n’amashimwe.”

Hanyuma nca numva amajwi y’ivyaremwe vyose, ivyo mw’ijuru, ivyo kw’isi, ivy’i kuzimu, ivyo mu biyaga n’ibibibamwo, biririmba biti: “Guhimbazwa n’icubahiro, ubwiza n’ububasha, ni ivy’uwicaye ku ntebe y’inganji n’Umwagazi w’intama yishwe, ibihe vyose!”
Vya binyabugingo bine bica bivuga biti: “Amen,” ba bashingantahe na bo baca bikubita hasi, barahimbaza.
Ngize gutya, mbona wa Mwagazi amena ica mbere muri bimwe indwi bimatanije wa muzingo w’igitabu. Nca numva kimwe muri vya binyabugingo kivuze n’ijwi nk’iry’inkuba giti: “Ingo!”
Ndavye imbere yanje nca mbona ifarasi yera. Uwayigenderako yari afise umuheto, hanyuma ahabwa urugori, aca ayigenderako nk’uwanesheje kandi agiye kunesha.
Yuguruye ica kabiri, nca numva ikinyabugingo ca kabiri kivuze giti: “Ingo!”
Haca haza iyindi farasi itukura. Uwayigenderako aca ahabwa ububasha bwo gukura amahoro kw’isi, no gutuma abantu bicana. Aca ahabwa inkota nini.
Yuguruye ica gatatu, nca numva ikinyabugingo ca gatatu kivuze kiti: “Ingo!” Haca haza ifarasi yirabura. Uwayigenderako yari afise iminzane ibiri mu minwe.

Nca numva kimwe muri vya binyabugingo kivuze kiti: “Ikiro kimwe c’ingano kizogurwa impembo y’umusi wose, ibiro bitatu vya sayiri bizogurwa impembo y’umusi wose. Ariko ntihagire ico mugira amavuta n’umuvinyu.”
Yuguruye ica kane nca numva ikinyabugingo ca kane kivuze kiti: “Ingo!”

Haca haza ifarasi isa n’urwatsi rubisi. Uwuyigenderako yitwa Rupfu, uwaje amukurikira na we yitwa Kuzimu. Baca bahabwa ububasha, ku ca kane c’isi, bwo kumarisha abantu inkota, inzara, ingwara, n’ibikoko vyo mw’ishamba.
Yuguruye ica gatanu, nca mbona imishaha y’abishwe bazira ijambo ry’Imana n’ugushinga intahe kwabo, iri musi y’igicaniro.
Basemerera n’ijwi rirenga bati: “Uzogeza ryari, Mwami uganje, uwera kandi uw’ukuri, uzorindira gushika ryari, kugira ngo ucire ababa kw’isi imanza, uhore amaraso yacu?”

Umwe wese muri bo aca ahabwa ikanzu yera, baca basabwa kurindira ikindi gihe gito, gushika igitigiri ca bene Data, abo bari basangiye gukorera Umwami Yesu, bategerezwa kwicwa nk’uko na bo bishwe, kibanze gikwire.
Yuguruye ica gatandatu, haba nyamugigima. Izuba rica ricura umwijima, risa n’igunira rikozwe mu bwoya bw’impene, ukwezi gutukura nk’amaraso,
inyenyeri zo kw’ijuru zikoragurikira kw’isi nk’ivyamwa vy’insukoni bikoroka biva ku giti kinyiganyijwe n’umuyaga w’igihuhusi.
Ijuru rica ririzinga nk’umuzingo w’igitabu bazinze, imisozi n’amazinga vyose bikurwa aho vyahora.
Maze abami bo kw’isi, abahambaye, abasoda bakuru, abatunzi, abakomeye, abagurano n’abidegemvya bose binyegeza mu masenga no mu bitandara vy’amabuye vyo mu misozi.
Bahamagara imisozi n’ibitandara vy’amabuye bavuga bati: “Nimutugweko muduhishe amaso y’uwicaye ku ntebe y’inganji, n’uburake bw’Umwagazi w’intama,
kuko umusi uhambaye w’uburake bwabo urashitse, kandi nta wushobora kuwuhangara.”
Inyuma y’ivyo mbona abamarayika bane bahagaze mu mpande zine z’isi, batangiriye imiyaga ine yo kw’isi, kugira ngo babuze umuyaga guhuhuta kw’isi canke ku kiyaga canke ku biti.
Nca mbona uwundi mumarayika avuye i burasirazuba, afise ikimenyetso c’Imana nzima. Aca arasemerera abwira ba bamarayika bane bahabwa ububasha bwo kwonona isi n’ikiyaga ati:
“Ntiwonone isi canke ikiyaga canke ibiti tutarashira ikimenyetso mu gahanga abakoreye Imana yacu.”
Maze nca ndumva igitigiri c’abashizweko ico kimenyetso; bari ibihumbi ijana na mirongo ine na bine bavuye mu moko yose ya Isirayeli.
Mu muryango wa Yuda bari ibihumbi cumi na bibiri, mu wa Reyubeni bari ibihumbi cumi na bibiri, mu wa Gadi bari ibihumbi cumi na bibiri,
mu wa Asheri bari ibihumbi cumi na bibiri, mu wa Nafutali bari ibihumbi cumi na bibiri, mu wa Manase bari ibihumbi cumi na bibiri,
mu wa Simeyoni bari ibihumbi cumi na bibiri, mu wa Lewi bari ibihumbi cumi na bibiri, mu wa Isakari bari ibihumbi cumi na bibiri,
mu wa Zabuloni bari ibihumbi cumi na bibiri, mu wa Yosefu bari ibihumbi cumi na bibiri, mu wa Benyamini bari ibihumbi cumi na bibiri.

Inyuma y’ivyo nca mbona isinzi ry’abantu batoharurika, bavuye mu mahanga yose, mu moko yose no mu ndimi zose, bahagaze imbere ya ya ntebe y’inganji n’imbere ya wa Mwagazi. Bari bambaye amakanzu yera, bafise n’amashami y’ibigazi mu minwe.
Baca basemerera n’ijwi rirenga bati: Agakiza ni ak’Imana yacu, yicaye ku ntebe y’inganji, n’Umwagazi w’intama.
Abamarayika bose bari bahagaze bakikuje ya ntebe y’inganji na ba bashingantahe mirongo ibiri na bane na vya binyabugingo bine. Baca bagwa bubamye imbere y’intebe y’inganji, basenga Imana
bavuga bati: “Amen! Guhimbazwa, ubwiza, ubwenge, amashimwe, icubahiro, ububasha n’inkomezi, bibe ivy’Imana yacu ibihe vyose. Amen!”
Umwe muri ba bashingantahe aca ambaza ati: “Aba bambaye amakanzu yera ni ba nde kandi bavuye he?”
Nca ndamwishura nti: “Nyakwubahwa, ni we wobimenya.” Aca avuga ati: “Aba ni abavuye muri rya hamwa rikomeye, bamesuye amakanzu yabo, bayezesha amaraso ya wa Mwagazi.
Ni co gituma, bahagaze imbere y’intebe y’inganji y’Imana, bayihimbariza mu rusengero ijoro n’umurango, kandi uwicaye ku ntebe y’inganji azobahisha mw’ihema ryiwe.
‘Ntibazoba bagisonza, kandi ntibazoba bakinyoterwa. Izuba ntirizobakira ukundi,’ kandi nta bushuhe buzobica.
Kuko Umwagazi w’intama ari ku ngoma ari we azobabera umwungere, azobaha ku mazi y’ubugingo. ‘Kandi Imana izobahanagura amosozi yose ku maso yabo.’ ”
Yuguruye ikigira indwi, haca haba agacerere mw’ijuru kamara nk’igice c’isaha.
Nca mbona ba bamarayika indwi bahagaze imbere y’Imana bahawe inzamba indwi.

Haca haza uwundi mumarayika afise ico gutuririramwo ibimota neza gikozwe mu nzahabu, ahagarara imbere y’igicaniro; aca ahabwa ibimota neza vyinshi abivanga n’amasengesho y’abera kugira ngo abitange ku gicaniro gikozwe mu nzahabu cari imbere y’intebe y’inganji.
Umwotsi w’ibimota neza n’amasengesho y’abera biraduga bishika imbere y’Imana bivuye mu biganza vya wa mumarayika.
Wa mumarayika aca afata kimwe co gutuririramwo ibimota neza, acuzuza umuriro wo ku gicaniro, agiterera hasi; haca humvikana urwamo rw’imituragaro, imiravyo na nyamugigima.
Ba bamarayika indwi bafise inzamba baca baritegura kugira ngo bazivuze.
Umumarayika wa mbere avugije inzamba yiwe, urubura n’umuriro bivanze n’amaraso bica bisukwa kw’isi. Maze ica gatatu c’isi, ica gatatu c’ibiti n’ica gatatu c’ivyatsi birasha.
Umumarayika wa kabiri avugije inzamba yiwe, ikintu kimeze nk’umusozi waka umuriro, gitabwa mu kiyaga. Maze ica gatatu c’ikiyaga gica gihinduka amaraso,
Ica gatatu c’ibiba mu kiyaga bica birapfa, n’ica gatatu c’ubwato burasambuka.
Umumarayika wa gatatu avugije inzamba yiwe, ikinyenyeri kinini caka nk’itara kirakoroka kivuye kw’ijuru, kigwa ku ca gatatu c’inzuzi n’amasoko y’amazi.
Izina ry’ico kinyenyeri ni Mururazi. Maze ica gatatu c’amazi yose aca ahinduka umururazi, kandi abantu benshi banyoye ayo mazi y’umururazi barapfa.

Umumarayika wa kane avugije inzamba yiwe, Imana ica ikubita ica gatatu c’izuba n’ica gatatu c’ukwezi n’ic’inyenyeri maze umuco wavyo uca uhinduka umwijima. Bica bituma ica gatatu c’umusi n’ica gatatu c’ijoro na vyo bihinduka umwijima.
Ndavye kandi, nca numva inkona igurukira kure mu kirere ivuga n’ijwi rirenga iti: “Baragowe, baragowe, baragowe ababa kw’isi ku bw’ibizoba abamarayika batatu ba nyuma nibavuza inzamba!”
Umumarayika wa gatanu avugije inzamba yiwe, nca mbona inyenyeri ikorokeye hasi ivuye kw’ijuru. Iyo nyenyeri ica ihabwa urupfunguruzo rw’icobo kijana i kuzimu.
Yuguruye ico cobo, haca hapfunduka umwotsi umeze nk’uw’itanure rinini, maze izuba n’ikirere bica bitakaza umuco wavyo kubera uwo mwotsi.
Muri uwo mwotsi haca havamwo inzige zimanuka kw’isi, zihabwa ububasha nk’ubwa sikoropiyo zo kw’isi.
Nuko izo nzige zitegekwa kutonona ivyatsi, ibiterwa canke ibiti, ariko zitegekwa kubabaza ababa kw’isi bose badafise ikimenyetso c’Imana ku ruhanga.
Izo nzige zihabwa ububasha bwo gutoteza abantu amezi atanu, ariko ntizemererwa kubica. Umubabaro zatera wari umeze nk’uwo umuntu agira akomowe na sikoropiyo.
Muri iyo misi abantu bazorondera urupfu ariko ntibarubone; bazokwipfuza gupfa, ariko urupfu ruzobahunga.
Izo nzige zari zimeze nk’amafarasi yiteguriye kuja ku rugamba. Ku mitwe zari zambaye igisa n’urugori rw’inzahabu, kandi mu maso hazo hari hameze nk’ah’abantu.
Imishatsi yazo yari imeze nk’iy’abagore, amenyo yazo na yo yari ameze nk’ay’intambwe.
Mu bikiriza zari zambaye ivyuma vyo kuzikingira, kandi amababa yazo yavuza urwamo nk’urw’imikogote myinshi ikwegwa n’amafarasi aja ku rugamba.
Zari zifise imirizo ikomora nk’iya sikoropiyo kandi ububasha bwo kubabaza abantu amezi atanu bwari mu mirizo yazo.
Umwami wazo yari umumarayika w’i kuzimu, izina ryiwe mu Giheburayo ni Abadoni, mu Kigiriki ni Apoluwoni, bisigura Umuranduzi.
Icago ca mbere kiraheze. Ariko hari bibiri bigiye kuza vuba.
Umumarayika wa gatandatu avugije inzamba yiwe, nca numva ijwi rivuye mu mahembe ane y’inzahabu ari ku gicaniro kiri imbere y’Imana,
ribwira wa mumarayika wa gatandatu yari afise inzamba riti: “Rekura abamarayika bane babohewe ku ruzi runini Efurata.”
Nuko ba bamarayika bane bararekurwa. Bari bateguriwe iyo saha, uwo musi, uko kwezi, uwo mwaka nyene, kugira ngo bice ica gatatu c’abantu bari kw’isi.
Nuko nca mbwirwa ko igitigiri c’abasoda bagwanira ku mafarasi kingana imiliyoni amajana abiri.

Ndiko nderekwa, mbona ayo mafarasi n’abayagenderako. Bari bitwaje inkinzo zitukura, izisa n’ubururu, hamwe n’izisa n’umuhondo. Ayo mafarasi yari afise imitwe nk’iy’intambwe, kandi mu kanwa hayo havayo umuriro, umwotsi n’ibizuku.
Nuko ica gatatu c’abari kw’isi bicwa n’ivyago bitatu vy’umuriro, umwotsi, n’ibizuku vyava mu kanwa k’ayo mafarasi.
Ububasha bw’ayo mafarasi bwari mu kanwa no mu mirizo vyayo; kuko imirizo yayo yari ifise imitwe nk’iy’inzoka kandi yari ifise ububasha bwo gukomeretsa abantu.

Ariko abasigaye batishwe n’ivyo vyago ntibihanye ibikorwa vyabo bibi bakoze n’amaboko yabo; ntibahevye gusenga abadayimoni n’ibigirwamana bikozwe mu nzahabu, mw’ifeza, mu mujumbu, mu mabuye no mu biti, bitabona, bitumva canke ngo bitambuke.
Ntibigeze kandi bihana ubwicanyi, amareba, ubusambanyi n’ubusuma.

Hanyuma mbona uwundi mumarayika w’inkomezi yururuka ava mw’ijuru. Yari yambaye igicu, umunywamazi ukaba hejuru y’umutwe wiwe. Mu maso hiwe hari hameze nk’izuba, amaguru yiwe na yo yari ameze nk’inkingi z’umuriro.
Yari afise umuzingo w’igitabu mutoya wuguruye mu kiganza ciwe. Aca ashinga ikirenge ciwe c’i buryo ku kiyaga, ic’i bubamfu agishinga i musozi.
Hanyuma aca arasemerera n’ijwi rirenga nk’intambwe yivuga. Asemereye, haca humvikana amajwi y’imituragaro indwi.
Iyo mituragaro indwi imaze kuvuga, nca mfata ikaramu ngo nandike. Ariko nca numva ijwi rivuye mw’ijuru rivuga riti: “Ivyo iyo mituragaro indwi yavuze, ubigire ibanga, ntuvyandike.”
Wa mumarayika nabona ahagaze ku kiyaga n’i musozi, aca aduza ikiganza ciwe c’i buryo akirabisha kw’ijuru.
Aca ararahira mw’izina ry’Imana ibaho ibihe vyose, yaremye amajuru n’ibiyabamwo, isi n’ibiyirimwo n’ibiyaga n’ibibibamwo, ati: “Nta mwanya wo kurindira ugisigaye!
Ariko umumarayika w’indwi niyavuza inzamba yiwe, imigambi ihishijwe y’Imana izoca ishitswa, nk’uko yayimenyesheje abakozi bayo ari bo bavugishwa na yo.”
Rya jwi nari numvise rimvugisha rivuye mw’ijuru, rica rirasubira rimbarira riti: “Genda wakire urya muzingo mutoya w’igitabu wuguruye mu minwe y’urya mumarayika ahagaze ku kiyaga n’i musozi.”
Nca ndagenda ndamusaba ngo ampe uwo muzingo mutoya w’igitabu. Aca ambwira ati: “Wakire uwurye. Uzokubera umururazi mu nda, ariko mu kanwa uzogusosera nk’ubuki.”
Nuko nakira wa muzingo mutoya w’igitabu ndawukuye mu kiganza ca wa mumarayika, nca ndawurya. Mu kanwa wasosa nk’ubuki, ariko maze kuwumira, uca ucika umururazi mu nda.
Hanyuma nca numva ijwi rimbwira riti: “Utegerezwa kuvugishwa kandi ku moko menshi, amahanga menshi, indimi nyinshi n’abami benshi.”
Maze mpabwa irenga, riringanijwe nk’iryo gupimisha uburebure, nca mbwirwa ngo: “Genda upime urusengero rw’Imana n’igicaniro, wongere uharure n’abaza kuhasengera.
Ariko ibaraza ry’inyuma y’urusengero nturipime kuko ni iry’Abanyamahanga. Bazomara amezi mirongo ine n’abiri bahonyanga igisagara cera.
Nanje nzoha ububasha ivyabona vyanje bibiri, na bo bazomara imisi igihumbi n’amajana abiri na mirongo itandatu, bavugishwa bambaye amagunira.”
Ivyo vyabona bibiri ni vyo biti bibiri vya elayo na vya biterekwako amatara bibiri bihagaze imbere y’Umwami Imana nyene isi yose.
Nihagira uwugerageza kubakorera ikibi, umuriro uzova mu kanwa kabo uturire abansi babo. Uko ni ko uwuzogerageza kubakorera ikibi azopfa.
Bafise ububasha bwo kwugara ikirere kugira ngo imvura ntigwe, igihe cose bazoba bariko baravugishwa; kandi bafise ububasha bwo guhindura amazi amaraso no guteza isi ivyago igihe cose uko babigomvye.
Baheje gushinga intahe, ca gikoko c’i kuzimu kizobatera, kibaneshe, hanyuma kibice.
Imivyimba yabo izorambikwa kw’ibarabara rya ca gisagara gikuru, kimwe mu mpwemu kigereranywa na Sodomu canke na Egiputa, ico Umwami wabo yabambwemwo.
Kumara imisi itatu n’igice, abantu bo mu mahanga yose, mu moko yose no mu ndimi zose bazokwihweza imivyimba yabo kandi nta n’umwe bazokwemerera kubahamba.
Abazoba baba kw’isi bose bazonezerezwa n’urupfu rwabo, bagire imisi mikuru. Bazohana utuganuke bigina urupfu rw’abo bavugishwa bahora batera ivyago ababa kw’isi.
Ariko inyuma y’imisi itatu n’igice, impwemu y’ubuzima iva ku Mana ibinjiramwo, baca barahaguruka kandi ababibonye bose bafatwa n’ubwoba bwinshi.
Hanyuma humvikana ijwi rirenga rivuye mw’ijuru, rivuga riti: “Nimuduge muze hano!” Nuko baduga mu gicu baja mw’ijuru abansi babo babaraba.
Ako kanya nyene haca humvikana nyamugigima iteye ubwoba isenyura ica cumi c’ibisagara, abantu ibihumbi indwi barapfa. Abarokotse bagira ubwoba bwinshi, bahimbaza Imana yo mw’ijuru.
Ico cari icago ca kabiri kirangiye, ariko ica gatatu cagira gishike.
Umumarayika w’indwi avugije inzamba yiwe, haca humvikana ijwi rivuye mw’ijuru rivuga riti: “Ubwami bwo kw’isi buhindutse ubw’Umwami Imana na Kristo wiwe, kandi azoganza ibihe bidashira.”
Ba bashingantahe mirongo ibiri na bane bicaye ku ntebe zabo imbere y’Imana baca bikubita hasi bubamye, bahimbaza Imana,
bavuga bati: “Turaguhaye icubahiro, Mwami Imana Mushoboravyose, wewe uriho kandi wamyeho, kuko wakiriye ububasha bwawe bukomeye, ugashiraho inganji yawe.

Amahanga yari yuzuye ishavu, ariko uburake bwawe buraje. Igihe kirageze co gucira urubanza abapfuye, no guha impera abakozi bawe ari bo bavugishwa, n’abubaha izina ryawe bose, abahambaye n’aboroshe, no kurandura abarandura isi.”

Maze urusengero rw’Imana mw’ijuru ruca ruruguruka, kandi muri rwo habonekamwo isandugu y’isezerano. Nuko haca haba imiravyo, humvikana urwamo n’imituragaro, haba nyamugigima n’imvura y’urubura ikomeye.
Maze haboneka ikimenyetso gihambaye mw’ijuru, c’umugore yambaye izuba, ukwezi kuri musi y’ibirenge vyiwe, afise n’urugori rw’inyenyeri cumi na zibiri ku mutwe.
Uwo mugore yari yibungenze kandi yari mu mubabaro nk’uwugira yibaruke.
Haca haboneka n’ikindi kimenyetso mw’ijuru, c’igisato kinini gitukura gifise imitwe indwi n’amahembe cumi, n’urugori ku mutwe umwe umwe wose.
Umurizo waco uhungurura ica gatatu c’inyenyeri zo kw’ijuru zikorokera kw’isi. Maze ca gisato gica gihagarara imbere ya wa mugore yagira yibaruke kugira ngo gice kimira uwo mwana akivuka.
Uwo mugore aca avyara umwana w’umuhungu, kandi uwo azotwazanya umukazo amahanga. Uwo mwana aca arasahurwa ajanwa mw’ijuru ku Mana, hafi y’intebe y’inganji yayo.
Wa mugore aca ahungira mu bugararwa aho Imana yamuteguriye ngo amare imisi igihumbi n’amajana abiri na mirongo itandatu agaburirirwaho.
Maze haduka intambara mw’ijuru. Mikayeli n’abamarayika biwe bagwanya ca gisato. Ca gisato na co n’abamarayika baco barabagwanya.
Ariko ca gisato kiraneshwa, maze abamarayika baco na co birukanwa mw’ijuru.
Ca gisato, ari co kiyoka ca kera citwa Umubi canke Satani, uwuzimiza isi yose, gikororerwa kw’isi n’abamarayika baco bose.

Nca numva ijwi rirenga rivuye mw’ijuru, rivuga riti: “Noneho agakiza, ububasha n’Ubwami vy’Imana yacu, n’ubushobozi bwa Kristo wayo vyashitse. Kuko umurezi wa bene Data, uwabarega imbere y’Imana yacu ijoro n’umurango yakororewe hasi.
Bamuneshesheje amaraso y’Umwagazi hamwe n’ijambo ryo gushinga intahe. Bemeye guheba ubuzima bwabo, ntibatinya urupfu.
None rero nimunezerwe mwa majuru, hamwe namwe ibiyabamwo mwese. Ariko haragowe isi n’ibiyaga, kuko wa mubi yabikororewemwo! Yuzuye uburake bwinshi, kuko azi ko asigaje igihe gito.”
Ca gisato kimaze kubona ko cakororewe kw’isi, gica gikurikirana wa mugore yavyara wa mwana w’umuhungu.
Wa mugore aca ahabwa amababa nk’ay’inkona nini kugira ngo agurukire mu kibanza yateguriwe mu bugararwa ngo ahamare imyaka itatu n’igice agaburirirwayo, kure ya ca kiyoka.
Ca kiyoka kigerageza gusuka uruzi runini ruva mu kanwa kaco kugira ngo wa mugore atwarwe.
Ariko isi ica ifasha wa mugore, irasama imira rwa ruzi rwava mu kanwa ka ca gisato.
Maze ca gisato gica cuzura ubushangashirwe ku bw’uwo mugore, gica kija gutera intambara abasigaye bo mu ruvyaro rwiwe. Abo ni abitondeye amabwirizwa y’Imana bakama bashingira intahe Yesu.

Ca gisato gica gihagarara ku musenyi wo ku nkengera y’ikiyaga. Hanyuma nca mbona igikoko gisokorotse kiva mu kiyaga. Cari gifise amahembe cumi n’imitwe indwi; ihembe ryose ryariko urugori, kandi ku mutwe wose hari handitseko izina ricokora Imana.
Ico gikoko casa n’ingwe, ariko kikagira ibinono nk’ivy’idubu n’umunwa nk’uw’intambwe. Ca gisato gica giha ububasha bwaco ico gikoko, kigiha n’intebe y’inganji n’ubutware buhambaye.
Ku mutwe umwe w’ico gikoko hari igikomere giteye ubwoba, cashobora kucica, ariko ico gikomere gica kirakira. Maze isi yose itangarira cane ico gikoko, iranagikurikira.
Abantu bose basenga ca gisato kuko cahaye ububasha ico gikoko, basenga na ca gikoko bavuga bati: “Ni nde ahwanye n’ico gikoko? Ni nde yokigwanya akakinesha?”
Ca gikoko gica cemererwa kuvuga amajambo y’ubwibone yo gucokora Imana, congera gihabwa n’uburenganzira bwo kumara amezi mirongo ine n’abiri gikora ivyo kigomba vyose.
Nuko gica gitangura kuvuga amajambo mabi yo gucokora Imana, no gutuka izina ryayo, n’aho iba, n’ababa mw’ijuru.
Gica gihabwa ububasha bwo kugwanya abera b’Imana no kubanesha. Congera gihabwa n’ububasha bwo kuganza imiryango yose, amoko yose, indimi zose n’amahanga yose.
Kandi ababa kw’isi bose basenga ico gikoko. Abo ni abatanditswe mu gitabu c’ubugingo c’Umwagazi w’Intama yishwe, kuva isi itararemwa.
Uwufise amatwi yo kwumva niyumve.
“Uwagenewe kujanwa nk’inyagano, azojanwa nk’inyagano. Uwagenewe kwicishwa inkota azokwicwa n’inkota.” Ibi bisigura ko abera b’Imana bategerezwa kwihangana cane bakagumana ukwizera.
Hanyuma nca mbona ikindi gikoko gisokorotse kiva mw’isi. Cari gifise amahembe abiri ameze nk’ay’intama, ariko cavuga nk’igisato.
Cari gifise ububasha bwa ca gikoko ca mbere, kirakiganziriza. Gica gitegeka isi yose n’abantu bose bayibako gusenga ca gikoko ca mbere, kimwe cakira igikomere giteye ubwoba.
Gica gikora ibimenyetso n’ibitangaza bihambaye, mbere kikamanura n’umuriro ukava kw’ijuru ugakorokera kw’isi abantu bose barorera.

Kubera ubwo bubasha cahawe bwo gukora ibimenyetso n’ibitangaza ku bwa ca gikoko ca mbere, kizimiza ababa kw’isi. Gitegeka ababa kw’isi gukora igishushanyo ca ca gikoko ca mbere cari carakomerekejwe cane n’inkota, ariko kigakira.
Gica gihabwa ububasha bwo guha ubuzima ca gishushanyo ca ca gikoko ca mbere, kugira ngo gishobore kuvuga no kwica abo bose bazoba banse kugisenga.
Congera gitegeka ko abantu bose, abakuru n’abato, abatunzi n’abakene, abagurano n’abidegemvya, bashirwako ikimenyetso mu kiganza canke mu ruhanga,
kugira ngo ntihagire n’umwe ashobora gusuma canke kudandaza atagifise. Ico kimenyetso ni izina rya ca gikoko canke igiharuro gihagarariye izina ryaco.
Gutahura ibi bisaba ubwenge. Uwufise ubwenge arashobora gutahura ivy’ico giharuro c’ico gikoko, kuko ni igiharuro gihagarariye izina ry’umuntu. Ico giharuro ni 666.
Hanyuma nca mbona Umwagazi w’intama ahagaze ku musozi Siyoni, ari kumwe n’abantu ibihumbi ijana na mirongo ine na bine bari banditseko izina ryiwe n’irya Se mu ruhanga.
Nca numva ijwi rivuye mw’ijuru risamirana nk’amazi y’isumo rinini, kandi rivuga nk’umuturagaro uteye ubwoba. Iryo jwi numvise ryari rimeze nk’iry’abacuraranzi bacuraranga inanga.

Baririmbira indirimbo nshasha imbere y’intebe y’inganji, n’imbere ya vya binyabugingo bine hamwe na ba bashingantahe. Nta n’umwe yashobora kwiga iyo ndirimbo, kiretse bamwe ibihumbi ijana na mirongo ine na bine bacunguwe bakuwe mw’isi.
Abo ni bo batandujwe n’abagore, ariko bazigamye ukwera kwabo, bakurikira wa Mwagazi aho aja hose. Bacunguwe bakuwe mu bantu, kugira ngo bashikanirwe Imana na wa Mwagazi nk’ivyeze ubwa mbere.
Nta bubeshi bwava mu kanwa kabo kandi ntibagira umugayo.
Hanyuma nca mbona uwundi mumarayika aguruka mu kirere, atwaye Ubutumwa Bwiza agiye kubwira abari mw’isi mu moko yose, mu miryango yose, mu ndimi zose no mu mahanga yose.
Avuga n’ijwi rirenga ati: “Mutinye Imana kandi muyihe icubahiro, kuko igihe cayo co guca imanza kirashitse. Musenge iyaremye ijuru n’isi, ibiyaga n’amasoko y’amazi.”

Hanyuma uwundi mumarayika agira kabiri aca akurikira uwo wa mbere avuga ati: “Kirasenyutse! Kirasenyutse Babiloni, igisagara gihambaye, canywesheje amahanga yose ku muvinyu w’ubusambanyi bwaco bukomeye.”

Mu nyuma haza umumarayika agira gatatu, na we akurikira avuga n’ijwi rirenga ati: “Nihagira uwusenga ca gikoko n’igishushanyo caco, canke akemera gushirwako ca kimenyetso caco mu ruhanga canke mu kiganza,
na we nyene azonywa ku muvinyu w’uburake bw’Imana, wasutswe mu gikombe c’ubushangashirwe bw’Imana utavanze. Azobabarizwa mu muriro n’ibizuku vyaka imbere y’abamarayika n’imbere ya wa Mwagazi.

Umwotsi w’ukubabazwa kwabo uzokwama upfunduka ibihe vyose. Abazosenga ico gikoko n’igishushanyo caco, canke abazokwemera gushirwako ikimenyetso c’izina ryaco, nta gahengwe bazogira haba mw’ijoro canke ku murango.”
Ni co gituma abera b’Imana, bubaha amabwirizwa yayo bakaguma mu kwizera Yesu, bakwiye kwihangana cane.

Hanyuma nca numva ijwi rivuye mw’ijuru rimbwira riti: “Andika ibi bikurikira: uhereye ubu, hahiriwe abapfa bapfira mu Mwami.” Mpwemu aravuga ati: “Egome, bazoruhuka imiruho barushe, kuko ibikorwa vyabo bizobaherekeza.”
Hanyuma nca mbona igicu cera, kandi kuri co hari hicaye uwusa n’Umwana w’Umuntu. Yari yambaye urugori rw’inzahabu ku mutwe, afise n’umuhoro ukarishe mu minwe.
Haca haza uwundi mumarayika avuye mu rusengero, arasemerera abwira umwe yicaye ku gicu ati: “Bangura umuhoro wawe wimbure, kuko igihe co kwimbura kirageze, ivyimburwa vyo kw’isi bireze.”
Nuko umwe yicaye ku gicu aca acisha umuhoro wiwe kw’isi, maze isi yose irimburwa.
Uwundi mumarayika asohoka avuye mu rusengero mw’ijuru, kandi na we nyene yari afise umuhoro ukarishe.

Uwundi mumarayika, yari afise ububasha ku muriro, aza avuye ku gicaniro, ahamagara umwe afise umuhoro ukarishe n’ijwi rirenga avuga ati: “Fata umuhoro wawe ukarishe, usorome inzabibu zo mu ruzabibu rwo kw’isi, kuko inzabibu zireze.”
Wa mumarayika aca abangurira umuhoro kw’isi, asoroma inzabibu, azisuka mu bwato bw’uburake bw’Imana.
Izo nzabibu ziganirwa mu bwato buri inyuma y’igisagara, amaraso yazo araduga gushika ku minwa y’amafarasi, yongera arasanzara gushika nko ku birometero amajana atatu.
Hanyuma mbona mw’ijuru ikindi kimenyetso gihambaye kandi gitangaje. Hari abamarayika indwi bafise ivyago indwi vya nyuma, bizorangiza uburake bwose bw’Imana.
Nca mbona n’ikimeze nk’ikiyaga c’ibiyo bivanze n’umuriro. I ruhande yaco hari hahagaze abanesheje ca gikoko n’igishushanyo caco n’ikimenyetso c’izina ryaco. Bari bafise inanga bahawe n’Imana,

baririmba indirimbo ya Mose umukozi w’Imana n’iy’Umwagazi w’intama, bavuga bati: “Ibikorwa vyawe birahambaye kandi biratangaje, Mwami, Imana Mushoboravyose. Inzira zawe ziragororotse kandi ni iz’ukuri, Mwami w’amahanga.
Ni nde atazogutinya ga Mwami, ngo aheshe icubahiro izina ryawe? Ni wewe wenyene wera. Amahanga yose azoza, apfukame imbere yawe agusenge, kuko ibikorwa vyawe vy’ukugororoka vyaramenyekanye.”
Hanyuma y’ivyo nca mbona mw’ijuru urusengero rurimwo ihema ry’isezerano rwuguruye.
Ba bamarayika indwi bafise ivyago indwi baca barasohoka bava mu rusengero. Bari bambaye impuzu zera derere zitanduye, bakenyeje imikanda y’inzahabu.
Kimwe mu binyabugingo gica giha ba bamarayika indwi inzavya indwi zuzuyemwo uburake bw’Imana ihoraho.
Ubwo nyene urusengero ruca rwuzura umwotsi uvuye mu cubahiro c’Imana n’ububasha bwayo, ntihaba hakigira uwushobora kwinjira muri urwo rusengero gushika ba bamarayika indwi bashikije vya vyago indwi.
Nca numva ijwi rirenga rivuye mu rusengero ribwira ba bamarayika indwi riti: “Nimugende, musuke uburake bw’Imana buri mu nzavya indwi kw’isi.”
Umumarayika wa mbere aragenda asuka ivyari mu rwavya rwiwe kw’isi. Haca haduka ibisebe bibi kandi bibabaza ku bantu bari bafise ikimenyetso ca ca gikoko bagasenga n’igishushanyo caco.
Uwa kabiri asuka ivyari mu rwavya rwiwe ku kiyaga, gica gihinduka nk’amaraso y’umuntu yapfuye. Ivyaba mu kiyaga vyose bica birapfa.
Uwa gatatu na we asuka ivyari mu rwavya rwiwe mu masoko y’inzunzi n’ay’imigezi, aca ahinduka amaraso.
Nca numva umumarayika yari afise ububasha ku mazi avuga ati: “Wewe Wera, uwuriho kandi wamyeho, uragororotse mu guca imanza nk’izi.
Basheshe amaraso y’abera bawe n’abavugishwa bawe, none ubahaye amaraso ngo banywe. Ni yo mpera bakwiriye.”
Nca numva igicaniro cishura giti: “Egome, Mwami Imana Mushoboravyose, imanza zawe ni iz’ukuri kandi ziragororotse.”
Umumarayika wa kane na we asuka ivyari mu rwavya rwiwe ku zuba, rica rihabwa ububasha bwo guturiza abantu umuriro waryo.
Abantu bose baturirwa n’ubushuhe buteye ubwoba; baca batuka izina ry’Imana yo ifise ububasha kuri ivyo vyago. Ariko ntibihana ivyaha vyabo ngo bagaruke ku Mana bayihe icubahiro.
Umumarayika wa gatanu na we asuka ivyari mu rwavya rwiwe ku ntebe y’inganji ya ca gikoko, ubwami bwaco buca bwuzura umwijima. Ababubamwo bihekenya indimi kubera imibabaro barimwo,
batuka Imana yo mw’ijuru kubera imibabaro yabo n’ibisebe vyabo, ariko ntibihana ivyaha bakoze ngo bagaruke ku Mana.
Umumarayika wa gatandatu na we asuka ivyari mu rwavya rwiwe mu ruzi runini Efurata, amazi yarwo aca arakama, kugira ngo abami bo mu buseruko baronke aho bacisha ingabo zabo.
Nca mbona impwemu mbi zitatu zimeze nk’ibikere, ziva mu kanwa ka ca gisato, n’aka ca gikoko, n’aka wa muvugishwa w’ibinyoma.
Izo ni impwemu z’abadayimoni zikora ibitangaza n’ibimenyetso, zikaja ku bami bo kw’isi yose, kugira ngo zibakoranirize ku rugamba ku musi uhambaye w’Imana Mushoboravyose.
“Ehe ndaje nk’igisuma atawunyiteze. Hahiriwe uwama ari maso, akama yambaye, kugira ngo ntazogende ari gusa, akamaramazwa n’ubwambure bwiwe.”
Maze zica zikoraniriza ba bami mu kibanza citwa Haramagedoni mu rurimi rw’Igiheburayo.
Umumarayika w’indwi aca asuka ivyari mu rwavya rwiwe mu kirere, maze mu rusengero humvikana ijwi riva ku ntebe y’inganji, rivuga riti: “Birarangiye!”
Ubwo nyene haca haboneka imiravyo, humvikana urwamo rwinshi, imituragaro na nyamugigima ikomeye itari yigere kubaho kuva abantu babaho kw’isi. Iyo nyamugigima yari iteye ubwoba cane.

Ca gisagara gikuru gica cigaburamwo gutatu, ibisagara vy’amahanga birasenyagurika. Maze Imana yibuka ivyaha vya Babiloni igisagara gihambaye, ica ikinywesha ku gikombe cuzuye umuvinyu w’uburake bwayo buteye ubwoba.
Amazinga yose aranyika, n’imitumba yose ntiyaba ikiboneka.
Haca haza urubura rwinshi ruvuye kw’ijuru rugwa ku bantu kandi rumwe rwapima nk’ibiro mirongo itanu. Abantu baca batuka Imana kubera ico cago c’urubura, kuko cari icago giteye ubwoba.
Umwe muri ba bamarayika indwi bari basutse ivyago indwi, aranyegera ambwira ati: “Ingo ndakwereke igihano kizohabwa wa mumaraya ahambaye, aganje ibiyaga vyinshi.
Abami b’isi bose basambanye na we, kandi ababa kw’isi bose baborejwe n’umuvinyu w’ubusambanyi bwiwe.”
Wa mumarayika aca antwara mu bugaragwa muri Mpwemu. Nca mbona umugore agendera ku gikoko gitukura, gifise imitwe indwi n’amahembe cumi, cuzuyeko n’amajambo yo gutuka Imana.

Uwo mugore yari yambaye impuzu z’agaciro zitukura, kandi yari ashazishije inzahabu n’utubuye tw’igiciro, hamwe n’imaragarita. Mu minwe yari afise igikombe c’inzahabu cuzuye ibiterasoni n’ibihumanya bivuye ku busambanyi bwiwe.
Ibi ni vyo vyari vyanditse mu ruhanga rwiwe: babiloni hahambaye nyina w’abamaraya bose n’ibihumanya vyo kw’isi.
Kandi narabona ko uwo mugore yari aborewe n’amaraso y’abera, amaraso y’abashingiye intahe Yesu. Ndamubonye ndatangara cane.
Wa mumarayika arambarira ati: “Kubera iki utangaye? Reka ndagusigurire ibinyegezwa vy’urya mugore n’ico gikoko agenderako gifise imitwe indwi n’amahembe cumi.

Kirya gikoko wabonye, carigeze kubaho ariko ubu ntikikiriho, ariko kizogaruka vuba kivuye i kuzimu, kije kurandurwa. Ababa kw’isi batandikishije amazina yabo mu gitabu c’ubugingo kuva isi ikiremwa bazotangara nibabona ico gikoko, kuko cigeze kubaho, ubu kikaba kitakiriho, hanyuma kikazoba kizogaruka.
Gutahura ibi bisaba umutima w’ubwenge: Arya mahembe indwi ni imitumba indwi uwo mugore yicayeko, kandi yerekana kandi abami indwi.
Batanu muri bo baratembagajwe, umwe araganje, uwundi ntaraza, ariko niyaza, inganji yiwe izoba iyo umwanya muto cane.
Kirya gikoko cabayeho ariko ubu kikaba kitariho ni umwami agira umunani. Ni umwe muri bamwe indwi kandi na we nyene agiye kuranduka.
Arya mahembe cumi wabonye, ni abami cumi batarahabwa ubwami, ariko bazohabwa ububasha bamare ikiringo c’isaha imwe baganje hamwe na ca gikoko.
Abo cumi bose bafise intumbero imwe kandi bazoha ca gikoko ububasha n’ubushobozi vyabo.
Bazotera intambara bagwanye Umwagazi w’intama, ariko azobanesha kuko ni Uwuganza abatware kandi ni Umwami w’abami; kandi abo yahamagaye akabatoranya bakamubera abizigirwa, bazoba bari kumwe na we.”
Wa mumarayika aca ambwira ati: “Birya biyaga wabonye wa mumaraya yari yicayeko, ni amasinzi y’abantu bo mu mahanga yose no mu ndimi zose.
Kirya gikoko n’amahembe cumi yaco wabonye bizokwanka urya mumaraya. Bizomwambura ivyo afise vyose bimusige ari gusa. Bizomurya inyama hanyuma ibisigazwa vyiwe bibiturire mu muriro.
Kuko Imana yashize mu mitima yavyo gushitsa ivyo ishaka, bizokwemeranya guha ububasha bwavyo ca gikoko, gushitsa amajambo y’Imana ashikijwe.
Urya mugore wabonye ni igisagara gihambaye kiganza abami bo kw’isi.”
Inyuma y’ivyo nca mbona uwundi mumarayika yururuka ava mw’ijuru. Yari afise ubushobozi bwinshi kandi isi yari imurikiwe n’ugukayangana kwiwe.

Arasemerera n’ijwi rirenga ati: “ ‘Kirasenyutse! Kirasenyutse Babiloni, igisagara gihambaye!’ Ubu gihindutse inzu y’abadayimoni, ubwihisho bw’impwemu zihumanye zose, ubwihisho bw’inyoni zihumanye zose, n’ubwihisho bw’ibikoko bihumanye kandi bisesema vyose.
Kuko amahanga yose yanyoye ku muvinyu w’ubusambanyi bwaco burenze urugero. Abami b’isi bose basambanye na co, kandi abadandaza bo kw’isi batungishijwe n’ibikayangana vyaco vyinshi cane.”
Nca numva irindi jwi rivuye mw’ijuru rivuga riti: “ ‘Nimusohoke mukivemwo, mwa bwoko bwanje,’ kugira ngo ntimwifatanye na co mu vyaha vyaco, maze mugashikirwa n’ivyago bizogishikira.
Kuko ivyaha vyaco vyarundanye bishika mw’ijuru, none Imana yibutse ibikorwa bibi vyaco.
Nimucishure ivyo cakoreye abandi, mugikorere incuro zibiri ivyo cakoze. Nimwuzuze igikombe canywesherejeko abandi inzoga iboreza incuro zibiri kurusha.
Cishize hejuru, cibera mu bikayangana; none nimucishure imibabaro n’ivyago. Cirata mu mutima kiti: ‘Nganje nk’umwamikazi; sindi umupfakazi, kandi sinzokwigera ngandara.’
None rero ku musi umwe, kizohwikirwa n’ivyago: urupfu, ikigandaro n’ikigoyi. Kizotongorwa n’umuriro, kuko Umwami Imana agiciriye urubanza ari umunyabushobozi.”
Abami bo kw’isi basambanye bakongera bagasangira na co ubutunzi bwaco, nibabona umwotsi wo gutongorwa kwaco, bazokiririra bongere bakigandarire.

Bazobirabira kure kubera gutinya imibabaro igishikiye, maze bakome induru bavuga bati: “Ibara! Ibara riraguye kuri ca gisagara gihambaye, Babiloni ca gisagara gikomeye! Mu kanya isase, urubanza waciriwe ruragushitseko!”
Abadandaza bo kw’isi bazokiririra bakigandarire, kuko atawuzoba akibagurira ibidandazwa vyabo.

Cahora kibagurira ibidandazwa bigizwe n’inzahabu, ifeza, amabuye y’agaciro n’utubuyenge; impuzu zera nziza, izitukura n’izisa n’agahama nziza; ivyakozwe mu biti bimota neza, ivyakozwe mu masenge y’inzovu, ivyabajwe mu biti vyiza vy’igiciro kinini, ivyacuzwe mu butare bw’umwakaka no mu vyuma hamwe n’amabuye abajwe.

Cabagurira kandi ivyitwa kinamoni n’ibindi birungo; amavuta amota neza, ibimotesha neza amavuta yitwa mira n’imibavu; imivinyu n’amavuta ya elayo; ifu inoze neza n’ingano; inka n’intama; amafarasi n’imikogote hamwe n’abantu bagurishwa nk’abagurano.
Bazovuga bati: “Ivyo wahahamira cane uravyatswe. Ubutunzi bwawe n’ugukayangana kwawe vyose biguhezeko, ntibizosubira kuboneka.”
Abadandaza bari baratungishijwe no gushora ivyo bidandazwa muri co, bazobirabira kure kubera gutinya imibabaro igishikiye. Bazorira, bagandare,
bavuga bati: “Ibara! Ibara riraguye kuri ca gisagara gihambaye, cambaye impuzu z’igiciro kinini, izitukura n’iz’agahama, gishazishije inzahabu n’amabuye y’agaciro n’utubuyenge.
Mu kanya isase, ubwo butunzi bwose buhindutse ubusa!” Abagendesha ubwato, ababugenderamwo, abasoza hamwe n’abakorera ibikorwa vyabo mu kiyaga, bazobirabira kure.
Nibabona umwotsi w’ugutongorwa kwaco, bazovuga bati: “Mbega hari igisagara cari gihambaye nk’iki?”
Bazokwisuka umukungugu ku mitwe, barire, bagandare, bavuga bati: “Ibara! Ibara riraguye kuri ca gisagara gihambaye, kimwe catungisha abafise amato ku kiyaga! Mu kanya isase, gihindutse ubugaragwa!
Nimubinezerererwe, yemwe mwa majuru! Nimunezerwe, yemwe bwoko bw’Imana! Nimunezerwe, yemwe ntumwa n’abavugishwa! Imana yagiciriye urubanza ruhwanye n’ivyo cabakoreye.”

Hanyuma umumarayika w’inkomezi aca atora ibuye rimeze nk’urusyo runini, ariterera mu kiyaga, avuga ati: “Uku ni ko Babiloni, igisagara gihambaye, kizokubitwa hasi biteye ubwoba, kandi ntikizosubira kuboneka.

Nta bavuza inanga, abaririmvyi, abavuza imyironge canke inzumbete bazosubira kwumvikana muri wewe. Nta bakora utugenegene tw’ubwoko na bumwe bazoba bakiboneka muri wewe. Nta jwi ry’urusyo rizosubira kwumvikana muri wewe.
Nta muco w’amatara uzosubira gukayangana muri wewe. Nta majwi y’umukwe n’umugeni azosubira kwumvikana muri wewe. Abadandaza bawe bari rurangiranwa kw’isi. Amahanga yose yazimijwe n’amareba yawe.
Muri co habonetse amaraso y’abavugishwa n’ay’abera b’Imana, hamwe n’ay’abandi bose biciwe kw’isi.”
Inyuma y’ivyo nca numva amajwi asamirana mw’ijuru ameze nk’ay’abantu amasinzi n’amasinzi, asemerera ati: “Haleluya! Agakiza, icubahiro n’ubushobozi, ni ivy’Imana yacu,
kuko imanza zayo ni iz’ukuri kandi ziragororotse. Yaciriye urubanza wa mumaraya akomeye, umwe yononesha isi ubusambanyi bwiwe. Yaramwihoye ku bw’amaraso y’abakozi bayo.”
Bongera barasemerera bati: “Haleluya! Umwotsi uva muri ca gisagara wama uduga ibihe vyose.”
Ba batama mirongo ibiri na bane na vya binyabugingo bine baca bikubita hasi bubamye, batazira Imana yicaye ku ntebe y’inganji, bavuga bati: “Amen! Haleluya!”
Haca humvikana ijwi rivuye kuri ya ntebe y’inganji, rivuga riti: “Nimushime Imana, yemwe bakozi bayo, namwe abayubaha mwese, abahambaye n’aboroshe.”
Nca numva amajwi avuga nk’ay’abantu amasinzi n’amasinzi, avuga nk’imipfunda yo mu kiyaga ikomeye, agaturagara nk’inkuba, avuga ati: “Haleluya! Umwami wacu Imana Mushoboravyose iraganje.
Tunezerwe, duhimbarwe, tuyihe icubahiro! Kuko ubukwe bw’Umwagazi w’intama burashitse, kandi umugeni wiwe aramaze kwitegura.
Impuzu zera, zimesuye kandi zikayangana, ni zo yahawe ngo yambare.” Impuzu zera zisigura ibikorwa vyiza vy’ukugororoka vy’abera b’Imana.
Wa mumarayika aca ambarira ati: “Andika uti: Hahiriwe abatumiwe ku mazimano y’ubukwe bw’Umwagazi w’intama!” Yongerako ati: “Aya ni amajambo y’ukuri y’Imana.”

Numvise ivyo nca nikubita hasi nubamye ngo ndamusenge. Ariko aca ambwira ati: “Ntugakore ivyo! Nanje ndi umukozi w’Imana co kimwe na we na bene So bashingira intahe ukwizera bafise muri Kristo. Usenge Imana yonyene. Kuko ugushingira intahe Yesu ni impwemu y’ubuvugishwa.”
Maze nca mbona ijuru rirugurutse n’ifarasi yera ihagaze imbere yanje. Uwayigenderako yitwa Mwizigirwa na Munyakuri, kuko aca imanza zibereye kandi akagwana intambara mu buryo bugororotse.
Amaso yiwe yasa n’imbeya z’umuriro kandi yari afise ingori nyinshi ku mutwe. Yari afise izina rimwanditseko kandi nta n’umwe ashobora kuritahura atari we nyene.
Yari yambaye ikanzu yinitswe mu maraso, kandi izina ryiwe ni Jambo w’Imana.
Ingabo zo mw’ijuru zariko ziramukurikira ziri ku mafarasi yera, zambaye impuzu zera zikayangana.
Mu kanwa kiwe havamwo inkota ikarishe; kandi iyo ni yo yakubitisha amahanga. “Azoganzisha amahanga agacinyizo.” Azorekura ubushangashirwe bw’Imana Mushoboravyose nk’uwuganira inzabibu mu bwato.
Kw’ikanzu yiwe no kw’itako rwiwe hari handitseko ngo: umwami w’abami, uwuganza abatware.
Nongera mbona umumarayika yari ahagaze mu zuba, asemerera n’ijwi rirenga abwira ibisiga biguruka mu kirere ati: “Nimuze, mukoranire ku mazimano ahambaye y’Imana,
kugira ngo murye inyama z’abami, abagabisha b’ingabo, abahambaye, amafarasi n’abayagenderako, n’inyama z’abantu bose, abagurano n’abidegemvya, abakuru n’abato.”
Nca mbona ca gikoko, mbona n’abami bo mw’isi bose n’ingabo zabo zikoraniye kugwanya umwe agendera kw’ifarasi n’ingabo ziwe.

Ariko ca gikoko gica gifatwa mpiri hamwe na wa muvugishwa w’ibinyoma yakora ibitangaza mw’izina ryaco. Ivyo bitangaza ni vyo cahendesha bamwe bashirwako ikimenyetso caco, bagasenga n’igishushanyo caco. Ca gikoko na wa muvugishwa w’ibinyoma baca batererwa mu kiyaga caka umuriro.
Za ngabo zose zica zicishwa ya nkota ikarishe yava mu kanwa k’uwugendera kuri ya farasi yera, maze ibisiga vyo mu kirere vyose bica birya inyama zabo.
Hanyuma mbona umumarayika yururuka ava mw’ijuru, afise impfunguruzo z’i kuzimu, afise umunyororo munini mu minwe.
Aca afata ca gisato, ari co kiyoka ca kera, ari we wa mubi canke Satani, arakiboha, kimara imyaka igihumbi kiboshe.
Aca agikororera i kuzimu, acugaranirayo, kugira ngo ntikibandanye kizimiza amahanga gushika iyo myaka igihumbi iheze. Ariko inyuma y’iyo myaka kizorekurwa akanya gatoya.

Nca mbona intebe z’inganji zicaweko n’abahawe ubushobozi bwo guca imanza. Hanyuma nca mbona imishaha y’abaciwe imitwe bahorwa gushingira intahe Yesu no kuvuga ijambo ry’Imana. Abo ntibigeze basenga ca gikoko canke ngo basenge igishushanyo caco, kandi ntibashizweko ikimenyetso caco ku ruhanga canke mu kiganza. Nuko basubira kuba bazima, baganzanya na Kristo imyaka igihumbi.
(Abapfuye bandi ntibasubiye kuzuka iyo myaka igihumbi idaheze.) Iri ni ryo zuka rya mbere.
Barahiriwe kandi ni abera abazoba muri iryo zuka rya mbere. Urupfu rwa kabiri nta bubasha ruzobagirako, ariko bazoba abaherezi b’Imana na Kristo, kandi bazoganzanya na we imyaka igihumbi.
Ya myaka igihumbi iheze, Satani azorekurwa ave mw’ibohero ryiwe,
hanyuma asohoke aje kuzimiza amahanga yitwa Gogi na Magogi, mu mpande zine z’isi. Azobakoranya ngo batere intambara, kandi bazoba ari benshi bangana n’umusenyi wo ku kiyaga.
Nuko ndababona bagendagenda isi yose, bakikuza ikibanza abera b’Imana barimwo n’igisagara Imana ikunda. Ariko umuriro uramanuka uvuye mw’ijuru, urabarigita.
Wa mubi yabahenda, atabwa mu kiyaga caka umuriro, aho ca gikoko na wa muvugishwa w’ibinyoma bari batawe. Bazobabazwa ijoro n’umurango, ibihe bidashira.
Hanyuma nca mbona intebe y’inganji nini cane, mbona n’uwuyicayeko. Ijuru n’isi birahunga biva imbere yiwe, ntivyasubira kuboneka.

Nca mbona abapfuye, abakuru n’abato, bahagaze imbere ya ya ntebe, maze ibitabu birugururwa. Ikindi gitabu kirugururwa, ni co gitabu c’ubugingo. Abapfuye bacirwa urubanza rw’ivyo bakoze nk’uko vyari vyanditse muri ico gitabu.
Ikiyaga kigarukana abapfuye bari muri co, urupfu na kuzimu bigarukana abari muri vyo, umwe wese aciribwa urubanza ruhwanye n’ivyo yakoze.
Maze rupfu na kuzimu bitererwa muri ca kiyaga caka umuriro. Ico kiyaga caka umuriro ni co rupfu rwa kabiri.
Umuntu wese atasanze izina ryiwe ryanditswe mu gitabu c’ubugingo, atererwa muri ico kiyaga caka umuriro.
Hanyuma nca mbona “ijuru rishasha n’isi nshansha,” kuko ijuru rya mbere n’isi ya mbere vyari vyakuweho, kandi nta n’ikiyaga cari kikihari.
Nca mbona n’Igisagara Cera, Yerusalemu nshasha, yururuka ivuye mw’ijuru ku Mana, uteguwe nk’umugeni yambitswe neza, ateguriwe umugabo wiwe.
Nca numva ijwi rirenga rivuye kuri ya ntebe y’inganji, rivuga riti: “Ehe raba inzu y’Imana iri mu bantu, kandi izobana na bo. Bazoba abantu bayo, kandi Imana ubwayo izobana na bo, ibe Imana yabo.
Izobahanagura amosozi yose ku maso yabo. Nta rupfu canke kugandara, nta kurira canke kubabara bizoba bikiriho, kuko ivya kera bizoba bikuweho.”
Uwari yicaye ku ntebe y’inganji aravuga ati: “Ehe vyose ndabihinduye bishasha!” Aca ambwira ati: “Andika ibi mvuze, kuko aya majambo ni ayo kwizigirwa kandi ni ay’ukuri.”
Yongera ambwira ati: “Birarangiye. Ndi Alufa na Omega, Intango n’Iherezo. Uwunyotewe nzomuha kunywa ku mbizi z’amazi y’ubugingo ku buntu.
Uwuzonesha azotorana ibi vyose kandi nzomubera Imana, na we azombera umwana.
Ariko abahemuka, abatizera, abakora ibiterasoni, abicanyi, abasambanyi, abapfumu, abasenga ibigirwamana n’ababeshi bose, ikibanza cabo ni ikiyaga caka umuriro, ari rwo rupfu rwa kabiri.”
Umwe muri ba bamarayika indwi bari bafise inzavya indwi zarimwo ivyago indwi vya nyuma araza ambarira ati: “Ingo ndakwereke umugeni, ari we mugore wa wa Mwagazi w’intama.”
Aca anjana muri mpwemu, andugana ku musozi munini kandi muremure, aca anyereka igisagara cera, Yerusalemu, cururuka kiva mw’ijuru ku Mana.
Ico gisagara cakayangana ubwiza bw’Imana kandi imishwarara yaco yari imeze nk’iy’akabuye k’igiciro kitwa Yasipi, kibonerana nk’ikiyo.

Cari kizitijwe uruhome runini mu bwaguke kandi rurerure, rufise amarembo cumi n’abiri arinzwe n’abamarayika cumi na babiri. Kandi amazina y’imiryango cumi n’ibiri ya Isirayeli yari yanditse kuri ayo marembo.
Mu buseruko hari amarembo atatu, mu buraruko atatu, mu bumanuko atatu, no mu burengero atatu nyene.
Uruzitiro rw’ico gisagara rwari rwubakiye ku mabuye cumi n’abiri y’urufatiro, ari zo ntumwa z’Umwagazi w’intama.
Wa mumarayika yamvugisha yari afise ico gupimisha gikozwe mu nkoni y’inzahabu, kugira ngo apime igisagara, amarembo yaco, n’inzitiro zaco.

Igisagara cari kimeze nka kwadarato, uburebure n’ubwaguke vyarangana. Apimye igisagara asanga gifise nk’ibirometero ibihumbi bibiri n’amajana ane vy’ubwaguke, n’ibirometero ibihumbi bibiri n’amajana ane vy’uburebure.
Aca apima uruzitiro, asanga rupima nk’imetero mirongo itandatu z’uburebure.
Uruzitiro rwari rwubakishijwe ibuye ry’igiciro ryitwa yasipi, igisagara na co cari cubakishijwe inzahabu, kibonerana nk’ibiyo.
Umushinge w’uruzitiro rw’ico gisagara wari ushazishijwe n’amabuye y’agaciro y’ubwoko bwose. Irya mbere ryari yasipi, irya kabiri safiro, irya gatatu kalukedoni, irya kane simaragido,
irya gatanu sarudonikisi, irya gatandatu sarudiyo, iry’indwi kilusorito, iry’umunani berulo, iry’icenda topazi, iry’icumi kirusopuraso, iry’icumi na rimwe huwakinto, iry’icumi na kabiri ametusito.

Imiryango y’amarembo uko ari cumi n’ibiri yari ikozwe mw’imaragarita cumi na zibiri, umuryango umwumwe wose wari ukozwe mw’imaragarita imwe. Ibarabara rikuru ryo muri ico gisagara ryari rigizwe n’inzahabu zivugutiwe, rikabonerana nk’ibiyo.
Nta rusengero nabonye muri ico gisagara, kuko Umwami Imana Mushoboravyose n’Umwagazi w’intama ari bo rusengero rwaho.
Muri ico gisagara nta zuba canke ukwezi bikenewe vyo kuhamurikira, kuko ubwiza bw’Imana buhamurikira, kandi Umwagazi w’intama akaba ari we tara ryaho.
Amahanga yose azogendera mu muco waho, kandi abami bo kw’isi bose bazohazana ubutunzi bwabo.
Amarembo y’ico gisagara yama yuguruye, kuko nta joro rihaba.
Ubwiza n’icubahiro vy’amahanga bizozanwa muri co.
Nta kintu gihumanye na kimwe kizokwinjirayo, kandi nta wukora ibiterasoni canke umubeshi azogerayo. Hazojayo abo amazina yabo yanditswe mu gitabu c’ubugingo c’Umwagazi w’intama gusa.
Maze wa mumarayika aca anyereka rwa ruzi rw’amazi y’ubugingo, rubonerana nk’ikiyo, rutemba ruva ku ntebe y’inganji y’Imana n’iy’Umwagazi w’Intama,

rukamanuka ruca hagati muri rya barabara rinini ryo mu gisagara. Ku mpande zompi z’urwo ruzi hari igiti c’ubugingo, cama cumi na kabiri mu mwaka, kikama uko ukwezi gutashe. Kandi amababi yaco ni umuti wo gukiza amahanga.
Nta muvumo uzobayo, kuko intebe y’inganji y’Imana n’iy’Umwagazi w’intama zizoba ziri muri ico gisagara, kandi abakozi bayo bazoyisenga.
Bazobona mu nyonga hayo, kandi izina ryayo rizokwandikwa mu ruhanga rwabo.
Nta joro rizobayo kandi nta muco w’itara canke w’izuba bazokenera, kuko Umwami Imana azobamurikira. Kandi bazoganza ibihe vyose.
Wa mumarayika arambarira ati: “Aya majambo ni ay’ukwizerwa kandi ni ay’ukuri. Umwami, Imana iganza impwemu z’abavugishwa, yarungitse umumarayika wayo kwereka abasavyi bayo ibigiye kuzoshika.”
“Ehe ndaza vuba! Hahirwa abumvira amajambo y’ubuvugishwa yanditse muri uwu muzingo w’igitabu.”
Jewe Yohana, ni jewe niyumviye aya majambo, nibonera n’ivyo vyose. Maze kuvyiyumvira no kuvyibonera, nca nikubita imbere ya wa mumarayika nubamye ngo ndamusenge.

Ariko arambarira ati: “Ntugakore ivyo. Ntukansenge kuko nanje ndi umukozi w’Imana co kimwe na we na bene So b’abavugishwa, ndetse n’abo bose bumvira amajambo ari muri uwu muzingo w’igitabu. Usenge Imana yonyene!”
Yongera ambarira ati: “Aya majambo y’ubuvugishwa ntuyanyegeze kuko igihe kiri hafi.
Uwukora ibibi nabandanye akore ibibi, uwiyanduza nabandanye yandure; uwukora ivyiza nabandanye akora ivyiza, uwejejwe nabandanye yezwe.”
“Ehe ndaza vuba, nzaniye impera umuntu wese ikwiranye n’ivyo yakoze.
Ndi Alufa na Omega, uwa Mbere n’uwa Nyuma, Intango n’Iherezo.
Hahirwa abamesura amakanzu yabo, kuko bazohabwa uburenganzira bwo kurya ku giti c’ubugingo no kwinjira mw’irembo rya ca gisagara.
Inyuma y’igisagara hazoba hari imbwa, abapfumu, abasambanyi, abicanyi, abasenga ibigirwamana hamwe n’abakunda kubesha bakanabikora.
Ni jewe Yesu, narungitse umumarayika wanje ngo aguhe ubu butumwa ubushire amashengero. Nkomoka mu muryango wa Dawidi na samuragwa w’ingoma yiwe, nkaba n’Inyenyeri yakaka yo mu mutwenzi.”
Mpwemu w’Imana n’umugeni baravuga bati: “Kaze.” N’uwumvise aya majambo wese avuge ati: “Kaze.” Uwunyotewe wese naze, kandi uwushaka wese naze anywe ku mazi y’ubugingo ku buntu.

Ndaburiye umuntu wese yumva amajambo y’ubuvugishwa yo muri uwu muzingo w’igitabu: Nihagira uwugira ico yongeye ku vyanditswe muri uwu muzingo w’igitabu, Imana izokwongera ku vyago vyiwe, ivyago bicanditsemwo.
Kandi nihagira ico agabanije ku majambo y’ubuvugishwa ari muri uwu muzingo w’igitabu, Imana izomwaka umugabane wiwe ku giti c’ubugingo no mu Gisagara Cera vyavuzwe muri iki gitabu.
Uwushingira intahe ibi aravuga ati: “Egome, ndaza vuba.” Amen. Kaze Mwami Yesu.
Ubuntu bw’Umwami Yesu bube kuri bose. Amen.
